name: bareMinerals Original Foundation Broad Spectrum SPF 15
about: Skin type:.What it is:.What it does:.What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:.Research results:.Best of Sephora Winner 2008
ingredients: -Titanium Dioxide 12.6%..-Zinc Oxide 21%..Bismuth Oxychloride, Mica, Iron Oxides, Zinc Oxide, Titanium Dioxide...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-SWIRL a small amount of bareMinerals in the lid with the Flawless Application Face Brush until all the bareMinerals are tucked into the bristles..-TAP away excess. There should be no visible bareMinerals on the outside of the brush..-BUFF the bareMinerals into the skin in a circular motion, starting on the outside of your face near your cheekbone, swirling as you go. Buff around your face and then approach your forehead, cheeks, and nose. Buff, buff, buff until you are satisfied with the coverage..-*Remember less is more when applying bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation.

reviews.review_title: Great Color for light yellow-olive toned skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has been a staple for years and years and serves a specific function that my other foundations can't. If you want to go the more natural route and use a mineral sunscreen, like a stick balm for example, they are usually whitish in tone and sticky. This foundation is the PERFECT solution over top! Actually to any sunscreen where you can't layer a liquid foundation over it or it will be a thick oil slick sliding around... This powder mineral foundation goes over sunscreen like a dream and melts right in for a beautiful finish! The sunscreen acts like a great primer with this foundation. You'll still need to use a setting powder on top as this foundation is creamy and doesn't suck up oil, unless you go with the matte version it might a little, but I always find I need a finishing powder over this powder foundation. I like the original better than the matte because I don't have an excessive oil problem and the barely there slight shimmer (not really a shimmer just a slight skin-like glow) looks more skin-like. I tend to mainly use it in the summer when I'm in the sun more, but this foundation also works as a touch-up blurring powder when at the end of the day or mid day your liquid foundation has broken up. It also works as a bedtime foundation where you can't bear to look bad with your guy and need something on that healing zit that won't clog it. A light dab of this is awesome for it's mineral clean ingredients that help the healing, not hinder it. Also this foundation won't spoil in a year like liquid foundations so it lasts forever which is great value if you rotate foundations like I do. I apply this with a very soft flat head brush in swirling motions.  A little goes a long way, if you over apply it will look bad, bring it down your neck onto your collar bone so it looks flawless-natural. For my skin tone being a light yellow-olive undertone, I'm blue-eyed, not asian, you might be surprised this is the perfect color.

reviews.review_text: After reading so many positive reviews, I decided to give it a try. My skin is fair, but since the fair and light were out of stock, I thought I would try the light to medium  shade. Surprisingly, it's extremely light on my skin. Too light in fact. As for how the finish looks on my skin, no amount of buffing works for me. I've tried with a primer, without a primer, different brushes, including the one from Bare Minerals, and all it does is settle in the pores and lines accentuating them. The more I buff, the worse it gets. I guess it's just not meant for me.

In a world where inflation hurts so many peoples pockets, I am not okay with that price increase. In December it used to be $43. It's February and it's already up to $47.

reviews.review_title: Twelve years and hundreds of foundations later....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a faithful customer of Sephora for about 13 years now, and I love trying new products.  Why I haven't written a review on the thousands of products I have tried is beyond me, but I plan to start now because there is so much to share!  I have very dry, eczema prone skin.  I do not have a lot of scarring or pitting, and no concerns with acne.  I have tried any and every foundation you can name, and I will always come back to this.  You have to remember to have a good moisturizer and primer on beneath (which you have allowed to completely dry otherwise this will pill and build up).  I faithfully use the BM recommended brush.  Start with a little and build up slowly.    Like most products, if you don't know how to use this, it will look awful.  But if used correctly, there is nothing like this to give you that everyday, fresh, flawless, glowing skin.    The best part is that it is for both young and mature skin; there is nothing quite like this formula.  I am forever committed and will always come back to this as my mainstay.

reviews.review_title: Nope - wanted to love it but didn't
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but did not. I had been using a powder foundation from Shoppers Drug Mart for years and was obsessed. It was the Nude by nature powder foundation. It left the most beautiful glow and looked so natural I always got so many compliments. Sadly they discontinued it in Canada so I needed a new one. This does not compare. It does not blend into the skin like the other one and somehow looked oily at the end of the day even though I have dry sensitive skin. Don't recommend this one it does not compare to Nude by nature one I loved so dearly.

I also use it almost everyday and it lasts very long. I absolutely love it.

reviews.review_title: It takes up too much time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was not it for me. I was initially hesitant to buy it because I‚Äôm not a loose powder kind of person - I‚Äôm scared I‚Äôll easily have a powder explosion and didn‚Äôt want to bother with that. But let‚Äôs face it, the reviews here are soo  good that I had to try it for the hype. First off, I tried this powder a decent number of times with various buffing brushes. The problem is the whole application process just isn‚Äôt worth the results imo. If I need coverage, I would have to swirl tap and buff a number of times to get the desired effect, because if I use too much at once, it looks powdery. Also, even at ‚Äúfull coverage‚Äù, this is at most the same as only one thin layer of a liquid product. So while it‚Äôs not bad, I just don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs worth it when I can easily achieve a similar and better result with other products with a much easier application process.

It's never cakey, it's the perfect colour match, and it's got the added benefit of having a fully physical SPF in it. I can't do chemical screens as they irritate my skin, so I'm very happy for this. I'm a little older at 43, and even though I have very good skin, this still creases in my eye area and can crease in my nasolabial fold if I overdo it there. Even then, I love this, would recommend, and will repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Simple ingredients, Not irritate to skin
reviews.review_text: Simple ingredients, not irritate to skin, great foundation performance, will repurchase.

reviews.review_text: This is the best product I‚Äôve come across for covering up popped pimples. I know - a powder - but hear me out. Obviously don‚Äôt pop your pimples, it‚Äôs bad. But if you‚Äôre like me and have no self control you need this product. Tap a bit of this on the area with your finger, then blend with a foundation brush. It doesn‚Äôt settle or clump up in the middle or around the edges of the zit like liquid foundation, it just completely covers it. I have dry dry skin and it generally doesn‚Äôt accentuate dry, flaky patches either. I also love how quick and easy it is to apply compared to liquid foundation.

reviews.review_title: ONLY thing you need for RADIANT skin + Compliments
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so so perfect. You can really see why this is such a cult item. It looks like your skin but PERFECTED. Gives the nicest radiant finish that highlights your features naturally without looking artificial. Even up close it looks amazing. This, with a little bit of bronzer and then finished with a setting spray gives an insane look to the skin. The amount of compliments I get from strangers and even from coworkers I'm not even close with is astounding. You can even buy a shade that matches you and then a much deeper shade to use as a bronzer on the perimeter of the face if you don't want to buy the little bronzer they sell. You also might find a better bronzer shade if you do that anyway. This stuff is *chefs kiss*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So glad I decided to try this powder foundation! As an avid foundation wearer for 15+ years I must say this is probably the best I've used for my acne, sensitive prone skin. My skin cleared up 95% after one week of using! Colour match was spot on, it blends beautifully and feels light weight on the skin. I do highly recommend using a primer/setting powder with this foundation, otherwise I find it has no staying power and will slip and slide (I have combination skin). I use The Oridinary Primer and they work very well together.

This foundation is my best shared secret, I've tried so many and nothing does all 3 without making me look powdery. This foundation is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: leaves me looking grey. maybe not the best shade for me. but not a fan of the residue like on my skin.

After the first day of wearing it I was convinced and after two weeks I am a believer! With rosacea, I was always red and needed always to excuse myself (‚ÄúI am hot‚Äù, ‚Äúsorry it‚Äôs rosacea‚Äù) and actually wearing a mask all day. Now my confidence is back. It still seems unreal, I love this product and was fortunate to ‚Äúscore‚Äù the right color the first time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs a magical product. You only need a little and it will give you a flawless natural full coverage finish. It stays all day long even with mask on. It‚Äôs worth a price.

The colour match was very wrong; Thai shade is much lighter than what I actually need. The powder makes the skin caky and shows so much texture. I had it on for about an hour hoping it would look better but it was just horrible.   I did use a primer before and my skin was clean and hydrated.  I am going to try to use this as an eyeshadow primer so I don‚Äôt feel like I wasted $40.

reviews.review_title: wanted to join the hype train...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a staple hg product for many people, but for my combination/oily t-zone skin does not agree with this no matter how I prep/apply to my skin. Every time I use it, it looks chalky (I can see the pigment sitting on my skin), highlights my pores by making them look deeper, zero oil control (look like a greaseball within 1-2 hrs), and overall the lasting power/transfer is not good at all. I‚Äôve used this for a year trying to make it work, but it just always disappoints me :( I much prefer other mineral/loose powder foundations over this one like the tarte Amazonian clay, too faced btw, and mac mineralized sf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This has been my go to for at least 10+ years. I hate liquid foundation or anything that makes my face feel like I have layers of product. This powder has always been a no brainer for me. I‚Äôm fair with pink undertones and this color seems to give me a more even skin tone and isn‚Äôt overly pink like some of the other fair shades. The one thing that is annoying at times is that they are almost always out of stock of the matte formula. The matte is better for oily skin and the original is better for dry. I have oily skin so a lot of the time i have to end up just buying the original even tho it results in my skin glowing almost too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation blends super easy and is almost a full coverage. It appears to blur imperfections. After about three hours it takes on a natural glow which is great for my ageing skin. Unfortunately things took a turn for the worse as I wore it to the gym. Not only did it separate, but it emulsified with my sweat and dripped all over my shirt. I exercise in the middle of the day so it has to be resistant and be long wearing. This is not.

reviews.review_title: Is fair ivory as dark as it looks?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite foundation but I‚Äôm wondering if fair ivory 02 is much darker than the ‚Äúlight‚Äù colour. I usually get the lightest colour but it‚Äôs not available. I‚Äôm fair and have lots of freckles

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally bought this product based on all the positive reviews, and Allure recommendation. I remember when this product came out a looong time ago, and I remember watching infomercials and I wanted it as a kid! I am happy to see the brand still kicking around, and being distributed by Sephora, otherwise I would have completely forgotten about it. I was a little skeptical about the coverage capabilities being a powder. In all honesty, it provides only sheer coverage, similar to a light to medium coverage foundation. If you are looking for full coverage, use this as a setting powder over your concealer, and you will wonder why you never purchased this sooner! The texture has a subtle glow, and it does sort of a miracle job of somehow making your skin glow, while also mattifying. Thus, this product is excellent for combination skin. It is a great all-day foundation, doesn't cake, and application is so quick you can throw it on literally in seconds. It's a perfect quick fix in the morning or before running errands, when you're in a hurry, and does a great job of evening your skin tone and eliminating redness. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fairly Light - for porcelain-to-light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product covers perfectly without looking like I'm wearing makeup

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Ivory 02 - for fair skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not the best powder foundation that I used. Not a lot of coverage, very light weight. Alright, but not gonna buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wish this foundation worked for me because it is buildable and truly has a nice finish to it. Unfortunately, after trial and error I‚Äôve discovered the ingredient bismuth oxychloride which is in this powder causes my skin to breakout like crazy. I‚Äôve had better luck with the matte foundation as it doesn‚Äôt have that ingredient, but the finish isn‚Äôt as luminous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly not that great. Coverage is buildable but it takes a lot of work and the end finish is pretty comparable to other brands. I use it now as a setting powder to make my nose and forehead matte. I liked that it had spf though;  it sure if it really worked. I also didn‚Äôt like that I felt I had to put moisturer on before otherwise my face felt dry.

has a weird orange/yellow undertone that I struggled to work with. Does have really good coverage for a powder, but works best with the brush accompanying it, sold in store. Brush is pretty expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Perfect colour and lasts all day!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve used this foundation since high school and no matter what else I try I always come back to it.   I‚Äôve got very fair skin, and the ‚ÄòFair‚Äô shade is the most perfect colour match I‚Äôve ever found. I use the BM foundation brush to apply, and find that it really helps the foundation blend into my skin (you do have to swirl the product pretty firmly into the brush to warm it up before applying, otherwise I find that it really emphasizes texture/looks cakey and refuses to blend into the skin). I also always make sure that my moisturizer has completely soaked in/dried down or the powder tends to cling to any tacky areas and ends up looking patchy.

reviews.review_title: So glad I came back to this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this foundation for a few years and then switched to a high coverage liquid foundation because my skin was so dry where I was living and my rosacea was getting really bad. I recently moved to a more temperate part of Canada and wanted something less intense for day to day wear and decided to give this another try. I don‚Äôt understand why I ever switched away from it in the first place. The other foundation was definitely making my rosacea worse and was making my skin break out everywhere but I thought my skin was just changing with age. This foundation perfectly covers all redness, seems to even help clear up any pimples, but still lets freckles show through so that your overall look is very radiant and natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it but it isn't as easy to get evenly spread on my skin as my other mineral foundation I had been using. I don't find it easy to get out...you have to sprinkle it into the lid to get it on the brush. I prefer the mesh shield which allows it to be more even on the brush. The sheer sometimes settles into my wrinkles a bit. next time I may try the matte one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far, the best foundation at bare minerals and I‚Äôve always come back to it. My skin has been a bit more oily then usual and the complexion rescue just wasn‚Äôt sitting well on my face anymore, I switched to this stuff and oh my god it doesn‚Äôt even look like you have makeup on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really like this powder foundation for every day wear. I wouldn‚Äôt say it‚Äôs full coverage but it can build up to medium coverage. I found the shade to be quite the same shade as my skin (which is usually hard for me to find). I also love how it has a 15 spf which makes it great for the summer time!

reviews.review_title: Good but doesn't last all day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am 64 and I have sensitive, dry skin. I like this one to a certain extent. It does not last all day but it covers well at first and for a few hours. I find it messy to use. I use a kabuki brush from when I bought Pur Minerals and it works well with this one, too. A regular brush does not seem to deposit the product on the face very well.  It just sits on the top layer of the skin. I was shade matched in the store but I find the fairly medium shade too brownish for me. It has been a battle to find the perfect powder foundation but this one comes close. I just wish it lasted longer and wasn't so messy.  I was advised that the compact version of this does not have full coverage and that this one does so I chose it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Golden Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with yellow-olive undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not a bad, not a high coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Beige - for medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been really enjoying this product. It seems to cover my imperfections well, without completely taking over my skin. I do use a concealer underneath

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fairly Light - for porcelain-to-light skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: best foundation ive ever used

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Beige - for medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with bare minerals! I switched to this because it's ingredients are more natural than most foundations out there. I also have oily/acne prone skin and this has definitely helped reduce that. It's super natural while still providing enough coverage. I just love how lightweight it is, nothing worse than when you feel super cakey. Will try the matte version when I'm done to reduce the appearance of oil even more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use this when I was a teenager with acne. I loved it and I felt that it was lightweight and helped my skin. I finally cleared up my acne as a young adult and recently decided to try this product again and had very poor results. My skin hated it. I broke out from it and I will never use it again. I used hardly any of it (as per instructions) and by the end of the day it looked very makeup-y and it actually made my skin oily. Not a fan. Perhaps I am one of the rare people who can't handle mineral makeup. Regardless, I will not ever use this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how easy this is to apply and how natural it looks on my skin. It feels so light, like I'm wearing nothing at all. I have switched to the blemish rescue formula, since the more matte texture has helped with my oily skin. I would suggest making sure you wash your brushes often as it can start to look cakey. Will never go back to liquid foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used to buy this a lot but for some reason now it doesn't blend properly it leaves streaks so be careful but apart from that it's good coverage for everyday makeup... might have to reapply throughout the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm too lazy for a liquid foundation on workdays so I was really excited to find a powder foundation with so many good reviews. Especially the whole idea that it melts into a cream so I thought it would help with the dry flakes I sometimes experience with regular powder foundations. I'm hardcore combo skin, super oily on my t-zone but desert dry on my cheeks. Yes, it does melt but then it continues to melt into a streaky, greasy mess on my face. It smears all over my fingers and gets everywhere. Blotting sheets help but once it's gone all streaky there's nothing I can do other than completely wash it off, moisturize, prime and reapply. Also I've noticed even after priming (tried with too faced, hourglass, and smashbox) it will sometimes apply unevenly. If I can get it applied evenly, it looks amazing when fresh but it doesn't last for more than a couple hours. The search continues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation! I have acne prone skin, and an oiler t-zone. My skin feels so much healthier when I wear this opposed to other foundations. It's a light coverage, but still buildable. I usually wear it and just use concealer where I need more coverage. Has a very natural finish to it.   Make sure you warm up the foundation first by tapping some into the lid and lightly mixing with your loose powder brush.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BareMinerals has been my go-to for foundation for nearly 10 years. I often get compliments on how naturally smooth my skin is, despite the fact that I've actually struggled with acne for years. I also love that, unlike any cream foundation that I have tried, it doesn't seem to aggravate my acne. When I wash off cream foundations at the end of the day, it always seems like I have a new breakout. But with the BareMinerals foundation that doesn't happen.   The only thing I don't love about BareMinerals is the shade range. The lightest colour is just slightly darker and slightly yellower than my natural skin tone (despite that fact that Fair is described as having pink undertones). I wish they would come out with a more extensive shade range to match more people's complexions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this foundation. I was on the market for one that looked natural that I could apply every day. A little goes such a long way and it makes my skin look even and not powdery a lot. I've gotten many compliments, some even shocked that I was wearing foundation at all. SO worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and my cheeks can get quite oily at times. I have found that liquid foundation tends to make my oiliness worse and sinks into my pores.   BareMinerals powder foundation handles my oiliness better and I find it has a medium to good coverage, but for skins like mine that have rosacea, you might still need a colour corrector underneath to even out the tone.   I would say it doesn't have a ton of resilience, like by the end of the day it's not quite there still, but to me that makes it easier to take off at night; I don't need a super performant makeup remover. I can also easily reapply it during the day with a brush if I need to.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Golden Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with yellow-olive undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage and for my acne skin! Will buy it again

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Light coverage at best, sometimes depending on how you apply it almost clumps up on your skin. Because of the spf you can see the ‚Äúflash back‚Äù without flash just in regular light. Good if you can find your exact shade if not it‚Äôs difficult to work into your skin. So it‚Äôs light coverage but looked cakey.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Golden Beige 13 - for medium skin with neutral to golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who was a diehard liquid foundation fan, I was at first apprehensive to trying this out, however I have converted to using this exclusively as my main foundation. When you initially apply, it seems very light coverage, but go in small layers and buff and you can definitely bring up the coverage! I will definitely recommend in using their beautiful finish brush, as I found it gave the best performance for the foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is INCREDIBLE! This is the first time I've tried Bare Minerals and It's officially now my favorite. Covers up redness and makes your skin look flawless. It feels natural, and not cakey. Love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not like this foundation at all. I found the application annoying and messy, and I do not like that I felt as though I needed to buy their application brush as well. I found the powder difficult to apply, and it did not cover my acne well. It did look pretty good once I took the time to apply it, however as the day went on it began to separate on my skin and looked horrible; I do have oily skin, so this may be why it separated. I returned this product, as I want something easy and fast to apply that I don't have to worry about separating throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is my absolute favourite. After years of trying different foundations, I've finally found the perfect one for both my skin and my skin tone. Just grab a kabuki brush and it takes me less than a minute to apply my foundation flawlessly (no icky sponges or liquid foundation getting everywhere). A couple notes I've learned on how to fully appreciate this product:  1) Don't be deceived by the fact that it's a powder. It is not resistant to becoming oily/shiny. SO, you need to make sure you dab a bit of translucent powder (I use the Laura Mercier one) over your T-zone after you've applied BareMinerals. Then it stays flawless the whole day (longer than any other foundation I've tried).   2) I have extremely fair/pale skin but with neutral undertones, so the fairly light shade is the one I go with. If I apply a thin layer (which is all you need for medium-full coverage) it matches my skin tone perfectly. But when I first got it, I applied a thick layer and it ended up turning me too dark. So if you think the shade is too dark for you, just try applying less next time.   I don't think I'll ever go back to another foundation! This one makes me look and feel airbrushed without looking fake or cakey. I get compliments on my skin when I wear it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can never be without this product. I have to order it from Sephora immediately if I notice I'm running low! This is the only foundation I can wear during the day, as it feels like I'm wearing nothing on my face. You can get as much coverage as you want out of it - either really minimal or really full coverage. Also works very well as a setting powder over liquid foundation for a night out or when you need full coverage. I've got all my friends and family hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years. My skin always looks flawless without feeling heavy. I usually just wear it alone after moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best powder foundation ever! Love how well it evens out my complexion - and a bonus that it has SPF 15.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this - I have recieved complements on my skin when I use it (not a daily make-up wearer), It lasts all day, and does not clog my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Still me fave foundation. If you have sensitive skin like me, this is the only brand that will not irritate it. Only gripe is that is doesn‚Äôt last all day for me unless I use a primer and then it doesn‚Äôt feel as nice on my skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Golden Ivory 07 - for light skin with neutral to golden undertones
reviews.review_text: Really love this foundation, I thought powder foundations would be messy but this is really good for the days where I don‚Äôt have time to put on liquid foundation and can just get out! reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with very sensitive skin, it took me a long time to find foundation that didn't cause me to break out. This foundation has been amazing on my skin and provides excellent coverage. It does, however, need to be pair with a good face primer and setting spray to keep it in place all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I've always liked Dior airflash in 200 as well and was going to go back to that but now that I've found this , this will be my staple. I was sceptical because of how's it's a powder and because I have dry ish skin in areas but as long as you use some moisturizer and primer it looks great. And it lasts !  And it even gives you a glow from within look. Will be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was just ok for me ! Probably looks better on younger skin

reviews.review_title: is perfect for pale olive skin!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Beige - for medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been using this foundation exclusively for 10+ years! It‚Äôs buildable, so I can use it every day, and when I go out, I just use a bit more. When I have a blemish, i like to take a bit of powder on the tip of my pimple and tap it on. It covers without looking cakey. I can also use the same colour all year round. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Consistently great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: lightweight but excellent coverage! covers my rosacea perfectly and my skin feels like it can breathe. Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Blends nice and makes my complexion look great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This powder was very comfortable as a light to medium coverage. It blended nicely and did not look powdery. HOWEVER, this is not for porcelain skin. I'm a bit tanned right now and the lightest shade is still bordering on being too dark. Unfortunately, I will be returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. It is is buildable and perfect for days that you are lazy and want to skip the whole foundation/concealer/powder routine. I love this for days I‚Äôm feeling more natural as well. I do wish there was a lighter shade as I wouldn‚Äôt even consider my porcelain fair but the lightest shade is slightly dark for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Golden Tan - for medium-to-tan skin with subtle yellow-olive undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good starter foundation thats light and adds some colour to even out the skin. Friends have told me when I put this on it gives an airbrushed look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use this product a few years ago. I've since switched to tons of foundation formulas and recently returned. I love to try new products but I wish I'd never switched!  I love that this doesn't look like powder - it looks like skin. I am very pale but use self tanners in the summertime, and this is a perfect match for me. It blends so well yet has great coverage.  I have really sensitive skin - a lot of products seem to make my dehydrated skin worse or contribute to either more hormonal breakouts or seem to make their healing worse. This product does not do any of that.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - for medium skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for more than 5 years and have not found anything that even comes close to it in other products.

reviews.review_title: Not Cakey Love sun protection for my skin

reviews.review_text: I really love this product - it actually covers red spots, acne, and my pours really nicely - it's breathable and so light - doesn't apply cakey at all which is awesome! I love that it has SPF since I am going away

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product but unfortunately for me, I selected the wrong color.  I will definitely order it again to try the correct color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product which makes my skin look natural with just small amount of the powder. Easy to apply even on my skin with a brush.

reviews.review_title: The best foundation for a natural look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation and have been wearing it for over 5 years.  It is light and breathable but also build-able without being cakey.  I use a kabuki brush to apply it and then go over problem areas with a concealer brush so I don't even need a separate concealer product. It looks and feels so natural and perfect for people who don't like to wear heavy, full makeup.

reviews.review_title: Not safe for the pale of skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the fairest shade they had for my very pale skin...I could use this as a contour or bronzer shade because it is so dark. In fact, I tested the medium shade in the store and it is somehow not as dark as this. I would give it 1 star but I can at least use it for contouring and it does have decent coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So amazing. I have rosacea and this really helped cover the redness with a light weight foundation. So happy I found this product. It seriously is so nice and I can't believe you can sleep it in (if you really have to that is)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this product 4 stars because it looks great when my skin is very well hydrated/during the summer. It‚Äôs good for people with oily skin because it won‚Äôt clog pores (or at least not as much as liquid foundations). If you have any dry patches this will really accentuate them so I would not recommend for dry skin types (nor would I recommend any powder foundation). I have combination skin, and even I can‚Äôt use this in the winter.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - for light skin with yellow-olive undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this powder foundation for years! I am a gal that does not like wearing makeup so this product is light enough to provide coverage while making it feel like I'm not wearing cake on my face. It's buildable and I switch my shades out for the seasons in Canada (darker shade in summer, lighter in winter).

reviews.review_title: FOR THOSE WHO HOLD A DISDAIN FOR LIQUID FOUNDATION
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I once read a review that this product looks better on the skin as the day progresses. I'm not sure if that rings true for everyone but it did for me! The oils that do seep through during the day help the foundation melt into the skin. I don't wear primer underneath, just prep my skin really well so it's nice and dewey. I'm quite lazy and don't bother with touch-ups (especially in the summer heat) and I noticed that the makeup was good for about 5 hours before it started to breakup. Blotting sheets would probably be super helpful at that point!  Not too sure if it's super buildable after the first application because I normally apply a light dusting and that's it.  Yes, you will feel this product on your skin! No, it's not a heavy, gross feeling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite foundation! I have acne prone skin and this foundation is perfect. It‚Äôs light so it doesn‚Äôt look heavy but also has good coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - for medium skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this one only because my usual, matte color, was out of stock.. its a bit more irridescent and seems a bit too white on my skin sometimes.  also tends to settle in the smile lines.  Still my go to easy to apply foundation

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Beige - for medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for a long time, but decided to try some others. Nope. Love may BE. I prefer the original. I know that they recommend the matte for mature skin, but I didn't like it. Gives light to medium coverage on its own depending on the brush you use. For more coverage and longer wear (i.e. Work and then going out later) I use the primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always avoided powder foundations because I didn't think they would blend/colour match/look as good as liquid.......ya, totally false. I LOVE THIS product and curse myself for not finding it sooner... a) its cheaper than the liquid Nars foundation I was previously using b) it literally just melts into my skin and blends better with my face than I ever thought possible. I heard about this product through a friend's recommendation ....then proceeded to read what feels like almost all 20 thousand positive reviews before deciding to buy it.... and now I'm writing a review since I relied on other reviews and feel that this product is worthy of its praise :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is BY FAR the best foundation I have ever used! When I was in my teens and early twenties, I swore by it. People complimented my gorgeous skin all the time and I barely felt or looked like I was wearing anything at all. Then I jumped on the BB/CC trend bandwagon for a couple of years...BIG mistake. Everything other than this foundation creates problem skin for me, clogging my pores, turning patchy by the end of the day, oxidizing, you name it. Bareminerals Original has never let me down. After switching back, my skin is coming back to its former glowy flawlessness. Don't be afraid of the fact that this is a powder. It doesn't feel or look like a powder at all. I love that you can build coverage depending on your needs. But most of all...I love what it does for my skin. I don't use this term lightly...it's THE holy grail of foundations. I will never change again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product, have been using it for the last 2  years, much better than liquid foundation especially for everyday use, very light on your skin and creates very natural look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The sade range = 10/10 It's one of the only brands that cary extremely fair and yellow/olive colours. The first hours of wear looks breathtakingly beautiful. After that it just separated all over the place, caked up and I just don't have words to describe how horrible this looked. It also creases like crazy. I don't know if it's because I didn't take the matte formula while having a combo skin but...

reviews.review_title: Best product for low maintenance people
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love Love this product. My dermatologist recommended it and I have never had a problem with it. Goes on nice and light and stays on all day no matter if I am sweating or relaxing. The best product for anyone who is not into spending hours applying make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favourite foundation, natural finish, light weight, I don‚Äôt like powder foundation before, but since I tried and I like it , and I keep buying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best powder I‚Äôve ever used. Feels light but still provides  coverage. Will buy again!

reviews.review_title: Best foundation for middle aged skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve tried numerous brands of liquid foundation with medium to full coverage. I have aging skin and need coverage for redness

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Ivory 06 - for light/medium skin with neutral to golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was scared to use a powder foundation because i didn't want to look cakey and i like very natural and glowy skin .. i dont know what it is with this stuff but my skin never looked better ! Very happy that i found this foundation !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buildable coverage, blends easily. I keep coming back to this foundation. Something about it makes my skin glow unlike any other! If you have oily skin, go with the matte option.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It looks so beautiful when you put it on and it sits well with oily or dry skin, but I find it creases and cracks a couple hours in which is not cute. But definitely a beautiful foundation if you‚Äôre okay with touch ups.

reviews.review_title: It's not a two star product! Hear me out...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I was a bare minerals convert in the early 2000s. Its was an expensive option for me as I was so young and busting my butt in restaurants but it was worth every penny. It gave me lightweight, flawless coverage and made me matte as he**. Even during a busy shift, there was no sheen. Plus I'm fair, so the SPF was a huge bonus. Fast-forward to today. I'm in my mid thirties, have two kids and while I don't have 'wrinkles' I certainly have started to develop 'crinkles'. Plus having kids does weird things to like, every part of your body, including your skin. I wanted to love this as much as I did when I was young, but this is a product for young skin. It sat on my face in an uncomfortable way, made my crinkles crepe-y and oxidized after a few hours of wear. Thanks to Sephora's awesome return policy, I was able to return it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage and feels like im wearing nothing! Very natural look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my HG foundation. I always got the most compliments on my skin when wearing this or the Estee Lauder DW. People always thought I was wearing a liquid foundation because of the beautiful finish (and I have dry skin!) I haven't used it in awhile because I find the undertones to be too yellow or too pink, however, you can def. make it work.   You have to use a dense kabuki brush if you're looking for max (but not cakey) coverage. Circular buffing motions is the key to achieving the best finish. I was trained, many moons ago, on how to apply and it's honestly amazing if used correctly. BM used to sell a kabuki brush that worked great with the foundation but I haven't seen it in awhile when perusing the BM section at Sephora. Maybe that's just my location.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years now and I love it. I've tried others powder and liquid foundations but I keep coming back to this one for the ability to build coverage. Whether you are going super natural or need a bit of extra help covering imperfections, this does it all. Doesn't clog my pores and feels like you aren't wearing any makeup!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Golden Ivory 07 - for light skin with neutral to golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is good when your skin needs a break from heavy foundations. I use it with their beautiful finish foundation brush and can get great coverage. Definitely use a primer - this settles into fine lines and pores if you don‚Äôt. I‚Äôm Chinese and I use golden ivory - colour match is great. Feels nice and light, coverage is buildable but it doesn‚Äôt last on me. I‚Äôm very oily and I get shiny within 1.5 hrs, even if I use the mineral veil. And it starts to get a little patchy in my shiny areas like around my nose and forehead. However if you just reapply and do another dusting, it‚Äôs easily fixable. I still use from time to time but just wished it would last longer on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a few years now it's amazing. I haven't met anyone who's tried it and hasn't loved it. Def recommend

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin all year round and a lot of dryness in the beginning winter but this makeup was great for me. I use coconut smoothie primer by FAB. After about 6-8 hours the foundation starts to look a little oily and somewhat settles into the lines around my mouth but I just use my foundation brush to buff or lightly tap my whole face, which makes it look perfect again. I use the hourglass vanish foundation brush- which works very well with liquid, stick and powder foundation.This foundation lasts longer and looks better than any other I have tried (I've tried ALOT of different brands). I also have acne and scars- this foundation covers up acne and redness VERY well, when I have scarring I apply an extra layer all over my face. I have a fair-light skin tone with olive undertones- or so I've been told.. If I don't have a lot of acne or scarring I apply a small amount of the foundation evenly over my face and the lightest shade matches my skin pretty well, increasing the amount of foundation I put on my face makes the foundation appear darker but it still never appears orangey. Moisturizing is a must before I put on this makeup, if I don't it makes my whole face look dry. The more primer I use the longer it looks perfect. I will definitely keep using this product. I highly recommend this product to people of all skin types, I suggest going into the store to test the shade on yourself- it looks darker in container then appears on face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for 5  years. The key is to layer, use the brush it comes with (In a beginner kit) or ask for a recommendation for a proper brush. It's all about the brush and the blending in circles. It does wear off after a couple  of hours but a quick touchup swipe will bring it back. Things I LOVE about this: It's practically waterproof! I've tested this many times in oceans and pools it only comes off with soap. I mean it fades a bit sure but nothing drastic whatsoever. It can go from practically translucent powder to full coverage the more you layer. And as long as I add some Laura Mercier Orgasm blush it looks hella natural. (As natural as I can get with acne scarred skin). The downside is the annoying messy packaging. It always send powder everywhere especially into my makeup bag and drives me nutso. Price is decent and even though I'm a heavy user it lasts me 3  months!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oxidized on my face so I ended up yellow. A lighter colour fixed this. Good coverage no flashback from spf

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Beige - for medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. I've been using it for months now. It has a natural finish and last all day (with a good primer).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've literally been wearing this for maybe half an hour and already know it's amazing. The finish is natural and silky, which is impressive on my dry leathery skin with my beard. I wish it was a little more dewy but if you spray it down with Fix+ it'll be perfect.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Golden Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with yellow-olive undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this to try out because I wanted a powder foundation vs liquid. But it caught on my dry patches and was not transfer resistant! Every time I touched my face, foundation came off with, even when I have used a primer, setting powder, and setting spray. I tried applying it with different brushes and different techniques, all with very similar results. My Color IQ match was also way too light for me. In the end, I just had to return it. I will try again when my skin has calmed down because I have read and seen so many good reviews!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. I mix this with a lighter Mineral Veil in the winter since it's quite yellow/olive tinged and looks a little like a fake tan on me in the colder months.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works as a nice skin toner even-outer! I am very fair when winter hits and this tone seems to work for me, when I start to get a tan I jump up a level :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to summer foundation. It contains SPF so I don‚Äôt need to worry about skin damage. And unlike in the winter where I find it can look powdery, in the summer your sweat seems to make it glow. I‚Äôm also pretty acne prone around my chin area and this does not aggravate it at all. Because its minerals, I can be a little tough to buff into the skin so make sure you also buy the bare mineral buffing brush. It makes a HUGE difference. I also use the mineral veil with it and apply throughout the day when I‚Äôm shining or about to head outside (and need more spf).

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Soft Medium 11 - for light/medium skin with cool to neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the finish and the coverage

reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation I have worn for many years now. I have oily, acne prone skin and this lets my skin breathe while giving buildable and natural looking coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very good product. 2nd time Ive bought it. Great for every day makeup. Not a heavy coverage at all. I use it over the top of cc cream just to help smooth out pours. This colour is more summer time for me and I use the fair for winter.

reviews.review_title: Not sure how to dispense the powder nicely
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know how to use it without the powder flying everywhere! Should I shake the powder out from those holes onto the cover , then put the brush onto the cover to get even amount of powder?  I am just not used to this way of dispense!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: coverage is surprisingly great and it makes my face look wonderful. Too bad it also makes my skin breakout so much :(

reviews.review_title: A lovely natural finish that causes clogged pores
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved how the powder's finish was so fine it looked almost natural and that it had sunscreen protection built in. I would still use this product if it weren't for the fact that it completely clogs my pores, particularly my forehead. I would be careful in buying this product if you're prone to breakouts

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this product for over 5 years. Never disappoints. I always get compliments on how nice it makes my skin look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Legit hands down my favourite mineral powder foundation. Subtle gold shimmer gives you a glowing healthy look. It's also super lightweight on the face and barely transfers. I bought another as back up because I absolutely can't live without it.

reviews.review_title: Great for everyday, but needs lighter options.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I (and at least a few others) would really appreciate more colour choices on the extremes; specifically, a lighter cool tone for those of us severely lacking in melanin. I can wear Fair, but it ends up looking a bit orangey and tanned. I have to blend out my neck, or it looks like I applied gradual tanner only on my face.   It can also be a tad drying, especially on those of us with already dry skin. I recommend heavily moisturising (creams and / or oils work beautifully) 10+ minutes before you start your makeup routine, and using some kind of chemical exfoliant 2+ times per week - as well as sunscreen every day. I use salicylic acid (2% - The Original - super inexpensive brand) and lactic acid (10% - The Original), and it helps prevent flakey, scaly patches of skin that grab onto the pigments. (Sidenote: AHAs and BHAs need to be around a pH of 3-4, so do not apply anything else for at least 20 min after these, as it will likely increase the pH and cause them to deactivate).   I also have extremely sensitive skin, and this hasn't caused any adverse reactions after months of wear. I was pleasantly surprised by this, but others may have different experiences with it.   Besides that, this is the best foundation I've found for easy, everyday usage. It is light to medium coverage, and buildable, to an extent. When applied lightly, with a buffing brush, it looks like your skin but better. It's not really obvious that you're wearing foundation, which is hugely appreciated. It is also the quickest and easiest to apply for a no-makeup makeup look, or when you want to downplay the face makeup in order to do crazy eye and / or lip looks.  Overall, great foundation for those looking for a light to medium coverage, easy to use foundation! Not so great for skintone extremes, though. :P  Sorry for the essay!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Don't think this suits dry skin I found it just stuck to some parts of my face - also the packaging is so messy. Sorry I wasted my money on this.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - for light skin with yellow-olive undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is quick, easy to apply powdered foundation that gives very good coverage.  Bare minerals was my go to foundation for years and I still use it occasionally when I'm just hanging around the house.  I find however, that it can gather in my pores, accentuating them and if my skin is dry it magnifies every little flake. Skin prep is so important with this foundation. Also I personally find it can look chalky at times, or the opposite, it can developed a odd sheen that looks very unnatural but not luminous??  I've switched back to using liquid foundations in the last year and feel that I prefer them over the bare minerals once again.  On the flip side if I want my makeup to last all day I have applied this over my liquid foundation once its dried down and it sets it nicely with out being chalky.  I probably won't repurchase this, I think my skin has just changed with time and requires creamier products, but when it works for you it is fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs super easy to use and you can build up your coverage. Makes your skin look flawless and luminous. Has SPF great for summer or warm climates (I always take this when I‚Äôm done south) feels light and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I read a lot of reviews on this product and I thought it was a no-brainer. I have dry skin with a bit of oil in the t-zone. This product makes me look dull yet shimmery at the same time. It also seemed to accentuate my pores and I felt it made me look older. This would be better for people with more imperfections that need coverage, but for me, all I wanted was something to even out my skin a bit, not a mask. I probably won't buy it again - the Laura Mercier one is better, albeit more $$$.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - for light skin with yellow-olive undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time purchasing a powder foundation and I was a little skeptical about how much coverage it would offer. I had to play around with it a bit so it wouldn‚Äôt look too cakey, but now that I‚Äôve gotten the hang of it, it offers great coverage and looks natural. The only downside is it comes off quite easily.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Ivory 06 - for light/medium skin with neutral to golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just picked up my second one today. I used to use fair ivory 02 but wanted to go slightly darker so I swatched different shades in the store and came home with neutral ivory. I went in to the store thinking of getting soft beige but it ended up being too dark. This foundation is so easy to use- just remember to buff well. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Beige - for medium skin with neutral undertones
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation!! It completely evens out my complexion but looks and feels light. And it giveaway my skin a beautiful glow. I am told all the time that I have the best skin but it's this incredible powder!

reviews.review_title: great product, doesn't come with much product
reviews.review_text: Gives excellent coverage and is so easy to use!! Doesn't come with a ton of product, so I can imagine it won't last as long as a typical foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Golden Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with yellow-olive undertones
reviews.review_text: Great colour. Great coverage. Mostly used for spot cover and under-eye.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - for the fairest porcelain skin with pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love it so natural looking!! You won't even know it's there. Bonus I have extremely sensitive skin and this amazing product doesn't make me irritated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its a really good foundation. However it caked a little bit if my skin is too dry.  Will definitely need to moisture before use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first started using bare minerals this shade worked for me. But the last time I went to buy it the shade was completely off. Switching to another brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing finish. Feels light on your skin - medium coverage. Love it!
Good powder foundation, good coverage. But I still prefer the bareminerals complexion rescue ( my favorite one ) as it looks more natural to me

this is the first powder foundation I have used. liquid foundations weren't sitting on my skin well so wanted to try powder for light coverage and not looking cakey. this works well on my skin. does break down in my t-zone cause I get pretty oily. but lasts hours. and looks great on the rest of my skin and is very light weight. just wish it didn't take as long to buff into my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation - it's the only foundation that I've tried that looks natural on my skin. It honestly looks like my skin but better/smoother.  I'd say it's a medium coverage, and it does require a good amount of buffing to build it up. It covers blemishes and evens out my skin tone really well, while still letting my natural freckles show though.   It stays on all day, but it does slip off a tiny bit in the areas I'm a bit more oily, like my chin and around my nose.  Great colour selection - I'm very fair so I always have a hard time finding foundations that work well on my skin, and this is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It's build-able, so I keep it light most of the time and go a little heavier if I'm having a stress break out. It feels very light and doesn't clog my pores like some liquid foundations have.

I use the shade fair and it has great coverage. My one complaint is that it has so much talc in it that and is too shiny in sunlight and in pictures I look shiny. It lasts well, but if you sweat it washes off quickly

I've tried mineral makeup before and wasn't impressed. There are 2 keys to mineral makeup: 1) really buffing it in and 2) getting the right shade. If you just tap it onto your skin, it won't look like it did anything. I do small, gentle circular motions around my face with a fluffy face brush and that's when it really looks like it melted in and covered things (it can be light, medium or even medium-full coverage). The shade is a pain to find. You can't just swatch it on your hand because they all look gray and ashy. You have to go with the model's pictures and get a few shades and try them on your face. It sucks because you have to return the ones that dont match. I wish bare minerals had good testers so we could be less wasteful. But finding your right shade is key to making this product work. **I found that I needed to go darker than I thought and even though I'm warm toned, a cool toned shade matched me best (for reference, I am NC42 and medium tan, golden tan and tan nude all work for my skin tone--with tan nude being slightly light). I also found that nearby shades looked identical on me. I also apply a setting spray to really get the product to melt with my skin. If you follow these tips, the foundation looks so natural, smooth and buttery. It's also so much better for your skin than other foundations and lasts a decently long time. Best of all, I find that it doesn't break up and look patchy after a long day and/or sweat

reviews.review_title: Have used this for years and always will.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using BareMinerals foundation for probably over ten years, maybe more.  I've tried others but have always gone back to BareMinerals.  I love it because it is safe for my skin, no dangerous ingredients.  It goes on smoothly and naturally with a brush.  I can take it with me and not worry about getting it on my fingers if I reapply when I'm going out.  It is buildable-I can wear it as a light, medium or heavy coverage.  It comes in lots of shades so I can switch to a lighter or darker color depending on the season.  I always require my foundation to have sun protection, which Bareminerals does.  I will use it as long as it is on the market, which I hope is forever.

reviews.review_title: been using this for years now
reviews.review_text: And I still love it every day! I can apply it thin or thick when I want, and it makes my face look so smooth and nice! Will continue to buy for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Always on the go, so I love this foundation. Feels good and I don't have to worry about the seasons.

this foundation lasted all day when paired with a primer, but looked shiny after a few hours on my naturally oily skin, even with an oil control primer. for oily skin, i would recommend the matte foundation from this brand!

I used to go crazy looking for the perfect foundation which was hard for someone with very pale skin, and I always saw the infomercials for this product and think no way but I was wrong. This is my holy grail. I will never use a liquid foundation again, I find them way to heavy and horrible now. I get this in the lightest shade possible and it's perfect and feels so light.

I purchased this to use as my go to travel foundation.  I only travel carry on so I wanted to limit the number of liquids I was taking through the airport.  This, clearly, travels really well.  The packaging is sturdy and I was never afraid of it breaking.  The coverage takes a while to get used to.   If you put on too much too fast, it will look cakey.  I find it to be light to medium coverage but buildable.  I also used it with a concealer brush to cover my spots which is nice that I didn't need to worry about also bringing a spot concealer.  Overall, it is nice.  I'll continue to use it mostly for travel, but it's not my most favorite foundation of all time.  It does tend to make me look somewhat shiny.  Which is weird because I have very dry skin.  Usually make skin looks too matte and cakey.  So for my dry skin sisters/brothers, this is a good powder foundation to try without the fear of it drying you out.  You may want to invest in a matte setting powder though because it can look too shiney in places.  It's a good problem for us dry people to have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for years and this is the only foundation I'll use! Coming from someone with mild rosacea and other products make me break out and cause my skin to turn red, I believe this is one of the only products out there that won't make my skin condition worse!

i really like how i can make the powder have more coverage by simpl adding more. for those having trouble with cakeyness male sure that you tap your brush on the lid. it makes a huge different. this powder is really natural looking!

This product is awesome and basically fool proof. I use a primer beforehand (like I do with any foundation) because I have large pores and then the foundation glides on. I have had no problems with Cakey-ness, but if you use too much, I can see how it happens. The lady at the Sephora store told me how important it was to swirl the brush in the cap and tap off the extra.

reviews.review_title: my lazy day foundation so easy
reviews.review_text: I found this product years ago while in France at a Sephora. I had gone in looking for a good foundation and the girl showed me this product and even applied it for me. I was so happy with the result that bought it even though I was in Europe and most likely ended up paying more. I used it daily for quite awhile in high school far before I went to beauty school and found I never had issues with the applications. it's no longer my daily use foundation but I always keep it in my car, it is the quickest, easiest foundation I have ever applied. I love having it for days I sleep in on so I can put it on in a hurry or when I go to the beach for the day and need to reapply some make up by the end of the day. it's a great product to have in the summer it's so light which I love. I would highly recommend this product! I think the fact that I was introduced to it years ago says it all.... The review really do speak for this product!
For me doesn't work, the result was thick, cakey, and i can see my pores biggger than ever. i dont like it  i return this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great all around foundation, setting powder and concealer in one. Coverage can be from light to full in 1-3 light coats; a little goes a long way. I have used this on top of liquid foundation as a setting powder (with a fluffy brush) which adds more coverage and no cake face on my dry skin. If used alone, you definitely need a buffing brush or a densely packed face brush; little more time consuming than a liquid but the result is flawless and natural. Can be used as a concealer as well to cover pimples and imperfections if used with a detail brush or concealer brush. Shade ranges are very flexible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the worst foundations I have ever used. No matter how I light a touch, how much I blended, or how little product I picked up, the end result was thick, cakey, and accentuated pores and lines.

reviews.review_title: OMG-why have i not used this sooner?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've always seen commercials about BareMinerals but never tried it. The concept of mineral powder instead of a liquid as foundation blew my mind but it was a cost effective concern that held me back. I've tried other mineral powder foundations, but let me tell you what...this one beats those hands down. It is lightweight but provides full coverage. It has long wear while keeping full coverage the whole time. It does not cake and looks super natural. I have combination leaning towards oily skin and I also have skin allergies to fragrances and perfumes and dyes-like, everything (I can't even use fabric softeners of any kind because of my high sensitivity and rashes/hives are miserable) This product has none of that and my complexion after using it for about 45 days actually has improved. I'm sold on this product for life.
Made me look flawless and didn't irritated my ski

This is the only loose powder foundation that I own. The reason I bought it was because I've heard a ton of great reviews on it and they are all true <3. This powder foundation is buildable and makes my face look like I never put any foundation on and lasts all day. It's very light weight so it also feels like I never put anything on too.

I have combination skin, decent texture, noting crazy, but I cannot with this powder. I've tried it several times over the years, I really want to love it. But it just always disappoints. I don't need much coverage, but somehow it makes me actually look worse. It makes my summertime oily skin even more oily. Better powder from any other brand

This foundation honestly saved my skin. I went through a time of really bad, painfully acne and using Bare Minerals skincare and foundation helped bring it back to normal. Yes, it is a lighter coverage and it does fade a little bit throughout the day, but I don't mind seeing my skin gradually throughout the day. I would and have 100% recommended this so multiple people and will continue to do so. Everyone needs it in their life even if it's just just for no makeup, makeup days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried tons of foundations and I wanted to really love this one.  I started to use it, yes, it can make a mess, but it does look nice on the skin, which offsets the mess for me. I used #9 and the color looks good. It's easy and quick to apply and my skin radiates.  BUT, by 12 or 1 in the afternoon, it's disappearing.  The coverage I had in the morning at 7, is gone by lunch.  I use good skin care and use a primer.  I actually use their primer too!  But, it just doesn't last for me.  I use it for weekends when I don't want to do full makeup, but want to even out my skin.
this product is amazing i'm going through my second one right now. will keep repurchasing this item forever. great build-able coverage

This is the only foundation I use. I've tried other foundations and nothing makes my skin look as good as Bareminerals.
