I use rose water toner, Caudalie serum, Bareminerals prime time primer then finish with this foundation in fairly light. I set it with a cover fx illuminating setting spray and my face looks so flawless. It doesn't look cakey at the end of the day and doesn't set into fine lines. (I use a bareminerals concealer or NARS concealer and set that with some Laura Mercier setting power). If you want flawless natural looking skin try this powder.

reviews.review_title: A great choice for people with skin problems!
reviews.review_text: I have just recently sorted out the root causes of some skin issues I've been having leaving me with few options for foundations. Bare Minerals, though, is on the list of options and so far I am very impressed! You can easily build coverage, it feels very natural when it's on the skin, and the result is very natural and sort of glowy. This is the best foundation I've ever used in terms of finish and feel with the main benefit being that my skin looks great even after I've removed the foundation. Give this foundation a try, especially if you have acne or seborrheic dermatitis or any other issues with your facial skin. I'm super happy and grateful for this product!
Have been using this for five years, with a primer or softly over Clinique Even Better foundation. It blends beautifully and is just a great product. Only downside is the mess.

Iv used BM original foundation(powder)for awhile now,but after having my 4th child I had to cut my budget..Anyway as I was in Sephora awhile back getting other items,i noticed this and took a sample to see if it still worked well with my now 34yr old skin.lol..it did so i although i ordered to dark of a shade,i cannot express how shocked that i am of the pigmented color,the light non cakey feeling alone,AND iv been trying to find ANYTHING that would make my MJ reMarcablefoundation look better (dries fast bt has beautiful coverage too)so 1 day i took a small amount of this over my MJ foundation and O.M G perfect! I feel this is for ANY one bc tbh-i used to use this as a bronzer in Summers only bc i love liquid foundations too much,but this never fails and iv got so many friends and family using this it's crazy,don't hesitate with the price bc a lil goes a long way and if you don't end up liking it,well that's the great thing ab Sephoras return policy :) Perfect for any season but best used in Summer so stop hesitating girls!!!
I wasn't expecting this to provide good coverage. I use concealer under this to make it full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted something light but something that would also cover blemishes. I COULD NOT believe how well this worked! ALL of my other make-ups cake over the blemishes, but this actually covers them to make them invisible.

What can't I say about this foundation. I love it. It goes on smooth and doesn't look like I'm wearing anything. I prefer more of a natural look and this foundation makes my skin pop. It's so great for uneven skin tone, and it's natural so it doesn't cause any breakouts. For that photoshop finish, I recommend using the tinted mineral veil over it. I don't have a lot of wrinkles so I can't speak for those peeps, but I love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually use medium beige over my liquid foundation most of the year and love the finished look it gives my skin.  For summer I purchased golden beige for a natural sun kissed look.  It looks great without liquid foundation.  On a clean face I apply mositurizer, primer and then powder.  Love how it looks and feels!

reviews.review_title: New color is darker than expected
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a long-time Bare Minerals user, and I love it. So this review is really just about the particular new shade that I bought recently.   I purchased the new color, 02. I had been using the golden fair tone, and was hoping for slightly less yellow undertones. However, I find that this new shade is darker than would be expected for an 02. I like that it's more tan/orange than the golden fair. However, I will need to purchase the 01 shade to blend because it's almost like a bronzer in terms of pigment intensity on my very fair skin.

i was a bit hesitant to buy at first because i like more of a dewy finish than matte, and i didn't want my face to look too powdery with this product. but, if you buff this into your skin it will seriously make your skin look airbrushed, and it doesn't look chalky or powdery at all. keeps your face looking flawless and beautiful for hours, what more can you ask for?

What can I say I sleep with this powder on ..nothing is better then this powder...i mix it with Smashbox hydrating powder and it gives me the best coverage and feel anyone could possibly want! I do not wear foundation and it covers insignificant skin imperfections like a champ!!!!

Loving this foundation as long has you work in light layers to let it melt into the skin. Too much results in powder face. I set with a spray and it looks so naturally pretty. I wouldn't say this builds to as full a coverage as a liquid, but still can't beat the look on natural days. If it's not covering, just go in with cream/liquid concealer underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WILL RE-REVIEW ONCE I GET TO TRY THIS OUT FOR A LONGER PERIOD OF TIME :)  My first impression: I tried building up coverage on half of my face (I am acne prone so I have blemishes/blotchiness), with a random old large powder brush I had laying around (I'm new to makeup). I found it wasn't covering much, not sure if it was the brush or my technique. I decided to try it again today when I had more time, and I put it on OVER my Body Shop Tea tree BB cream. It covered everything very well and quickly when I did this, without feeling too heavy! :D I'm going to try it again on it's own and I want to test its wearability  throughout the day, but those are my first impressions.  P.S. I got it as part of the Ingrid Neilson kit because Sephora didn't have the Get Started kit and I wanted to try it out as a more natural foundation compared to others on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first face foundation I've ever committed to. That being said, it has a very natural finish where you don't feel makeup caked on your face. The rest of the foundations I've tried are liquid, but this is the only powder foundation I stick with.

I was honestly so surprised with the amount of coverage this foundation gave. I was skeptical at first but was pleasantly surprised. This foundation made my skin look flawless without feeling heavy or cakey

I really wanted to love this product as I'm a big fan of powder foundations and have been trying to go more natural in the cosmetics that I use. However, I think between the dry climate that I live in, and the nature of having to buff the product for a long time, it really dried out my skin and clung into flaky patches. It didn't look smooth at all, and the product just didn't seem to spread evenly. I watched so many tutorials and tried different brushes with no luck. Maybe this would have worked for me if I lived in a more humid climate--this is why I'm giving it two starts instead of just one.

This product is perfect for summer. I have combination skin so I don't think it would look good during winter as my cheeks tend to get pretty dry. I have rosacea and my skin reacts well to this product. It doesn't cover all the redness but still does a good job. Even though it's a powder, it leaves your skin with a little bit of a dewy finish, but very natural. Be careful not to apply too much. Overall a great product, looks very natural and makes you feel as you're not wearing anything.
perfect for summer! especially if you are outside a lot

I have been wearing bare minerals Foundation in medium beige for over 12 years. I've tried many different foundations over the years, from pressed powder to tinted moisturizer to liquid high end brands; but always end up coming back to this classic Foundation. The light weight feel, buildable application, and range of color are what make this Foundation worth every penny. Also to mention I have fairly sensitive skin and this is one that doesn't make me break out! I usually go for the deluxe size when it comes out around the holidays, and will use it to refill my original for traveling. If you're debating on trying it out, definitely do. There's a reason so many love this original bare minerals Foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this powder goes on feeling so light but has great coverage. The saleswoman in store was so helpful in finding my perfect summer color. (I have to wear different ones for summer/winter.) Keep up the great products!!!

reviews.review_title: Really decent powder at a really decent price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this foundation as more of a finishing powder to go on top of my moisturizer and BB Cream. I am new to bareMinerals as I heard in the past that i was actually bad for your skin... I like the lightness of it (I don't swirl it around and turn it into a cream, I kind of dab and spread and use it as a powder) and it makes my skin very bright and lovely looking! 4 stars because I do feel like by the end of the day it looks a little patchy on my drier areas (chin, nose area). Not enough to stop using! plus i only use a tiny bit each day, so hopefully this lasts me a long time. Feels lightweight and makes my skin look very luminous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i took a chance on this foundation when i was 16 y/o through an infomercial - paid $60 before this product that hadn't hit stores near me. i had severe acne and terrible scarring on my forehead. after purchasing this it became the only thing i ever raved about and convinced my friends w/ similar acne issues to purchase. it covered everything and improved the quality of my skin overtime. it was so good i could literally sleep with it, just like they said in the infomercials. i had fallen asleep w/ it a few times & when i woke up to wash it off, my skin was smooth like a baby. the minerals are so natural and calming. it never looked like i was wearing foundation. it was buildable and did not feel like i was wearing any makeup. i would still recommend to anyone to purchase, it is truly a miracle foundation.

reviews.review_title: SO GLAD YOU'RE BACK IN MY LIFE BARE MINERALS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, so this foundation was my highschool go-to and I basically forgot it existed for many years until I saw a Sephora ad. I have greasy skin and I am in the market for a new foundation so I was actively interested in a powder especially for summer. I bought this in Natural Ivory and I AM SO HAPPY I DID. The coverage is surprisingly good and build-able and it isn't drying for me at all. It gives a kind of air brushed finish with a bit of unexpected glow. This is a great product for my oily/combo friends especially with warmer weather upon us!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using full coverage liquid foundations since I started wearing makeup. I have a lot of redness and my t-zone and eyelids get pretty oily throughout the day. I'm used to having to touch up or re-apply if I'm going somewhere after work, especially in the summer.   I'm a makeup minimalist most days - foundation applied with the fingers, a swipe of blush & mascara, and concealer if needed, usually applied in a rush in my car. Naturally, I've avoided powder foundations because of the messiness/time factor but after hearing so many people talk about this foundation I had to finally try it.   WOW. At first I was confused because I thought I wasn't getting any makeup on my face. I'd buff it in and see nothing. But then I pulled my hand away and looked in the mirror and my skin just looked AWESOME. The makeup just becomes undetectable.   It easily covers my redness, keeps most of my oily spots in check, is long-wearing, and takes years off my face. Coverage is completely buildable. The hassle of having to apply with a brush and deal with powder is totally 100% worth it. I haven't used it long enough to see if it actually improves my skin over time, but I'm pretty confident it will considering it's performance so far!   I accidentally bought the wrong shade online and would definitely recommend visiting the makeup counter or Sephora to find the correct shade.   Note: I originally bought the bareMinerals liquid serum foundation thinking it'd be more my speed but it was NOT for me. Difficult to apply, greasy, and came off WAY too easily..  Another note: I bought the Perfecting Face Brush to go with the liquid foundation but found it to be great for the powder formula as well. I found the recommended Beautiful Finish brush to be way too large (although very soft and seemingly fun to use).

reviews.review_title: One of the few makeup items I buy at Sephora
reviews.review_text: I am a broke recent grad who will not have any disposable income for the next couple of months. However, I like my makeup. This stuff is great. I use their tinted moisturizer and this stuff on top. It has build able coverage and doesn't make me break out.

reviews.review_title: Will always be a holy grail
reviews.review_text: Bought this 5 years ago on a friends recommendation and have never been without it since... BEAUTIFUL natural finish, can be layered over foundation for a flawless full coverage look or worn alone for a more natural look (still buildable), controls shine, lasts long.... Between this version in fall/winter and the matte version for spring/summer I have never come across a better powder foundation. YOU NEED IT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation. It is pretty light coverage but that's what i like right now. It's really easy and quick to apply and takes no effort to blend because it is a powder and is light coverage. It feels like nothing on my skin! I think it would be best for combination or oily skin, though I use it and love it and have dry skin. It's not really drying or anything, it just doesn't add any moisture and can give certain especially dry areas on my face a patchy look, but that happens with a lot of different foundations. If you're looking for anything medium coverage or more, not for you. I definitely love this product though and have been using it for abour 7 months and haven't used it up yet.

well, I wore this product for over 10 years. The last two I purchased just did not cover at all. It was like nothing. I'm wondering if the formula changed? or perhaps it just doesn't work on aging skin like it used to. Either way, I couldn't use it anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I always have a pot of this product around my vanity no matter what I'm obsessed with at the moment. Bare Minerals is reliable for providing excellent, natural looking, mattifying coverage. It absolutely destroys shine, and is so easy on the skin, I use it for my little makeup days as a foundation and over the top of other products to set them and improve their finish.

This was the first foundation I ever tried when I was about 15 years old. I used it religiously until about age 21 when I discovered MAC studio fix powder. At age 23 my skin took a major turn for the worse after going off birth control. I'd never had any skin issues before BC and during - besides minor break outs and hyper-pigmentation (redness) on my nose. At 24 I opted to only wear make up on special occasions thinking my skin was not fairing well due to make up. From 24 until about 6 months ago (I am 27) I have been on a very strict skincare regime in order to improve my skin (it has helped a lot, but there's a bit more to be done) as well as tried 20 or more different foundations looking for my Holy Grail. 6 months ago I thought back to make up I had been using when I had perfect skin - this bare minerals foundation - so I decided to give it another try. I can't get over how natural this foundation looks while still providing amazing coverage! I use Laura Mercier setting powder to keep me matte. I should have never stopped using this foundation! I still sometime use other brands (tarte, urban decay, L'Or√©al) for foundation and I can't say I'm a fan of any other bareminerals products, but this foundation is simply amazing!!! Love it for easy days when I'm not trying to look glam, just simple looks that really LAST! Perfect for work!

This loose powder is a magic!! I love it, I apply it after my tarte BB cream, the BB cream's color is a bit dark for me but whenever I apply this foundation everything turns out astonishing, It makes the most beautiful finishing ever...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've always struggled with dry skin. Before I got this stuff, I had to moisturize, prime, conceal, and use liquid foundation... But it would start to crack/dry out and look awful just hours later. I tried so many different kinds. Now I literally only put some concealer under my eyes and this foundation. The coverage is INCREDIBLE. As long as you blend it, the effect is completely airbrushed. I got the shade fairly medium and I've never had makeup blend so well with my skin tone. I've also had this foundation for 5 months now, and I still haven't run out (I use it almost every single day)... Seriously, this stuff is amazing and I have nothing negative to say about it.

I have dry skin and sometimes break outs, but this foundation glides over any skin issues I have at the time. When other foundations are clinging to my dry patches, this foundation doesn't. It is more of a light to medium coverage, so it's not going to cover every imperfection, but I prefer to spot conceal anyways. What it does do is even out your skin tone and provide a soft glow. My skin always looks super radiant with this foundation on. One cautionary note: if you get rained on or cry with this foundation on you can get streaks. Definitely not water resistant at all. Just something to keep in mind. Really a great foundation!

I was in search of a new powder foundation and I thought bare minerals would be perfect. Some days when I use it, my skin looks amazing---glowing and radiant. Other days, not so much---dull, dry and cakey. I think I have that type of skin this just doesn't work for.

I have combination skin, and am prone to breakouts. And since my skin is pretty fair, the blemishes always seem super red. I've used liquid foundations but just wasn't happy with coverage of acne because you could always tell I was wearing foundation. But This foundation totally gives amazing natural coverage! I definitely recommend exfoliating and using a good primer before hand as this tends to cling to dry patches. But even if you let the foundation sit on the face for a bit, it seems to melt into the dry patches and blurs them! Important is to take your time and buff, it really does give great natural coverage and you can definitely build to full coverage. Use a fluffy concealer brush for problem areas and any redness literally just disappears. I find that the mineral veil really helps to set my makeup and keep me from getting shiny too quickly (and trust me I usually get shiny within a hour or 2 of applying makeup). It also seems to calm my acne prone skin. Highly recommend!

I got this because I wanted something that is good for my skin and can cover me up fast in the morning. My sister used this in high school and said she loved it so I gave it a shot. I have hormonal breakouts on my chin and forehead, and I need at least medium coverage. This didn't cover up the freckles on my cheeks because I used less there. I like my freckles peeking through. I was able to cover my undereye darkness with this and the redness of my breakouts, but you could see texture pretty easily. also, I'm not a fan of the shimmer in it. I didn't want to buy the matte version because I still want glory skin, but this just made me look shiny. After matte bronzer and blush, it looked okay, but on its own I'm not in love. I feel like when I took it off my skin did look healthy and nice, which is why it's 4 stars. I still use it when I don't feel like using my liquid or concealer and I'm late to class.
Beautiful finish. Great for sever acne or mature skin. Looks like skin not makeup! Radiant. Lightweight and best for hot climates.

For years, I have been looking for a powder foundation that is lightweight and can cover dark circles and redness. This one is perfect. I have dry skin, and it doesn't crust on my dry patches. It's perfect for a no makeup makeup look, and is buildable if you want more coverage. As for staying power, on its own, it lasts 8 hours. But I use the Kat Von D Hydrating Primer and the Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray, and it lasts 15 hours (the entire time I have it on). So definitely a must have product.

reviews.review_title: One of the best powder foundations!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far one of the best powder foundations out there. I used this mostly on minimal makeup days were I wasn't looking for much coverage. And it gave just enough coverage to were my skin looked evened out and still natural. Even with oily skin I found the original to be much better then the matte. I found the matte version to be a little chalky, but the original adds a slight glow without being dewy. One of my only cons would be that it's not great for controlling oil throughout the day, But that can be easily solved by using a good primer underneath.

I love this foundation and I've tried a bunch! I have sensitive oily/combo skin, large pores and slight texture. I moisturize, setting spray, setting powder (yes, that's correct), prime, powder foundation and set with Laura Mercier in Medium Deep and this is the PERFECT combo for me. Sounds like a lot of steps but my foundation stays PUT all day when without this combo I'd look like an oxidized oompah loompah that's been doused by oil. With this foundation I still look great at the end of the day and not like I slathered vaseline on my face. I'm also glad they expanded the shade range. When I first started using this about 5 years ago I had to mix two colors to even out the redness but now I can just use one color! I have noticed the difference in finish when I dab the powder on verses stippling in circles. Dabbing the powder on with my brush helps minimize my pores dramatically.

In love with this foundation. I use it when I'm too lazy to put on liquid, and I can't tell a difference! I used to use the Lanc√¥me Dual Action powder but now I'm for sure switching to this one. The only reason why it's 4 stars is, on its own, the staying power isn't there. When used with a primer and setting spray, then it lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Better for the cooler months I think. It's easy enough to apply. I use a kabuki brush & set with a setting spray. If you touch your face a lot, it will come off, but I find the wear time excellent with a setting mist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is definitely a different and strange product if you've only been exposed to liquid foundations. it took me a while to find the right way to apply it.  i have extremely combination skin because of hormone imbalances and eczema. when my skin is more on the oily or normal side of the spectrum, i love this foundation. i apply it with the luxie pro precision foundation brush by picking a bit up from the jar and swirling it around in the lid to get it evenly in the brush, and then a mix of buffing and stippling. because it is powder, and because you do have to buff, this foundation doesn't work for people with dry, flakey skin, obviously, and so i have a liquid foundation for those times when i get patches of eczema and dry skin. now that it's spring/summer i can use this foundation more and it looks so natural! i've never used a foundation that looked completely natural until i found this one and i am so in love. definitely recommend if you have the skin type for this product. even though it's a powder i've had no problems applying liquid concealer on top of it, it blends in perfectly. i do feel like i have to set it in my t zone because my t zone gets really oily and i have to set and bake those areas with every foundation ive ever used, but other than that this foundation lasts all day and stays in place perfectly. it's also very buildable and very easy to do so only in the areas you need more coverage without looking weird and cakey.

Do not buy if you have dry skin. No matter how much you moisturize and prime your face, it will apply in cakey dry patches. Also tried it applying wet, I had to wash my face again and started over using different foundation. Never buying it again.

reviews.review_title: Why did I stop using this!?
reviews.review_text: I've come back to this after about 3 years of not using it because I was trying other foundations and what not... why did I ever stop using this!? Omg I love it! I'll admit that at first it looks just a bit powdery on my skin but once I'm done doing my hair and rest of make up it has meshed perfectly with my skin and it looks amazing! Make sure you're taking your time to blend blend blend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: perfect for my everyday make-up routine. Not cakey, leaves my skin radiant, blends really easily. Re buying it for sure.

reviews.review_title: I Really Wanted to Love This...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a premium sample of the fairly light with one of my recent purchases. I really wanted to love this. I was looking for a loose powder with light coverage to wear to work when I see patients. It had everything I was looking for: loose powder, buildable coverage, good for sensitive and dry skin, and natural SPF. However, it didn't blend as well as I might've liked. It caked like nobody's business. It covered some areas more than others. I don't know if maybe it has to do with the moisturizer I use or the brush they supplied, but I was pretty disappointed. Also, the fairly light shade wasn't right for my skin. It was too tan on me, and I'm fairly light...haha. On the bright side, it didn't dry out my skin which is a plus, but I think I'll keep searching.

First time I bought this, it was via an informercial. I've used it since then. Yes, I've tried other foundations over the years and STILL I keep coming back. Bareminerals was the brand that converted me from a wet foundation to powder. Out of curiosity, I decided to try the Makeup Forever HD liquid foundation. It was a disaster. Even my cousin told me to return it. I looked old with the HD foundation. Went back and got my Bareminerals. It's worth all 5 stars.

This is a great lightweight foundation that is best for summer use. I have oily skin and though this makes me oily, it only takes a couple of blots to remove the oil. I use concealer before using this to hide my acne scars and this takes care of the rest of my face. I could see it being drying during winter but in the summer it works well as a lightweight, natural looking foundation.

This is hands down the best foundation that I have ever tried!! I am a track and soccer athlete, and spend an average of 15 hours of week in the California sun. I was looking for a foundation that did not make my dry to normal skin look cakey or oily. This foundation does not do either of those things! It gives my skin a natural finish and has minimal flashback (spf 15, which I LOVE for summer :)). The coverage, but it can be built up to full coverage or even left as sheer coverage if you were to use a sparse brush with a light hand.

reviews.review_title: Pretty good but colour is off
reviews.review_text: I got fair, which said it was for people with pale skin with pink undertones. I bought it and tried it but it still looked pretty yellow, it doesn't match my skin tone at all. Other than the shades being off its really good. It feels nice on the skin and it covers really nicely for a powder foundation. It also goes on really well and has a pretty natural look to it. I wish the colour matched my skin so that i could use it more often.
I won't put anything else on my face (besides their concealer). Simply the best. So flawless and natural. Bonus points because it's good for your skin!

I do love this stuff. It goes on very easily and smoothly and looks great. Only con is that it doesn't last very long for me. Even with priming and spraying it looks a little patchy when I get home from work. Still like it though, I hate fussing with liquid foundations in the morning.

I currently have combo skin w/ an oily t-zone and this did not hold up. Looks great after initial application but after 2-3 hours of wear I am already having to blot. This also emphasized my dry patches so I don't know how this also would work on dry skin.
this stuff highlights my acne and wrinkles and has almost a glossy finish that reflects oddly in the light.  super cakey after a few hours of wear mixed with perspiration or oil.

Wanted to love it, but hated it. After initial application it looked pretty flawless. But upon closer look it was cakey, emphasized texture, sunk into pores. And by the end of the day it was much worse, along with it breaking me out my face looked like I had rubbed oil all over. Returned it. Yuck!

I heard so much about this foundation but never thought I would try it cuz I didn't have faith in powder foundations. Well, silly me. Finally I decided to give it a shot and it immediately jumped to the top of my love list after the first use. Great (actually greater than most of my liquid foundations) coverage, easy to apply with the right tools, really fine powder that leaves no trace on your face, and settles beautifully after mixing into the skin's natural oil. I leave home with a fresh look in the morning and come home with glowing skin after work. I have combination skin and the makeup stays on beautifully through the whole day. No reason not to love.

I might have missed the point completely... I enjoy other Bareminerals products, but how is this supposed to be full coverage?  Did anyone notice how the girl in the commercials already had beautiful skin before applying this?  I have hyper-pigmentation and other flaws on my skin, and this had zero cover-up effect.  It might make a decent finishing powder, but that's all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Heard great things, so I wanted to give it a try while on vacation. It clinged on to dry patches and hard to build coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wore this foundation for years. I stupidly decided to try some new liquid foundations because I believed the hype about them. I regret it for sooo many reasons. Yes they did provide a little more coverage but caused me to experience the worst breakouts I've ever had. Had to spend a lot of money on skincare products before I finally realized what should've been obvious. Liquid foundations clog pores and were causing my breakouts. I'm returning to Bare Minerals and never using anything else!

I love this foundation because it makes the skin look so naturally flawless; the finish is beautiful and it covers up any redness or imperfections on my skin nicely. You only need to use a small amount of product and when it is blended out it is very smooth and light on the skin (I barely feel like I'm wearing foundation). My skin is a mixture of oily and dry and this did not stick to my dry spots but was not too dewy. I have light-medium skin with warm undertones and I got shade matched in the store for neutral ivory 06. It is a good match for me and makes my skin look so healthy. I'm obsessed!

I have combo-oily skin. I got this as a sample & I was excited to try it, did not like how it emphasized my pores around my nose area... decided to give it another try with the porefessional (my all time favorite primer) & it still manages to sink into my pores & it does not look pretty at all. It looks like all it does is clogs up the pores... better off with another powder foundation

I used to use smashbox loose powder but after they raised the price to nearly $50 I decided to try this out, and I loved it. It doesn't fill in any fine lines or imperfections and gives a nice smooth finish.
This product allows me to have full coverage without feeling caked on.

I've having using for years, specially during the summer. I'm NC30 and my color is 13 golden Beige. Love the dewy finish on me. I have oily sensitive acne prone skin and this foundation work perfectly:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have seen this foundation on so many people and I loved the way it looked. I usually use the bareMinerals tinted moisturizer, but thought I'd step it up to something a little more coverage. My skin is very dry. I tried this for 2 weeks with a variety of face moisturizers and primers and it made my skin look dry and wrinkly no matter what I tried. Sadly, I have to return, it's not for me.

I really wanted to like this. It applied beautifully and initially looked so nice on my skin. However, by the end of the day, my skin was an oil slick and was broken out all over. This is a good product, but it is apparently not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a few years now and only now thought of writing a review.  Overall, the look when you put it on is super natural and actually fits my skin tone.  Depending on how you apply the foundation, it can get a little cakey, especially if you have dry patches on your face, but apply it in the right way and it turns out to be such a beautiful finish.  I break out pretty easily, but the minerals used keeps everything smooth and doesn't cause any dirt clots in my skin. I have a medium skin tone and usually get the shade medium beige.

This powder is the best one ever. Full coverage, and the original has a Dewey, creamy finish. Finally, a color to match an NC40/NC42, Tan Nude 17. If you have texture, use a good moisturizer and smoothing primer. If it's not enough coverage, use a liquid foundation with light coverage underneath or a tinted moisturizer. This stuff is amazing and makes me look airbrushed.

reviews.review_title: amazing foundation but shows dry patches
reviews.review_text: For the first time in my life my foundation ACTUALLY matches my skin tone. I have very light skin with some yellow undertone and Bare Mineral has every shade that you can imagine. It is light weight and has buildable coverage. The best thing is that all my acnes cleared up after I switched to Bare Mineral and I don't feel like I am wearing foundation at all. Had to take off a star because if order to wear this foundation, you need to work a little harder on skin care. This powder really accentuates dry patches if you don't hydrate well and it definitely takes a little practice to learn how to apply this foundation. Overall an amazing product if you take good care of your skin.

Bought this based on the excellent reviews here. I was looking for a light-weight powder foundation to add to my daily makeup routine and came upon this product. For some background, I have combination-oily, acne-prone skin. I suffer from the occasional breakouts on my cheeks and have medium size pores (I used to have huge pores but daily use of my clarisonic and murad  toner have shrunk them so much in the past couple of months!). When I first used this foundation, my face looked like a cakey mess! I The powder settled into ALL of my pores, clung onto all of my dry patches, and creased around the one blemish I had on my cheek. It almost looked like my face was covered in pitted acne scars, which I don't have...I initially thought that it might have been because of the new primer I was trying out or that I might have applied too much product at once so I decided to give it another shot. I used this with my holy grail moisturizer and pore minimizing primer and it still looked the exact same as it did the first time. I tried applying it with different brushes, in different weather conditions and it looked terrible every time. It's definitely a full coverage powder, which I love, but sadly this product was a huge disappointment for me. Porous skin beware!

I first got a deluxe sample size of this as a promo ....I chose the lightest shade cause I'm fair complexioned. (Fairly Light) I was shocked when the shade matched my skin tone too a T !!! I have Fair skin (Porcelain) and the Fairy Light is perfect for my skin tone. I then ordered a full size one in Fairy Light as well! A little does goes a long way that's for sure and it looks like I'm not wearing any makeup on my face at all! Full coverage as well :) I love Bare Minerals....I recommend the Original bare minerals over the matte version though. I just love the Original one so much better :)

I was honestly completely supported by this product. I received it as a sample and decided to try it out. I was not expecting to have such good coverage. I have a pretty red colored skin due to acne and scarring and this covered beautifully. I have never really tried powder foundations just because I have oily skin so I wasn't sure how it would react but so far I'm pretty impressed. Will definitely but the full sized product!

BE is my goto everyday foundation for several years now. Always go back to it when many other new foundations sit collecting dust. For years I've mixed the medium beige and golden medium for my perfect color match. Ordered the new shade golden beige and it is perfect. So thank you BE for adding to this already great color selection. The new shades make an already almost perfect foundation even better.
I don't use this foundation everyday, but I'll always have it in my collection. This foundation is flawless, lightweight, and amazing coverage.

I have pretty even skin that is not too oily or too dry. This foundation was meant to be a lightweight foundation to provide sheer coverage but it ended up looking horrific on. My pores and fine lines looked huge and no amount of buffing could make it blend well into my skin.
i just bought this with the hydrating mineral veil and im shook  soooooooo good i never want to use a liquid foundation ever again

I have been using this product since I was 16 and I have always loved it I recently stoped using because I wanted to try out new things and it just made me love this powder even more I have very dry skin and I just don't know what it is about this powder but it never holds onto my dry spots it  is just magic only way I can describe it! I will forever use this! I always use a light foundation or bb cream and primer under this also then use a setting spray and my skin just looks so nice <3

reviews.review_title: Don't wear with glasses or if you are dry!
reviews.review_text: I got a deluxe sample of this but just so happened to be the perfect color. It also looked great when I applied it like my skin was made of satin but I where I was dry it looked terrible. Especially under the eyes.I considered getting this as just a powder to apply as a touchup throughout the day but then I wore the foundation out and I found I had the worst marks ever from wearing glasses. I am sure every person on the planet knew I was wearing make up that day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had previously sworn by liquid foundation, but I am finding that it makes my face feel extremely weighed down and heavy. I received this sample from Sephora after a purchase and I LOVE it. My skin is combo, but leans on the side of dry and this does not negatively affect my skin at all. I brush it over my skin for moderate coverage and top it off with some cheek color and I use Benefit's Watts Up highlighter. My skin has never glowed so much and I will be making the conversion. I'll save the liquid foundation for special occasions perhaps, where I need something with higher coverage. But for day to day jobs and classes, BM is the way to go.
Love this powder foundation and love that they carry so many colors.  Found my exact match!!   has helped to cover my acne flareups perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a relatively new makeup user and this foundation was perfect for me. I love it because it's so easy to apply and it's very lightweight and natural looking. Really a great foundation for young people or those who don't want to look cakey.

I love this powder. It is part of my everyday makeup routine. I put on a tinted primer, this powder with a little bit of blush and eye makeup and it gives a flawless natural look. It light enough to wear in the summer and it won't clog your pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this powder!!! As someone who always wants a very natural and quick make up look, I found this powder foundation so perfect! I hardly wear any other foundation because it tends to look so caked and heavy on the face but this was the perfect amount of coverage (as someone who has blemishes and acne scars, they are always hidden so well!!) I think that the price is definitely worth the money, especially if you're in highschool and want to look as natural as possible. I have recommended to my friends and they have loved it too! Definitely worth trying :)
The only beauty product I've used consistently for years. Can't live without it! Worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am 100% a liquid foundation girl, but with summer approaching this is just the most beautiful powder foundation I have encountered it's quick easy and the finish is too natural. I am in love with this and will continue to use and buy! (btw I have tried the tarte powder foundation and although it offers more coverage, it patchy and clogs pores like no other.)

This product is outstanding! I have used this every day, on vacation, or while running around doing errands. It's light weight, medium coverage, and perfect for every occasion. This is also great for every age and technique level. LOVE THIS PRODUCT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this stuff for years, and it works very well for oily skin like mine. The coverage is pretty amazing for a powder, but I find myself gravitating towards liquid foundations these days due to the fuller coverage. If you have oily skin and want medium coverage, this is your solution.

I love this foundation and have used it for years. I'm a makeup junkie so I've tried loads of foundations and I always come back to this. If you buff it in with circular motions using a medium density brush it makes your skin look airbrushed. The only drawback is that it doesn't provide enough coverage to combat my dark undereye circles. But I don't care because of how flawless the rest of my face looks. I'm biracial and use Golden Tan.
This is beautiful but only on certain places of the face ! Not for under eyes and it has a noticeable shimmer not glitter but a shine which isn't good for all over. Don't recommend for oily skin.
It's okay, but definitely not for oily skin and you set it really good. It's not the worst powder foundation but there are definitely better out there and for cheaper! Take me word!

reviews.review_title: one of the worst powder foundations out there
reviews.review_text: This powder emphasizes pores, can't handle oil, doesn't cover hyper pigmentation or undereye darkness. The powder has tiny sparkles in it and it looks soooo bad! I honestly don't know why people love this powder. I have tried different primers, brushes and what not- it doesn't work. It was a waste of money. Tho I do give it to Bareminerals for expanding their shade range

reviews.review_title: IM IN LOVE WITH THIS MAKEUP
reviews.review_text: So I have tried just about every liquid foundation, and some are okay, but I find that they just don't feel good on my skin. I have acne prone oily skin with slightly dry patches on the skin between my eyebrows. I am also very very pale with pink undertones so it is difficult to find a shade to match my skin tone. I never thought about trying a powder foundation, but I'm so glad I bought this. It looks like I'm not even wearing makeup, while offering medium-full coverage! It's so easy to apply, and it feels so lightweight. I stopped wearing makeup for the past couple of months, but with this, I can wear it and still get that no makeup feel! I'm seriously in love! Buy this foundation if you have oily skin because it is way better than liquid! Only thing is that I use a bb cream on my large pore areas to fill them in before i apply the foundation. So a poreless primer would probably do you some good if you have large pores on your cheeks like me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this powder! It's easy to take along for travel, it last me about 2 months, it doe not feel caked on to my face and evens out my skin tones. I have been using this for almost 3 years now. Not looking to make a change.
Love this foundation. It blends well and looks so natural. If you like a foundation that you don't even know your wearing it this is for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great powder foundation. I switched to this from liquid (NARS) after I started seeing an esthetician and she recommended using a mineral foundation since my skin is prone to clogging. I had to throw away my Laura Mercier translucent powder (beware of Talc!!) and am only using liquid foundations for special occasions when I'm only wearing it for a couple hours. I use this powder as my everyday foundation while working an 11 hour shift. I use the original formula and have oily skin, I do have to blot and reapply some by 2pm (put makeup on at 7:30am) but it's not that much of an issue. I've tried the matte formula and it made my skin very itchy so beware. Overall, this is a good foundation and I feel better about wearing foundation all day when it is mineral based and is better for the skin. Good skin 2017 here I come.

reviews.review_title: why did I resist for so long?!
reviews.review_text: I have held out on powder foundations forever. I thought for sure there was no way they could work for me. I have sensitive, dry, acne-prone skin, so there was no way I could achieve the coverage I wanted with a powder that wouldn't dry out or irritate my skin, right?  Wrong.  This stuff is incredible. It achieves flawless coverage (with help of Almay concealer underneath) while not drying my skin out or aggravating it. I can wear it for a full work day without becoming spotty or losing coverage. It doesn't irritate my skin, or cause me to break out. I've gotten compliments on how I seem to glow.   Wow. Just wow. I am in love!
This product is very natural looking and has a light feel. If you aren't using an under eye primer it does tend to cause creases. It isn't long wear but definitely a go to for a light natural look.
Absolutely love love this product. The Fairly Medium is a perfect match for my skin and it goes on like a dream - lasting all day. I can't see myself switching from this product any time soon! I
Such a life saver! Goes on so nicely, blends perfectly and does not flake or dry the skin.

I absolutely love bare mineral products! I bought the fair powder and each time I notice it does a good job of clearing up your skin for that real matte finish. My skin even looks better after using this product. It's like magic. Definitely would recommend for any skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used both the original and matte. I bought this one first because the reviews were so good unfortunately it made my skin oily within 4 hours after application so I switched over to the matte formula which was much better. I love how the coverage can build to a medium and it looks beautiful on the skin. I wore it for more than 12 hours during my nursing shift and sometimes it looks flawless. During the summer time, I would recommend putting primer because it did begin to separate after 10 hours especially around the nose. Overall I was happy with my purchase it lasts a very long time!
It makes my skin feel so soft and I've noticed a difference in my complexion after using it. I don't know why, but I love it! Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't like to use makeup on a regular basis but I had to update my antiquated makeup that I hadn't used in a while with something fresh and new. I got some help from a fantastic lady who recommended this as a popular item for people like me who want something easy to use but isn't too heavy or thick.  Absolutely love this product. Got it with the magic brush that it goes with. Hadn't bought myself any makeup for easily at least 3 years and this is by far one of the best things I've ever picked up.  Coverage is incredible, easy to use and doesn't make you look super made up. Fell asleep with it on my face and I swear I woke up with smoother skin too.  Great product. Highly recommend it.  And the brush is amazing too.

I am Southeast Asian and the Medium Tan was a perfect match for me. I have oily to dry skin and sometimes powder foundation would absorb the oil and it looks blotchy on me. bare minerals went on smooth and blended perfectly for me. I also got a sample of the medium dark with my order and I use that to contour with then mist it with the setting spray.

Love the color and I love how the foundation mixes with the rest of my makeup. However this made my skin very dry so I had to return it. I'll wait until the summer, that's a better season for this type of foundation.

reviews.review_title: Such a simple yet amazing product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can't stress how much I love this product. I've always struggled to find the perfect foundation and I lean more towards powder foundations. This was the first foundation I ever tried and I loved how it was mineral-based. I tried a powder one recently and it was mattifying so I didn't like how dull it made my skin look. this BareMinerals foundation adds the perfect amount of color and shine on my face while giving me the right amount of coverage. I'd say this is light to medium coverage which is exactly how I like it. It also stays on for a few hours which is really good too. I've also always suffered with acne so this is a holy grail product. When I first used it years ago it made my skin just LOOK better overall. I'm so happy I purchased it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that I can wear this and no one notices. It makes my skin look softer and it hides the little imperfections, but it also looks like I have nothing on. Plus it also feels like I have nothing on. Definitely a winner for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down my favorite go-to beauty product. I'm 25 and have been consistently using this since I was 16, even after trying other products here and there. The coverage is really good and buildable but doesn't feel too cakey. I like that I can quickly put it on without having to deal with concealer or foundation if I don't want to. The SPF is a plus, although it's not a very high amount. I tried the matte version and did not like that at all, maybe my skin is too dry. I returned the matte one and went back to the original formula and it never fails me. :) I will say that I don't think the coverage lasts all day. If you're looking for something more long lasting I would recommend pairing with a foundation, or plan to apply a refresher of powder later on in the day if that's important to you. I am a light skinned latina and use the shade fairly light, when I was tanner I used medium.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is super hot! I put it on my face and then i forget its there! One problem, i have large pores and you can totally see it on my face! not a flawless blend. Still love it doe.
This item is so easy to use and provides great coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love applying this as part of my regular routine. It makes my face look healthy and minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love it, but i think i get the wrong one,,, I love the mate one, but still using this for the night. !!!
I love it I have a very sensitive skin but let my skin really soft I got a example but I bought the original package:) :)

I use this everyday because the liquid foundation by bare minerals was a major failure. This product is an alright product but more close to being a failure compared to a success.  It leaves my skin looking dry and powdery. It separates probably within 5 hours and looks worse. The natural oils in my skin combined with this product leaves a shine after worn for part of my day and I can easily smudge and wipe it away with a brush of my finger. I personally wouldn't recommend this product.

I'm not too sure why I haven't wrote a review on this product yet, it has been my staple for years! This is the only foundation that doesn't break me out. I love how you can use it wet or dry. I sometimes use it for highlighting purposes. Or on top of BB creams when I need a little more coverage. It can be layered & become more full coverage. Love this stuff. I use both matte and original. Sometimes I'll use Matte all over my face and use the original to highlight since it gives you a natural glow.

I have combination oily/dry skin with large pores and while it looks great from 5 feet or more away, the closer one looks at my face it is as though every pore is amplified and the products clings to any of the flakes on my face. I will not buy it again. I am still on the search for a full coverage, non-cakey, pore minimizing foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've worn this foundation for years in Fair. My skin is somewhat dry, especially on my cheeks, but I prefer powder foundation to liquid. Before I put it on I use CeraVe moisturizing lotion and it helps. Although this powder sort of settles into the pores on my nose and if I have a dry flakey patch of skin on my cheeks. If I moisturize well before applying it minimizes the drying cakiness. After a few hours of wear the oils on my face make this look dewy and less cakey and dry, which I like. I'm sure that if I used a primer before putting this on it would help, i'll try that. I'd say definitely make sure to moisturize well before. Oh if it's a hot day this looks really gross if your face sweats lol, it kind of melts. Oh and when I wear sunglasses it wipes the foundation off on my nose. I don't usually get acne except maybe one or two pimples per month around the same time. But I have some redness and discoloration and visible blood vessels in my face. This foundation helps the redness but is not very full coverage. I don't like to put more than one layer on either. However Bare Minerals foundation does make my face look very good and thankfully the fair shade isn't too orangey like many liquid foundations!
I liked this product a lot ! It applies really nicely and looks really smooth BUT I think this wasn't meant for my skin since it made it look cracky and dry!
I always go back to this foundation. Sometimes i use it in combination with my Urban Decay Naked foundation which i also love.

reviews.review_title: not good for dry skin, aging, or light coverage
reviews.review_text: Looks like I dusted my face with over priced rice powder, definately doesn't wear well through the day, by the end all I see it does is cling around blemishes leaving a crysty patchy powder ring around them, makes my skin look like I've spent my spare time doing crystal method really, if this is timely, I second the review under min. Not worth the hype, want to say better than nothing,  but honestly nothing has been better!

reviews.review_title: None of them Match my Skin Tone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am asian with fair skin tone. I really liked how smooth and flawless it looked on my face. Unfortunately, none of the shades ever matched my skin tone. My face began to turn a little oily on the T-zone as well which I did not like.

Really truly will never understand the hype behind this foundation. I have combination skin (oily t-zone, dry patches on cheeks) and it was genuinely one of the worst foundations I've ever used--and I wanted to love it so badly. Even with the Prime Time primer designed specifically for their products, it settled into lines, refused to blend, and WORST of all: clung to any remotely dry areas on my face. So disappointing. Pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage this product provides is amazing! You do need to make sure you use a stiff brush and bend properly. At first I was using a fluffy brush then was told I should be using the opposite. Game changer right there. I've purchased this product twice and will continue to do so.

I love this foundation because it doesn't irritate my sensitive, rosacea prone skin like most foundations do. It stays on for at least 6-8 hours, but it does tend to rub off on my nose and get a bit... off looking within a few hours. The packaging also makes for a bit of a mess which I dislike. Other than that this product is awesome

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this foundation every day I wear makeup and it's incredible!! You need the smallest amount, and it helps control oils on my face.  Some days I will only use a little bit, but other days I can layer for more coverage. I was new to powder foundation and this is so easy to manage! I use the bareMinerals kabuki brush which works so well.  I always recommend it to my friends who are looking for a powder foundation.

This powder was very disappointing. It has very uneven coverage where it goes on thick in some areas and barely shows up on others. I tried to change up my primer but it never made a difference; there was always areas where the powder looked thicker and heavier than others. Additionally, the powder had a very weird sulfuric smell especially as the day went on and I got oilier. Would not recommend. I do, however, like the bare minerals mineral veil
I really wish this product has more of color selections like barepro. im in light medium neutral to yellow but cannot find a right shade

I have been using bareminerals for about 4yrs and I always go back for more. I find  that you have to use a dense brush to really get a good coverage. I always mosturise and prime my face before and I use my concealer before hand with the mineral powders as well. Trying to blend a creamy concealer over powder is not recommended. All in all if you are looking for a nice natural look that is easy to apply, then I recommend this. If you want a full coverage foundation or a really done up look then this is not for you. It's great for busy mornings or if you want to cover-up some uneven skin color. Give it a try!

Feels smooth on my face but doesn't offer a lot of coverage.  It also magnifies my pores and fine lines.  I did use the primer that came with my starter kit before hand. This is not for people that have dry winter skin issues.

I really love this foundation. I have seen a few reviews contradicting each other about sheer coverage and full coverage. I believe it depends on the brush you're using to apply it. I use the morphe m439 which is a very dense buffer brush which gives me medium to full coverage with the foundation alone. It looks beautiful on and covers all my redness and blemishes. If you want a sheer coverage then you should use a fluffier brush. I will definitely be repurchasing!
The shades tend to run a little yellow, and it likes to stick to the dry patches of the face. It's also a bit messy, but the coverage is nice and it stays all day and keeps me matte
I really love this foundation it is a medium coverage but totally use bareminerals primer with it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great! I no longer have to wear liquid foundation because it does a great job of covering any unevenness on my skin. It's light and does not feel like you caked something on your face. Because it's SPF 15, you don't have to wear sunscreen underneath either. Also, a little goes a long way and so this product lasts forever! Because it's mineral-based too, I don't feel as bad about putting the product on my skin as I would with say a liquid foundation that has many chemical or unnatural ingredients. This stuff is the best!
I got this as a gift and i love it! Sheer coverage and very natural! It goes on very nicely and i high recommend it! Good for beginners!

I used this for two years when I was younger and loved it. During that time, of course, I wasn't looking for much coverage so it worked fine. It was recommended by my dermatologist because it's very skin friendly. If you aren't looking for much coverage, it's for you

This is the foundation that I always come back to, despite forays into BBs and full-coverage liquids.   I have combination-oily skin and some faint pinkness, and this provides just enough coverage while providing a very natural glow. It stays all day (especially with setting spray) and doesn't make my skin oily or cause my pores to clog.

I was very iffy about getting this. My step-sister always told me she loved it, but I have bad acne scarring. I went ahead and ordered it. I fell in love with it. It has excellent coverage. If you follow the directions about making swirling motions with your brush, you can cover your entire face instead of adding more and more product. Of course if you need more coverage just add more product. It has a glowy-like, natural finish, which I like. I definitely recommend. :)

I'm 41 with dry and sensitive skin. I've tried many foundations and this is the only one that gives me that natural, no makeil feeling. What I love most about this foundation is that it covers my imperfections without erasing my freckles.

I've been using this for a couple months now and am almost out already. It looks nice on my skin but very very minimal coverage although I have pretty good skin I don't feel that it evens it out very much for a foundation powder. It gets blotchy in certain spots after a couple of hours but I don't use a primer with it, just Clinique moisturizer underneath.

Until recently, this was the only makeup I wore. In the last year or two, however, I began having issues with oil, which caused this makeup to melt off of my face. Also, it began oxidizing in certain places, turning kinda of orangey. I tried the Bare Minerals primer for oil, but that didn't help with either the oil or the oxidizing. I was sad about having to replace it bc I really loved the way it covered and the way it felt on my skin- until I turned 32 and got oily. Another issue I've always had, but dealt with, was that it definitely didn't last all day even before the oil problem, so it always had to be re-done before I could go anywhere after work. Now, I only wear it to work or for quick errands on the weekend (if I wear makeup at all), and I wear a liquid foundation for everything else.
this product for me didn't really do anything. it's not very hugh coverage and if you wanted even a little coverage you have to use a lot of the product. i dork reccomend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved how my skin feels and looks with it, lasted the whole day with perfect coverage, however I wish I had bough 1 tone lighter. I felt it turned out a bit darker that I would like. I will be buying it lighter for sure.

I don't know how this product gets so much love. I gave this product three chances but still not loving it. To me, this is messy to apply, and accentuates pores and fine lines. Hard to apply evenly... I think it's just an ok product. I bought the special edition. I think I'll probably keep it though.

Do yourself a favor and get this stuff! My skin is incredibly sensitive and this is the most gentle foundation powder. This entire line (including skincare) is perfect for sensitive skin! It's also light and feels like you don't have any makeup on while still effective in full coverage! I've sampled other makeup just to try something new but nothing compares to this and I'll never buy anything else!
Great coverage but looks natural!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is perfect for those mornings when I'm in a rush and don't have a lot of time to apply my makeup before work, or when I want to wear something light. If you have problematic skin or a lot of spots to cover up, this won't do the trick and will cling to any dry patches. I find it easiest to apply all over with a kabuki blush and blend in circular motions, then spot cover with a smaller concealer blush.  I'd say the coverage is light - medium, but you definitely can't apply too many layers. I like that it's lightweight and looks natural on the skin. It's great for combination/oily skin and I definitely wouldn't recommend it for dry skin unless you moisturize really well. It also lasts all day which is a big plus!

My skin is fairly clear therefore I use pounds of foundation to cover my pores and blemishes. With Bare Minerals, I know that with a small amount will go a long way, leaving my skin with a somewhat natural glow. Till this day it will forever be my go-to foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this foundation. It's the only one that makes my skin look natural while still covering up any redness or light blemishes. Its light weight, doesn't give me that cakey heavy feeling that liquid foundations do. Plus it doesn't clog my pores. Quick & easy to apply. I also notice that its the only one that blends into my skin tone well and looks natural even in natural lighting, as I have a more yellow hue in my skin. I'll be sticking to this one! The only downside is that it isn't very long lasting, sometimes I will have to apply it again later in the evening if I want to go out. But it only takes me a minute or two. Love it and Ill be sticking to this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had to work with brush for a long time and with many repetitions to build a decent coverage even though I am not a fan of wearing too much makeup and I have fairly even toned skin. It is not a product to use in the morning before work and expect to make it to the office on time. But most upsetting was that it left my skin dry and I had to apply moisturizing masks twice more often than usual. I got scared when I noticed wrinkles ( I was 26) because my skin was so dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The formulas is too drying and since the container is really small, the powder gets everywhere. I have a normal skin type and I feel like this is too drying for me. But I think the coverage is buildable and nice. This is a good foundation for a beginner or someone who have a sensitive skin.

If you have and use multiple foundations, this would be an okay addition to it. It gives you a subtle sheen, and has medium coverage. However, for someone like me, who only use one foundation from day to day, this just doesn't work. First of all, im light to medium, and I'm using medium gold which is too dark for me. Second, my face gets very sensitive and easily irritated in the winter, and this foundation amplifies every tiny little bump on your face and make your makeup look super cakey compared to a liquid foundation. Will not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For MANY MANY years this was the only foundation i wore! Before I even knew how to do my makeup and I would just slop this all on my face and you would not believe the comments I would get from everyone telling me how good my face looked! Nowadays I still have this product and thought I do not reach for it all the time I still cherish it! It is my go to for a quick morning when I have to rush out the door!

I saw so many good reviews and I thought this would be great for oily/acne prone skin. But all it does is make my face look patchy and cakey and definitely did not help my oily skin. Do not buy if u have extremely oily skin!! Not sure about dry or combo...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a lot more work then my other foundation. It also did not wear well and transferred all over my chest and shirt.

I have combination skin and some issues with acne for about 8 years now. Although I usually prefer a good, thick foundation, I LOVE this one because it's so light - I can't barely tell it's on my face! And it doesn't make me break out. My only problem with it is that it is medium coverage so I usually have to use a colour corrector underneath for the acne, as well as concealer on top. Other than that though, it's amazing and it is so lovely to have! Especially perfect for summer when you don't want your makeup too cakey.
Works great! Wear alone or over foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Recently I have been using a shade darker than my skin tone for a bronzer and have found that it is not at all noticeable and doesn't stay on the skin even with a primer.

reviews.review_title: Sad there is no longer a color match... :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my ONLY foundation/concealer for years. I love it and would never switch if I didn't have to. After living in Australia for 9 months, my skin tone ended up fading to be in between shades, and neither match well enough. BUT if you do have a match-and there are lots of colors!- then I totally recommend this. I have oily/dry combination skin as well as acne, and this has worked amazing.
I have used other powders but this is my go to for 6 years and I can't imagine my life without it. It gives the best coverage and there's nothing it can't cover.

This stuff is fool proof, have been using for years now and there is no way to mess this up. I took my 15 y/o to Sephora and had her color matched with Bare Minerals and she loves it also. It's a buidable coverage which I like, and my face doesn't feel like an oil slick by the end of the day.

I love how buildable this is! If I want more of my freckles to show, I just do a once over. I can cover up blemishes easily and smoothly with a concealer brush. This stuff doesn't transfer and doesn't irritate my skin! It doesn't look cakey or fake. When I use it, I always catch myself in the mirror throughout the day like Dang, my skin looks good. Can't get any better than that. A little goes a long way. Try a sample first if you don't wanna commit!

So I stopped wearing this for a year because I realized it brings out tine lines a lot worse than liquid does.... but I now realize I could put a very light foundation or a primer on then put this on! I must say soooooo much better and face looks smooth and wrinkle free for the most part! Now my daughter is 14 and it's absolutely gorgeous on her and flawless!

I purchased this for my 15 y/o daughter who is new to makeup and wears very little. This looks beautiful on her. It makes her skin look smooth and even and covers the few blemishes she has without causing further breakouts. I will definitely repurchase for her and try other Bare Minerals products if she is interested.

This is my favorite!  Light enough to wear by itself or over a primer if need or liquid foundation for extra coverage. Works very well with my skin type (combination) and I'm over all very satisfied and will probably always use this product.
As always the best thing I put on in the morning
Pretty buildable coverage but I noticed that after I put this on it doesn't show my blush very well unless I use a cream or liquid.

I'm not a fan of most liquid foundations since I like something more light and I love the Bare Minerals foundation. It's super fast and easy to apply and while it doesn't cover up a lot, it's just enough to even out my skin tone. As with most loose powders, it is a little messy sometimes if you're not careful, especially when it's new but it hasn't been too much of a problem for me.   I recommend this for people who are looking for easy application and light coverage.

This is the best coverage powder foundation! It does leave a little bit of a highlighter effect on the whole face which some may not like but I do! I don't like having a million steps to make my complexion even so this does the trick for me! Will definitely be repurchasing in the future and recommending to friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the limited edition version and it's basically the same except the case. It's very high quality!!! it goes from powder and as its on your face.
This foundation makes my skin flawless and radiant.  I have been wearing it for years and I still love it as much as the first day I wore it.  My favorite foundation ever!

reviews.review_title: I have a love hate relationship
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and this foundation just doesn't stand up to it for even a few hours. However, I am absolutely in love with how it looks when I first put it on. If I wasn't so cheap, I would use this as my finishing powder on top of my foundation, but I can't afford two high end foundations at once.

I got this as a sample once and I absolutely love it so I bought the full size. I tried the matte first in the same shade but it seemed a little orangey on me so I exchanged for the original. I absolutely love using this on top of my Liquid foundation and then using a setting powder.

I have used Bare Minerals original foundation for 14 years! I think it is a great foundation and has a beautiful, natural, but build-able coverage. It's good for all skin types and doesn't cake or flake. Sometimes I like to do a light dusting of this after applying Bare Minerals Complexion Rescue or Stila Stay all day Illuminating moisturizer.
I love this foundation so much, I can't use any other product. It always looks so natural, I love it!

I was so excited to try this foundation, as I had heard so many wonderful things about it. I have oily acne-prone skin. I love how this product applies - very quick with a flat-top brush and looks great but also natural. However when I wear this for about 5 hours or more it completely breaks up! It becomes so patchy and weird, it looks like there's something wrong with my skin. I find it especially around my mouth/jaw area. I went back and tried multiple primers and setting sprays, but nothing helps. Sadly I will be returning it, because by the end of the day my face looks ridiculous.

Honestly it's the best foundation I have ever used, which is probably why I rarely wear foundation. The feeling of it on skin is light but may inch a little after a while. It doesn't cover well at all and honestly leaves skin hardly any different looking with or without it. I'm not saying don't buy it, but if you need something light and you're skin is amazing naturally this is probably good for you. If not hopefully you can find something better.

reviews.review_title: Awful for my skin and doesn't apply well
reviews.review_text: I have loved other bareMinerals products, but not this one. It has turned my skin super oily and it does not apply well. Even with the best brushes, it goes on streaky. Would not recommend.

I do like it. It applies easily and quickly and gives my skin a natural looking glow. However, it makes my forehead and noise oily every time I wear it, even with a setting powder. My skin is normally combo/dry, this doesn't happen with other foundations I've used. It doesn't cover congestion aka pimples very well either. I don't know if I'll purchase it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this, and I was excited to try it based on the high reviews. After wearing it for a few days, however, I am SHOCKED that this has such a high rating. It caused the worst breakout I've had in probably 10 years. I stopped wearing it a couple of days ago and my skin is still not recovered. Not only did it cause horrible pimples on areas of my face I've never had pimples before, it also made my skin incredibly shiny. I rarely write reviews, but my experience warranted one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good foundation. Looks amazing, does not take long to apply with the right brush. My only complaint is... even with a primer I don't find it lasts ALL day, without being reapplied, but does last a good amount of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably the best powder I've used in my life. It basically makes you look airbrushed and healthy.  My only negative was trying this in a sample size,they sent a sample brush that was frustratingly small.
