reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I forgot the last time I was without this product. I absolutely love it, I like to stay natural, and this is the perfect product for me. I get compliments on how natural my makeup looks, Bare Minerals is my favorite.

So I used to get Bare Minerals when I was 16 -  18 because it was good on my skin. I hadn't bought it in a few years and just bought it, maybe a month ago. I have used it and it hasn't changed in being lightweight and feel nice. Love it!

reviews.review_title: Good coverage and I don't feel it on my skin!
reviews.review_text: I love that its buildable coverage! I use the bareMinerals primer with it and it lasts all day. Also does not break me out and I love how natural it feels. The only con is that since its powder foundation, it washes off when I get rained on so not the best for fall/winter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the theory of this makeup, specifically that I can buff on with a brush quickly. I workout before work on a couple of days, so I thought this would be the perfect replacement on the mornings I do not have time for regular foundation/beauty blender. However, it outlines ever single pore on my forehead and chin. Like a little halo around each one screaming look at my not smooth skin!! This foundation makes me look scaly and patchy. Maybe I have been pampered by the beauty blender that makes my skin perfectly smooth like porcelain. This foundation just makes me look older.

I always come back to this product. I occasionally try other things like tinted moisturizer or cream foundations but I always get tired of those and come back to this one. Even my mom who isn't a big make up person approved and compliments me when I'm wearing it (she's usually pretty brutally honest too. So I know she means it.) I use this with the warmth and the mineral veil. Perfection every time. I do have to be really proactive about cleaning my brush though, when I don't it starts to go on a little heavier than I intended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first, this product was covering well. In store, the only shade I matched to (out of all the foundation products) was the medium shade. Which, as someone who is pale, thought was a bit off. So, they put it on and it looks great in store. I go outside, after purchasing, and see that it's a bit dark.  The next week I try working with it since I already had the sheer mineral veil. I ended up getting fairly light and that worked for a while. But lately it just looks cakey again.  I do have to use a primer under my skin for redness. However, I didn't change any products in my routine, so it's a bit off that the foundation powder is being cakey. I'll probably get it again until I can find a better solution.

Tried it on in Sephora and it matched my skin perfectly...Tried it on at home matched my brother who is 2 shades darker than me lol. Love the product and the texture but since it is a bit darker than my skin tone I used it as a bronzer and it still works great! I would definitely buy this product again but this time ill make sure its the right shade. -nessaXOXO

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for about 3 years now and I love it. Every now and then I try something else but I always keep one in my makeup kit and I always come back to it. It's natural, it doesn't give you this weird mask-like finish but it still covers all the blemishes and pimples. To everyone who says that a mineral foundation can't cover spots- try it! You'll be surprised how great it is. It could last longer and maybe look a bit better after 8 hours at the office but it's still fine with some small touch ups here and there. It's a great choice for someone who doesn't like a heavy makeup but needs easy buildable coverage.

I love this foundation.  It takes practically no time to apply, stays on and is easy to touch-up if needed.  I have received comments on how great my skin looks since I have started using it.  I'm not doing anything differently with my skin care, just switched to Bareminerals!

I finally broke down and decided I was a grown up and could afford and should buy grown up makeup. I wish I had done it years ago because this stuff rocks! It has been great for preventing breakouts and it makes my skin look flawless. I see the shimmer when I put it on my hand, but one my face I don't notice it. It just makes my skin look dewy and radiant. I get lots of compliments on my skin, and I owe it all to this new makeup. The one drawback is that it transfers and doesn't last forever. If I go out in the evening, I need to reapply from the day. The most I've noticed the transfer effects are from blowing my nose, and then the makeup is all on the tissue instead of my face. But I am so glad I made the switch from drugstore liquid to this foundation.

reviews.review_title: Best Coverage and Great for break out prone skin !
reviews.review_text: I have used this foundation for years and I have tried all the new stuff and etc... There is nothing that covers my flaws and break outs like this does ! I have very fair skin and get redness and breakouts and this covers it all without  making it worse !!!
Great for olive skin that is sensitive and normal. I get compliments all the time! suits my olive skin well and doesnt cause any irritation or dryness!

This product didn't cause any skin issues, but when I bought it the Sephora consultant assured me that there was no shimmer to it (I can't stand makeup that has a shimmer). When I took the makeup home, I was very unhappy. The makeup make my face look shiny and shimmer, instead of natural. I tried to return the product but was not permitted to. I would not order this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Very nice coverage, with a natural looking finish. Build-able as well, lighter for day, more for night etc..some primer underneath.  I have normal non oily non dry skin, and am in my 40's. Product works great for me, and I always get compliments on how great I look when I wear it. Tip - I always wake a mirror and walk myself outside to see what my makeup Actually looks like, before trusting the dimmer light in my bathroom.  Too much makeup is worse than none at all ladies, keep it real!

I liked this a lot in my early 20s Now I'm thirty and cannot get it to work for me. It doesn't last, and dried out my t-zone...like flakes! A totally not dry place. I guess I'm just not willing to make applying my makeup such an involved process.  But I should be able to do moisturizer, primer, foundation.
This does everything I want and more. For someone like me with a very furry face that is dry and sensitive with lots of texture and huge pores, this makes your skin look amazing.
Don't wear white. Don't wear white. Transfers like nobody's business. I want foundation on my face not my clothes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i never have been one to wear foundation daily because it 1. seems like too much work and I'm lazy and 2. i don't like LOOKING like I'm wearing foundation   but this stuff has changed my ways its incredible! easy to apply, light enough to wear to work every day without looking like I'm trying too hard. it makes my skin tone so much more even and bright, i feel like it makes me look awake and vibrant. its awesome.

This stuff is great and can help you achieve a flawless finish IF you properly prep your skin.  1. Exfoliate  2. Moisturizer 3. Prime 4. Apply this with your favorite brush using DOWNWARD brush strokes.   If it's too cakey, mist with your favorite setting spray. Voila!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After trying what seems like countless tinted moisturizers, foundations and powders, I keep coming back to this. I have oily, very sensitive skin and suffer from pretty severe hormonal acne. This is the only product that looks natural on, has no chemical sunscreens, and doesn't make my skin freak out. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: all its cracked up to be!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is a life saver for me. In college, I went through a terrible phase of acne (until I stopped drinking milk!!) and skipped class one day because my acne was so bad. I went to the makeup store and they suggested BareMinerals. It covered the acne beautifully, and left me with a glowing, even skin tone. I would never want to have to get by without this stuff! FYI- the matte one has a totally different finish and looks terrible on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In all honesty, I got a jar of this about 2 years ago that came in a Bare Minerals skin kit thingy and completely forgot about it. So when I ran out of my current powder foundation, I went rooting around in my collection and thought I would try this out. I can't believe I hadn't tried this before! I love that it's mineral makeup, so it's easier on my blemish-prone skin. The coverage is INSANE. I've never seen a powder foundation with this much pigment/coverage. Just the smallest amount completely covers up any redness. I've actually used it as a spot concealer on occasion, that's how full coverage it is.  The only thing is, it doesn't take much to become cakey, at least on my skin. But my skin doesn't hold up well under a lot of makeup, so that might just be me. I also love that it has a bit of a dewy finish, which is extremely rare for powder. The consistency is slightly damp feeling.  Very impressed. Would recommend.

It was the right color but hated the consistency. It went on too thick and too full coverage, I had to wipe it off my face before going out. I had been using powder foundation before this, 3 different types, and this was my least favorite of those.
This is the ONLY makeup that I forget I am wearing.  It stays on for most of the day and covers up all my imperfections. I was colored matched at the store and love it!

I was using medium beige an living how it was making my skin look flawless and glowing. I ran out and ordered another medium beige. The new one is much different somehow and makes me look chalky and washed out. And I'm a pretty fair skinned woman with blue eyes. Now I had to order a darker color just to try to mix in to come up with the right shade. And it's not going to arrive in time for my vacation so I'll have to use other makeup. I wish the second pot matched the first. Disappointing.

I've tried so many foundations, and this still remains my tried and true. The ability to control the level of coverage is amazing, it can range from sheer to full depending on how much product you use, as well as your brush. It can be a bit messy, as all loose powders can, but it's totally worth it for the flawless finish this gives. The original provides just enough natural glow without looking shiny. I seriously think this is improving my breakout prone skin. This will forever and always be my favorite foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the natural finish of Bare Minerals, especially in the summer as it stays put better on hot days.   It lasts well especially if I use a primer and gives an even coverage that doesn't look cakey or too made up.  It is a product I keep coming back to and I am a fickle cosmetic customer!!!

I really like using bare minerals - my foundation changes through the seasons, but there's always a color that matches or I can easily blend two shades to match my skin tone. Before switching to bare minerals (I don't use them for all makeup products, but stick to them for foundation / concealer, and sometimes bronzer), I had fairly bad acne. After switching over, I did notice a big improvement in my skin and it cleared up quite a bit (though not completely).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Have used this product for awhile.  I generally mix 2-3 shades depending on season and how much time I've (safely) spent in the sun.  Adaptable, lasting and great coverage -- you decide how much.  I sweat in this product almost daily as I teach group exercise classes, no breakouts here!

reviews.review_title: great for skin that has just had a procedure
reviews.review_text: I recently have been going to get chemical peels and have not been able to wear makeup because of how sensitive my skin has become. I have also been very self conscious of all the redness that has taken over the entire area of my face. This is the only product I have tried so far that has been able to not cause me any irritation or burning on my skin. It also has the added bonus of it being a mineral makeup with SPF which is also what i need to keep my face from burning from the sun. Layering it with mineral sunscreen has helped me continue to look professional at work instead of a red tomato. Just make sure you buy the brush that they recommend for it because if not you end up using way too much powder and have to go buy more sooner than necessary. I learned that the hard way.
Love it love it amazing coverage been using for 9yrs

My sensitive skin requires a mineral makeup. This is the most natural looking and easy to apply.  I do use an dense, natural hair, large round Stila brush to get the best coverage.  I have replenished the powder every few months now for 7 years! My color number changes depending on the season, but I always find a match.  Love it with the concealer and BM concealer brush~
I like it, nice coverage but NEEDS a primer

I had a patient in my office with the most beautiful, flawless, porcelain, glowing skin I have EVER seen in my life. I felt bad but I HAD to ask what makeup she used after I was done working her up for her exam (it was girl talk so it wasn't too weird) but she Bare Minerals Original Foundation. I went out, bought some. Used it for three weeks, already bought another one. This is now my default powder and I LOVE it. Will  be buying more.

I used to use this a long time ago but I had been using a mars pressed powder. I thought a loose powder would be better to set my foundation better. Now I remember why I stopped using it. So hard to keep it from looking cakey. Hard to blend even when you swirl it on
I've been using this since 1997. Tried other foundations and always come back to BAREMINERALS!!

One of my good friends used this product and her skin looked flawless! So I paid over $40 to get one of my own and when I tried IT I thought it was a joke there was NO coverage at all and if I wanted to get any I had to pack it on 100% not worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always a liquid foundation gal, but I do have the holiday super size version of this foundation. I decided to use for a change it and it held up for good while. I would say maybe up to 6 hours before it started to accentuate my lines. It's a nice foundation for those who want a natural quick finish. My only issue is that I feel their shades aren't light enough for me. Their holiday size only offered Light but it makes me look tan. Be careful choosing your shades.

I've been using bareminerals for 11yrs since I was 18! I used it for years then for some reason I stopped thinking I could find better....bad idea!  Theres nothing better, finally I went back to my bareminerals and i'm so glad I did. I have ance prone skin also combination skin and this stuff makes my skin look beautiful!

reviews.review_title: Breaks down in the most horrible way.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product.  Really.  A number of my friends and colleagues use it and I've never heard negative things about this foundation.  So, I purchased it.  I used it every day for two months in various ways.  I loved how it looked right when I applied it, and it truly didn't feel like I was wearing much of anything.  It was easy to blend my other face products (blush, bronzer, highlighter) into.  Yet, I hate this foundation.  I have combination skin and no matter what I did this foundation broke down within ninety minutes of applying it every single day, despite using various primers, being in various weather/temperature conditions, and setting it with a number of different setting powders and/or setting sprays.  I built it up in layers on my face with different kinds of brushes, varying from three layers for fuller coverage and one layer for light coverage.  It was worst on my forehead, nose, and chin, which are admittedly the most oily parts of my face.  But, it also broke down on my cheeks and they're pretty dry.  For what it's worth, I manage a jewelry store so it's not like I applied it before running a marathon or something.  I just couldn't win with this foundation so I finally threw it away in disgust.  I must be an anomaly since most people seem to really love and rave about this foundation, but thought it may be helpful to post my experience in case anyone out there thinks they're doing something wrong because it's acting the same way on their skin.  PSA:  you're probably not--find a new foundation.
I have very very oily skin & although it's such a nice finish, it's too TOO luminous for my skin type sadly. maybe the matte version will suit me best :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Current Favourite Powder Foundation. Goes on easily and gives my face a super natural look with a glow and the coverage is definitely buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite powder foundation .. I blend two shades when I am in between seasons. I have normal to oily skin and I love this because this never creases and blends throughout the day (even on hot ones)! In the winter, I apply with a damp to wet sponge for a more pigmented coverage. In the summer, I mix with my powder shimmers for a light coverage look.

My skin is so dry and I never imagine that I can use a powder foundation! I'm so lazy before to do my skin care but after I bought this one I keeping thinking that I'm using a powder, so I need to do my skin care carefully.  And my skin is kinda sensitive, each time I removed my makeup, I can see the terrible redness  on my face. But it becomes better when I'm using the mineral powder foundation. I don't know why, but I think this product suits my skin and I'll definitely buy it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive and somewhat oily skin, so I often avoid foundations all together.  I wanted something light that could still cover any redness, and this does the trick.  When wearing heavy make-up, my t-zone can get fairly oily by mid-day, but not with bare minerals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this foundation powder ! its pigmented, yet it leaves your skin looking natural and the texture makes it not look cakey when applied. I did have to change the color i use pretty often (every season i would say) because it delivers a truly pigmented foundation... but can I really complain.   This is truly one of the best loose powder foundation I have tried !

reviews.review_title: Great!! please givt it a try
reviews.review_text: I¬¥ve tried both original and matte. I have oily skin so i switched to matter version. I looooved this product. Either original or matte you should try it. Makes my skin feel so heatlhy, glowy. It is easy to apply, just SWIRL,TAP and BUFF. I do need setting powder since I live in a very hot and humid weather.  I would say bareMinerals changed my life :)
Nothing to say... Too cakey, made me look pale. Only thing I liked about it was that it was matte
I really like this foundation ! I never really wear mineral makeup but this covers good & does take time getting used to if its your first with mineral! Last long too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know why I ever stopped using this - great for a flawless, natural finish, especially for those who don't want something too heavy. I have super dry skin, but this still works well for me. I'll use a concealer on areas where I need higher coverage and use this mineral foundation on the rest of my face. Pretty buildable as well.

reviews.review_title: leaves you looking like a glazed donut
reviews.review_text: this foundation has been my #1 for about two years now & i haven't ran out yet! i use it in the summer because its my shade & i tend to get oilier so a powder foundation helps soak up the oil a bit. a lot of people compliment me when i wear this saying your skin looks so good! and i gotta admit it, this foundation leaves a beautiful satin & glowy finish which almost looks like your skin but better! the coverage is light-medium depending on what brush you use. and its great for sensitive skin! however, this foundation does transfer a lot onto clothing so watch out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love makeup so Sephora is like this amazing happy-place universe! This may be the best product in the entire inventory! How can my complexion look flawless and feel like silk AND suede...? I tried Bare Escentuals in 2006. A kit w/ shadows brushes lips foundation. I have all BE foundations but this is the one! Even on it's own but if you can, get the MV an Bisque also.  I never liked liquid foundation so this product - truly the ultimate! And not only natural, but made with minerals from the earth? Sounded too good to be true and actually is, uh, true! Don't you love when that happens? Had to get a different color (got Med Beige, needed Medium). Now with Complexion Rescue underneath, MV and Bisque! All can't-live-without products!

I love this powder. I was actually only ever a fan of liquid make-up but it's been so hot this summer my make-up kept sliding off and that is never a good look. I tried this in on a whim because I also have super sensitive skin. I was going through foundation after foundation that kept breaking me out or was making my super dry skin look disgusting in person and in pictures. This works wonders. It lasts all day for me, doesn't come on cakey and it doesn't transfer as much as liquid foundation does. I also like that it gives sort of a soft glow. I look clean and polished when I use this. Sometimes I don't put on any other make-up but I still look refreshed when I have the foundation on.
I love this powder! I usually use cream foundation. But this powder keeps my eye makeup from smearing all down my face. Love it!
Good coverage, great for hot weather, and they don't test on animals !  :)

This has been my choice for powder for the last 6 years! Other powders just sit on your face and look cakey, this one really sets well on your skin and covers any imperfections. I sometimes use liquid underneath if it's for nighttime or a special occasion, but it can be applied by itself too (over a primer of course) everyone should use primer and a good moisturizer! I have red tones in my skin and the golden medium has yellow tones that really cancel out my red tones and still looks very natural. Love this product!

I really like this foundation because it is so easy to use. It gives me a healthy glow and I can quickly wipe off the old stuff mid-day and buff on again for a fresh face. I also like the matte foundation, however this seems to last longer. It doesn't irritate my sensitive, breakout-prone skin, and my dermatologist recommends it.

I am someone who struggles with acne prone skin, my doctor suggested I try a powdered foundation instead of liquid, so I bought this one. This foundation looks so natural while covering any redness or acne scarring! It can show dry patches but I just put moisturizer on my face before hand, a pore minimizing primer and my face looks great and it doesn't cling to dry patches as much. Also, a Sephora employee told me that if I want a bit more coverage, to just add concealer over any redness or darkness, then apply the foundation over top and my skin looks flawless!! I'd definitely recommend!

This is my go-to foundation for the last 8 years. It covers perfectly and doesn't look like makeup at all!!!! I have oily skin and previously had moderate acne, but my face has been clear since using this. I frequently don't wash my face at night and never worry about leaving this on overnight. The only issues I have are if my skin gets dry in winter, but that is easily fixable with a little moisturizer before applying bare minerals.

reviews.review_title: Best foundation I've tried so far
reviews.review_text: I went on a long hunt for the perfect foundation and ended up with the bare minerals original. I tried everything from hourglass, tarte, laura mercier, too faced, makeup forever, and different types of the bare minerals foundations line but found that I liked this one best. It doesn't break me out, provides great coverage and looks relatively natural. The only drawbacks are that it can get a little cakey, and I use it up pretty quickly.
I love this foundation. I have normal skin and feel that it works just fine for me, I recommend to use this with the Bareminerals Prime Time & a good buffing brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and this foundation is way too shimmery. It does have a beautiful finish but doesn't fit to my skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product broke me out very badly, clogged all my pores, and made my normal-combo-ish skin very oily.

This product is great for on the go! There are some downsides to this product though. It's messy (which you would expect with any loose power). And it's patchy. I've used this plenty of times, and I realized it gets very patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation, I have it in two shades, Medium Beige (Winter) and Medium Tan (Summer). It feels as if you aren't wearing foundation at all while providing solid coverage. It comes off easy and lasts all day.

I have combination skin with an oily T zone and this foundation is a god send. It gives me a flawless, radiant complexion and it's very easy to layer without it looking cakey. Even though it's a powder it doesn't dry me out at all and actually soaks up excess oil, not to mention that with the right primer it stays put all day.

I have been using this product for almost 7 years! I have tried other brands high brands in between however, this is the best foundation for me. My skin is dry yet this foundation make my skin look like its hydrated . I love how this product looks like it sinks into your skin as hour pass so it looked like a natural look! I love that about this product!

I have tried so many different foundations from high end to low end and I always come running back to bare minerals. It doesn't clog my pores or cause breakouts. And it works just find for dry skin which is rare for a powder. Has a very pretty natural finish like your skin but better. Coverage ranges from light to full coverage. It will even covers up any acne scars I have. And it's a very generous amount! Will last a while! Love this product! Favorite everyday foundation hands down
I love this stuff for on the go when I don't want to do full on makeup. Great coverage and extra good coverage with liquid foundation.
This is an easy and fun product to use, with good, smooth coverage.  The only issue I have is it does get a bit cake-y.  I am going to try the primer and see if that helps that issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing. It makes my skin look flawless and doesn't make every hair on my face stand out. This has worked wonders for evening out my skintone and hiding most blemishes. It doesn't transfer and I've worn it from sunrise to sunrise the next day and it stayed on (my face was oily of course, but it did stay on). You dont need much to cover your whole face, so it lasts quite a long time. Mine lasted 8 months before I had to repurchase, and I use it every day.The only downside is if you drop it often, the bottom may pop off. Mine did and the powder went everywhere. Just put it in a safe spot that it wont fall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my primary use for powder is to wear over sunscreen on most workdays when i don't wear any other makeup. i was looking for something that would get rid of the shiny finish sunscreen leaves on my skin, and this is perfect. i'm also obsessed with sun protection, so i love that it's SPF 15. this is my new go-to for (mostly) no-makeup days.

I started using this product just before my engagement photos almost 15 years ago and I will never use anything else.  I've tried other mineral foundation that were less expensive and more expensive and this is my fav!!  Perfect color for my skin and blends perfectly, I do not have perfect skin but people frequently comment that I do. Love this makeup!

I was so excited when I when n got matched for my color with the machine they have..it was my first time trying bare minerals, I even bought the brush they suggested that goes with it..But total fail. Never have I had a foundation that makes my pores look so huge.:(..you must try it before you buy it

Been using this product for years and love how it looks, but hate how messy it is. Because you pour it in the lid, it ends up everywhere. On my counter, all over the container, and eventually all over all my other makeup. Wish there was a better way to do this, it's so frustrating.

Did I mention I love this foundation? Great coverage, very light feeling, doesn't rub off on clothes (or your cell phone), breathable and looks natural. Doesn't cause breakouts and if I forget to wash my face before bed I don't feel guilty about it in the morning. Great product!

I tried his product when I was 16 and have been using it ever since. I am absolutely in love with this. They have a great selection of shades and it feels so soft on your skin. Also what I love about it is its infused with minerals to give a really natural finish. Some people complain it's messy to apply but I've never had a problem. Make sure to swirl the product around to warm it up. Also it has spf which is really important. I will pie ably never use another foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the glow that this foundation gives. I has great coverage and doesn't make my sensitive skin break out.

My go to foundation . I prefer the original over the matte version . Never broke out once utilizing this product . It covers my redness but not my freckles and enhances my natural beauty ! The best !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage from this foundation always amazes me, as typically I have needed to use a liquid foundation to feel that I have the coverage needed for my acne scars, oiliness, dark spots, etc. This product is buildable while still providing a natural looking finish. My only reason for giving 4 stars rather than 5 is that I have found that it doesn't cover as nicely as other foundations I have used on any current blemishes. Otherwise, I am so impressed with this foundation and it's well worth its cost.

reviews.review_title: FREAKIN' AMAZING and I have oily skin
reviews.review_text: I freakin love this product omg  I have a combination to oily skin and my oh my I swear with regular foundations (I've tried everything) and especially during the summer my skin gets super shiny and Cakey. Which is quite gross with this my face looks natural and covers up amazingly! First time I ever tried it I'm getting more now! LOVE LOVE LOVE  100% I recommend
Beautifully pigmented powder!  Looks fresh and light

I tired to stick with my liquid foundation at the beginning of summer, but knew I just couldn't. This provides relatively full coverage while also being light--perfect for summer! I love that with the concealer brush a little truely goes a long way, then I apply additional and buff with the foundation brush.
light but full coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I went into sephora a while bcak and one of the ladies working there recommended this for me for my oily, acne prone skin. I purchased and I have to say I'm a little disappointed. When I first put it on, it's really not all that bad, has decent coverage but usually use concealer with it, and within just an hour or so, my skin looks worse than usual and the oil just glistens on my forehead and cheeks. its so bad and if I try to cover up with more it just looks cakey and spotty/patchy!
This powder has Wonderful coverage. I will be sticking with this powder.

Ok so the first couple times I used this, I didn't like it and was so disappointed. BUT, it turns out, I was using the wrong moisturizer. Once I changed that, this goes on beautifully! The coverage is surprisingly good and really buildable. It doesn't accentuate my pores and the fair color is great if you're a pale redhead like me. It also doesn't make me breakout and I have pretty sensitive skin. All in all, very happy with this foundation.

I love this! The reviews and stars are ACCURATE. It has a great coverage and very lightweight at the same time, feels like I'm wearing no make up at all plus the fact that I've never had any breakouts with this foundation. I love how luminous my face looks when using this. This will forever be part of my must-haves.

starting my freshman year of high school I had horrible acne and I probably used the wrong makeup products at the time they were just cheap liquid foundations from the drug store. I looked into using this bare minerals foundation because my derm told me about it and OH MY GOD it saved my life. it covered so well, you couldn't even tell that I had red marks all over my face and on top of that its all natural stuff and actually helped prevent me from breaking out more!! it created a really nice finish on my face and hardly looked like I was wearing any face makeup. I recommend this to anyone!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: ok this stuff has sooo many 5 star reviews that it really doesnt need one more...but like, this is my holy grail of foundation. If you're looking for a total full face coverage type thing don't go this route, but I have never found a face product I liked more. It makes my skin absolutely glow, and evens out different tones in my skin and corrects between dry and oily so my face just looks perfect. I use a Morphe mineral powder brush with this (it's cheaper than the bareminerals brush and I haven't been too impressed with the quality of their brushes) and it works great. Plus, one container of it lasts like a year. can't recommend it highly enough.

I was first introduced to makeup with this line when I was 18 (now I'm in my late 20's). I'm not a big fan of heavy makeup (still not), and this gives amazing coverage especially for being so lightweight. This is my daily  go to foundation. I alternate from this one to the Hourglass liquid foundation (also incredibly lightweight with amazing coverage) depending on the occasion. I don't like spending much on makeup, and this definitely gives you more for your money.
Have used this for many many years now. It's so smooth and light. Good sunscreen too

I've tried to give this foundation a chance but honestly it did not work for me at all. It gave me horrible red undertones and it NEVER STAYED ON. On top of that whenever I wore it my skin got SUPER oily. Yeah this product definitely is not for me.
I've spent over 10k on makeup in my lifetime, and this powder is #1 on my list of stuff purchased

First I want to start off by saying that this powder foundation is perfection. I am far from having perfect skin- I have old and new scars, red marks, little acne here and there and this covered all of that with just primer and this powder. I used no color corrector, concealer, or liquid foundation as a base. A little goes a long way and for the price you cannot beat this product. The coverage is definitely buildable and doesn't cake at all. If you're going on a night out, do your whole face and then I very gently and lightly use this as a setting powder, it'll cover up all the imperfections your makeup underneath didn't cover.  Overall, this powder is amazing and does everything and more. It is definitely worth the purchase.

This foundation is absolutely perfect! It is lightweight with buildable coverage. It stays on the whole day. Also, a little product goes a long way. I usually pair this with a little bit of concealer underneath and then I top it off with this foundation powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great natural foundation for almost anyone who want's a light and blowy foundation. The lighter the layer , the lighter the coverage. So don't get frustrated if you try it and there looks like there is no coverage. You have to slowly build up the coverage, and make sure you let the layers set. It takes time but this is definitely a build-able foundation. You have to try this foundation a few times to see how it works for you best. The brush that you use also really impacts the coverage. My personal recommendation on applying this brush is a small dense face brush, as opposed to a powder brush which will not get you much coverage.

reviews.review_title: I'm just too oily for this one
reviews.review_text: I wish I loved this foundation, since I'm a huge foundation minimalist, but I can't get it to work for my skin. It really does blur and even out my skin tone and stayed on all day, but in the end it just couldn't stand up to my oiliness. Within a few hours my pores popped out with powder stuck in them and the foundation separated along my oily t zone. It also liked to rub off if I touched my face. Primer may help, but I was looking to just buff in and go. Will try the mattifying one tho.
My favorite foundation! I was very skeptical of powder, but I love it. Light and natural looking, and stays on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I quite like this product, it has great colour tones, easy to find a match (with the help of a sephora employee of course). Goes on top of other products nicely, be sure to blend everywhere for a non-cakey coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation does not look very natural on the skin. I feel like my face skin looks more flaw than without it. Also, feel not staying on skin very well.
I actually use this to set my Bare Minerals Bronzing Serum or their liquid foundation. I use just a small amount to give a beautiful airy, Dewey look!

I have used bare minerals foundation for years. I have found as I get older (age 58), I need to pair the powder with Iiquid makeup first. Love the original product, butI didn't like the matte foundation though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Foundation. Its so Simple and easy to use. You can wear one little light layer just to give you some Color to your skin in your on the hurry/on the go. Its build able coverage which i like. It gives you a sheer finish to my skin it brings out my Glow in my skin and looks silky smooth.I love that its Mineral based makeup so it doesnt clog your pores and doesnt have all those harsh Chemicals like most makeup has.Thats what i love mostly about BareMinerals Makeup Line,There so healthy and natural for you skin.Its suits anybody. I have Oily skin anf i feel like It doesnt run my makeup off from the Hot weather. It stays in place.. I like to take a Spray Finishing spray and spray it on my foundation brush then dip the brush into the BAREMinerals Foundation and do Circle Motions onto my skin. Its Flawless. it take 2min to apply and i can walk right out the Door.
This is my third purchase of bareMinerals foundation and I have to say I am hooked! Easy to apply, blend and it looks natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using BareMinerals for over 10 years and it has done wanders to my face. It is the best makeup I have ever tried and have no intentions of making any changes.
My experience comes as over 4 years using bare and its been the greatest I dont dress without my minerals...Love it mean it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally got the correct tone. I love the feel of this powder.

I tend to wear very little to no make up at all for everyday use. So when I do occasionally wear makeup, I want a more natural look. If you follow the directions and apply lightly, this is the BEST foundation for a minimalist. Beware, if you use too much, it can definitely make you look cakey and/or oily. But if applied properly, it is almost like a magic eraser. It won't completely cover blemishes, but it will fade them to unnoticeable while still looking like regular old skin. I love how it makes my face look evenly toned but it doesn't look like I'm wearing makeup. It also feels very light and it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin or cause it to break out. This foundation is perfect for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my perfect foundation. I repurchase and repurchase. There IS  learning period involved...it isn't just something you can paint on with a brush and have it look fabulous immediately...putting on too much can look like the worst cakey-drugstore makeup...and the wrong primer or brush can cause it to slip right off the skin after a few hours. Once you learn the perfect application for you, it is fantastic. I love how I cannot feel it, and I love the wonderful, natural-looking glow that matches the skin on my neck and shoulders. If you want a heavy foundation that will fill in pores and looks like you are wearing a nice flawless foundation, this isn't for you. Once applied correctly, it looks exactly like even-toned skin.

For me this isn't a stand alone foundation, but it is excellent.  My preferred method is to use this over a great BB Cream or tinted moisturizer with a high SPF after I set my concealer with a translucent powder.  I find this to be fairly light in coverage which is exactly what I want for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first high end foundation I ever purchased. I used it religiously for several years before moving on to other brands. I enjoy trying out different foundations, but this is the one I keep coming back to. It has such a beautiful, natural-looking finish and is so easy to apply. It doesn't look powdery on the skin, it's actually really creamy. I'll probably wear this til the day I die.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looked great right after first applying it, but unfortunately it didn't stand up to my oily tendencies. The color was great though! Would work well for someone who didn't have any oiliness.

I had been really curious about bareminerals because so many people seem to rave about it. I know why now. I switched from kat von d lock it foundation, which is absolute gull coverage but makes you look like youre wearing a lot of makeup. Bareminerals has more of a blur than cover effect, it blurs your imperfections out while making your skin still look like skin. Im loving it. I had a lot of redness in my cheeks and around my nose, as well as acne on my chin and this blurs it all and give my skin a beautiful glow. I will say, it's not like a super full coverage, I'm sure you could build it up, but it don't completely erase impercections. But I've never loved how my skin looks more than when I'm using this.
This covers up my rosacea without looking cakey. It looks natural too!

I bought this foundation because when I first tried it in store the foundation was a good match for my fair skin tone. It looks really nice when first applied, but it only looks good for a few hours on me before it starts separating. If you have oily skin or oily spots I wouldn't suggest because It left my skin looking splotchy.

very good product. doesnt bother my skin, is more natural than the cheaper stuff. no fragrance either. only product I will use for make up. the bronzer and mascara are excellant as well. looks very natural, most of my friends think I have either gotren a little bit of sun, or that my complexion is great.

Back in the day, this stuff changed my life. When I started wearing this years ago, it was the one & only time in my life I was told my skin was glowing. It did a great job of evening out tone, blurring flaws & concealing my dark spots. I still have a few containers of this in my train case because I can't let go. However, I recently found a shade from a different brand that actually matches my skin tone better & blends in to match my tone perfectly. The shades in this line just don't quite match correctly. It also would sometimes sting when I applied it, not sure why. I never figured out if it was only after certain skin care treatments or only after sun exposure? And I don't tend to have sensitive skin. It didn't ever turn my face red, just uncomfortable stinging which would eventually dissipate but could flare up again if I got hot & sweaty which is common in Texas summers. But I just loved buffing it in with that brush that came with it, watching it melt in & blur imperfections. I was totally sucked in to those infomercials back in the day lol.

I got a Get Started Kit of this foundation a year ago, and was a little skeptical at first. My skin is very dry/combo skin and powders usually don't work out for me. But after seeing all the results for other people and reading rave reviews I decided to go for it. And I'm so glad I did. I got the shade fairly light and its a perfect match to my skin tone. And you can build to the level of coverage you want. It feels like you have absolutely no makeup on at all. And if you use a very thin layer of primer ( I use bare minerals prime time ) it doesn't cling to any of your dry spots. The best part for me is if I forget and fall asleep without washing my face, it doesn't break me out or clog my pores. Skin care meets makeup for a match made in heaven.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently bought this product and I am in love with it! It covers very well and looks very natural. I have pretty heavy freckles and it even covered those a lot! I will definitely continue to use this!

I had been in need of a new powder for awhile and I've always had a problem with my makeup getting blotchy as the day went on. I was looking for one that can set my makeup, keep my skin matte but not dry-looking, and with a natural finish. this does just that! I was so excited to try this because of the great reviews and it definitely lives up to the hype. well worth the money, as a little but goes a long ways. GET THIS POWDER ALREADY ITS AMAZING.
This product does not do well on oily skin. A couple house after application skin is shines looking and pores are magnified.

I've been using Bareminerals for over 8 years now. I had scares from acne, and uneven skin tones. I can say that this product really works! And is improving my skin. The product is light, and you can adjust the coverage based on the daily condition of your skin. I tell everyone it is worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally made the switch to powder foundation as my oils have been just destroying liquids in the summer. I do enjoy this foundation; it's buildable and I can take it with me without worrying about it spilling or how I'm going to blend it in with the rest of the foundation after it rubs off.  My only complaint is that it doesn't stand up to sweat very well, and after a couple hours it disappears from my nose and is falling apart around my mouth. It also clings to dry patches a bit and that becomes even more noticeable as it wears off throughout the day.  On days where I don't sweat this foundation is a dream and works so much better than my liquid foundations but on a really hot day I have to make sure to blot and touch up as frequently as I do with liquids on a normal day.

Bare minerals original foundation is hands down the best foundation out there!! I have tried many different foundations, but this has been my go to  for over 9years now. This foundation gives you a flawless finish, along with a very soft glowly look. The coverage is buildable, but a small amount goes a long way. I wear this foundation year round. It looks great in the summer, and in the winter when my skin is a bit dry. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There are so many choices out now for different kinds of foundations, but this bareminerals one is always a classic. It has a natural finish - not matte, not dewy, just natural. I use it with the RT buffing brush and it works great. I really like that you can control your coverage depending on how much you use.  I also sometimes use it over the Bareminerals Prime Time which has SPF 25 when I want a bit more SPF, and it applies so nicely over it.   If you have dry skin , like me, don't worry - just use a good moisturizer. And if I want a bit more of a radiant finish and extra moisture, I just use a facial mist (I use the argan one from the faceshop).

I really liked this...colour match was perfect and it settled into my skin nice, a nice glow to the skin. I was looking for something quick to put on in the morning and really....if you use a BB cream that is probably faster. I don't find that this cuts down on time but its very natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is what I was looking for. I have sensitive skin, and I was avoiding power foundation but this works good for me. It is easy to wear. It looks natural but covers enough.

reviews.review_title: I've been using this foundation for 8 years!
reviews.review_text: I love that if I forget to wash my face before bed I don't have to worry about breaking out! I finally found the perfect method for best results and full coverage: use a good moisturizer, then use a primer (I found that for me the smashbox primer water works best over the cream), then I do the left side of my face first then, do my right side, and go back and forth until I've done it 3 times on each side, and I like to finish off with a little of the mineral veil! It looks so flawless. I learned this technique by watching a tutorial video on YouTube by Shelbey Ashburn (loveshelbey). Before this I always had trouble with the foundation not staying on all day but now that I follow that routine it says on all day and night! I love this foundation! It will always be my #1!

This is the best foundation I've ever used, I've been looking for the perfect one for my skin for years and this has to be the one! I was hesitant to try it because powders usually dry my skin out (I have dry combination skin) but this isn't any ordinary powder it's like a creamy powder and goes on so well. It lasts throughout the day and matches my neck perfectly, loooove it!

reviews.review_title: Fairly Medium/pink undertones is perfect for acne
reviews.review_text: My face is blotchy and I break out, I got the fairly medium with pink undertones and it hides the blotches really well! It's perfect!! <3

I have used Bare Minerals for 6 years now and I don't think I could ever wear anything different. I suffer from hormonal acne and Bare Minerals hides it almost all completely! If I didn't have this, I probably wouldn't even be able to leave the house from being so embarrassed about my skin. Bare Minerals hides everything while looking natural and it also gives me a nice glow. Definitely recommend!
I've used many foundations over the years and this is always the one I come back to. It's perfect!!

I use to use bare foundation constantly, but got bored went through a slew of other foundations. I should have stayed with what I know works. Such great coverage without looking like I am wearing tons of make up. Also side note great for the gym, it's still looks great through a sweat.
I really like the coverage and feel of this. And I've found that it lasts longer than my liquid foundation.
Love this foundation. Its perfect and so natural.
This powder is light and silky. It has full coverage and feels as if I am not wearing any makeup. The color matches perfectly and it stays on all day! A definite must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this with a box set which includes instructions. Produced a cakey, powdery appearance despite following instructions. Disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to have very sensitive skin, prone to breakouts on the regular. This was the only product that didn't irritate it! My skin has become somewhat less temperamental over the years, but this is still my favorite foundation. Not too chalky in spite of being a powder, and when my skin is dry in the winter, the pigment still distributes evenly, unlike so many liquid foundations. The coverage isn't a buildable as a liquid, either, but I'm a less is more kind of girl. I like being able to see my freckles. This product helps me look like the best version of my freckly self, eliminating redness and evening things out. :)

I did not like this at all!! It stuck in every pore I didn't even know I had to make them extra noticeable. It set on top of my skin and looked awful, very cakey look to it. I very lightly dusted it on too and that still did not help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my go to foundation when I was pregnant and I loved it. I haven't used it since then because it takes awhile for me to get the coverage that I want. Will probably be using it soon if I'm not too lazy!

reviews.review_title: Not same formula it used to be !
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product as I've used it all through out high school and it was my go to powder I haven't purchased bare minerals since 2013 and when I purchased the original foundation 04/15/16 I was very disappointed it was very glittery on the face and made it appear as though I was wearing a highlighter as foundation. Will not be purchasing this product again the formula has definitely changed over the years !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just love it. If you want to look natural but presentable, I strongly suggest you to buy this. This is such a light foundation and even protect you from the sun. The powder is so soft and a little shimmery but your face wont look shinny. I love how healthy my face look using this. Love it!

I cannot say enough about this foundation.  I had always been insecure about my skin. Although it wasn't terrible, it was uneven from acne medication and scarring, and I would always break out in the most conspicuous areas on my face. With that said, I have always sought out a foundation that would accommodate my needs. I wanted good coverage, a formula that wouldn't accentuate the dry skin of my scars, something that actually covered acne, and something that would not oxidize or look disgusting at the end of the day.  Little did I know, heavy duty full coverage was not what I needed. Est√©e launders double wear, makeup forever mat velvet , nars, urban decay, revlon color stay, Loreal true match - every holy grail or top 10, I would try. But bare minerals is all I could ask for.  1. It matches my skin tone - one of only 6 foundations at Sephora that actually do. 5Y06, so I am quite light but with a strong yellow undertone. Any pink would make me look grey or orange.  2. It's so easy. The biggest possible mistake with this is application, but once you get it down you're golden. I now spot conceal redness and just quickly buff this in all over to even things out.  3. It's good for you. Liquid foundations just don't let your skin breathe the same way minerals do. In fact, I think switching to bare minerals really helped clear my skin up.  4. It looks amazing. My biggest issue aside from uneven skin is pores and this foundation practically eliminates them. Not to mention the fact that the finish is so healthy looking. You practically glow.  It will not accentuate any peeled skin or fine lines. If you need some extra staying power, i always use the Nivea aftershave and it works wonders. I also spray some fix plus if I feel like it looks a little powdery.  Truly recommend, especially as a first time foundation.

I stopped using concealer because of how amazing the coverage is. I am obsessed with this foundation. I was using KVD lock it pressed powder but it settled in any fine line. I am beyond happy with this purchase. Try it out, you won't be disappointed.
So nice looks natural not cakey

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The original foundation has only gotten better. I took awhile away and just came back to this classic. I have very sensitive skin that apparently wants to keep getting more sensitive and this has never bothered my skin.

I love how light it feels on my face. I actually returned my Kat Von D foundation for this and I'm extremely happy. Kat Von d made me feel like j was wearing a rubber mask and bare minerals is so light I forget I'm wearing making up. It's long lasting and makes my skin look flawless.

I always use bareminerals and constant get compliments on how flawless my skin looks. This is surprising since my skin is not great without make up! I use a primer before and set it with the mineral veil. Can be messy at first, but you get used to it and find easier ways to apply.
Excellent product! I use it everyday. It's light weight and looks natural. If your going for the more natural look then this product is for you.
I've been a Bare Mineral girl for years......  Love love it!
I love bare minerals.  I have used the original form for years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have worn this foundation since I started wearing makeup in middle school. I'm now 25 and with my super dry skin I decided to get into liquids since powders generally just emphasis dryness. I have not enjoyed this journey into liquids/creams... ugh. I had such great skin (minus the dryness) with this! looked natural, never caused blemishes/acne. Now only a month into trying other products I'm getting new pimples every day. I am now focusing on skincare to fix my super dry skin so I can just go back to this, but even with my dry skin, I still liked how it looked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down this is the best foundation out there. It provides flawless coverage that's honestly hard to mess up, can be buildable for blemishes/dark marks, and I honestly enjoy buffing it on every day as opposed to messing with liquid foundation. I've been using this for over 5 years and will never go back to traditional foundation. I highly recommend!
Love the color and coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the products that I have re-purchased for at least several times now. I use it as a setting powder over concealer alone or over foundation/BB cream for extra coverage. It has a very natural non-caky finish. When I do start to get oily, I get some natural shine but never super greasy. Over all highly recommended product.

This powder is my favorite factories favorite powder in the world. It can have sheer to full coverage, depending on which brush and how many times you buff it onto your skin. On nights where I am going out, I layer it on top of my favorite liquid foundation and it makes for a seamless, flawless coverage. This is one of me makeup essentials.
Its works good, not amazing. Clings a little to my dry spots, also noticed not the best for flash in pictures.

reviews.review_title: a little messy, but overall great
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So this product is wonderful. It has spf and is buildable, so I can use less on my chin and cheeks and more under my eyes and I still look wonderful. I wish they made a pressed powder (maybe they do) but overall, I am happy with it. I have dry skin, so I use it under Josie Maran face oil.

I like the coverage and the natural finish on this powder. You do have to apply it carefully, get it right the first time. Once in place on the skin, it can be difficult to blend out. The best way I have found is to apply it in thin layers, buffing it into the skin. But I suspect this related to how long it lasts on the skin.

I have probably bought myself 5 of these within the last 4 years and I will continue buying it. During the winter it would look too drying around the areas it tends to dry up and flake. Other than that it is such a great and natural look on your face, this one (original) and the matte version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this about five years ago and I won't even try other foundations. My skin can be oily, especially during the warmer months and this stays on regardless of how much I sweat. I am also extremely pale and have a hard time matching my skin tone. I usually have to go with the lightest shade they have but in this case the fair is actually my perfect shade. I also like that I can put on a light application if I don't feel like wearing make up or layer it on for a night out. I will buy this again and again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried SO many foundations and continue to buy new ones every year because I like trying new things, but I ALWAYS have a continuous stock of this. I thought powder foundation would make my dry skin look cakey but the coverage and finish is the most consistent with this product and find that I look the best in pictures with BM foundation vs armani, MF, guerlain or the multitude of other liquid foundations I 've tried

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have freckles and did not want to cover them up. This foundation is very buildable and leaves great finish. Skin looks healthy freckles are not grey.

I absolutely love this foundation. Before I started using this product, liquid foundation was all I used. But the liquid gave my skin a cakey appearance and caused me to break out. After using this foundation for a few years, I have seen an improvement in the appearance of my skin. This foundation is so easy to apply and is buildable for more coverage! No matter how much I apply it remains lightweight on the skin. Covers redness, and applies seamlessly. Nothing could top this mineral foundation!

For people with dry skin... I found this foundation settles in to all the places it shouldn't, it looks caked on and dull, I hated it and I should've returned it.  I love make up and I try a lot of products and this one was a regret.
I use this as a setting powder for my foundation and for some extra coverage on my trouble areas it's a great product
It didn't work for me , my skin appears even more oily with it , don't give a prober coverage, and the color was way too off for me

In love with this foundation! I've worn it by itself and its flawless and sometimes I apply a little bit of it on top of my tinted moisturizer :) it's the best setting powder as well and keeps my tinted moisturizer from wearing off. In love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first foundation I bought when I started getting into makeup and I'll probably be buying it again and again in the future. It's lightweight and non-cakey but also has buildable coverage and creates an even finish! The price is amazing for its quality! Definitely wouldn't want to wear this with dry skin though. Based on experience, if my skin is dry, the foundation will make flaking spots more apparent and visible on your face. Otherwise, I would recommend this to all of my friends looking for a powder foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting to wean myself off wearing such a heavy, thick foundation now that my acne is getting better and I'm becoming more comfortable with my bare skin. So I decided to splurge and give bareMinerals a try. First off, let me say that this was my first time ordering online from Sephora. The shipping was AMAZING... I ordered this Wednesday afternoon, got free standard shipping, and it arrived Thursday morning! Was so, so impressed by that. But let me also just say that this foundation is more than worth the investment. When you apply it properly, it goes on so evenly with your skin. Paired with the mineral veil it gives you an excellent, natural looking glow. It lasts all day, in fact it appears to look better throughout the day as the minerals sit on your skin. I got the light shade and was a bit worried at first that it was too dark. But I do have more yellow-olive undertones in my skin so it blends in quite nicely for me. If you have light skin with more pinky undertones I'd definitely recommend going with the lighter shades. What a BEAUTIFUL product this is! 5 stars! Thank you bareMinerals!

I love this foundation!  I used to wear tinted moisturizer, because I don't like the thick and cakey feeling of foundations. The thing is, I don't even like wearing tinted moisturizer. Everything usually makes my face feel oily.  This foundation feels like I barely have anything on my face. I was amazed by the great coverage. Love everything about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I almost gave up on this gem.  I was originally matched to the wrong color at the bareminerals store (fairly light), but I loved the finish of the foundation so I decided to give it another go and match myself.  Ultimately, I ended up with golden medium which is perfect for my olive skin w/yellow undertones.  I purchased several brushes, primer, well rested concealer (?), and a blush.  After prepping my skin as I normally do, I applied the primer followed by the foundation (waited about 10 minutes for the primer to dry first).  It was horrible!  I was so disappointed.  I thought maybe I just didn't let the primer dry long enough so the next day I waited 20 mins for the primer to dry and I ended up with the same horrible result.  I placed the fault on the foundation and I almost returned it.  Then it occurred to me that I wouldn't normally use a silicone based primer with a powder foundation so the next day I used my regular powder primer from ED Naturals and voila - magic.  No more funky separation on or around my nose and when I touch my face no more funky streaks or dragging of the foundation.  No more settling into my fine lines.  Bottom line for me, the foundation is a winner, but the primer is not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great! Not only does a little go a long way, it blends wonderfully and doesn't feel heavy on the face at all. Definitely going to buy it again.

I have been using this for about 7 years now and I love it! I have combination skin and break out easily on the jawline/chin area.  I recently discovered using mac fix+ gives this foundation a more luminous finish as well as better coverage.  I love how versatile it is.

I rarely ever put powder foundation on my face because I have really dry skin. I really wanted to try a Bare Minerals product so I tried this foundation out and I was totally surprised with how well it looked on my skin! It is not drying at all, it leaves a nice matte finish on your face, and almost looks as if your makeup is airbrushed. Very soft powder that does not cake.

I don't think I've ever loved a powder foundation this much in my life. I use Liquid foundation and then power foundation over that. I have acne and very red undertones. This covers my acne and helps hide my red face. I've never found a loose powder from Sephora before and this is hands-down a Sephora must-have.

I've been using this foundation since 2013! Great coverage, I have very acne prone skin with a lot or scars an full a medium coverage foundation and this product, it makes my face look flawless! I do notice if I use too much it makes me break out, so I usually apply a thin layer.

reviews.review_title: The absolute best make up ever invented !!!!!
reviews.review_text: I've used it for ever! And loved it forever! I love that it's coverage is buildable you can use as little or as much as you want and it always I repeat always looks fantastic !!!!!

This is my first purchase of the bare minerals original foundation. I've always used the bareminerals matte one, and it always left my skin so oily and cakey. But I decided to give this a try, and I absolutely love it! It goes on well, gives you great coverage and it does not leave my skin as oily as the matte one. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Prior to buying this BareMinerals loose powder foundation, I probably hadn't worn foundation for over 10 years. I had help looking for it too because I thought I was super pale and turns out I'm not lol. It's great, not heavy feeling, can apply lightly or heavily depending on my needs, doesn't clog my pores and has a nice flawless finish. It also looks very natural. My new favorite powder!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the matte bareMinerals better than the original. That sheen the original has doesn't work for women over fifty. The coverage is good and they have a good selection of shades. I just wish they could find a better method of application. I wind up with more powder on the countertop than on my face, and since it's fairly expensive, I don't like all that waste.

This foundation is amazing for oily skin! This is the only thing I put on my skin (don't have too problemed of skin) and it looks flawless and controls my shine. I would say it could be used as a higher coverage powder or foundation! Defiantly recommend for oil skin and, it has spf in it! (What more can you ask for?)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite powder foundation! Doesn't feel heavy on and has decent coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for a few years.  I have oily skin and I prefer the matte formula, but since they didn't have it in the color I needed, I got the color I needed in the original formulation. I like the fact that it is natural and doesn't break me out. It gives medium coverage. I still need to use a concealer to adequately hide dark spots, but this does what I need it to otherwise. I also like the fact that it has natural SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'd been looking for a powder foundation for awhile now, something easy and quick, but still amazing, and I've found it! I have the shade 'Light' since I was previously mismatched but this powder lasts through an entire day of work and it's coverage is buildable. What's nice is that you can build it up to a full coverage foundation and still feel like nothing is on your face. It's lightweight and gives you great coverage and an even skin tone. A little does go a long way, a slight gentle tap will give you enough to cover your entire face if you'd like. For more coverage on my red cheeks, I'll just push down my brush on the opening and dust a bit more foundation on.

I used this foundation for 8 years and decided it was time to try some other options (I was worried I was in a beauty rut). I wandered from one foundation to another, trying pretty much any well-reviewed foundation at Sephora over about a year. I don't know why I ever left! My sensitive skin was a wreck and once I came back to Bare Minerals, all was well again--I did start using the flawless concealer foundation brush and my skin glows and looks amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore the bareminerals brand and this foundation is great, although there are a couple of downfalls. Primer is a must have if you are going to use this but by the end of the day their primer makes my face oily then makeup comes off throughout the day. Would buy again though without a doubt
This used to be my go-to daily foundation, but I had to stop using it because it started giving my skin a weird texture.

I've been using this make up for about 8 years. Since then I've tried using other foundations due to convience or price and I always return to this. I used a liquid foundation that resulted in a skin infection and I broke out all the time I returned to this and my skin has cleared up. Everyone always compliments my face and it's so light! You won't regret using this

I really like this powder, although I do find it making me a bit oily(which is crazy because I'm usually a dry skinned gal) but I guess I'm combination, & I like to use this when I'm not wearing foundation, & it provides a nice poreless look!

I use this primarily as a setting powder on top of my foundation and it's done great things for my skin. I think it's help overall with my acne (I have very sensitive skin, very prone to breakouts) and doesn't break me out.   I normally don't wear alone but when I do it covers my acne scars nicely and gives me a great glow. My only complaint is that it doesn't last long, by the end of the day it's faded a fair amount. If you have acne prone, sensitive skin this foundation will be your friend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for 5 years now and it seems to be the only one to work with my acne-prone and sensitive skin! Powder seems to be better for my skin, even though I do have to cover my dark spots with concealer, this still has a good overall coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that it doesn't crease around the eyes or mouth, it looks like REAL SKIN. The mica or whatever mineral that is in the original foundation formula gives a beautiful luminous glow. I like a little shine to my forehead and cheekbones so this is perfect.

reviews.review_title: Great! Been using it for years
reviews.review_text: This product is excellent and I have been using it for about 8 years (since I was about 16)! I have used it both as a foundation and concealer.  If not for the fact that I've been getting dryer skin recently and feel like I need something more moisturizing, I would still be using it and plan on switching back to it in the summer months It does not crease like many liquid foundations or concealers do.

I recently re-purchased this item, and the last time I regularly used Bare Minerals was back in 2008ish. I do like how the application makes it look like I don't have any makeup on, and it's nice for my casual, laid back days. However, I think in the grand scheme of things, I simply prefer liquid foundation over powder/mineral foundation. The positive aspects of this foundation is that it is long wearing. It also minimizes the appearance of my pores. I find that I don't get as oily throughout the day with this foundation either. They negative aspects is that it doesn't make my skin look all that much better than my bare skin. I took some before and after pictures and I wasn't incredibly convinced that the foundation did anything more than neutralize a little bit of some hyperpigmentation on my cheeks. It kind just makes my face look monochromatic, but it doesn't give a luminosity, dewiness that I'm used to seeing from a liquid foundation finish. All to say that if you're liking a very matte and very natural foundation finish, this might be the right makeup for you. In the end, I am not quite unhappy enough to want to return the product. But I am also practical enough that this will probably be my go-to makeup when I am running small errands in the daytime and you won't catch me wearing this foundation while out to dinner with friends or family.
Will never use anything else. It's light,smooth and looks natural.

reviews.review_title: my favorite foundation i think ever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I typically like to keep my morning routine fuss free and the thought of buffing loose powder everywhere was just not that enticing. But my liquid foundations just felt way too heavy and I knew they weren't doing my skin any good so I thought I'd go back to BM, and I'm glad I did. I used to use the BM matte version many years ago and thought it was just okay but somebody told me that the original is actually way better and it is. The coverage is amazing, the staying power is also really great. I usually do 2 layers to cover some redness and pigmentation left from past blemishes and it never feels too much. I use a flat top buffing brush and a very small flat top for extra coverage in certain spots if I need. They claim its so gentle you can sleep in it and I can say that this claim is true.
