I've taken a nap in the afternoon in this, I've also been on a 16 hour flight with this on and have had no averse effects and I have pretty acne prone/oily skin. And major plus in my books, it does not give you a flashback.. which was very very surprising.
This lasted me forever, and it's a decent amount of coverage
I did not like this at all. No coverage for the price, and the container is much to small for the money.
I love this foundation. It has good coverage stays on well even when working out. Is scent free so it works well for me During hunting season as well as every day.

I recently switched from a liquid foundation to this hoping for a more youthful appearance. Boy was I wrong! This literally exaggerates every single imperfection possible- including fine lines and wrinkles! Save your money ladies! Definitely not worth the hype

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: leaves my skin with an airbrush look! perfect powder that doesn't make my skin oily after a long day's wear.
10 years, still a fan. Every once in a while, I try something new and always come back to my original BE foundation. It's the best!
Have been using this foundation for years and will continue. I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I read once that if you're over 35, you should not wear powder as a foundation because it settles in your wrinkles and lines. I'm 42 and have used this powder for years! It stays on all day and covers any uneven skin tone issues and leaves a flawless finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried other foundations but I always come back to this one. It is my absolute favourite - always gives me flawless coverage and makes my skin look amazing.

I have super sensitive and dry skin and have been using this product for years. It's light and easy. You can add more for more coverage. I do my moisturizing routine (including a smash box tinted moisturizer) then use a foundation stick for under eyes, etc, blend and finish with this powder.

I have to be very careful with my skin, I can't use anything heavy or thick or oily. I use this and mineral veil and spray with UD setting spray and the results are perfect. Luminescent, nice even coverage that stays put. The mineral powder gives a light SPF which is good because I can't wear traditional sunscreen on my face either. I still use a hat in a lot of sun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LIGHT WEIGHT. NATURAL GLOW AND LOOK.
Great stuff, it has great coverage without looking caked on!
The foundation covers well, and is light enough to wear during the brutal summers in Houston.
I use this foundation almost every day. It blends in well with my skin color and makes my skin not look so red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Goes great over liquid foundation or just by itself. Great coverage for a powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Recently purchased Bare Mineral Original Foundation and I am really disappointed. The product does not come out of the jar. The holes repeatedly clog and I have given up trying to pry and pound it out. Almost a complete container is unusable. Very frustrated. Like the product. Hate the container.
Best coverage and healthy looking. Perfect for acne prone skin.
Love it! Light cover makes skin feel soft fills the nicks and crannies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I switched to bareMinerals several years ago and it's definitely the best. You can use it with or without a base foundation. You only need a little, so it lasts several months. And the color really matches my skin well.

I have been using this for over 6 months now almost daily, and I love it! It's not super high coverage but is very light and skin perfecting. This is my go to natural easy looking foundation. I would definitely recommend this to high schoolers.

I have used many other kinds of powder before and they have all broke me out and made me look fake. When I tried this i loozed at my husband and cried. Because I actually looked like myself and not a ton of make up had to be out on my face. I inky have to apply once and it lasted all day. I even looked at my husband the other day and told him i was almost out it had lasted me a year or so and we have fell on hard times and are unable to buy me more. That is the ones lyrics depressing part about this powder is not being able to get more cause I know it's what works for me. But i absolutely love it.

Best there is! Everyone says I have nice skin and I attribute that to this product. Pigmentation depends on the brush used, I highly recommend a concealer brush for issue areas then lightly dusting for all over coverage. I read reviews about dry and oily skin concerns... I have normal/combo skin, I wear primer so my skin doesn't dry out and if I get shine I use a mattifying powder:)
This is a very nice powder foundation. It is really full coverage for a powder. I don't think their is a more pigmented face powder.

reviews.review_title: accidentally got this instead of the matte
reviews.review_text: This has a little bit of a sheen that doesn't look good when my face starts getting oily. And I have pretty oily skin. I do give it points for ease of use and for the spf.

Waited a long time before finally trying the infamous bareMinerals line... Why did I wait so long and waste hundreds of dollars on liquid foundations all those years?!? Why?! Nothing compared to bareMinerals original... My skin is healthier, luminous and so natural looking. Strangers on the street stop me and ask how I keep my skin so healthy and glowing!! This has given me true skin confidence even when I'm not wearing it! Everyone stop wasting your money on goopy liquid foundations and go for the powder! You'll be glad you did

This is the best buy ever. I use this product every day and it lasts all day long. I use a liquid foundation and finish with this powder before i contour and its amazing. Just a little bit covers so much and it feel amazing on your face. I will never stray from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Always used liquid foundation but my skin was aging so quickly..I am only 23 and I have a lot of lines in my forehead and my complexion is uneven. After 2 weeks of using this my skin is not only now acne free but the Complexion and quality of my skin look so much better it's insane. It gives such even natural coverage that is absolutely flawless. Would recommend this to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I seriously have nothing bad to say about this foundation. The colour selection is amazing, super natural yet buildable coverage, and the result is luminous, healthy looking skin that can breath. No words can describes how much i enjoy this foundation.

This foundation is amazing! My friend bought it before me and she kept telling me it was amazing, so naturally I purchased it to try it out.  The coverage is buildable, so you can just use as much as you want until you get your desired coverage, a little goes a LONG way, and you won't even feel it on your face when you wear it.  I have combination skin, but more normal during the Canadian winters, and I have quite a bit of scarring, but they're almost gone. This covers everything perfectly, and if I want more coverage in one area, I can just spot conceal with this foundation too. No matter how much you use it won't look cakey, and from what I found out, it doesn't dry out the skin too much either. It honestly doesn't feel like I'm wearing foundation at all.  I have noticed that with continued use, my skin has been more clarified, and my pores don't get clogged anymore as I used to get clogged pores with liquid foundation.  Honestly give this a try, its definitely worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this foundation on and off for the past 5 years and I just keep coming back to it! Worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the texture of this foundation. It was matte finish, reduced the shine on my oily skin, and great cover up. I loved that it was light and smelled great.

reviews.review_title: I'm ride or die for this one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this as my foundation for the last 10 years and I have zero complaints. I love how it feels barely there and you can have minimal coverage or full all depending on what brush you use. Its versatile and I have zero complaints. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ya'll...I finally made the switch to bareMinerals after my sister swore by it for years. I can't believe I waited so long! Not only is my makeup light and more natural looking, my skin has become clearer. Goodbye drug store makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super skeptical going in, but my friend has loved it for so long that I had to try it! I can have really dry patches so powder looks terrible usually, but I haven't had that problem at all with this powder. It blend in super well & is perfect to build so I can go for lighter coverage or heavy.

I recently bought this because I had heard so many people recommend it. I love this powder so much, it covers redness and any other imperfections perfectly and looks more natural than other foundations I've tried. I use it with Prime Time primer and it lasts all day. I highly recommend giving it a try

reviews.review_title: great for oily/dry skin covering blemishes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this foundation. it is very buildable and feels light. My skin has improved since using (less breakouts).

I've used this powder for as long as I can remember. I have a general love for this company. All products I've tried have been high quality. A light coating of this with a proper brush and my skin looks amazing, no heavy liquid foundation or BB/CC cream necessary. Even when I'm not in a rush to get ready, applying this as my foundation is perfect. If you don't want a full face of makeup or have skin not prone to blemishes or breakouts, this will provide all the coverage you need. If you want more full coverage I recommend applying BareMinerals Complex Rescue tinted hydrating gel cream underneath and using this over it.

This is the first powder foundation I have ever tried and after hearing all the hype around this product, I decided to give it a chance. The coverage is light! It can look a tad powdery and cakey with 2 layers on so be careful if you have problematic skin. I found the wear time to be about 8 hrs, not bad. I have combination skin - this product doesn't make me look shiny throughout the day. The powder itself is so soft and silky (a bit like flour) and blends into the skin so beautifully. It looks very natural, much more so than other ones I've tried, like the makeup forever hd foundation. This has become my new favorite foundation! The only prob me is that the container becomes so messy! The mechanism that you twist to close the product when not in use doesn't work very well (if shaken, even with that plastic closed, powder will be all over the lid!). This is not a good product to travel with but a good foundation overall. Will repurchase again.

I've been using this stuff for at least 6 years. Every so often I switch it up, most recently giving liquid foundation a try, and after a week I've gone back to ole faithful. Bare minerals matches my skin tone perfectly while giving a beautiful glow and protecting from any midday oiliness. I've tried much more expensive foundation and feel the most comfortable and confident in this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for 7 years, and I love it. Not only does it blend perfectly into my skin, the powder lasts me 6-8 months! I definitely feel like I get my money's worth. I just love it. Also, I love that I can pick how much coverage I want.
I got this for Christmas and it's already gone. I liked it A LOT but it's gone so quick.

I love this foundation when I tried it at Sephora for the first time. My skin was a little tricky back then, and my acne was very horrible. This foundation just covered my acne without feeling cakey or heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Good for everyday, gives more coverage than i thought. only looks cake if i try to put it over concealer. But other than that is is awesome. Comfortable, feels like nothing. lasts about 12 hours, fades gracefully.  If you have relatively good skin, this is great. If you have lots of acne try something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product along with an eyeshadow primer to keep my eyeliner from smudging throughout the day. Beyond that, it is disastrous to my dry skin. Even when applying lightly with a foundation brush, it appears cakey and unnatural. This product would work best for those with a normal to oily complexion.
It's VERY LIGHT coverage if you use it on your own and it looks cakey of you put it on top of foundation so maybe I'm doing something wrong

I despise the packaging. I feel like I can never get enough powder out and I'm constantly trying to shake some out. Other then that I think the product itself is rather decent. I wouldn't rave about it though I would put it on par with purr minerals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a while and I love it.

reviews.review_title: IF YOU ARE OILY THIS IS FOR YOU!
reviews.review_text: This is AMAZING STUFF! Less is more with this powder! Keeps my oily nose in check for hours longer than other makeup. I top my look off with Urban Decay All-Nighter spray and I am good for the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite products! It is light and gives you a natural look if you wear it by itself. But if you have both foundation and this on, it will give you more coverage. I got this for an every day look so I don't have to spend much time on my make up. I love it! If you touch your face throughout the day and then touch other things, your makeup won't transfer over. I don't recommend it if you're looking for super-heavy coverage.

I used to never ever wear anything on my face because I typically break out, but this is light and airy and I don't feel like I'm wearing makeup. It actually makes my skin glow and I haven't gotten a single pimple since I started using it. Definitely would recommend to anyone.
It doesn't cause break outs but I'm an oily mess midday. Will keep using until I find something better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was not for me, I like a cream foundation better, I felt it did not cover my pores on my nose, and was a bit hard to put on with the brush I also bought at Sephora for this product, I returned this product and brush.

If you follow their application tips you can't go wrong. It's huge with powder to get your perfect color match so test a few. Apply over all and then gently touch up spots that need additional coverage
Love love love this product! Great coverage, light weight, and the color matched perfectly!
Always liked bare minerals products, not too heavy, great coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareMinerals powder foundation for years. Every time I try to switch it up and try something new, I always come back to it! It has great buildable coverage, and doesn't feel gross or cakey on your skin. I break out easily and I feel that this powder foundation is great for that. It gives a very natural finish, and has great stay for hours. Whenever I feel I need a touch up, I just use the bareMinerals mineral viel and my make-up looks fresh as when I first applied it! Would recommend for any skin type!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im a Red Head with very sensitive skin, All BareMinerals Products are fantastic, they have full coverage without any weight. Love this product have been using it for 7years
Bare Minerals Original formula is always perfect. Never cakes or leaves line. Perfect blending every time.
Great foundation! You can get a full or light coverage depending on how much you put on/layer. I have combo skin and it lays beautiful on my skin. Lasts all day and I don't need to touch up!

I bought the starter kit and used that with no issues. It stayed all day in the Floridian Sun with no oily spots or settling into my skin. Hooray! Finally!! This was the one...I fell in love. No new breakouts and my face was so clear. I used it for a month before deciding to splurge and buy the fancy Collector's Edition. Big mistake. Upon opening the package I noticed a previous enemy, shimmery, glittery...mica. That glittery stuff breaks me out so bad, settles into my creases, oxidizes and makes me so oily. I had a similar experience with Boscia's BB Cream which is also glittery (mica!) and oxidized after only a few hours. Broke me out terribly and smashed my trust in foundations. Why would you do this? I was totally sold on this product line until you changed the formulation. Having acne prone oily skin, it is frustrating enough to find good coverage with staying power and no lasting irritation. I will not recommend this product to anyone.

Good product!! It makes my skin appear smooth but I always make sure to apply it light with not much product on the brush because it can get splotchy and dark if you use too much with brush. So apply lightly and keep going as needed. Other than that it's great and lasts a while and perfect price !!

Great light coverage for the day to day! I can use it as a coverup on blemishes but don't find it does enough for under eye coverage if you really need it. My skin in sensitive and I've had peri-oral dermatitis in the past from fave products and this hasn't triggered it at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I Love BareMinerals and all they stand for. Ive been using their Original Foundation for years and decided to try their Bareskin Liquid Foundation when it first came out. Although it was OK, but i don't think it worked well with my skin type. I decided to go back to their Original Foundation and I regret ever trying anything else. It leaves my skin looking nice, smooth and healthy without looking cakey. It takes some getting used to because you definitely have to build up to your desired coverage, but again never overdone. Their Mineral Veil helps my makeup stay put all day and adds that extra luminous, airbrushed effect. I also use their blush in vintage peach which I love. I have pretty sensitive skin but I've never had any problems with BareMinerals. Love love love this foundation!

For everyday use, this is fantastic. It's light in coverage, has a natural glow, and looks like skin. I've noticed that when I wear this, I experience less breakouts., which is another plus.  My only complaints are that near the end of the day, it starts to break up, especially around my chin. It also is not a long wearing foundation, and unlike other liquid foundations, when some oil or sweat comes through, the foundation doesn't melt together, but breaks apart.  Overall, still a great foundation. I don't have other powder foundations to compare it to as this is the first one I've tried, though I still prefer my liquids to this.

reviews.review_title: Seems different from what it used to be...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used bareMinerals Original Foundation Broad Spectrum SPF 15 for six years now. I feel that something has changed.  Either the formula has changed or the ingredients are different, but whichever the case it is not the same. It makes my skin very dry and it makes me break out these days. The texture is also different. I have dry skin, so I don't have many blemishes. I feel that it enhances my pores rather than reduces like it used to. It's not as smooth as it used to be.  I will be trying out different makeup brands from now on, because bareMinerals no longer makes my skin better! Nowadays, I only wear sunscreen and get tons of compliments on my skin, whereas when I wear bareMinerals, I get no compliments! It is the opposite from when I first started wearing BM.  Maybe the change is in my skin, so I will try other makeup brands to see. But as of right now, my opinion is that something is different with BM original foundation.

This makeup is perfect to even out the complexion. I've been using bare minerals for about a year and realize that when I run out of it my skin suffers and will sometimes even break out. I really believe this stuff has helped me keep my skin clear! For those who are afraid of a powder because they have dry skin or don't want to look cakey: moisturizer well, really (REALLY) buff this powder in with a flat top brush and set it with a dewy setting spray. Without taking those steps I've found it to occasionally look cakey. Overall this stuff has really saved my skin and with a few extra steps it looks flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You can get more coverage from this product than what you would expect, however you have to keep working on blending it in in order to activate the minerals. You can hardly feel this foundation on so if you don't like the wetness or heaviness of liquid foundation give this a try. Just keep in mind that it takes longer to blend in than liquid foundation. This is hard to detect on the skin, so that's why you have to blend for a long time and how long it takes to build coverage. You only need a little bit of product contrary to popular belief. Due to how long it takes to blend and build coverage I took a star off but it's easy to get over considering how natural it looks and how little you can feel it on the skin.
It is perfect for people that don't necessarily want to wear a foundation. It feels nice and light but makes your face an even tone and gives a nice glow.

reviews.review_title: Good product that didn't work for me.
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to purchase this, as it was the first powder foundation that I have ever gotten. I was looking for something natural-looking and light but with a decent amount of coverage and this powder foundation definitely gave me that. It looked and felt wonderful for the first few days. I applied it with the travel kabuki brush, also from Bare Minerals. I had heard a lot of great things about this product and a few negatives, mainly about breakouts occurring from using it. I ignored those reviews, as I have very tame skin and very rarely get break outs. I used this for about a week, maybe even less, when I started breaking out severely. I immediately discontinued using it. I got the breakouts all over, mainly on the lower part of my face. It took about a month or two for everything to completely clear up. I'm now back to clean and clear skin. I still use the kabuki brush to apply my new foundation, because I love it, but this foundation didn't work for me, sadly. Highly recommended to anyone that doesn't have sensitive skin. As I said before, beautiful finish, nice product- just not for me.
Really good. Covers, but results in more acne. Lasts, but not a full day. Better than liquid foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've given this product countless tries, the color matches my skin with yellow undertones great no matter how pale/tan I am but this has never failed to break me out. My dermatologist recommended mineral based foundations but they all don't work, take notice of you skin if you have problematic acne while using this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it's just okay. it matches my skin tone well but leaves me looking a bit cakey. it is expensive so i want to use it more but i'm tempted to use other makeup that makes my skin look less old. does not cover anything up well. not my favorite
Great product that everyone should try once. I absolutely love it and keep returning to it after trying others.

reviews.review_title: made me look like a cake face
reviews.review_text: I bought it to use as a light natural foundation but it did the exact opposite. It caked up on my face and made me look very heavy, powdery, and emphasized the lines on my face ALOT. What i do recommend it for is to spot conceal any pimples or small imperfections. It has amazing coverage and when used on the tip of a beauty blender will cover literally anything, just don't use it on large areas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is incredible! I remember my mom using this a long time ago. I was in search of a new powder and happened to see it in the store. I can't believe how much coverage it gives without being too heavy on your face. It lasts all day and doesn't irritate my skin. This is definitely part of my everyday routine. I'm so glad I found it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an amazing product! I had heard about it for so long but after trying tarte's powder foundation, I was a bit hesitant. But, this foundation is outstanding. It's better than any liquid foundation I've ever used. Such good coverage and it's great for any skin type.

Rather lotion... You can see the little powder dots on your face makes your face look old also dried out my face and made me break out even after cleansing it off and moisturizing and everything wouldn't buy again I don't understand why everyone's obsessed with it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a bareMinerals starter kit years ago for Christmas and haven't gone back to anything else since. The foundation itself is amazing, but the fact that it is paraben free is one of my favorite things about it and the company.
I've never used a powder that works so well! This stuff is absolutely amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: like the title thats how i feel, it matches my skin well and it so far hasn't created any unnecessary oil, some of my red spots can still be seen but i think that i just have to build it up. one of the best things is that it doesn't have an annoying fragrance.

Ok to get that out of the way the bismuth in this burns my sensitive skin when I sweat. I've pinpointed that it's def that ingredient. Aside from this, wow what great glowy coverage. I do need The PoreFessional with this or it makes my small pores look like craters. Yes but I still love it. I have light red skin and use 'light' which I got to cancel out redness. It looks dark and yellow when first applied but then it melts into my skin and something magic happens. After it sits on my skin it just makes it look perfect in shade and glowy. Not shiny or anything just far from flat. Oh how I wish it didn't burn me. I usually use any bronzer or blush with this but then finish with mineral veil (SPF for day or illuminating for night). I tend to use the MV only when using this foundation idk why. They just work well together. Try it! You can always return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My one and only foundation. I have been using this for years and will continue for as long as I wear makeup. I have tried other foundations and I always come back to bare minerals. No issues with it and it makes my makeup more natural which I personally prefer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this on top of my liquid foundation on a daily basis. It doesn't cause breakouts. It blends well and doesn't cake up. I usually get compliments on my skin because of it.
Great coverage! Lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been buying this product for almost a decade and I still get compliments on my skin. People say my makeup looks natural yet I get heavy coverage from it. The only downside is that as I get fine lines it's a bit too dry, but I've started wearing Hourglass Hylauranic Skin Tint underneath to smooth out the lines before putting on this powder. Only other concern is wondering what the gradual, longterm inhalation of this product is doing to my lungs... it tends to fly around a bit when you put it on and can be a bit messy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this foundation every day from 7:00 am. to 9:pm., and I like it - stay in place , is not thick or pancake look, looks more natural.
Absolutely love this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is perfect foundation its very light weight but gives you perfect coverage and can always carry it on the go since it is very compact in size. Lots of shades to choose from as well.

reviews.review_title: It's a nice foundation for light coverage
reviews.review_text: I like this foundation for light smooth coverage.. But, I need to use the proper brush for it or I have dry patches on my face.. But, with the right amount and right brush it's a quick and easy way to get just perfect day-to day coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this make up, last for hours and still looks like you just put it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just love this stuff. I use estee lauder double wear and this on top to set it. It has a nice glowy look to it. This is my second container of it. I am oily and this really helps make my makeup last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased hoping for to try a new face powder that used more natural ingredients. Unfortunately, it was WAY too full coverage for my skin. Didn't give me the natural look I was hoping for so I had to return.

This foundation is awesome for an everyday makeup (college student). For over 5 years I've always trusted Bareminerals Original since high school. My make-up routine has change. Before, I use concealer to cover redness around my nose and cover dark spots. Until, i changed my skin care. I believe makeup goes well on skin with a good skin care routine (cleanser, night serum and night cream). Because of my skin care routine, i only use the powder itself to even my skin. And it is amazing!

I really like this product. I have normal to slightly oily skin, and I just buff this into my skin after applying moisturizer. The coverage is easily buildable and feels like nothing on my skin! great for everyday use. HOWEVER during the winter my skin has become super dry in some areas and this WILL CAUSE SKIN TO FLAKE if you have dry skin- I solved this by using smashbox hydrating primer before applying, and it looks great! Definitely a dewy finish, which I love. :)

reviews.review_title: great foundation for every day use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i've been using bare minerals for years and it provides nice coverage. i am prone to breakouts but the lightweight foundation is perfect for my skin. i don't like to fuss over my daily makeup routine so this foundation is really ideal for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used bareMinerals Original Foundation for well over 3-4 years because I loved it and it worked flawlessly. But, maybe they have changed the powder up. For the past 6 months it only lasts a few hours before it cakes up and goes horribly splotchy.... I have oily skin as is and this used to be perfect for it. Not anymore! I tried the Matte Foundation, that was even WORSE! I have finally given up hope and switching to something different!

I love this powder enough to have continually used it for almost 2 years without complaint. It doesn't cover perfectly, but that also means it's not too heavy. I use it with a BB cream that I love and that covers well, and it works great for me. I have found however that the brush I'm using to apply it REALLY makes a difference in how it looks. When I switched from the BareMinerals brush to my tarte bamboo brush, it made all the difference in the world!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. Ive been using it for years, I can never find myself liking a liquid foundation. I always compare it to Bareminerals and Bareminerals always wins. You can build it up with layers for a medium-full coverage, I use their beautiful finish brush but any buffing brush would work.The application is really important to get a good result, you need to buff not sweep or else it wont be a good result. Love this stuff, never loved anything else!

I have several different shades of this Bare Minerals foundation and I like it . You do have to have pretty good skin because it's not full coverage and light but it does look natural. The only thing I don't like so much about this foundation is that it makes your skin look dull instead of glowing and healthy.
If you have acne scars don't expect much coverage!! Only good thing about it is it looks natural!!

The trick to this foundation if you have some spots of your face that you need hidden is to spot conceal with a liquid concealer before applying this. I would recommend spot concealing, then applying a translucent powder directly over the concealer, and then applying the bare minerals foundation to even out your skin tone as a whole. If you do this, you will better conceal and even our your skin without caking on this product.

reviews.review_title: I always come back to Bare Minerals
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this foundation for close to 5 or 6 years straight and loved it. I moved to a drier climate and didn't really moisturize right before I applied it, so then I search for something different and turned to liquid for a bit. I have always come right back it and especially now that I am more conscientious about my skin care routine and take better care to cleanse and hydrate my face. I rarely get any breakouts when using this and it really makes you look luminous. I have some dark spots on my face now from some scars, and it doesn't do well hiding those, hence the 4-star rating. I am going to try a different brush to use with it other than the one it comes with because since BM has changed to a different way of making the brush about 1 or 2 years ago, the bristles are very scratchy and it doesn't go on as smooth as what I remember in the past. I've used both the matte and original and like the original best. I live in a really dry climate and found the matte to be too much. Overall, I love it though! I
This is a great foundation for people with oily skin. I can only wear it in the summer because it makes me too dry in the winter.

When I first started getting into makeup, I really needed something light and natural as I had dry and cystic acne prone skin. This whole brand is very well done and offered a lot of tips and tricks to help newbies and seasoned makeup artists through their makeup journey!

This foundation is very easy to apply. It looks natural and can be built up to medium coverage. I have sensitive dry acne prone skin and have never had any issues with this foundation breaking me out. Only down sides are it does tend to settle in my smile lines but all foundations I wear do that anyway. And alone it does not cover acne well.

I have been using this foundation for years and absolutely love it. It goes on smoothly and stays on all day. It also provides great coverage and evens out my skin tone. But it's not heavy and it doesn't look like you are wearing foundation at all!

reviews.review_title: Only foundation I can wear without acne issues
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive combination skin with cystic acne issues. I am light skinned with freckles and I like medium to full coverage. I've tried pretty much every line of foundation (powders and liquid) and I keep coming back to this. I've learned to layer it well for better coverage. It matches my skin tone the best (fairly light in the fall/winter and medium beige in the summer) and I never have acne issues when I wear it and it evens my skin tone the best out of any makeup I've used without looking greasy or caked on. After contouring (I use Kat Von Ds line), I follow up with mineral veil (by bare minerals) and spray with urban decay's makeup setting spray. I used a different product by my eyes (because of the fine lines -it cosmetics under eye concealer) Sometimes I'll retouch it at the end of the day, but I don't always need to. I've used it for the last 7 years and I will continue to do so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a history of cystic acne and the bareMinerals powder foundation was one of the only make up products that my dermatologist approved for wear. The product has natural, buildable coverage that does not look fake or too matte. I hate the line of bareMinerals brushes, but found that my E.L.F. kabuki is perfect for buffing in product. The only con of this product is that it is not great for traveling.

I've used this off and on since 2006. Every time I try a new foundation I run right back to this...I'm blonde/blue eyes with yellowish pale skin. I use Medium. The pink in it helps me look less yellow. When I switch to other foundations everyone comments on how pale and tired I look. I highly recommend Multi Tasking minerals (I use Bisque) for dark undereye circles. I also love the All-Over face color in Glee--I just use it as a blush. The reason this gets 4 stars instead of 5: it can settle into fine lines and appear cakey on dry skin if you're not careful. I use Ponds dry skin cream in the winter to help...and I would recommend a dimethicone/silicone-based primer to fill in your fine lines if you're 35+. Overall this foundation gives a nice glowy look, and blends really well. Set it with the Mineral Veil to avoid being too shiny or shimmery. You'll definitely want a lipstick when you wear this foundation, as your lips will look more bare and dull in comparison to your luminescent skin. What I don't recommend from this line: the lipstick and mascara. Better off going to the drugstore--just not worth the price. The brow powders are ok but nothing special. The eyeshadow are very pigmented. I like Drama (although it tends to make me look like a harlot).

So, I know there's a lot of hype surrounding Bare Minerals, and a lot of people love it. I'm not one of those people. First off, it has no staying power. If I touch my face AT ALL it gets all over everything. Second, it takes quite a bit to get decent coverage out of it, and if you have acne or any skin imperfections, I've personally found that the coverage just isn't really there. NEXT!
I have been using BareMinerals for years and always find myself repurchasing the powder! It is long wearing and a little will so go along way!

This was my first powder foundation that I've tried and I love it! It gives a natural look and doesn't look like I have any make up on my face at all. It blends easily and comes with a lot of product that will last you awhile. It's great and for $28 I think it's worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation powder. You can easily control the amount of coverage while looking natural. If you need a little extra coverage in only certain areas (not now Melasma!) you can use a concealer under this. My patches are not that dark anymore, so I can easily cover it with just the foundation. Lightweight and long-wearing too. My skin tend to be on the dryer side, so definitely moisturize beforehand.

This foundation covers very well...so well that I didn't have to use concealer (which is huge for me!). But, it dries my skin out so bad. I have oily acne-prone skin so I thought since this was a powder, it would control the oil. I was wrong. My face still gets shiny, but I also get dry, rough, flaky patches on my cheeks and foreheard. So sad this drys me out. It has the best coverage I've ever seen in a foundation, and I've tried a lot of foundation.

When I first started experimenting with foundation (I used to just use a tinted moisturizer or concealer), I wasn't sure where to start...liquid? Powder? What's the best way to apply? Then, two of my good friends told me that they used Bare Minerals, which both of them seemed to like. They showed me how easy it was to apply, and I that sealed the deal, since I was inexperienced with foundation.  I love that this stuff is lightweight and looks great on pretty much everyone. The best thing is that it's a foundation and a concealer in one, so it saves you time if you're in a crunch to do your makeup. The one thing I will mention is that because of the slightly dewy finish (though they offer matte finish as well), building layer upon layer to conceal (for example, under eye) will start to look slightly--hmm...I guess oily?--if you go overboard.  Overall an awesome beginner's foundation!
This mineral powder is amazing. I have dry/combo skin and this works beautifully. It never cakes up and always looks so luminous. Also, it's very full coverage. Love it.
I really like this product it looks natural on my skin and it last all day. I haven't breakout doesn't plug my pores it just perfect for every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation, I've been using it for years! Whenever I try something else I come right back to bareMinerals. It keeps my skin clear, is easy to put on and you can control the coverage.

I really like powder foundations and after reading the reviews I was sure I had found the perfect one. I have sensitive, acne prone skin. I think this foundation somehow actually made me break out more. And if I'm having an off skin day, say breakouts or fine lines, this foundation really accentuates all of that. I think it's overrated, and I wouldn't buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily and acne-prone skin so I was nervous to use powder foundation thinking that it won't be full coverage. I've been using the bare mineraIs foundation for about 3 weeks now and I am still shocked at the fact that it's medium-to-full coverage (you have to keep building it up, little by little) and it did not break me out at all! To be honest, it has actually helped my skin breathe and so prevented new breakouts. All in all, the application process takes a while to get used to, and it can be tedious to keep blending until your wrist hurts, BUT it's so worth it, my skin hasn't felt this good in years. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Wish I Could Give it More Than 5 Stars
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best foundation I have ever used. Perfect buildable coverage, gets along with concealer I apply with it, looks extremely natural, super lightweight, and easy to apply. I love the natural finish I get when I set this with my Urban Decay all-nighter spray. Seriously recommend - Awesome purchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect everyday foundation! It can be built to full coverage and does not break me out. I love this foundation, but take one star off because it does need you to work on it to get a perfect look. Otherwise, it can be caky.

I always wear powder only, and I've always used Mac. I got this product because one of my friends recommended it, I'm loving it. The product feels light, last all day, and it gives great coverage. I didn't give it 5 starts because I don't like the container of the product.

I've always loved this foundation to use as a light everyday foundation to use everyday for work/school. lightweight and gives great coverage to give u that natural I'm not wearing any makeup look. this will always be one of my favorite powder foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first mineral foundation that I've tried and it is my favorite. It is very natural looking but it gives quite a lot of coverage as you keep buffing it to your skin.

I am 66 and have used the original foundation for 2 years and continue to receive compliments on my complexion. Maybe it was the sales person that showed me how to apply the makeup, but it looks so much better on me than any other product I've used. The coverage, including age spots is excellent. I noticed the other reviews were all over the place and at least one commented that they didn't think the product was for people over 30. All I know is that it works very well for me, and you should probably try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this about 6 yrs ago and at that time the lightest shade oxidized darker and yellow for me. I am between a neutral to yellow undertone, light asian/caucasian skin. I tried this for the second time in the light neutral shade and though the formula is better, I found it to still settle in fine lines after an hour. It does feel soft on the skin, so I will still use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was my first ever purchase at Sephora years ago and I've tried many high end foundations since, thinking I would find something to top it. I was wrong. This foundation is still the only one that offers me an excellent color match and a formula suitable for my combination skin. Despite being a powder, it does not dry out my skin like many liquid foundations do. It also has good staying power. I frequently receive compliments when I wear this foundation. I would absolutely recommend this for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just to start out: I have light olive-yellow skin, brown eyes, brown hair, and dry skin. I used medium beige. I found that the finish was fairly powdery, and even though I am mainly olive, I would recommend a yellower color, because this color didn't cover my redness. In retrospect, I shouldn't have bought a powder foundation considering I have dry skin, but this was during the summer when my skin was almost normal. The result was very powdery, cakey skin. And I'm no newbie to makeup - I know how to apply the foundation correctly. I will say that I prefer a very natural finish so that may effect how i perceive the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and in person my foudnation looks great but in photos the foundation was giving my face an oil slick sheen! The foundation itself has a lot of shimmer in it. I don't remember the old formula being this way. Will avoid original from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a die hard liquid foundation user until I tried Bare Minerals during a make over session. I have used it since, and I really like it with a few considerations. It is important to use the primer or a good moisturizer with this powder. It sits better on the skin and looks more luminous. I have combination skin with an oily T-zone, so a few hours into the day, I have to blot or touch up. Again, primer helps. Use a tightly bristled foundation brush with this, and the finish is gorgeous. If you use the one that comes with the set, the coverage and finish is very average. FYI.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In my life I have tried many foundations and more times than not they irritate my skin so much that sadly I wind up tossing it out or giving it away. And I am not talking about low quality, cheap foundations. I was so lucky on my last Birthday when my daughter gave me Original Foundation Broad Spectrum SPF 15 by Bare Minerals as a present. Been using it for a while now. I am so delighted that this product has such a positive effect on my sensitive skin. Now my skin feels so lovely. Added plus is this foundation has very little or no scent, which is important to me. I will definitely purchase more and recommend it to friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product, I wear it and love it. It works so well for uneven skin tone, dullness, and very mild acne. I'm serious about this, if you have a pimple or two that are not too noticeable, you will be fine. However, if you have pretty bad acne over your whole face, you might be disappointed. See, you do have build-able coverage up to a limit, after that it does look like you are wearing heavy make up. Also, be sure that your skin is moisturized or it will pick up the dryness and highlight it. If you find it is too Dry for your taste, mix it with a bit of moisturizer and use it like a tint!

I tried this with bareminerals primer and the full flawless face brush. Even used the mineral veil as well. I liked the idea of this mineral powder but it just didn't work. It made my skin look cakey and horribly oily. Didn't last long either. Not for me.

Ever since I first tried this foundation and got color-matches to my perfect shade, I have never been able to find another product that gives me the same results. It really looks natural and several people have commented on how great my skin is, but when I tell them that I'm wearing a full face of foundation they don't believe me! My entire face is riddled with acne scars and hormonal acne, but this product really helps cover those imperfections without looking fake and caked in makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used Bare Minerals since I was 24. I am now 35 and I have always thought that Bare Minerals was the best for my face. I use it daily and I use a great primer before I apply it. Last week I stopped into Sephora after work to get more Bare Minerals. The super nice Sephora Rep pointed out to me all of the reasons I should switch to another foundation. She handed me a mirror and all of the powder had settled in my fine lines and the lower half of my jaw and forehead had nothing left at all. It looked awful. Apparently this foundation is not great for 30 and up. The lady behind me had the same complaint on Bare Minerals. Just take a look at your face after about 6 hours of wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used bareMinerals for YEARS ‚Äì and I am so satisfied I recommend it to all of my friends and family
I love BE!!!!! Best ever foundation... Perfect for sheer to full coverage everytime! Swirl, tap, buff I also find if you need a little extra coverage just pat on with a foundation brush and buff out

reviews.review_title: bareMinerals Original Foundation Broad Spectrum SP
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for more than 5 years and find that is gives a wonderful coverage. If the first application does not cover, simply add more where required. If you moisturise and then apply the foundation immediately after you will get excellent coverage with a dewy glow to your skin. I find that after using this product my skin has never been better and people are always asking what I use and I am happy to tell them.

I have been using Bare Minerals for about 6 years now. I have tried many different foundations over the years, and this is the one that I always go back to. I love that it is light on the skin (doesn't feel caked on) and very natural looking. It doesn't look like you're wearing foundation, but at the same time it creates a nice even tone and covers redness and pimples. The only reason I am not giving it 5 stars, is because in the colder months it brings out the dryness in my skin, but I'm certain that any other foundation powder would likely do that as well.

I've been using bareMinerals for years now. I was never a fan of liquid concealer's and powders that you brush on using a little pad. I love how light and gentle the powder concealer and foundation is. I will never go back to liquid products and compact powder!

Moved away from liquid foundations after I bought two in a year and neither matched after a vacation. Got sick of having to dish out a lot of money for something I never matched with again! The medium beige is a great color for both winter and summer for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently switched from using a drugstore brand 'mineral makeup' to Makeup Forever Ultra HD foundation. However, the latter started to break me out, so I decided to go back to mineral makeup. I heard good things about Bare Minerals so I decided to give it a try. This powder foundation is a great alternative to those who struggle with cosmetic induced acne or hormonal acne. It certainly won't irritate your skin like conventional liquid foundations. A little of this product goes a long way! It does tend to get oily after 6-7 hours, but I consider that pretty normal, and a little touch up with mineral veil or setting powder will do!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It took trying several different shades in the store to find my perfect fit, but now that I have it, you can't even tell I'm wearing any foundation at all! It goes on so smooth, and with using the Smashbox photo-finish primer, it doesn't sink into my fine lines and stays looking fresh all day.
Best powder foundation I've ever tried! Will definitely go back to it. Leaves smooth finish, great coverage, doesn't cake up.

I have used this product on and off for ten years. I always come back to it. This past year my skin decided to freak out. I love the finish and the coverage and everything about it. One small problem and it goes by the name of bismuth oxycloride. It breaks me out like no other. If your having troubles maybe the same is true for you. Check ingredients on products. So sad to have to give this up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Usually don't wear foundation because it looks so cakey on my dry skin. This product gives me the perfect amount of coverage without looking like a layer. I have such fair skin you can see the blue veins under my eyes so I wear a bit of this by itself or with a tiny bit of concealer and it is great. one of my favorite foundations I've ever purchased!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stuff! I use the Real Techniques Face Expert Brush and it just blends wonderfully. Its buildable if you take time to apply it.Buffing is key with this stuff, you aren't going to get full coverage with just a regular powder brush.I don't even use a primer and it still lasts about 6-7 hours before i start to get oily in my t-zone.If you do have dry spots this stuff probably won't be ideal for you because it will cling onto dry spots if you don't moisturize(which you always should do :) ) Once its on it looks good but it looks better and better through out the day unless you are super oily it may tend to start sliding but i have combination skin. it takes about 7-8 hours to start getting oily enough where i have to use blotting papers.I also have sensitive acne prone skin and this hasn't irritated my skin nor has it broke me out.All in all i love this foundation and i definitely think its worth the price.(:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have this in fair. On days when I do a full face of makeup I use this over a full coverage foundation to blend. On days when I want very light makeup this is my go to. It easy and with primer it lasts and covers well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is everything I've been looking for. I've been using MUFE HD for quite a while, but have recently decided that I want a more natural look and feel - and am I ever glad I made the switch! This foundation is lightweight - it looks and feels like you have no makeup on (as long as you make sure to blend, but it also has good coverage that effectively hides my acne-prone skin. It's perfect for an everyday look. Even better, I have found that in the past 6 months I've used it, my skin looks a lot better than it did with any other foundation. One thing that I will say is that it can really dry your skin out, so make sure to use a moisturizer beforehand, as well as a primer. I also like to use the bareMinerals mineral veil on top along with a setting spray just to lock it all in.
this is the best . it beautyfull

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I hope this never gets discontinued. It is perfect for my oily skin - it just absorbs the oil and looks better as the day wears on. If my pores look a little weird, all I have to do is wait a minute for it to absorb more oil and just blend it. I won't use liquid foundation anymore. I use so little of this stuff that it lasts for years before I have to replace it. If I want a more dramatic full-face look, I use a little more. I can't ask for anything else in a foundation. I've taken this stuff to Austin, TX in the middle of August and it didn't disappoint.

reviews.review_title: I really wanted to like it..
reviews.review_text: I've used this during my college years and it's served me really well. I stopped using it when it began to accentuate my pores - years later I'm hunting for everyday make up that provides good coverage + affordable- and this is the perfect make up for it. I used a few different primers this time around but my pores are screaming out of my face an hour later. I love it on all other area of my face except where I have visible pores (nose & cheeks). I wish it worked for me but I had no choice but to return it. If you don't have gigantic pores like me, I would totally recommend this product- maybe I will come back once I figure out what I can do about my pores.. !!

Love the color selection, but didn't like how it went on. I have combination skin so it's hard to compromise with a powder foundation. It dried out my under eyes to the point where you can see all the lines.

Personally for me now the coverage isn't as dense as i would like, but i'm much different than my middle school self. I highly recommend for younger people who are just trying out foundations and makeup because its pretty hard to go wrong when applying this.

I purchased this in the shade fairly light and it matches very well. I love the coverage that this foundation provides me, and it lasts all day. I would recommend this product to anyone and will be buying again in the future.

reviews.review_title: Been using this for over 8 yrs
reviews.review_text: Still using it daily no matter what season and wouldn't trust any other lightweight foundation!

This is a good mineral foundation, it's light-medium coverage, definitely buildable. Make sure you use a primer or moisturizer before you apply it because it tends to fall off dry skin and makes your dry patches quite noticeable. Also I have to use a concealer afterwards because it won't cover your spots well. I like to use this when I'm in a rush and don't feel like bothering with liquid foundation, or if I just want a lightweight foundation that's going to even out my skin tone. I've noticed that at the end of a hot day,or after 8 hours of wearing it, it makes me look quite oily. It's not my no.1 fav foundation, but I still use it for convenience.

I really want to love this product- that's actually why I'm on the website again. I've had mixed experiences with this product though. i guess I can sum it up with 3 experiences. 1. In hs I had oily skin and I noticed the makeup looked over-cakey at times and too shimmery- maybe almost like fish scales. Needless to say I still really wanted to love it! Sooo 2. I kept the foundation around and once the oily skin pretty much left the bare minerals looked really good! (Especially in indoor lighting-awesome!) 3. This is the main reason I'm still on the fence- I wore it to a special event (after having it for maybe 5 years-yikes! I know.) needless to say the texture still looked rly pretty BUT in the photographs from that event the tone of the makeup came out very yellow and opaque in certain places on my face. It might have been because the makeup was old, but it kinda turned me away from bare minerals. Still wanna try to again, though!

I saw how so many people raved about this product and so I just had to buy it. However, it looked rather cakey when I applied it onto my face especially on my nose. Perhaps I used the wrong brush? (I used the mini 45 brush). So now I just use it very generously on my face as a setting powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, honestly this is the best foundation I've ever used, no joke. I've mostly just used liquids in the past...other than cheap drugstore powder foundations. It's such a flawless look even with only using a little product. This doesn't melt off in the sun like my liquid foundations. It's definitely buildable. I'm just in love with it. This will be something that I always have in my makeup bag.

I actually received a kit of this a long time ago at a bridal event and I was hooked! I mix shades Light and Fairly Light together for my foundation & use the veil & bronzer it came with. Best part is I don't have to color match for dif times of year. It feels light and natural which I absolutely love! Recently though, I found some areas of my skin were itchy during the summer so after 10 years of powder foundation, I switched to liquid for awhile because of the itchyness & my dry patches shows up too much with this but this is still my fav. Maybe mine was just expired and that's possibly why it itched? Anyway, i def recommend this foundation powder for anyone wanting a natural, weightless look. A little goes a long way too.

This has very good coverage for a powder. I have sensitive combination skin with acne. This covers the acne pretty good and it doesn't irritate my skin. It gives a natural kind of finish like it's not matte but it's not dewy. I feel like this is good for dry skin but if you have oily skin you should get the matte version. On my dry spots it looks good throughout the day but I have to use oil blotting paper on my T-zone. Overall this is great if you don't have oily skin.

No matter what, no other powders compare to this one for me. Applies evenly, stays on all day, and makes my skin look flawless (which it is not)! I have combination/oily skin. If you're like me, stick with this and not the matte foundation.

I've tried using this various times using different techniques, brushes, and primers underneath but NO. I can never get this to work! I have oily skin with dry patches, hyperpigmentation, acne, and wrinkles on the sides of my mouth; this makes ALL of my imperfections look WORSE. It takes way too much to even make it more than light coverage and accentuates dryness so badly. Not to mention that there's sparkle in the powder. Returned it and never trying it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a skeptic on bareMinerals powders, seeing as I'm an avid full-coverage liquid foundation fan. I was worried that this would not cover all my imperfections - I was right about that, it does NOT cover acne/acne scars. However, with a little bit of concealer, this foundation does give a lovely better than my skin coverage. I've been using it as to not make my stubborn skin worse and I'm satisfied. It does NOT last exceptionally long, so it's essential to set this with a finishing powder.

I have problem skin - acne and deep scarring. I have tried different powders and nothing compares to this. Leaves a smooth finish and texture on skin. You can build up the coverage and I recommend the Matte one for oily skin. Since using this (along with a smoothing primer) I don't need to constantly be blotting my face!

Bare minerals was the very first foundation I actually liked. I still use it occasionally, but have become more adventurous in my makeup. I like to try different foundations, but if all else fails I always have this on hand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a lot of foundations on my skin over the years, and this is one I always come back to. Yes, it's a bit drying in the winter, and yes it gets a little weird looking when I'm sweating loads, but it almost always does the job well and feels best on my skin. I've been using this for years and it never makes me break out or feels heavy. As long as you have a good brush, you can easily layer this as lightly or heavily as you want, and I never feel like I'm putting tons of chemicals on my face. And the SPF is a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing foundation since I was a teenager and have tried many brands. I started using BareMinerals about ten years ago, and I swear by it. It doesn't clog my pores,and it covers everything, yet it feels light and looks natural. It's the best!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to summer foundation. I'm not normally a powder foundation type of gal because of my combo skin and well dry patches but this is great! It covers and lasts pretty well and I always repurchase whenever summer comes around!
I recently got this and I love it!! It's light powder and feels light on your face. Feels like you have no product on. I love it!! Highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for years and can't say enough about how amazing it is. In the summer, with a primer underneath, it's the perfect light, glowy foundation. I use the handy buki brush to apply it, which is another great product by them. In addition to wearing it on its own, I also use it to set my makeup if I choose to wear a liquid foundation when I want fuller coverage (which I need after suffering a massive breakout and scarring thanks to Josie Maran products, fyi). I hope they never change their formula and never discontinue it. I love love love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my everyday foundation, I have a large area of broken capillars in my cheek and I can build the coverage in that area leaving the rest of my face with a very natural look. It has a satin finish so I have to top it with a little bit of powder (because my skin get very oily). If you have dry skin this might accentuate it a little bit. I think it is essential to use a primer underneath otherwise it doesn't last very long on the skin. Another thing that I really like about it is that it doesn't transfer as much as liquid foundations. Anyhow I would REALLY like to see an improvement in the packaging, it is kind of messy sometimes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this product!!!! It gives me such a beautiful glow and colour. I can't believe I lived so long without it. I will never use another powder and I'm getting the pressed powder as well for my purse. I got the light colour.

This is the best foundation - long lasting, covers imperfections (and I mean any and all), and makes skin glow. If you're not sure in color, just ask a Sephora Rep if you're pink, yellow or neutral undertones. I was using pink undertones for a couple of years until I was pointed in the right direction (you guessed it, yellow) - now I can really tell the difference.

I bought this on a whim intending to use it during my hormonal days because my face can be such a wreck-- oily, congested pores, break outs. I used it recently on one of my bad days and I was so happy with the coverage and how it settled nicely on my skin without giving me a cakey look. This is a great alternative to liquid foundation or regular powder foundation..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! If you are looking for a ton of coverage this likely isn't for you, but I usually use a CC cream and then a sheer dusting of this powder to help set/add a little more coverage and I find I get beautiful flawless looking skin with that. Only complaint is that some product can get wasted if you accidentally tap out too much and then don't use it all.

reviews.review_title: its what'd you expect from a high end product,
reviews.review_text: that being said, its nothing more than what you would expect as while. it doesn't exceed expectations compared to other high end products but it isnt a let down either. It looks very nice on tan skin because of the overall texture, but i recommend having a really good moisturizer or primer or both because like all powders, it can cling to dry skin. This looks pretty natural, overall. and it feel vry nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've kept this in my makeup bag for years. I started using it as a foundation but found my skin would flake in some spots. Now I use it as a setting powder over my BB cream. Adds just the perfect amount of finishing coverage. I do wish it held up against oil better as i have an oily chin and cheeks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started using bareMinerals when they were still called Bare Essentials. That was when I was about 15, and eight years later at 24 this is still what I run back to. It gives the best natural finish.  While I wouldn't pick this for a humid climate, I will always pick it for a drier climate. Example: I live in Arizona now, and the Pacific Northwest before that, and both of those climates work great. Living in a humid climate, however, like Florida, it gets cakey.

The Bareminerals Original Foundation is a wonderful product. it provides great coverage without looking cakey. I will apply this after concealer and I always get compliments on how flawless my face looks. I do not feel it on the skin and it has a slight luminosity which I love. This doesnot clog my pores and looks great for everyday. The one small downside is that it does have a slight flashback problem when taking photos. However, I will use this for everyday and on special occasions I can substitute it for something without SPF.

reviews.review_title: Not the best for acne hyperpigmentation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in hopes that it would cover my leftover acne marks (hyperpigmentation) but unfortunately it doesn't. I tried to build up the coverage, but it became cakey and my pores were magnified, especially on my nose! I followed the directions exactly - using a tiny amount and swirl, tap and buffing as much as I could but it didn't cover that well even when applied in several layers. I also noticed that this made my face itchy and started to break out from it. I will be returning this product.
This foundation was very cakey on my skin and broke me out really bad. Wouldnt try this again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've gone back to using this foundation several times. It's so easy and it feels better to me to wear powder in the summer. I find that this foundation goes VERY shiny on me and basically disappears by the end of the day. I feel like (on me) it's more similar to a tinted moisturizer with wear time and coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for oily skin, not in this dubai heat, accentuates my pores, but good to dust on the neck and ears only.

This was the first makeup product I ever used. As I grew older, I started using liquid foundation. One day I found this stashed in my makeup drawer and decided to use it again. First thought: WHY DID I EVER STOP USING THIS? I have oily skin and a bit of acne, and I REALLY needed a break from liquid foundations but I wasn't ready to leave the house completely bare. This gives me such a natural finish. I feel like a better version of myself. Perfect for every day use!

Generally speaking, I've never had great luck with powder foundation. Coverage is always  meh and if you have any fine lines it never fills it out and if anything enhances the look of lines. BareMinerals however, has truly got the formula right. Coverage is exceptional. I read a lot of gals saying it looks powdery on their faces but truth is is that you're not applying it right. The amount of makeup does not change the coverage, the brush does! Use a more dense, shorter brush for full coverage and a looser brush for light coverage. Never add more product than necessary because only then will you see the product sitting on the face. This foundation looks perfect every time and Is great for my combination skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had this applied at a Sephora makeover session and although it was a good color match if you have any facial hair at all this will just shine a spotlight on it. Plus it tends to settle in facial wrinkles. I have mature dry skin so overall not the product for me.
I love this product! Works especially well with my bareMinerals 'Seamless Shaping & Finishing Brush'. So happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can put this foundation on in less than 30 seconds. Its very natural and covers my freckles. One container lasts me about 6 months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great way to even out my skin, without feeling cakey.

I love the coverage of this makeup and it matches my skin tone almost perfectly (I am incredibly pale so its hard to find a good match). However, it really shows my gigantic pores so thats a major downfall but, I will be trying some pore-minimizing primers in the future to see if that will help. I'm willing to do almost anything to make this product work for my skin bc I really enjoy the benefits of powder foundations and I think this is a very nice product!

I have been using this foundation for many many years now. I've tried other foundations, but always went back to Minerals. I don't like the feel of liquid foundation...it feels too heavy and I don't want it clogging my pores, but this is not heavy at all and it won't clog your pores. You can add more if you want more coverage or just dust a little if you want just a little coverage and color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Using a good brush makes a difference. I use the one designed for the Ready compact Bare Minerals. Buildable coverage, natural-looking finish, and pretty good wear. SPF is a nice bonus. Make sure you get the right shade!
Love this! It's the bet I've had, and love how natural it looks!

I purchased this foundation with the intent of something to even out my skin tone just for everyday use. I applied layer after layer and didn't see any difference in my skin, and the powder started to look very cakey on my normal skin. It also clung to dry patches. I've tried and tried to make this work for my skin. Other mineral foundations just work better for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have had this sitting in my drawer for over a year now. I have always been on the hunt for the perfect foundation and i didn't think much of this product at all.  Finally one day, i decided i did not want to put foundation on, and busted this little gem out. I don't know why it took me so long to figure out this product is incredible. Very easy to apply, and it gives my skin such a natural glow without even using a highlighter. The best thing about it is i can wear it to work without looking too done up, but still look put together.  I have combination skin and this does not make me oily. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my go to for years. The coverage is great and can be as little or as much as you want. All you need is a good kabuki brush and you're set
I received a deluxe sample of the product. It works very well. However, when I get the full size, the effect is much worse.

reviews.review_title: NO breakouts, looks great ALL DAY!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
