reviews.review_text: I've been using liquid & creme compact foundation for at least 10 years now (I'm 46), never tried a mineral foundation because I just didn't think it would really matter, despite all of the infomercials I'd seen over the years showing how great they were! But after visiting a relative whose skin ALWAYS seems to look so perfect, she told me she ONLY uses mineral foundation and mineral veil, & said that if she DIDN'T use them, her skin would be shiny after a few hours. So I immediately bought the Bare Minerals starter kit, which includes the original foundation, mineral veil, cover up, and primer, and I LOVE IT SO MUCH!! It is VERY easy to use, takes LESS time than my old routine, and LOOKS JUST AS GOOD AT THE END OF THE DAY AS IT DID AT THE BEGINNING!! That is CRAZY-unbelievable! It definitely takes a little playing with (but not too much) to figure out your coverage (a TEENY TINY bit goes a LONG way!), but that's the same with ANY new foundation. AND I've had NO breakouts since I started using it!! Despite my age, I've continued to have breakouts periodically - nothing awful, and definitely worse during certain hormonal swings, but I pretty much ALWAYS have at least one blemish, usually several. But NOT since starting Bare Minerals! And NOTHING else in my routine has changed - NOTHING! So I completely credit BM for that! Summed up - EASY to use, GREAT coverage, lasts ALL DAY (with NO shine whatsoever, even when I spent HOURS in the hot sun with high humidity!!), and NO breakouts! Could I be MORE excited? Only if gravity reversed its effects on me! Otherwise, NO!

The coverage is light, obviously you won't get a full coverage with this. It's the one I would pick up for a lazy day when I don't feel like getting my hands dirty. Just apply with a brush and go natural. Doesn't make a big difference but it does even out your skin color if you did found your right color

Like many women, I've got troubled skin; acne and some scarring. I've tried quite a few liquid foundations over the years and find them to feel makeup'y. In Texas our summers are very humid and muggy. Heavy makeup and humid weather do not mix well >< Having tried Bare Minerals, I am instantly in love! The coverage is great and feels light and wonderful on my skin; like wearing nothing at all. I am now a huge fan!

Hard to find an exact match to my skin tone, takes a lot of product to reach medium coverage, will cover redness but not my horrible acne/post acne, for some reason makes my face itch, gets oily within a few hours therefore I look oily. I've tried their matte version as well, it's not any better, and I feel it's expensive for the amount they give you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this foundation. It's literally the only one that does not break me out. I highly recommend it! It doesn't last as long as other high-end foundations but it does look really nice and natural throughout the day. :)

This foundation is wonderful. Ever since I've started using this I feel like my skin is getting better and better. It's natural looking, and has good coverage. If liquid foundation isn't for you (like me) I would recommend this to anyone wanting to try powder foundation. Will use this until the day I die.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had used this foundation years ago and I loved it, so when I searched for a new foundation for the summer, I thought I'd give this a go again. I wish my experience was just as fabulous as the first time. First of all, this made me break out. I really rarely get pimples and my chin and jawline was covered in them. The coverage is much heavier than I remembered, even when using a very light hand, but, it didn't do much in covering up blemishes at all. And my skin looked like I had a pound of makeup on, this was really hard to blend well. I'm really sad these don't work on me anymore.

I love full coverage makeup. I personally apply Tarte liquid foundation with the Beauty Blender sponge and top off with the BareMinerals foundation to set. My makeup looks luminous and I get compliments on how great my 'skin' looks almost everyday. ;)

Lately I have been into the whole skin IQ idea so, i decided to put aside my beloved bb powder foundation and try this out! First off.. It was chalky. Like i have no way else to describe this!! It patched up in clumps no matter how light handed I was. I have combination skin and exfoliated before so something is up with the formula, speaking of which broke me out!! Not returning for the reason it works fine on my mom's skin however it just doesn't gel with mine:(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first powder foundation, and I'm glad I finally made the switch from liquids. This goes on feeling smooth and matte, like a second skin. It has a beautiful, natural looking finish that brightens my skin tone and minimizes imperfections. I adore how natural it looks and feels! I also love how little product is needed to create a nice finish - a small amount goes a long way with proper buffing. I have huge pores all over my face and this does a great job of hiding them, though acne still needs extra help from concealer. It also manages oily skin very well, with only minimal t-zone blotting needed by the end of the day. I didn't think anything could make me confident with my oily, acne-prone, porous-looking skin but this has done the impossible. Highly recommended!

I want to start out by saying I used this foundation for years. I loved it. I stopped using it last year because it wasn't working for my skin anymore. To be fair, my skin has also changed in the last year. It is more dry now. I am approaching 40 years old. I wasn't happy with the way my skin looked with this foundation anymore. I would say it didn't blend well on my skin anymore. I switched to a light-coverage liquid and haven't looked back. I don't want to say this is not a good product. I think it is great for sensitive and acne- prone skin. I have both. I think if your skin tends to be on the dry side this foundation may not be best for you.

I have a decent amount of acne and this foundation does a pretty good job at concealing it while still making my skin look natural and not further irritating my acne. It's light and doesn't make your skin oily. I was never really a make up girl, but this product has totally changed me! Am so glad I was introduced to this product!

reviews.review_title: Great Product, but not for oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for a month in the middle of the summer, and I found it had great coverage for my skin without leading to any breakouts. However, the product was not helpful in neutralizing my oily skin, and it would get shiny within the hour. As great as this product is, I would recommend the matte foundation for those with oily skin.
Its looks amazing when your first put it on but i find it makes my skin really oily through out the day and doesn't really seem to last. Good for pictures though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has great coverage, but it is annoying to use and shows all my blemishes on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have an olive skin town, i like a light coverage so that you can still see my real skin. It gave me exactly what i wanted with a no make up look and feel. I love the finish and the lasting power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Used to love this product. Now I hate it. The powder doesn't stay on my face and it just feels different than my previous purchase. I asked a Sephora employee and she told me they changed their formulas. ugh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin with an incredibly greasy t-zone, and this stuff works miracles for me. It mattifies my oily spots, covers up any redness or blemishes, and provides a nice, light base for the rest of my makeup. I don't wear foundation at all because I hate the way it looks on my face, but I love BareMinerals foundation because you can barely tell you're wearing any makeup! You can't feel it on your face like you usually can with typical foundation, but blurs imperfections just as effectively as liquid foundation in my opinion. Perfect for those who want light coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this powder foundation for years and years now, and whenever I try to branch out and buy another product, I go right back to this one. It's flawless and the even the original (non matte version) doesn't look greasy and I get asked by everyone how is my skin so perfect, and whenever I reply that I'm using bareminerals powder they don't believe there's anything really on. Also the fact that it's very natural makes it so I don't break out :) Pat on a little bit of concealer on any spots you have and then gently powder away with this baby all over your face and you're ready!

Love this foundation! It gives you a very natural dewey look, only criticism I have is that it doesn't last all day I find that by the end of the day it has flaked off quite a bit. Other than that lovely makeup, my main foundation for 3 years

I feel that those who give a negative review on this product perhaps have not been using it properly. You are suppose to use a little at a time and build it up. The buffing motion makes it so natural and makes the pores appear smaller. I switched to Bare Minerals when i broke out once and it gave such a healthy look to my skin! I cannot rave enough about this!
Definitely not for dry skin.  I have fair, neutral toned skin and this stuff was way too yellow. It made me look ill.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't provide as much coverage as I wanted it to. Have since found powder foundations that I like a lot more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE IT  i was looking for a powder foundation for summer and I have super combination skin meaning my skin is either SUPER dry and super oily skin on my t-zone  When I first bought this foundation for i was worry is going to make my skin super dry and show my flaky skin.... but i was wrong it goes on my skin soooo smooth  the only problem is that if you want a full coverage you have to build on it but if you want a natural finish this is perfect for you

I absolutely love bareMineral foundation powders. I have very sensitive combination skin with a lot of redness. I like to use the prime time primer then apply maybelline dream pure BB cream with my hands under the bareMinerals foundation powders to get a little fuller coverage to cover my redness. I first buff the original powder all over my face because I love the glow that it gives. I personally do not find it to be shimmery at all. It just gives a youthful glow to your skin. It is also weightless and feels like you are not wearing any makeup at all. I then like to use the matte powder on the oily areas of my face like my chin and around my nose. The matte also works great as a concealer and to cover dark under eye circles if used with a concealer brush. I also use the bareMinerals warmth, blush, and mineral veil to finish the look. This makeup stays on all day long and I have really put it to the test with this hot humid Louisiana weather!

I got a sample pack from my future mother-in-law for Christmas, and loved it! It's June and I'm still not done with the sample, and I've already purchased the full container. It's exactly what I needed-I have acne and it covers blemishes wonderfully. In the summer it's perfect because it doesn't run off and doesn't give you a shiny gross look. I guess I've never noticed a shimmer, but so many reviews mention that. I tried a airbrush trial and decided that this was the makeup I wanted to wear for my wedding (also hated the eyes she did for me, and I want to look like myself on the big day). A little pricier than what I used to use, but it's totally worth every cent.  Another bare minerals product I recommend is the blush. Stays on as well as the powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is one of very few that does not feel weighty on my skin. It feels and looks as though there is no make up on my face at all and yet it helps to make my skin tone more even and natural.

The coverage with this is great and buildable. Pros: a little goes a long way. Cons: its sparkly. (Very noticeable under eye areas on cheeks) That could be a pro for some, but I like my coverage matte. Great product though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. Perfect for covering redness but sheer enough to look natural. I have a little bit of dry flaky skin on my cheeks sometimes and this foundation doesn't make it look caky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've gone through so many foundations over the years to find something that would work for my oily, acne prone skin. I always overlooked this one because I figured a powder wouldn't have the coverage I wanted. I eventually got a sample and tried it and was amazed. It has the same coverage as my thick liquid foundations except I feel like I'm not wearing makeup. My skin is less oily and I don't break out as much. I love this foundation.

My skin is oily and acne skin. My skin is very easy to get break out. But now, everything are fine with bare minerals products. No more horrible break out! And it has physical sunblock ingredients. Protect my skin sways from the sun damage. I love it! U better try it, if you have acne problem. And good coverage. I always use it with bare minerals concealer and BB primer.

This foundation is very hard to like. I find it hard to make it stay on, even with many different primers tried under the foundation. It also sticks to dry spots and makes it more visible. However, it adds a small sparkle to your face, and it does hide blemishes well when it stays on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin tone is a little pink compared to most people and this is the only thing that works really well with my skin tone. It's super light and provides hours of great coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm asian, yellow under-toned, oily combo skin. I recently recovered from some severe cystic acne which left scarring all over my face. I was looking for something that would cover my skin but still let it breath, something that wouldn't break me out and that matched my very yellow toned asian skin. I've tried a bunch of powdered foundation and all of which gave me a very grey finish. This was godsend. I tried it on at my local sephora after reading all the good reviews. The color match was perfect. It hasn't broken me out yet. I do have to touch up 1-2 times throughout the day b/c my skin is very oily. But overall, I'm so happy. Thank you guys for the recommendation.
I have used this product for more than 9 years and I refuse to use any other.

This made my skin look a million times worse than wearing nothing at all. It made my pores absolutely huge looking. If you have visible pores at all this makeup will magnify them. It's also cakey and clings to dry spots. Horrible stuff! I seriously can't believe the reviews are so good.
Awesome for sensitive skin! Big love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start off by saying I've never written a review before because I've never felt compelled to I guess...but this foundation is amazing! I feel like I'm not wearing anything at all yet it still gives a luminosity (not like a hey, I'm greasy what's up but a good amount of luminosity) and a good coverage (it's definitely light-medium but buildable). I have pretty good skin but naturally red cheeks and this covers that and lasts ALL day. I'm not kidding it's amazing. I am oily through the t-zone and most foundations break up on me a few hours after putting them on (even with a primer and powder and all that jazz). This one however doesn't break up or settle into fine lines or any of that. I'm seriously in love with this stuff! I also would like to add that I am very fair. In this I went with the shade fairly light and I don't think it looks orange or yellow or any of that. Try it if you're contemplating it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It is easy to use and has an SPF so you feel good about using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using bare minerals for several years and absolute love it. It has improved my skin so much. Great coverage and never cakey or greasy and last ALL day.

I was using a powder that I thought was a little too heavy and slightly cakey, so I thought I would switch to the BareMinerals since it seems like it is supposed to be natural looking. Wrong!!! It left my face cakey and greasy. It fell right into fine lines. I had to return it. I washed it off of my face immediately and went back to my old face powder, as reluctant as I was to do it. This wasn't even good enough to substitute for something I don't like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously cannot live without my bareMinerals foundation. I've tried other foundations and they have all made me disappointed - until I found bareMinerals. Great for all skin types and all seasons - flawless, light coverage. Definitely recommend!

I'm a fan of this foundation but I swear the colors are off a bit but it could be just me . The colors I had seem to be too dark for my complexion I'm going to try one more shade and hopefully this one will work out . It might be because of people in sephora is not correctly matching me so we will see

reviews.review_title: Please Be Aware of the Color Selection
reviews.review_text: This foundation was so nice. I loved the finish of it -- glowy and healthy. It was soft, comfortable, and blurred imperfections. It was so close to being my holy grail foundation. BUT! The shades are so off. The fairest color is much too dark and has a very strong pink undertone. I later learned that almost all bareMinerals colors (from fair to deep) are famous for being either much too yellow or much too pink; very few are truly neutral. By the way, the company's foundations are generally not fair-skin friendly. And, unfortunately, bareMinerals fell into the classic mistake of assuming that the fairest people have pink undertones. PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE update your foundation line to include more shades and more universal undertones.  Bottom line: if you have strong yellow or pink undertones in your skin, this may just be perfect for you, but definitely head to your nearest retailer and test it out first.

The first time I used bare minerals, I fell in love. It's so light, you don't even know you're wearing anything on your face. I've fallen asleep with it still on my face a few times lol. It doesn't drag my skin down or irritate it like the other stuff. Love this and will continue to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so glad I took the time to fool around with this at Sephora's a few years ago. Although I don't always use it as a foundation, it is a wonderful fabulous concealer. My first purchase came with a concealer brush. I just went on vacation and could not believe I broke out right before I left. After I put my liquid HD foundation on I patted a spot with this and it disappeared. I don't have experience with concealers but I can't imagine something working better than this. Of course it is a great foundation. You really do have to start off very light and build. Be careful because if you have very dry skin it's not going to work well. Definitely use a moisturizer and their primer is good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have struggled with extremely breakout-prone skin for my entire life. For almost ten years, I was eager to try BareMinerals foundation and other products, but never got around to doing so. I finally purchased a kit in store, anticipating the best. I will agree that it does supply good coverage while transforming from a powder to a more velvety texture. However, this product not only broke me out with horrible blackheads and whiteheads but also did nothing for shine control. I have used every bit of the product to allow my skin to adjust and still breakout. L'Oreal makes a similar product that is half the price and suits my skin tone much better. I will not purchase or recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use strictly drug store products, until my skin started to become very sensitive. I went to a dermatologist, who recommended the BM line. At first, I tried the BM ready foundation. It applied very cakey, and clinged to my dry spots. I did not want to lose faith in this line, so I tried the original foundation.  Luckily this was around the holiday season, so I bought the BM gift set. Within the first day of trying this foundation, I received so many compliments. People kept pointing out my beautiful, glowing skin. Even strangers approach me to compliment my skin sometimes. I have noticed little to no breakouts nowadays.  It does not provide full coverage, but it provides enough to dim hyperpigmentation/ dark spots. Without a setting powder, it provides a dewy finish on my face. I usually set it with a translucent powder.  I would recommend this to ANYONE, especially those with sensitive skin. It's definitely one of my holy-grails.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a fan of bareMinerals for years and always seem to venture back to it. I think its great and has a good range of shades which is rare for most brands. The product is great for touch ups onto of other foundations as well as wearing it on it's own. It helps even out my redness with such a small amount and last a very long time.

It is rather difficult to find foundation fair enough to look natural on me, firstly. Also, my skin is very sensitive and foundation tends to break my skin out. I was astounded by this. It looks natural, lasts all day in any weather... It's as if it becomes part of the skin because through the flawless day, it rubs off on nothing yet doesn't clog pores or irritate thy skin.

This powder foundation is the best foundation I've had for my oily skin. It covers the blemishes and you don't need to use concealer anymore. It suits with my skin color too! I definitely recommend this!

This foundation stays on well, and looks very beautiful when I first put it on (if I use a little). It covers blemishes and dark circles so well I don't need a concealer. This is my go-to travel foundation. When I use a normal amount it is easy to see the powder on my face, and does not look natural. Later in the day when my nose gets oily, it wipes off the foundation where my pores are. I would definitely recommend a smoothing primer under it.
It goes great with my skin color like no other powder foundation and does not cause me to breakout. One container lasts me a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This covers and blends like an angel! I'm experimenting with new powders right now but would go back to this in a heartbeat as it never let me down. Only thing it loses a star for is that it does not hold oil back on really oily skin. May need to set it with primer.

I've been using the bareMinerals Original Foundation for over 5 years and it will always be a go-to of mine for everyday makeup! I love the powder foundation because when you have a big zit or some skin discoloration, the coverage is buildable and can easily cover those problem spots. However, the powder is also great for just dusting on your face to even out skin tone/texture and giving your skin more of a naturally flawless look. My only negative with the product (as with many foundations) is that it does tend to settle into extra dry areas, but I've easily remedied that problem with either a primer or a light coat of moisturizer before applying the makeup. Great product!

I have very very pale skin and was looking for a good under eye concealer. Tried this since it got such great reviews. This does provide good coverage however the lightest shade is still orange on my skin (no matter how much I blended).  Please make a lighter shade for the very pale girls!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this powder a lot! I use it with the bareMinerals liquid foundation and it tops it off perfectly. If you're going for a more natural look however, I do suggest using a thinner powder, for this one definitely does not make you look makeup-free. That isn't always a big issue for me and I still use it every day. Highly recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation and will never change. I have never had a problem with it appearing Cakey like some reviewers say. I do know people with oily skin who don't like it though, so perhaps it only works on dry and neutral skin? I sometimes wear it on top of the Benefit Porefessional primer when my skin is particularly uneven, but generally I wear this and mineral veil overtop and it's perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Someone else mentioned in a review how this stuff seemed to make their skin oilier, and that's how I feel. It's very strange. I like how it goes on. It's really easy and fast, especially if it's one of those days when I'm running late or do't want to even bother with concealer underneath this. I'll just put this stuff on, and I'm good to go- it covers up most, if not all, of my skin imperfections. BUT... my skin gets oilier quicker than it does with other face makeup. I find myself needing to use paper blotters at least 2 at time almost every hour. I still like the product, and I may buy the full size in the future, but I hate that it makes my skin oilier. I definitely recommend that anyone try a sample if it's offered- it's a great value. I got a full week of daily wear our of mine. I chose the shade 'fairly light' because I have very fair to fair skin, but it was a tad too dark. It also has a bit of shimmer in it that I wasn't expecting, but it reflected light nicely and gave me a little glow, which is never a bad thing!

I have been using this product for years and I will never use anything else. I first start with the bareMinerals liquid foundation (which is also a must have) and finish off my look with this powder. The coverage is great and does not make you look cakey. I have problem skin and this powder has helped my skin tremendously and not to mention is has spf in it! I get so many compliments on the way my skin looks and I have this product to thank for it, you have to have it!

I have a really hard time believing that people are giving 5 star ratings unbiasedly. I think people are buying this already thinking it's amazing, and then trying it on and are unable to see how poor of a product it is. First, it's cakey. I don't wear foundation, just a loose powder to control oil, but since people said this looks so natural I thought I would try it out. Its not natural, it looks cakey and obvious on the skin. I know my application technique was fine, I watched every video talking about how you need to buff lots, use small amounts and build up coverage, make sure to swirl 5-7 seconds in the lid, nothing worked. It still looks like you're wearing foundation. It's not a miracle powder. I can't really tell you how long it wears, because I never got out more than a few minutes before realizing how awful this stuff is and took it off. Maybe you'll like it if you're already used to your skin looking like it's wearing heavy foundation (with poor coverage), but even then, I'm sure there are better quality alternatives.

Got a free sample with an online purchase. So far I like it! I've been searching for an easy and light foundation for my combination skin, with a few breakouts here and there. I feel like this gives me the coverage I'm looking for without having to spend a lot of time applying/blending. It can get cakey if you use too much, so start light! Picked the color using the descriptions and it matches perfectly. Will probably be purchasing the full size.
Product looked extremely cakey even with the tiniest bit applied. Broke up during the day and made me SUPER oily. Not a fan

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Feels like nothing on, light to medium coverage, perfect color match, and I'm getting the best (multiple) foundation compliments ever: What makeup? You're wearing makeup? I don't see anything but your skin looks smooth and healthy. Even my husband, who sees me up close every day and doesn't like makeup didn't know for days until I told him. That's one of the 2 the most important things I want from a foundation. The other is that it covers pink/red rosacea splotches and doesn't irritate. (Ok that's 3).

I have never been able to wear foundation, no matter what i tried my skin broke out (pimples, blackheads etc..) This product does not make me break out, gives a natural finish and you don't need a lot to even out your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was given a sample of the matte version in medium beige and loved it so I decided to do a little research. I have dry - normal skin so I went into a Sephora and decided to give the original a try. I am glad I did!!! I was matched with Light (I am custard in NARS creamy concealer). This foundation is amazing. I just needed something to make my skin tone more even (due to redness around the nose and cheeks) - and this does exactly that. It also wears great throughout the day and gives a flawless glow. I would say the coverage is medium. I am so happy with this product. I have always been looking for something that does exactly what this foundation does. Thank you BM!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried multiple other foundations to see if there was anything better than BareMinerals and I'm back to buying this. I don't need a lot of coverage- just enough to even out my complexion and this does the trick. Skin doesn't look cakey and it still looks like there's a glow with this foundation- best foundation for my skin out there and its nice that it's all natural!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was able to get a sample of this product. I normally use Tarte, Nars,and amazing cosmetics or Tarte finishing powder. The lightest shade of bare minerals was dark on my fair skin. The coverage was not flawless. The product seemed heavy, pores were clearly visible,and appearance was not natural. I will not be switching my wonderful products.
I love this stuff, great coverage and all but my only problem is I don't know how to get it on to my brush! I just dump some in the lid then do it from there lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Bare Minerals Foundation for many years now, and I really prefer it as my foundation layer to anything liquid or mousse. The powder formula does a great job of mattefying your skin and controlling shine. I don't like thick or heavy coverage because my skin is pretty light and I don't need it, but if you're looking for something to create heavy coverage, this isn't it. This will create an even base layer with light coverage.

I have been using this product now for years, and I love it! I am 50-ish, still have break-out prone (but gracefully aging...) skin. I also live in the humid south, and this product wears so well without looking or feeling heavy, greasy or slimy. I tried the matte version once, but definitely prefer the original! (The matte tended to yellow on my face.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: All the liquid foundations I have tried all turn cakey on me due to my dry skin. This however doesn't! It lasts throughout the day fairly well without powder. Powder on really helps in sealing it in place. It does a light- medium coverage. I would recommend it if you have just some spots you want to cover. However, if you're looking for a full coverage foundation I wouldn't recommend this one. I have tried building coverage but my red hyper pigmentation spots do still slightly show. I docked it a star due to powder's inconvenient packaging. You do lose product inevitably when you swirl your brush through it. In addition, the packaging isn't that great. You have to be careful with the lid and closing it or product will fall out once you open it again. Overall I am pleased with it. It does a good job on giving a very natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I couldn't get it out of the packaging and then it all clumped on my brush and it dried out my skin. Horrible.
Wonderful! Skin looks better without makeup after using this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a die hard Dinair airbrush foundation user (which is not sold on the site) But recently decided to try this stuff out since it was a free sample; and I fell in love with it, I certainly plan to get more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this foundation for the last 8-9 years and I love it! I sometimes try new foundations but I always end with going back to bareMinerals mineral foundation. It gives me a great coverage throughout the day and it last pretty good. I love how it blends in very natural in my skin and it does not look like I am wearing make-up. I also love how easy it is to apply! I can never stop using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it love it love it. Easy to use, very light and looks natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin and bareMinerals is my go to foundation. Its got the coverage you want without being too heavy or cakey. It's perfect at containing shine or oil during the day as well. Also, the brushes make it so easy to appy the perfect amount based on what your skin is throwing at you that day! Once I started using it, I will never go back. I love it!

It goes on so smooth it makes me feel so good about myself. It hides a lot of things on your face you don't want to be seen. I just love it . it is very light and soft and it feels like you don't have anything on your face that is why I like I so much

I absolutely love this foundation. If you need full coverage then this may not be for you. I'm 48 and have no scars or spits so it's perfect for me and lasts way into the night. Been using more than 10 years!!
Doesn't get any better than this foundation, I wear it in the Warm Tan to look naturally tanned and it lasts through literally everything, been using for almost a decade :) <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bareminerals has been a godsend for me. I moved from a very hot and humid place to a very cold and dry one, and my sensitive skin cracked and became very prone to redness, dryness, acne and dermatitis. I switched my face routine from scented acne scrubs and thick liquid makeup to bareminerals and am loving the difference! It is soft and doesn't aggravate any of the skin issues i'm dealing with, and provides great coverage to boost my confidence. Teamed with a ph balancing facewash, basic moisturiser and topical antibiotics my skin is well on the way to recovery. I adore this makeup and feel my skin being a lot healthier wearing it :) Won't ever go back to any other pore clogging makeup again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this original foundation for the last 10 years. Love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this mineral foundation for the day. I used to use this foundation all the time in college but for the past few years I've ventured out and fell in love with the Laura Mercier mineral foundation. Although I do love both, I'm starting to like the bareMineral one slightly more because they have a wider range of colors. I also like using mineral foundation to set my night foundation when I go out. A great product with great coverage and I definitely plan to repurchase it when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for a couple of years now and I still love it. It's kind of pricey but will last me 6-8 months. This foundation provides great coverage that lasts all day!

Doesn't really cover the age spots too well, but doesn't feel like full foundation either (which I really appreciate). I will keep looking. Also, very shiny on my face. Prefer the matte better, but still doesn't stop the oil in my t-zone.
This works so great for my dry, sensitive skin! I've been using this for 8+ years. It lasts a long time. I purchase it maybe once year.

reviews.review_title: This is grown woman full coverage
reviews.review_text: This is my everyday make-up. Whether I'm going for a sheer, soft glow or flawless full coverage, this is the only make-up I need. The application is so creamy and finish; soft and dewy. Such a lightweight formula, one layer is all you need. Finish this look worth a quick dust over of their finishing powder and let the compliments ensue. This is my Mother of twins and still rocking it, big-girl foundation. A must in my make-up bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for almost a year now and I have to say that I absolutely love it! The only complaint that I would have is that it doesn't last as long as other foundations but I mean it's not good for your skin anyways. I love that it isn't thick and that your skin peaks through. It looks natural but can also have a full coverage effect. I absolutely love it!
This is such a great powder! It doesn't leave me looking powdery or completely matte and gives nice natural coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this foundation after debating about it for the looongest time. I had the bareskin already after being swayed by a Sephora assistant but I didn't like it. The coverage is amazing and makes all my acne scars disappear.I love how it feels like nothing's there. The only problem I have is that it seems to wear off during the day. I'll try it with a primer.
I've been looking for a good natural looking foundation for a while. I have tried both liquid and powder and neither worked for me. BB
Love this foundation. Perfect amount of coverage, easy to use. I've tried many other products, but find myself going back to bareMinerals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for 6-8 years. It is never clumpy, evens skin tone, and is super light. The SPF is an added bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is great for my skin type, and it has great coverage. Make sure you get a bareminerals brush because it does not apply well with other brushes.

I have very oily skin and for some reason I always used liquid foundation which made my skin break out so much. I heard excellent reviews about BareMinerals so I decided to give it a shot. I bought a starter pack and it truly is amazing. I love it and will never use another foundation ever again. It's well worth the money and the concealer woks so good too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this foundation. I never wore foundation, but decided to try this because I found my combination skin was becoming shiny and a bit oily. This foundation is natural-looking, makes my skin touchable and soft, and settles beautifully into my pores. I also tried Bareminerals Ready Foundation, but keep coming back to this one. The Ready Foundation didn't blend as well, and the compact became dry and crumbly after maybe a month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I keep coming back to the Original Foundation by Bare Minerals. Every time I waiver, meaning trying their liquid or ReadyMade, I come back to the basics. The ReadyMade products 100% of the time crumble and break before I am halfway through the product - and this product stays in a drawer -not like I am tossing it around! The liquid, well, just too oily for me. So, original, you will always have me as a customer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't like matte finish because I have dry skin. Although it is a mineral foundation in a powder form, It doesn't dry out my skin and I am happy that it also looks dewy and sheer. But I don't like that the package gets dirty easily!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had been hearing great things about bareMinerals and mineral makeup in general for a long time and I am not disappointed with this product! I don't wear foundation at all - if anything I'll have some concealer to cover up small blemishes. I impulsively bought a blush and realized it would only show up if I had even skin tone, so I took the plunge and got this in Fairly Light. I kept tapping and tapping so only little bits of power would come out and I wasn't sure if I was even getting any on. I could see a slight difference after applying it - most of the redness from my cheeks were gone. After studying myself in the mirror for a while, I realized my skin tone was more even. Later that night when I took it all off I was so shocked to see all the color on my cotton pads! I need to do some more experimenting to see if I can forego concealer and just use this - so far I'm very impressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how fast, easy and buildable the minerals are and it give you a beautiful look with a little bit of glow. If you are not into foundation, this is a great choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was doubtful that mineral makeup could really cover anything, but it does. In fact, it seems to cover blemishes better than liquid foundations. However, I have noticed a slightly greasy look after a while of having it on. I didn't set it, though, so perhaps that is why. Photographs beautifully. Praying it works out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product provides fantastic coverage and looks so natural. My problem is that my daughter has moved back in and she loves my Bare Minerals too!

I have been using Bare Minerals foundation for many years, and now my daughter loves it as well. It is perfect for sensitive skin, including acne and rosacea. It provides excellent coverage, and I love that it doubles as a sunscreen! All other sunscreens cause awful breakouts and I don't know what I would do without this stuff!

reviews.review_title: Excellent for sensitive and dry-combo skin!
reviews.review_text: I break out very easily and mineral make-up is my best-friend. I also have mostly dry skin but oily forehead, normal nose... (i know weird). This gives a very natural glow to the face and to a certain extent does control the oil on my forehead. Granted, I'm not excessively oily on the forehead, so if you're oil-zones aren't excessively oily, then you should definitely try this out! This does not break me out, gives a beautiful glow to the face, and not drying at all. This is extremely versatile, you can make it a light to full coverage. It last for the whole day for me, and I've even slept with it on in the library hahaha. I looked great waking up hahaha Usually I like to give 2 light layers all over my face, then take a small brush and spot conceal with the foundation. I have ALOT of acne scars and this covers them pretty decently. I don't always conceal with this because it is time consuming but it is doable. This product definitely has a learning curve to it, so just practice putting it on and also, a little goes a long way. Tap a little amount into the cap, swirl your brush in, tap the excess and buff into the skin. Do light layers! Do not cake it on in one spot because it will look cakey like that. (It happened to me hahaha) The key to this product is light and multiple layers.

I got BareMinerals after I had an allergic reaction to a foundation I was using, and I have to say that I was pretty impressed. For being a powder it didn't leave my face white, powdery looking, or have a heavy makeup feeling, and has sheer coverage. Downside, my skin is oily and left it looking super shiny in less than 3 hours. I tried the Matte foundation too and same thing. Def don't recommend if you have oily skin like me, I ended up looking like a grease ball. Don't think I'll be trying this foundation again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product for a few years now and still like it. My dermatologist was happy when I said this is the makeup I used. Win, win.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first, I loved this foundation because I thought it made my skin look flawless. However, through out the day, my face would get fairly oily, and the powder made my skin look cakey, especially in my T-zone. It looks great for short periods of time, but needs to be touched up often. So, if you have tons of times throughout the day, I would say go for it! Otherwise, I would look for something less demanding.

I never write reviews... I've been eyeing this foundation for awhile now and decided to bite the bullet and get it. First off.. I've always had pretty oily skin but just recently since I gave birth to my daughter my skin has become impossible to work with... All the liquid foundations I've tried ( and I've tried tons!) go on very flaky and separate, then a couple hours in just wears right off in spots... Not to mention falls into all my creases and pores, making my skin look very dry and a lot older then it is. I was told this wouldn't work that great for me because my skin can be a bit dry but also oily at the same time... Well I tried it anyway... It's amAzing! It goes on so nicely doesn't seep into my fine lines or pores. My skin looks flawless! Finally! And my husband... Is always commenting on how great my skin looks! I love how easy this stuff is to use. I can take it anywhere and wear it anywhere, like at the gym when I don't wear much make up other then just this on my face! Makes my face look great. I also use it as a concealer with a concealer brush and just dab it on to any problem spots. It has awesome coverage! Finally found my perfect foundation!

I was color matched with this foundation in fairly medium at Sephora. I'm on the Acne.Org regimen for acne, so my skin can be pretty bad and very dry. It was so funny--my sales lady looked horrified and said that my skin was oh-so-dry and powder foundation would look awful. She decided to try this BM foundation on half my face, and Bareskin on the other. She buffed Bareskin into my cheeks and go-hummed about how my skin wouldn't look flawless sine it was so dry. Then she buffed on the powder and her jaw dropped- the powder buffs in like a cream and didn't cling to dry patches at all!! The side with Bareskin looked cakey, awkward, and only light coverage at best...but the BM foundation side was absolutely flawless. This is a combination skinned girl's dream! It soaks up oil from my oily T-Zone and doesn't cling to flakes on my jawline, so I'm left with beautiful natural skin. Super light, next to no transfer, and stays on all day. I use ELF hydrating primer and their airbrush kabuki brush for medium to full coverage with no shine, flakes, or spots--just glowy awesome skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for 7 years. I do not like how it feels itchy in the summer when I'm sweating on my walk to work but I try other products and keep going back to this. It goes on quick. It stays on. It absorbs oil as my face get a tiny bit oily towards the end of a day. The color matches my face well and it gives me a pulled together professional look with out being a mask of makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very first powder foundation. It does it's a little bit orange but you can work with it.

Bare Minerals foundation was the first I had ever used. It seemed like a good idea- mostly natural, you could supposedly sleep in it- that was almost ten years ago. I thought I would give it another shot because I'm trying to purge my beauty products with bad chemicals to benefit my skin with more natural products. Every time I've used this it makes my skin feel itchy and turn red... Almost like an allergic reaction... Even after I use all natural face wash and moisturizer. This is really disappointing because I want to love BM but I don't think they are quite as good as they used to be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so disappointed with this product... This foundation left my skin feeling greasy and cakey after only three hours of initial application. I purchased the primer for oily skin, the foundation, as well as the brush and wanted to love it so much. It gave me very little coverage and it made my skin look so washed out. I have returned the product and will definitely not buy any other bareMinerals product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have heard about this product for the longest time, growing up with my older sisters using it. I always thought this was just some miracle foundation! I have acne prone skin, unlike my sisters. But I decided to try this anyway. I have normal to dry skin, and my face is usually really red. For me this offered barely any coverage, and just made me look so dry. I really wanted to love this product since everyone else I know does, but it wasn't for me..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that they have a yellow tone foundation. I've always struggled with finding a shade and this is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of Arbonne's mineral foundation, but it is double the cost of this product. I love the way it glides on my skin. It is very simple to apply and with the original formula, you get this sheen or glow that is really nice. The color does not fade and does not change during the course of the day. I used to be a liquid girl because I liked the coverage it gave. This product provides that coverage without the greasiness of a liquid and it is not as messy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have seen the infomercials on bare minerals for years and i always wanted to try it. I'm normally a liquid kinda gal and there are only a few that i love. I hate powders but a few weeks ago i decided  what the hay springs right around the corner and its gonna start getting warmer and i really don't want to sweat all my foundation off,so i bought the starter kit and WOW!!!!!! I absolutely LOVE this stuff!! It stays on all day with the face primer and still looks good right before bed and i normally break out like a teenage girl,I'm 30 btw, and i haven't had any really bad breakouts since using this. I def recommend this to anyone who loves powder!! The brush it came with though,its ok,not great but ok. it kinda sheds.

I've been using this foundation for years. Last year, I attempted switching to a Clinique foundation to switch things up and after a month came right back to this stuff. It's not cakey, yet still gives you a nice medium coverage. I use Stila One Step Color Correct as a primer and it works perfectly with this makeup. Use the Sephora Classic Multitasker Powder Brush #45 with this foundation. It is much better than the Bare Minerals powder brush.

Holy grail! I absolutely love this! i have used this product since 2006 a friend recommended this to me. I have acne prone skin and this definitely helped with my acne.. Not only did it help my skin but it also looks flawless! Beautiful finish! I have tried so many different foundations both high end and drug store and sadly they all make me break out. I always come back to this foundation!!! No matter how many different ones I try or how expensive they are this is always what I go back to nothing compares! Definitely recommend this product especially if u have acne prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after not liking the feel of liquid foundations, yet I was super disappointed. I journeyed to the distant Sephora and was skin matched yet when I wore it at home my face was splotchy with orange. I have fair skin and it's very noticeable, and no matter how many times I tried to apply it (after showering the internet) I continuously had heavy skin.

I SO wanted to love this. I used an entire Jar out of the sample set just to give it a fair trial. I think it's a great product for younger girls. I am in my mid-thirties and it settles into every fine line and crease despite numerous application techniques. So disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for several years... I love the way it feels on my face. It gives nice coverage without looking cakey.
Left my skin looking very cakey and super oily . Stopped using it after I was able to buy something better. Would not recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my daily foundation. I hate wearing foundations that are extremely high coverage and thick. I like the fact that it feels and looks as though I am not wearing makeup. It does have build-able coverage so I can control the amount of makeup I am wearing. For a night time look, I just put more powder on. I have tried other mineral powders and the consistency cannot beat bareMinerals' creamy texture, I do notice that the powder tends to settle in the fine lines near my eyes, accentuating my wrinkles, so I don't use this on any place that may have fine lines or wrinkles. I don't want to look older! I use a separate concealer for those areas. I have been using this since my early 20's (I am now 27) and always come back to this foundation.

More natural looking and easier to blend blush, highlighter, and bronzer over than liquid or cream foundation. You don't need a setting powder and it can be full coverage of you put enough on (like I do). It actually looks best after a few hours and it lasts all day

I was hopeful about this product because of the great reviews. The seldom times I do a full face, I usually wear a pretty light coverage CoverGirl mineral powder foundation just to get a more even skin tone, but this time I wanted to try something a little more professional. I also purchased the bareMinerals Precision Face Brush to use with it.  Okay, as for this bareMinerals powder, I am thoroughly dissatisfied. The color matching was fine (Fairly Light for me), but it really does cling to any slightly different texture spot on your skin, so even though the color matches you can still plainly see (and feel) the powder on your skin. ALSO--it positively BURIES itself in your pores. I wore this yesterday and I washed my face with my normal makeup remover--it was not able get this powder out of my pores.  I've never had problems with acne and my skin isn't particularly sensitive to makeup, but today I woke up with four large angry zits in different areas of my face and my entire forehead is bumpy with clogged pores. I've never had this happen using any other makeup. Nothing in my routine was different besides wearing this foundation so I have no doubts that it is to blame. Obviously, I am incredibly non-plussed with their promise that it improves the look of your skin over time. What, does it have to get worse before it gets better? No thanks.  TL;DR--be wary of this foundation, it could clog your pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for years, it has such a nice finish, and people always complement my skin even though I don't have great skin. I guess it looks like I do with this foundation! Buildable coverage, and it looks great over the new tinted hydrating gel they have. It feels super lightweight and doesn't cause my skin to break out or dry out like most other foundations. For longer wear, definitely use a primer.
Great product. Have been wearing this since 2009! I keep trying other foundations but alas, i can't help but come back to this one. Makes you look radiant. Get compliments all the time.
Used to use it on its own as a foundation but now I love it as a setting powder!

I love this foundation. I have been searching for years for a quick easy and flawless foundation that doesn't cake or look like I'm wearing a ton of foundation. I love this stuff! It is so fast on the morning when your getting ready for work and I love how it feels all day. Worth the money!

Granted, it's natural looking but not good enough for when you want a full coverage look unless you spend your money on the other products that help make it full coverage. Maybe useful when you wanna even out your skin but for that you can use their liquid or pressed powder foundation without needing to use so much product to achieve it.

Goes on great, very light weight, and if you have the right color you could never tell you have makeup on. I recommend you getting your skin matched at a Sephora store so you get the best color for your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mineral foundation goes on beautifully and feels like I am wearing no makeup at all. I love that it contains sunscreen. There are lots of color choices, so I had no trouble finding one that looks good with my pink undertones. This is now my favorite foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have terrible acne and scars this powder is very gentle. because I have so many scars and it works well I give it 5 stars. even though its not full coverage it covers redness just fine without concealer which makes it a great by. I purchase this in the starter kit very please I use this with lorac primer.also i like how easy it washes off and you dont feel greasy after long wear.
It has good coverage but I found that it left me looking really cakey which is not what I was expecting from this product

I am a makeup guru, but still want my skin to look natural and not cakey. This is very pleasant on my skin, light, and great coverage. I dont use concealer or anything other than primer. I only use primer (porefessional) to minimize my pores then i apply this and sometimes i like just a little sometimes i build it up. It always looks wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gives great coverage. Have an employee help you pick the best shade for your skin. TIP: I apply it with my fingers to the spots that need covering - not all over my face. This has proved to be the best method for me.

This stuff is amazing! It has great coverage, gives a flawless look and also helps a lot with the shine I get on my tzone. Great product and wish I would've tried this stuff out a lot sooner, definitely was missing out. I highly recommend!

This foundation is perfect for my skin. I have sensitive skin and tend to break out very easily. This foundation lets your skin breathe, and looks so natural. This has buildable coverage. You can always add more for more coverage. I also feel it does not need touch ups throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is AMAZING. Clean coverage and a beautiful finish. I love that it makes my skin appear brighter and its overall a good product. Combined with the bareMinerals concealer you have an amazing combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone has always told me how great this product is and I didn't give into the hype until recently which I consider to be one of the biggest beauty mistakes of my life seeing as I could have had flawless looking skin for all of these years. It feels very light on the face, but gives great coverage. It lasts all day and my acne-prone skin doesn't have any issues with it. I like the original finish with my skin type as opposed to the matte because it gives more of a glow to the skin, but that is really a personal preference. I'm extremely fair and always need the lightest shade available of foundation and usually they wash me out even more, but this one adds a very nice glow. I will continue to buy this for as long as they continue to make it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am soooo happy to meet this product. I came US from South Korea 6 months ago, so I have not know about bareMinerals brand. Few weeks ago, I was recommended this product from my friend. At the first time when I heard about 'powder foundation' I concerned that this foundation would make my skin dry. However, after using this foundation, I definitely realized that my concern was useless. Now, I am learning how to do a natural and long wearing makeup with this product. I would like to know about this product to my friends being in Korea !!!

Prefer to use Dior BB cream most days but for the odd occasion when I need full full coverage I reach for this on top. Can be drying on my normal skin when I used it everyday back in the day. Excellent finish and coverage.

This is such a great powder! I never ever like powders on my face but this one I am going to repurchase! The finish is so pretty and dewy for a powder. I have normal skin and it doesn't cake up or look powdery at all!
Love this product I'm 29 %26 have been using only this foundation since I was 18 I have oily skin %26 am prone to small breakouts it keeps my skin looking great %26 lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using loose powder and it is a horrific mess. Every time I dab the brush in the container powder flies everywhere. It will be gone in no time since the loose format is so wasteful. It also goes on too thick. My boyfriend noticed and told me to stop wearing it.
Like a few other reviews I've seen...this stuff makes my skin look disgusting. Absolutely, by far the worst foundation EVER. You'd be better off to buy the cheap stuff at a dollar store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: good coverage last all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always used liquid foundations and have been wary of powder ones. I just ran out of my Origins foundation and since I wasn't overly happy about it, decided to give Bare Minerals a try. The biggest thing with this foundation is the coverage. It is excellent without looking or feeling cakey. I don't feel like I have makeup on when wearing this. I love the fact that it's buildable. It makes it so versatile. I also seriously love the dewy look this leaves. I have combo skin and get oily in my t-zone through the day but didn't have issues with this. My mom commented on how nice and glowy my skin looked, she didn't think I had makeup on. (: The only thing is that I have found you do need a primer under this or it settles into lines. Overall, I won't be trying any other foundation any time soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Texture is the biggest issue I have with my skin. I suffer from severe redness and mild adult acne alongside uneven skin texture from adolescent acne. My biggest issue when finding a foundation is how it sits on my skin. I need full coverage but most liquid foundation looks cakey and gloppy on my skin no matter what or how I apply it. Frustrated I gave bareMinerals a shot and it changed my life. I use the lightest shade and am able to build up full and natural looking coverage with little effort and no concealer. I feel so much more confident about myself and have noticed an improvement in my skin since using strictly bareMinerals. This foundation has a beautiful glow to it. If you want natural looking foundation without sacrificing coverage give this a shot.
Best foundation with great coverage. Hides my dark spots and blemishes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended this loose powder foundation by a consultant at Sephora. I am so glad that I took her advice! The color is perfect and it blends wonderfully. This is the best foundation that I have ever used (for an everyday, natural look).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my FAVORITE foundation! It looks flawless and natural on my dry, flaky mid-winter skin. Application is easy and quick! I use a Tarte foundation brush, the brush they recommend you use with it is garbage in my opinion, but thats a review for another day. I would recommend this to anyone, particularly those with normal to dry skin. The only downside is that the powder can be a little messy if you aren't careful. All in all, it's one of my favorite makeup products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years and always get compliments on how my skin looks so flawless. It covers even the worst of breakouts and lasts a full day.

I have a fair complexion as I am Italian and Spanish. My skin is really sensitive so I don't try new products very often. I ran out of my MAC foundation and received a $25 Sephora gift card so I decided to give this product a chance. You only receive about half the amount you would in a MAC compact so I was disappointed right from the start. I used the smallest amount of Bareminerals and it covered my entire face. It is so light and airy that I forget I'm wearing makeup. This is the best makeup I've ever had. It looks so natural!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a teenager, I don't want to much of a heavy foundation so I went and tried this foundation. This foundation is really nice for a natural face, it does well with evening out my skin tone. The reason why I'm calling this OK, is because it doesn't seem to last on my skin. I have tried this foundation with primer, without, and it doesn't make this foundation last any bit longer. I can put on a fair amount in the morning and come home from a seven hour school day, wash my face, and there doesn't seem to be any trace of this foundation. The redness starts to slowly come back throughout the day as well. I haven't tried any other mineral foundations to compare it to because I want to use this up before I buy a new one. From what I've experienced with this foundation I feel like there has to be something better out there. That being said, this foundation isn't terrible. It does give a slight luminous finish and covers somewhat well. It's a good foundation, but it doesn't have that wow factor, that makes me want to keep on using and purchasing this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily, acne prone skin and I like the lightweight feel of this foundation. I was skeptical about how well it would cover my acne and scars, but it does a pretty good job and lasts well thru out the day compared to a liquid foundation. It isn't cakey feeling like with liquid foundations. The only problem is the color the SA recommended for me....it has yellow undertones and my whole life I thought I had red undertones! May exchange for a different shade, but other than that very pleased with the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time ordering bareMinerals powder. I can't believe I waited this long to do it! Great coverage, especially for someone who doesn't really need the thickness of a liquid foundation. The color is great and matches perfectly. I love that you can close the top. Can't wait to order again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product, it doesnt make my face shining and it is full coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I chose this product because it had been a recommended product. I do not like it at all. Even with very light application it looks caked and shiny. The product is not flattering at all. I will go back to my tried and true. Would love my money back.

This is not longwear, not buildable, and clings to dry patches on your face. I feel like it just makes my face look really dry and chalky and takes a lot of product to make it at least cover a little. It doesn't cover up my redness very well either. I don't have oily skin or dry skin it's somewhere in between and I am acne prone but just not for my skin. Color matching was great though :/

reviews.review_title: good luck getting any on your face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: everyone swore by this stuff, but i just couldn't force it to work for me, even though i really wanted it to. PROS: good for my oily skin..powders in general work well. CONS: stuck to dry spots, took forever to put on, needs three coats, lost too much product during application, product gets everywhere, no color match for me, product only lasted me 3 months
Amazing for when u want that natural look i do get dry patches but that's just my skin type overall I will deff repurchase this again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a 10+ year user of Bare Minerals from foundation to shadows, mascara and liner shadows. Won't EVER use anything else.
I have alot of age spots, this does cover them I have too put it on 2 times, over spots. everywhere else once, still doesn't look heavy. good price. nice product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It's extremely like on my face and doesn't feel like I'm wearing make up at all! I have moderate acne and I break out on my cheeks (cysts) and chin (nodules). In my opinion, it works best with the highlighter/bronzo duo (don't think that's the right name but it's also bareMinerals). Although I wish it had a bit more coverage, it seems to live up to what I was expecting based on what I have read on here and from the advice I received from the beauty associates. I also think that it gets a little cake-y in my smile crease and when I use concealer under my eyes and when I try to cover healing acne. It does seem to cover my acne scars well when paired with concealer. I just really like this because it doesn't feel like I'm wearing make up and doesn't cause me to break out more when i wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great natural foundation! You can put as little or as much coverage as you need. Even if you do put alot on it still leaves your skin looking very natural and not cakey. This also stays on your skin all day long!

Had a Love - hate relationship with this. Picked it up years ago without knowing how to use this. I loved the glowy sheen but it went on so cakey and emphasised my pores like crrrrraaaazy. Turned out the saleswoman back then recommended a brush wayyyyy to dense and I used too much product. Just now I learned how to use this properly! I now use the Real Techniques powder brush and just a teeny tiny amount in the lid, swirl the brush around and then blend, blend, blend, blend..... and layer it up like that. Also, I use a Smashbox primer underneath (which I never liked before with any other foundation because somehow it made my foundation fall off even faster). So now, I have the beautiful glowy sheen but without the cakeyness, have full coverage but still look oh so natura and it feels like you're wearing no make-up at all. Plus it stays on all day (normal activities).  For reference, I have combo skin that gets oily especially on the nose, some enlarged pores on and around my nose, and large hyperpigmentation due to sundamage on both cheeks.  Totally Love this now, will purchase in other colours for winter and summier!

reviews.review_title: I always come back to youuuu.....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this oh, 10 years ago for about five years. Worked great with my sensitive, acne prone oily skin. For the first time in my life people complimented me on my skin! For some reason that now bewilders me, I decided that I should get into liquid foundations. Used Chanel, Laura Mercier, Hourglass, Neutrogena, Becca, Chantecaille and totally forgot about old faithful BM. Then I was watching an online video with a makeup artist who has similar skin problems that I do (oily) and I thought - this guy's skin looks great! What is he using? Well turns out he is usually wearing BM when he films his videos. So I tried this again and I'm like WHY DID I EVER LEAVE? It's not even that expensive when I consider some of the other $$$ stuff I was using. And I'm getting compliments on my skin again! At 45! My only bridge to cross with this foundation is that I have some large pores on my nose and if I didn't buff it enough, it seemed to accentuate those pores, but that is just a matter of my own application. You really only need a teeeenie bit of this stuff and then buff, buff, buff with a professional type brush. Gotta invest in the right brush for this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Every time I wore this foundation I got compliments!! I love how it made my skin feel & look. It's amazing in everyway!! I would repurchase & recommend to everybody. It's perfect for all skin types & age groups.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this due to all the positive reviews, but I must admit that I do not like this product. I have dry skin that is also prone to acne. Lucky me, right? I have adult hormonal acne only treated with a medicine that I can‚Äôt take at this time. Anyways, finding good facial products is tricky because not only do I get raised, red bumps on my face but I also have dry patches all over. Not only did this mineral foundation NOT cover my acne but it also helped emphasize each and every bit of dryness on my face. Also the golden medium color oxidized quickly on my skin. It looked weird and orange-y within minutes after application with my Tarte airbuki.  Perhaps this mineral foundation works best with oily skin or with fairly clear skin with minimal to no acne. If you have any dry patches then please test this a few times before you purchase. Just my suggestion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use this foundation in fairly light it was a tad too dark for my pale freckly skin, so I started using fair. I like to use this as a setting powder I dust it lightly over another foundation, and it stays on ALL day. I sometimes use it as my regular foundation if I want a light coverage, and don't feel like spending a ton of time on my make up! I love bare minerals!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used the original foundation for more than five years and still love it. I tried the new liquid foundation and came back to the powder.

reviews.review_title: Powder Foundation is Amazing for Acne Prone Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin was breaking out a lot under liquid foundation, such as Clinique, and so I figured I should try a lighter-weight powder foundation instead. I used Everyday Minerals which was inexpensive compared to BareMinerals, but must be shipped to Canada which makes it pricey. It was good, my pimples cleared up and the coverage was okay. But then I got Bare Minerals for Christmas. I am HOOKED. The coverage is AMAZING, the colour matches my skin perfectly and it doesn't feel heavy, dry, or greasy.
