It really feels like I'm wearing nothing at all but my skin looks flawless. I can never go back to any other brand. Loves it. Highly recommended for those with acne-prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My friend recommended this to me. I absolutely loved it...It gave great buildable coverage and made my skin look great. Only thing, is that I don't feel like I get my money's worth. I use it up in about a couple of months, and I can't repurchase it so often at the price. I don't think it's too expensive if I didn't have to purchase so often. I'm sad. :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is perfect!!! I have pretty dry/normal skin but it's absolutely amazing! Some times I just use a matte powder on the days where my face is a bit crazy but it's amazing! I can't really build up a lot of coverage on my type of skin because it tends to look cakey, but I don't use a ton of coverage.

I did a lot of research and finally decided to buy this due to all of the great reviews, the reviews held up because I love this product! I love how few ingredients this product has as well as how natural and light it feels on the skin, it is as if I'm not wearing any foundation at all! I was blown away by the coverage I got also, it is a wonderful foundation and definitely becoming my HG. One thing you need though is time and patience, if you're looking for a quick throw on makeup this isn't for you, taking time and really buffing it out on your skin is what gives you that flawless airbrush look. Another positive is a little goes a long way so this should be able to last a decent amount of time. This is a 5 star foundation for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination and very sensitive skin. It is amazing! If you have fairly large pores like I do, I choose to applying a primer before and make sure my skin is regularly exfoliated. This eliminates the creasing and emphasized pores that is sometimes a concern. Overall really blend able and feels amazing.
Love how you get glowing coverage but not shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been a BE girl for many years. Tried the matte and the new bare skin liquid foundation and still like the original formula best. Please don't mess with a good thing, BE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Finally splurged on a higher end foundation, and came away disappointed, while it is obviously much higher quality than a drugstore foundation, I found the coverage to be excellent, but the way it stuck to my dry skin and acne made it unusable. Even after exfoliating and using moisturizer. I'll have to stick to liquid formulas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After years of searching for the right base for my makeup, this product is my favorite. It is light on the skin, matches my skin color well and is good coverage to go under my makeup.
Been using this product for almost 9 years. Finally wanted to review and say its the best!! Sometime ill wear liquid foundation under if I need more coverage. but overall its wonderful

Favourite everyday product!!!! I use on top of primer under bronzer - as my foundation everyday. When I go out I use it on top of foundation and under bronzer! :) IT IS GREAT!!!!! I use the matte one - love matte for everyday stuff

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like to have this on hand if I ever have blemish I want to cover. Works better than cream or liquid foundation.
The best. I Keep coming back for B mineral foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've always been a liquid foundation kind of gal. My face is ridiculously dry and even worst in the winter. I thought this product was overhyped and never bothered trying it because it wasn't liquid.  I recently used a sample size my friend got me (that was kept in storage for a few months) when I started getting into my old habits of going crazy at Sephora again. Although it wasn't my exact shade, I still LOVED the flawless coverage it gave me. So I went and got one in my shade (which took a very long time deciding on) and it was PERFECT.  Took one star for the price. Decent price but for the amount you get, it goes by really quick! But I would definitely purchase again!

I've been using this face powder for over 5 years now and I absolutely love it. It goes on smooth and gives me great coverage without looking cakey or too heavy. I like my makeup to look a little more natural and Bare Minerals ABSOLUTELY does that for me. My only complaint is that the powder tends to make my face get oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot survive the world without this product! The original is by far the best for my skin. I've tried the Matte version, which works for times when my skin is too oily. But most of the time, the original is my go-to! One of the best of the best!!

I was really disappointed with this powder. It's either too translucent or too cakey, no in-between. It has very poor coverage for blemishes. To hide them, it requires putting on so much that it's noticeably cakey and discolored. Do not recommend.

I have tried so many different foundations over the years and this seems to be the one I always go back to. I didn't rate it five stars because I feel like it wears off sooner than other foundations but for being a powder foundation, it does last a few hours without having to reapply. I use golden medium and love the glow that I get. My skin looks flawless and youthful with this product. I have tried switching to liquid many times but hate that it makes me look like I'm wearing a ton of makeup. With the BM foundation you can apply as much needed to get a fuller coverage. I definitely would recommended it to anyone who is looking for that flawless look without feeling like they have tons of makeup on! ...don't forget to use a primer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Be careful if you already have large pores! I do because of oily acne prone skin. I hated this product at first because I put it on after moisturizer and it seemed to enlarge my pores. I didn't use it for awhile but just last week on a whin I put it on after my green redness correcting bb cream and it looked so much better! Definitely use some sort of primer before to smooth out your pores and so it doesn't make you look dry and older. Buffer it on with the brush and it looks really nice.

So I bought this powder last July, and have not stopped using it. It is fantastic. Its long lasting, and my total day-to-day wear. The powder has not yet ran out and it just is so complementing to my skin. It also covers up any of my spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many foundations over the years and always come back to this product. It's lightweight and never feels greasy or like you have makeup on at all. I usually apply two layers and covers up very nicely. I even got my Mom to try it and she has never worn makeup before. She love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Second time trying BareMinerals, I have to say I love it more the second time around. I've been trying to find the perfect foundation that will make my skin look fresh and new, considering I wil be 30 soon. Mineral powder is the way to go. Leaves my face nice and clean. Not to mention flawless. Im glad I switched over from liquid foundation to bare mineral. It was really starting to age my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wanting to try mineral makeup and I have got to say that I absolutely love it! Even though I wasn't skin matched, Golden tan was the perfect shade for me so I was pretty happy about that. It's a nice change for whenever you don't feel like putting on liquid foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love, love, love this foundation! Bare Minerals makes my skin look flawless all day long without a single touch up. I have combination skin and my face is usually a mess by early afternoon when using liquid foundation. With BM, my face looks just as fresh at 6pm as it did at 6am which, in humid south Florida, is quite something. It did take a couple of tries to perfect the application. On my mature skin, I found that Prime Time is key. It allows for a smoother application, better coverage using minimal product, and the foundation won't settle into enlarged pores or creases.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation!  I love using this and it really helps cover up all the flaws I want to hide on my face. It's easy to use and it easily covers all the flaws.  I wasn't sure about this product at first because of the price. Luckily, I got a free sample of this foundation and I fell in love with it the first time I used it.  I have a good amount of redness on my face (cheeks and forehead) and this foundation easily covers it all. It makes my face looks flawless.  I would totally recommend this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited when I saw the special holiday value size of this foundation, because I had been colour matched perfectly in store and wanted to take advantage of the offer.  Sadly when I tried this on my whole face, I noticed right away that it made any textural imperfections like pores, and smile lines look a lot more apparent. Probably not the best if you have any dry skin at all, or fine lines around your eyes or from dimples etc.  I used as little of the product as possible; it spreads very nicely and a little goes a long way. If I planned on keeping this foundation, it would probably last me a couple of years!  When I back away from the mirror, it looks perfect.... Which is great if you always keep your personal space bubble at a five foot radius. Up close and personal, it ended up taking normal, problem free skin, and making it look a little ragged.  Too bad! I wanted to love this :(

I have oily skin and this foundation stayed on my skin all day and kept the oil down. I do have to give my face a little bit of powder mid day, but still a huge improvement. It gave me a nice glow and a natural look. super in love and will buy over and over again. never going back to liquid foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for YEARS and I have never been able to find anything better. Others do not compare. It provides full coverage and feels light. No creasing (I put on the Bare Minerals Prime Time foundation primer under it) and it stays on all day and all night!
I keep trying other things and always end up back here. My favorite.

reviews.review_title: I'd give it ZERO STARS if I could...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh boy, where to begin on this one? It's hands down the worst makeup product I have ever purchased. EVER. I purchased it because I eat fairly healthy and use mostly toxin-free makeup and skin care products. This was basically the last transition I needed to get all of my makeup to natural. For reference, I have fair, normal-to-dry skin. I am lucky to have clear skin and small pores. That said, this makeup made me look worse with makeup than without. I didn't know that was possible. I thought most makeup enhanced your features. I prefer the I'm wearing makeup but I don't LOOK like I'm wearing makeup look. Instead, I had cakey makeup and after about an hour I was a greasy mess. Not sure how--I have dry skin, so it did adhere to dry patchy areas, but the rest looked oily (not illuminated--great natural product for that glow is RMS Beauty Living Luminizer). On top of that, it clings to every hair on your face (and I spent time buffing). My skin also appeared sallow and grayish after it oxidized. The powder enhanced any possible line on my face that I never even knew I had and creased like crazy on my eyelids, around my mouth, etc. I only wear a tinted moisturizer for special occasions, and wear a powder for my normal makeup routine. I have NEVER had that level of creasing before with either product. It also caused me to break out a little on my chin and forehead. At the same time, I was itchy around my jawline. I gave this product two weeks, and even went back to purchase the BM brush to apply normal coverage. (I thought maybe my Sephora brush wasn't cutting it.) No, this is just a horrible, horrible product. On top of how bad it looked, this powder is a mess. I followed the directions, placing a small amount in the cap, swirling the brush, and tapping/blowing off excess. You will have powder all over your bathroom counter and sink. As someone who doesn't wear a ton of makeup and prefers a simple 5-minute makeup routine, this added too much time and cleanup for my liking. I returned the foundation powder and the brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight foundation that covers perfectly! Stays on all day long without need for reapplication. Would recommend this product to everyone! I have sensitive skin and have had a hard time finding a product that works well for me. Affordable and definitely one of the best I have used!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry and sometimes dehydrated skin. In the winter, my face also gets very flakey. I didn't expect to like a powder foundation, but I actually use this every day! The nice thing is that I can just put this over my moisturiser after it sinks in, and then put an extra layer on for concealer. Sometimes I'll use this to set my stubborn spots or discolouration. In any case, I'll likely use this every day, AND it wears so well! It actually gives me a slightly satin/dewey finish, which I adore, and it feels so lightweight and trustworthy.  The only con I have with this foundation is that unfortunately, the lightest shade is not light enough for me in the colder months, but matches nicely when I have a bit of sun. If this foundation went a shade/shade and a half lighter, it would be my be-all, end-all. Still, I love it so dearly that I just blend down the neck! If you are interested in this foundation please do yourself a favour and get a sample or do research on colouring! It is an incredible foundation and looks amazing on all skin tones and types!  (For reference, I wear Nars Siberia as a perfect match and I've got the shade Fair in this. This one does not come off as too pink)
I love Bare Minerals! I have used this product for yearsss and wouldn't use anything else. It provides a lot of coverage, but feels light. Definitely one of my must haves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy that I purchased this. I had been on the hint for a dewy foundation that didn't feel sticky and heavy. My skin is very sensitive to a lot of liquid foundations, and I never even think about getting a full coverage foundation because I know my face would freak out. This foundation makes me look so beautifully luminous and dewy and it feels like nothing on my skin! My skin can only handle lit weight foundations and the only lightweight ones I could find were matte until I found this! My boyfriend even tried out the BareSkin foundation on areas where he had redness and he enjoyed it :) definitely going to try out more bare minerals products :) I am in the shade Golden Tan

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using bareMinerals foundation for years. After having my daughter, I ended up with brown spots on my forehead. I thought I needed to switch to liquid foundation to have better coverage, but I soon realized, nothing worked better or made me look more radiant than the bareMinerals foundation along with some blush. I highly recommend it!
Long lasting, great coverage, gentle on skin. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok ladies.. if you are looking to be done up and to look like you are clearly wearing makeup and have full/heavy coverage, this is not the product for you. This is a very light, airy, natural coverage. Basically, you can barely cover your redness or freckles with this product. I get better coverage with their Bare Serum.

reviews.review_title: Very good mineral foundation but emphasizes pores
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was never eager to try this product until I saw the deluxe size at a good price, so I finally caved in. I believe it needs a little more work than a regular liquid foundation or a compact powder foundation but it definitely gives a natural, luminous finish. Only downside, it emphasizes the pores of my nose a lot. And does nothing to control my oily t-zone area. Use a good primer beforehand and powder mid-day and that would probably solve the problem.

I struggled for a very long time trying to find a perfect match in this foundation and I finally found the perfect color. I have yellow undertones I am Asian descent I am fair/light and Fairly Light is seriously the perfect color the balance of neutral helps. I tried Golden Fair and it gave me a white cast, and Light oxidized to a orange color.
Will never switch to anything else. Last up too 12 hours.Could dry you a little, but in this case add stronger moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A friend suggested trying this foundation and I love it! It isnt heavy, I dont feel like I am made up yet it gives wonderful coverage. I am darker skinned and it matches without looking gray or harsh.

I have been buying this foundation since it's debut many years ago and continue to buy for my two teenagers now. Cons - as your skin ages and requires better coverage and more hydration - it's not as good as liquid.

I love this stuff to death. people always complement my skin. even though I'm a rare teenager that does not have acne, my skin still has dicoloration that this foundation is perfect for. my mom also uses this and it works wonders for all ages. this is the only foundation I would ever buy. I would recommend pairing it with the bare minerals mineral veil for the perfect finish
I just got this today, this makes me look like when i was 18 years old or younger just by making my face look pale like back than i love it!

reviews.review_title: better than Laura Mercier mineral foundation
reviews.review_text: I don't know why it took me so long to try this one. I have tried many other mineral foundations and I stayed away for years now because I didn't like how they all accentuated my pores and dry patches. I decided to give this one a try after seeing many good reviews...out of curiosity and I was surprised by the finish I was getting with it. I have tried few different ways to apply it and application method is key to using this one I found. Best brush that works for me is is the tarte buffer brush and the real techniques expert brush and I pick up the tiniest amount at a time to buff in each time and build it up to how I want the coverage to be. If you swirl a large amount all at once, it will look cake and blotchy. It looks so natural and feels airy on the skin if applied the right way and the finish is very brightening and awakening! The only complaint I have is that the jar lid is too small to swirl tarte buffer brush. I wish the packaging was wider in diameter but thinner in height so that the lid will have efficient space to swirl in product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This may sound overly dramatic, but I'm serious when I say that this foundation has pretty much changed my life. I'm 24 years old and I've had acne since I was 11. I've been using Bare Minerals for a couple of years now after trying SO many other foundations. The problems I had with other foundations were one or more of the following: 1. They would not be enough coverage 2. They would not last all day 3. They would not have the correct color for my skin 4. It looked very obvious that I was wearing foundation  I have none of these problems with Bare Minerals - I absolutely love it. I've attached a picture to show the coverage it provides.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My dermatologist recommends this to her clients as she has seen a huge improvement in people with acne/sensitive skin. I have Snow White porcelain skin that has a tendency to be sensitive and honestly, bareMinerals is thee best makeup I've ever used--it provides wonderful coverage and looks very natural. I hate looking like I'm wearing a ton of makeup, which is often the case with liquid/whipped foundations--they are heavy and I think can age a person. Comfortable--takes a minute to apply--lasts all day--provides me with an even skin tone (having fair skin I am prone to redness). I began using this 5 years ago and never looked back. Love love love!

reviews.review_title: No coverage, No silky powder finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought a value set (no longer available) that came with the original, matte, and mineral veil foundation. It also came with their little concealer powder as well as their foundation brush mini and concealer brush mini. I tried using this product with their brush as they instruct but I did not like it. I tried using this product with my own brush how I would normally and I've tried using it with a sponge, I don't like any of them really. When I'm buying a colored powder foundation, I expect it to give more coverage. This is as if it's translucent. No matter how much product I pack on my face, I can't get rid of the feel of my liquid foundation underneath. Very disappointed in their foundation products with how much hype they have. Would not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to finally buy this foundation. I bought the Fair and the Fairly Light because I couldn't decide what color to get. The Fair was too light on my fair complexion and made me look like a ghost in pictures, but the Fairly Light was too dark and yellow. I was also upset with this brand because it looked so cakey on and I felt like I broke out from it too.

reviews.review_title: I can't see myself switching to another brand
reviews.review_text: I picked up this foundation after falling in love with the bareMinerals Eye Brightener. I had never used a powder foundation before this because I assumed it would look cakey on my skin. I am very pleasantly surprised with this product. I am very fair skinned and the lightest colour blends seamlessly onto my face. This product is buildable and won't cake up on you. It has a very natural finish to it and feels very light on your face. My T zone does get oily after a couple hours but I haven't found any product that will prevent that so I just re-apply. A little goes a long way, and the price is reasonable considering it's careful formulation. I will be re-purchasing many times in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love my bare minerals makeup I wouldn't use any other makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've wanted to buy this foundation for months, according to my bff this is her must have. I always hesitate with powder foundations because of my dry skin but this is amazing, I promise I wasn't expecting this to be this good but I'm surprised. Makes my skin super soft and makes me confident of my skin. I always have it in my purse I want to retouch but I end up not using any because it lasts all day. I love it and I will keep buying it.

Nice product, covers well, I have redness on cheeks and nose area and it covers better than most liquid foundations. Absorbs oil in the summer, for wint I out on a very good moisturizer, let it dry and apply this and it stays all day!

Only foundation I've been using for the past year. The color is a little lighter because it is supposed to be brightening. The coverage is SO good and feels relatively light compared to other liquid foundations. Only use small dabs on concealer on acne after buffing this into my skin w/good karma brush and I have flawless skin!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product that matches my skin tone almost exactly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this foundation! I have allergies and struggle to find makeup that I can wear that doesn't cause me problems.

reviews.review_title: Oxidizes over hours and harsh on sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation was easy to apply but I found it oxidized to a very orange tone after only hrs of having it on, also tended to smudge easily, onto clothes and hands, and was harsh on un-primed skin eg. Exacerbated my acne alot. Do not recommend, there are many other, much better, products out there.

I usually don't do loose powders. I tried this one out because I got it as a sample, and I was totally hooked so I purchased the full size. It makes my skin glow and the coverage is decent. I like the fact that it makes me skin feel softer even after I take my makeup off.

I've been using this product for over 6 years now. I definitely notice my skin looking more even toned, but others don't know I have makeup on! I have sensitive skin and this powder has been very gentle on my skin.

I got a sample of this powder and absolutely loved it. I was looking for something more natural and felt this was a good one. After being happy with the sample I went ahead and bought it and loved it. Soon after, I discovered it was making my skin oily throughout the day and giving me terrible breakouts! :( Needless to say, I had to stop using it - a waste of $34

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have literally no complaints about this foundation. I have had extremely bad acne that is now cleared up, but from terrible skin to acne scars to discoloring, this foundation stays with me because it is so versatile. The best part is that you can layer the foundation so that if you want a natural day look, it is easily achieved with a brush all over the face. But it works so well layered to create fuller coverage that sometimes my friends think I have had a skin peel. I couldn't imagine a foundation doing everything for me that bareMinderals does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought bareMinerals when it first came out. it's particularly nice in the summer when you want light coverage. it will pick up and accent dry skin - so a bit harder to use in the winter months if you're not regimented in your exfoliation and moisturizing.  I bought it again for my gym bag as the screw on top and easy application work perfect for the morning rush between gym and work. It seems to me it isn't as easy to apply light layers upon layers as it used to be? It also doesn't seem to have the same staying power. This stuff used to be pretty bullet proof once set...now, meh.  However, I do love the new containers. When cosmetic companies hire good engineers for their containers, I love love love them. there's an INSIDE twisty cap in addition to the twisty lid. That's super double protection from spills. That alone is why it has 4 stars instead of 3 and will be staying in my gym bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally used bareMinerals when I purchased the sample kit, which had two different foundations and the mineral veil included in it. Out of the two foundations, the Original and the Matte, I really loved the original. I just purchased a larger size of this foundation in fairly light. I've never managed to find a powder foundation that covered but didn't look powdery. I still use a coverup for when I have breakouts, but this still manages to cover, but not look like makeup. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Coverage not as great as mall kiosk product but a lot cheaper so good for the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: after reading all the rave reviews I gave this product a shot. I like a product to be versatile - light coverage one day, medium to full the next. I found this powder to be cakey and made any lines I have really stand out. I thought this would perhaps mask those, or at least NOT make them more prominent but sadly, it's not the best for those of us with crows feet or laugh lines. I use this now with a light hand and very poofy brush (not the more dense one I bought to use it with) in order to use it more as a setting powder over my tinted BB cream. I would really not recommend or purchase this again since it was basically a waste of money for me personally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this powder for over 6-7 years and would not change it for anything. I always go back fore more :)

I've been wearing this foundation for almost 10 years and I can't imagine using anything else! It provides the perfect amount of coverage and leaves your skin so natural and radiant looking!! It's true, I think my skin looks healthier after using it too! The ONLY downside is that it doesn't last as long as I would like, especially if you're perspiring or in hot humid weather. At first I tried bareMineral's original primer and it worked well and left my skin feeling insanely soft however, now I use Dr. Jart's premium BB beauty balm under it and not only does it last all day, but I'm constantly getting compliments on how great my skin looks! I'm hooked for life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is my favorite b/c it has good coverage and also has zinc-based sunscreen (the best kind). Love LOVE it!
This is my daily go-to foundation! It feels like I'm wearing nothing and yet I love the coverage it provides.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is the best of them all. Beautiful, glowy, flawless finish yet lightweight, breathable, natural and good for your skin. I love this for special occasions because believe it or not despite the sunscreen factor, it looks amazing in pictures and I just love the flawless finish and glow. Love this foundation for everyday, nights out, filimg/pictures, special events, everything!! Love you BE :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful skin, even after using just a little product. Good at covering big blemishes as well as getting all-over healthy looking skin. Eliminates the need for liquid/other foundation underneath just this powder. Also, there's not really a need to wear the Mineral Veil over, no matter how much the Bare Minerals people try to push it on you. The Foundation powder itself works great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gives a medium coverage that looks absolutely flawless. I am a long time user of this product.
Incredible powder. All of the 5 star reviews say it all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally use Philosophy mineral make up and I loved it! But they changed the product and no longer have the color that I used. So I thought I would give this a try and I liked it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for the last eight years. I love it!!!. I have tried different liquid foundation which i use from time to time. But the powder gives me that light and natural look I love to beat my face but at the same time i like the natural look which this product give me. I also use the base foundation primer which keep my face oil free. I hope this help!! Enjoy!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have FINALLY found the right combination with this line of mineral makeup! I am dealing with pores and ruddy cheeks. So I use the Bare Minerals MATTE in Fairly Medium all over as a base. Then, I sweep a light coat of Bare Minerals Original in Golden Fair or Golden Medium (depending on season). It give my face beautiful coverage without the heaviness and it gives my skin just the right amount of glow! I don't care for the look with ONLY the original formula...much too shiny/sparkly for me. I felt it hightlighted my pores and wrinkles. But with the matte first and then the original over, it is perfect. I am 51 so I need all the help I can get! lol :-)

I have been using it for over three years and wouldn't change it. You can do light or full coverage depending on how much you apply. The color matches perfectly. It's loose powder and can be a little messy but other than that love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally bought the starter kit that included this foundation and I immediately was impressed with how I was able to cover the sun spots on my cheeks . It blends beautifully and provides a natural finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best foundations I have been used, I regret I did not try this before, is good price, and the look is just beautiful, natural and good coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea and blemished skin and it is tough to find something that gives enough coverage without looking like a mask. I've tried every top foundation there is and none of them worked for me. Then I got a sample of bareMinerals, thought I'd try it out, and was stunned at how quick and easy it was to get the finish I wanted. I'm used to painstakingly covering every spot and blotch of redness. But using this product, I watching it all get erased before my eyes. A miracle. For me anyways. You have to follow the directions exactly though or you won't get the results you want. You must use a kabuki brush or the recommended bareMinerals brush. Then, tap a very small amount of powder from the tin into the lid. You will need far less than you think you will. Then swirl the brush around in the lid a few times, then buff it onto your face very well. Doing this, you will achieve virtually flawless coverage. I can't say enough good things about this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used Bare Minerals for about 3 years now and I love it! I get a few pimples every now and then and this foundation covers them so good. The foundation stays on really good to so I don't have to reapply it all the time. I would recommend this to everyone!

I had been struggling with what foundation I should use for years, and I am BEYOND satisfied with this product. It blends beautifully and covers great! Wonderful product to use if you're looking for a fresh, natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is really good. I was skeptical whether to buy it or not but im glad i did because its excellent even if you want a good amount of coverage.

I've used MAC NC20 for over 15 years and I decided it was time for a change. My skin is changing, with age, and it's difficult to find something I'm not allergic to, and nit thick and heavy on my face, hence the highly-rated switch to Bareminerals. I was immediately in love with the way it went on so easily, with great coverage, and the glow it gave me! I do, still, love MAC, but I love this powder just as much! My next question is to try their other products.
This foundation gives lovely raidient glow. It offers a sheer and weightless coverage. If you have oily skin you may not appreciate it.

I've used bareMinerals foundation for years and have never found one negative aspect of it. If you have dry or flaky skin it may not be as flattering as you'd like but with normal, sensitive or combination skin this will do the trick. I use it over CC cream almost daily and on my lazy days I use it alone..both options work well. Also covers up the annoying shine of my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used several different foundations over the years, and I ALWAYS come back to Bare Minerals. It's so good for your skin & doesn't leave your face looking like its painted on. I do recommend that one purchases a good primer to apply before this foundation. It helps prevent any settling into the fine lines on your face. This product comes in a huge container, so it will last a long time as well! <3 Bare Minerals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This evens out my skin tone without looking like I have lots of makeup on.

It's really easy to use, but you have to be careful not to use too much. It almost looks like you're not doing anything but you have to just keep on buffing it into your skin without adding more product otherwise you'll end up looking like you have on a lot of makeup.

I've been using this foundation for years. I get the W-15 Original color. I've tried the matte but it's just too dull for my liking but if you already have shiny skin you might like matte. One big complaint is the packaging. My fianc√© breaks down the canister for me when it gets to the end so I can use ALL of the product. Honestly there is usually at least 4-5 applications that go unused if you just throw it away when it gets hard to shake it out. I also don't appreciate the tab used to open it initially. It's way to short to grab and you have to tug so hard it pulls the skin away from my thumbnail. I try to open it for first use at home but I've been caught without tools to assist too many times!! I tried the liquid version that just came out a few months ago and forget about it!! I'll review that next!

reviews.review_title: Hate to rain in the parade but...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In all honesty I broke out like it was going out of style-( not sure if it was the foundation or the mineral veil as I used both) like large whiteheads in the chin and cheeks-horrifying. I'm not saying it'll happen to you but I suggest trying it out (sample) before you buy. I haven't used it since- a bit intimidated now and I don't want to tempt fate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Little background. I struggled with acne for years. Two years ago, I began a regime that made my skin healthy and clear and radiant.  As an extension of all that hard work, I have slowly begun trading in products for lighter, more natural alternatives. And this is where bareMinerals comes in. After a year and a half of perfectly clear skin, this singlehandedly made my skin explode with acne. So disappointed, especially because I had such high hopes.  Not saying this is a bad option for everyone, just that it destroyed my skin (which although on the sensitive spectrum, has never had a reaction like this to a makeup product).

I chose this foundation for my wedding day 5 years ago and still use it to this day. It truly provides coverage in the most natural way, and it literally feels like nothing on your face! I love that it's build able coverage so I can swirl some on quickly for a nice look, or layer it on once more or even twice when I'm going out or for a special occasion. The tube lasts long and it's just my favorite foundation ever!
been using this cover up for 10 years now... works great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Bare Minerals for many years. Just started buying at Sephora since I can up my points. I actually was told to get a lighter color than I'm used to and it's great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareMinerals for years now. It is still the best foundation I have ever used. My skin is super fair with pinkish undertone, semi-oily, prone to break-outs, and pretty sensitive. This is the only foundation that has ever worked for me. My skin looks photo-ready all day, and this stuff stays put. Very light-weight, sometimes I forget I am even wearing make-up at all. The added SPF is a major bonus as well. Give this a try if you are looking for great coverage without a lot of work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love, love this foundation! It covers 95% of my Rosacea, and leaves a perfect matte finish. I do recommend moisturizing and using an oil-based primer before using this foundation if you have sensitive dry to combination skin (like myself) as it can feel drying and cause itchiness. Other than that it's not irritating like most foundations, does not feel heavy, and it's not hard to take off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years. Love it!

reviews.review_title: good enough to be the only one I've used in 8 yrs!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love this makeup. great coverage without looking cakey. if you have too much fun at night and sleep in it, your skin does not mind so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation I can wear all day and not feel like my face is dirty. Great for my sensitive fair skin

I love this foundation. I use it after my CC cream to give more coverage and finish it with mineral veil. It lasts a long time and my skin got so much better and healthier! I use it even to conceal any spots and it does a great job. The best foundation for ur skin and your looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only stuff I use! Have tried may different foundations and they all magnify my large pores and lines.This stuff is great for my skin,has a sunscreen that never expires and makes my skin look beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation. I started wearing makeup and this is the first thing I bought. I have been using it for 2 years now and it lasts so long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this product as part of a beauty insider weekly special and loved it so much I immediately went and bought it. It provides lovely, luminous light coverage. Perfect for when I don't have time to do my full liquid foundation routine.
I love the way this covers and give you the illuminated look! But it makes my skin really dry and it make it peel alittle bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used Bare Minerals for many years now.. I will never try another mineral powder. Her formula has improved my skin. Makes it glow. This formula has NOT upset my sensitive skin.. I will never stop Bare Minerals.. I am a Huge Fan of her mineral powder makeup. Always have been always will. I am Not and never was a fan of anything Liquid. on my skin. I feel confident when wearing this product. I know it improves the skin and NEVER causes an issue. Never with Me. Miss Sensitive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this!!! Doesn't make me breakout and gives me the coverage I need. Does make me a little oily but its not bad.
Main stable in my make up kit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for years and it's my absolute favorite. I love the coverage it gives and I love the way it makes my face feel. It's very lightweight and long lasting. With so many shades, I feel like it matches my skin tone perfectly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this for over a year and I am absolutely in love with it. Coverage is definitely build-able and the shade fits me SO well. Looks so natural, I always get compliments on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used bare minerals for many years now. I have tried other products from time to time, but nothing goes on as easy or wears as well. I get compliments on my skin all the time. Great foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great product! ive been using this for 2 years- highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe this works for people with perfect skin but it just didn't look good on me. I have some redness which it did nothing to cover. Put on a light layer and it still looked heavy on my face and felt gross to touch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I just use this as not only my foundation, but also concealer, face powder & sunscreen all rolled into one.

I got this as a gift from my friend on my birthday. I had high hopes for it because of the reviews online. Although the coverage is buildable, it comes off because I have oily skin, maybe I should try the matte version. Definitely not oil blotting esp for a powder. Recommend if you have normal skin (:

reviews.review_title: can not live with out it
reviews.review_text: I can not say anything bad about this. I'm live it. Been using it for years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every so often I get lured into trying something new, only to return back to my tried and true makeup. It covers and doesn't feel like I'm wearing makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. I bought it about 3 years ago and haven't used anything else since! I have very sensitive skin and my pores get clogged easily. This stuff doesn't clog my pores or irritate my skin. The container also lasted forever. If I use regular sunscreen, it clogs my pores, so it's great that this stuff has SPF too.
I bought this powder absolutely randomly, but now I can't live without it! My skin looks so fresh with it. I can see that in the mirror!

i have a lil bit of a dry skin. i thought it would be okay if i finely built a moisture layer before putting on any makeup - which i always do- but this product is too dry for me to use it in its original form. It hasnt been long that i got this so i'm trying to apply it in different ways. so far though, it goes a whole day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for more than 5 years now I think and I am still happy with it. It it good for the skin. Since I have been using it my skin hardly has had any break outs, Sometimes I use a different foundation because I want a different coverage and I have notices that my skin gets many more break outs.  I have two different shades as I need a darker color in summer than in winter. I think my brushes do need to be replaced after many years of usage.

Was unsure about this for a while because I didn't know if it would provide the full coverage I need but it's better coverage than any other powder I have ever used. I have acne and hyper pigmentation and this powder covers it all and never looks cakey. Will forever buy.

The coverage was too sheer for my taste--it didn't really build at all, and I could still see my acne fairly prominently. There weren't any horrible flaws but it just didn't do the job. Honestly I think I'll just go back to my old (and inexpensive) standby, Covergirl.
My face is pretty oily in the summer, comparing to other liquid foundations this makes me feel comfortable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use this product and I can say that it does provide coverage, but it did dry my skin. It also gave me the appearance of looking greasy if I wore it for a long time. I think that this product works for someone who does have clear skin, because it barely covers any redness, but it does even out your skin tone. You can build some coverage, but it starts to pile up and add dry patches to your face. I think it is better than liquid foundation, but does have some serious flaws.

If you have a combination/oily skin and do need coverage in your foundation this product is not for you. It does not cover blemishes or redness, and leaves your skin looking oily. I used my product as setting powder for extra coverage, and I did like it for that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this make-up. It's so light but covers well.My acne has improved since using it too. Great value for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved bareMinerals Original Foundation since forever. I am not an everyday makeup wearer. When do take the time (which with bareMinerals is minimal) I am guaranteed to receive a compliment or maybe even two!
I have sensitive & oily skin.. By far this product does work for me. Last through the day without touching it up. Blend very well with other product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I continually try to find something better and can't. Always go back. Doesn't break me out and covers lightly or full coverage. My skin feels healthier wearing it.

I just started using Bareminerals after receiving a sample and then purchasing a base kit. As a soon to be 50 year old with combination skin, this is miracle coverage! I have found I like going a shade deeper with the original formula and then I have the lightest mineral veil and a tinted mineral veil for night wear. Love, love, love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It is summer time. I am constantly looking for the perfect foundation in the summer. My completion is a shade darker than usual in the summer. I found the perfect color for my skin.. I love BareMinerals and have been using BM for years.
When I mix my foundation routine up for a while it's always great to come back to this one! I always forget how amazing it is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for 2 years now and haven't found something that compares. I have oily skin and enlarged pores, so a lot of foundations don't work because they melt right off, get cakey or separated on my face, or even make my pores look larger. This stuff is incredible! I use it over moisturizer and primer, and occasionally I layer a tinted moisturizer under it when I want a little bit more wear out of it. I use a real techniques buffing brush to buff in a small amount (and I mean reallyyy buff it in!) and it looks flawless! My pores don't disappear, but then again nothings ever done that. Depending on how much you use, I'd say it's light-medium coverage. I still get oily throughout the day but not as bad as other things I've tried, but no matter how long I wear it it doesn't cake up, or separate or look patchy. It just looks like my skin. I'll just use a blotting sheet or touch up with powder and I'm good. I think I'll be a user for life!

OK, so I've been looking for that perfect foundation for summer days (you know- that never ending search for the perfect foundation), and although I'm not quite sure I've settled on this as my favorite/everyday foundation, I absolutely LOVE this foundation! It's great for light coverage, has SPF 15, and has great ingredients so I don't feel bad covering my face in it:) I could go on for days... Basically, it's a great light foundation that I love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really best powder out there...and I have tried many! You can wear it alone (which I did for years) or on top of your favorite foundation (which I do now- my makeup lasts all day...really 6am-10pm) Worth the money!
I've tried several foundations, this one is AMAZING! great coverage, easy to apply, long lasting! It also wipes off easily at the end of the day and have noticed less breakouts as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing!!! A lot of people don't like it because they don't know how to properly use it. This product must be buffed into the skin, not just lightly dusted over. I pair it with the Sephora brand 45 mineral brush and I end up with a flawless finish! It doesn't look like there is anything on my skin! I do have oily ish skin but this turns it into a natural, youthful looking glow instead!!

This foundation have me absolutely no coverage. I bought the brush the women suggested, and tap, swirl, whatever the heck you do and it looked like I had no makeup on, which sometimes is good but when you're trying to cover redness and blemishes- no. It smelled weird and overall I'm not a fan. One star because it did match my skin tone well, or maybe nothing was even on my skin. I don't know.

This foundation has great coverage except on any area with larger pores and wrinkles. It makes my pores look HUGE! I also really hate the smell, it reminds me of dirty playground sand. It's too bad though because the parts of my face that it works on have great coverage and it stays in place all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing natural finish; need to touch up after a few hours tho.

Best foundation I have EVER used, I've probably used over 20. I have never used a foundation that looks so natural yet Delivers such great coverage! It's very buildable so you can get medium- full cover or a light coverage I use this with bronzer and mascara and it looks great! And it's supper quick and easy to apply it blends great and gives you a glowing look to your face!

reviews.review_title: for a everyday use for ppl w/ acne prone skin
reviews.review_text: I love it. I use it mostly everyday and I never break out anymore. The only time I use liquid is for special events. Not full coverage, but great to cover blemishes although I still use bronzer or some color after.

So I recently bought this foundation which came in a set. I was so excited about this because I've been wanting it for a really long time and happened to fall in love with it. One of my problems before I tried this out was that when I would put foundation on, it wouldn't look natural. Well that's not a problem with this. I really like that when I apply this on my skin... It's my skin but 10 times better!! I also really love that it lasts all day!! Really recommend! Worth every penny! Defiantly repurchasing :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Using for years would not ever use anything else just love it. Stays on all day. Feels like no make up on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: From Australia to Hawaii or everyday work wear to parties with the girls... This is the best and easiest loose powder foundation i have used. I team this with a BB cream to give me a long lasting finish.  I'm a Beauty Therapist in Australia, so my skin is judged every day by strangers... And the 1 product they love, is my makeup...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This makeup generally looks great on my cheeks and forehead, but does not always come on nicely on my nose and upper lip. On bad days, it tends to clump around my pores (which are actually pretty small) and once that happens, there is not getting it to look good no matter how much I try to smooth it out. Not good for buildable coverage in these areas. A pro is that it has not caused me to break out.

reviews.review_title: Can't Find Anything to Knock This One Out...
reviews.review_text: I have been using this stuff since I was headed out of my teens, and while my skin has changed a little, the amazing qualities I loved about this foundation certainly haven't. I have really tried with liquid foundations to cover my sensitive, acne-prone, combo and (oh, buddy) fine line-starting skin...they just don't seem to hold up. I also work in a humid environment, and Bare minerals (with light primer application in trouble spots) is the easiest thing to touch up. Even if I am sweating, it wears off more naturally and without creating awkward color patches on my face. I have tried ALL the drugstore/less expensive dupes, but they simply aren't comparable. I have sensitive skin with acne problems, so I need the legit ingredients of BareMinerals and its excellent, buildable medium coverage.
This product works wonders on me!! I'm so happy I finally found my perfect foundation!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this product after primer and with just this, my make up is done!  Very good coverage and no need to put powder after this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've gone through several containers of bare minerals and I love it!! I always have a backup. The powder just melts onto your skin, is super blendable, and covers so well! I have acne and hyper pigmentation and I think BM does an incredible job of covering it up without feeling like a thick mask. It doesn't cover everything, but tones it down to the point that I am very happy. I think this might even do a better job than liquid foundation because it kind of sits on the skin and covers beautifully but is lightweight. I use the max cover concealer brush to first apply the foundation to the spots and redness so that it's concentrated coverage and then buff a little extra all over with the full flawless face brush. For light coverage, I just buff all over. I will say that it is not super long lasting, but I find that taking a small amount and buffing after a few hours refreshens it. Sometimes I use Urban Decay deslick and it seems to make the foundation last longer. It is a great every day foundation. I can't say enough good things about BM and I love that it has spf 15. Definitely get color matched and give it a try!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. No messy creams, only a brush & this stuff glides right on & stays on smoothly all day. I will never wear anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing foundation, it does not look cakey and it looks very natural. But, for some reason after wearing this product for over 3 hours my nose would always starts to get oily even though my skin type is dry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is awesome! I have fair skin and it blends in and matches my skin perfectly. It gives the right amount of coverage and it isn't cakey at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in fair after my aunt had said that it was the perfect product with or without anything else and it is! I can wear it alone or just with concealer or with foundation and concealer. It always makes my face look and feel fresh and I will definitely repurchase!
I have skin that can be oily but this makeup suits my skin well and doesn't make me more oily like other products can. I also have acne and marks it covers very well. It also gives a pretty glow.

reviews.review_title: Sorry I didn't try it sooner!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I seriously live this stuff and can't believe I didn't try it sooner! I love the coverage and how light it feels! I do dab a bit of concealer on any blemishes first, then buff and I'm done! I'm in between colors (a tiny but of a summer tan) so I mix my shade with a lighter color from the getting started kit that I purchased and it looks great!

reviews.review_title: Fab once I learnt how apply to suit my needs
reviews.review_text: Ok so about a year ago I got this used it a few times and then just left it in my make up bag to just go off. Just for reference I used golden medium. So in the meantime I used the ready foundation alongside with the flat precision brush. After a while the ready made me have dry patches on my cheeks so stopped using it. I then thought I'll have another go with the original and am I glad I did!!. I use the same brush for the ready and swirl onto my skin and then tap it into my areas for fuller coverage. People say I look glowing and I feel my make up takes half the time :) fab coverage and no patchea

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, THIS PRODUCT IS NOT NON-COMEDOGENIC. There are a lot of reviews with people guessing that it is, and I guessed that way myself, but my dermatologist yesterday when I asked him said that NO it is not. It WILL clog your pores.  I have been using this makeup for a year and a half, however, before I found that out. The reason I have used it so long is because it truly does look really good on your skin, it looks natural.  However, it does get oily if you put on a moisturizer on first before you apply. If I didn't use a lotion, then it didn't get oily throughout the day.  It doesn't hide blemishes great, but it makes them more subtle in a way that looks natural, not like makeup caked on your face.  I would keep buying this product if not for what my dermatologist said yesterday. If you have acne prone skin, you probably shouldn't buy this makeup. If not, it does have a nice finish to it.
I always end up coming back to this,

reviews.review_title: Good coverage, but tough on dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the famed coverage of bare minerals foundation, I have a lot of acne scaring that are all still very red and it covers them really well. That being said, my number 2 skin concern is that I have VERY dry skin and this only seems to magnify that discomfort. I wish I could find the best of both worlds.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. As I get older it was harder to find a foundation that gives me coverage and not heavy, this foundation is all that and more.
Very good powder with a light natural feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly would've given this a 4.5 stars instead of a 5 stars and this is my reason why. First of all, let me start off by saying that I have, maybe not the worst, but not the best acne problem. So, needless to say, coverage was one of my biggest issues when I was choosing out my next foundation to use. This mineral foundation gives the same coverage as a BB cream, definitely not as good as a liquid foundation. But considering that this is a mineral foundation, that's pretty good. Since buying this foundation, the longest that I've been out at one time while wearing this foundation has been 7-8 hours and this foundation has lasted the entire time, which I'm extremely glad for. However, while it does stay on, it does have a tendency to become slightly oily throughout the day, which you can easily fix with oil blotting sheets or keeping around a setting powder (I prefer the sheets).  Also, as a side note, I read a review in which someone said that this product was too itchy? I didn't experience this problem, but when I looked into the ingredients, this foundation, as well as most other mineral foundation and powdered products, contains bismuth oxychloride, which may cause irritation and itchiness to the skin, as well as possibly acne. So if you're someone with skin that is sensitive, I would do a little more in depth research on this product before you purchase it.
excellent coverage, SPF, easy application. don't really know what I would do w/o it.

reviews.review_title: My 'I can't live without this' makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wear this all of the time! It takes my face from looking drab...to looking fab! It's all natural...feels like nothing on my skin and has SPF! I never have to worry about having break outs with this and wear it during my night shift at work. It keeps my skin from looking greasy too. It's perfect for the summer for a natural look that helps your skin look more even toned! I love this...I cannot go without this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I puecahsed Bare Minerals via the TV but I went to Sephora for color adjustment. I found want I was looking for. With a little trial and error I found almost a perfect match in foundation

reviews.review_title: Why did I wait so long?
reviews.review_text: Amazing light coverage with a natural look. It smooths on easily and covers blotches, blemishes and the like. Worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying to find a foundation that would not settle into light wrinkles and thought I had found the one. The powder made my face itchy and I sneezed for about an hour after application. In addition to the physical problems, it was just so much work to get the product on. Tap, swirl, tap, buff, tap, poof...My arm literally hurt after applying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to foundation. It's light and not oily, and offers even coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first started using Bare Minerals after coming across it at a factory outlet centre in Las Vegas whilst on vacation. Before then I had been using a Maybelline 24hr stay liquid foundation and it had not been working for me (skin still became oily and cause major breakouts). The lady in store recommended it to me, saying not only would it be better for my skin it would improve it, it would also give me great coverage and be easier to apply - being a powder. All the things that the lady said in-store was true. I have been using it for over 6 months and my acne-prone skin has improved dramatically. I'm still on my first jar (mind you it nearly over) and use it nearly every day, It works great with a primer (the bare minerals one works particularly well) but I've worn it plenty of times without and it still works wonders. For those with a deep-skin tone wondering whether this product has the right shade from you - I'm a NW40 in Mac and I find Golden Tan a great match to my skin tone. As its a powder you can really blend it into your skin so even if the colour is a little off with enough buffing you can find the perfect balance between coverage and colour. I usually apply it with a blush or powder brush - no need to buy the bare minerals one and a little goes a long way. It is also very build-able if you're looking for extra coverage. The only cons I would give it, is that if you have excessively oily skin maybe matte bare minerals is better suited, and this eventually after a 4-5 hrs will become slightly oily (use some blotting paper or pressed powder) and the coverage is not as good as a liquid although fairly close. If you're considering buying this product I strongly urge you to give it a go, it works better then you think and is a lot cheaper then other brands for the amount and quality you get.

I typically wear a light layer of Urban Decay Naked Ultra Definition makeup and follow it with a light layer of this bareMinerals Original Foundation. I cannot tell you how many times I have women stop and ask what makeup I use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love bareminerals I have used both the matte and the original as well as the well rested concealer. I almost feel like the original foundation doesnt cover as well as the matte foundation but that may be because I am finally applying it the way you are supposed to and need to build up the coverage. PSA THIS STUFF IS NOT SPARKLY WHEN IT IS ON YOUR FACE. I was worried about that but honestly i dont notice shimmer when its on. it is definitely a more dewy look than the original.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the fact that this powder gives you coverage and has SPF 15. It's all you really need to use in the summer when you don't want heavy makeup.
This is probably one of the best foundation powders I have ever used.!! Makes my skin look so great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this powder - goes on really nicely, esp with the BM brush, but it's all over the bathroom counter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate the mess! Lose powder is just so inconvenient compared to pressed. I bought this after I received a sample and thought the color was perfect. I like the way it looks natural (almost no make up) and not cakey. I was using Make Up Forever pressed foundation, but it oxidized on my skin and looked very cakey. I have noticed a few small bumps around the hair line and chin after switching, but I can't say for sure if it is from this product. Overall it is the most natural looking powder I've ever used, so for that reason alone I plan to keep buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for years and I'm still as much in-love with it as I've ever been. I'm going to continue to repurchase this product forever because it's my top go-to foundation when I choose to do a no makeup makeup look (which is quite a bit because who has time to slather on tons of makeup every morning?). I enjoy that it doesn't make my face look cakey, and it's just very natural (you know, the whole my skin but better thing).

reviews.review_title: Still not sure how I feel about it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Im not used to using loose powders so Im still getting used to it! One of the best packaging for loose foundation tho!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bare Minerals Original Foundation is an awesome product. It covers skin discolorations, goes on effortlessly & keeps covering all day. I would highly recommend it to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have been a loyal fan for this foundation powder for a good 10+ years and still loving it. Great coverage! Just make sure you get the right shade.

I have been using this foundation a couple of years now and cannot say enough good things about it. I prefer a natural look and this foundation gives me just that. It is super easy to apply and long lasting. I definitely recommend this product!

This stuff is great - if you plan on wearing it for 5 minutes! It looked so nice when I first applied it, my skin looked naturally flawless! I wore it outside for about 5 minutes and then I went into the movies. 2.5 hours later I looked like a cakey splotchy mess! It was awful! And it completely rubbed off of my blemishes so they were completely exposed! I really had high hopes for this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My HG powder foundation forever and always. It looks like I have nothing on. It looks flawless on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I swore off drugstore foundations in my early 20's when I discovered bareMinerals. I thought I would never go back to liquid foundation after this. True, my skin feels clean after wearing this. I still cringe at the thought of putting liquid foundation on nowadays. I'm now in my late 20's and those fine lines that appear around your eyes and mouth tend to pool this foundation in, making me look older! Plus, if you have oily skin, or sweat in humid weather, this will break apart, and look horrible (and there's no way to try and blend it together to fix it!) I'll miss the feeling of this makeup (I was matched to Makeup forever HD foundation and I love it now!) I thought it provided decent coverage, I have some flat dark pigmented moles on my face, this plus makeup forever concealer were able to cover them up completely. For a flawless face: moisturize, and apply in circular motions with CLEAN brushes... and make sure you don't have oily skin w/ fine lines :( I'll miss you bareMinerals foundation!

I just switched to bareMinerals about a week ago and I love love love this foundation! I have extremely fair skin and got the fair color of this foundation, and even that wasn't quite right for me. I was previously using a liquid foundation and I just felt like it was too much coverage and too orange for my skin. When I stumbled upon this powder foundation I knew I needed to try it. My skin is in fairly good condition so I was excited about using something that will cover but not cake on and that is exactly what this makeup does. It gives you smooth all over coverage while still maintaining a natural look. It is easy to apply and it is so lightweight. By far my favorite foundation I've ever used!

Been using this foundation for roughly 4 years and ill never use anything else. Gives me the perfect glow and coverage that i need! And its the ONLY foundation that doesn't make me break out and get bumpy things on my face! I recommend this 100%!! Plus it lasts a loooong time! I buy 2 or 3 during the entire year but thats because i use it DAILY!!

reviews.review_title: Tried and true, great as always.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the ability to be able to have light coverage or to be able to layer. I also love using it as a concealer with the concealer brush. Just a little swirl over a blemish makes it go away and it doesn't irritate or clog pores. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for something where I didn't have to use a liquid foundation and have enough coverage without the thick look. This is definitely the product to use for just that! The ONLY and I mean ONLY reason I gave 4 stars is because if you don't let your moisturizer dry completely it will melt right off your face.. Not a pretty look! I have combination skin and I would purchase again and again!!
Made my skin very dry, had to return.

reviews.review_title: OMG where have you been all my life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so after trying so many high end foundations..i was still not happy with the way they looks. i have medium to oily skin and one day i was like i need to try bare minerals..and so i remembered that i had actually gotten a little sample kit with my sephora points...and although the shade i was testing was too light for me...the way this foundation just sat on my ski was just amazing...i went straight to sephora to buy my color and i am so in love! it lasted me forever....i went to the mall and walked and i walked outside and its been like 8 hours since i applied it and i have not retouched my face at all and it looks flawless. I already have nice skin..except for the occasional pimples and this just glides through my skin..and i even forget i am wearing make up. it is so amazing...needless to say i found my perfect match

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone skin and years earlier my scarring was quite bad and my skin is difficult so I needed something that covered well but lasted all day. No matter what I tried, nothing worked. I literally tried everything Sephora had (Laura Mercier, Make up forever, Hourglass, Lorac, Stila, the list goes on) FInally at Sephora I decided to get matched for Bare MInerals since they carry so many shades and its been a match made in heaven ever since. Bare MInerals covers well, doesn't make me break out and lasts all day. I love it, its my go to foundation, no other foundation works for me! Bare minerals gave me my confidence back, luckily my skin is so much better nowadays but I still cannot be without my bare minerals.

Absolutely perfect.
