I have acne-prone, sensitive, dry skin and I struggled for years trying to find something that would cover my breakouts without irritating my skin, seeping into my dry patches, or the worst - causing me to break out more, but this product has done wonders for skin! If I'm breaking out, it completely covers the breakouts. if my skin is dry or flaky, I use my heavier moisturizer and after I put on the foundation, my face looks flawless! Get color matched by one of the very friendly employees and you get absolutely NO lines, it looks so natural! this really helps me because I'm blonde and sometimes it's difficult near the hairline. I've received so many compliments on my face after purchasing this product, all around five stars!

I have so many high end foundations and whenever I grab this on my vanity I always forget how much I love this foundation. It's great for everyday use. I'm a boy, and when I wear this foundation people always say,you have such beautiful skin, rather than,your makeup looks good. I have combo skin with an incredibly oily t-zone, and I'm a dog groomer so I'm getting water splashed on me all day and by the end of my 9-10 hour shift my face still looks pretty good and I only have to blot my nose 1-2 times. This foundation gives you the appearance of naturally healthy and youthful skin without being detectable !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know what it is about this foundation, but every time I wear it I am always complimented on my skin and how healthy it looks. I use the Medium Beige mixed with Medium Tan to get a perfect shade for my skin tone. Cannot be without this foundation. I have large pores and pits in my skin from having acne in the past, and this foundation blurs everything, yet still has a slight luminosity to it so my face doesn't look flat or dry. t have been using this foundation since high school and I am now 27. Highly recommend!!
My wife loves this product!

I have very acne prone skin, but bareminerals has never caused me to breakout. I don't even feel like I'm wearing makeup! I also have acne scarring and uneven skin, but bareminerals gives me flawless coverage and evens my completion. As long as you make sure you get the right shade, you're set. Sometimes it makes my skin feel tight, but doesn't dry me out at all.

I love this foundation, there's so many great things to say about it: -This is the only foundation that does not break me out, not even 1 pimple -It gives such a natural finish -My face does not feel heavy when I wear this foundation -It's cheaper than most high-end products, but gives better results than high end -I have 12 hour work days, manager at a restaurant so you can only imagine how much running around I do... and this foundation still looks good at the end of the day  I've tried many drugstore and high end liquid foundations and this is just my favorite. Of course, it does take longer to apply because you have to do the whole swirl and buff routine, but it's really not that bad.  I have both the full flawless face brush and the real techniques expert face brush and I usually alternate. Both work GREAT, however the real techniques does NOT shed, so I prefer using that one.

Can't go wrong with this. Dust it on or get your brush wet & use as concealer. I do use it less as winter dries me out & I hate having to switch to a cream foundation...it does make me flaky during Indiana winters tho.

reviews.review_title: Season changes beware, bareMinerals is here!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation for so many reasons! Works great for a day where you want to just get out and go, but can also build to a full coverage for a night out. Get two shades, the lightest you are in the winter and the darkest you are in the summer and you can create an endless array of colors to match your skin! An excellent foundation for those who don't actually like foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this concealer! At first it was a little hard to get used to as it looked too light but I think I was putting too much on. Don't need much for great coverage! It's perfect with the mineral powder from Bare Essentials!. Be sure to use an eye cream under. It blends better. I have rosacea and I put this on my nose as well. Great coverage all day! Try it as a base for your eyelids too. Keeps the eyeshadow in tact. Wonderful product!

I've used many foundations but I always go back to this one I find it's actually more matte then the matte foundation is. I don't need to touch up as much. It has great coverage just make sure to build up slowly for best results. If you're oily I would personally recommend trying the original before getting he matte foundation the original seemed to control my oil a lot more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this powder. I have very oily skin on my T-zone and I have sensitive skin so I break out easily. but when I use this powder it keeps the shine away for about 7hrs, 6 when its humid. I use it along with the primer and it stays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gives great coverage that looks very natural, but after using this for a long time I noticed when I was in the sun my face would start to tingle and itch so bad to where I had to get out of the sun. For that reason, I stopped using this. Myabe it happened because I have dry skin, but it was unbearable. I would use this at night only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's been a while since I bought BareMinerals and now that I'm going through menopause, I'm always perspiring in my face which I hate! It used to work for me but now I need something that will matte my makeup. This gives you a shine which my face already has from the perspiration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like most, I was skeptical about using a powder foundation, I wanted to look natural not cakey. I was constantly falling in and out of love with foundations until now. This foundation melts into your skin for a flawless finish and looks absolutely fantastic and natural. It lasts the whole day without shine peeking through. A must buy for anyone searching for that truly perfect fit me foundation.

reviews.review_title: Finally foundation that matches my skin...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently ordered the Original BM Foundation in Golden Medium (a total guess based on what I know about my skin and the not-exactly drugstore makeup-friendly undertones that come from being hapa in a region of the US where there aren't many Japanese people or Asian people in general). And I have to say, I LOVE this stuff. I have oily skin, which makes wearing liquid makeup nigh impossible, so I'm used to wearing powder foundation. But BM is by far the best mineral foundation I've tried -- it is slightly fuller coverage, it blends sooo well with my summer skin (+ a little bit of bronzer), and it leaves me looking glowy -not greasy - at the end of the day. I also really appreciate the locking mechanism inside the cap... why don't other powder makers do that?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. I always have trouble blending foundation along my hair line because my hair color is so light. With this foundation I have no issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the BM matte formula which was too drying and flat for me. Was hoping this original formula would be the fix as I used it years ago with happy results and stopped for some reason... Anyway, this turned out to be too non-matte, if that makes sense. Used it with a BM primer that I think was not a good match for my skin type, which may have been a contributing factor, but even without that this seemed to slide-off my skin and also oxidize with any oily zones. I know others with less combo skin that have great results with this product though, so I think it's just not meant for my skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty oily skin and I've heard wonders about this foundation from everyone who uses it but it simply just comes right off my face and lasts like, 3 hours. I prime and everything. Covers surprisingly well, but after 2 days of using it it started giving me small pimples everywhere, which was really upsetting.

Love Bare Minerals, but when I received the package, one of the Bare Minerals loose powder containers' bottom was completely off of it. Needless to say, everything in the package was coated with the powder. Waiting patiently for a new one, but haven't heard anything after sending it back a couple of weeks ago:(

bareminerals provides incredible buildable and breathable coverage. it feels so light on the skin but provides impressive full coverage.it blends perfectly to match your skin tone but it does not mask your face. I am super happy with this product! just bought my 3rd order!

I've been using this product ever since it came out. I've tried others in between, but have always found my way back to this one. I have olive color skin, and the Light foundation works perfectly. I use this with a great blush and bronzer, and my skin looks great. With this, make sure to start out with a small amount and slowly add more. A little does go a long way. If you add too much too fast, you will get a weird sheen all over your face. So don't rush! :-)

reviews.review_title: Returning to Bare Minerals...why did I leave?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used Bare Minerals years ago, and at one point started picking up some drugstore brand liquid foundation because of budget constraints. I decided to treat myself last week and I can't believe I ever used anything else! I will say that watching the tutorial videos at BE really helped- a little goes a long way, buff like your life depends on it, and build coverage with light layers. My skin is luminous and I can decide the amount of coverage I want depending on what my day looks like. It always looks natural, feels great on my skin, and touches up flawlessly. I have found that using a primer or BB creme before you get started makes a huge difference! I recommend getting the Get Started kit with the primer, original formula foundation, matte formula foundation, brush, mineral veil and warmth bronzer. The price is right and you can try a lot of products out to decide which ones you really like. Also, get shade matched in store! I thought I would go darker in the summer but the tan shades were still too deep for me- turns out an extra layer of bronzer was all I needed to match my summer glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it covers perfectly, it feels great and looks even better. I even made a believer out of my daughter who had forgotten her makeup bag, and was desperate enough to try mine. and she fell in love with it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Since it is all minerals TSA does not have to check it at the airport. The best about it is that it does not come off on your clothing should you decide to change what your wearing. You need someone who wears it to show you how to put it on. Used it for over 10yrs

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had bought this a year ago and it wasnt until last month that I really figured out how to make this look good on my skin. The swirl tap buff method works. The trick is not to use too much, you just need a small amount on the cap and that is enough for a light coverage. Just put more on the cap after your first application for a higher coverage. This is slightly inconvenient since you have to put your brush down, it can become messy, and it takes longer than liquid foundation. But after you buff, the foundation will stay on your face for the rest of the day. Buff for at least a minute to get all the powder to stick to your face.  It does take to some work to get the coverage that you need. I like that it doubles as a concealer when you use any concealer brush. Buffing is your friend. Also using a primer and the mineral veil helps it last all day on my face. It is now my go to for the spring/summer. BB creams don't work for my oily/normal skin during the humid days we have in NYC.
I love the application and coverage of this product. My skin always looks good when I use it, but the problem is it makes me break out, especially on my forehead. I was very disappointed.

I got a free sample of the light powder foundation, and at first, I loved it. However, when the weather changed and became hot and humid, it seemed to melt off of my face. That being said, I would definitely recommend this if you live in a cooler and/or dryer climate. If not, it may be good if you have an extremely good finishing powder to put on over this.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to like it but....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Since I am expecting a baby boy next month, I decided to try and find an quick and easy foundation that left me looking natural, yet flawless. After reading all the amazing reviews on Bare Minerals, along with the price, I thought 'Why not?! A powder foundation without the mess of liquid foundation, the melting effect you get from liquids in the hot summer months, and not having to wait for it to set...I thought it would be perfect. When I put it on, it looks flawless! Absolutely beautiful...Covers up everything I need it to, gives me a natural healthy glow, and I feel sexy with it...Then a few hours go by and it just doesn't hold up at all, it looks terrible! It gets super blotchy down the center of my nose, totally evaporates on the cheeks like nothing is there...I feel prettier with no make-up at all. I've tried different lotions, primers, brushes, nothing helps...It just kind of stinks because it looks beautiful when first applied, but after 5 hours I look like poo. Another thing is that I can feel it on my face too. I barely apply a dime size-nickel size amount on my face so it's not like I apply tons to my face to cake it up. Also, After a couple days I already started breaking out =( I guess it's not for everyone.... It is strange too, because I don't have oily skin what so ever, yet with this foundation, I feel like I do...No good.

I have fair skin and I love golden medium shade. I have been using this brand for over 6 years. It leaves my skin looking so natural with just the right amount of coverage. I never break out using this. It leaves my skin so smooth and radiant. I will never use any other mineral makeup.

reviews.review_title: loved it but needs improvement on color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: loved the soft texture of the powder. The colors for yellow undertones for this comes out too orangy. If you have yellow undertones it may comeout looking more orange on you. So you have to decide to look lighter or darker.
I love this foundation

reviews.review_title: Best natural finish! Just don't use their brushes.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most natural-looking foundation I've ever used, both in person and in pictures; there's a shade for every skin tone! I've used bareMinerals Matte (hard to blend, not as natural), Make Up For Ever, Clinique, Korres, drugstore foundations, and this one just outshines them all! (Not literally, of course- rather, it unshines.) Several years ago, I stopped using this because the bareMinerals brushes I bought shed more hairs than a cat, and I was tired of picking them off of my clothes and face. However, I picked up this powder again a few months ago and decided to use a cheap synthetic face brush with it instead, and it works a charm now! HIghly recommend this foundation.

Such a great product! One of the best foundations I've ever tried! I love the original foundation in the winter because (even though it's a powder) will give u hydration without making you look or feel oily. I prefer to use the matte one in the summer though. Amazing coverage. ONE OF THE MOST NATURAL LOOKING FOUNDATIONS ON THE SKIN

Can't say enough about this product. I've been using it since 2007 and I love it. Some background: I don't wear makeup often, usually only eyeliner and Chapstick. But every once in a while I would want my face to look more even and luminous. This foundation leaves you with a flawless finish without clogging your pores. A must have!

reviews.review_title: I have always loved this product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved this product ever since I started using it about 6 years ago. Only down side, is the price keeps going up on it!
Very easy to use. Perfect for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was perfectly content with this foundation for about 3 years. It cleared up my skin, looked like I wasn't wearing anything at all. Suddenly, it made my skin feel tight and dehydrated. Oh well, still a really wonderful product!

reviews.review_title: Over 10 years now, and never disappointed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Recently I read an article in Oprah, beauty mistakes older women make (I'm 43) and one was continuing to use powder as it settles into fine lines. So I research and decide to try a nice Givenchy product, with no luck. The cream base left my skin dryer looking than using powder and the cream settled into the fine lines more than this power. Sticking with bareMinerals, wonderful product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've got dry skin so I generally avoid powder foundations, but when I talked to a bare minerals SA, she assured me that this foundation would be perfect on me. She couldn't have been more wrong. Not only did the foundation look cakey, but it picked up on every dry, flakey spot on my skin. I looked better without anything on.  I can't give this one star though, because I understand that it probably works really well on oily skins. Its just not natural looking at all on me. Dry skinned ladies, just stick to liquid foundations or tinted moisturizers for light coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this powder foundation. Its so lights weight, but still very good coverage, that is buildable. Even if you build the coverage, this does not feel like a mask of makeup on your face. I would say it will give a medium to full coverage. I use the handy buki brush, which also is great, and the concealer brush to cover spots that needs it. Even though it looks natural and not cakey on the skin, like i have found other liquid foundation to do. This does not make me break out eater. Also i feel like the foundation looks better through out the day, it gives a nice glow to the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect mineral foundation for me! The color matches, coverage is just what I want. I prefer powder foundation in the spring/summer months, and this is exactly what I need/want.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I often try new foundations, only to find that they make me break out. This has natural, buildable coverage and it doesn't clog my pores. It's not the most long-wearing foundation, but I have yet to find something better.

reviews.review_title: I changed my mind on this stuff with experimenting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Originally I had bought bare minerals and I never really got the coverage I needed and it was spotty. I have very oily/acne-prone skin and needed something with more coverage. No matter what I tried I couldn't get this foundation to work for me. So it sat for a couple of years in my drawer because I felt guilty to throw it out.  Fast forward to now, I came across it again and decided to try a different technique with it. I dumped a little of the foundation into a very small dish and then sprayed my mineral hydrating facial mist on top of it (one spray). I then mixed it together with my brush and it became a light weight liquid. I found that it spread evenly and the coverage was a lot better and it looked more natural. Shortly after I applied it to my face it dried to a powder finish. I mixed it in small portions as I was applying it on a certain area of my face before I moved on to the next. I am now happy with using the foundation and glad I can put it to use. My acne has actually cleared up a bit with use of it. I hope my review might help some other people who was having the same difficulty I was. If you don't have a facial mist spray I suggest making a small spray bottle and just filling it with water and follow the same steps (making sure when you spray its very light). However some of you might just try their new liquid foundation instead. ;) Either way works.

I bought this foundation due to raving reviews and was not pleased. I have a lot of redness and acne and it hardly did anything, it was like putting a translucent powder on my face, regardless how many layers I applied. This foundation made my face extremely oily as well. Only reason I have 1 star is because it make my skin so smooth.

reviews.review_title: Good colour selection, not good for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had heard so much about Bare Minerals that I really wanted to try this out. The BM line seems to have a really great selection of shades and healthy ingredients for the skin, as well as broad spectrum SPF. Unfortunately, I found this to be way too shimmery for my oily skin, and it just got worse as the day wore on. Perhaps works better for other skin types. In comparison, the BM Matte foundation works much better for controlling oil, but it looked too heavy and flat. Not a Bare Minerals fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't use anything else and have tried some of the best powders. This is light and has great coverage with the right brushes. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a few years now and I LOVE IT. It's the only foundation that doesn't make me break out (i have super sensitive skin). I always get asked what I use on my face and their primer and foundation is always my answer :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really skeptical about loose powder foundations, but when I got to try a little sample of it, I totally saw my face was oil-free mostly throughout the day. I always apply this foundation over my liquid foundation just to give a little bit of more a matte look. Although it says its original, it still gives a matte and flawless look! I just reordered the full-size online. I would recommend this product for combination/oily skin type, just get the right shade and you will love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy a medium to full coverage foundation so that is probably why I did not enjoy this makeup. At most its medium coverage. Its absolutely perfect for when you have those no make up days;)

I used bare minerals probably 10 years ago, and really liked it. I recently moved to LA and wanted something that might hold up in the humidity, so I thought to give it another shot. I hated the way it looked. I feel as though it exaggerated my pores and imperfections. Sorry Bare Minerals, but I'm no longer a fan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage but seemed to make dry patches stand out more. Looked a bit cakey on me.

reviews.review_title: Good but laura mercier did it better
reviews.review_text: BM is a nice foundation. Blends well and lots of shades to choose from. But in my opinion laura mercier mineral foundation is much better. Not sure what it is about it, just looks better on the skin. More natural, less likely to look cakey, harder to overdo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this stuff for 5 years. It covers well. I am now pregnant and developed rosacea in this pregnancy...never have I had it before in my life until now. Well I like this makeup because it covers the redness well, without causing the rocasea become irritated and worse. I'm excited for the rosacea to go away after I give birth and I will continue to use bare minerals as I did before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My face is very oily & when I tried out this out, it only stayed on one-2 hours. It had nice coverage & color, but it never stays on. I tried it with anything possible for it to stay on my face but nothing worked. I'm now using my Sephora foundation & in love <3 hoped this helped with any one with oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So first off I never knew powders could cover this well. This foundation really is a foundation, you can layer it aslight or as thick as you want. I don't like the look when people make this full coverage because it is so matte and you can tell that the person has a layer of makeup on but if done naturally (light-med coverage) then it can truly look great. This stuff lasts a long time too. I really like this foundation for days when I have more time and can actually buff through instead of using my usual tinted moisturizer.

I sampled this and my skin broke out into itchy red blotches. I thought it may have been the brush so I tried it with one of my own brushes, but still the same issue. If you have sensitive skin I would recommend trying a sample before buying this product.

I had a few friends that were Bareminerals advocates. When the brand I usually bout changed their formula I decided to try this on for size. Unfortunately I am SUPER pale and getting the tone to match just wasn't happening. It did make my skin look nice, but it was too dark. I had too many family members asking if I had gone tanning. YIKES!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this product provide get overage but I never look powdery or overly matte. Gives an amazingly natural finish and lasts on the face. I'm 47and dry skinned so I was skeptical but this product makes my skin look fantastic. The product I found did settle into fine lines is the powder concealer. But the bare minerals is a daily staple in my make up routine. An excellent product.

It's not the best color-match but it's hard to find a perfect match when you're a woman of color, especially for deeper-toned brown skin. It is, however, easy to apply and blend, does provide good coverage, and stays well-put on my oily skin. The packaging also goes a long way in avoiding wasting it and helping it last a long time. Definitely a decent investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for YEARS. The coverage is flawless without looking too cakey. I have dry to combination skin but really hate using liquid foundation on the regular because I fear it will make me break out. I use a primer on my face prior to putting this one (Smashbox's Photo Finish Primer) and this goes on so perfectly. It gives great coverage without looking too heavy and is good for your skin. A little bit goes a long way! I wear this almost daily and it still takes me about six months to get through an entire package of it. Love love love and such a great price for the amount of product you get and how long it actually takes to get through.

Wow! This is one h3ll of a buy. I find that this foundation is light on the skin but gives perfect coverage and makes skin look quite flawless. You feel like you are wearing nothing at all! The makeup doesn't cause break-outs like others and on top of the bareMinerals Prime Time foundation primer, it is perfect and quick and easy to apply in the morning.  Definitely well worth the buy, once you try this, nothing else will be up to par.  I have pale skin and blue eyes, my colour was: Fairly Light

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin tone is not an easy match, but this hit the marks. Covers up and evens out my skin tone without looking like a mask like some foundation can.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. After using mac foundations for many years my skin began to react to them. I started using this product because I wanted a natural look and something that wouldn't irritate my skin. When you first wear it you'll notice it's not as full coverage as a liquid but still build able. I started using another liquid and found my skin got bad again. I'm glad they recently came out with a liquid formula definitely going to try it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My aunt turned me onto BareMinerals for my wedding day. I love this stuff. It controls oils well along with long wear and light weight.
I've heard tons of good thing about this one, so I tried, but I didn't like it. When I have dry patches on my cheek area, it turns to enlarge it instead of smooth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying this product. I could not figure out how to open and dispense product. I finally just used a make up brush on a clean primed facial surface. My complexion looked dull no color or radiance I reapplied just made my face worse. Not happy at all returned.
Excellent product. I love all of the bareMinerals products. It goes on light, with a nice matte finish. Hides minor flaws and evens skin tone without looking like I am wearing makeup at all.

I have played with a quiet of few foundations, liquid, powder, and matte. I have tried the cheaper ones and the more expensive ones. I actually prefer bare minerals from all the ones I've tried mainly because it gives your face a more natural look and feel. Your face won't feel heavy with makeup like it does when you wear liquid foundation. When it's humid outside your face won't be icky either. I give this a definite thumbs up, and will definitely keep purchasing more bare minerals makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bare Minerals was recommended to me by my dermatologist and it holds up to the advertising! It really makes my skin and complexion feel great!

I have been using this product since High school, it was the first foundation I ever wore. Light coverage. Perfect for every day. It doesn't stay as nice as some liquid foundations ( mufe HD or Smashbox halo) but it's quick and easy and looks great if u don't have too many blemishes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There's very few products that I use for many years but this is one that I have. It looks natural! Coverage: Light to medium I hear people complaining that it doesn't last all day...I started experiencing that more recently, however, if you make sure to put on a primer it helps a lot (don't forget setting powder). Setting sprays work wonders with this product too.
I have super dry skin and this makes my skin look and feel flawless without drying it out or feeling heavy

I really covers anything at all. Iove wearing BareMinerals. Love that it has more natural ingredients. Love that it feels nice or that it does not feel like liquid or powder. I find that it covers acne very very well. And if applied with kaboki brush in small Circles Is flawless. Does not sit in lines. Im 49

reviews.review_title: Been Using for about 7 years now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels light, goes on easy, been using for years now. I like the original better than the matte kind. I prefer this powder over liquid foundation. Looks natural. People tell me my skin looks like peaches and cream. I use fairly light. Only when my skin is really dry does this look powdery. I recommend for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This makes you look natural in that you have no coverage what-so-ever. I used to love this foundation about 2 years ago until I decided to try something else because I noticed that I had never seen a make-up artist use Bare Minerals before. There are just way better options in my opinion if you want a flawless coverage. I tried this again randomly today. My face has been itching like crazy which has led me to write this review. I'm not sure what the deal is but it is really irritating my skin. I also told my husband I tried a different foundation today, and I asked him if he thought my skin looked better or worse than normal in his opinion. He said it normally looks nicer than what it did today. Time to officially leave this foundation behind.
I love this stuff ! It's my absolute favorite foundation. Super light weight and breathable !
I ordered the wrong color. I love it but I'll see if my granddaughter says my face is dirty! I'll wait till later in the season when I'm tanned. This coming from a caramel black woman! Go figure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the Bare Minerals better than any mineral makeup I've used. Now if I had something to fade the brown spots on my face I'd be so happy. Nothing I've tried has helped. Any suggestions? Thanks.

I tried so many brand name products that caused facial break out after several use. One day I was shopping in JCP, I went into Sephora, purchased bare mineral products started wearing it got so any compliments about my skin and these product are so healthy and light weigh with sunscreen protection. I just love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation made my newly arrived adult acne less noticeable. Now that my acne has luckily lessened, it makes my skin look even better. I went from needing a little pink to mix in with the ugly acne and now I moved to a golden and I truly love it...it stays and needs just one translucent powder touch up about midway through my 12-16 hour days...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like to wear makeup without looking like I'm wearing makeup if you know what I mean. This foundation gives great coverage without covering too much. It just makes your skin and face look like a better version of itself. I am so happy I switched over to Bare Minerals. When I have this on people don't even think I'm wearing makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tolve how it covers the skin and I barely feel it's there. Since I started using this, I've noticed a difference in my skin. I'm not as oily at the end of the day.

this foundation is so natural looking! it blends so easily! I've used benefit's hello flawless powder for years but the fact that bare minerals has way fewer ingredients makes me feel better about using it. still love both but we'll see. the product does have some shimmer to it, so just keep that in mind! (it gives you a nice glow though. not over the top sparkly)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareminerals for for about 6 years and it is amazing.I mainly use it as a foundation but I find it also works perfectly as a setting powder and a concealer. It is the perfect foundation for everyday because it makes the skin look even and flawless but it doesn't look like I have a ton of makeup on my face and it's comfortable. I feel like I can touch my face and my foundation isn't going to wipe off. It also just feels so much healthier for my skin! The key with bareminerals is to apply is with a fluffier powder brush. I am currently using the Real Teachniques powder brush which works perfectly and is super soft. Bareminerals brushes work well at applying the minerals but I find them super scratchy and uncomfortable. Bareminerals was the first foundation I ever wore and it will probably be the last! I've tried all types of foundation (liquid, powder, cream..) nothing compares!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to, every day foundation/powder. I use a Smashbox BB Cream underneath this with some concealer and my skin looks flawless. I always get so many compliments on my skin/face makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent coverage, doesn't cake up. Once you finish with the mineral veil, your skin looks smooth and perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried to love this foundation so many times. It's easy to apply all over your face quickly if you want really light coverage. I have really red cheeks and I felt like it took me forever to make them look normal and even colored with this. Maybe because it's a powder. I don't know. Anyway, the thing that is always a turnoff for me and why I stop using it is because it makes my pores look huge. I don't know why but this makes my pores stand out more than any other foundation. It doesn't smooth my skin at all. It also doesn't last on my oily skin but for a couple of hours. I have tried many combinations of primers and finishing powders with it, but for some reason it just isn't great for me like it is for many other people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: History: I have acne-prone, oily AND dry, flaky skin. I have tried countless acne products, including numerous dermatologist prescribed products. The only thing that works longer than 3 months to keep my moderate acne at bay is an oral pill. It works for my acne, but I do have to be careful to use only non-comedogenic and gentle makeup/cleansers/lotions.  This product: I was concerned it did not say non-comedogenic anywhere. I called the brand and they told me ALL of their products are non-comedogenic, so it is not listed anywhere. I have tried the matte foundation before, and it dried out my skin, even in the somewhat oily areas. I gave this one a try, it has been over 2 weeks now, and this foundation definitely does not cause acne or dry out my skin. I didn't believe the reviews that said it made their skin better, but, I'm becoming a believer. I seem to have better skin without makeup than I did before. When I do have a breakout, this makeup seems to actually help the breakout heal faster than normal.  Coverage: The coverage is not light, which I was used to, it's closer to a medium coverage. (I switched foundations once I realized my old one was not non-comedogenic) For work and nice occasions, however, medium coverage has proven to be great for me. I love the added bonus of sunscreen. Sometimes I use a primer underneath, sometimes I don't. It doesn't seem to make much of a difference. The foundation doesn't have the BEST staying power through my oily areas after 8-10 hours, but I'm okay with that.  So far, I'll be sticking with this foundation.Hope this helps people that were on the fence about this product like I was!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this for 5 yrs and still love it. Good coverage for a few dark spots, yet feels light on my face. Ive honestly wondered what on earth I'd do if they ever stop making this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a hard time matching my skin tone and this is finally a foundation that does! Great for your skin too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation ever! Its amazing, your skin actually looks smoother and younger over time. I like trying new foundations but, I will always return to this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has the perfect color and coverage for my oily acne prone skin. It goes on easily and stays on all day (with my added finishing powder). I have no complaints. I love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin this is very gentle it looks good to.

I've used this foundation for 12 years. I do not have a single eye or laugh line wrinkle. I've use from age 19-31. I will keep using. I've struggled with acne and this has not caused any extra pore clogging. Currently in my age of 31, I'm clear(hydrogen peroxide as astringent has cleared me better than any prescription). It's an amazing foundation. I'm a true devoted fan for over a decade. It takes some getting used to if you only have used heavy liquid foundations. You can sleep in it. I just dab hydrogen peroxide before bed to avoid acne. This stuff is amazing. Kabuki and concealer brushes are a must! Warning:matte formula was so drying and splotchy. Get original!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this foundation as a concealer. I wore it years ago as a foundation and liked the way it looked but I have sensitive skin and when I got hot my face would itch in a major way. Recently I got a sample and used it with the BM Max Coverage Concealer Brush when I was trying to cover a blemish and cream products were not working and BAM, no more blemish. It was the most natural looking coverage with the luminosity, but super high coverage when applied with that brush and did not highlight the bump. I now wear less product and use this as a concealer to cover redness and occasional breakouts - I do not wear under my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this makeup for it's buildability (is that a word?) - I don't always want a full-coverage look, but BareMinerals can be applied sheer or full-coverage so there are lots of options! I also feel good baout it because the ingredients are natural, and I never feel like my skin is plugged up with foundation (like it does with some liquids).  One downside: this is not good to use when my skin is SUPER dry in the winter - I need to really exfoliate and use a super moisturizer if I don't want dry patches to show.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely Love BareMinerals!! Been using this powder for YEARS bcuz of my super sensitive skin.. As long as they keep making it, I'll keep buying it!

Looks great on. I actually bought the whole started kit and it looks great on. But my skin was just destroyed by it. I've to stop using it all. It may me breakout terribly. I thought I was going thru puberty again. It's taken over two months to get my skin back in shape. I'm using Nars now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation did not work for me. I have combination-dry skin that is also acne prone and sensitive. This really emphasized my dry spots even though I had just exfoliated and used moisturizer. It didn't really cover all the redness in my skin either and really emphasized my pores. I liked how it felt on my skin and how easy it was to apply. My skin tone is light medium with olive undertones. I am a person of color and it made me look ashy(even though I'm super pale right now). Sadly I'll be returning this.

It's too light weight, cheap, and after a little while it just fades after application. Doesn't really do much and I wouldn't buy anything from BareMinerals again (and I already have a few of their stuff which were disappointments as well). I have started using Smashbox, Urban Decay, and Bobbi Brown ever since, it's more expensive but you get what you pay for.
Tried it once and loved it, blends In very well. Doesnt look like you have alot on. If you have doubts, dont worry, you won't regret buying it!‚ô°

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I will never go to another foundation or make up line. bareMinerals is truly phenomenal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation off and on since being about 15. I am now 28, and have tried many other products.My skin is combination, so being that this was my mainstay product for years, I ventured out to try some high end liquid foundations (Makeup Forever, Chanel, Marc Jacobs), and although those foundations are great too, I keep coming back to my bare minerals. I always get so many compliments on my skin when I use this product, and it does not make me break out (some of those liquids were not the best for my skin). I just repurchased this product even thought I have so much of the liquids to use up. I am getting married in September, and I plan on using my Bare Minerals for foundation. It is my favorite!
I absolutely am in love with this foundation it's easy to apply it covers well and it's very light so I don't feel like I have a ton of stuff on my face!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate heavy foundation. This can be applied sheer or more coverage is needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation because I absolutely cannot stand liquid foundation. It's a nice change from the cakey feeling that comes with other foundations. It has not caused any problems for my skin either. Great product and worth the buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer high end makeup, and I've tried every foundation you can think of but Bare Minerals is the greatest one I've had so far. I don't think I'm going to buy a different one. It is so natural looking and it makes your skin look glowy and beautiful, almost like youre not even wearing makeup. It's also perfect in the summer time. It doesn't get greasy or oily, it stays on all day. I also love the fact that it is natural and only has 5 ingredients. So much healthier for your skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It is very natural looking and stays on very well all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the last year or so I've only ever used liquid foundations. I always found I could never get the proper coverage from just an ordinary powder. I tried this foundation in the bareMinerals starter pack and loved it from the first try! It stays on longer than any liquid foundation I've tried (liquids always seem to rub off on my nose throughout the day), has the perfect coverage, and keeps me matte. My skin is fairly oily, so regardless of this being a powder I do set it with MAC Prep + Prime powder. At first, your face feels a little dusty because of all the powder, but then everything blends right in and stay on perfectly. Highly, highly recommend even just to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love bareMinerals. I can honestly say I won't buy anything else. Before I tried bareMinerals, my makeup was blotchy, not so great, uneven and just overall horrible. I never really took the time to actually see what I was doing with my make up. I would just whip it on and walk on the door. My cousin dragged me into a Sephora and the lady there totally did a due over with my makeup routine. And, I am so glad she showed me! I have never been actually to see my eyes 'pop' due to the constant dark circles under my eyes. This make up does wonders. I can work all day in a hot automotive shop and not even worry about my foundation wearing off. This stuff is purely amazing! I use the fairly medium with a well rested concealer for my eyes underneath. I am considered pink undertones and have dry skin with freckles and a few blemishes/scars and this stuff totally covers it completely!

As a longtime user of bareminerals I love that they are constantly adding new shades. I wear golden fair, and it perfectly matches my pale skin. It goes on very easy, hard to mess up application. Leaves my skin flawlessly imperfection free. Only downside is that is rubs off easily, very prone to leaving sunglass marks or the like if you don't wear a setting spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it for natural everyday looks. Doesn't break me out and the light shimmer gives a healthy glow.

I have been using bare minerals foundation for years and i have never tried a more natural foundation before. Its lovely, it makes you skin look flawless. I have combination skin with few acne and this foundations hides all the little imperfections.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is nice and light. A find myself shining a bit much with the iriginal firmula, but it might be the moisturizer im using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried this a few times and every time I'm super disappointed. The original was too shimmery and the matte was too chalky - both seemed to go patchy on my skin and both made my skin itch. I have friends who swear by it - it's just not right for my skin which is a real shame as the colour matching is awesome and I really liked the bronzer colour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love how it covers up but makes such a great foundation!

reviews.review_title: I would give this zero stars if I could
reviews.review_text: I know so many people who love and swear by this, but every time I try it I hate it more. Not a single shade or any combination of shades matches my pale, pink undertoned skin. It's itchy, drying, and cakey. It clings to my dry spots and does nothing for my oily spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know so many people that swear by this product that I am always disappointed by how much I have fallen out of love with it. Personally, I find the powder makes me itch all day and seems to dry me out as I put it on, no matter if I use moisturizer and primer beforehand. Still, I have sensitive fait skin and the lightest option was a lways a great color match, while being incredibly easy to blend and never causeing any reactions. I think it is best in the summer considering I live in a very humid area and liquid foundations seem to run off by the end of the day - this always stayed put. So, if your a fan of powder or have oily skin this will definitely be a terrific product. Dry skin should try it out first and see if you have the same issues I do - I hope not because I do think this is a great product for those who can use it.

This is lovely foundation if you have relatively nice skin. If you're looking for full coverage, this probably isn't for you. That being said, it has a beautiful natural finish and if you have dry skin like me I highly suggest using a hydration primer beforehand, it makes a HUGE difference because then the powder will not cling to the dry patches. Been my go to foundation for years

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to stay with mineral makeup because my skin just seems to be react better to it. Unfortunately my tarte powder foundation has no colour match for my winter shade so I went for the bare minerals one instead. The powder isn't as finely milled as I'd like and I really don't like how it clumps into little balls when i pour it into the lid. It doesn't blend as nicely but its okay. It gives me the coverage I want and the finish is pretty natural but leaning more towards the matte side.
It's so light yet does a great job hiding those little imperfections.. very easy and simple makeup
I've been using this for years and I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first mineral foundation. I purchased shade Fairly Medium because I'm light skinned around winter time. I might get Medium shade for summer when I become a little tanned. So far I really like it. When I don't feel like using a BB Cream, I use this and it mattifies my oily skin even though I got the Original Lumining Mineral Foundation. I was contemplating whether to get this or the Matte version. Maybe when I purchase the Medium shade I will get it in Matte.

So I normally I use liquid foundation but I recently decided to start using mineral powder instead and I mean for powder its good. It does have pretty good coverage and you can build it up. I also like the staying power on it. It tends to last me all day. Some cons I do have with it is that it tends to cling on to any dry patches, so make sure you exfoliate. Also this is a big one, I find it really messy to apply. Which in the morning can be a pain to have to worry about. So just keep that in mind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to foundation, I have been using it for 2 years and I love it!! It evens out my skin tone, has buildable coverage on acne marks, and doesn't make my dry skin dryer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for 6 years and will keep using this FOREVER!! Love getting this on Holidays

This foundation is absolutely beautiful. The finish is amazing and it really covers. I've used bare minerals on and off for 10 years...I'm definitely sticking with it this time! I forgot how much I truly love this stuff. The shades are very forgiving, but I recommend getting matched in sephora. The color I was matched to (fairly medium) is one that I never would have thought for myself. If you are tired of that heavy feel from liquid foundation give this a try...you won't be sorry!
I use this powder for years! Love it ... Always did and always will. Easy, quick, goes smooth and covers well.
Very see-through, but has a silky feel and even-ing property. It won't cover acne alone, but for those with naturally smooth skin (mine) it brightens and unifies quite well.

at first i did love this product. i was so excited to try it out because i read all the rave reviews. but it's honestly NOT worth it. it creases under my eyes and EMPHASIZES my fine lines after a few hours of wearing it (even with an under eye setting powder)! i'm using a new foundation routine that is drugstore & honestly works better than this! what a shame..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have problem skin and wanted a one step process where I can have on a light foundation that looks dewy and natural. This is it! I love it.. been using it for 2 weeks, and have received so many compliments that my skin looks flawless. It feels like you have nothing on, but yet evens out any redness and imperfections.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this powder. But I'm too dry to wear powder anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It really gives a smooth, clean coverage. I have just started using a CC cream underneath it and love, love it even more. I have had for nearly a year now and use it every single day. My T-AREA is very oily, and I'm prone to acne and I think this is a product that works well with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: light natural coverage that evens skin tone without having to wear liquid foundation. I have been using this for years

Before buying this, I always wore liquid foundation. I used to have a lot of acne, and now that it's mostly cleared up, I don't feel like I need to be wearing full coverage liquid foundations all the time. I bought this because I heard it has good coverage and is better for your skin. I was very skeptical, because i thought it was for older women and I am only 16, but I could not be happier with this product. It has the perfect coverage for me. I thought it would be too sheer, but it is medium and buildable. It covers all my redness and acne. Also I was scared it would look unnatural and powdery, but in my opinion it looks even more natural than liquids. It does not look powdery at all. It also is not drying. Lastly it is extremely easy to apply. I tap a little into the lid, swirl a flat top brush in it, and buff it all over my skin. IM OBSESSED. And my skin has been clearing up ever since I switched. Definitely recommend, especially for teens who have problem skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gives great coverage with little to no noticeability. My go to makeup for everyday use.

I purchased this and i am sure I would be happy with the product if it wasn't such a TINY amount! Trying to do the right thing and finding a cruelty free make-up. No wonder people don't support it more because they cant AFFORD to! I looked for a weight on it prior to ordering, but it was not readily available to me. When I opened the box I thought oh look they sent a sample of a different kind as well, how nice! Then I realized that was my $26 foundation. I feel ripped off

I've tried all types of foundation on my melasma and this one does the trick on my medium tan skin without looking like I'm trying to hide anything! Pigments are effortless! Actually makes me look brighter and younger!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for the past 5-6 years and I love how natural it looks when using a brush to apply it. It stays on all day and it does not feel like anything is on my skin. I like how there are so many shades to choose from so if I were to get a tan, I can always go back to sephora to test out a new color on my skin tone. Best of all, it does not clog my pores like other foundation products so I rarely have acne.
Greatest stuff ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation not only doesn't break me out but also has helped the overall look of my skin. It has gorgeous buildable coverage and doesn't make me oily! I LOVE this foundation and will be repurchasing!!!

I used Bare Escentuals in the past and loved the coverage. It provided a light coverage and left a natural finish. I bought it again and it seems they may have changed the formula. The foundation looks powdery even after it has been on my face for a few hours. I have oily skin so usually it just blends into the skin but it just looks powdery. Not too impressed.

reviews.review_title: The only powder i would recommend
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i've been using this powder for almost 2 years now. The only powder i would buy. i have oily/acne prone skin and bareminerals is gentle enough not to worsen my acne. it is a great product to layer. i used this on top of laura mercier tinted moisturizer for added coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've learned to like the original bareMinerals instead of the matte because of the glow that it gives me. The matte seemed to settle in any dryness in my face. My complexion actually looks better after a day of wearing. The only reason why I don't give this five stars is because the product does not look right over the concealer when it is applied on cheeks. Need to keep concealer off cheeks.

Everyone comments on my skin and how fresh and natural it looks. I love all their products. The only thing I can maybe complain about is that it makes me breakout at first when ever I start using it again. Easy fix, just wash before you sleep!

I was one if those bare minerals skeptics. I work at a local sephora as a product consultant. After seeing how fabulous this product looks on other people, I decided to try it. I wanted something that gave me good coverage, a dewey glow and was nice and light for warmer weather. Well this did the trick! My skin looks so much better since I've been using this. I can honestly say, that I'll probably never use anything else for foundation again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: it's very light weight, so that's good... but a little too dry for my skin that it cannot stay.

I liked this product at first, but it was too light for me. It didn't last long, and by the end of the day I practically had nothing on that would hide my blemishes. Love how it feels but it really didn't do much other than make me feel like it was good for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation since I was 18! It's perfect for springtime and summer so if you haven't already, please try! I use this in my weekend makeup tutorial video below, check it out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With this foundation I feel my skin can breathe and makes my skin look so healthy and glow!

reviews.review_title: Not for skin that is oil prone
reviews.review_text: It felt kind of heavy on my face. By the end of the day I looked like a grease ball, even with the oil control primer. I did switch to the matte foundation and it's much better for oil prone skin. Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation I've used for years. I'm mostly a natural/easy/laid-back look kinda gal, but this still provides great coverage and with certain techniques and possibly other bareMinerals products you can create many different looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bare minerals foundation for a few years now..Living in Ohio with brutal seasons, I used to have to switch foundation depending on what time of year it was..Not the case since I switched to bare minerals..Lightweight with buildable coverage..Can't beat it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently bought this foundation along with the bareMinerals started kit. I haven't used power before as I was always hesitant about the coverage. After trying this, I won't be going back to liquid. The coverage is fantastic! It looks natural instead of the 'caked on look' too. I really do recommend this. I would say that it isn't as long wearing as liquid foundation, I usually reapply after 6 hours or so if I'm out, which is easy to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used BM foundation for almost 10 years now (started when I was a sophomore in college in 2005) and I love, love, love it. I would NEVER think of using a different foundation. It makes my skin look radiant and even. There isn't much shine, but does project a slight glow. I can't explain the difference of what I look like when I put on a liquid foundation (ick) and then compare it to BM. I've even tried high end brands such as Dior (Air Flash). I will never change, no matter what. Why would I fix something that isn't broken? I'll never find something better. ***I use light in the winter and medium beige in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this in fairly light which is my winter shade. It has such a lovely quality when used with primer and mineral veil: it makes skin look airbrushed. I never look like I have makeup caked on my face like women who use liquid makeup. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased in fair and love the color and the finish, however the fair foundation has a better finish than the fairly light original I had been using, which I consider quite strange. Overall great finish, hasn't broken me out and masks my oiliness. Cons are that if you use this without a good pore primer all your flaws will become magnified.

On behalf of sensitive skin everywhere this is the best product out there. Added plus: it's novice proof. The only time I've ever had a problem is when my skin is clearly dried out, but with some added cream my problem was solved. I once considered the pressed version but it was a mistake! The pressed clearly has not been perfected: the color is wrong and sits on my face differently. Loose powder all the way, you won't regret it.

reviews.review_title: Not the same as it used to be...
reviews.review_text: I used Bare Minerals for years and loved it and then switched to another mineral makeup several years ago. Recently, I gave BM another shot because it's about $20 cheaper than my current foundation, and let me tell you, I was really disappointed. I purchased the Fairly Light shade as I am pretty fair. The color did seem like a good match for me, but the foundation itself just didn't seem to absorb into my skin at all, even throughout the day. It seemed to just sit on my face and was really obvious to the naked eye. I also felt like it settled into fine lines under my eyes that I honestly didn't even know that I had! I'm only 30 years old! I've had years of experience with mineral powder so it definitely had nothing to do with the brush I was using or how I was blending it in. I use a high quality mineral brush from Sephora that has always worked very well for me, so I honestly believe it is just this foundation in combination with my skin. For the record, I have dry skin in the winter and pretty normal skin in the summer. I even tried using different moisturizers under this makeup and always got the same horrible results no matter what I used. I don't know if it is my skin or if the formula has changed or maybe I had the wrong shade (even though the shade did seem to match well).  I will not be repurchasing this foundation again for myself. I know many women that BM works wonders for, but it was awful for me. I would suggest getting some samples to try before purchasing it if you can. Try some different shades, with different moisturizers underneath, in different weather conditions, etc. I hope this foundation works better for others than it did for me!

reviews.review_title: love it but makes me break out
reviews.review_text: I love the finish and the coverage. But it makes my skin looks extra oily and breaks me out a little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep going back to bare minerals foundation because it is lightweight and buildable. Sometimes I need to mix two shades (usually in between summer and winter) but I seem to always find a perfect match for my skin tone.

No mineral foundation compares to this. I've used this for as long as I can remember. My shade is 'fairly light' and it matches my skin perfectly, which is something I could never find before. The coverage is perfect, and a little goes a long way with this product. It works best with the prime time foundation primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite powder foundation ever. Great coverage, very light feeling. I hate the heavy makeup feeling so this powder foundation is perfect for me.

reviews.review_title: it was good but broke me out !!!
reviews.review_text: i love the finish and how light weight it is but i broke out horribly. but the matte one didn't break me out oddly enough

reviews.review_title: Don't know why I ever strayed
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 50 with large pores and some wrinkles around eyes and lips. I had acne as a teen and into adulthood, and nothing covered it to my satisfaction. When I tried bM, I was pretty awestruck at how well it covered but the Original formula magnified my pores, even with primer. When the Matte formula came out, i tried it and it's perfect. I have to say that this makeup actually CLEARED UP my adult acne. I am completely serious. So for younger skins battling acne, this stuff would be a godsend.  Over the past few years, I strayed because as my skin began to show signs of aging, i was concerned that powders would make that look worse. So i've tried everything- and returned A LOT of it- including BB creams, CC creams, tinted moisturizers, you name it. NOTHING works as well or is as flattering AND soothing as bareMinerals. So, I'm back! & I don;t intend to make that mistake again. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My very sensitive skin does not react to this foundation. Highly recommend it.

I bought bare minerals about a month ago and I love it. I got the original because I have heard that it helps to even the texture of the skin. I can feel the difference in texture. I took one star away because as a person with oily skin I find that the original's luminous glow can make people with combo to oily skin look oiler easily. However this is easily fixed with the mineral veil. I look forward to trying to matte foundation today.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a 15 year old girl, I'm lucky to say my acne isn't all over the place. I do have acne and acne scars though, and sometimes I like to cover those up. Some days I can't go all out on my makeup because I need to get to school and I need to get there FAST. On those days, I use this mineral foundation. I put a little concealer on my troubled spots, then put this foundation on, and ta-dah! A nice, natural look that covers up my acne and takes less than 5 minutes. It lasts throughout the day and doesn't even look like I'm wearing foundation. I also like that on the days when I'm running late for school and I use this, I don't have the spare a minute or two to put on blush because this allows my natural rosy cheeks to shine through a bit. Absolutely love this foundation and will buy again!

reviews.review_title: When I fell in love, it was the summer time!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Now that I am approaching my 30's, my skin is not as oily as it used to be and I find my skin a lot dryer than it ever has been. Even though I don't consider myself old, its not the skin I had as a teenager into my early 20's. Stabilizing hormones have stabilized my skin, which is normal. I find now that I can only use it in the summer time because these New York winters now leave my skin feeling parched and a mineral formulation just won't work for me from crisp early fall to cold, harsh snow winters. It was a really hot summer when I first tried Bare Minerals foundation and it calmed down my acne, redness and oily skin that I had at the time. It has great coverage and does not look cakey. I would use it all-year-round if I still could, believe me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will never be without this! I've been using it for about 6 years now. You can see my complexion in the video below where i am wearing it in Fairly Light and in the summer I wear Medium Beige...check it out!
This my daily foundation for school

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had switched over to the Bare Minerals Matte Foundation because I thought it might help the shiny look after half the day. But the coverage seemed minimal and made my skin look dull.  I had been using the matte foundation for about a year, but wanted to go back to the original, because I felt like it was better (but I had kind of forgotten). The original formula seems to always be out of stock everywhere, and now I know why, it's fantastic!  Upon first use after finishing up the matte foundation, the coverage is so much better and leaves a nice glow to your skin. I feel that I don't even need primer for this to show up nicely. I also feel like this one improves my skin. Definitely going to stick with the original for always.
A light and soft foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this foundation because it isn't super greasy and I like a powder format. It doesn't provide a ton of coverage and is a little drying. I still like it but don't feel glued to it by any means.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing this foundation for years and years - I love it. Good coverage and matches my skin tone perfectly. Can be layered for more coverage. I wear a lighter shade in Winter and a shade darker in Summer. Foundation for all occasions. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite foundation!! I have been using it for almost two years now and have not had any doubts. Build able coverage and long lasting! The shade matches my skin perfectly and blends. Definitely worth it!
I've tried other foundations but keep going back to this one. It covers well, for my skin alittle concealer works perfect with this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about five years. I have sensitive skin and I have had trouble finding a good color match for my warm olive skin tone. Golden tan is a perfect match. If you are looking for heavy coverage or a very made-up look, this may not be for you. This product lets your real skin tone come through. I like a more natural but polished look so his is perfect for me.

reviews.review_title: They can never stop selling this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Bare Minerals foundation for almost 10 years. I tried a few liquid foundations and other brands of mineral powders in between, but this one is by far the best product. I have mostly combination skin, and this covers breakouts very well, and never feels heavy or cakey. I highly recommend it for all skin types. The only trouble I ever have is that my skin is quite fair, so I sometimes have to mix two shades together, or else it can appear too tan or too light for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I give this three stars, only because it didn't cause acne or dermatitis in my very sensitive skin, which is a difficult feat. However, I ended up returning it because it was INCREDIBLY drying (my skin started to flake in some places kind of dry) and even with the appropriate brushes and recommended technique it still provided very very little coverage. Overall, I was rather disappointed with this product, especially considering the number of rave reviews it has garnered. I love many other BM products, but this was not up to par.

My friend loved this product but because i have very dry skin it didnt work for me. It gets a bit messy pouring the powder out and since i have dry skin after putting it on dry patches everywhere. Made my skin even drier and was shown right away. It was not right for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage, looks natural. It's just a little messy and a bit drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I went into a bareminerals boutique in my local mall to try this stuff out. I didn't have any plans of buying anything but this stuff was too good. I do have dry skin, so the bareminerals lady had to moisturize me first. After moisturizing, this product went on smoothly and perfectly. It worked better than my usual product, which is a tinted moisturizer. The product took away my redness and it is easily layerable. Just make sure you us the right brushed with this stuff and buff, buff, buff. I love this stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The original bare minerals formula is nice and looks beautiful on normal and dry skin, but it is not for oily skin, you may end up looking rather greasy by the end of the day. Instead try the matte formula that will set nicely on your skin if you have any issues with oiliness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have this foundation in light and golden fair. Both go on very well, blend easily, and cover up the majority of imperfections. The best part my skin is a lot clearer since I started using it and my breakouts aren't as bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
