reviews.review_text: After purchasing multiple different foundations through sephora I finally found one that works! I usually use mineralogie makeup (which I LOVE LOVE LOVE) but needed to find a new foundation without vitamin A when I became pregnant. I remembered that years ago I had tried bareminerals and hated it so I steered clear from trying it again. However, after mutiple failed attempts with other foundations tried through sephora I finally ordered this and I am in LOVE. Not only does this makeup not break me out but it gives me full coverage without looking like I am even wearing makeup. I think that BareMinerals may actually provide me with better coverage than mineralogie and at a better price. I like to use the bare minerals radiance and their translucent veil as well. Ever since I started using this everyone at work told me I had the pregnancy glow (and trust me whenI take this makeup off there is no such glow lol). People even started guessing that I was pregnant with a little girl because they said that I was getting prettier.....well it ended up that I am pregnant with a little girl but I think the bareminerals played a large role in my beauty factor. Overall I highly recommend this product. I love that it doesn't settle into lines, gives a really even coverage and you can build how much coverage you need. Some days I even just use this as my concealer as well since it stays put so well. Love this product!
I've been a fan of them for a while now. I seen to always come back to it. It covers beautifully and it doesn't irritate my skin. This is a great product to use in the spring and summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this foundation, it looks gorgeous on the skin and makes you GLOW! but.... im combo and this lasted 30min until i turned into a grease ball! im VERY breakout prone and this didnt cause any. im gonna return for the matte, cause i need my foundation to last longer than one hour. good for dry skin, but stay away if oily!
Will never use anything else. Keeps my skin pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I always wear this when I want to add a luminous glow and light coverage...so mainly for work. I've strayed many times and even though I love liquids a bit more now for coverage, this will always have a place in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went in looking for a light foundation that would give me the coverage I was wanting, but not something heavy that would clog up my pores. I switched from the compact powder to the loose powder so I could try both. This foundation gives me great coverage and works well with my sensitive skin. I love how it doesn't make my face shiny and there are so many shades that finding one to match my skin tone isn't too difficult at all. I still feel like the compact powder might last a bit longer, but this brand always has such great products for a reasonable price. I like that you don't have to lose quality with something that also won't completely empty out your pockets.
Like must of us girls I had gotten bored with my daily makeup routine and thought I would try something different than my bare minerals.. Well after months of being frustrated

Very good for a few hour wear for my skin. It tends to cake up in my forehead wrinkles though (which makes me look older). I love this foundation when I was younger so I guess im looking for something to work better for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I originally didn't like this foundation. I found it in my foundation bin a few months later and decided to give it another try bc it was the last foundation I had and omg. The coverage is amazing. Even if it wasn't enough coverage the first time around, you can keep building it up and it doubles as a concealer. The finish is perfect and makes your skin bright and luminous without shine. I originally found it expensive until I realized I don't use a primer, concealer, or powder with it. Great product would recommend to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation. It gives just the right amount of coverage and looks very natural. I've tried many different foundations and I always come back to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been buying drug store makeup and decided now that I was in my 30's it was time to invest in some more quality makeup. I went to my nearest sephora to do a color match and started using it. I've been very happy! It doesn't feel like I have to much makeup on and I feel natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really is the best foundation! I've been wearing it since I was 17, I'm now 26, and while I try others (Urban Decays Naked Skin, Nars, Laura Gellar) I always come back to this. Once I do, I wonder why I stopped. It blends easily and matches my skin perfectly. You can hardly tell I'm wearing makeup. I have acne scars (although Josie Maran's Argan Oil is helping fade them!) and BM helps cover them and any current break outs.

. I wear minimum makeup from day to day.  The scientist in me did a few experiments. The hardest part was color match. I'm not make-up smart. I went to 5 sephora with in a 2 week span and got 5 different colors. At the end, i just picked one and stuck to it. It turns out that my skin def needs the bronzer to match.  After I did buy it - i got a damaged product - it had no swifter. However aft that the product lives up to all the hype after i made multiple visits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I suffer from acne and find this is the only product that gives me excellent coverage! I've tried numerous expensive to non expensive brands ... And I always go back to bare minerals! I would recommend this product to anyone problem skin or anyone who wants great coverage without the cakey feeling.
I have the same prob. This sounds crazy but I take a knife and wedge it in one of the holes and pry the top off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product did not deliver that air brushed look that they claimed it would. My fine lines showed up 10 times worse and the product wears off where everywhere but where the fine lines show. Lousy assortment of colors and it takes way too long to put on. My skin broke into acne while I was using it. Also, product makes my skin feel dirty and the coverage was not full coverage as stated unless you cake it on.

reviews.review_title: At 64 people think I'm i my 50's
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Bare minerals face powder for about 10 years now, and it had put any wrinkles I may have gotten on hold. I have taken pretty good care of my skin, but I Have quite a few friends my age and all of them have some Major wrinkles going on. My only complaint is that you can't open the jars to get out that last 1/2 tsp. or so out. I've saved almost all my old jars, and if I could get them open I'd have at least one full jar of powder. Does anyone know how to open the jars?

reviews.review_title: Perfect - just know the tips and tricks!
reviews.review_text: I have been devoted to BareMinerals foundation ever since my hairdresser (who I always just assumed had amazing radiant skin - she didn't appear to wear a stitch of makeup!) told me it was her holy grail. I can't even count how many of these I've gone through since - it is a complete MUST HAVE. There are a few negative reviews here, though, which address some easily fixed issues:  1. For even, flawless coverage, you MUST get the BM kabuki brush, and swirl the minerals in the lid for a few seconds to warm/loosen them up. This is essential to distribute the foundation lightly and evenly over your face. Layer as needed - it's very buildable! But always use a light hand.  2. Apply concealer to any trouble spots first, if you have any. BM will cover them, but may not last all day there.  3. If you are using a moisturizer/primer OR have oily skin, matte-ify your face with a fine powder (such as the Mineral Veil, or, my personal choice, Make Up Forever's INCREDIBLE HD Microfinish Powder) before applying the minerals. This will help the foundation distribute evenly and stay out of pores (a common complaint from BM beginners).  Hope these tips help: look forward to looking FLAWLESS! ;-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I will probably wear this foundation until I die. I keep trying to find something different just for a change, but I am always disappointed. I have very bad Melasma which covers both sides of my face from cheek to under jawline. This covers it - never found anything else that would cover and not feel or look like I was wearing a sticky mask. This is a lifesaver. Probably shouldn't be so concerned with my appearance, but I do like to look nice for my husband every day.
Cannot live without this classic staple. I apply it lightly and it provides the perfect amount of coverage, either alone or paired with Laura Mercier tinted moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only powder I love, having dry skin. It doesn't cling, it has a radiant finish but NOT sparkly, is great for touch ups as it doesn't look cakey, and the coverage is wonderful. I dust a light layer of this over my liquid foundation and it leaves me looking airbrushed.

I only wish I had been using this stuff all my life and maybe my skin wouldn't be scarred right now. Not only does my face NOT break out anymore, the texture is getting much smoother the more I use it.
Flawless, lightweight, and easy application

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an OK product. It feels light like you're not wearing any makeup on and it has a natural finish. I love how you can dab at the foundation with a max concealer brush so you can use this foundation as a concealer too. It's a good product for your skin so If you have sensitive skin, this product will not irritate!  However if you have a lot of blemishes or super obvious blemishes, it takes a while to cover up all of them and doesn't cover as well as I'd like.

reviews.review_title: Great coverage, gentle on the skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use bareMinerals Original Foundation when my skin is stressed, breaking out, or after I've had a dermatological treatment. It's very gentle on the skin, never causes aggravation, and covers really well. If you've had ab IPL treatment, it'll cover the the spots beautifully, but never increase the damage. It wears beautifully if you are exercising. The only reason I gave it only 4 stars is that it looks a little dryer than I prefer. I like a little more satin finish. But its fabulous when I really need it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally my favorite product in the entire world-its simply amazing. I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin that can be oily at times and dry at other times. This foundation feels super light and seems to absorb any oil/shine and it doesn't dry my face out whatsoever. Loveee

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always trying new foundations, but Bare Minerals is always the most consistently great foundation that I fall back on. It conceals so well and always looks natural. The coverage is as light or full as you'd like... just adjust the amount of powder. The colors are easy to blend for different seasons/skin tones and every jar stretches so far. I've been using this for almost 10 years and I've never been disappointed. I have tried the pressed version and the matte but the original works best for me. It gives my dry/combo skin the perfect dose of luminosity, and unlike others, I've never found it to be glittery. I think the biggest thing is applying it properly with a good brush. Plus, it never breaks me out... that's a deal breaker with foundations! Long wearing, lightweight, lovely... okay, I'll stop!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used the matte version of this for years and I decided to give the original a try. First of all, the same shade I have been using forever is so much lighter in the original formula than the matte formula. Also, it's sparkly. Literally tiny sparkles all over your face. That luminous glow they talk about is actually shimmer, and it makes your face look oily not to mention childish.

I have always used this as a setting powder. It works BEAUTIFULLY! If you have freckles or blemishes and need a little extra oomph coverage wise, this is for you! Not cakey, not radiant (sadly), very matte and slightly luminous. Today, despite my dry skin, I decided to use this powder as an overall foundation. The moment I put it on, it glided beautifully into my skin. Immediately, I got the dreaded outcome I did not want. Flat and light coverage. Once I built it (and I mean BUILT UP), the coverage was as high as it could possibly go, medium coverage. Oh my goodness, the moment I went into regular/harsh lighting, I was scared it would rain and my pores would fill with the water. THEY WERE HUGE!!!!!! MY FACE LOOKED LIKED A BLOATED SPONGE!!!!!!! I tried to apply blush, finishing veil, setting spray, even cream products. The makeup literally SOAKED into my skin! I took it off right away. Not only did it accentuate my dry, scabby acne I have all over my face, it accentuated my pores like nobody's business. Sticking to it as a setting powder. Poreless and perfection. If you have normal/dry skin, I would NOT suggest using. But I have used on oilier skin, and it works MIRACLES!!

reviews.review_title: Good, but leaves skin too shiny and oily!
reviews.review_text: When I first used it it was amazing, and then after a couple of used it was making my skin really oily, I have really dry skin, and it made my fave feel dirty, but great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: really like this powder, gives judt the right finish to your face

reviews.review_title: Great staple, and how to hack the new packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using bareMinerals for years. I've dabbled in tinted moisturizers as a quick and easy solution for casual days, but always come back to this as the single, simple thing to keep in my makeup kit, as it can do anything from light to full coverage. I also like that natural aloe vera gel is an effective, inexpensive, non-irritating primer for this stuff.  For those who are frustrated with the new dispenser design: To get every last bit of product out, close the twisty top, then flip the jar over. There's a lip on the underside by which you can easily pry out the bottom of the jar using whatever small, flat thing is handy. (I use the file that folds out from nail clippers.)

Wearing this for the first time, as a make-up artist matched my complexion to warm tan, it seemed to work out just fine. But after using it (light and heavy application); it seemed to irritate my skin. I didn't experience break-outs; just the itchy feeling. I guess loose powder make up isn't for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've have found that bad reviews have helped me make decisions as much as good one so I'm trying to review everything I've tried.  This was a terrible product for me. It felt like a thick mask on me. I felt like my skin could not breath.  I am Asian with oily skin. Uber straight hair, including lashes. Still looking for a mascara that does not smudge.

reviews.review_title: Not as good as I expected
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping this product would be perfect for me. Unfortunately it made my pores look worse! I have large pores so I usually wear liquid foundation as I find it has better coverage than powder. But I was really looking for a nice powder to put on top of my foundation that would give me even nicer coverage and a nice finish. I noticed that my pores looked much less visible with just my foundation. To be fair though I have never found a powder that looked good with my pores. So this powder will probably look really nice on those with small pores but for those with large pores like myself, you may be disappointed!

reviews.review_title: I always come back to Bareminerals
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like to try new things but I always come back to this because it gives me great coverage with a natural glow. The key to looking natural and not like a shiny hot mess is that you have to make sure you warm up the minerals by swirling your brush in the lid and buffing it onto the skin. When you warm up the minerals it will gives a creamer texture.

Love this product! Great coverage and looks very natural. I don't feel like I'm clogging my skin like I do when I use liquid foundation. This is much easier to blend and far more breathable. I have been converted!

reviews.review_title: Luminous does not mean glitter specks!!
reviews.review_text: I do not know where Bareminerals got the impression that luminous means add glitter specks but it needs to stop.  I used to use the Original Foundation a few years ago but wanted to try a liquid foundation since I have dry skin so I switched. Recently, I wanted to re-try this again unfortunately, the Original Foundation, which now has a luminous finish), has glitter specks in it (which I think would mean it is not original since the original Original did not have glitter specks). The description says this foundation gives you a natural luminosity.... Glitter specks do NOT give your skin a NATURAL luminosity, it just makes you look like you have sparkles on your face when the light/sun shines on you.  I am 27, not a teenager, I definitely do not want sparkles all over my face.  And BTW, their luminous/radiant mineral veil has sparkles in it too.
I've used this foundation for a few years and I keep coming back to it because it looks natural, covers nicely, and is easy to apply. My only complaint is that it doesn't seem to last all day on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been suffering from cystic acne ever since I was about 11 years old. I would go into walgreens and try every single makeup brand known to mankind. However, they always made me breakout. Desperate, I turned to youtube to find something that will cover my acne. I heard a lot about MAC and decided to try it. It covered everything amazingly, but it looked really heavy on my face and it made me breakout even worse due to the heavy makeup. Then, I turned to Bare Minerals and never looked back. This amazing foundation has made my breakouts fewer, and they are not caused by the foundation. It looks so natural on the skin. And it has minerals in it to actually help your skin as opposed to just covering. I really like the loose powder rather than the compact because it is less heavy. YOU DON'T FEEL LIKE YOU HAVE ANYTHING ON YOUR FACE! It truly is the best and I highly recommend it for everybody.
It was ok. I thought it would have been better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PLEASE change back to the original simple sifter container, or to a locking sifter that can be removed, if desired. Way too much product is wasted with the locking travel sifter. Love the product, hate the container. Thank you!

reviews.review_title: I like product quarity, don't like container
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Covered pretty well, and I like it. I would give 5 stars if I can take off inside cap. Currently this container doesn't fully open unless break it, so I have to waste some powder (probably it would be 2 time use amount).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bare Minerals Foundation is the best powder foundation I have ever used. I've tried other brands, but this takes the cake. It matches my skin well, and stays on all day. I am a Kindergarten teacher, so this means a lot of dancing and moving around. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for something light, but provides great coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product for daily use! When i purchased this product i was worried it would highlight my dry areas i get in the winter. Instead it hydrated it and i no longer see dryness. On the other hand my face gets oily by the end of the day. The packaging looks good but is messy.
My favorite product from bareMinerals!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! I wore it all summer! It has a really beautiful finish and doesn't leave your skin feeling dry like most other powder foundations. It also has very buildable coverage. If you apply it with a synthetic powder brush (I personally love the Real Techniques multi task brush), is leaves the foundation looking really natural. If you want a fuller coverage this brush is great for that too. Just layer it until you get the look you like. Overall, I would highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, after about 4 years I've finally finished my first bareMinerals foundation (yes I'm not a but makeup person T^T). Surprisingly, even after 4 years it still stayed perfectly like new. I love this product, and I believe its a great to invest in a foundation that does a very good job with coverage. Will definitely re-buy this in another 4 years (haha just kidding ^^ maybe in the next couple of months or next year ^^ we will see)
I love this product so mutch! I use it every day. It has perfect coverage. Love it so mutch! :-)

reviews.review_title: pros and cons.. compare to liquid foundation
reviews.review_text: This is first time for me to use mineral foundation. I have been using Makeup forever hd foundation. It is more dry side natural looking on skin than hd foundation but shows more pores and wrinkles. I feel like it will be better in summer. It is so much quicker than liquid foundation. I will use it everyday so i don't spend a lot of time to apply makeup. I just got this today so i have to see which one is better But for now i can't say i like this better. It is half good an half bad but pretty decent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is absolutely amazing! It didn't irritate my ridiculously sensitive skin, and I found a near perfect colour match! The coverage is excellent, the finish is dewy and gorgeous, and it works very well over dry patches on my skin. My only problem with this foundation is that it has zero oil control, but I just use a different setting powder in my T zone. And to top it off, I used this foundation nearly every day and it has lasted me 3 years! Definitely worth picking up.
The only foundation I will ever wear. It covers and feels like you are wearing nothing. Perfection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Fairly Medium in the original formula. If you were using Fair and needing just a bt mor color this will be perfect. THANKS! bare fr adding this as t is a perfect color match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great, And its pure minerals so there's no way you can break out or get itching skin lol been using it for many years.
Makes my skin itchy and oily. Not sure if I want to use this product again. I thought this product is good for my skin but I was wrong. My skin breaks out after wearing BM.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation works best in the summer. My skin is too dry in the winter months for it to blend without showing my dry skin. I'm still trying to find the right color during my non-tan months. It's still a tad too light when I wear it alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this product with clear skin. While it was on, it looked good - but would start to look shiny and strange after a few hours. My face felt like I had makeup on and was a little itchy. I developed small pimples along my jawline that would grow into whiteheads. It took me months to get rid of the breakouts, and I haven't been able to wear makeup since.

I used this years ago and loved it at first. The more I used it it stopped looking as good. It wasn't until years later I found out why. My brushes lasted forever which was pretty great but they were scratchy on my skin. They have since changed the brushes which are a lot softer now. As far as the foundation itself, I do wear it on occasion when I need something quick and fuller coverage with a glow, but I can NOT wear to the gym or outdoors because as soon as I sweat it itches. I would say its good but not great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used mineral powder foundations from other brands in the past, but they were just okay, so I finally decided to give this a try. This was so much better than other mineral foundation. It gives my skin nice coverage and also sheer glow. I think it makes my skin looks very beautiful but still natural, and it feels nice and smooth on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Once you master the mess of the loose powder, you'll find this is one of the best foundations for the oily skin that I have. Nothing else mattifies like this mineral powder foundation and the coverage is consistently wonderful.

I have sensitive/ance prone skin. I love the coverage I get and i don't break out worse because of wearing this all day. The coverage lasts all day for me and I have been told that they can't tell I have foundation on. I also have darker skin. I find it is hard to find a color that matches with darker skin but this is perfect for me. I use the tan foundation color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got the starter kit back in 2007 in the shades dark/deep and I still have a little left- a bit goes a long way to create nice coverage that's buildable. The only con I have with that set was that the dark shade was a bit too light for me, even in winter. But the deep blends nicely with my skintone to give a natural, almost airbrushed look. My skin is very oily and I found that after a few hours I had to blot away the excess. Otherwise, it doesn't irritate my skin. I think I will repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years. The new packaging is great! You can still get all of the make up out, just have to open it from the bottom now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation that I use. I get a natural and flawless look eveytime. It is perfect for younger skin because it doesn't cover all lines and wrinkles. It lasts all day but you should sweep over face with a brush every couple hours to even out and remove build up from fine lines. I would give 5 stars if there was no stupid open and close container. They should go back to the old packaging, the new sucks!

I thought this would be perfect for me. I have sensitive acne prone skin and heard that this stuff was awesome. I loved the coverage and how easy it is to cover up my uneven skin tone, however after a few hours it made my face so oily and blotchy and I normally have no oil at all. I started breaking out so fast. I wish it didn't make me react this way because the coverage is awesome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn't give me flawless look and look kind of cakey I think. Doesn't really like it.

This is the only foundation I will use. I use this with Benefit's Erase Paste as a concealer and I am such an advocate of this product. I originally got a gift set, but had to go back and get a refill for the color I use (fair). Make sure you wash your brushes often, so you avoid breakouts!

I love every time I get a new package of new Bare Minerals make up. I am 16 and have been searching for the perfect make up for my face since I was in 6th grade. I am a pageant princess, but I have always been self conscious about a bare face because of my self claimed flaws. I have Native American inherited high cheekbones and medium-fair skin with sun exposed freckles. I have only recently been comfortable with these freckles this year when I started really using this makeup. My skin appears flawlessly smooth, yet the things I claimed as flaws still show in a new naturally beautiful way. My flaws are now flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this foundation for years and LOVE IT!! I get so many compliments on about my flawless shin. But only three statrs due to horrible new packaging which started maybe last year, I cant ever get the last of powder and end up missing out on maybe 4-5 more applications. Someone Please I want ALL of my powder!!

This is the best makeup for my combination skin! I don't use the brand brushes because they break me out but the sephora mineral brush is amazing with this makeup. 4 stars because I wish there were more light-medium tones other than just pink. A Fairly-Medium in gold tone would be perfect!! Besides that, bare minerals blurs all my imperfections and is perfect in humid climates!

I have been using this for years and it's the best foundation ever! It looks so natural and clean. If you have combination skin with some oily and some dry patches, this is perfect. It covers everything without being too heavy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been buying BE for years, and it is an old favourite that i keep turning back to. It gives me great coverage, and is quick and easy to put on in the morning. Requires little touch up aswell. I love that im getting a bit of SPF too in the product. And it doesnt irritate my uber sensitive skin.

I love this product but get so frustrated when it is almost gone. It's nearly impossible to get the last of it out of the container. When you spend that much money on foundation, you want to use every last speck of it. I really hope that more people complain about it so the issue gets addressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: okay i bought this because i was out of my MICA mineral powder and didn't want to buy another because its like 70 dollars plus shipping if i want to buy it online. So was in sephora and saw this for 27 dollars!!! i was like wow. i gotta have it. so i got it in the golden medium and i mainly use it as a setting powder but wow. this powder is an oz smaller than the MICA but it's still way cheaper and better quality. needless to say, i'm using this from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this bareminerals. Whenever I run out, I try a drugstore mineral makeup and I'm always disappointed. Nothing compares to this. I have (hormonal) breakout prone skin, and I love that I can build coverage depending on whether I have any breakouts. It also leaves a really pretty dewy finish. This makeup usually lasts me most of the day, but I need a touch-up by dinner time if I'm planning on wearing it all night. It tends to last a while too, probably 8-ish months, so it's worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used Bare Minerals for years and years and have often received compliments on my skin . But being the beauty junky that I am, I was swayed by what I read in the magazines and switched to Laura Mercier's tinted moisturizer (made my skin shiny and did not have enough coverage), and then to SmashBox's BB Cream (too drying), and then to SmashBox's CC cream (felt good on my skin but needed to use a lot of product for coverage). During the times I was using these other products, not only was I not 100% satisfied with the results, but I did not receive a single compliment on my skin! Therefore, I came back to my tried and true LOVE, Bare Minerals. This product does everything I need it to do. It covers the sun spots while it evens out my skin tone, and gives me a healthy glow. You can't go wrong with this. Please do try it. Just make sure you find the correct shade for your skin. It took me three tries to get the right shade. Also, don't use too much. Just take the time to really buff, buff, buff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation since I was 16! I am so scared to try something new... And why would I when this make up is so AMAZING! I have extremely sensitive skin and this make up is perfect for my face. It covers all my blemishes and you can wear it all day without is wearing off. I recommend this product to everyone. I have my mom, sister, and best friends all hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many foundations, from Covergirl to Urban Decay, nothing has worked as great as this stuff! I get great coverage and this buildups so nicely! I am definitely newer to doing the whole face makeup thing, but this is the easiest foundation to use that I have ever tried. This is perfect for my skin, because most break me out, and I have never had any bad reaction to it! I use primer, this, and a setting spray and I'm good to go! I use Medium Beige and I have to say, it's the best matching foundation with my skin tone I've ever used! All in all, this is my holy grail foundation. I am a college student who likes to try to get the most bang for your buck, and this is definitely worth it!!!!!!
Most important thing about this, is that it does not break me out. Great control shine. Not much coverage but loved it during summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, have used it for years. I do tend to sway now and then just to try other products, but I always come back. This is my safe, fool-proof, great coverage life saver. If I need a little more coverage I just use concealer around my eye area, and then the powder. This product always makes your skin look great. I have oily t-zone skin, and this seems to work best for me. I hate to feel like I am on makeup overload, this always looks natural. You won't be sorry you bought it. I love this powder, and all of the other products available!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting to try bare minerals for quite some time. I've always suffered from acne and broken capillaries and a lot of redness, and I'm only 21! I don't like using anything harsh or chemical laden on my skin. I have very sensitive skin that is combination. I've been using this foundation for over a month and a half now and I will never be going back to any drugstore brand. I've used the Makeup Forever HD foundation before, and while at first I liked it, I hated how it would dry and make me look cake and heavily made up on most days. I never had a glow and it definitely didn't look natural or cover well for whatever reason. This is build able and even the lightest coverage makes me feel pretty and put together. I took off one star because it can be a pain to apply and does take time, and it doesn't cover perfectly, but no foundation does. This is the best of the best in my opinion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is great if you have sensitive skin. It has fairly light coverage, and never leaves my face itching or tingling like other products tend to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really had high hopes for this but it was too light. I had returned it and got it in the matte version in the same shade which was wired because actually a little darker. But I have to say it gives my a full coverage with a kabuki brush. Also the matte version was perfect!

reviews.review_title: I Always Go Back to This
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is no other foundation like this. I've tried EVERYTHING and I always come back to it. I have combination skin with breakouts around my chin, broken capillaries around my nose and light acne scarring on my cheeks and this covers them all yet also looks flawless. I always get compliments on my skin when I'm wearing bareMinerals. People can't believe I'm wearing makeup, it looks so natural. I don't really ever write product reviews but I just want you to know that if you're wondering if you should use bareMinerals the answer is YES!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareMinerals original foundation for over 2 years now. I have tried others periodically but this is the one I always go back to! It makes the skin look flawless but like I'm not wearing makeup at the same time. I recommend it to anyone that will listen to me rave about it. I have tried the matte version as well since I have combination skin and can get oily in the t-zone area but I didn't see much of a difference so I went back to the original formula.

Maybe i'm applying it wrong, or maybe I should try out the Matte version, but i just can't get this to work for me. IT looks amazing and super natural on my friend with norm-dry skin, but on my combo skin, it looks glittery, and sinks into my pores :( I also don't like the packaging, I have the pressed version, but I feel that the pressed version has a different formula that im also not crazy about either. Good coverage for a power foundation though.

I love trying out different foundations so I've used everything from loreal true blend to more high end foundations like make up forever HD and I always come back to bare minerals. I am in the shade fairly light, which has a neutral undertone. Its perfect for me because I don't have warm or cool undertones and it just depends from foundation to foundation. I have combination skin and my main concerns are dark under eyes, pores on my nose, and small blemishes and this foundation blends smoothly onto my skin for a flawless finish. I also use mineral veil, warmth, and their blushes but I love how you can pair this foundation with any of your personal favorite blush, bronzer, and highlight. I use all kinds of products so that was a plus. I'll admit this isn't really built for travel but luckily you shouldn't need it because it lasts all day. This will always be my favorite foundation. It also functions as concealer so its kind of a two for deal. Highly reccomend even if you have severe skin problems.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for a natural, flawless look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It is light and natural. No creasing or caking. I didn't think a loose powder could give me the coverage I need, but it does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am new to this product. I began using from a sample included in another order. I found this product gives a little extra coverage when needed. Use a very light hand while applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just wish it was a higher SPF Great coverage Looks natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know how to edit my initial review, so here is a second one. This stuff is horrible. I understand some people love it, but this product ruined my skin. My entire face feels like sandpaper, I have red bumps all over, some are scabs. My face itches and it hurts horribly to scratch even lightly. I quit using this product about 10 days ago, and my face still is not healed. I'm returning every single bareMinerals product I bought and will NEVER touch it again. I normally have beautiful skin, and now I look like a meth user. I hope some of this isn't permanent.

I feel this product has gone down hill since I've first tried. My very first time to try I was sooooo impressed. But now it's chalky and has a yellowish tint. I'm not a true believer anymore. Sorry bare minerals

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the 4th time I‚Äôm buying this product.I feel the quality is still good but not as good as my 1st and 2nd purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is amazing. It's so lightweight to the point where I don't feel a thing. It also looks natural. I've been getting so many compliments on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation. I use it all the time in the winter. It has nice coverage for age spots and red marks without looking like a mask. It is a little drying because it is a powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After seeing all the hype around this product, I was excited to try it. Unfortunately, it didn't work for me. Upon application, there was powder all over my shirt and all over my sink (even when swirling, tapping, and buffing), and the light colors made my fair skin look yellow. I tried to use it several times, and each time, my skin was so itchy I wanted to scratch my face off by the time I got home from work. My mother wanted to try it, so I passed it on to her and she had the same reaction. Something in the product just didn't work with our skin. I'm still searching for th perfect powder foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep coming back to Bare Minerals foundation! When I wear it people do not think I am wearing make-up, just that I have nice skin. I usually wear foundation, mineral veil, and some mascara...if I want to look extra nice I will put it on a little heavier, and add some eye shadow and blush.

I can not express my hatred for bare minerals enough. If loading your face up with bismuth (small ground up metals) isn't enough to break you out then why would you want to walk around looking caked. I have had arguments in the past with people who prefer powder over liquid and how sensitive people are. Before you claim you're sensitive look at ingredients first. This powder is awful and over drying. Why anyone wants to look cakey is beyond me.
Great coverage, natural looking and gives me that slightly tanned look all year long. It's also one of the few foundation that doesn't make me break out.

reviews.review_title: Good for natural look- can be layered
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The beauty of this product is that you can use a little bit all over your face and it takes the edge of your imperfections, redness, dark circles, blemishes, etc., leaving you looking naturally perfect, not caked on. You can do a quick sleek ponytail or bun and run out. I use Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizer first and then Bare Minerals, if I have time I use the Laura Mercier primer but that tends to be more for the extremely flawless, foundation look for outings. It doesn't look powdery and it does a pretty good job of absorbing oil. I would begin with applying only a little bit when practicing putting it on without a mirror because you can apply it unevenly if you're not looking. Loyal user for 5 yrs.
I'm 24 and have been using this since I was 17. On and off multiple methods of birth control, and going from teen to mid-20s, this has been my trusty go-to for daytime makeup. It speaks for itself.
The best overall coverage, easy to use and blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as a spot concealer and it is great. It provides great coverage while also drying blemishes up!

reviews.review_title: No matter what foundation I try I always come back
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To bareMinerals.  I remember when I first heard about BM and knew I wanted to try this foundation. I still have the old packaging from the first few foundations I purchased. The coverage is outstanding and the fact that it's build able without looking cakey is KEY. Another thing that I love is that it is not a messy formula compared to a liquid foundation. I can add more if I need anywhere without worrying about making a mess. This foundation stays put on my face and makes it feel and look flawless. I don't know why I ever tried something else..
THIS IS MY HOLY GRAIL FOUNDATION. I'VE TRIED MANY THINGS AND I HAVE ALWAYS COME BACK TO THIS SINCE COLLEGE DAYS. LOVE THIS STUFF!

reviews.review_title: LOVE. I can't use any other!
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many foundations, liquids and powders, and I can't use anything else. Nothing covers up the redness of my skin! My skin is so smooth afterwards and it doesn't have any annoying scents.

reviews.review_title: perfect when paired with argan oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently switched to argan oil as my sole moisturizer and fell in love with bare minerals all over again. It matches my skin tone flawlessly, coverage is buildable, and its free of all the bad junk (parabens, etc..). Truly my holy grail foundation

I'm a makeup and product junkie so after hearing rave reviews I wanted to try this product to see what all the fuss was about. My skin looked amazing with thus product I couldn't believe the dewy natural finish and I instantly loved it!  I have two bottles of Bobbi brown and Clinique foundation that I haven't touched in almost two years (don't have the heart to throw away)because I wear my minerals religiously.

This foundation is amazing ! The first time I put it on my face was like if the world as stopped. I never found the right foundation until this one. Light, perfect for my skintone in fairly light, it covers more than I ever tought ! I will buy this over and over again. I also with my smashbox primer and Urban Decay fixing spray it stays all day for sure !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation! It is very light and natural looking. My skin looks photo-shopped when I have it on, which is a huge accomplishment because I have severe hyperpigmentation.

I juss love this product! It makes my skin look so natural and flawless during the day. My skin is really dry and I was using make up forever powder during the day and it looked fake. But after i've tried bareminerals I couldnt believe how natural and fully covering it is..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to love this. I love how it looks. BUT - it is drying out my skin a lot, and I've started breaking out. However, it's turned cold and the heaters are on full force, which also dries out skin. So I can't really say yet. I'm leaning toward loving it, though.  One thing about color. I went to the store and did the Color IQ. It said that I should use Medium Beige, which I thought looked too dark. The makeup artist tested it on me and said it was a perfect match. For the next few days, my face was a different color than my neck and chest. So I went online and ordered the Light. THAT one is the perfect match. I knew that Medium Beige was too dark. So don't always trust the Color IQ or the Sephora employee, unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: light natural coverage plus sunblock. a much better alternative for me than heavy foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wear many types of foundations, liquid and mineral, pressed and loose. But my all time, fall back on, can't miss favorite is the original BareMinerals loose foundation. Especially in the summer (In Texas) ....no matter how high the temps, it stays on all day every day. Coverage is swift and full. It lasts forever and I'll probably use it forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product, love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for 2 days and I really like the results! I do not have the heavy look and my skin feels great! Plus the cost is the best part!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been using the matte foundation to combat my combo skin, but the original is much better, giving me a more natural look.

When I first put this foundation on, I thought it looked okay. Or maybe I tried to convince myself that it would be okay but I had the wrong color. But after I while my skin looked blotchy and dis colored. I don't think I would repurchase. Maybe it might work better with oily skin.

I have been using mineral foundation for my entire adult life, and Bare Minerals is the worst brand I tried. In fact, it is the only brand that I had any complaints with. I used it for a few years, and my skin was horrible the entire time. It made my skin greasy and dry somehow at the same time, and I had terrible breakouts. I didn‚Äôt realize that it was the Bare Minerals that was ruining my skin until I switched brands and almost instantly my skin became calm, smooth, and nearly flawless. I still use mineral foundation, but stay away from this brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always go back to bareMinerals. The shade Fairly Light matches my complexion perfectly. It takes me literally seconds to apply, it covers any redness, it gives a natural finish, and it leaves a subtle amount of freckles still peeking through. I never have any problems with my face absorbing this stuff, and I have never broken out due to this foundation. 30 bucks gets you months of use. Great investment for those looking for a foundation that takes little time and gives light, natural coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for over 5 years. I've tried other mineral foundations but was disappointed. Love, love, love it!
Love Bare Minerals foundation, the best. Doesn't settle in pores like cremes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was excellent in terms of the natural finish it gives. Doesn't even look like you're wearing makeup. However I don't recommend this product if you'll be doing any physical activity or going out in the sun. It makes my face very itchy if my face starts to sweat the slightest... Still a good product, but I've definitely used better.
love this, every time I apply this product to my face , my face looks awesoem the next day..i never break out with this stuff
I love the bare minerals original foundation better than the matte. It is really good to my skin too and I have far less break outs than with any other products I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't say enough good things about this foundation powder. It looks so natural on and covers well - even for me, and I have occasional breakouts and acne scars. It's build able for a more flawless look. Use with a kabuki brush, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for summer!!!! (But it is not summer so..) anyway this product stays on all day another great product from bare minerals!!!
I've tried different everyday foundations but nothing compares to this one. It's also the perfect match for skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a winner all around. it never ever causes breakouts, is really easy to blend and build up if i want heavier coverage and it has an spf. i love this product!

reviews.review_title: Great coverage and gentle on skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this original bare minerals foundation. It can give the appearance of an airbrushed look when combined with mineral veil. I have very sensitive skin and this is one of the only foundations that doesn't irritate my skin or make my face break out. My only problem with this foundation is that the colors of the original and matte are not consistent with the Ready Bare Minerals foundation. I ordered Medium Beige in the original foundation because that is the color I use in the Ready compact. The hue was almost more orange and a little darker than the compact version. Fairly light in the Original foundation is the closest to the medium beige Ready compact because of the neutral undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bare minerals for 7 years. I am not a huge fan of liquid foundations for every day use which is why I have been so in love with this product. It seems that my skin changes every few years. Changes in oiliness, dryness and even which area of my face is prone to acne. Whether I have completely clear skin or I am broken out my skin always looks great! When the matte foundation came out I got it for when I'm feeling oily and I still find that the original covers better. The matte foundation sits on the surface and making it easier to see the find facial hairs. I can even use the light color when I have a tan in the summer time. It's like it does whatever my own skin does! I am a true fan and even when I try other brands I find I come back to using bare minerals. I am constantly complimented on how flawless my skin looks (even when I am broken out! It covers!) and even my derm loves that I use this!  I highly recommend giving it a try! I've gotten many friends hooked on bare minerals!

I used the original for years, the switched to the matte formula when it came out. Recently I have been highlighting my skin more than normal to get that dewy look. I decided to revisit the original formula. Love the finish, BUT I remember why I switched!!! The original has a white appearance when using flash photography, the matte does not! In the age of social media I will stick to matte and use a highlighter!

I love this foundation! I had to stop for a few months bc on accutane and skin was to dry. But now I have clear skin and this is great for my scars only foundation that looks Natural so glad I can use it again!
I've been a huge fan of Bare Minerals for years. I've tried other products but I come back to Bare Minerals. Great coverage. Love it.

It is lightweight and feels like you have nothing on. I do have to go over my face three or four times and it never really gets the full coverage. But works well as a day to day make up and when you want a more natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it totally does not work for me at all, i have combo skin, have some pores, it just makes my pores looks huge!!! they actually look like deep holes!!!
Used this for 6 years . Absolutely the best powder or mineral foundation I have ever tried. Last all day and covers very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best mineral foundation I have ever tried. I've been using this for about a year now. I used to use Sheer Cover but it would need reapplied multiple times a day. I do use a primer though first. This powder lasts all day (I do have to reapply if we are going out later in the evening but that's normal) and goes on nice and evenly. It never makes me break out either as I have very sensitive skin.
I have used this foundation for several years now. It wears well and blends into skin easily. You can easily apply more as the day goes on without the 'caked on' look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it because it has natural ingredients and some sun protection. I broke out a little after I used it, but that might have been because I was sleep-deprived rather than the makeup itself. I rarely wear makeup these days, least of all foundation. But I like this. I think I probably should've gotten the matte finish one instead though for fuller coverage. But I guess you can put more on for more coverage. I am medium brown and got the tan one, which blends well with my skin tone, but not very well with my forehead!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this foundation from Sephora backj in 2008. I have been hooked ever since to this product, and even buy a few at a time so I don't have to run to Sephora every month. I have tried many different foundations and powders by many different high end brands, but nothing beats this product. It gives such a natural, glowing finish, it doesn't feel like you are wearing make up. Hands down the best foundation out there, the all over face color bronzing powder is also amazing!!!

I used to use only drug store makeup and I was never satisfied with them because of the cheap quality. I didnt think paying more for high end makeup would make a difference but it did! This powder foundation does it all and it didnt leave me powdery and cakey. I got mine in light and it provided excelent coverage and flawlessly finished my look. It is pricey though and the product runs out really fast so that kept me from rating it 5 stars

I'm obsessed. I've used every kind of liquid and powder on the planet and after starting college my skin exploded from the stress. I was scared that I wouldn't cover, but it's incredible what this stuff does to your face. I saw an improvement in my skin's blemishes, texture and coloring in THREE DAYS. I'm the biggest skeptic on the planet, but there's a reason this product has a cult following. IT'S INCREDIBLE. Don't think. Just do. Your skin will thank you, and you'll feel as confident in your skin as I now do. I'm finally a natural beauty!!!!!!

I definitely was surprised by the coverage this foundation offered. However, it made my skin look like it had lots of makeup on... I believe a good foundation doesn't do that. And yes, I did use a good brush and everything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product is a must for anyone who likes using more natural products! i prefer using products with less chemicals in them and dont want them to feel so heavy on my skin but still cover my redness and any blemishes i have on my face and this foundation does exactly that

I love Bare Minerals and will continue to use their line for a very long time!  I think I picked the wrong shade though. I did the color match during the summer and went to purchase a new container b/c I just ran out and somehow my tan seemed to have disappeared ;) Oh well, I will see if I can mix it in with a moisturizer and get a tinted moisturizer. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have had severe acne for the past 5 years. I have tried so many different types of makeup and this has been my saving grace. I was worried when I first bought it that it wouldn't cover like I needed it to due to my acne. I was wrong! This stuff works wonders! I no longer have severe acne and the coverage is great! I do notice that it tends to wear off during the day but that is something I can live with!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a redhead with freckles and ivory skin, and this product is perfect for light to medium coverage without covering up my freckles. It's incredibly natural-looking while covering redness and minor imperfections in my skin. I use the lightest color foundation and have been for about 6 years now. I doubt I'll ever change foundations; the application is just too quick and easy and it makes my skin look naturally flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: makes me even bright and the powder is fine and smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color match is PERFECT! Unfortunately, no matter how I wore this, it looked cakey on my face. I used a flat top kabuki and the brush that came with the mini kit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I was a freshman in high school, I used the foundation in the color light I fell in love with it! However, always being on the go, I had little time to really put on makeup and being that this is a mineral foundation, it can get everywhere when you are in a rush so I stopped using it after a while and switched to liquid foundation. My mother uses this foundation which had made me want to try it out again, so this previous monday I went to my nearest Macy's and got a sample. Yesterday, I tried it out and it looked absolutely amazing!! I looked like I was in a magazine, airbrushed and everything! I even went to the gym later on that night and sweated VERY much and when I came home, it still looked GORGEOUS! I am in love again with this foundation. I have very big pores and my skin can get very red, so I usually look for a medium to full coverage foundation with a natural finish, that also feels very light on the skin. This does the trick!! I still can't get over the way my skin looked, I'm very pleased, will be going back to Macy's to purchase a full size! thank you BareMinerals!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. I wasn't expecting that much coverage from a powder but I was wrong. It hides literally everything and looks 100% natural. Get it girl!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used Bare Minerals for years, and on occasion have gone back to liquid....I'm always sorry when that happens. I will be sure to keep a sufficient supply of the bare minerals. It makes my skin better.....
Love it ! It looks natural
Really amazing it gives a great cover as much as you want I have a combination skin it observe the oil in oily parts and so soft and gently on dry areas

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i was never acne prone, but often have had issues with texture - unevenness beneath my skin. though i don't believe in one miracle product, using this in place of other silicone based products i believe has made a huge difference. i have been wearing this daily for months now, and ironically need less product now than ever before. finally at 23 i can say i have flawless skin. perfect product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i like this, but i dont love it . I prefer a matte finish, s√• i guess i should have bought the matte formula one, but the finish is not the problem. when i first put it on it look great, but 30 min later it has rubbed of on my chin and nose.. i am gonna try buying a primer to use it with.. i works nicely to set a product, it provides a bit of extra coverage, but it does not prolong the wear of it! :)  hope this was helpfull for you, and sorry for my english.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot believe no one knows the secret!!! Don't like the sifter because you can't get all the minerals? The bottom of the canisters pop off ladies! Turn it upside down and use the corner of your tweezers or a fork to pop off the bottom to get every last drop out!!! I do, now I get what I paid for. Happy hunting!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this many times and think it is a lovely powder. However, if you want flawless airbrushed looking skin think again. I use this during the spring/summer season for a light powder over lightweight foundation or bb cream. It works well but does not last long with the Texas heat. For a light makeup look it gives a great glow but if you are trying to go for flawsless go to Tarte.

This has been the best for years and years. I've added a BB cream to the mix and I'm even more impressed. It actually makes my skin happy while everything else irritates or causes breakouts. I use with Sephora's power brush and Make-up Forever concealer and get a flawless results. Alone it doesn't last all day but with a BB cream it lasts all day. I prefer the original because it gives my skin a glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Always the best!!! Never disappoints, flawless coverage
good for the price a great everyday foundation. must use an oil free primer with it otherwise i get massive breakouts and blackheads
I absolutly love Bare Minerals. Have been using it for a little over three years now! By far the BEST foundation ever. So light and perfects your skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is creamy but not oily. Most powder foundations don't have very good coverage, but this goes on like liquid foundation. I highly recommend it, especially if you have acne-prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For years I used cream or liquid makeups. It always looked made up. I wanted to look like a natural beauty (even if I wasn't). So, when I tried BareMinerals, I was in shock! I can't tell I have anything on, and I feel that it doesn't clog my pores like liquids do. I've been using this stuff now for about 6 years, and I don't plan on turning back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love bareMinerals. It's wonderful for my skin, which is fair and transitions between dry and oily. I find that using a primer is important with this product. The coverage is great because you can use a small amount to get a sheer and healthy glow, or layer it for full, photo quality coverage. I do like to put a mineral viel or finishing powder over for photos. Doesn't clog pores and is majorily allergen free. I'm also prone to break outs and this never causes a break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a big fan off and on of BareMinerals. I like the coverage, but it leaves my face feeling dry. In past experiences, they also did not have a good foundation color for me.  I learned that they added more foundation colors and decided to give BareMinerals another try. I found a good color to match my skintone so I bought it.  It is still too messy to travel with (even with the new stay closed lid) but I hope they will fix that problem soon. I may be a better candidate for the compacts of pressed powder (which I have not yet tried).

reviews.review_title: Amazing product! You can't beat it!!!
reviews.review_text: I've loved this product. I have tried other foundations since then, but I always come back to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage! Good for sensitive skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first foundation that I've tried and used all over my face. I like the build-able coverage and light SPF. I'm still not used to the feeling of having a base of makeup all over my face (I usually use just concealer under eyes and blush), but I like the lighter feeling.

I have used this foundation for about a year. I thought this was the best I could get. The problem was that it settles into all my pores and highlights any skin imperfections. It did feel good on my skin and not heavy but I have had to make a switch

This is always my go-to choice for foundation. It's easy to use, blends well, doesn't feel heavy, doesn't melt away, and makes skin look flawless. I've never had it cause any breakouts. The fairly light color works for my skin. It's not quite white like some light colors can be but it isn't orangey either. It's a great shade for us girls who happen to fall in the pale category!

I love BE make up. The coverage is great and it is very natural. However, I absolutely dislike the packaging they switched to a year or so ago. The sifter piece that is connected to the container makes it impossible to get all if be makeup out now. Complete dislike!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product after reading countless reviews that raved about it, in the shade Fairly Light. I applied it with my full flawless face brush in the morning, and although the coverage was decent, I had a cake face. It looked unnatural and like I was trying too hard, but I kept it on for the rest of the day. I felt a burning sensation on my face that day, and when I got home and looked in the mirror I found that my entire face was peeling. I immediately took it off, and returned it the next day. In summary, if you have sensitive skin, or want a natural look with coverage, do NOT get this product!!

I originally started using BareMinerals while I was in college and loved the light feel of the mineral foundation. Back then, there weren't many color options so I went with the one that matched the best. Then I left for Prescriptives mineral foundation, which had a flawless match. But after leaving department stores in 2009 and discontinuing my color I was left searching. I went over to Laura Mercier but felt like the color wasn't quite right. Now with Sephora's color iq, I found out that I have a perfect match in one of BareMinerals 20 colors! The Golden Fair is a perfect match for my asian skin and gives me a natural warmth. Now that the product has a perfect color match I won't buy another foundation! It is perfect for my combo skin and wearing it all day at work with my 12+ hour shifts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes my skin almost look airbrushed, it matches so nicely with my skin tone! And it lasts longer throughout the day than I first thought it would.

After using this product for a couple of weeks, I've noticed my skin does not feel as oily as it has with other foundations. I do have acne and have not seen any improvements as far as clearer skin, but using the concealer brush and full coverage brush along with this product does hide blemishes well.
I used to love bare minerals I would always end up going back to it but this time it broke my skin out bad!! I washed my face every night and it still made me break out I won't be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was wary of using this powder- aging, dry skin can trap powder in lines and make the face look artificial. But the reviews were so good, I went for it. So glad I did! I use it all the time to even out my skintone and it's the perfect canvas for blush, etc. If I'm in a hurry I use a large powder brush for an overall sweep. If I have more time I use the brush that came with the kit I initially ordered. It's actually a nice little brush..Highly recommend!

I've tried the bareMinerals Ready foundation, and liked the coverage, however even the lightest color was noticeably different from my neck. So I got introduced to the original powder foundation in fair, and matched my skin perfectly. The coverage is amazing as well, I notice a difference in just the first swipe. Works even better with the bareMinerals prime time!

A few days ago I went to my local Sephora and the awesome beauty technician used the foundation color matching tool to find my perfect shade. The only thing that popped up was Bare Minerals foundation in Medium. She put it on my face and it's the most natural looking foundation I have tried so far. I usually go for liquid foundation but I loved it so much I went to the Bare Minerals shelf and bought the complexion starter kit, which was also my very first high-end makeup purchase. This powder foundation keeps my skin looking flawless all day. I have a very oily nose and this tamed that oil. I'm very happy with my purchase and I will definitely make this my go-to foundation. It's helped me discover that you can get the cheap eyeshadow, eyeliner, and even lipstick, but when it comes to your face you definitely have to invest in the high end products for a perfect complexion and flawless application. I definitely recommend this to everyone.

I have been using bare minerals for 9 months now, and I hate it even more every time I use it. I purchased the starter kit from sephora and really tried to love it, but I just can't. Ever. At first I thought it was amazing, but then I realized my face looked way darker than my neck and chest so I would have to apply bronzer everywhere just to even it out. It settles into my fine lines and makes the dry spots on my face stand out HORRIBLY. It looks so cakey and gross, that I've just been going out without any makeup at all so I don't have to even bother with this stuff. Not to mention if I'm out eating somewhere, my makeup gets all over the napkin and almost completely wipes off when I wipe my mouth. And I couldn't even lay on my white pillow cases without taking it off first. And I hate how much of it flies everywhere when applying. It's like half my money is just flying around the room. It's awful. Definitely not for me, at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product since the beginning of its time; there's nothing better. I have found myself cheating on this product from time to time - only when looking for heavier coverage in times of minor breakouts. However, no matter how many times I stray, I always come running back to this foundation. I absolutely love this product. I'm an oily skinned gal, but I will not switch to the matte formula because the finish of this formula is beautiful and slightly dewy. It's fabulous - you must buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only make up that provides adequate rosacea coverage. It is gentle and nicely evens out my skin.

reviews.review_title: I really love this as a mineral foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a variety of makeup bases, liquid, powder, mineral, bb creams, tinted moisturizers, etc. and I find this to be a favorite next to my BB cream.  Pros: feels amazing on, easy to apply with a good brush, good for light coverage, natural luminous finish.  Cons: this is not for those that need full coverage, regardless of what the company claims. You can't really build the coverage too much as the luminous /sheen finish then gets accentuated and in your attempt you could then end up with a forehead that looks like you applied waaaaay too much highlighter incorrectly.  There ARE other mineral foundations, and I have tried them. They are good, and similar in ingredients and finish, but this is superior in quality and application.  For mineral foundation I would not buy another brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried something else that sounded good. Aargh! My face immediately started to break out in bumps like a teenager. Then I remembered why I started bareMinerals--to help my skin. I swear this stuff works like medicine to keep my face looking good. When I don't use it for a few days, my face looks worse. I have consistently worn it this last week and my face looks and feel wonderful. This is great stuff!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used to spend so much time blending my makeup but with Bareminerals foundation I just swirl the full face brush over a few times and I'm done! No lines, no mess!! Looks natural too and it doesnt clog my pores!!! I love this product! For extra coverage I use the handy buki brush with it ;) The only downside is I tend to sweat it off after a few hours

i love this stuff!! i've been a huge fan for almost 10 years now. the color payoff is amazing and does not leave me looking dry or caky. it's definitely fool proof for people like me who are not makeup professionals. I tried out the compact formula for a few days because I wanted a less messy foundation. The mineral-based formal tends to get a little messy and i was always paranoid about inhaling some of the dust.
