The compact formula was not my cup of tea. the shades do not translate so it was harder for me to find my shade and when i did, it still didn't look right. At the end of the day, i would totally recommend this foundation to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation provides good coverage while feeling light and soft on the skin. It evens out my skin tone while blurring imperfections. Sometimes my nose and forehead become oily but I've noticed no oiliness when I wear this foundation. Overall I'm very satisfied. I like a more natural look and this does look like my skin, but better. I took one star off because it does fade away, in the morning I look flawless, but then later in the day I find I need to re-apply. I will be trying this with a primer to see if that extends the wear.

reviews.review_title: I came back again and again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know why I every try anything different! It works beautifully - it looks natural, is buildable and feels really nice on my skin. Recently I tried a BB cream instead and it broke my face out really bad - a problem I have never had with bareMinerals. Sometimes my skin gets that dry feeling but with acne, so it feels as though the mineral makeup with make the dryness worse, but it doesn't. It covers great and the original has a nice dewy affect for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'd been using a liquid foundation before I switched to Bare Minerals, so I wasn't sure if I liked it initially--it felt so light and didn't quite conceal a sun spot I have on my hairline. It does NOT cover the same way liquid does. However, it makes my skin glow, and I've gotten so many compliments on how soft my skin and makeup look since I started wearing it. I am a convert! I've found it's best to apply it then put on concealer, though I'm sure that's backwards from best practices. It addresses the coverage issue for me. This is my new go-to foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product really delivers what it promises, and it continues to be my first choice in daily make up routine. It provides great, natural coverage, and the application of the powder is easy once you use it a few times. As long as this product remains on the market, I will continue to use bareMinderals for years to come!

reviews.review_title: bareminerals Original Foundation Broad Spec SPF 15
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG this is THE best for those with relatively clear skin that has some blotchiness to the cheeks and nose. A quick gentle brush of a little bit goes a long way and am camera ready. It's light on my skin doesn't feel heavy and my skin can breathe. No oily application. And it has SPF protection. YES! All so very important for good skin care.

reviews.review_title: It doesn't work as long as I heard
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I heard it is comfortable for acne skin and sensitive skin. But after I use it, there is acne on my face. Maybe the reason is that I recently sleep late. I feel this powder is very light and thin. If you do not have more problems on face like acne and pores, you can use it. it is ventilate and good make up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you are thinking of switching over, DO EET NOW! This stuff is fabulous! I hate the look of cakey foundation and this eliminates all fears and it improves skin tone! I love this stuff! I have been using it for over two years now! I remember using drug store products and struggling to find an alternative that would not clog my pores. I have very sensitive skin, and I react to everything in different ways. This is the only makeup that provides full coverage without breaking me out. Another benefit of this is that you can chose to go light or full coverage with it. I find it to be very buildable with a nice setting spray. I do recommend getting a primer and setting it with spray after the fact because this is just powder after all, and it tends to rub off if there is nothing holding it in place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation on the market, hands down! But I struggled finding the perfect shade for myself. One would be too light, another too dark. So I bought two shades to mix in the lid. It was perfect, but I hated fooling with two containers. And you can NEVER get the last little bit out because of the sifters. Then a little birdie told me a secret every BM wearer should know!!! The bottom of the canisters pop off!!!! Now, I pop off the bottoms, mix them both in a bowl, use a spoon to refill the mixture in the containers and I now have 2 perfect containers of my shade. This is also handy for those that want that last little bit out, so we don't feel cheated because of the new sifters. Just thought I would share because after using the containers for a couple of years, not once did I see this tip!!! Wished I'd known it 6 canisters ago!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome foundation. Very buildable without the heavy feeling.

reviews.review_title: been my favorite for over 5 years
reviews.review_text: so light, so natural looking, perfect skin tone match, doesn't make me break out... feel like I can go on forever on what I love about it. and ONE container lasts me about 3-4 months. MONTHS! unreal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE IT. It makes ur skin looks clear and soft, never gets oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation. It looks natural yet covers well.

I have used this product almost a month and it is the best foundation out there! It feels so smooth and soft on my skin and there are so many shades you can choose from. I an very sensitive, so I don't use any cosmetics with strong smell. However when i use it on my face it feels like i am not wearing makeup at all! Also when i want to wear barely any makeup, i can just use this as a finishing powder. Overall i am very satisfied with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many different types of make-up foundations and I always return to BareMinerals, especially when I am looking for a very natural look. This tends to be my everyday makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin that's very fair, sensitive and burns easily. I also get a fair number of red patches that require evening out, so I need foundation that can provide good coverage without looking cakey. I've tried liquid and other powder foundations over the years, but BareMinerals is the best one I've found. I use it in the lightest available shade, fair, which is a good match for my pale skin.  I like how the SPF 15 provides a bit of insurance coverage over my daily wear sunscreen (when you're pale and freckled like me, you can never have too much sun protection) though I would *not* recommend using this as your only sunscreen, since most women won't use enough product to get broad-spectrum protection. It also is one of the few products I've used that doesn't make my skin react badly or break out. And even though I have very dry skin, I find this does a good job of not settling into fine lines, though you really do need to moisturize first since this is most definitely a powder foundation.  Minor quibbles: I find this goes on too light with a brush, so I mostly use a dry sponge to apply. If I'm trying to get heavier coverage in a problem area, it can look cakey at times. I also find the packaging to be a pain, since I tend to spill a lot of product while I'm applying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can't go wrong with this foundation. I have very sensitive and acne-prone skin and this foundation makes my skin feel even BETTER than without make up. It's lightweight yet provides great coverage. It looks very natural yet hides all your imperfections. Obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Since day 1 of me wearing makeup, mouse and liquid foundations were my go-to products. I swore that these foundations were the best and I feel like I received 'okay' coverage. My skin is a little on the drier side, but I noticed that liquid and mousse foundations gave me an 'oily/sweaty' look! I always had to reapply power multiple times a day and blot my face with oil sheets constantly! On top of that I spent countless times buying different foundation brands and shades and none seem to be the one for me. I kept on insisting that liquid was the way for me, until I finally caved in on buying bare minerals. I didn't understand what all the hype was but I'm glad I bought it. No oily face anymore! My face looks clear, smooth, and radiant. It is well worth its price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Our house favorite, and a certain steady

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before BM I used liquid and mousse foundation because of their coverage. It was a hot summer day and my face was melting off and I needed a change. I found out about BM from a friend and finally took the plunge. I am now a loyal BM fan! The coverage is build-able and I get less acne. Love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It conceals the redness and scars on my forehead very well, but won't be enough if you have pimples, especially the infected ones. Love that it has spf 15. Stays on for the entire day for me but you need to reapply it in replace of sun screen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far the BEST foundation I've ever used. I have drawers full of product, but BE is the best by a mile. I recently went on vacation overseas and caused my skin to freak the f out.. But a few swirl tap buffs and my face looked perfect. I'll never cheat on you again, Bare Minerals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love to use this to set my liquid foundation or to use alone on hot or lazy days. I have been using this foundation for probably 6 or 7 years and I will continue to repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this as a sample given away at my gym (luckily in my shade). I used to wear OTC pressed powder, as I'm not into heavy make up or foundation type products. this makes my face glow and gives a flawless look without the heavy feel of a foundation! love, love, love it
Works very well with enlarged pores. Makes for a smooth complexion! Radiant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: when I FINALLY started using this foundation. In answering a Question I realized I should take more time to review this since I cannot do without it. Having Acne since I can remember, and it being traumatic as I grew up...Going through two rounds of Accutane, still using topical RX's and when bad, Antibiotics ~I still have ACNE! Guess it will make me look younger??? No it is still difficult.  Now, Finding just the right Tone/Shade- one that would cover, but also do something to lift & compliment my coloring was challenging. The straight up Medium- was not for me- and other gals I know. Blah! Medium Beige, same. I am 1/2 Italian, and 1/2 Slovak/Czech. (for reference) I think it finally took me 3 years of trying all the way to Medium Tan (too dark for me) and prior - tried the Summer Bisque Multitasking Concealer (a bit too pinkish and ok for pre-concealing, and last touch concealor...) Then they came out with the Golden Medium. YAY!!!! It's just enough color to do something attractive, but has just enough gold-ish tone to it to TRULY COVER and counter act under eye circles, red areas, those veins that appeared out of nowhere and just about anything else you may want to vanish away. Mind you, this is not accomplished in 5 minutes. Buildable coverage. Also worth mentioning, I sometimes use CoverFx M40, now G40 as a supplement when I really need the full artillery.  I use a Tiny detailed brush Pro Gel Liner Brush #26 Sephora Collection for the tiny brown spots, blemishes, etc. I am an Artist, and love intricate detail. BUT this really PRE CONCEALs teeny imperfections beautifully. Then I use Cover Fx pointed Brush. (Sephora makes similar ~ # 58) It works everywhere. Eyelids, Under eyes, T area.... Sorry BM. Then the Sephora Kabuki Brush (not the retractable- PQ ) for Everywhere. This one is more $$ but has lasted. Go undereyes again with a Concealer Brush...Then go over small imperfections again, now with Cover Fx ~ a Dot here, a Dot there, inner eyes... and there is a Regular face!! Thank you Bare Min.s for helping me feel better about myself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation for sensitive skin. Have used it for the last 7 years and will continue to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: do you break out from everything?? try this .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a product I come back to time after time. When used properly, this foundation looks natural and stays put. Plus, the product lasts for months.
For years I had used MAC foundation and it was heavy. I decided to give mineral make-up a try and couldn't be happier. The application is easy, the color matches perfectly, and it is weightless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is the only face foundation/powder i use. it lasts so long before having to buy more. i prefer the Original powder formula to the Matte. both look fine. i just am a stickler for repetition. i use B.M for acne coverage, dark circles, general face powder.
Perfect flawless coverage !

If natural, youthful, and alluringly beautiful is the skin look you are going for, then this the product for you. I use it everyday for work over moisturizer and at night over a liquid foundation if I'm going out. You don't need much at all, but it works wonders. totally worth trying in the store if you are contemplating a mineral foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: flawless face in quick easy steps. perfect skin color match to my sunkissed summer face.

reviews.review_title: Why did I ever stop using this product?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Surely because I was lured by the promise of all in one bb creams that blur imperfections. What it took me 2 years to figure out is that silicone clogs my pores. Other products might look great but who care if they eventually cause acne? So many products with high silicone are listed as non acnegenic or non comedogenic. That simply is not the case for me. This product gives great coverage, light is the perfect tone for me, it feels weightless and doesn't cause me to break out hence, nothing to cover anyway with a heavy foundation or bb cream. There is a reason this wins awards year after year.
Have been using this for a few years. Works well and lasts a long time. Having SPF an added plus

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just purchased this today and i got the golden tan in the store i had one of the ladies that worked there help me choose. i was asking for a natural look but to cover some acne scars, i was pleased about the look but not with the coverage of the spots but purchased it anyways cause i liked it. but when i got home i saw i looked tanner then what i really am but didnt realize this in the store cause of the lighting. i like how look flawless despite my scar but not completely natural cause i look darker. my reccomendation to anyone who is buying this is too have someone apply this at the store put it down walk out to wear there is good lighting and really see how u look before you purchase this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best product I have ever found for spot touch-ups of blemishes or small discolorations. It really is miraculous how it blends right in and blends spots right out! I use it without any foundation, but on rare occasions when I do use foundation I use this powder last to blend away any spots or blemishes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's my absolute favorite foundation ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like I'm the Goldilocks of mineral foundations simply because I have tried so many over the years but haven't found one that was just quite right. However, almost everything about this one is perfect! The Golden Medium shade is a perfect match for my skin and the coverage can be built up to full, sometimes I can skip the concealer altogether on good skin days. I love that the sifter can be closed for travel and the price is very reasonable. I wear it every day and only have to buy a new one every 5-6 months. My only caveat is that it does sink into my smile lines towards the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing this foundation for the past 5 years with a few exceptions. I got a sample kit for Christmas when I was a month away from 13 and have loved it ever since! My Mom has worn it for as long as I can remember and she is in her 40's and her skin looks fantastic! Glowing and wrinkle free! It is the one foundation that I can count on to always be good for my sensitive skin. The coverage is buildable and somehow looks like you're not wearing anything at all. It covers your imperfections but lets your perfected skin come through. Every time I wear it I don't get compliments on how good my makeup looks; I get compliments on how my SKIN looks! Believe me I don't have perfect skin! I have redness on my cheeks, under eye circles, and the occasional pimple. It is quick and easy to apply and the price is reasonable. You need the smallest amount so it lasts forever! Also, its good for your skin so I don't feel like I'm damaging my skin. Its a must try!
this stuff is great it's quick easy to use, and has coverage depending on how much you put on with your big brush, I keep one in my desk at work

reviews.review_title: The only foundation I will ever use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love bare minerals! If you're looking for more coverage, which I need, you MUST use this with the precision face brush. After using the two I get more coverage than with a liquid foundation but with natural ingredients and a light airy feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lightly covers my skin. Doesn't turn my face orange and stays on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareMinerals for more years than I care to mention! Originally, I only used Medium Beige; however, now use Medium Tan exclusively. Just love the coverage I get :-)
I have been using this for years and will use nothing else. I first day I ever used it I got so many compliments about how pretty my make-up was and got carded!

I freakin love this! I use this product as a base. I use primer and than this and than my bronzer... I do that because this product completely evens out your skin tone and hides any flaws it makes you look like a Porcelain doll

reviews.review_title: Excellent product but must use the correct shade!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for almost 10 years but either they changed the formula or my skin color changed because the shade I've been using (medium) does not look natural anymore. The sephora artist suggested I switch to light but that made my skin look orange. The Skin IQ machine at the store did not show a Bare Minerals option for my skin tone, so I am trying out Laura Mercier (recommended by Skin IQ). Otherwise,BareMinerals is an excellent product. Light weight, good coverage, and easy to apply. Just make sure you. Use the correct shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect powder for me. I have really oily skin, and my face is about two shades more pink than the rest of my body. I used to have problems with finding a powder that could make my face match my body until my sister bought me this for my birthday. It works perfectly! It covers completely and evens out my skin tone without giving a caked on appearance. It lasts a long time against my oily skin without clogging my pores. Some days I can get away with just using this powder (though most of the time I use a tinted moisturizer before applying the powder). Works wonders. Never trying another powder again!
By far the best coverup I have ever used! It doesn't rub off and looks no natural!!!
This is the only decently priced makeup that provides great coverage for my sensitive, oily skin. Every time I've tried something different, I always come back to this makeup.

reviews.review_title: The only foundation I will use
reviews.review_text: After countless years of searching for a shade that looks normal of my fair but olive toned skin, I finally found perfection in this foundation in the shade Golden Fair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Every summer I turn to bareMinerals to ensure that my make-up doesn't slide off my face in heat and humidity. The products provide good sun protection and a very nice finish--absorbing perspiration. I also love this line when I travel...I have fewer liquids to present when rolling on a plane.

I used this year's ago. In fact, it was my second foundation. Then, I switched to tinted moisturizer, which I loved. However, my dermatologist said the moisturizer was pore clogging and that I should go back to the original formula of bare minerals. Good to be back with my first love! A little goes a long way. My skin looks flawless.

reviews.review_title: Will never return to liquid foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After becoming tired of liquid foundation wearing off midday I decided to give this product a try. Understanding how to put it on and using the proper brushes is the key.  I have now been using this product for almost a year and think it is fantastic. It goes flawlessly and feels light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I got matched at Sephora with the Pantone Color IQ technology. And this foundation came up in the results. My absolute perfect shade is Golden Medium. It goes on seamlessly, and it has very good coverage. I personally recommend getting matched with the Color IQ technology, and if this foundation pops up in your results, pick it up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this foundation after hearing so many wonderful comments about it. I have to say it was simply not for me. The foundation settled into my pores and seemed to make them even more noticeable. My cousin and my daughter also had the same issues along with this foundation. It did not stay on and was really shiny at times.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried Bare Minerals a few years ago and was not impressed. I decided to try it again since my Mom has been using it and loves it and the price is so reasonable compared to other foundation brands out there. I realize now that I was using it wrong the first time and that is why I didn't like the results. The first time around it made me cakey and settled into lines and pores but that was without primer. Now that I use the bare minerals primer, the results are great and it wears so well during the day. My second mistake the first time around was applying too much. I watched a video about applying Bare Minerals in the swirl, tap buff method and this made a huge difference. I purchased the customizable starter kit with the Bare MInerals brushes, warmth and mineral veil and everything works great. I just got back from Las Vegas in 115 deg temps and despite the heat, this makeup looked flawless all day. I'm so glad I decided to try this makeup again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a foundation wearer, but I wanted something that would smooth out my skin, keep the oiliness at bay, and not look to makeup-y. This product is great. I love that you can build the coverage, or just swipe it on quickly for an easy glow. It's been very hot here lately (in the upper 90's) and this makeup really lasts. I've had no issues with needing to reapply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always find myself repurchasing this product! So awesome for clear skin that just needs a bit of a boost, especially if you workout and want a little makeup. This is awesome and doesn't clog your pores, very light. If you use foundation under it , you get great coverage . It's the perfect t powder durning the day and great to combine with others at night,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Bare Minerals, and the coverage is great. I have used Bare Minerals for years, and I've tried other makeups, but always go back to Bare Minerals.
If your skin is at all dry, this make up will look good on application, but after some wear it will slowly stipple off your face. I imagine it might be okay if your skin wasn't dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, but it didn't work. Not only did it crease like CRAZY, but whether I used it to set other concealers or if I used it on its own, it would gather in very tiny bumps underneath my eyes.

reviews.review_title: love this product - been a fan for over ten years!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: bareminerals is the only foundation to use. it is light weight, never cakes, gives full coverage, and a little goes a long way!
I needed this for my summer tan! A must have to tone down the shine in this heat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say that I am very impressed with this foundation. Beautiful, natural look, for everyday wear :)  I have combination/dry skin, and I was afraid to try this foundation, because I did not want my face to look too dry. But it has a very nice finish, and I dont even need finishing powder (I use it as a one step before my bronzer and blush).  I am an NC20 and i have strong yellow undertones, and Light is a perfect match for me. I apply it with s stippling brush because I like that airbrushed finish :)  I cannot find anything bad about this foundation, I love it. The coverage is light to medium with the brush i apply it (but if you use a brush with thick, compact hairs you would get close to full coverage).

reviews.review_title: There are other mineral powders on the market...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Goodness, the reviews are outstanding for this product, but for me, this isn't the best mineral powder on the market. Do some research for best results, try other mineral foundations, then settle on bareMinerals if that's what works best for you.  I've used Susan Posnick's mineral powder foundation during summer months for years. The foundation is outstanding, but the brush applicator (which also holds the foundation and is delivered internally via the brush) gets clogged often. So I thought I'd try bareMinerals--it gets outstanding reviews and the product is housed separately from the brush applicator.  The product just doesn't work for my skin, in fact, it highlights my imperfections.  Instead of blending into my complexion, it seems to sit on top of my skin. It's obvious--my pores never looked so big. And, the powder gathers in oilier areas of my face, while blending perfectly into the most healthy spots. I stood several feet away from my mirror, and was horrified, to be honest.  It's buildable, that's for sure, but do it at your own risk--I found it to look cakey in the oily areas of my face, even with one sweep. Building the foundation only made me look like Tammy Faye.  The feel is tight and irritating. And my complexion appeared flat, not luminous like the Posnick brand effect.  All this feedback is too bad, because honestly, the color match for this product was outstanding.  Powder foundations can work flawlessly with many complexions, but for others, a fluid mineral foundation is the way to go, or, another brand of mineral powder.  Just keep an open mind and don't forget there are other products on the market besides this one. And another tip--if you really MUST use a primer with mineral powder, it's probably the wrong formula for you. It should effortlessly blend into your skin (after your moisturizer has absorbed completely) and provide a glowing, gorgeous finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the Golden Medium and I really like it. I don't need a lot of coverage so it works perfect for me. It gives you that luminous look and it's so easy to use. Perfect for the summer. The only thing is that when you get sweat or water on it, it smudges. Other than that, it looks really natural and airy. It's my everyday go-to. It also doesn't clog your pores.

I love this product! I had a deluxe sample and couldn't resist buying the full size. I have oily skin and this works wonders for it. It lasts all day for me, which is rare with the other face makeup I have used in the past. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ove bareMinerals!! I use the Prime Time before I put this on and my face feels great!! Very light and a perfect match for my face!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation ... It's my favorite. Great coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for 5 years now. Coverage is completely buildable and this foundation does a great job of covering redness and acne without it looking fake like liquid does. This foundation is not miraculous though, for instance my face will get oily during the day (haven't tried matte version yet). This foundation is breathable, so it will not clog your pores and cause other problems like liquid does. I recommend using with a small liquid concealer for bad spots. I found this foundation does not cooperate well with dry patches of skin, so if you often have peeling skin I wouldn't use this. This is probably the only foundation out there that is good for your skin.
I've been using this makeup for years. Every once and a while I try something new, but it never compares.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally decided to try a bareMinerals product after hearing so many great things about the brand. I bought the original foundation in medium beige to use as a setting powder to go over my liquid foundation (MUFE HD foundation in 153 Golden Honey). I love it. It sets my foundation perfectly, although I'm sure this product would be wonderful on it's own. Best loose powder I've ever bought.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Provides coverage, easy, quick and flawless application. It does stay on all day, even with sweat or rain. It doesn't look like you have make up on, very light, and natural. It evens out my uneven skintone. I've been wearing it for about 5 years now and haven't wanted to switch to anything else!

I have acne-prone, combination (dry and oily), very pale, sensitive skin with acne scarring. But since I have switched to Bare Minerals foundation, my skin has improved SO MUCH. I stopped having new breakouts completely without changing anything else in my regimen! It covers my acne scarring but has a natural, slightly dewy finish and I am getting SO many compliments on how good/healthy I look since wearing this.

reviews.review_title: I'm a lifetime user of this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've reviewed before. Best makeup in the world. I've tried everything......NOTHING COMPARES!!!!! I'm always getting complements on my complexion (it's because of the Bare Essentuals Mineral Foundation and Mineral Veil!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is great for people who have combination-dry skin. If you have oily skin then you should go for bareMinerals matte formula. My skin tends to be dry-normal so this is perfect. It basically makes my skin glow. It looks really natural and has buildable coverage, plus a little goes a long way. It covers acne, blemishes, and moderate sun spots pretty well. I love this stuff and I have been using it for almost a year now. It also last about 7 hours before needing a small touch-up. I love using it with bareMinereals warmth because it adds color to my face.

The good: I love how Bare Minerals FEELS on my skin. It is silky smooth and breathable, does not feel dry or caked on.  The bad: it is too sheer of coverage for my freckled skin. It did cover my acne well but didn't give the overall coverage I wanted unless I used concealer brush all over. Also wears of throughout the day as skin absorbs it. Has a sheen to it that some may not like, but does not feel oily.

reviews.review_title: You can sleep with it on
reviews.review_text: Great for reflecting sun rays from your face and looks beautiful on. I have been using for years and my skin has cleared up since using it. Plus I have extremely sensitive skin that will blister as soon as any chemical touches it and none of the bare minerals products have ever irritated my skin the way that many others do. Only catch is that it is a loose powder and can be a bit messy when applying.

The foundation felt cakey, even when applied lightly and every time I wore it I got a new breakout. No staying power, would wash my face at night and nothing would come off because there was nothing left to wash by the end of the day! I gave it a really good try and I really wanted it to work but it just wasn't for me.

I love this foundation! I love how soft and even it goes on my face. This is the foundation that I have found that matches my skin tone closet than any other I have found. It covers up my dark spots so well. This is easily blendable. When I wear my sunglasses it rubs off the foundation and I just rub the area to blend it and it looks flawless. I could not live without this product now!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love bare minerals. I have super sensitive skin, and bare minerals is the only foundation that doesn't clog my pores and make me break out. It is messy to put on, and it takes a few tries to get the right amount of coverage. I also always need to have some type of setting spray or powder to keep it on all day. Overall, it looks natural, is able to be blended and layered, and the original formula leaves my skin with a bit of sheen.

reviews.review_title: used to be a diehard fan..
reviews.review_text: I used to use this RELIGIOUSLY.. and I feel like not 1 of the 20 colors they offer actually matches my skin tone. I may just have an off tone or be rare in color, but none of them match anymore. So yes, it does cover very well, and blends nicely. It doesn't work at all on dry skin, so make sure to moisturize generously! Wish I could still use and love it.. but I am onto other brands for a better match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite make up product ever. The coverage is light and natural, and the finish is not dry or powdery on my skin (unlike many other products, many of them much more expensive than this). I never really understood the phrase confidence boosting product until I tried this - truly amazing.

This product is overall good, only if you use a little. It may look to thick and cakey in some areas when too much is applied. And it is a little bit pearly, for me on my nose and chin. Though it does cover up redness also covers irritated pimples or acne.

reviews.review_title: The BEST foundation I have ever used!
reviews.review_text: I have combination oily/dry skin. I had a hard time finding a foundation that worked for me. This product covers all my blemishes and lasts all day. Love it!

reviews.review_title: I never thought I'd convert to powder foundation..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: But I did and boy am I glad I did. Coverage is just as good as the Tarte Amazonian clay foundation I've been using previously and seems to stay on longer. My sensitive skin is reacting well to the product and doesn't even feel like I'm wearing makeup. I am a true believer in bareMinerals.

I have used bareMinerals foundation before and I really like it. It's a nice alternative to liquid foundation and it makes my skin feel cleaner. I also love that it doesn't have as many chemicals as other brands. I was a bit disappointed with this new container of foundation that I just got though. Although I got the same color I had before (light), it seemed a bit darker than my previous one and the sample in the store. Also, I like the idea of the travel cap since the old container was liable to make a mess during travel, but the new one still left me with extra foundation dust on the container.

There's no comparison between Bare Minerals and the brands you can buy at the drug store. I had run out and didn't have to drive several hours to the nearest Sephora and didn't want the hassle of online ordering. I thought the drug-store makeup would work in the interim, but it just fell flat. I'm glad I found a Sephora with Bare Minerals while I was on vacation.
Simply put - the best foundation ever! Good coverage, stays on forever, feels great on my skin. I have used it for years after trying sooo many other foundations. Will never use anything else!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this foundation is lightweight and does not feel like I am wearing makeup, but I do not like that it does not cover up my blemishes and uneven skin tone. Even when I use layer upon layer, it does not do a good enough job. I ended up using it as a finishing powder over my liquid foundation, almost like a Mineral Veil.
I use this occasionally and I love the bronze glow it gives. It goes great over my naked foundation too.
This lightweight foundation provides the perfect amount of coverage and since it's already a powder, it helps keep my complexion shine free in the hotter summer months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin so this will work great in the summer, but it is too drying in the winter. I love that it doesn't feel like you've applied a mask. It work wonderful and I've received many compliments

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, i've tried a lot of foundations out there, and this one is absolutely my favourite for a number of reasons. I am a teenage girl who's been going through some hormone changes, i'm lucky enough i don't have a lot of acne, one in once in a while, but a lot of products out there not only did not help my acne but broke me out more around my cheek area. I heard a lot of people rave and said this is a good foundation for acne prone skin, so i decided to pick it up and try it, then i literally fell IN LOVE with this! Nothing can replace this foundation, not only did it not break me out but it gave my face a flawless natural finish, making me look as if i don't even have foundation on! Although the product is really good, i do notice that i get oily around my T zone area after a while of wearing it. This product is a MUST for girls like me who suffer from acne, because not only did it make my face look flawless it also one of the ONLY products that helped my acne stop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for 10 yrs now & its a staple. I don't use it daily, only when I want better coverage than a tinted moisturizer & it is pretty darn good! Just wish the spf could be increased...

I used Bare Minerals for years and am very happy with the coverage. But the other day I wondered if it was time for a change, if there was something better out there...  So I went shopping at Sephora for foundations for 2 HOURS. A dozen foundations later I always came back to the bare minerals which still had the coverage and look that I liked best. Sometimes the grass isn't always greener.  I highly suggest giving Bare Minerals a Try, especially since it is all natural. This one however doesn't have the ease that the new formula in the compact does. It's so much easier to use than the loose, so that is one change I'm happy that I made.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareminerals for years and wouldn't ever think of going back to goopy liquid foundations ever again. My skin loves this stuff! Great coverage, weightless, and spf all in 1.

What can I say about bareMinerals that hasn't already been said? I tried liquid foundation again on a whim and immediately returned it and went back to this. I'm 40 with normal skin. I won't ever change again. Get the shade right and it's a perfect foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using for years and it is wonderful! Great coverage while looking natural.

I finished using what I bought, but I definitely have not come back for anymore. My main issue was that the product left a dusty finish over my face. I don't know of any other way to describe it. It's not terrible, but there's definitely better stuff out there.
I absolutely love this product! Once I started using it I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used this product for the short period of one week, and that was long enough! During this time, my face was a complete wreck! My normally clear skin not only got extremely dry and itchy, but also covered with blemishes. Once I stopped using this product, my skin got better after a few weeks. Word of advice - if you have combination skin, do not try this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am 26 and am still dealing with breakouts, etc. I really feel most of it is due to the makeup I have been using (everything from Tarte to Chanel foundation) so I decided to finally try Bare MInerals. I never thought that a powder would cover up the acne and redness but it does and all while keeping that natural look. I am hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received a sample of this and I am hooked! It's absolutely perfect! I have acne prone, combination skin that is very sensitive. Most powders will cause me to break out however this one doesn't. It gives my skin a perfect finish and natural glow with even coverage. Plus the SPF is a great bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for about 5 years now,if not longer ...can not use traditional foundation now . Covers flawlessly without the gunkie feel of liquid foundations ..what I love about it is it still lets your natural skin show through it so its just a touched up version of you .Not sure how well it would cover for someone with heavy acne bc I don't have that issue, but I do know it works fine for occasional breakouts to moderate acne ...I was a hard core Clinique user for years ( which is still an extremely good product) and this stuff converted me for life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years and I love it! It has SPF15 but what I like the most it doesnt make me breakout like other products that I have used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using medium beige for about 4 years now but this new color golden beige is even better! Kudos to bareMinerals for getting new colors!
I love this product, I never buy anything else!
This is a great product. Bare minerals gives great coverage without being heavy. I use the original formula and it gives you a natural glow. I've been using it now for almost three years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Matches my skin seamlessly. Buildable coverage. They give a lot of product so it will last a while.
Love this stuff.......

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have used this product for at least 10 years. Love it. Easy to apply, goes on evenly, stays on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a dry and sensitive skin, so naturally I always stayed away from anything that's powder. So glad a girl at the store persuaded me to try and explained how it works! My skin does feel smoother and nicer, haven't changed anything else so it has to be it. Not a full coverage but evens a skin tone pretty good, not dry and lasts!!! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i've used this foundation for about 6 years now. no matter how many other ones i try i always come back to it. evens out skin tone, lasts all day, doesn't clog your pores, and just generally leaves your skin looking amazing. i recommend a good moisturizer or BB cream underneath if you have dry skin and if you need to cover blemishes just put a tiny bit on your finger and apply to problem area after applying normally. works great!

I was looking for a new foundation in the Sephora store. An employee recommended this to me, chose the perfect shade, and applied it on me. Provides nice coverage without that make-up look. I bought the full size and love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Bare Minerals for years for love how it looks on my face. It covers whatever spots I have and gives a flawless look. I got a sample of liquid makeup which I tried the other day and didn't like how my skin felt at all - tacky. I also have sensitive skin but this makeup doesn't bother it at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. And no matter how many times I stray from it, I always come back.  I have exceptionally acne-prone, combination skin. I break out often and when I'm using bareMinerals, my skin is noticeably more beautiful. Because it is powder, there is a tendency for it to flake up if you use the concealer and then the powder over a zit. But, if you keep your skin hydrated with the right moisturizer, then this foundation is key.  Even if I fall asleep in it, I can still wake up the next day without clogged pores and inflamed skin. It's the perfect lazy-girl's product. Dust it on and GO.  DO watch out for the skin types. Sometimes what your other skin tone would be in normal foundation can be a little too light. I try to go one tone lighter than what tone I use with other foundations, as the powder creates a light yellowy shade if you don't pick the right tone.

I really do like this product for several reasons: it's relatively affordable, it's free of parabens and a lot of the other nasty substances that are in more traditional foundations(this is the biggest perk for me) it has very respectable medium coverage, and it feels pretty light on the skin IMO. However, there are also several reasons I took off two stars: it settles in fine lines in few hours and it also reacts with the oil on my skin and gets cakey so I have to smooth it out with the brush and add more foundation or mineral vail. The makeup looks nice again after I've touch it up but I never felt the need to reapply with a more traditional liquid foundation; as a result, the product is gone much more quickly. It's not good around the eye area- seriously awful- so I had to purchase liquid concealer to use with it. For me, the pros out weigh the cons so i will probably buy it again.
I luv it luv it, make my skin so beautiful my husband. Said to me Wow don't you look Flawless....... I am just loving it. Thank you. I just luv your products. For lady's all colorer.

reviews.review_title: the best mineral make-up out there.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff, it magically transforms my combo/patchy/unevenly-toned skin (including acne scars, freckles and melasma) the second I brush it on. I think that the original formula (with slight sheen/light deflecting particles) offers better coverage/deflection than the matte version and is better for those of us with coverage needed.  Can settle into fine lines/poors after a very long day of wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a number of years now - it makes my skin glow. I've tried other foundations in different formulations and some are also really good but I always come back to bareMinerals - there is nothing out there that makes my skin look so flawless and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i bought this as an extra foundation build-up to use over my liquid foundation or bb cream. i dont hate it which is why i gave it a good rating but i dont love it which is why i didnt give it five stars. i feel like i need extra coverage given my hyper pigmentation but it almost looks too powdery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for several years with confidence that it will look good all day and not emphasized any wrinkles. It feels like you are not wearing any makeup at all. Even though it is a powder it is certainly not drying and it has built in SPF protection. I have discolorations but this foundation covers them well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used bared minerals since I was 14 and I still use it. It gives a nice glow that last long, and it feels as I am not wearing make-up at all!

I wanted to get bare minerals ever since I had seen the late nite infomercials. My girls ( 14 year old twins) bought me the starter kit for Mother's Day, they knew I would never spend that much $$ on myself. I LOVE IT!!!!! It makes my skin look great!! It makes me feel beautiful!! Perfect present :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews, but thought it was worth it to right a review because this is the ONLY foundation that I have found that helps give clear and even LIGHT weight coverage! For the past two years I have developed pretty bad Melasma and uneven skin tone from sun damage and pregnancy which are very hard to fix and treat and take time to do so, so while I am trying to alleviate that problem I have used nearly everything out there (make-up wise) to help create an even tone and cover up the Melasma, which is very hard to do. I use concealer as well, but it is the bare minerals powder that helps finish up the look perfectly, almost better than the concealer alone at times, but it make me feel better to have the concealer on as well. Most full-coverage foundations are think, liquid, heavy foundations that just feel gross on my skin and this pretty much feels like nothing on and has buildable coverage! Its taken me a couple times to figure out my perfect shade but its worth it because the Melasma has definitely hurt my self-esteem over the past couple years. I am slowly getting it to fade but having this powder helps me feel like I dont have to put as much make up on and cover up so much!!

I have been wearing many BareMineral products for about 5 years. I will not be switching anytime soon. There foundations are not only attractive on my skin but you can't even tell I am wearing foundation . Since I started wearing it I almost never get any kind of blemish on my skin which proves its good for my skin!

This mineral foundation is so easy to use! I love it because it doesn't take me long to apply it to my face and it makes my face look even and natural looking! Nice look w/o looking like I have too much makeup on! However, when I want more coverage, I use cover fx liquid or cream foundation! BM is very good for everyday use! I have tanned skin and use med-beige. It's a little light for me, I might try going with tan next time!

My first review, and it's about time! I have been totally devoted to this foundation for 8-9 years, but I sadly need to move on. Started using this in my late teens when acne was a big concern and my skin was pretty oily. It did the job of covering effectively without looking cakey. In the last year or so, I started using the Oil Cleansing Method for cleaning my face (such a money saver too!), which seems to have made my skin much more balanced. Acne is still a concern, although to a lesser degree. Lately I've noticed that the bareMinerals foundation was making my face look dull, dry, and very powdered down, despite using moisturizer and primer. My skin felt itchy after applying it too. Overall, I'd recommend this foundation to those who are more on the oily side, but I'm off to find something better suited for me now that my skin seems to be drier - looking for that dewey glow :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but EVERY time I applied it, it looked super cakey, I used it on my little sister as well and again it looked horribly cakey, way more so than any liquid foundation I have ever tried. I tried applying it different ways but no matter what I did it looked horrible, I was looking for a natural everyday look with this and it wasn't happening, it looked way to much to even wear out at night in my opinion maybe I did something wrong but I doubt it because make up isn't something that is new to me. So I'm not sure? I have thought about getting the pressed one but I'm not sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always loved bareMinerals. It provides the best and full coverage without clogging your pores and your skin is able to breathe. Flawless and leaves no shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have large pores, slightly oily skin, and live in a hot humid climate. I this really is not bad. I like the feel and coverage. But it did not last, ran and settled into my pores. Looked awful. Matte finish is much better but the coverage is lacking and colors are different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i was originally just looking for a powder based, non-toxic sunscreen and i came across this product. it is fabulous! it's sheer, the perfect color match to my skin (plus it just blends away), and has the SPF coverage using minerals, not chemicals. i like that it is low toxicity and also looks great on the skin. my skin looks smooth and even and will stay that way since i won't get skin damage! i also use mineral veil on top when i need a higher SPF. it's pretty good (but the sales person sold me a shade too dark for my complexion so i use it very sparingly)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like a more natural look that doesn't make me look cakey which is why I chose a powder. I love this and refuse to buy anything else for myself. The color really blends to your skin tone. I love that my skin can breathe a little and it's not completely hiding me. It's the right amount of coverage. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite! Great coverage every time
Walked into the store and was helped quickly and this was light and covered enough. I don't like foundation but this is so nice it almost covers like it. Just so much lighter. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Still love Bare Minerals after yrs of use - the older I get the more my skin changes but I can always rely on Bare Minerals to keep my face looking fabulously flawless. I use a smaller brush to conceal my imperfections & the fuller brush for overall coverage.
This product is absolutely amazing and makes my skin glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this foundation gives a natural finish and doesn't get cakey. Using a more dense brush allows for a more full-coverage look if needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have nothing bad to say about this. The price is pretty good compared to all the other High end foundations. It doesn't dry me out, with my primer it will last me all day and it doesn't look cakey! Highly recommended... Plus it has SPF

reviews.review_title: Quick and easy coverage that's hypo-allergenic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a huge fan of bareMinerals products in general. Provides great coverage for acne scarring while avoiding new skin issues from developing.

reviews.review_title: Great Foundation - Worn for over 6 years
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great powder, it covers well and feels like you have nothing on. Plus I don't always wash my face before bed and it doesn't promote breakouts. The Primer is worth the money too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Full, full, full coverage without the heavy, greasy, oily quality of liquid foundation. It is light as air and you wear the makeup, not the other way around. My skin can breathe and doesn't react especially since it is a natural product. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this foundation for years, and I adore it! I have super sensitive skin and tend to break out even with the gentlest BB creams, and liquid foundation is usually a nightmare. bareMinerals is so gentle and natural-feeling, I can't even tell that it's on! Especially when used with the Mineral Veil, it has a flawless finish that looks like my skin, but better! My only complaint is that since it's a powder, it's a little tough to use when my skin is dry -- it just makes my face look flaky, which is never attractive. bareMinerals' Skin Rev-Er Upper does a lot to help that problem, though!
My absolute favorite! I have very sensitive skin and this is the only brand I trust to use on my face!

This foundation is absolutely wonderful! I have somewhat greasy, acne-prone skin with an uneven skin tone. The foundation helps to matte the oil while still looking natural, hide my acne, and even my skin tone. It lasts for a long time, especially when paired with the BareMinerals primer and Mineral Veil finishing powder. It also works extremely well as a concealer, covering my acne and blending into my face. The natural ingredients don't clog my pores and cause irritation, and holds up their claim of feeling natural enough to sleep in. Because the foundation works so well, it isn't necessary to use very much and should last months. The wide range of shades to select is perfect- I have very, very fair skin and usually have a difficult time finding foundations that match my skin tone. The Fair shade is PERFECT for me, and I've never seen my face look so naturally even in skin tone. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a great product! It is the only foundation I use. It evens my skin tone, makes it silky smooth and gives a natural look.
For my daughter. She loves it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product since June of 2009. I have loved every single minute of it. What a blessing it is not to have to worry about streaks and make-up lines. Or getting the liquid foundation all over your hands.  If I could change this product in any way it would be that it is extremely frustrating to see there is still product left in the container and not be able to get it to come out or get to it.

reviews.review_title: I've been using this for years.
reviews.review_text: I would never go back to liquid foundations. I've been using this one for at least 5 years. It actually has great coverage and lasts all day. I can sleep in it with no worries if I doze off unexpectedly and I can even go running in the rain without my makeup getting messed up. Also I have very sensitive skin that is prone to breakouts and this make has been the best thing for my skin I have ever found.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used for many years and love the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using bare minerals several years ago and its the only make-up I use now. It's a little on the pricey side and I wish Sephora would offer more discounts to their insider clients. The matte one is great for low shine and covers flaws.

I don't understand the hype for this foundation, your skin has to have a perfect balance in order for it to stay put in tip top shape. You can't have dry or oily skin, or if you're unlucky like me, combination skin. Its beautiful light shimmer immediately turns horrid when it highlights the dry patches on your skin. If you have oily skin the foundation will start sliding within 2 hours. If it weren't for all of this, I would give it 4 stars since it has a very nice finish in the BEGINNING only. But for all of you with perfect skin, go for it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin gets very shiny throughout the day and this foundation (paired with a primer and a translucent powder) keeps my shine free all day! The coverage is very buildable. It is also super easy to apply so I can give myself a full coverage look in like a minute (I also don't have a great foundation brush so that's saying something).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation in my makeup drawer. If you have a clear complexion and not many blemishes this is a great choice. This foundation evens out my skin tone and appears as though I am not wearing makeup. It also stays on the entire day! I like it because I do NOT feel like my skin is suffocating under a mask. I choose the original foundation over the matte because I have an olive skin tone and it looks more natural. I prefer to look shiny! Matte would be a better choice for someone with a fair complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my Go to item at Sephora and online ordering. Living in humid Hawaii. This makeup is the best for the climate and my skin. Mahalo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing this now for about 10 years now (age 15-25) I have extreme acne prone skin. It covers about 75% of my blemishes and scars, I still need to use concealer/coverup and for that I use a stick or liquid. Do I think it HELPS with breakouts, or makes my skin better? NO. I've had acne since I was 8 years old and no chemicals, natural remedies, makeup has completely removed it. I lay this on super thick, probably 3-4 layers to really cover, and doing that, this product lasts me about a month and a half if I wear it like this every day.  The reason why I like this is that it is easy to blend in comparison to liquids or cream foundations. I like to mix it with the mineral veils, or with MUFE HD powder to give a nice even look. Sometimes I will mix the powder with the primer to make a nice even cream to go on, I find it gives a thicker coverage especially if you're going out or need your makeup to last a while, because it is more like a creamy paste.  I also use a synthetic fiber soft focus brush, not a natural brush, to really get around those blemishes without irritation from rough brushes.  All in all, this is great whether you have acne skin, rough skin, or perfect skin. It's lightweight and you can wear as much or little as you want or need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: - Lightweight coverage that doesn't make me feel like I'm wearing a mask. - Perfect color match for my pale skin, which is something I've always struggled with (usually too dark, even with the lightest shade available). - Buildable coverage so I can put on as little or as much as I want on a given day without looking fake or cakey. - My skin doesn't break out as much since I've been using it. My skin feels like it can breathe when wearing it.  Cons: - My skin looks a little shiny and oily even though I don't struggle with oily skin. It gets worse as the day goes on.  Overall, I am addicted to this foundation; however, I will stick with the matte version.

bareMinerals original foundation is unlike all others. Besides the incredible coverage it provides (I also use this as a spot coverage and its amazing), it evens skin tone while looking incredibly natural. This perfect pixie dust is the most vital part of my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gives you a natural non caking face look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for years and I love it. Easy to use, good coverage, and lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation, hands-down. I have some broken capillaries on my cheeks, and this light dusting of foundation covers the redness without having to use a cover stick! It is natural and non-irritating. I love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used and loved bare minerals foundation for years, but my last purchase gave me a huge case of blackheads everywhere syndrome. I don't know what happened, but the sparkly ingredient must have gotten into every single pore and clogged it. No bueno. But I switched to the matte and every righted itself. Might be my skin changing over time, might be a new formulation. I still give it 5 stars because it's an amazing product, but for those with large-ish pores I would recommend the matte version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i used to use this as my primary foundation without a primer and it worked really well until i decided to upgrade to a cream foundation. my skin has worsened since then so now i use an anna sui foundation and then this broad spectrum foundation on top of it to build more coverage and it works really well on my skin! i hate opening it for the first time though because that plastic thing will not come out easily!

I am in love with this foundation. I have always had problem skin, acne, dark spots, light freckles, and uneven tone and this makes my skin look almost flawless. It's buildable so I can use less coverage if I'm having a good skin week. Also my skin is so sensitive one wrong product or application tool on my face and I break out within the day. I recently went on a cruise and I only used bare minerals foundation and I actually slept in it and my skin didn't break out! It's definitely worth the money but make sure u use a good application brush with it.

I have problematic acne since high school and this is the best product ever for me. I have been using it consistently for about eight years and my skin does not breakout from it. It is light enough but provides great coverage and my skin feels like it can breath with it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great mineral foundation that will make your skin look natural and better. This powder hides imperfections like acne scars and any blemishes. I wear this over my sunblock and I love how it doesn't give me a cakey look. Also this doesn't provide full coverage, it's more of a summer item when it's too hot to wear heavy foundation. This has become my first choice for summer make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It looked great in the store when I applied it, but then again I already had liquid foundation/concealor on. When I applied it at home, following my usual face prep, the coverage was too light for me and seemed to take a bit too much work to get it to the right coverage. So, although it just didn't give me the coverage I was looking for, I am still giving it a good score because it didn't cake or set in pores and lasted well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great natural color on my skin tone. I only wish it lasted longer on my face. My skin at times is normal/oily so sometimes about 4-5 hours later it looks like my makeup disappeared off my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great product when you have a little sun....
Love this foundation! It goes on smoothly, provides good coverage without being heavy.
I LOVE bareMinerals foundation. It's the only foundation that I'll use. Ever. It's so lightweight but it really covers up redness or uneven skin color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this product almost a year ago on a whim because I wanted to try a foundation that wasn't full of chemicals. Since then, my skin is much more even and I have fewer breakouts. It looks flawless and natural on my skin and the ladies at Sephora color matched me perfectly. The buildable coverage is perfect because I can cover my face with an light even layer and build it up easily to cover blemishes and bags under my eyes. Best foundation I have found yet!

I got this product in a mini size in a kit, and my skin can be very dry on some days. Usually, this foundation is okay, but when my skin is dry, I mean if it has ANY dry skin at all or any flakes, it makes my face look horrible. It looked really noticable and make my face look cakey. I would only reccomend this if you do not have dry skin.

reviews.review_title: Good, but perhaps not the best
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like bareMinerals, and have worn it for years now. But my love for it has waned as during summertime it settles into my pores despite my use of primer. It's my first choice in the other three seasons, but I have begun to for a new foundation on account of this issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Powder foundations just don't work on my normal to dry skin. I had heard good things about bareMinerals so I gave it a try, but it had the same drying effect. Had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I have been using this for five years now and whenever I try anything else it does not compare. This is a great foundation to look natural but still gives coverage. The coverage can also be buildable to be as natural or full as you want. Especially great with the warmth and the mineral veil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bare minerals is awesome! It makes my skin look silky smooth!! I have not to great skin (oily in some places, dry in others. Big pores and some acne.), but it covers it up so nicely and naturally. I love it!
I love the original bareMinerals foundation! It covers my skin flawlessly and feels so lightweight plus, it is made of natural minerals... this is definitely my go to foundation.
Love love love my bareminerals powder. Best makeup ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have use this make-up for 9 years. I love it. I have never been able to wear liquid make-up. I have tried many different sample from Sephora but none of them seem to work for me. I have sensitive skin and am prone to brake-outs.

I used the original Bare Minerals formula for about a year, then decided to try to compact version. Never again (the color wasn't the same, and it was cakey to apply). So glad to be back with the original!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have been wanting to try bare minerals. received a sample of the primer and powder and love it. Very light and easy to apply, stays on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have red undertones on my face, especially in my cheeks. This particular shade really covers the red undertones and evens my complexion! Good for summer, but it'll make me look like I've put too much make up on in the winter, so I'll probably go back to my N20 shade in the winter.
Bare minerals powder gives a natural beautifully finished look and feeling to your skin and works amazing in any lighting or climate.
Love, love, love this stuff! I've been using it for years. I've tried different types of mineral makeup, but I always come back to this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love bareMinerals. I have very difficult skin. It's always either too dry or too oily, and prone to breakouts. But this foundation always feels fresh on my face, never too heavy. I've recently been using it over a primer, which helps it from being too dry, though it's not really necessary. I've been using it for years, and don't expect to change.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful foundation if you don't want anything heavy, however I feel that if you have oily or combination skin the matte foundation is better. Also, mineral foundations will NOT give you full coverage no matter how many times you apply it, but I do wear this daily and get compliments all the time. People who say it's 'cakey' are not putting on the foundation right, it's all about the tools and tricks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation I use and feel it is the best on the market. It is easy to apply, doesn't get cakey or heavy, or look like I am all made up. A little goes a long way so just use a small amount on the kabuki brush and really blend it in your skin. The most important and critical thing is to find the correct shade for your skin. I mix fairly light and medium beige to get the right shade for me. I get compliments on my skin all the time. Other women say my skin glows and looks pure. I always tell them it 's BareMinerals! But they don't believe me. Try it yourself. You will become a believer.

I have always used the loose matte powder medium tan. I received a small sample of the compact foundation and love it! I immediately purchased the compact which I like much better. Easy to carry and more coverage.
Great coverage and finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for years. I hated the feeling of liquid foundation on my skin and how sticky I felt afterward. I LOVE this product.
