My husbands family (5 sisters) all tell me I have the best makeup and I have made believers out of them. It feels like I am not wearing makeup. My skin feels natural and I receive compliments all the time on my skin. I don't know how anyone would not like this makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I kind of like this powder and am pretty happy that it gives you bang for your buck. So far it has looked great on my skin and pretty much kept the oils at bay. Will see how it performs in the summer months.

I don't usually wear foundation and bought this as more of a spot concealer, but I love it regardless. I love how soft my skin feels after using it. It does the job without making me feel like I'm clogging up my pores.

This is my go to loose powder foundation. I find the coverage is perfect, not too opaque and not too sheer. It covers what needs to be covered but lets your skin BREATHE which I find many powders don't. A little bit goes a long way so it lasts forever. I seriously can't praise this enough, it's made my makeup routine as simple as a bit of concealer and this. That's it and I have flawless skin. Plus extra points for being natural and animal friendly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample kit of bareMinerals and followed directions to a T but this kit left me looking Old and enhanced wrinkles and pores that I didn't even know I had. (I'm in my 20's.) Very thick, cakey, un-natural and annoying to apply. No thanks, I'll continue to use Light coverage products such as my BB creams and tinted moisturizers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this product. It doesn't irritate my extremely sensitive skin (I have psoriasis) and it provides the coverage I want. I am not much of a makeup person - makeup for me means putting on lipstick. I bought this because I was desperate for something to cover my extremely red cheeks. I always look like I've been sitting in a sauna - not a very professional or sophisticated look. The bareMinerals covers the redness with ease (a tiny bit goes a long way) and even upon close inspection you can't tell I'm wearing makeup! I couldn't be more pleased.

I was very pleased with the color of the product. Sometimes powder can have gray undertones, this one did not. A little goes a long way. My skin looked smooth and did not feel weighted down. In a word, my face looked flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Even though I love the coverage it brings, unfortunately it makes me breakout sometimes and it doesn't help my dermatitis either :( I have bought it several times and still use it when I don't want to wear BB creams or liquid foundations, but beware if you suffer from dermatitis as it may not help you with that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have bought this many times and love it still. Highly recommended. Only try to keep it in the container, if it gets on clothes, counters, anything..it makes a mess. Have a salesperson try different shades on you to get a match.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation i have never tried! it's not a heavy foundation like others. TRY IT!!!

reviews.review_title: blends well for a flawless finish
reviews.review_text: I have tried many liquid foundations that I had to top with a powder foundation to set as I have bad skin and require full coverage. I have gotten this and tried to simply use the concealer with the foundation (with blemishes and all) and it has given as much coverage while looking super natural. Meanwhile, I save time by skipping a step from my old routine. It is lightweight but blends well and covers what you need covering.
I've been using this product for years for extra coverage at night. It has a sheer, flawless look, and a little goes a long way

Best foundation I have found to date but can indeed get cakey at times. I prefer this over liquid foundation - it is so so easy to put on in the mornings with some brush strokes! Would definitely recommend. If you tend to sweat it could be an issue with grease or cake although I have only come across this issue maybe once or twice in the three years I have been using this product.

I'm always the lightest shade in foundation, so I got the Fairly Light because the undertones sounded appropriate for my skin and I figured it would blend. It's too light, so I recommend getting someone in a store to help you with a shade. Also make sure the primer is fully dry, as well as any moisturizer you put on before. I'd say you need to wait a good half hour or so, or else the powder gets really cakey and doesn't stay on very well.
This is a foundation I have been using 12 years! It always ways evens out my complextion and is light and longwearing. Love it..

I've been using bareMinerals for about 10 yrs. now. I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE the products! I have broken capilaries, and the coverage I get from this product makes me so much moe comfortable than any make-up I've ever used. Honestly, I've tried other mineral products, but they just don't do the job that bareMinerals does. PLUS - the service provided online or in stores is unbeatable. Thank you SOOOOO MUCH!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Normally I'm a product junkie and I try everything. But I have settled on this foundation because it's the best. I wear Golden Dark and it's everything you want in a foundation. Buildable coverage - goes from very lightweight to full coverage with some layering. It's easy to apply and not messy since you have the click-spout, and it smooths your complexion really well. It doesn't dry out my skin or make it oily, and it's easy to wash off at the end of the day. And my sensitive skin isn't irritated by it. Perfect! I really recommend the Get Started kit, as it also comes with the Mineral Veil and the brushes, which are also great.
I'm 63 years old & love the coverage of the Bare Minerals Original Foundation in Med Beige with SPF 15. The SPF 15 is just an added bonus!!!
Very light weight but covers everything! It's my secret weapon! I also feel great because I know the minerals are good for my skin.

reviews.review_title: Great overall foundation for all skin types....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love bareMinerals. I've used it for over 6 years. Of course in that time I've tried other products, most of which make me breakout, but I always seem to find my way back to bareMinerals. I recently switched back and I cannot count the number of times that I've been complimented and had women ask what I'm using on my face. I'm told that it glows, and girls...everyone wants to hear that they glow now and then. I use Medium Tan in the summer and Medium Beige in the winter. As an added bonus, this foundation is great for my skin, it hides large pores and helps clear up my skin, I've had minimal breakouts since switching back even though I tend to sleep in my makeup (bad bad I know). Ladies, remember to moisturize and let your lotion dry otherwise the powder will stick and look cakey, also make sure to use the concealer brush for a flawless complexion. Note that I did try the Matte version and was very disappointed, it made my skin look very sallow and dull, the orignal formula is the best, I rave about it everywhere I go.

I have been wearing this foundation for 8 years. In this time I have tried other powder foundations, as well as cream foundations and I always come back. What I love about this foundation is the ability to easily decide the amount of coverage you want. You can easily have light, medium, or heavy coverage. I do think it takes a little practice and recommend playing with it before you leave the house for the first time to figure out how to get your desired coverage. I go back and forth between fairly light and fairly medium. I love that these shades don't make my face look pink. BE has been the first foundation I've used that doesn't give my face a rose tint like all the other foundations out there for people with red tones in their face. This is also the first foundation I've used that not helps cover up my blemishes, but does not make my break outs worse! I got adult acne in my early 20's and every foundation I used seemed to make it worse. I stopped wearing make up all together for a while until a friend introduced me to BE.  What I don't like is that this foundation will bring out how dry your skin is. I recommend doing a light exfoliation every couple of days and use a good moisturizer. During the winter I use the BE foundation primer to help hide my winter dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been buying bare minerals for years! I struggled to find the right type of foundation for myself for a very long time. I could NOT make do with liquid foundation no matter what the brand or price and my face always broke out. Bare Minerals is the first I have been able to wear daily and not have a negative impact on my skin.  The only downside was that in heat it tended to not look as good, but I bought another product that would make it stay put.
I love how the minerals make this a light weight makeup that stays put all day.
The best product that covers all your flaws better than liquid foundation. I suggest if you have oily skin it works great. That is my skintype and it works wonders.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for about 8 months. It lasts a long time and looks great.

This foundation is very natural and covers some blemishes but it does not help my oily skin. The shade never matched me. I have asian yellowish pale skin. bought 5 different colors hoping to find the perfect tone so I decided just to give up
My expierence at Sephora was excellent and the products that I purchased are excellent

I first bought this as part starter kit. I really like the application, longevity, coverage. It feels great! I like the slightly opalescent sheen. I liked the brushes as well! So I tried another mineral make-up but it was chalky & sort of highlighted fine lines (yikes! I'm only 33 & have slightly oily skin so not too many wrinkles) so I went back to this foundation. Super happy about it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This powder foundation is my favorite of all. I've used different products over the years and this one has the most natural coverage and feels weightless on your face. I've received so many compliments whenever I wear this. I'm a fan for life.
My skin has always been very sensitive to foundations. This has been the only foundation so far to not break me out. It looks pretty natural on my skin, and gives great coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to use this a lot when I first got into makeup. I really liked how light it was and when I sweat (which is often), it wouldn't stay, but it wouldn't run either like liquid foundations. It was also very natural looking but obviously did not have a lot of coverage. However, the major downside for me was that it caused little bumps on my skin, they weren't obvious but I could feel them. I think that it probably just blocked my pores. Wouldn't repurchase.

I was diagnosed with Rosacea ~1 yr ago and this product along with other natural based skin care lines have made all the difference in calming down my skin without drying it out. I'm a convert to mineral based & use this with the bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin so I was hopeful that a mineral foundation would work well for me. This looked awful on my skin. I tend to have slight peach fuzz on the sides of my face and this foundation clung to it, and literally made every hair stand out. It also emphasized any pores around and on my nose. I will never buy a powder foundation again!
My 13 yr old and myself use this foundation and we both love it!! Perfect for both of our skin types, which are totally different.
Flawless, natural, radiant coverage.
Love that it is SPF, matches my skin tone and is basically spill proof.
My daughter, 15 years old, needed foundation for a gala we were invited to. I opted for bare Menerals for its full coverage and its health benefits for her skin.
This is the first powder foundation i have used&i still use it till this day. The coverage&shade is just perfect. I totally recomend this product to everyone!

I love this foundation... I would prefer if it came in a shade between fairly light and medium; however, I use both of these and sometimes mix the two.  The best thing about this makeup is that it is noncomodegenic. In my earlier years, I used make that was not noncomodegenic with a result of enlarged pores/blackheads. Ugh. Nasty. My face is finally beginning to clear up.
I've always used Bare Minerals, due to my oily skin. I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation I've tried that doesn't irritate my skin or make me break out. It looks great on, never cakey or like a mask. It gives you a glow, which normally would be a problem with my oily skin, but it just looks amazing. Remember that you only need very little and if you have spots or scars to hide, use concealer, don't try to cover them up with a ton of foundation because it doesn't look as good when you use too much.... oh and you know how some liquid foundations rub off on everything, this foundation doesn't! You can sleep on a white pillowcase with it, snuggle up to your boyfriends white t-shirt, no worries :)

I love your makeup but miss the old jars. You are defeating the purpose of being able to mix colors with the new jars. It is impossible to mix colors easily. Also it is also impossible to get all the makeup out of them. My husband has even tried breaking the lid for me and then the pieces of plastic get in the makeup and you really can't even break them very well at all.

I love this foundation and will never use any other type again. It blends so well on my skin and doesn't make me breakout like a lot of liquid foundations do. Since I have started only using bareMinerals products on my face I have gotten tons of compliments on how great my makeup looks!
I love this foundation. It is lightweight, not too heavy and just enough coverage.

I really like this foundation for two reasons. First and foremost, my sensitive skin is always better when I stick to the bareMinerals. Second, the range of colors includes a great match for me. The only drawback I can cite is that because it is a powder, wrinkles can be more noticeable than they would be with a liquid, especially during dry winter months.

I've been using Bare Minerals for 3 or 4 years now. I love it's natural look and that it feels like I'm not wearing anything. Even thought you aren't supposed to, I've fallen asleep with this on and no break outs!

I've been using this shade for years. It gives me an all over smooth palette to begin my makeup regime. I use it in conjunction with Warmth to get a natural glow. In summer, Faux Tan can be used instead.

I've been using the BE foundation (original) in Light for years. During a recent promotion I was restocking and browsed some reviews. I saw that some people liked the Korres mineral foundation instead, and so I ordered that as well. At first I couldn't decide, but ultimately I kept the Korres and returned the BE. The Korres seems more sheer on the one hand and yet builds for better coverage on the other. The Light shade is perfect all over my face and jaw line, whereas with the BE I needed to use a lighter tone on my jawline/neck if I had blemish to cover. I also used the Summer Bisque concealer powder under my eyes. With the Korres product I use one thing for all three purposes...so I've switched. Sorry BE!

I've been using Bare Minerals for over 3 years now and I absolutely love it. I always had acne prone skin and when I switched to this mineral foundation, my skin got visibly better immediately. Today I no longer have acne problems. I will stick with this foundation forever!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not brand loyal to very many beauty products, so to say I've been using this product for 5 years is a big deal. It gives me an even skin tone without looking caked on. It matches well and the sunscreen element helps me feel safe even when I forget on a sunny day. I recommend it to anyone looking to make a change.

Goes on smooth, blends with skin color, no oily look & No break outs. I've forgotten to put on my regular sunscreen and just put on the powder, and the sunscreen in this makeup works!. I've been using Bare Essentials foundation for 4 years and really like it.

My skin tends to be red and dry. The bare minerals always delivers a beautiful, soft finish and helps to tone down the redness. i always get compliments and for a woman of a certain age that always makes my day !
I've been using bare minerals for about a year... I love it.. Doesnt feel like you have makeup on, it lasts all day, so much better than liquid.. I will never go back.

I use medium beige matte for all over my face and I used to use it under my eyes but I didn't like how dark my undereyes would look after a while... So I had an old medium original foundation laying around (expired) and I applied it under my eyes and LOVE how it looks. My eyes look so awake and refreshed. I have under eye circles to begin with so I apply a yellow concealer underneath and then set it with the medium original foundation. My eyes look awesome! Soooo natural. So I went and bought me a new medium original foundation ... One that isn't expired. ;) the original formulation reflects light and I believe it's just what u need for the under eye area.

Been using this on and off since it first came out. Great for normal and (my) oily skin, tho when I'm dry (winter) I must use a liquid. All their products are very high quality; the drugstore brands don't quite live up to the coverage and finish this brand provides.

I've used bareMinerals for years and absolutely love it! I will never use anything else. I'm 65 but people are surprised that I'm in my 60's because my skin looks so youthful. I tell them it's bareMinerals!

Have been using bareMinerals foundation for years, would not switch to any other brands. btw, don't buy on ebay, I learned my lesson, they are fake. Feedback on ebay is mostly about transactions, shipping speed, how responsive a seller is, nothing about authenticity. I trust Sephora, will continue to shop here.
Love bareMinerals products, but should have purchased this in Fairly light. Even with my fair skin this made me look like a ghost.

I keep trying to find something that has a bit more coverage but this foundation with Makeup Forever concealer is still the best match for me and I've tried A LOT of makeup. I have some acne scars and the makeup alone wouldn't cover it completely, but gives me a nice even complexion. I prefer the original over matte because it gives your skin a glow. It lasts the work day, it's buildable and gives good coverage and lots of colors to choose from.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin, my forehead and t- zone get oily throughout the day but around my mouth and my cheeks can get dry. This foundation was absolutely perfect for me though, it didn't make me break out at all unlike other foundations I've tried, and it left a smooth, silky, and even finish on my skin. I use very minimal concealer under it on my eyes and blemishes, and find that just one layer is enough for me.  Would recommend this product to anyone except those with very dry skin, as it may collect on flakes and make skin look/feel even drier.  Overall though, fantastic product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried basically everything (MAC, Bobbi Brown, MUFE, drugstore brands- you name it- my face wore it), and I was getting restless at finding the ideal foundation for my combination dry skin. Never in a million years would I have ever thought a MINERAL POWDER would give such ideal coverage and not cake or smudge throughout the day- or dry out my skin most of all! I am highly impressed! Five stars for sure!

I have never looked back since I left liquid for Bareminerals foundation. I am very fair skinned and I hate having heavy amounts of makeup on, not to mention dealing with shades.  I have the lightest shade Fair and if its summer time I just add a little extra warmth to my skin for color and contour. I finally don't feel like a one tone flat face.  Believe me, the compliments will come on how beautiful your skin will look! And the coverage for a blemish is good AND they will have short lives too!
After starting with the intro kit, this has become my favorite complexion perfector - I'm pale, but this is light enough that I can use Medium Beige in the summer months for a little glow.

reviews.review_title: Want more coverage? Change your brush!
reviews.review_text: I have been using BareMinerals for the last 12 years, and I still enjoy it. Over the last year or so, though, I started to wonder whether I should change, since I feel like I'm starting to need a little more coverage. I considered changing to the Ready foundation, but read it doesn't last very long. (I do love how long one of these original foundations lasts!) When I went into the store, a consultant suggested I use one of the synthetic Sephora foundation brushes. As opposed to the BareMinerals brushes, that have natural bristles, the synthetic brushes do not absorb as much makeup into the bristles, keeping more at the bottom as you apply it to your face. This gives you much better coverage. (The synthetic brushes also don't harbor as much bacteria.) Try it!

BareMinerals foundation seriously changed the way I looked at my skin. I have pale skin and am prone to redness on my cheeks and chin. Liquid makeup always gunked up my pores and gave me breakouts. Since I switched to BareMinerals a few years ago, I can count the number of breakouts I've had due to makeup on one hand.  It goes on flawlessly, is easy to touch up and lasts for hours (mineral veil helps this!). I love it! I must not need as much as they suggest, because I only buy it two or three times a year. A little goes a long way!

Everything is awesome about this powder; it applies evenly, it reduces irritation, it's non-toxic, it doesn't cake, the containers are easy to use, the color option is varied & it has really helped heal my skin instead of irritating it (like most unnatural & talc based powders do!) The reason this stuff is popular, is because it works... plain & simple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bare minerals for several years. It is easy to use and always gives professional results. Even though I wear jeans and tees I feel like I am dressed up when I have Bare Minerals on my face. It makes me look much younger than my real age. I gives me a smooth , polished look with a few swirls of the brush.

I've been using this foundation religiously for over 4 years and its kept my skin blemish free and radiant. I'll never go back to any other liquid or powder foundation!!! Absolutely recommend to everyone!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fallen in love with this product. I have tried many other foundations and this does it for me. It evens out my skin tone and covers any blemishes. I live in a warmer climate with lots of humidity so this helps with shiny complexions.

I would recommend this to anyone no matter the skin color or type. I have been using this foundation for about 5 months and it leaves my skin feeling and looking smooth, natural and flawless! Except for a matching issue the 1st go around, I will never ever use anything else again. M face doesn't feel heavily made up and it looks natural......

I get full coverage without looking made-up. It covers up my bags, scars, and helps to heal any acne. I LOVE that it matches perfectly with my skin tone (I had issue with this with other brands). I probably won't use anything else ever...
I have used this product for quite some time and I love it!!!! It goes on so evenly and smoothly and stays on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I was in college, I noticed my roommate had amazing glowing skin. She told me she used this product so I bought a beginner kit. I've never gone back. Even when I'm on a tight budget I always put this on my MUST BUY list. I can use drugstore eyeshadow, eyeliner, blush, mascara, etc but I will not compromise when it comes to foundation/skin care. bareMinerals has come a long way since 8 years ago. They have so many new products and options but I just stick to the basics. It's all I've ever needed (I use a tinted moisturizer underneath). Buildable coverage, light, doesn't clog my pores, natural, and now the container has an option where you can close the holes! I'd recommend everyone giving this a shot. Plus the brushes they give are great quality. I've been using the same brushes from the kit I got 8 years ago and they've been holding up well. My foundation brush JUST now started shedding a little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this almost two years now and I LOVE it. It's perfect coverage and not too heavy. I use a black Sephora brush (the huge one) and it goes on perfectly. It lasts all day and never looks cakey. I am extremely picky about my makeup but I definitely recommend this! I am very pale but the fairly light is the perfect shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutly love this product because not only does it give me great coverage it helps my skin. I also love how it doesnt clog my pores as much and ever since i started using this makeup i havnt really been getting breakouts at all. I LOVE THIS MAKEUP!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 10 yrs of use and I can't get enough. I love feeling like I have no makeup on, yet still getting the coverage and even skin. I highly recommended it!
i have been using bare minerals for aslong as they have been around. I try to go to something else and always return to this. I love it
I love this powder foundation. One layer and you are all set on busy mornings. I like the SPF without the uncomfortable chemicals found in other foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive, acne prone skin. The foundation does not cause breakouts and makes the skin look flawless. When combined with the blemish coverage, it covers everything!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. The color, texture and the flawless look is amazing.
I use the powder when I need more coverage over my BB cream. It works. I look great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's such a great product to wear, and I wear it almost everyday! And, the best part is it doesn't cause you to break out, and it gives your skin such a radiant, natural glow! I'm constantly getting compliments about how clear and soft my face appears! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will never, ever go back to a liquid foundation after Bare Minerals. It is lightweight and flawless. I love their eye shadows as well.
I like the naturalness of this, but somehow I get shiny sooner than when I use a bb cream

I have used Bare Minerals for 10 years, and I have received compliment after compliment of how good my skin looks whenever I wear it. I've tried other foundations, and they make my skin break out or dry out or itch, but this one does none of that. This foundation is a miracle worker; it actually keeps my skin clear. It also gives my face a nice dewy finish with buildable coverage so that I can get as sheer or as full a finish as I want for the day. Give it a shot! It's a bit pricey, but the tub always lasts me at least 8 months to a year because you don't have to use much!
I have been wearing Bare Minerals for about 10 years and I absolutely love it and will not wear anything but.

reviews.review_title: Smooth even slim without the oily or cake-y look
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. Great alternative to liquid foundation, tinted moisturizers, and bb creams. Doesn't make skin look oily. Smooth. Locks into pores for smooth and natural finish without the 'cakey' look.
I haven't found a better foundation than Bare Minerals.. it looks so natural and doesn't even look like you have makeup on yet it conceals so perfectly. Highly recommended product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite powder foundation because it feels great on my skin and has SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately if you have sensitive skin this foundation is not an option as it contains sunscreen. I used it for a week and while it stayed on all day and had nice coverage i have had 2 weeks of trying to get my skin to calm down again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. Wonderful color matching and always looks very natural. I use a concealer brush to 'paint' problem spots like the redness around my nose and brush loosely around other areas. It creates a nice uniform look without being too matte or shiny.
amazing product, very lightweight feeling and natural! Just wish the container would open all the way so I can get more product at the end when the container is almost out.
Light, natural look. And I never break out on my face anymore.
I love this foundation after buying this I find myself reaching for this everytime I do my makeup!
I have been wear this for 3years can't live without it. The material is really light feels like nothing is on. Blends great last vey long. It truly is a must have product....

I have been using bareMinerals Foundation for several years. Have tried other products but always come back to this foundation and bareEssentual products. It leaves my skin soft and clear. Have had multiple compliments when using this product. Have even had a friend I had not seen in 10 years ask if I had cosmetic work done. It is easy to apply even though in the beginning it seems awkward. It has sunscreen to protect your skin from sun damage. This makeup is the best.
I use this every day, it evens out my skin tone. I like that it is not heavy and not lotion based.

I've been using Bare Minerals for years now. The coverage isn't perfect, but it's so much more lightweight that foundation. Great for daily wear. If I need more coverage I add a thin layer of foundation as a base.

This foundation is REALLY as good as all the advertisements claim, which is really a shocker in today's I'm-the-Best-so-gimme-all-your-lunch-money world. My own word of caution: this is really designed to look like your skin, so take extra care that you find the perfect match. I was given a match test a year ago by a fill-in at my JC Penney's Sephora. Let's just say she was really a fill-in. She had no idea what my tone was! She gave me Fairly Light, a golden-tone foundation... I'm cool-toned. So I lookd like a pumpkin for a long time. Now I have the right shad and LOVIN' IT!!!

I've been using Bare Minerals foundation, bisque and several other products. I've recommended the products to family and friends and all of them still use only Bare Minerals. So natural; no streaking or build up and never irritation. I'm 77 and the youngest family member using this product is (14). Others are in 40s, teens, 60s and 70s. It's wonderful for all ages. Once tried - one's hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My cheeks have a lot of acne blemishes. I use a little bit and buff it onto my skin gently and it evens out my complexion! Not fully - of course for the more obvious marks I still need a concealer. But the blemishes are a lot less obvious and the skin tone is even and it looks natural! Like I didn't use foundation at all.  The price is GREAT compared to many foundations at Sephora. And they have a wide range of color options which is a definite plus for non-caucasians like me.
I have been using this product for 3 years. I love the way it feels & goes on. I gives me a very natural, flawless complexion.
The true healthy foundation for all skin types

By the time you layer enough of this powder on your face, you won't be ble to smile or make an expression without the powder caking. I tried it with primer and a fix and it still made me look like a powdered doughnut.
I have been using Bare Escentuals for over 5 years now..I absolutely love it. And I refuse to ever go back to liquid makeup.

If you are thinking of trying bare minerals I say go for it! I love it, because it does not clog my pores. I have minimal acne problems after converting over. I also love the natural look you get from it if applied correctly. Every girl should try this stuff at least once before bashing it. It doesn't work for everyone, but my sensitive skin loves it. Just remember to clean your brushes often, because it will be cakey if you don't.
I have used bareMinerals for 5 years and like everything I have purchased. The foundation has good coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am allergic to EVERYTHING....especially makeup and sunscreen and I CAN wear bareMinerals with no problem. I thought I was never going to wear makeup again and then tried bareMinerals. This is the ONLY eye makeup I can use and the foundation has sunscreen, which is the only product with sunscreen I can use.
Lasts forever, used this for years and just had to replace it. Great product.... bareMinerals NEVER disappoints
Hides my imperfections and makes my skin feel young and radiant! I use this religiously, and after years of liquid foundation, I will never go back... Thank you bare minerals!!!

This foundation is a good foundation i think for someone who is looking for lighter coverage. I dont think it provided me with the same coverage as say a medium coverage liquid foundation would and for that reason i find myself barely using it. But i do think that for the days when i want just a little bit of coverage and just an even skin tone, this would be perfect. It feels really light on the skin as well. Only thing to keep in mind is that it is a light coverage therefore, if you pack alot of it on hoping that itll turn into a medium coverage, you're wrong. The powder just sits on the face. So, with that being said, i did like it, just for those lighter days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is on the dry side, but it does get blemishes with most foundations. I've slowly weaned myself off of wearing foundation all over my face. Now I use only this foundation (the shade Fair is great for my porcelain skin; the supposedly pink undertone is minimal, thankfully), generally with a concealer brush, and spot apply it where I think I need a bit of coverage.  My skin really has improved! I was using various high-end compacts and liquid foundations, and I didn't think they were making my skin any worse, but since quitting those and exclusively using this it has improved so much that they must have been irritating it without my even realizing it.  Seriously, my neighbors randomly complimented my perfect porcelain complexion -- and my first instinct was to tell them, Oh, no, it's makeup... before realizing I wasn't wearing much of it at all.  I will say that I apply it as needed with the brand's concealer brush, and only this brush gives me an appropriate amount of control and coverage.  I do dislike that it is extremely hard to get the last bit of product out of the container, and I feel the packaging itself is a bit misleading in terms of how much is in there.  But it's worth it, and I keep repurchasing, and my skin keeps improving, meaning I use less over time, and I can go longer without NEEDING to buy it... and so on.  * * As an aside, when I got cocky and decided to not wear ANY on my face, not even under my eyes, everybody at work asked if I was sick. So my judiciously applied dots of this DO still make a difference. :)
I've bought this foundation 3 times.. Im in love with it, light weight and so easy to put on and use in a hurry if I ever am.. I just cant say enough
This is a great foundation that has staying power. Covers up brown spots and facial flaws and lasts well into the night. I love this stuff!
doesn't irritate my skin or make me break out if I don't wash it off before bed.
I have been hooked on this since the first time I used it
This was a refill for me. It's the one product I always have in my makeup case. Great coverage without looking like I have makeup on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think it looks nice once it's applied, but sooner than later, it gets very oily and then the luminous finish makes it look even more oily. I think it looks good in pictures and within an hour of putting it on. Also, since it is a powder foundation, it LOOKS and FEELS like a powder foundation. Sits heavy on the skin, makes my face feel hot and kinda of dirty. I know it's supposed to be good for your skin, but I'd rather wear no foundation than this :(
I absolutely adore this foundation! Great coverage! Wide range of colors! Flawless finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first foundation I've used in years. I whole-heartily recommend it. I love the way it feels after it goes on.
Everyone is always so helpful when I enter the store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this foundation evens out my skin. I am also very active, and this foundation always holds up through sweaty workouts, it never runs! It's great for my normal to oily skin. Never clogs, and I'd never use anything else, ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. Better cover than some of the other mineral make up. Lasts for a long time too, a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Bareminerals Foundation for a few years now. I love the new packaging, it makes it a lot easier when traveling. I wear this foundation everyday! I don't have time in the mornings to be using liquid foundations and I don't like the feeling of it either. This is the perfect product if you want a natural look but still want an even skin tone. I can not say enough good things about this product. I also love the fact that it's natural without a ton of chemicals in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this product. My skin always looks natural and never cakey or powdery. My skin has a tendency to breakout, so I love that this foundation has great coverage without clogging my pores. I'm definitely a bareMinerals ORIGINAL Foundation kind of girl!

I have inconsistent problem skin and bare minerals is consistently my makeup of choice. it works around the clock. I won't use any other foundation. it's light and lasts all day. it also never looks caked on. I buy the original formula as I feel it looks most natural.

This stuff is simply incredible. I sampled this foundation in Fairly Light at a sephora, and the Sephora used Smashbox Camera Ready BB Cream SPF 35 in Fair as a base/primer. These two products had an amazing effect on my reddish/pink undertones that are usually so difficult to mask with makeup. I ended up first buying only the BB cream but it just did not have the same effect with other powder foundations. I finally got the bareminerals foundation and immediately remembered how incredible it was! It totally evens out all redness in my face and leaves me with an airbrushed, flawless finish! It is absolutely the best foundation I have ever used. Usually I am turned off my powder foundations but this one disappears once on my skin and you can't even tell it is a powder. As soon as I started using it, people immediately began to compliment me on my make up, even men, and bareMinerals is responsible! I still use this in combination with the smashbox BB cream and together they provide full great coverage. My skin gets more oily around my nose, chin, and forehead throughout the day, and even sweating all day long as a ballet dancer this foundation lasts! I would HIGHLY recommend this foundation however would suggest trying it out in store first to find your proper shade. No complaints.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING. Great coverage. Long lasting. Not thick/ cake- like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation in conjunction with the mineral veil for about six months... I will never go back to traditional cream foundation. This is light enough to feel like I'm not wearing anything at all, but provides as much coverage as I want to layer on with a seamless blendability. Highly recommend.

There's really nothing out there like it. It's so light while making your skin look flawless! I know it sounds too good to be true but it really helps keep your skin looking fresh even when it's not on...if you use it often it really helps keep your skin clean, clear and healthy. Get it!!

reviews.review_title: Good coverage but dried out my skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne-prone and combination skin type and have breakouts once in a while. I'm pretty satisfied with the coverage since I only have to cover up one or two hyper pigmentations on my face, but this foundation got my face so dry that it started peeling off after a couple days. I think it'll definitely be a good foundation in the summer time when my skin is more oily, but not so in the winter time.
Best Mineral make up ever, a good primer only makes it so much better.
I LOVE the coverage and natural look of the bareMinerals line. However, I do not like the new packaging. It is very difficult for me to open the first time because of the plastic plug thing.

reviews.review_title: I will not wear anything else!
reviews.review_text: I have been using bare minerals for years now. I used to break out often - after about a week using this product it stopped - and I love the light feel and flawless finish it gives my skin...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After a few minutes when it sets into your skin, it feels and looks like you're hardly wearing any make up, let alone foundation at all. I also love how there's a wide range of shades to choose from. Great price for a great product!

i like bare minerals and the idea of this product, but i've not had good luck with it. i've used both this one and the matte version. while this doesn't irritate my skin, i think i'm just too oily. it never looks like it settles in to my skin, my pores seem larger, and when i sweat it seems to float up off my face and looks goopy. had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I know using a mineral make up on dry skin might seem counter intuitive, but I have very dry skin and this is the only foundation I have found that is smooth and non-drying. It gives a nice sheer, matte finish. Always happy with this foundation.
would definitely recommend this to anyone and everyone!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't get what is so special about this product. I have REALLY oily skin and even the matte formula of this makeup made me twice as oily as usual. I have also been color matched about 3 times and have yet to find a color that matches my skin. The one this I do like however is how buildable this product is and though I don't like the foundation the bronzer and the mineral veil aren't too bad.
This is by far the bast foundation I have ever used. I love it and have been using it for over 3 years. I will never go back to any other foundations. You can't go wrong with this!

I will admit that I only tried BM because I was desperate to find a good foundation to cover my acne-prone combination skin. At first I thought it was way to expensive for what it was, especially just being a powder. After using it for almost two years now, I cringe at the thought of going back to any other kind of foundation! BM not only covers up any pimples, scars, or any uneven skin tone that I may have, but it is super lightweight and doesn't cause me to break out more, like most other makeup would. No makeup is actually good for your skin, but if there is one kind out there that is, I would say this would have to be it. If you apply too much, I can see how the primer, foundation, and then mineral veil might look cakey. The trick is to find a nice balance between it all and not put too much on. I always end up going through the meneral veil before using all of my foundation. And if I have a certain spot I'm trying to cover up, I use a small dab of concealer on it, and then I use my BM to lightly cover that. If you buy the right shade for your skin and apply it apprrppriately, this stuff will make you look flawless. :-)
Did not spread easily...led very cakey had to buff it out for 10 mins to get near desired effect..wont purchase again!

This is the only foundation I will ever use. Every morning I wake up with blotchy skin, and after applying this I miraculously look fresh faced and clear. It is light, clean, and easy to apply. I would not recommend sleeping overnight in it though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great powder foundation, I love the slight dewy finish it has. It has pretty decent coverage, covers redness on my nose well, but doesn't quite cover dark under-eye circles as much as I'd like. I sometimes dab my fingertip into the powder and dot it along under my eyes, but I find that when I try to blend it with my fingertip it gets shiny and almost grey colored. I think it looks best blended with a dense powder brush. What I love the most is that it doesn't transfer to clothing, it absolutely stays put. I can hug my boyfriend without worrying I'll leave makeup on his shirt. It feels weightless and comfortable like you aren't wearing anything. The cons: doesn't blend well with fingers, packaging can be messy if you're not careful not to spill, and it does look dry on wrinkled areas, such as tiny creases around the eye. Not perfect, but pretty darn close.

I have med-tan skin, & went through all the bronzing colors, then tried going lighter & finally landed here... after so many years I finally know what all the fuss is about ~ when you get the perfect foundation color, you really do look your absolute best & like you're not wearing makeup at all. Couldn't be happier with this makeup & I'll never go back to sticky liquid foundation again.

I've tried to compare this to LAURA MERCIER Mineral Powder SPF 15 and been reading reviews... BE has better coverage, therefore thicker. if you are looking for a lighter weigh mineral foundation, then LM might be your choice. I've been using BB cream for years but it doesn't have the same natural finish as BE which I love.
Wanted to try this foundation for some time. Coverage is great. Lasts all day. Very happy with this purchase .
This foundation is great!! I wear with concealer on some days, but other days I use just foundation and it covers my small blemishes very well!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation on the market by far. It's so nice that its dry powder instead of wet, cakey liquid. It's fantastic that it has SPF protection and it lasts all day long without feeling heavy or smeary. I don't have to ever worry about blemishes because they are easy hidden by the great coverage that bare minerals provides. I've used this product for seven years and wouldn't change it for the world. Worth every penny, every time.

I wanted to try bareMinerals because everyone seemed to love it. I have bought 2 original foundations and two of the matte foundations, finally I realized I just do not like it. This foundation is sparkly and just gets pushed into my pores making them stand out. It does not stay on all day (made my face look blochy) and it makes my face look super oily after an hour of wear... Even with makeup forevers microfinish over top. I would not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I maintain that this is a great foundation, despite my love of liquids. The main concern of a lot of reviews seems to be cakeiness, which is easily avoided by buffing A LOT. Like, more than seems necessary. Don't just sweep it across your face. Using a little at a time and building coverage also helps. All of that said, this foundation lasts all day, esp. if you blot to get rid of oil. I have sensitive skin and I never had an issue with it.

A friend gave me this in the shade Light and although it appears to match in tone, it's much too yellow. I tested a few of the surrounding colors to see if they worked for me but they were either too light, too dark or too pink. I tried wearing the Light it a few times anyway and I felt greasier than I do with liquid foundations or tinted moisturizers, and in those two days my forehead and chin seemed to get a lot more pimples. I can't say for sure it was this product, but this combined with the extra greasiness, hard to match color and messy powder, I knew it wasn't for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried every product under the sun for my oily skin. As a bartender I need a foundation that is light, has good coverage and lasts through 10-12 hours of hard work and sweat. I rarely have to touch up with bareMinerals which is fantastic considering there are times that I can go 8 hours or more without a chance to go to the ladies room and check my appearance. I am never worried about my face looking oily or cakey. It's my miracle product.
My all time favorite! Hides all discoloration && black spots! Feels super natural almost like your not using make up!! I love it!! ‚ù§

reviews.review_title: Good, not completely perfect, but good
reviews.review_text: foundation goes on great, not meant for full coverage. if you need serious cover up, use a liquid foundation or concealer first then dust with the bare minerals foundation. the bare minerals foundation does fade over the course of the day, you will need to reapply - also not the best at absorbing oil, you'll get shiny after a few hours. but it does have a bit of simmer in the foundation so i don't have to apply bronzer or highlighter.

reviews.review_title: I always go back to BareMinerals...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this foundation for about 5-7 yrs now. I've tried a least a half dozen other types of mineral foundations and I always come back to this one. My only problems with this foundation is the cost and a faint itchy feeling I get sometimes when I'm wearing it (its not all the time and its bearable). I have tried other mineral foundations do to the faint itchy feeling and they didn't last all day or they looked cakey. This foundation looks natural and lasts the bulk of the day.
I've used this make-up for years and love it. I can't imagine using liquid foundation ever again.

I don't ever want to use anything else. The coverage is great, which is nice when I'm having a breakout. I have very sensitive skin that is acne prone. This foundation does not make me break out at all. You don't need to put on allot to get great coverage. I have brown hair and green eyes and wear the fairly medium color which is a nice shade.
Favorite foundation. I love the coverage, even when I layer it, it never looks cakey...it evens out my skin tone and looks natural and lovely.
This foundation is great. For me, it's a little powdery looking, but natural coverage without all the extra junk. I like it a lot.
Love this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareMinerals for 2 years now and I love it. Its not cakey and wears fine in hot weather
Worn this foundation for 5 years. I've tried a million other foundations, and always come back to this one.

I have been using this foundation for years, and love it, but when I bought it at the Sephora store, I was so disappointed to see that it was open and used! Unfortunately, I did not have my receipt anymore and the store is not near my house. I didn't realize the purchase was on record, so I just threw it out and didn't bother to return it. Very disappointed!
Full coverage and it doesn't make my skin breakout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an exact match for my skin tone
I love this product....I get so many complements on my skin, when I'm wearing this!!!
I enjoy wearing BM Foundation. It helps my skin with an over all cover look of perfection and keeps my skin looking good healthy every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for 5 years and it has never failed me. I love how you can easily build the type of coverage you need--from light to medium to full coverage. It never feels like I'm wearing any foundation, keeps my sensitive skin clear of breakouts and eczema, and adds radiance to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing. I use the fair color. I break out every now and then, and bareMinerals is *amazing* when it comes to covering up any spots while still looking natural! I have recommended many others to use this product.

Randomly got a makeover when these guys used to have their own retail locations ‚Äì the difference was nothing short of life-altering. Complete coverage, while appearing to be totally translucent. Fixes everything: redness, uneven tone, bumps. Doesn't settle into lines, which for a powder is awesome. Spend the time to find your right shade, thought ‚Äì go a little off and the effect is lost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation since Senior year of High School (about 4 years ago now), and it is fantastic! I love that it is light, stays on all day with a primer, and makes your skin look flawless. I use a long side the 'warmth'. It doesn't make your face looking cakey or chalky or airbrushed (which I think looks strange). It does leave it looking like you have naturally smooth, clear skin, and eliminates any discrepancies in skin tone. Will probably keep buying for years to come.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably the best loose powder foundation I have purchased. It's not a lot of product for what you pay, but you honestly don't need much. My face looks natural; no cakey dry look. I purchased the shade 'Fairly light' and the color matches my skin tone 100%.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing this powder foundation consistently for nearly two years. It is a quality product that provides a good amount of coverage and lasts all day (more than 10 hours) without a primer. I wear this most days, and always wear it when I want to look my best. It makes my skin look flawless and smooth. I have a slight problem with redness; a mild case of rosacea, but this foundation covers it almost entirely and gives a look of perfection. This product has never caused my skin to break out and has never felt like it is clogging my pores. It does not look cakey either. Once it is applied I don‚Äôt really see or feel that it‚Äôs on; my skin just looks better. This foundation is easy to use and quick to apply. The one and only problem I have with it is that powder tends to fly everywhere during the application process; but it can be dusted off quickly and this is something minor that I am willing to overlook since this foundation works wonders for my skin. I have tried 3 other powder foundations and this is my favorite one that I have repurchased several times. I highly recommend it, my skin feels and looks good after using this product.

Best foundation ever! I don't like the feeling of make up but I need it to cover acne breakouts. This product works amazing. Great coverage without that heavy feeling. Will continue to use it and definitely recommend it to everyone.
Does a great job covering blemishes and mperfections without appearing heavy or dry.

I love this line of makeup...how it applies and the tone is perfect. I like that I don't feel caked up and it looks and feels so natural. I get a lot of compliments on how nice my skin looks. It is so easy to work with...for a day or evening look.
I don't use anything else anymore. Perfect coverage without looking cake-y. SPF in it too!
Always makes my skin look flawless. Absolutely love it. I only use bare minerals foundation and bronzer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With a little concealer and this my skin looks almost flawless! I dont have extreme acne but it does cover the acne i have fairly well. Compared to my fit me powder this is a heavier/more coverage. I will purchase again. It does tend to fade at the end of the day a primer might fix that!

My Sephora customer service agent made the perfect match & I now have all over coverage. I have slight acne so I have some dark spots from former spots & need a bit more coverage. bareMinerals does the trick. :) Just use the primer & the small coverage brush to fill in the red spots then use your large brush for all over & you're good to go. : )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea on my cheeks and nothing can cover it! When i tried this i was so surprised that right away it covered all my redness. It doesn't make me breakout and and gives such great coverage!

I just ordered another one of these, so I really like it. I have combination skin, and this covers my redness, my large pores, and my blackheads. This isn't oily or cakey and leaves a very light, long-lasting coverage all over my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely fair skin, usually called porcelain. But it has yellow undertones, my cheeks tend to be red, and I have acne scars. I really couldn't find a foundation out there that covered all that and matched my neck. Until this! I use Golden Fair and LOVE IT. It tends to wear off quickly, but I pair it with Urban Decay All Nighter and haven't had a problem. I tend to build it on as I go, and even use the concealer brush with this foundation for really hard to cover spots. I also notice less breakouts when I use this (I frequently forget to take my makeup off at night.) This is the first foundation I've repurchased in more than five years. LOVE.

I've been using this product for many years now - and can definitely say it's the best powder foundation I have tried (and I've tried several others that let me down). Very light...covers well...leaves my skin looking terrific. Lasts all day long.
I have oily to combination skin, this powder made me look extremely shiny, and made my dry patches stand out even more. Would not recommend this to anyone with oily skin.
I love this...all I can say is this is great coverage... natural look..I even fell asleep in this!...I will continue to buy this forever! Best makeup for an affordable price!!

I used this product when it arrived on the market teas ago. I loved it then. I was having issues with my skin and thought it was my makeup so I stopped using it. I started using a different mineral makeup that didn't give me the same look and it starred making me breakout. Decided to give BareMinerals another try and it's just as amazing as I remembered . I've been using for about a week and my skin has improved dramatically. So worth it and ill never stop using it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation that I have ever used that makes a tone that is light enough for y complexion. The coverage is excellent and I have no irritation, despite having sensitive skin. If I do not use a good enough moisturizer, it can become flakey fast. I began using the brightening primer instead of the original, and the problem seems to be resolved.
This is my go-to foundation. It is easy to apply and covers blemishes. I would recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. No allergy reaction. Best of all it feels and looks natural.
Have used this at least 5 years. Love the light feel and good, natural coverage whether I'm in humid or dry climate.

I only use bare Minerals and have been using since I was in High School. It is the only foundation that does not case me to break out. Its is very long lasting you can probably go to gym with this on and leave looking just as fabulous as when you arrived. It makes my pores look smaller. If you live in a cold or dry climate you NEED to moisturize before applying.
I have been using BM for 5 years now and would not were anything else. I also have very dry skin so I dampen my brush and mix with the make-up and it is awesome coverage for dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this stuff for about seven years. I love the way it makes my skin toned and even, and how I tend to get compliments on my complexion. Good stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using BE for nearly 10 years. I have strayed a few times, but have always come back. It is the only foundation I found that I did not need to change which formula I used when the seasons change. I am very faired skin with pink undertones. Most foundations are either to yellow or to pink. I'm tired of make-up artist telling me to buy a foundation that has yellow undertones to neutralize my undertones, because the yellow makes me look yellow. I use fairly light, which has neutral undertones and looks amazing on me. I receive several compliments on how nice and natural my skin looks. When I tell people I have BE on, they're always amazed.  If you're new to BE I recommend playing with the foundation before you put it on an run out the door. The foundation tends to go on with medium-heavy coverage. The foundation blends easily, but if you apply to much pressure with the brush you're going to get a huge concentration of powder in that spot.  As with all powder foundations, it can bring out your flaws. If my skin is dry (especially around my eyes) it seems to accent those areas. I use an exfoliating sponge on my face twice a week and remember that during certain times of the year I may need to change my moisturizer .

I love Bare Minerals (original, not matte) ! I've used it exclusively for years. It's the only foundation that doesn't irritate my skin or cause breakouts, plus the coverage is great and it stays put.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is really great. It goes on very light and smooth, and blends right into my skin. I find the coverage is rather light, but since I‚Äôm just looking to even out my skintone, rather than cover up a lot of stuff, that‚Äôs not an issue. That said, I find I can also dab a little extra on blemish or dark circle and it‚Äôll cover it up almost as well as concealer, so I imagine you could keep applying it for a heavier effect.  It also wears pretty well throughout the day. I work long hours, and bike-commute in a semi-tropical climate, and it still looks pretty good when I get home at the end of the day.  It seems to agree with my skin very well. When I was travelling over Christmas, I even left it on overnight a couple of times and never got a blemish or irritation (not that that's ever a good idea!) The only thing is, it will show up on any dry, flaky skin, so exfoliate and moisturize first if that's an issue for you.  I would recommend getting their special foundation brush, or something similar, to appy it with. I don't have one, and I've been alternating between a makeup sponge and my big powder brush, but I feel like both are using more product for less coverage than the correct brush would.  Overall, I can't imagine that I'll ever want to try another foundation again. This one is pretty much perfect.

I have been using it for what seems like twenty years, since it first came out. Nothing else compares. It covers all and yet so.natural feeling and looking. I always get compliments on my complexion, I wont leave the house without it. Its the best.

love this! surprisingly good coverage without feeling like you're wearing makeup at all. i didn't have the right color at first, but the one i have now is perfect for me - grateful for sephora samples and easy returns :)

I love the product because it gives a nice coverage, but looks natural. As much as I love the product, I find that removing the plastic tab on a new foundation, is incredibly difficult. That's probably the only downfall to this foundation :(

I really love this foundation. I stopped using it a while ago and went to liquid foundation. I recently switched back and fell back in love with it. I have acne, and this covers it well and it has never, ever broken me out. It looks more natural than any liquid foundation could, and it is my perfect shade. So far, I have only tried the original, but I think next time I will try the matte. I definitely recommend this foundation and all bare minerals products. It is worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This it my favorite foundation. I love that it feels light like you're not wearing anything. I have been to Clinique counters and other counters and they could not find a foundation that matched my skin tone. This foundation matches my skin perfectly and I have been using this foundation for about a year and a half now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i wish they made the pots the way they used to, the click and lock is useful but now that theyve sealed the bottom in hard plastic, rather than a plastic inner liner that can be popped out i feel like im not getting my moneys worth. this is the only product ive found though that can cover up the red in my face, and my face gets RED. if my face lightly grazes something or the temperature changes at all my face is instant red, and forget about it if im doing any kind of physical activity PURPLE after 10 mins on the treadmil, i dont know why, its always been like this, but i can feel confident wearing this, when i feel my face flushing i never worry that anyone else can see the rapid color change happening because this stuff is amazing, especially when used with the primer

This product is advertised as an all over foundation and concealer, which it works really well as. I have many acne scars that it doesn't quite coverup so I gave up on it as a foundation and started using it as an eye concealer. I use a color just a couple shades lighter than my skin tone, so it's exactly the right shade that I need to brighten up the eye area and give me a more awake and fresher look. Everyday I apply underneath my eyes into the v-area on my cheeks, it works wonders hiding under eye darkness. And on days where I wanna go natural I apply it on my lids to hide the darkness on those areas as well. Overall I recommend for covering up eye darkness and using as a highlighter for face contouring
Even in the winter when my skin gets really dry and I think I am going to have to switch to a liquid foundation, this bareMinerals still does a great job.

At one point when talking about makeup with coworkers, they thought I was crazy that I had to go to sephora to get this foundation but I love it. I tried others well known brand foundations but they didn't feel right and it seemed like they made my skin break out more than cover blemish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the flawless coverage of this product!

reviews.review_title: Match your color right and it's PERFECT!
reviews.review_text: My favorite thing about BM Original is that it truly gives a natural glow many other products claim to give. It has a lot of do with the mineral pigments. It doesn't cake on like traditional power, even when you need to load it on on days you feel like you need a little extra coverage. I've used this for years, and I've tried it all - liquids, BB creams, pressed powders, traditional foundations, etc. The key to really getting the most out of this is to make sure you're choosing the right shade. BM does a good job of giving you a wide range of shades to choose from - it's just a matter of getting it right. I have light, but not fair, skin - with neutral to pink undertones, and I was matched to Medium Beige. My friend is darker than me, but has very yellow undertones, and was matched to Light. It boggled our minds in the beginning, but after using seeing clearly how well it matched our natural skintones, we knew knowing our undertones had a lot to do with picking the right shade. The best thing to do is have someone (or 2) help you out in the store. Also, if you're trying to debate whether you should get matte or original, I tried matte out, and was willing to stick with it until it ran out - turns out, I returned to original. I have oily skin, but all the matte did was go on matte, but it didn't help reduce any oil. It kinda got rid of the glow BM is usually so well known for. On top of that, the colors are just SLIGHTLY different (BM claims this also), but not to a point where it's too noticeable. The original already did well not getting oily throughout the day, so it definitely was better than the matte in all aspects. Love this and can't switch to anything else!
Nice and light but great coverage.
The only make up I use year round. Easy to find here and in malls everywhere. Matte is best for oily skin! Let someone at a sephora pick your shade! Works well
bare minerals Original foundation is awesome for my skin. I love the coverage and the confidence I feel when using this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: excellent product. I've been using it for over 5 years. it does what it's suppose to...provide coverage without the heaviness of foundation. my skin looks great. highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm used to a bottle of foundation lasting three months. This was gone in threel weeks. Also, I had a hard time finding a color that matched my fairly light skin tone.
I am 32 and have tried tons of different foundations of different brands.. By far this is the best i have ever tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! I just purchased this two weeks ago and love the way it covers. You barely need any powder to get full coverage, and it stays on for a full day.
My daughter actually bought this and she really likes it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and this did not work well for me. I did like that I found a color that matched my skin very well. I will probably give this another try in the summer when I am not so dry.

Well I thought this would either end up cakey on my dryish skin or just not cover very well but I'm impressed. It does give full coverage and blends very nicely and easily. One must be careful about finding your perfect shade though, as an off-tone can create an odd hue. But I'm fair Irish with pink undertones and I believe It's the fairly light shade that works well for me. There is a shade for each skin tone and it's worth making sure you get the perfect one. I returned medium originally because it's too golden. The only drawback is that it's a messy affair using and storing this product but I just keep a paper towel under the pot while I'm using it and let it collect the dust and then throw it out when I'm done. You could also just wipe away the dust with a square of TP or whatever, but no matter how much you try to keep clean, there will be a bit of the powder strewn around. That's not from any bad design really, just the nature of the product. It doesn't dry out over the day and stays put pretty well. I love that I can brush it on easily all over my face or quickly on just areas I want which makes it easy and pleasant to use. No washing hands and blending perfectly with fingers or sponges. I love that. I've recommended to my mom who has a hard time finding the right foundation.

reviews.review_title: Not great coverage but lasts forever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If your looking for light coverage then this is definitely a great foundation. I buy about 2 containers each year since they last FOREVER! Very light weight and blends very nicely into skin, no cakey look at all. I however was looking for more coverage so have moved on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this off and on for 7 years. No matter what foundation i stray away too i always come back to this. I dont like my face matte, i like a luminous finish. I use a tinted moisturizer and sometimes i will buff this over..depending on the mood of my morning. so basically no matte what foundation comes and goes..i will always have this.
This is something i've always come back to... It's light and has great coverage for all year round. Love the bareMinerals foundation.!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it completely covers any imperfections. I like how its not too heavy and it leaves you with a flawless and natural glow that lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using bareMinerals for the past three years and I absolutely love it. It's incredibly light weight, so it feels like you are not even wearing make up. There's a reason I keep coming back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 22, and I've never worn any other foundation other than this one. I have extremely sensitive skin, oily, combination, and acne prone due to my sensitivity because I also have Urticaria but I have been using this product since I was 17. Just makes everything even and smooth, yet natural. You don't need much and a pot will last you 6 months or more. I never develop hives, or acne because of this product, nor does it add to my oily skin. It does nothing for my dry skin when I do have dry skin, but you cannot pick and choose your battles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this foundation for upwards of five years. I won't lie, it IS very good stuff- if your skin type is just right. And by right I mean normal skin that isn't overly dry or oily.  Pros: -Lightweight -Feels like you're wearing nothing -Healthy ingredients -Lasts forever so you don't have to keep throwing it out after 3+ months  Cons: -horrible for dry skin. it emphasizes every bit of flakiness and doesn't blend well over dry skin. -horrible for oily skin. does nothing for shine and you CANNOT touch your face because it WILL rub off on your hands. it's ridiculous. Same with itching. If you itch your face, the foundation comes off under your fingernails and it's gross. -the coverage could be better. i'd say it's about a light-medium coverage. I have dark acne marks and it's doesn't cover them up very well. the same with redness.  My final take: I only recommend this is you have normal skin with no major oily/dryness and need something with lighter coverage. (honestly if that's the case, you'd probably just be better off with a tinted moisturizer.) It's not necessarily a BAD foundation, it just isn't versatile. After I started acne medication, my skin has been really out of whack and unfortunately, it isn't compatible with this foundation anymore. Now I have to find a new Holy Grail foundation :'( Blehh.

I have very, very sensitive skin: If I put something on my face and my skin doesn't like it, my face turns red, burns, and the skin peels. It's also very prone to acne. I bought this because I had heard all of the great reviews for it, and it sounded like it would be perfectly suited for my skin. I have no idea what went wrong, but after using it, I developed some of the worst acne I have EVER had on the sides of my face and on my forehead. Aside from that, I do have to give it some credit where it's due. I managed to cover up a lot of my acne scars and acne (even that which it had created), and also covered dark circles well.
