The only issue I did notice was that it did start to oxidize a little bit, but I think that might have had something to do with the brush I was using at the time as well. But overall, if you have sensitive skin, be cautious!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Heavy makeup would make me look older and, at 63, I definitely don't want that. This makeup looks light and natural but it covers and evens out my complexion nicely.

I am a big believer in the bareMinerals foundation because the coverage is perfect without being too heavy. I'm 26 and occasionally get adult acne, but this is still able to cover it pretty well (you MUST use the concealer brush to get the needed concentration). I have both the original and matte foundation, but I haven't noticed that big of a difference between the two except you get less product in the matte jar for the same price so I'll stick with this one! The Fairly Light shade is perfect for me - I'm pale with pink undertones and this doesn't wash me out. Overall, I love this foundation and I can't imagine using something else on a daily basis!
This is the best foundation . I've tried using different ones and I always come back to Bare Minerals. Looks great , super easy to use and lots of colors.

I've been a makeup artist for going on 13 yrs & B.E.'s cult like following always turned me off, even when I worked in a store that sold it. FINALLY, I figured I had to be fair & tried it.  At the 1st application I was IN LOVE. I have worn/tested 100's of foundations, powders/creams/liquids & this 1 is the best. BELIEVE THE HYPE! Beautiful finish & coverage, it looks just like your own skin but better. I've kicked myself for not giving in sooner. I don't use mineral veil or the B.E. brushes, I provide my own brushes & feel the M.V. is an unneeded step.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't use this as foundation alone -- I wear it over Clinique Perfectly Real Make up. I like that it provide a nice natural looking finish. I use to specifically under my eyes to add a little extra coverage to dark circle and I also use it if I have a blemish I need a little extra coverage for. In the summer, I do use this alone and think it provides just the right amount of coverage but I don't think it lasts all day...i find myself needing to reapply.

I don't have dry skin, but this made it feel dry. I don't have lines or wrinkles, yet it somehow found some to settle in and make me look 10 years older. Plus, after wearing it like 3 days, I broke out and looked like I had leprosy. Back it went!
Love it. The best foundation. Keeps your skin soft, goes on smoothly, and feels like nothing is on your face. Works best with Prime Time and Mineral Veil

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ahhh-MAZING!! I absolutely love this foundation. I had trouble looking for something that had enough coverage, wouldn't make me break out, and looked natural... until I tried this beauty! More than I generally spend, but worth every penny AND IT LASTS WAY LONGER THAN I THOUGHT IT WOULD!! You will surely love it!

I have been using this product on and off for 6+ years, I always end up balking at the price and thinking that a dupe will work just fine but I can't kid myself anymore. This is THE mineral foundation of all mineral foundations. No dry skin, stays put ALL day, never have a makeup line and a little really does go a long way.

To be honest, I was a bit disappointed in this product. Not that I wouldn't recommend it. I have a medium neutral skin tone and found it difficult to match. There aren't a lot of colour options. I also found that it clings to flaky skin and is very messy (messy to apply and it transfers). However, I have very sensitive skin and it did not irritate me or break me out, I can't feel it on my face and I dig the buildable coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation goes on well lasts all day long. Best mineral foundation I've found yet.

Seriously - who can live without it nice they've tried it! The brushes need to be replaced before the mineral powder does. Sometimes I use a very, very thin foundation, like Dr. Jart very sparingly underneath for some extra staying power, but nothing beats this stuff to hide imperfections and red skin. Even if I'm going without makeup - I never skip it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using BareMinerals for about two years now, ever since my dermatologist reccomended it. It goes on smooth, and there's barely any blending involved (a huge plus for me!). It lasts all day, through my classes, work, and night too, also a huge plus. It is a little hard to match perfectly with a skin tone, but I've found combining a little bronzer makes it a perfect color for any tone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea and when I started using this product in 2005, it was gone. I am 50 years old and after tying this product, I was hooked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have rosacea and bare minerals covers the redness and stays put. I re-touch my trouble spots for night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In college I was a BE fanatic. All of my make up from primer to foundation to blush to eyeshadow to mascara was BE. I LOVED the way it made my skin look. Aside from it rubbing off on EVERYTHING, my skin looked natural and glowing like it did in high school when I didn't need make-up. Unfortunately, I couldn't tolerate the itching. As I read more about Bismuth Oxychloride, I decided the look wasn't worth the allergy and abrasiveness on my skin. I switched to Merle Norman's mineral make-up that lacked the Bis.Ox. ingredient. It looked beautiful, but never as natural as BE.  In any case, I am stoked they came out with their Matte Foundation that lacks the Bis.Ox. My skin is very different from college, I am a bit oilier with mild acne since going off birth control, however, BE Matte has given me the most natural finish without the irritation. MUFU has an incredible liquid foundation, but there is something so natural about BE minerals. I recommend the Matte as opposed to the original based on my experiences, thus the two star rating.

I've been using Bare Minerals for a few years now. I truly enjoy the results and how luminous, fresh and glowing my skin looks. I feel good about this product. I will continue to use it for many years to come.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this in the past but have gotten older and decided to give it another shot. After wearing the makeup for a few hours it became cakey and my face looked like a mess. When I returned it to the store the lady who helped me said I was way to young to wear this type of makeup, not so sure about that.
Truly the best of everything. Covers evenly, impossible to mess up aplication, stays all day, looks natural and fresh. I recommend to all my friends.

reviews.review_title: The perfect little something that is just enough!
reviews.review_text: I have never been a big foundation user and can't stand lots of fuss over make-up on a daily basis, but after hitting my 30s, I also couldn't get by on mascara and lip gloss alone, either! This is perfect as it is fast, non-fuss and even has some SPF protection! Highly recommend and have become a regular user.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this foundation for the longest, but I never got to vent! I'm African-American, so my skin is very yellow based. Medium Dark was the only shade that even remotely matched. When i applied it it was entirely too orange. -__- Now I only mix it with my too light E.L.F. tinted moisturizer or use it as a concealer under my lip. :/

I love this product, it sits nicely on the skin and over the day gets better instead of rubbing away. The lightness of this product makes it easy to wear everyday! I never breakout because of this product and would recommend to anyone with sensitive skin

I LOVE this foundation. I have tried so many others, and I always end up coming back to this. The only thing I'd recommend is that you make sure to moisturize well. As with any powder foundation, it can look dry if your skin is not well moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only foundation that is comfortable, covers amazingly, never creases, and lasts all day. So props to whoever designed this thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Having horrible skin all my life I have tried many different kinds of foundation, but bareMinerals foundation is the BEST! I finally found a foundation that covers my acne/scars that is light and does not leave lines.
love this foundation. Its a little expensive but i wil continue to use it
This is a great match to my skin and makes my face look flawless. It does dry my skin out, though, so I will try the hydrating formula next time in the same color. So glad I decided to try this.
I love this make up! I buy everything they make! I have lots of freckles, and it covers them up...without having to use foundation, which I particularly hate.
excellent makeup !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I have used BM foundation for years & will never go back to the creams or liquid types again. Great coverage. I never even feel it on my face. I just can't say enough about this makeup.
I have been using BareMinerials for years. will not use anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this at first. I have combination skin that is very sensitive and prone to breakouts and this was perfect...or so i thought. It was good over a bb cream and gives good coverage but it started to become noticeable on my face. Maybe it was because of the cold weather or maybe its just my skin but it started to not look so good. It also transferred very easily onto clothes and didn't last very long on my skin. I might come back to it in the summer but for now it just does not work on my skin.

I absolutely love this product. It gives you awesome coverage and a glow to the skin. I don't find that this product is drying and just makes the skin appear balanced. Defiantly recommend this, especially for teenagers.

I have used this product for almost ten years, I absolutely love it and recommend it to every female I know. However I hate the new packaging, you are left with so much wasted product that you can't use. I wish they would change back or come up with a new idea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been toying with the idea of trying bareMinerals foundation for a few years and finally decided to give it a try. I wish I had tried it years ago--love it! I have aging skin (age 51) and most liquid or cream foundations no longer work for me, either looking mask-like or feeling heavy on my skin, settling into those fine lines, etc. BareMinerals gives me excellent coverage and even luminosity, without feeling heavy on my face. At first I was a little nervous about the application method (swirl brush in product, tap off excess, then apply in circular motion to skin) and thought it would take me longer to apply than traditional foundation. Instead I discovered that with just a little practice, it actually goes more quickly because the coverage is great--no need to keep applying like I used to with liquid foundation---one pass with bareMinerals is all it takes for great coverage for me, but you can build coverage if you need to. Also, no worries about later finding an unblended bit of foundation on my jawline or wherever, which I sometimes encountered with liquid and cream foundations. The only thing I don't like is that after a few hours of wear, it can start to look a bit shiny on the more oily spots of my combination skin--maybe I will try the matte formula next time. Just the same, I am a convert and will be trying the mineral veil next.

This powder is a must have. I don't go a day without it! Cuts shine, keeps breakouts at bay, and covers so well. I have tried lots of drugstore and department store brands and I will never use another powder again!!
I have been using this product since 2004. Love it. Their shades matches my complexion very well. I am from India so finding right shade is difficult. It blends in well.
coverage and color match.

It is very true what they say about this foundation, once you try it you don't want to use anything else. I have been wearing bare minerals foundation for a few years now and it is the best. It makes my skin look healthy and alive and brings out the natural beauty of my skin. It provides the perfect amount of coverage and is build-able for any problem areas. I sometimes use my liquid foundation when I run out of this and that just reminds me of how much I love this light weight foundation and run out to the store to get more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a few drugstore foundations, but this one is definitely the best. It's super lightweight and natural looking and it's the foundation I reccomend to all my friends. It does start looking a little oily after about eight hours or so, and can slide a little if you're not wearing primer, but other than that, it's pretty great :) I love that it looks like I'm not wearing foundation.

reviews.review_title: Love it, and will continue to buy it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just as it says, this product evens out your skin immediately, giving you a clean, flawless look. Pair it with mineral veil and it's pure perfection. A good brush will make all the difference in the world too, so make sure you're using the correct type...kabuki works well. Great, even finish.

Typically powders provide little coverage. But working with bareMinerals, this product evens out the skin and provides great coverage!! Now that it comes in three different formulas is even better I am very impressed with this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this powder. I hadn't purchased it in a while and was pleased to see that lock and turn feature in the container. I had a lot of issues with spillage before so this was great. I wish it provided more full coverage but it works for an everyday look.

This is so much better than the ready to go foundation. Together with the primer it works great, spreads on evenly, don't have to use much at all. I have always used a cream foundation and this is a nice chance of pace for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this, it stays on pretty much all day and it looks flawless. Only problem is I either get a shade too dark, or a shade too pale. I can't seem to find the right shade for me. So I have to buy a meduim and a medium beige and then mix them together. It works, but I really wish there was a shade in between those two.

Best makeup EVER! I have used several different foundations in the past, but this is by FAR the best. Lightweight and seems to be a lot easier on my skin than others I have tried. It is way more natural looking and gives a nice healthy looking glow to your skin!
Love this foundation. Strong enough to cover my Roseacia but so lightweight!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail of foundation cant live without it!!

I have had this foundation for over a year and use it basically everyday. With prime time, it stays all through school! It doesn't look cake-y or over done at all. It leaves a nice glow-y finish. You can't beat it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for just over a year now! I am an air hostess so my makeup is on over night and for 24 hours so I need something that won't clog but will stay put!, I also suffer from eczema on my face and as this is natural it is really great! I would recommend this to anybody! I am not a foundation wearer orally I use this more just for abut of colour, shine and to raven out my skin. This is great admit doesn't feel like your wearing anything! X

I've been using Bare Minerals for over 5 years now and i absolutely love this product! It feels light on your skin, blends right in with your skin tone and most importantly doesnt create messy lines on your face even after hours. I love this product!
The only powder I use. I always get compliments. They improved the container. Not as messy as before.

I use my Bare Minerals every day. My face wouldn't be complete without it! I have been using it since I first tried it five years ago and it is hands down the BEST foundation I've ever tried. Flawless :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE the bareMinerals powder foundation. It is so light and provides great coverage. I have oily skin, and unlike many other liquid and pressed powder foundations, this one does not clog my pores or look caked on! I definitely will be buying this from here on out. $27 well worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a Bare Minerals user for years. I strayed away for a short while and finally started using it again. It is just as good as I remember and doesn't FEEL like you're wearing makeup. I hate that caked up look some foundations and powders give... I found my perfect shade in medium beige, but I would really recommend getting color matched in a store to find your perfect fit.  PS: This stuff just keeps getting more and more expensive! When it first came out a few years ago it was only around $22... >__<

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using BareMinerals for over 5 years and I still love it like the first time! :) I remember they had 3 or 4 shades to choose from and now they have such a wide range of shades it's unbelievable. I've been using the same Medium and Medium Tan shades since the beginning. Use the Medium in the winter and Medium Tan when am tan in the summer. I would recommend this to anyone because it looks natural and the best part is that it doesn't irritate the skin. Don't be afraid to go to a Sephora and try different shades and see which you like best. I'd suggest setting the makeup using a water spray like Evian as I find that a few minutes after the application the color looks even better. That's because the natural oils in your skin will give you such a lovely glow which would be mimicked by the water spray when trying to choose one.

reviews.review_title: Golden Medium, Medium Tan, and Medium Beige
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased 3 shades. All three are lovely -- a little drying at first for my skin, but it ended up making my skin a lot healthier, so it's worth the initial tiny itchiness the first few days of application. I've tried various shades, and I'm constantly amazed how even the ones that are wrong for my skin color still make my skin look great. Something about the powders instantly warms and shapes your face.  Medium tan was the perfect match for my skin, so I use that as an all over foundation. Golden Medium was a little too bright for all over use, so I use it to highlight my cheek and brow bones. Medium Beige always seemed too ruddy for my skin, but after a lot of experimentation, I now mix it with my Hard Candy bronzer for the perfect shade to define my cheeks, jawline, and forehead.
Bareminerals is great, this lasts me months, because bareminerals is powder it is tapped to save from putting too much make up on. I use two different shades one for summer and one for winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bare Minerals is a great product. It covers great and looks and feels natural.
I've been using this foundation on and off for five to ten years and I love it. No matter how many times I switch I always end up going back to this because it covers my blemishes and scars so well!!

I live in an extremely humid climate. In the summer, this is my go-to option. When I sweat, it doesn't bead up like other expensive liquid foundations do. It can be cakey and a little drying in cold or dry climates, but it's a lifesaver, even as a quick touch-up remedy. In the winter I use this as a concealer and use a high-end liquid foundation as my main foundation. I never stop using bareMinerals, I just change the primary base depending on the air. Overall, my skin always looks luminous, flawless, and my skin condition does improve after repeated use of this product. I highly recommend!
this is the only foundation that wont clog my pores and wont dry my skin either. It looks flawless without the pasty look of liquid foundation.

I tried BareMinerals a long time ago, and I wasn't a big fan of it. I didn't like how it looked on my skin, and I thought it was way too messy. I decided to give it another chance after I was slighty disappointed with the Ready Foundation, and they changed the packaging to make it less messy. I am very glad I decided to try it again. It is one of my favorite foundations. It makes me skins look flawless and glowy. I use it with the Sephora Mineral Powder Brush, which I absolutely love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am very pleased with my new Bare Minerals makeup.

reviews.review_title: Love how easy it is to use bareMinerals!
reviews.review_text: It is easy to apply in summer and winter! I work outside and I like the fact it has SPF15. It looks so natural!

I have had numerous compliments about how well my foundation looks. I feel like it blends well with my complexion; I am of an American of African descent. I would recommend that you go into a store and let them find your shade and then buy your products from sephora.com. You get better samples that way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using it for years - it does wonders to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this foundation for years and I refuse to use any another brand. The powder goes on easily, blends beautifully with my skin, makes my skin look luminous, hides any redness, and covers most imperfections. The best part? If I need more coverage for any imperfection, all I have to do is grab a concealer brush and dab some on and they vanish. I have some acne scarring on my jaw line, but with the concealer brush trick you can hardly see them. I also have very fair skin that bets burned easily, so I'm thankful this has SPF in it too.
I love bareMinerals powder foundation. It looks great after I apply my concealer on. It doesn't flake off and it holds my make up on all day. Great stuff.

reviews.review_title: The Best I've found in 57 years!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I get constant compliments on what great skin I have at 57. I don't feel like I am wearing anything on my face and I look better than I did 10 years ago. The coverage is perfect and it goes on in seconds. I couldn't be happier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have to say that I didn't use this as a foundation. I used it after my foundation to get a matte finish. My skin is quite damaged (acne, scars..), so I don't feel confident using only powders on my skin, but I don't feel confident too using only a liquid foundation, so I kind of mix them to get the finish I want to. I was really in love with it, because I'm fair-skinned, and it's hard to find a good match for my skin here in Spain. But after two times buying this, I found that my colour (Fair) had been discontinued here, so I'm very disaponted ): Please, please, Sephora, bring back Fair colour to my country!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing. I have had bad acne for years and now I have barely any and it covers what little I do get so well, without clogging my pores. The fairly light shade is perfect for my skin tone, but for some reason I bought the same shade in matte and it was too orange... I bought the original again and I'm staying with it. I get so many compliments and it blends perfectly with my skin. It lasts all day, just gets a bit oily so I touch it up a bit half way through the day and use a bit of mineral veil and im good to go! It covers my redness, I only wish it wasnt so expensive, and that I didn't have to use so much. I love this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For years I wore a cream to powder foundation. I was looking for a new liquid foundation to try BUT then I saw the reviews on this product and wanted to try it out right away! And am I ever happy that I did! This product is a great, lightweight, everyday, natural finish makeup! I finish this and the Light Stroke Concealer with the Mineral Veil powder. When the foundation is first applied, I find it really light but by the time I finish the rest of my makeup and am out the door - it settles into my skin to look like I have flawless skin! I have dry skin especially in the winter months, this product DOES NOT emphasize dry skin and DOES NOT look cakey. The SA in fact told me that this product is great for dry skin and will help it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is great! Is covers well if you want, but feels like nothing on your skin...oh, and your skin will look great too!

This is the best foundation I have ever tried. I like really full coverage so it's perfect for me but it also gives you the option of light coverage depending on what brush you use. It makes your skin look airbrushed and beautiful and never breaks me out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to replace a cheaper powder foundation that I had been using. I love this foundation. The powder is so finely milled and blends seamlessly into the skin right away. Another bonus is that you don't need a lot of product, so I see this lasting a long time. This foundation did a good job of keeping shininess to a minimum (I have oily combination skin). It's also nice that the packaging allows you to cover the shaker so that product doesn't spill out onto the cap (and everything else) when not in use. I am so glad I tried this brand - this will defintely be my go to brand for foundation going forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to be a liquid foundation girl (mostly because thats what my mom used to buy me). But, after I inherited an unused gift sample of bareMinerals...I haven't used anything else! My skin actually got better after I started using power instead of liquid. It has this amazing natural looking glowing finish- even without the mineral veil. Its perfect of combination skin like mine and it blends so perfectly with all skin colors! I would challenge you to find a powder makeup that is better than bareMinerals.
I have used this product for years and it never let's me down. Great coverage and light feel. My skin rarely breaks out using this particular foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great natural foundation. It's amazing how just a tiny little bit of product can give me a complete natural finish. I am currently between NC 20-30 and found the perfect shade in Fairly Light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've gone through 3 of these... It's amazing!! Makes my skin how and there are so many shades to choose from. I absolutely hate foundation because it never looks natural on me but I found my soulmate foundation!!
This foundation does it all-conceals, combats oilness, and covers as much or as little as you need, all without causing breakouts. It is the ONLY foundation I use on my skin.

I'm Asian with a medium skintone and light yellow undertone and the Golden Medium is perfect. It actually makes my skin look brighter but not artificial. I like the fact that it's a clean powder that can be gradually built up--I prefer the light coverage as its effective. I tested that you can do a heavy build up, but that is the point where it starts feeling kind of itchy on my face.
Just discovered and tried the fairly medium shade and love it! I had been mixing 2 shades-fair & medium before, now it comes already mixed for me. Thanks!

I've used bareMinerals before, I bought the starter kit back in 07.. It lasted me a while, up until 2010 (I use to wear makeup everyday.) I stopped wearing make up for the past 3 years and just wanted something for events. It's nice for a non oily, clean and light foundation.

I've become such a bareMinerals fan & why not buy it from Sephora? I love the coverage & the pure ingredients. It doesn't feel caked on. I feel natural! This is the 1st time I'm ordering on-line from Sephora & it's definitely a great experience! I get to see a sneak peek of other products, I get Beauty Insider Points & great free samples! I'm going to be ordering again for sure! Happy Holidays!
I bought two other foundations for around $60 that were suppose to be marvelous. I went back to this. So much better. Glowing coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using bare minerals for years now and will never try another foundation...light and just perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is kind of tricky. It emphasized dry patches of my skin, so I only use it during the summer. Also, it is pretty easy to apply too much. I sometimes just use a light layer of it to set my liquid foundation or BB cream.

reviews.review_title: bad news for wrinkles and pours
reviews.review_text: bare minerals is not great when it comes to coverage nor is it helpful in making my skin look like I have no makeup on (as the commercial states). in fact it will accentuate any wrinkles, fine lines and pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this, but it isn't anything special. Unless you already have nice skin, this won't really do anything for you. I don't even have bad scars on my face but the dark spots from acne that i do have show up clearly no matter how many layers i apply. Even if i put on a layer of good-coverage liquid foundation before applying bareminerals, i still see some of my dark spots. It does make your skin glowy but i don't really have a need for glowy acne scars so i won't buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: if you are looking for a foundation that you can wear everyday without having to reapply though out the day and that blends in with your skin tone without leaving a makeup line then this product is for you. I will never use anything else. it's soft and smooth and easy to apply so say goodbye to the liquid forever this is a must have for a flawless finish!!! you will never use any other cover up after trying this just once. I dont wear anything else. I love Bare Minerals!!! it is definitely a 5 star product!!!

I swear by BareMinerals....I use the Foundation and Finishing Matte. Blends in great and doesn't feel heavy like liquids. The Bronzers are great too they give me that fresh natural look. I have been using them for years!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used bareMinerals for several years and wouldn't go back to liquid foundation. It has full coverage and cover blemishes. It is very light and smooth. I would highly recommend it.
I love BareMinerals. I try new things and always end up back with this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. Great coverage. I would always sway away from this product but after using so many other powders and loose mineral powders I always find myself back to this one. I always get compliments on how radiant and nice my skin looks.
Fantastic product with great coverage!
Perfect coverage, could not ask for a better foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareMinerals for about 15 years on and off and always come back to it. I'm sticking with it now. The coverage looks natural and it's so easy to apply. A little dab with a brush is all you need to cover trouble spots. You don't look like you are wearing makeup. I am not happy that they have changed the packaging however. It is very difficult to pull the little tab on the inside of the container to get to the makeup and you cannot remove the inside plastic piece to get the last of the makeup. Please go back to the old style!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Having moderate acne I am always struggling with finding the perfect foundation. Most of the time, the foundations i purchase make me break out even more or they leave me cakey, or don't cover my redness enough! I turned to bare minerals as a last resort because I was looking for a product that would better my skin. I didn't really have high expectations for this foundation because i do have problem skin, but i was pleasantly surprised with this product! Almost all of my imperfections were covered in just one coat, with a second coat my redness was gone and my skin looked NATURALLY flawless! After using it i noticed that my breakouts had calmed down as well! I would recommend this to anyone and everyone ! It has a natural finish and It is good for your skin too which is a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is the only face makeup I will ever use. period. It makes my skin flawless. I cannot praise it enough!

reviews.review_title: Once You Know How To Use It, You Will Love It!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a foundation junkie. You name it, I have used it. From drugstore to high end, including mineral makeup. This by far is one of the best products that I have ever used. I am extremely oily and I use a primer to keep this mu intact. It would not come off until I wash it off. I use a soft mineral mu brush and I blend and blend. The shade selection is just perfect and the best that I have seen in the market. The texture keeps my skin healthy even when I wash off my mu, I can see the great effect of this mu. Last but not least, this mu looks great in photos. For records, I am between NC30 and 35 but I am not as yellow. I use Medium Beige. I do not care about the matte or compact formula but this is miracle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love bareminerals original foundation! i've been using it for 5+ years now and i'd never use anything else. it gives me natural coverage and people always compliement me on how great my skin is (which isn't always true... but no one else has to know! ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I have ever used and I have tried ALL kinds!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love bare minerals powder - it gives me the coverage I need and doesn't feel heavy at all.

I have been using Bare Minerals foundation on an off for the past 8 years and I love it! I keep coming to it! The original formula matches well my combination skin, especially when I take great care of it! Lately I've been using it on top of less than a pea size Makeup FOrever for better pore coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using bareMinerals for about 4 years. Love, love, love the coverage, the light-weight, and the natural effect. I will probably never use anything else again in my life. It holds up well over the day, and doesn't make me break out.
My sister and I have been using your product for 5 yrs. and its wonderful. We would not change for anything. I also have eyeshadows and mascara, there the best.

Great foundation! It goes on smooth and covers so well with such a small amount. Nothing else has covered dry patches and red spots on my skin like this does without looking caked on or emphasizing the dry patches. I also like the way the original formula gives that glow without shine.
I have been using this foundation for years and it is amazing. I never use anything else, I love it!!
Nice coverage and doesn't clog my pores. Love this make-up.
I have bee using bare essential foundation for several years and now would never go back to anything else...I love the feel, the coverage, the simplicity of it. It's absolutely wonderful!!
This is by far my favorite foundation, covers my redness, and still leaves a natural look! I love that it doesn't feel heavy. I have dry still and even though it is a powder, it doesnt make me flaky!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this foundation and it looks just like skin. It is very sheer but can be builded up to medium coverage. Perfect for the summer time.

I was very skeptical given my combination skin but I am a convert! This glides on for full coverage and doesn't feel greasy or sticky the way some liquid foundations do. It has a slight sheen, which leaves your skin looking dewy. I use this with the mineral veil. I love the packaging also. It is so easy to get just the right amount of product out without contaminating the whole jar.+
I started using this foundation about a year ago and I will never use anything else. I'm pretty happy with all the compliments I've bee getting about how smooth my skin looks, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: an excellent product especially for the oily skin or combination skin

I bought the new compact foundation because I thought it would be better for travel...not as messy. Much heavier coverage and still messy. Returned it and have gone back to the original foundation. I still wish it wasn't so messy for travel!
I've been using BareMinerals for 7+ years and it makes my skin look flawless! Light weight but total natural looking coverage. LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
Even though I have dry skin, this glides on sheer and smooth with just a light hint of color. Prefer it way better than liquid foundation.
I've been using Bareminerals for almost 10 years and no other foundation compares. From the choices of colors to blending.
I love love love bareminerals. It hides just about anything.

reviews.review_title: Best Mineral Foundation I've Ever Used!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This bareMinerals foundation is the best I've ever used! It gives flawless coverage, does not look flaky or powdery on the face. I also love that it has SPF 15 in it. My makeup looks very fresh & natural. Also lasts all day!
Provides the most coverage of any foundation I've ever used, yet looks so natural. It never looks caked on or like too much makeup. I get compliments on my skin all the time.

Again & again I go by star rating & reviews of product use. I saw nothing on self or my 17 year old daughter that truly improved skin. It didn't give me that overall healthy glow that I expected seeing since that it was 1 of the highlights & I didn't see the cover-up.

reviews.review_title: THE ONLY FOUNDATION I WILL EVER USE!!
reviews.review_text: Bare Minerals is the best of the best. I have few blemishes but I bought it to cover my undereye circles without much hope. The first time I applied it, I couldn't believe how amazing my skin looked... and my undereye circles were gone! Plus if I sleep with it on, I don't wake up with breakouts or irritated skin like I would with liquid foundations. If you haven't tried this, you should. It's worth every penny, and one container lasts me at least a month, usually two.
I mix the Fairly Medium and the Medium foundation together to create the perfect tone for my skin. Absolutely love it and I get many, many compliments even at my age of 68.
Best foundation you'll ever own.
Good coverage and long lasting

I have less than perfect skin and I waited for the longest time to try this because I was afraid that it wouldn't cover everything I needed it to. I was wrong! After years of trying every imaginable liquid foundation, both high end and drugstore versions, I was so glad I found this. I've been using it for years now and I haven't been tempted to try anything else. This foundation looks incredibly natural and you can build your coverage to hide almost any imperfection. I only wish that bareMinerals would release more shade varieties because none of the shades are a perfect match, but the beauty of the loose foundation is that I am able to mix two colors to match my skin tone.
This is the only stuff that actually works. You don't need that much so you have it lasts for quite a while. I will continue to purchase this item for as long as it's available.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I much prefer the original to the matte foundation. I love that, with bareMinerals, I don't have to use that much for full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It doesn't look to heavy, like you're caked in make-up. It gives a natural, finished look--perfect for everyday. bareMinerals is the best in my opinion; the texture is so fine, it goes on really smooth.

I have very sensitive skin, so it was difficult for me to find a foundation that didn't irritate my skin. This product is so light, doesn't clog pores and makes your complexion look flawless. I would definitely recommend this to anyone!

reviews.review_title: what is all the hype about?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive heard a lot about this product so I decided to try it. It made my skin look horrible. Like worst than it did before I applied it! It highlighted my flaws and looks super cakey. Maybe this product works well for people with flawless skin, but for someone who has blemishes like myself and want some coverage....I wouldnt recommend trying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this in Fairly Light. It is a good shade for me, but I wish there was a shade in between Fair and Fairly Light, as it looks slightly orange throughout the day. The application is simple and easy, and quicker than when I apply liquid type foundations. I have combination skin; oily on T-zone and normal on the rest. I love the finished look of this - your skin glows and doesn't make you look powdery or matte which I hate when certain make-up's do. In Winter, when my skin tends to get dry, this doesn't accentuate the dry areas, thankfully. Just don't overdo it, it does cake up. Very, very little really works. Plus, this does not make me break-out! Now...the only flaw I found in this is that, indoors, your skin looks amazing. But outdoors...my skin looks a little less amazing. I don't know why. The coverage is about light to slightly medium. You'll need concealer to cover up imperfections, as this won't. I recommend this to people with good to average skin people, as I noticed when I have a break-out, this isn't my go-to foundation. Overall, I really like this foundation though.

reviews.review_title: Now I know why everyone's praising this product...
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin with oily forehead and nose & dry cheeks. I kept away from powder foundations because they cake on my oily skin & make my dry skin look drier. Bare Minerals is different. It stays on the skin like liquid foundation but is easier to handle. However, it accentuates my big pores (as compared to liquid foundation) and it does cake when I use too much.

I like my makeup to be minimalist and not at all obvious. This wasn't the one. I was hoping the powder would provide coverage and reduce shine. Instead, it looks cakey and no matter how much I put on, my face looks shiny. Not a natural look on me unfortunately.

I think this brand is nothing short of amazing. I have acne on my chin and can have very large raised zits and this foundation (when applied properly) gives me great coverage. I must use a primer for it to stay for a long period of time (8 plus hours).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had a roommate who used to be a bareMinerals makeup artist. She warned me that if I started using it, I'd love it so much I'd keep using it. While we lived in France she tried the knock off brand, but it made her brake out. So when I came back to the US, I tried this foundation and loved it. I love all my bareMinerals products and reccommend them to everyone!
I've used this product for 8 years now and wouldn't go without. Long lasting product in terms of value and daily use. I have sensitive skin and never have problems with this makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It's great.
I have been using this since 2001 and I am still in love with this product and especially with all the compliments I receive about how natural my makeup looks.

Works great with my combination skin which seems to go more towards the dry. Doesn't cake and has great coverage. You can also mix with the other ones to find that perfect match. Doesn't fall into the creases so the coverage is as light as you want it to be.

reviews.review_title: The mother of all mineral foundations
reviews.review_text: What can I say! This baby is a rock star! The skin transformation is immediate right in front of your eyes. You can do the half face test and you'll see the difference. When I wear it, people always compliment me on my skin, and tell me how lucky I am that I do not have to wear make up... (hehe) I love how smooth it goes on the skin, how it evens out tone and the amount of coverage it provides, very light. I use the large MAC Kabuki brush to apply it. Is the perfect combination.
but why does it make me breakout now. This is better then the matte for sure! and the new stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't say enough good things about this foundation to portray how much I adore it. I got hooked on it a few years back, and have always, always, always come back to it! It's natural, covers well, and has a beautiful luminous touch that makes your skin look like it glows. My skin without this makeup is dull, with the occasional blemish, lots of blackheads on my nose and chin, and redness around my nose and mouth-- in short, not too pretty! However, with this makeup, I always get compliments on my skin! It feels so lightweight and is not at all greasy. A couple drawbacks are that it can be messy if you accidentally drop it, and that it transfers quite easily and might not last all day if you have really oily skin-- both of which I am willing to live with for the flawless finish this foundation gives!

reviews.review_title: Wonderful product for already flawless skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fairly good product for those who already have nice skin and just want to apply a base for the rest of their makeup. However, if you are looking for a foundation that will help get you a blank canvas, this is not the product for you. (Also, I suspect this is not a good product for oily skin, perhaps bareMinerals Matte foundation.)  bareMinerals Original Foundation is lightweight, and not harsh on skin, but it is also quite sheer. For those of us with any blemishes, freckles we'd rather hide, or even slight discoloration (perhaps from passing blemishes or sun), this foundation will not help cover it. It simply polishes already flawless skin.  However, it is a wonderful product for the right clientele!

This foundation is the best I've ever used. I have rosacea and the coverage is amazing. No more redness and the coverage lasts most of my normal day. It's easy to apply and can be mixed with other shades to make your perfect match. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a completely satisfied user of bareMinerals for several years. I've tried others, but nothing even comes close. The coverage, east of use and comfort are everything I could ask for. I LOVE bareMinerals!

I hv been using bare minerals spf15 original foundation for years and it has been great! I have a very sensitive skin and a lot of freckles,this product provides it all, protect,improve yet coverage! Will continue using it ....prob forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation, very natural looking. However, there isn't much coverage if you're looking for something to cover scars, acne, etc. I do appreciate the fact that it doesn't break me out, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a huge fan of Bare Minerals products for awhile. I love how nicely the foundation covers light or heavy your choice. Looks pretty natural and blends nicely. My only complaints are that they don't make a shade that's a bit lighter for VERY fair skin. I buy the lightest shade (fair) but it is still a touch to dark. I have to blend a lot to prevent slight lines of demarcation. Lastly I wish they made the foundation and especially the Mineral Veil which Is even more incredible in larger sizes. The Mineral Veil runs out very quickly if you use it more than once a day. I use it quite a bit having a slightly oily completion.
Always a winner! Even after trying new products I always come back to this one!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried it a few years ago and have tried new things just to see if it's better, but nothing compares to BM. My only issue is I do have to reapply after working all day, but it's easy and doesn't take much effort.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel that if you manage to get the right color this foundation does give a wonderful glowy finish, however, if you have oily skin it does require touch ups throughout the day because it seems to slide off or move into unwanted areas of the face. I also do not like that that when I talk on the phone I notice a nasty amount of makeup on the phone- very transferable and if noticed by others, embarrassing. I have been using the Jane Iradele loose powder and I can get away with working my 12 hour shifts without wonder where my makeup traveled off to but it gives more of a matte finish. I wish they could make the foundation have more staying power without applying a bunch of other pore clogging ingredients to your face first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It covers extremely well when you apply it correctly. It makes my skin look so smooth and flawless. I have been a long time user of BareMinerals, but I get curious when a new foundation comes out with great reviews. I recently tried MUFE HD foundation and didn't like it because it took way too much for a nice look. It also didn't look as natural. Will not stray from this again! It also clears my skin up. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I saw how many good reviews this product was getting, I decided to give it a try. I have to say it does not look very good on my face. It looks dry and flaky and it definitely doesn't last the whole day and it does not give full coverage whatsoever. Such a disappointment and I won't be buying this again in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. I will never go back to liquid. It's so easy to apply, blends perfectly and gives a nice glow.
This is the best foundation I have ever used. I have been using it for years, and will continue! I am acne prone & it has helped improve my skin.

I love BareMinerals so much. I tried marykay mineral makeup and truly missed the wonderful coverage and flawlessness that I enjoy with BareMinerals. Do not switch your makeup ladies. This is the best foundation for sensitive skin, I have not had any skin issues with it. Wonderful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I think I already wrote a review on this a week after my purchase, but I will rewrite one since it has been almost 6 months using it and still LOVE IT and nothing will ever replace it.  I will say, I wasn't used to using powders since ithey are kind of messy, but I guess thats what you get for an amazing natural looking glow.  This has a really subtle spark, you cant see it on your face, which is why it looks more glowy and threedimensional (more than the matte one). It doesnt give you full coverage, which is why I use my bbcream and concealer before this. The powder just gives you a natural finishing look, even-ing skin tone...I simply love it. And i break out with technically EVERYTHING but not with this

I have extremely pale skin, and so I have very few options when it comes to foundation. Most of the top brands (Mac, MUFE, UD) have such wonderful products that FAIL to accommodate to pale, freckle-free, blue-eyed redheads. Bare Minerals is an exception to this rule. This foundation provides full coverage...beautiful on my combination-dry skin (liquid makeups tend to leave skin looking dry/flak after a few hrs). I don't use the mineral veil because my skin is dry....but I use Josie argan powder is a light sweep in order to set the foundation and give a hint of color. I also highly recommend bare minerals eye shadows (envy) and mascara....you won't regret it.
I am a 50 something with combination skin....this covers beautifully even though I have uneven coloring and does not settle into fine lines....Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Hard to believe that powder can give such complete coverage without looking fake or overdone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best, most natural looking foundation I've used. However, they NEED to make more variety of shades. I use the lightest fair, and it has way too much pink undertone, while fairly light matches my undertone but is way too dark. If they made a neutral true porcelain shade I would use this for life.

I've been using bareMinerals for about 7 years now and I wouldn't even consider changing for something else! It is really easy to control the coverage which I love because I like a more natural look during the day but can easily switch to a more dramatic look for evenings without feeling like you're wearing a mask. It is the best!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's nice that it comes in all shades, however it doesn't give you full coverage. It goes on easy but if you apply too much it looks dry and flaky. After wearing it for a couple hours you'll notice that it's already gone. Nice for minimum coverage day, but definitely will not last if you go to the clubs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is not for me. It extenuates my large pores and it is super messy to use. The coverage also isn't any better than other foundations I have tried. I will stick with my BB cream.

reviews.review_title: good for when you want more of a done look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to go easy on the make up, with a very light hand. This make up is good, but it's much more coverage than you'd expect from a powder - so definitely go easy. That said, it blends in beautifully and lasts. It's a little heavy for everyday use for me. But I use it for special occasions, events, when there will be pictures, etc.
won't ever change my foundation, light airy, adequate coverage, noncomedogenic, never a line of demarcation
Love this product. It stays on all day. I would go a color up from what you think will work for your skin tone. That is just my opinion and what worked for me :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite foundation. I don't use anything else now. It provides full coverage, it's fast, easy, and flawless to apply. It makes my skin look great! It looks light but it covers very well. I now have a baby girl and I love this stuff even more because I sometimes sleep in it and it never breaks me out or anything. I also notice it stays on really well too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have acne prone/oily skin (large pores) I suggest you DO NOT use this... the ingredients in the BE original foundation is VERY harmful and will build up over time even if you use a clarsonic brush daily to clean your face, your pores will never fully be cleansed. The BE matte version of this doesn't contain the ingredients so it would be more ideal to try.

Love!!!!! This would make a great bronzer for someone with porcelain skin. Use Korres primer to keep pores from getting enlarged and keep oil at bay!!! Love love love. I'm a makeup artist but personally this just works best for me. I use a hair dryer with diffuser to warm up my face(sounds weird I know) this way the makeup just blends my fine lines and wrinkles and goes on super smooth.
It is full coverage,but light,and does not build up in fine lines on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed how easy and flawless the product was to put on. And at first it looks like perfect coverage. However, if you have dry-normal skin, it ends up looking cakey and the product moves on your face as the day goes on. If you have oily skin, this product would be perfect.
Great foundation . Bought one for myself and my daughter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this Bare Minerals for almost 9 years...I occasionally (being a bit fickle and prone to a 'grass is greener' mentality) will attempt to use another base, but each time I go running back to this one.

reviews.review_title: One year of use- Love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the Medium Tan shade in a Get Started Kit and it worked perfect for my skin tone. As a college student, its been perfect for providing a light amount of coverage for normal use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have using this since I was a freshman in high school and I am now a junior in college. I get bored with products easy and try to mix it up, but ALWAYS come back to this!! I have really sensitive skin so anything and everything breaks my face out, except bare minerals. I use this every day and love the coverage and the SPF protection! I am hooked for life!! I recommend this to everyone I know. My little sister who is 15 now uses this too and she loves it!

I've used bareMinerals for many years now and I still love it. It makes me skin look natural and beautiful. But I deducted a star because it just doesn't work for me in summer anymore. It just sinks into my pores and ends up looking and feeling gross, not matter what primer I use. Still, I'll continue buying and using it for the three other seasons.
Nothing comes close to the coverage I get with the bare minerals. Love the sheen of the original formula

I have tried anything and everything out there. By far this is my favorite. It doesn't feel heavy nor cakes on you face. I have very sensitive skin and pretty much everything irritates it but never BE foundations. I love the entire line!
<3 it. Been using it since they came out, haven't had any problems.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this in Fairly Light as a concealer for blemishes, red spots & discoloration over a tinted moisturizer. It is wonderful-matches my skin perfectly, hides blemishes & lasts all day. The jar lasts for abt two years when using as a spot treatment daily. Amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used bareMinerals foundation in the past, but I always like to try other products...just to see. I ran out of the other foundation I was using and found the BM in my make-up drawer and used it. When I got to work, I was complimented by almost everyone I came into contact with! I didn't think it could have been only the foundation, I just thought I was having a good skin day. The next few days I used a new foundation I ordered and no one mentioned a thing. So on Thursday I used the BM..and again compliments galore! So I bought a new, fresh, BM foundation in Fairly Light and have been thrilled, again, with the results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! The coverage is great and the color is wonderful and easy to blend. I got this in medium beige and it works great to cover my dark spots and hide my pores.
After months of using both, I can say: you are being ripped off. The All Natural Face is the way to go for mineral foundation that is better-quality, non-irritating, and way more affordable.

This product is really good value. Powders usually run a lot more expensive and I would say that this powder is really good for the money your paying. As far as colouring goes, I got the fairly light and i should have gotten the lightest one. I am olive and its just a tad too yellow for even me in fairly light. They need to modify their colouring because if the second lightest shade is too yellow for myself and I have a yellow skin tone, I can see others being frustrated with their options. Just something to keep in mind if you are going to purchase this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gives me the coverage I need and the sheerness that I want in about 30 seconds ! People are always complimenting me on my skin :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this foundation because I was tired of having those powder, mineral foundations that made my face look like a disco ball. I went to sephora and the woman there helped me find my perfect match for my complexion and it's incerdible! No more glitter face! Just smooth, oil-free coverage. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This makeup stays on in the water.... you can sleep in it and it does not transfer to your pillow...no more makeup on your collars...it provides full coverage and looks like you're not wearing anything. I use fairly light and it is perfect for my complexion.

I never knew my skin could look so good! All I need is this one product and I'm completely done! It goes on smoothly and lasts all day. My favorite thing about it is that after putting it on, my skin looks naturally perfect, not like I smothered it in goo to make it look good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've always been one to use mineral makeup as I've never liked the way liquid foundation looks on my skin. Bare Minerals is perfect! In the past, I have relied in other mineral foundations as an everyday foundation for school and work but they'd never seem to last very long. Bare Minerals not only gives me full, natural looking coverage but also lasts all day (some days I don't even need to use a primer!) I purchased this foundation with the Starter Kit which I also believe is very good value.

I've been using BareMinerals for over 5yrs now and love it. I loved it when they switched to this new 'twist closed' container but was trying to figure out how to get all of the powder out when there was just a little left. The old container I could pop off the top with the holes. I found with the new container you can pop off the center round bottom. This allows me to get every last bit!

I've been using bare minerals foundation for about 6 years now, and though I am constantly updating other areas of my makeup routine, this product has continued to hold the title for only foundation in my lineup. From my day to day light coverage to my wedding, this powder has been buffed into every moment :). Ok, I may be a little too attached, but its really a great product. Adjustable coverage, never feels cakey, never gives me any kind of adverse reaction (I have super sensitive skin) and won't ruin your complexion if you forget to take it off at the end of the day (which I almost always do forget to do). So glad it's around... If you haven't tried it yet, I highly recommend it. The starter kit is also a great way to go for any beginners :)

reviews.review_title: As little or much as you'd like!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product five years ago, and I've been using it ever since. I love that you can really wear as much or as little as you'd like - light to full coverage, depending on your skin condition, or just the occasion or look you're going for. It's never felt oily, and blends beautifully. Two thumbs up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to go for maximum coverage products when it comes to foundation. I wanted to try something a little more natural looking, I decided to try bare minerals, and I was pleasantly surprised! Even though it's a powder foundation, you can definitely control your amount of coverage. Not to mention, the stuff lasts forever! I've been using the product now for almost a year and I have only just recently bought my 3rd refill. They tend to last me about 3-4 months. I love this product and don't plan on using anything else as far as foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thus is a great mineral foundation. It is easy to use. I love the product packaging that helps prevent spills.
Easy application. Excellent coverage. I haven't found better foundation products than Bare Minerals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am disappointed to say this product was not a good fit for me. This is not to say that it won't work for someone else, but my normally dry skin looked and felt like an oil slick with this product on. I did try the matte version too, but I don't believe I'm meant to wear Bare Minerals.  On a positive note, the staff of Sephora were so helpful, and I was able to return this product and find something better suited for me. Thank you Sephora girls for being so gracious and helpful!
Best foundation ever

reviews.review_title: Best Cosmetic Purchase I've Ever Made
reviews.review_text: I've tried all sorts of liquid foundation, and I never knew that it could contribute to acne until recently. When I found this out, I was quick to switch to powder, and thought Why not Bare Minerals? Not only did a lot of my acne cleared up, but this foundation was faster to apply and so lightweight without offering any less coverage than liquid foundation, in fact it offered more. I'm so so happy I bought it, and I would recommend it to everyone- at least try this product!!!!!

This is the only cover up I wear, It works under my eyes and all over my fave. I use a primer first if my skin in really uneven or bumpy, and the foundation makes my skin look flawless. I have been using this for 4 years and I plan to continue using it. I eventually needed new brushes so I got a Sephora brand set which works great.
my favorite foundation
I have been using Bare Minerals for about five years now....it is the best foundation ever. My skin never looked better. I highly recommend you won't be disappointed.

I've never been a thick foundation wearer, so this is light and perfect! The Golden Medium is perfect for my skin tone. Never causes breakouts either. I think this might be my 4th or 5th time buying this product. Just two reasons why I didn't give the 5th star: 1) it causes some dryness on my face in certain spots, but just moisturize heavily the night before, and 2) gets messy on the counter and floor if any minerals spill.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It gives a nice glow where my skin is good, but accentuates my big pores. I guess that's the limitation of the foundation in a powder form....

reviews.review_title: what is all the hype about?
reviews.review_text: I finally broke down and purchased this as my first foundation. I don't have bad skin, but I have developed some redness and dark spots. I love how easy the application is and it's nice for a sheer or light coverage. However, I have been unable to use it to even out skin tone without looking like I'm wearing a pound of cakey makeup. I thought mineral foundation was supposed to be natural looking! I do like the luminous finish, but I could easily achieve that look with a luminizer. This foundation is fine for now, but I think I will try something different when I run out.
I've never used a foundation that looks COMPLETELY natural while providing impeccable coverage. Would recommend to any/everyone.
Most amazing foundation ever. When I don't have it with me and have to use my old stuff I used I'm amazed with how horribly my old concealer blends in. I will never go back to any other face make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My mom has been trying to get me to use this foundation for YEARS. I finally did, and now I'm obsessed. Makes your skin look GORGEOUS and it doesn't get as oily as fast as liquid foundation! Definitely worth investing in.

I always heard great things about bare minerals, like once you try you will never go back. I'm so glad I finally purchased the starter kit. I am very happy with this foundation and can't see using anything else after. It looks so natural and light, fully evens out skin tone. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Great Foundation and Coverage for Combo Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been an avid bareminerals user for over 10 years, and don't know what I'd do without this foundation. For years I had issues with standard liquid foundation and it was a true revelation for me when I found the bare minerals products. On top of having combination skin prone to break outs, I have very sensitive skin with many product allergies, and this one didn't give me any problems at all...I will be a true B.E. product user for life. I especially love how the mineral products can be combined for 'in between' coverage...I go between 'medium biege; and 'medium tan' during the summer months, and can use the two to cover that awkward in between stage.

I love bareMinerals. I tried it years ago in store and opted for a different brand for more coverage as it doesn't have a complete, solid coverage, but I almost wish I had gone with it earlier. I tend to breakout, and my skin changed after I started using bareMinerals- WAY less breakouts! Give it a shot.

reviews.review_title: For some, I'm sure it's amazing...
reviews.review_text: For me, not so much. Doesn't cover we'll for me, and doesn't have staying power. I have tried a few times, I have not given up. On to something else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this stuff since July 2005 and I doubt I will ever use another foundation as long as it is still in existence.

I've had a longer relationship with this foundation that with any man in my life! I love that it's 100% natural plus it's the most natural looking foundation I've ever tried. And I do still try new ones that come out such as the new YSL touche eclat foundation but I still like the natural finish from my bare minerals foundation better. You can find a VERY detailed review along with swatches for fairly light and fair on my blog. Just google Sensitastic. The whole blog is dedicated to beauty and skincare for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: Great for light but total coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're not really in the mood to put an insane amount of work in to your foundation one day or ever, this is the product for you! It goes on so well and so easily. It's easy to blend and lasts. It gives total coverage. The only problem I have with it is that it sweats off in the summer with me living in the South. Still it's a great product.

I love this foundation! It covers up any redness, it looks great on my skin. I thought it would be too dark since I am so fair, but it is perfect. I feel like it is great coverage with just a small amount. I recommend BM to my friends now!!
Bare minerals provides excellent coverage without looking unnatural or cakey. I have used for over 5 years and will never use another product. Period.
I will never try another foundation again- this is so awesome. I've been using this for 3 years now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great powder fo nice coverage, bulidable

I have been using this product for about five years now and still love it as much as the day I bought it. When used with the primer, it has excellent coverage and always gives my face a nice, healthy glow.  The condition of my skin improves when I use this product -- it actually feels like it is working my skin wonders -- and I can rest easy knowing that my face is protected by a layer of SPF on a daily basis.  I highly recommend this product to beginner and veteran makeup users alike. As far as powder foundations go, you can't get better than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I typically avoid foundation because my skin is very sensitive and prone to acne from almost every foundation product I have tried. This product has been recommended to me for years and I balked bc of the price and my general dislike for foundation. This is the first foundation I have found that doesn't make me rashy or break out. It gives perfect coverage while still feeling light and clean. I am a convert.

reviews.review_title: More coverage than you'd expect from a powder
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: took me a while to get used to this, but I like it. I don't wear much make up, and when I do I tend to use a very light hand.  This powder gives a lot of coverage, more than I expected. Once I got the hang of it, it worked well. It's a bit much for everyday, but I use it for nights out or if photos will be taken.

reviews.review_title: Back to Bare Minerals for good
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many foundations, without success, and have retd to Bare Minerals. Just really works, covers what I want it to cover, and blends in. No ifs, ands, buts.

reviews.review_title: Easy Shopping.... More choices...one stop shopping
reviews.review_text: Love, Love , Love shopping at Sephora... no matter what i am buying! Free shipping, and lot's of fun samples!
Easy to log in and find exactly what i want. Prices competitive, shipping free..... samples are always fun!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have pretty good skin myslef with accasinaly breakouts, i have always used the bare minerals foundation and it works really well but it does not provide the best coverage. It takes away the redness really well and doesnt feel heavy but, its tricky to apply because of how it starts out a powder but it works to a cream when you rub it into your skin wwith a brush, so you can tell you have a good amount of powder on but it has really good coverage and does give you a natrule looked. a little goes a long way with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love bareMinerals. I started using this from March. I love the fact that I dont even feel like wearing any makeup when I put this foundation. ...but at the same time it covers up my dark spots well!  Only reason I put 4 is I still havent found a good primer for this. I used the one came with the set, but i didnt like the smell of it or it did not keep the foundation long enough for me.
