After 6hs, 30% of my makeup is gone, and my face looks oily during summer (just office work and occasional visit to other offices). I will try matte one next.
I'm a fan of bare minerals as is. I needed a new foundation bec I got very tanned during the summer. It blended very nicely & evened out my complexion. A little goes a long way.
Very good product! But cakes onto skin easily if I over use it.
I get so many compliments on my complexion since I started using Bare Minerals. (And I'm 58!) Highly recommend it.

I've been using this oundation in the #15 Light for about 6 months now along with the translucent the 25spf mineral veil and I LOVE it. I had to try a few different colors before I found the right one for me but once I did I could totally see the difference in coverage. My skin is very oily and acne prone but a Sephora assoc suggested some of the different Philosphy skin care products and I fnally have the perfect makeup with the perfect skin care regimen.
one of my favorites, I love how easy Bare Minerals is to use. flawless coverage and a spf, it is a daily must for me.
Accept no imitations! This is the best mineral makeup on the market...bar none.
I've been using bareMinerals foundation for nine years and nothing compares. It covers, it lasts and the quantity is generous. I cannot imagine using any other product.
Love it Love it I would absolutely recommend this!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've started using bareMInerals foundation about 8 years ago and I've tried to use other foundations in between but I've always come back to bareMinerals. What I love about this foundation is that during a hot day, this foundation doesn't melt or get oily. If you can find your right shade, you will love it too. Ps. There are other brands who try to copy bareMinerals but somehow they just come up short...they doesn't cover as well or the texture is just off. I'd say go with the real thing, it'll be worth it.

Love love LOVE this particular shade of Bare Minerals! I'm rather fair skinned, yet this shade gives me a tanned look without looking orangey. Medium tan is a must if you have no yellow complexion tones but want to look sun-kissed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fair skin with pink undertones. Some foundation appear too cakey on me or wear off but that's not the case for this one. It went on very smooth and natural. Even after building coverage it didn't appear cakey.
I have tried to use other foundations but nothing compares to bareMinerals. It looks and feels so natural and doesn't make me break out.
I try to use other foundations but there is nothing that compares to bareMinerals. It looks and feels so natural, and doesn't make me break out.

reviews.review_title: Tried Other Products & Keep Going Back to This One
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is very sensitive. The first time I tried this product, it made me itchy. Then a couple of years later I tried it again and I haven't been able to find anything better. I've gone through trying out about 3 different shades, going by the color I was seeing in the pot. When it just wasnt working, I went back to liquids and/or other powder foundations that only created oil slicks and clogged my pores, causing breakouts. As soon as I went back to this, the breakouts cleared up. And that's what happens every time I try a different foundation. Found a genius lady who helped me find the 1 perfect shade (that looked too dark in the pot to my eye but ended up being perfect on my skin) and I haven't gone back. Because it's so easy to apply, I sometimes put too much on and have to back off a little. Simple application. Takes very little time. Foundation doubles as concealer. Amazing coverage. Can't get much better/easier than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I held out on trying this product for years, despite the hype, because I have various blemishes to cover and didn't believe that a powder foundation could do the job.  Out of curiosity I finally tried it out one day in the store, and was immediately very impressed by the finish and coverage. Even my acne scars were hidden! I was also really impressed by the color selections, because many lines of foundation don't have every undertone like BE does (it's hard to match my pale yellow/olive skin).  Anyway so I bought it right away and gleefully put it on as soon as I got home, admiring myself in the mirror. After a little time went by though I found that my face was feeling kind of weird and itchy, and you can't scratch it cause you don't want to mess up the makeup! After it almost felt like it was burning, I googled bare minerals itchy and discovered that a lot of people have this reaction to mineral makeup because of the ingredient Bismuth Oxychloride. Sadly, I had to return it, BUT I just found out that the matte formula does not contain bismuth, so I'm going to give that a try instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use it only in winter tho I feel it's to Cakey for hot weather

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Time and time again I come back to the Original! SPF is great, usually gives long-lasting coverage.

I tried Bare Minerals after MK started breaking my face out. I have had eczema (sometimes severe) all of my life and I can only wear Bare Minerals. I'm getting my step daughter switched to it. It's also weightless, feels like you're not wearing anything.
I have been a user of this in the summer and spring for 8 years now. I wear the light in the fall/winter months. You can get a good amount of coverage in spots that need it but it still feels light.
Great foundation perfect coverage. Light your skin can breath in it totally will re purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bare Minerals is the best mineral foundation. It gives you light buildable coverage that lasts. I have tried other mineral foundations but always regret my purchase and always return to Bare Minerals.
I realy like this foundation, it leaves skin without the normal foundation aftermath. I highly recommend it.

I have used product since 2005 and I love it! Over the years I would try to use other concealing/foundation products they would never add up to bareMinerals!!! I love everything about this product except when you sweat I live in a very hot climate during the summers anyway other than that this is my favorite product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is awful.... I used this for a couple of years before finding my new love liquid foundation. WHAT WAS I THINKING? It looks like dry cake batter on your face..ew. It made my skin feel tight, dry, and a tad ichy. I do not care what type of skin you have, do not use mineral make up. I had a friend of my try it in matte because her skin was oily and she also hated it. No shades match your skin tone no matter what, I have talked to previous users of it. Talk about low quality. I adore make up and knew what I was doing with this and just no..HORRIBLE product.
This Foundation is really great. It covers skin very well. I have a dark spots after sun so i needed something to cover up. Therefore i got this product. I really recommend it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareMinerals for years and I love it. I have tried other foundations but this is still my favorite. It looks natural and light on your skin and feels really nice. I also love that it does not make my skin break out.
This goes on nice and I like how it looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For years I tried a multitude of cheap to expensive foundations and could not seem to match my skin tone. In 2004 when I finally started using bareMinerals I had finally found the perfect foundation. While some of my application methods have changed, this is still my primary foundation. Layarable, non-clumping, perfectly matching - ideal in every way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this a try because it is so popular, but I felt that it was heavy, cakey and dry. Made me look older by settling into fine lines, and even made my eyes feel itchy. Maybe an allergy? This is probably good for people who need heavy coverage with more oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareMinerals for over a year and will never use another brand. This foundation gives a flawless finish without the cakey heavy feeling a liquid foundation would. I've noticed clearer skin since I've started using this makeup too! It's long lasting and super natural looking. Amazing!
Love this product what can I say just wish that when you use the eye brightener it would work together darn.

After switching over to this product a few years ago, I have no complaints!! I don't break out and I can have all the coverage I desire. It is a must have in my make-up bag. I ran out and wasn't able to get it so I used an off brand, As soon as I had the opportunity to get more I did. There is nothing like it!

Its ok, I as looking for a light, natural looking powder and this can look a little caked on. About an hour or two after applying my face gets a greasy look around my him, nose and forehead. Not as good as I was hoping

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation i've ever used. I was hesitant to try a powder foundation because I have dry skin, but bareMinerals really works on my skin (I do use the Clarisonic which helps a lot as well). It gives a great finish and makes my complexion look flawless. I have tried Tarte and Laura Mercier, but I prefer bareMinerals!
I have used this product for 10 years, when my daughter started wearing make up there were no other options... This or nothing. We both will not wear anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok, I have used this in my color golden fair for about a year. I love how it feels like I have on no makeup at all. The things I don't like about it are starting to outweigh the positives. I don't like how this stuff is so messy. If I go a week or so with out cleaning my bathroom there is literally a light dusting of this stuff everywhere. I also don't like how it settles into the few lines I have under my eyes even if I use a primer there. They also increased the price by a few dollars, not a deal-breaker but annoying.
tryed many other mineral makes ups....but none compare to the gold standard of baremineral..

I love this product because it does not irriate my sensitive skin. It is easy to layer to establish the amount of coverage one wants. When applying I always wrap a towel aroung my neck since mineral make up tends to be a bit messy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation since I was pregnant with my younger daughter (she was born in July of 1999), and I still love it! I have tried so many other foundations over the years, and I have never liked anything heavy. This product feels so great on and covers very well. I will never be without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate giving bad ratings and reviews but seriously... this product has got to be the most hyped up product ever. It's hard to get a good color match to begin with but what's worth is that the color oxidizes within an hour and then you end up looking like an oompa-loompa. So embarassing and annoying when you're at work and by the end of the day, you look like you put on cheap drugstore foundation..  Also this thing just looks so fake... No amount of moisturizing, priminng, touch up powder afterwards can detract from the fact that you have obvious makeup on. This product is just ugh and has turned me off from mineral based products forever. So thankful for Sephora's return policy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this when mineral powder first hit the product and thought it was amazing. However, a lot of newer, better formulations have since come out. It does a decent job but can look really flakey and dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this mineral foundation because I saw great reviews on here. I went to my local sephora and got my shade matched to my skin tone. The lady who put the make up on me, to try it out, used a very light color. I looked so pale. I insisted for me to go a shade or two darker, but she said no its perfect. I said okay whatever, I just really needed a new mineral foundation. The next day when i went to use it to go out my face color was SO much lighter then my neck and the rest of my body. Not to mention it was very think and cakey looking. Sadly, I threw out my recipt and i have no way to return this horrible product. I guess I am going back to using my liquid foundation. I do not reccomend this product unless you want a cakey face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: hihi, so im 15 torontobased, and moving onto highschool next year - i lovvve natural products that are free of all the chemical blehh in them. this is actually my first powder foundation after hopelessly trying drugstore liquids that'd make my face look chalky and unatural. i have pretty good skin; i think with a bit of blotchiness and whiteheads around my eyes + the occasional pimple & i have combination skin. i start by using a moisturizer then prime with the original primetime primer, then apply this stuff with my ecotools kabuki :) all natural stuff as you can see #proud this stuff is suuuuuuuuper lightwieght and distributes evenly with a buffing motion . i don' t need loads and loads of it which is a bonus ! it gives a really natural finish and totally flaunts my skin as flawless with only a bit of work! i really like this stuff but im worried its staying power for the winter windy/cold months wont work ! ;thinking of investing in a highend longwear touchupfree powder for winter erkss if i have enough money! but this stuff is all natural so i really feel im doing good for my skin even at a young age :)

I always knew tht Bare Minerals had SPF, but I didn't realize how well it protects until recenttly. This summer has produced some very hot scorching days, and twice I have been out too long without proper protection for my shoulders and chest. I got burned there, but BM protected my face wonderfully.
feels good on just not enough coverage for me. I have to use with alot of concealer which make me feel like it defeats the whole point of using it in the first place.

I like this makeup because it lightly airbrushes on an even surface that improves the look of skin without looking made up. The newer packaging is a bit frustrating because the last little bit of product remains trapped in the container.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good setting powder. I use it after applying liquid foundation to set my face and concealer. I do not find it provides enough coverage when used alone as a foundation. However, it stays on well (especially when using a primer!) and does not flake on me at the end of the day like many other powders do. I have dry skin and this powder stays on light all day.
I have been wearing this product for 4 years now and my skin shows a difference in how healthy it is. It feels light and my skin can breath.
Not a great coverage, but it still works for me.
I keep going back to this. It is especially great in the hot humid summers here in Texas. Other foundations cannot hold up like BE. Covers like no other . And believe me I've tried a lot of them.
Great product. Very satisfied

I have been using this foundation for years. Every once in a while I will try a cream foundation but will always come back to the powder minerals. Having a light hand when applying makes for even coverage. I use velvet minerals concealer for undereyes and blemishes then top with powder minerals. I have found using powder minerals to drying for under eye concealer. Using a moisturizer and cream concealer under gives my skin a nice even glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It covers even the worst acne/dark spots. It is light and it doesn't clog my pores, in fact it seemed to help my acne! I absolutely recommend this foundation for anyone who doesn't particularly love makeup or doesn't want to look like there wearing a lot. It may seem expensive but it lasted almost a year. Definetly a great buy!
Long lasting, great coverage.

reviews.review_title: i wanted to love this SO BADLY :(
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: after seeing all the GREAT reviews on sephora about this foundation i finally went and bought it. i was SO excited when i came back home and i immediately took off my makeup and moisturized and primed. i had gotten a VERY good brush (hourglass kabuki brush) so after i primed i obviously did what the directions said put on the close thing it comes with, swirl tap off excess and put it on your face. i was so sad:( it was SO CAKEY, just like all the drugstore powders.. and i herd its supposed to cover up redness, i guess it did but you can see it under. my cousin uses this product and i LOVED how it looked on her, but it just didn't work for me.... i only used it once ill try it again i might like it, but so far this was VERY disappointing.
If you haven't tried this type of foundation, do. It's easy and gives good and natural coverage. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It makes my face look like a mask. I literally can feel it on my face. Its not a lightweight or not visible product. Do not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This powder is seriously the best. I get the best compliments ever since i started using this powder. I not only use it as my cover up, but i can also use it to cover my acne. It gives me a glowing complexion. it makes my skin look smooth..i just love it!!!!

ive been using this in medium since i started using makeup when i was 15 and is also the only foundation ive ever used consistently. it lasts long so its well worth the price. my freckles on my nose still show if i keep a light hand which is something i love. it makes my skin look healthy and evens out my skin so well. 5 stars really are not enough.

reviews.review_title: The only foundation I will wear!
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing liquid foundations for years and I figured that they would be far better than powder foundations, boy was I ever wrong! I am the type of girl that likes the natural look and I HATE when it looks like my makeup is caked on... So one day I went out and I bought this bareMinerals foundation and when I tried it, I was shocked! It went on my skin really well and left my skin with a beautiful luminous finish. I didn't have to use very much at all and it gives fairly good coverage. Also I use this foundation as a concealer, all I do is use it with the concealer brush and it works great! The best thing about this foundation is, it doesn't even look like powder on your skin! I even got a compliment the first time I started wearing it. Honestly, it's worth a shot trying even if you are a little skeptical about powder foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have incredibly pale skin and am covered with frekcles, so I am always nervous to use foundation, because then it is ovious that I am wearing it. However this foundation evens out my blotchy skin town, while still allowing my skin to show through. By the end of the day it does wear off, but that could be because I'm not using enough primer. I recommend it, it's good for a more polish night time look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I have really oily skin. Like, breakouts everywhere except my cheeks. Bare minerals doesn't make me break out even more, but it does cover it. When I apply it, I really have to work at covering my more severe blemishes. Also, I get shiny towards the afternoon and it wipes off when i am dancing or running. However, this foundation is still really good. It provides a full coverage look, but it is still natural. You can't really tell that there's anything on my face, but my skin still looks better than it did before! I put it on over an acne moisturizer.  Overall, I would recommend it. It proides nice coverage, even if it comes off after a while.
No title created for this review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: well i originally tried this in the get started kit..... i like it because it doesn't melt off my face as bad as liquid in the heat but it does make my face look dry and makes my wrinkles stand out yet it sais that it hides them... and when i sweat at work it does make my face a bit itchy.... also it doesnt last long at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually use this as a spot concealer! I apply it using a small concealer brush and it seems to do a better job than any other type of concealer I've tried, plus since it's a powder it's better for acne-prone skin like me. If you're skin is a little bit flaky, though, this will highlight that so make sure you exfoliate and prime prior to use.

reviews.review_title: Love the makeup, Hate the new packaging
reviews.review_text: I detest the new packaging that won't let you open it to retrieve your last week's worth of makeup! I also used to reuse the old jars for sewing notions like pins and needles. The new packaging just seems wasteful in so many ways.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Bare Minerals for a few years now and it's great. I love that I'm applying SPF every time I put it on, and it really does give good, even coverage and a totally natural look to my skin. I do use some liquid concealer when I have a breakout, but this foundation really makes my whole face look even yet like I'm not wearing makeup at all. My only issue is in hot weather, when my face sweats, powder foundations such as this can clump up on damp skin...always make sure your face is entirely dry (after washing or applying lotion, etc).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation. So far, 3 compliments for the healthy glow of my aging skin. This is a keeper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a MUST have in every girl's cosmetic drawer. It goes on seamless, flawless and gives you a natural looking coverage without that made up look. It's also good for your skin, a WIN-WIN!! Love it!!

I am 34 years old and have worn bareminerals for a few years. The powder foundation provides great coverage and wears very well. I tend to sweat in my T zone and all you have to do is blot it with a paper towel. Problem solved. It works much better than a liquid. The powder does not clog up pores or sit in any wrinkles.
This particular item was a gift, although I use the same thing myself. It is wonderful! The powder makes my skin look and feel healthier!
I have been using this mineral foundation for years. I try others, but always come back to Bare Minerals!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is only foundation that doesn't break me out, dry my skin out or make me ashy. My skin has an airbrushed healthy glow whenever I use Bare Escentuals. Try it. You will definitely like it!

reviews.review_title: Awesome if you want a little shine
reviews.review_text: I always use the MATTE foundation instead of this ORIGINAL one because I don't like the shine the original version gives you. For a more natural daily use try the MATTE .

This product gives good coverage and fills light on your skin. I like to use all different kinds of foundation. For me, this mineral-based foundation is great when you are in a hurry or when you are on the go and need a touch up.

I've been using this foundation for about three years and I love it. It has a very natural and smooth color and texture. I use the Matt version which has less shine the original. Great for daily use. I also love the fact that I can have it on while working out without having it run off my face when I sweat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've always worn liquid foundation, but decided to try something new because nothing seemed to give enough coverage while still looking natural. I thought a powder would look cakey, matte, and obvious, but that is DEFINITELY not the case with this foundation. Even if I build up coverage on dark circles or redness, it still looks natural, and has a glowing, luminous finish. It also takes way less time to apply than liquid. The application does take a little practice, but I got the hang of it quickly and now it looks perfect every time! I've gotten a ton of compliments and am never worried about what my skin looks like anymore.

reviews.review_title: BE has changed colors without notice!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product to two years and it was basically perfect. Picked up another container and realized my skin didn't look so hot after applying it. I ckecked it against the dregs left in my old one, and the color of the recently purchased one was much darker and pinker (the fairly light). I went into the store to make sure it wasn't just the one I had bought, and saw that they had deffinately changed the color. Without warning! None of their colors match my skin now!!

love it, had to get color match in store, but ordered refills online... covers great as a sheer cover to blend skin tone, or works great as full coverage with extra layers... i do think my skin has improved but i can't be sure... although it has the click top it still spills everywhere so its a messy product, but works great.
This is by far the best foundation. You can have a light look or build the foundation for more coverage. The only foundation I have used for 7 years!!!
I love this makeup! I like to have that I'm-not-wearing-makeup-look and that's what Bare Escentuals gives me.

I tried this foundation to get non-chemical sunscreen and foundation coverage. I have dry, sensitive skin and this totally dried out my skin, even when I put on tons of my usual moisturizer beforehand. My skin even looked cracky by the end of the day. I tried it for 3 days but it's not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this powder because you can build it to use it as a concealer as well...I honestly don't use it as a foundation because my combination skin gets VERY dry in spots with powder makeup, but it's great for covering up blemishes in a very natural and un-cakey way. It's amazing how much like an eraser this stuff is for covering blemishes...it surprises me every morning. Tip - if you get the foundation, I wouldn't necessarily buy the separate concealer. The foundation is buildable so with the right brush you can use it as a concealer, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this is very natural and does not feel heavy or like you are wearing a lot of make-up. It covers very well and does a good job of evening out the skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Good coverage, light feeling on skin.

reviews.review_title: I always come back to this one
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for years and love it. Buildable coverage, great value for money.

Started using bare minerals over a month ago. Love the coverage I get. Though I do use the tinted moisturizer as my base. Very lightweight good coverage. If you want to cover dark spots and look airbrushed this is not for you. If you want a natural lightweight don't know it's there give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been searching far and wide for a long lasting, natural looking foundation that won't break me out. Thank the lord for this foundation. It looks like skin, keeps me from being super oily. What I like about it is that you can build up the coverage. I have really sensitive skin, and this stuff works great, it doesn't break me out in acne or with weird bumps. It's my favorite foundation :-)

Never been able to wear foundation. It always makes me break out, makes my skin oily, or just doesn't look right. All in all I don't like the feel of having it on... this is the first one I've ever tried that looks and feels completely natural and gives just the right amount of coverage. Best of all - no breakouts so far. Also found just the right color for my olive skin which is hard to match. winner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation with one exception. I hate the packaging. You are not able to get all the product out of it and I end up wasting some. Please change to a removable shaker top. Otherwise it is the best foundation on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the BEST foundations ever!! I have discoloration AND sensitive skin, but this foundation covers all of my blemishes! I'm still in high school, so I was really insecure about my skin, I was afraid to start wearing foundation, because I didn't want it to look obvious. But this foundation is SUPER light weight, and it gives you a flawless finish! It does not look like your wearing make up at ALL. This also last all day, even through P.E. class! If you are looking for a light, full coverage foundation, this is the one!!
The coverage I want with the no-makeup feel I desire. To quote Goldilocks, this bare makeup is just right!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good foundation, i like it better than the liquid ones, because the liquid foundations just keeps my face wet and shiny, and whenever i need to apply powder, it just ends up caky. But unlike this one, its like a 3-in-1, the foundation, the powder and the concealer since it really gives you good coverage. In that, you wouldnt have to feel that you are wearing so much make-up, and not to mention, this really feels light on your face and it dsnt make me break out too. I ignored all my other foundations ever since i started using this. Im one happy costumer!

When I first bought this product I was ecstatic, only to later on be disappointed. The coverage of this makeup is not very good, especially if you have acne prone skin. I also had a problem with the product drying my skin off. To top it all off this foundation doesn't do very well in the heat and made my skin look awful. The only CON to this product is you can use it over a liquid foundation for a finished look.
Have been using for years and love it. Great coverage and natural looking

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I thought i loved this product then I saw it in the sunlight omg! It aged me 15 years . It's bad in pics too .I can spot that artificial sheen a mile away. It also ages my 35 year old niece I pointed it out to her. We both threw ours away .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Matches my skin tone perfectly. I used to use the tinted moisturizer from Laura Mercier (I still do sometimes) but this works beautifully and easily!
I've used this makeup for over 7 years now and love it

It was a great buy, price was good, coverage is great (it does match my horribly white neck!) I like that it has a natural finish and I know that it doesn't have all those chemicals of other products. Although, I don't believe the SPF claim (and I put real SPF before make up) I do think it is a good option for the everyday -job related makeup. I don't regret and among all the benefits it also last a long time (not only coverage throughout the day but also the amount of the powder is enough to run for some time!)

reviews.review_title: good coverage, makes me look older though
reviews.review_text: this is good stuff. it doesn't break me out and doesn't mask my skin. it can be used to cover acne or red spots, too. it DOES get in the very fine lines around my mouth and age me, however.
Love bareMinerals Foundation. Have always used the medium shade. Bought med beige because the rest of my body is tanned for the summer. This gives me more color on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this is SPF15. I have a medicated moisturizer that requires sunscreen, so this is perfect. I continue to be a bareMinerals fan. The coverage is adjustable, and my skin always looks perfect.
Good coverage. except my face is very oily so when its really hot i deff sweat it off. but its the best foundation i have tried by far.
Quick, easy to use with great coverage. Doesn't cake - goes on evenly.
I like the coverage and it doesn't look like I have any makeup on.

I had ordered Fairly Light which I used in the past, but was sent Medium Beige. Instead of sending it back, I am using it and love it. Didn't think I could use that color, but was surprised at the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a love/hate relationship with this product. I use so many different foundations, I love playing with new products to have that 'perfect skin' look. I do love BE when used with bisque, and mineral veil (it's a process) in real life. However as a stay at home mom, I don't have time for touch ups, and this just doesn't have the staying power that a lot of liquids have. It looks so natural in real life, but it just doesn't photograph that well. You'll notice on the red carpet make up artists are usually using a liquid because mineral make up just doesn't cut it. In our facebook overexposed culture, I don't want to have to wear a different foundation each time I'm taking a picture! It's the biggest downside for me - which may sound stupid, and I understand the natural look in real life, because it looks like you aren't wearing makeup. That also can be a disadvantage. It may be my love of that airbrushed look that pulls me away. I do usually have this to throw on, especially on beach days or when I'm just at home. However I always have a liquid in my bag for longer days, evenings out/ any time pictures are involved. If you have naturally good skin - this is perfect. But with my combination, oily, dry spots, uneven marks on my chin - I just can't rely on this in every situation. Overall it's a good foundation sometimes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my 2nd impression about this foundation. I used to try this foundation back from 3 years ago, and it looks horriable on me, caky and just sit on top of my face; and everytime i went to sephora, i just stay away from BE line because of the bad 1st impression; But 2 months ago, I decided to pick it up to just give another try even though i had very low hope; I bought the starter kit which comes with brush and foundation, primer. Be honest i don't even know why i have courage to buy it because that date my skin was having some ace problem and looks like i will have allergy or something because of my period was coming; I put this foundation on and went to work the second day; i got 1st compliment from my client saying  i have such a nice skin OMG, i know it must be the foundation it is working; at the end of the day, i didn't feel any dryness at all and it just keeps looking good; That night i washed my face, my pimple on my faces were gone; i couldn't believe the 2nd time i try this product, it now just works for me; In order for convincing myself to keep it, i used it for continuous of 2 weeks when the whether was about near 100 degree; The foundation just looks Good on me even when i sweat; Now i guess maybe i am using the right brush to apply BE foundation; then immedicately i pucahse another Set from online because i love it so much; i know some people have reaction to the BE foundation, but luckily so far i don't; I think the starter kit is really good to try because it comes with everyting you need; I think i will keep using it and i will repurchase and try more of their products; By the way i have sensitive, dry skin; Stuff that doesnt work for me if i put it on, I will have reaction in 1 or 2 days; the shade i use is Light. I am a BB cream addidit, now I have been using this foundation constantly because it is so light that i don't feel anything when i put it on; I also use Nars pure radiant tinted moisturizer 1st and then concealer, then apply the BE foundation on the top, it works great for me; I don't use the primer come with it because it dries my skin; I will recommend to my friend to try;
This bareMinerals foundation is awesome! It doesn't make your face look all cakey and it's great for the summertime! I've been using it for over 2 years now and I love it :)

reviews.review_title: Love the product - HATE the container
reviews.review_text: The foundation works very well. Since the new product design, I want to scream. You cannot get the last seven days worth of the product from the container with the new 'fancy' dispenser. Please bring back the old plastic cover and forget the new twist top. One has to break the container to get the last 1/8 of the product out of the container. What a crock!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily, acne-prone skin, not to mention that I live in humidity center Houston! BareMinerals is oil-free and keeps my complexion matte and smooth all day long. I have very pale skin but easily freckle, so this color will give my the white face, so I would recommend really checking that the shade of your foundation really matches your face. You can build and build layers of foundation or just buff on one layer. This is an all-event makeup, for a night out, work, or just running Saturday errands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've loved this foundation for 6+ years now, and can't see myself finding anything better. I've had really bad acne for a long time too and have struggled with finding a foundation that covered my bad skin and didn't irritate my acne or make it worse. I've used cheap and expensive liquids, powders and creams and this foundation is the best I've tried. I use a smaller brush with this powder for concealing and a kabuki brush for all-over coverage -- it hides my imperfections so well and with so little makeup! One product lasts me about a month (but for people with less acne, which is most people, I bet it would last even longer). Also I have very fair skin and the lightest shade matches me perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I Love this Foundation , it's non cakey . the only thing is that it's not full coverage but other then that i love love this product . best foundation i've tried

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Through the years, I've used several different makeup lines - everything from the cheap drugstore stuff to the really expensive lines. When I found Bare Escentuals, I stayed with it. I've used it for years now and will not use anything else. I love the purity and gentleness of this brand. This foundation is wonderful. I live in a hot, humid city. And this makeup never cakes or smears or runs. I look as good at the end of the day after being in the humidity as I did when I left home. I have fair skin. I ALWAYS had a line along my jaw with even the fairest of shades in every other brand of makeup. I never have that anymore - that alone is a huge selling point in my opinion! I cannot recommend this foundation enough. It is incredible.

I have used at least 10 different foundations sold at Sephora, but I keep coming back to this one. I mainly stick with BE because it does not settle into my huge pores or some acne scarring like liquid foundation does. The luminous finish does make the foundation a little shiny on your face, so I always use a finishing powder.

I have been using bareMineral foundation for years, IT is a must have, especially in the hot summer months, It won't melt off your face like liquid foundations. Very natural looking- it evens out your skin tone beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: do not recommend, ruined my skin. had to stop using all products form this line.
My complexion is sloghtly darker than Medium and slightly light than the next colors darker. So I bought the medium to mix with one of the darker colors for a perfect match.

I looove this product. This is my second purchase after the summer came and I needed a darker shade. I have normal/combo skin and the original formula works great. Get the matte if you get shiny/oily as the day goes on as this formula does not cover up shine at all. My favorite thing about it is that you can choose how much coverage you want on a given day and it always looks invisible. I use a minimal amount for work and then concealer plus a bit more powder for evening for a more flawless look. Everybody tells me it looks like I'm not wearing any makeup, and that's the idea! This is not necessarily for you if you need to cover every bit of discoloration or blemish to leave the house.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is perfect for everyday. It is quick and easy to apply, making it great when I'm rushing to class. It gives a light to medium buildable coverage and looks so natural. It evens out your complexion, giving it an airbrushed look. It doesn't look like you're wearing makeup at all. With a face primer, it lasts pretty long. It can get a bit powdery if you over apply but using a setting spray after helps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is simply a great product. Looks natural, hides imperfections without looking makeupy, and doesn't cause breakouts (even when I've been lazy and forgotten to wash it off.) It has even survived sweaty workouts and looked pretty darn good. I like that you can use a light dusting to seem as though you're not wearing anything at all (you can let your freckles shine through a bit), or build it up for a more finished appearance. I've got fair skin that tans to a medium in the summer, so I switch between two colours: Fairly Light and Light. I really like that it's got a bit of SPF for daily protection. Everyone should try this. Definitely handy to have in your makeup kit. Also great for travel, since it's not liquid. I can have my regular foundation with me whenever. Since I have sensitive skin, I also appreciate that it isn't loaded with chemical ingredients and preservatives.
I am not sure how many years I have used Bare Minerals, and but it's been years. I love this powder!! I am 55 and folks tell me often that I don't look my age.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years and absolutely love it! It is the best product for concealing (no need for a separate concealer) and still feels lightweight, like I'm not wearing any makeup.
The only foundation I have ever found that looks natural and doesn't clog the pores.  I'm a boomer, so I've had years of product experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I was 17 my mom called my into her dressing room and was like hun check out this new foundation you're going to die. Being the self-absorbed and parent-critical brat I was at the time, I was like hurmph I have no time for [insert-pyramid-scheme-door-to-door-momish-makeup-brand-here] - my mom laughed and was like girl please give me some credit.  Anyway, 10 years later, I've not used another powder foundation since. It's enhanced the best parts of my skin while minimizing imperfections. I literally have no idea what I would do if Bare Escentuals/Minerals went out of business. It can cover simple, faded scars to major blemishes like nothing and there's not been one girlfriend of mine who I've introduced it to who hasn't absolutely died and changed to it immediately - girlfriends of ALL skin types and tones.  It's great because' it's perfect for day-to-day wear and doesn't sit on your skin and make you look all makeup-y, and at the same time you can use a concealer brush to cover particularly unsightly spots with extra powder to hide them completely.  I always reorder before I runout because I simply can't be without this stuff.  I would suggest visiting your local Sephora though before buying (if you've not bought it before) to get them to match it perfectly to your skin tone because once you're matched perfectly (they've got ALL shades) you're set. As with any foundation, it obviously looks garish if the color's off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for heavy coverage I don't recommend this for you unless you're using a cream concealer and a primer base for the powder. I also recommend a spray to make the foundation long lasting, but once you put this magic together the combination is a flawless, natural look good during any weather. I'm very picky about things on my face and this was comfortable. I guess if I had to say something bad about the final product it would be that if you have dry skin then make sure you're moisturizing, otherwise it looks a little powdery on your face when you're done. Not really a put on and run out the door sort of thing, takes a little prep, but this is my go to foundation and I would recommend it to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareminerals for atleast 3-4 years now and i always go back to purchasing it. i used to have brakeouts and acne but i dont get it as much as i used too, and this does help my oily skin ( with a little reapplying throughout the day when needed) a little goes a long way with this product so it is worth the money because it should last you a couple of months which is why i love it.

reviews.review_title: Great for acne prone skin! Use a primer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I break out once a month. I used to be a lot worse. Liquid foundations always clog my skin no matter the brand or ingredients. This doesn't. I don't even get blackheads anymore.  I wear it with Prime Time, (but the Tarte Clean Slates work well, too). That keeps me from getting too oily in my T-zone and makes it last all day. I can even use it as a spot concealer with the concealer brush. Primers work! Don't be afraid of them!  Before you buy, go into a store (either theirs or Sephora) and have them make you up using their products. Once you know how to use it properly, it's so easy.
I'm not a fan of the new container. It makes it very hard to combine different shades.

I have to use the lightest shade of this foundation, and I find that it doesn't offer as much coverage as some of the darker shades. I think I am just not a huge fan of powder foundation really, but that part isn't the company's fault. I do like that it has SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this 10 years ago and I remember really liking it but it was too expensive for me at the time. I tried it again a month ago and am finding it to be awful. It looks good until my skin gets oily, then it just melts off. Where I'm not oily it seems to clump so I end up looking like I loaded makeup in some areas and didn't put it on in others. Also if you are peeling at all on your face it emphasizes it, which is no good! Try other products before you get this one. I'm still on the search but am definitely done with bareminerals. Also, its so messy to put on. My counter is always a mess after I use it.

Ive been using this product for a while now and love it! It covers well and you cant even tell you have any on. I really got to moisturize my skin before I put it on bc I am on the dry side and powders are tough for me, but I love it anyway because covers and is invisible.

been using this for years, and still love it! coverage is light but complete, and natural looking. I love the rotating top so you don't have to deal with spilled powder and can control how much you want to sift out. I just wish you could remove the entire top once you get close to the end of the powder, so you could get every last bit!

reviews.review_title: if you have acne prone skin...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have acne prone skin this make up is for you! I have had acne since I was in fourth grade, severe to moderate, I am 18 now and it has defiantly gotten better (years of going to the dermatologist). This make up is the ONLY make up that doesn't make me break out the very next day. It covers any red marks I have and really does make my skin look flawless. If you have bad acne and sensitive skin you cannot go wrong with bare essentials! love love love

I have loved using bareMinerals since I was a teenager, but as my skin is aging this product seems to be accentuating fine lines on the skin. My mom has always had this problem and has never been able to use this product, so I don't see this issue resolving itself over time. I will finish this container (maybe) and then will be parting ways with bareMinerals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I waited a long time to get this product and I've been using bareMinerals now since about October 2011. I recently bought my second one this past week. It helps me not break out nearly as much. When I use just this without any other concealers or foundations I pretty much don't break out anymore. It covers decently enough but I do have pretty bad under-eye bags naturally which I do have to cover with more concealer. I use this almost everyday and hardly ever use other foundations now. I do prefer to use liquid foundation if I want a lot more coverage for nights out or special occasions. Overall GREAT product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fair skin and a photosensitive autoimmune skin condition (the sun will trigger flare ups), and I could not get rid of the acne I developed after my last round of treatment for a flare (corticosteroids do that :P). This foundation has been amazing! I got this as part of the Get Started Kit, and this is the first combination has cleared my skin up without irritating it. On top of that, it looks great, natural, feels light and offers buildable coverage without getting cakey. The SPF is a huge bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation in Fair/#1 for about 10 years. I like to try new products here and there to see what the hype is about, but nothing delivers as well as Bare Minerals. I use it with the original Mineral Veil, and could not be happier. I apply the veil before and after the foundation, and that helps it last all day in harsh/hot/humid weather. I love how it blends like a cream into my skin and gives a youthful/healthy glow. I have sensitive skin and this has never irritated my skin or clogged my pores. Perfect formula, perfect product.

Great foundation - the best and easiest I've ever used. My esthetician loves what it does for my congested skin. My only negative is that I hate the new packaging! Although it does keep the minerals stable during travel, you can't remove the cover and transfer product from one to another. It also makes it impossible to use all the product when you get to the bottom. I say go back to the original packaging!
Totally recomend! Super light feeling, good coverage and good price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the bareMinerals line. This foundation is great. You can layer it for buildable coverage, and it has enough SPF to protect my fair skin during the day. Sometimes if my skin is super dry, it will flake, but I've found that if you use the primer or extra moisturizer ( I like Clinique Moisture Surge Gel), it usually helps.
I like this makeup. I mix in a little with my medium beige and I look like I have a tan...great for summer because it is in powder form rather than liquid.
I have had great experiences with this product, good for sensitive skin, coverage is nice and natural, overall great long term cosmetic.
The best and most gentle foundation I've ever used!
As always will never trust another foundation to have the coverage I need!!
light weight, awesome coverage. I'm allergic to a lot of products that go on my face but this is the best stuff ever1

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I do love this stuff. I've been using it for years. It creates the most natural, flawless look. I must say though, after years of usage, for some reason I began to have a bit of an allergic reaction to it. I'm not sure if this is because I had switched to the matte version, or the brushes I used, or what. I would get very red and tingly not long after applying the powder. I stopped using it for a few years, and went with a different liquid brand, but gave bM another try recently and it works just as marvelously as before. No signs of irritation yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The original foundation is just the best, so easy to apply & covers well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A few years ago I odered the bare minerals starter kit and was instantly in love. The only problem I had was that the shades they offered did not match my skin tone. Then finally I discovered the Golden Medium and bam I have found my shade. It is so perfect it blends perfectly, covers effectively, and doesn't make me look gray and washed out like the beige based colors they offer. Needless to say this is the only make up I use for my face along with warmth for some color. Best product ever!

EXCELLENT PRODUCT! Once I started using this foundation, I haven't been satisfied using anything else. It's been about 4 years now. It doesn't feel or look heavy, and gives your skin a nice glow with a good amount of coverage even though it's sheer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Though after using this my face had a slightly powdery look, I can't complain since it got rid of all my acne! In only a month or so of using this daily my acne, which was all over my face (cheeks, jawline, chin, nose, and forehead) and chest, I only had 1 spot on my cheek! Thanks bareMinerals ;) also the foundation made my skin look and feel extremely smooth! So glad I purchased this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for about 8 years. I check out newer foundations from time to time just to make sure there isn't something better out there but I keep coming back to this one because it's so flexible. If you can't find the perfect shade for your skin, you can mix a couple to create the exact tone you need which means that you always have the shade you need all year long. You can also build coverage so it goes from sheer to full coverage depending on your application. And it melts into your skin within an hour and lasts all day (if you use the mineral veil) so you have flawless natural looking skin without reapplication. I use the golden tan shade and the tinted mineral veil (regular mineral veil looks ashy if you have warm tones in your skin). Also, using this foundation greatly reduced skin breakouts.
I always love this stuff, great coverage. Just wish it wasn't so chalky

I've tried several mineral powder foundations and this has been my favorite. The cool medium beige matches my skin pretty close. The coverage is buildable. It has a slight sheen to it but still looks natural. It doesn't make my skin look flawless... Can still see the larger pores on my nose. But it makes a big improvement in my completion. It does not last all day on my oily skin so I usually have to touch up 2 to 3 times throughout the day. However, it has better staying power than any others I've tried. Still on the lookout for my HG of foundations.
Love this foundation! It feels like your aren't even wearing it which is amazing. I love all of bareMinerals line.
I've been using this product for several years. Looks very natural, compliments my skin tone. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was very impressed with how smooth and creamy this felt going on, with excellent coverage! This feeling did not last however.. My skin became EXTREMELY oily within an hour.. tried it with and without primer, water-based moisturizer, oil-based moisturizer, nothing seemed to make it stay!! Very disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased a starter kti & fell in love with BE. Great coverage for everyday wear.
I may try alot of different lipsticks, eyeshadows, and mascara, but this is my staple foundation. Love the coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely am in love with the entire Bare Minerals collection. A few months ago, I decided to invest in a starter kit, thinking I would just give it a shot. I didn't think I would love it, but at least I could say I had tried. The Bare Minerals Original Foundation is PERFECT for me. It gives me just the right amount of coverage. It is weightless, yet evens my skin tone nicely. I look like I am not wearing makeup at all - I just have beautiful, flawless skin when wearing the Original Foundation!  My advice to anyone trying Bare Minerals for the first time: watch the DVD they send, and watch some tutorials on YouTube for great hints about how to use the makeup in the best way.

reviews.review_title: Perfect just like other Bare Minerals
reviews.review_text: Great color for my light golden skin color. I have blonde hair, light skin and green eyes. I am 1/4 native american so I do have golden undertones. This foundation is perfect. I sometimes switch and always come back to this stuff. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My rosacea and/or acne has improved dramatically since I started using Bare Minerals 6 months ago. It provides a great coverage without looking like you have makeup on. It is really a one-of-a-kind makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love it, it's just the right coverage for me. I like that there is SPF 15 in it as well. The only thing I don't like is the amount I waste putting it on and it always seems to get on my counters since it is loose powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only started wearing makeup after giving this a shot, and now I won't wear any makeup without this foundation! It feels so comfortable and natural that I forget it's even on my skin. It doesn't look heavy or flaky, and it stays on even in the hot Louisiana sun. I always finish it off with a light dusting of the Mineral Veil, just to give my face a smoother, more finished look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Bare Escentuals foundation. It is the only makup I need. About 3 years ago I tried the Bare Escentuals line and was hooked. Have not tried produce from this line that I have not been happy with.

reviews.review_title: Feels Like I am Wearing Nothing!
reviews.review_text: I love Bare Minerals-have used this for 2 years and it is so light and easy to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this for years.. Great coverage, natural looking and long lasting. I get compliments, I tell them its BareMinerals ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Sephora's employee. The sample size is very small, but it also comes with a tiny brush. I use this product after finishing on applying the liquid foundation (MAKE UP FOR EVER or MISSHA BB CREME). It just perfects the look on my face. I do not use this by itself because I don't think this would cover my flaw. But, it is great for the finishing. I might purchase the product later.

I switched from MAC Studio Finish Powder and I'm really happy with this product. The fair neutral shade really blends well on my skin tone and gives an effect of a glow that i never had with the MAC powder. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it does tend to wear off towards the end of the day and sometimes is a bit noticeable in oily spots.
I get terrific coverage and stay power. I use as a conceler and foundation. I love that it doesn't transfer to my clothes. Been using this product for five years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first foundation and i love it. It works very well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing foundation since I was 15 years old, and with everything I've tried, bare minerals has to be the best product out there. I have an oily t-zone with dry cheeks, so liquid foundation would look oily quite quickly. Bare minerals makes my skin glow, and I've gotten a ton of compliments since I've started wearing it! I'd encourage anyone to try this product out.
I've only been using this product for a week but so far so good!! I live in Florida and even with the heat and humidity the coverage is vvery good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: when i first started using bare minerals foundation, i loved that it matched my skintone perfectly, and didn't make my skin break out (my skin is horribly sensitive and acne prone). however, as i started using it, i looked literally like a powdered-sugar doughnut - cakey and too white. also, as soon as i would sweat in the slightest, the product would wear off. don't get me started on how messy the container is when i would open it every morning... basically, get this product for the great choice in skin tones and good match for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: You were warned... You can do better.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bareminerals is a very adequate product. But be prepared to settle if you have an oily complection. I have been a loyal customer to bareminerals foundation for almost a year now, however, bareminerals isn't all that it portrays itself to be on tv, advertisements, and in the over enthusiastic sales associates that pressure you to buy these products. The make up itself can deliver the ever elusive full coverage at a moderate price, BUT if you have an oily complexion, I'd advice you to look elsee where. Flawless makeup is possible, and I never advice women too settle for anything less than what they're worth. This is probably phenomenal for those of dry or normal complexion, but if you're oily, try makeup forever.
I love this...i put this on after my foundation and it looks beautiful!!

i love it! it has an easy too use vibe about it. THe twist-lock cap is really cool. If you add lotion too it you can use it as concealer and the people in the store helped me a lot with it. It's best used with there primer and some lotion.

I bought the starter pack of bareMinerals after having a store associate show me which shade matched my skin tone and how to apply it.  This is without a doubt one of the best skin products I have purchased - not only does the set include everything I need to start, but the price was great for the number of products! I have been getting compliments from friends who have not seen me for some time asking what I am doing differently! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the best foundation on the planet. I have tried everything and always go back to bare minerals!

It just doesn't get any better than this. I used Fairly Light during the winter, but now with a touch of sun, Medium is perfect. I suggest ALL women use Bare Minerals... with the complete kit. It has worked wonders for my complection. I always say...ALL women should wear makeup...you just shouldn't be able to tell! Here's the answer girls!

I waited a while to try this foundation because i don't like the way powder looks on my face. But I'm always on the lookout for a good foundation with spf that my skin can tolerate. I am pale with very sensitive combination skin. I have to stay this product lived up to the hype. It doesn't look powdery and it does seem to actually improve my skin. I have had many disappointments over the years b/c of my difficult skin but I'm giving this one a thumbs up.

I have tried multiple foudnations and always come back to bare. When I mix Medium Beige and Medium together I get the perfect shade for my skin tone. I find it a lot easier to mix together than other foundations. Super easy to put in a smaller container & take with me on vacations & quick weekend trips.

I like to use liquid foundation on my face (oily skin), but I hate the makeup lines, especially on the acne/acne scars I have along my jaw line. I like to use this for my chin, since it looks very natural. I still have a hard time using this on the rest of my face, though since I have a very oily T-zone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, one of my favorites in my makeup case!

I used this before and stopped. I don't even know why. I went back and I noticed a significant change in my skin! I tried anti acne make-up, but it did a poor job of covering up my blemishes and I really believe it made my skin worse. Paired with my current skin regimen, I have noticed a huge difference in my skin! It's softer and I see my skintone improving. I'll never go back!
Same as the one in the starter kit. Perfecto!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought the foundation a month ago and still have mixed feelings about it. I have oily skin and noticed this didn't help a lot with the oil. I do like the lightweight formula, just wish it helped reduce oil and had a little more coverage. I do use the concealer with the foundation and I am IN LOVE with that.

reviews.review_title: My First, My Last, My Everything
reviews.review_text: I began using bareMinerals when I was 15, looking to hide those blossoming skin imperfections. After 5 years of flawless skin and amazing compliments, I decided to mix it up and try the matte version. The matte version kind of dulled me out and lost the luster the original version gave my skin. I decided to try something besides bareMinerals for the first time and was directed to Lauren Mercier's Mineral Powder Foundation. It looked ok in the store however, after a month I was getting itchy on my jaw line, routinely getting pimples and looking faded. Which is why I have finally returned to bareMinerals. Within a few days of re-buying, the compliments have returned as has my flawless skin (even after I take off my makeup for the day!). I made the mistake to stray once, and will never again! It is truly my favorite piece of makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this foundation for over 4 years and still love it. I don't like wearing traditional liquid foundations and this is wonderful at evening out my skin tone.
I was introduced to Bare escentials when I came in looking for a light sheer tinted moisturizer. I love how it can be light or full coverage. Been using BE for 2 years now and love it!

I've been using this foundation for 10 years now and it works great! It's super light weight; it feels like you're not wearing any makeup. That was the one thing I had to get used to when I switched from a liquid foundation by Clinque. With B.E.'s foundation you don't feel like you're wearing a mask. And it does cover! You decide how much coverage you want by how much you buff. I'm guilty of sleeping in my makeup sometimes without washing my face before I got to bed. I don't have to worry about it clogging my pores and giving me pimples or blackheads. It's safe to sleep in! I highly recommend it. You'll never go back to your old foundation! Make the switch.
This is my first and last make up brand i will ever purchase! great product i have a uneven skin tone and this is great! i love that it last all day.

I must be the only one that does not like bareminerals. It sat weird on my skin and settled into lines (I'm still in my teens!) It did not seem to last very long either - I had to reapply during the day, even if I used a primer and finishing powder. Maybe it's just not for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. I spot treat with a concealer and add this all over. It gives a slight sparkle and a wonderful glow to your skin. As long as you know how to apply it, it has great coverage as well.

Hey Everyone =) DOES anyone want A $25 Sephora GIFT CARD? I had bought a set of this a few years back and was sorta iffy about whether I really liked it. But I decided to give it another go since my skin has been a little more dry and the liquid foundation always seems to stifling. And I have really enjoyed using it the past 2 weeks. I'm glad they finally redesigned the container so it doesn't leak out when it's in a makeup bag and I really appreciated the help getting the right shade this time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is extremely wearable, long-lasting, and natural. Incredibly silky!
I've been using this product for quite a while, but this new container doesn't seem to have the same coverage as the last one.
I love the no-spill container and absolutely love how the product wears! I no longer use liquid foundations!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've always had a hard time finding makeup that was the right color and right weight. I absolutely LOVE this product. The color is just right and application is quite simple. If I use the kabuki brush, it looks airbrushed without any weight on my face. I will continue to buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time im using bare minerals...i do love this product. it easy to use, easy to put in your purse and easy to apply. i recommend this to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Provides GREAT coverage. Really covers up and evens out my skin. I use a light sweep unless I'm having a bad skin day, then I applyl more - it's very easy to layer and increase coverage. I like that it has SPF, so it makes me feel good about reapplying/touching up.

Love love love this product! It never makes my sensitive skin break out. BUT the service I received at sephora that day was sub par to say the least that I almost walked out of the store without buying anything

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally tried this foundation instead of the Matte version because I have combination skin and didn't think the oiliness would be a problem. However, it was a BIG problem, as this foundation made the oily parts of my face look even worse. I'd recomend that anyone with any oiliness try the bareMinerals Matte foundation, as I use that now and it works MUCH better.

I love this foundation. It leaves a beautiful natural finish but the effect doesn't last long. It doesn't wear well in warm, humid weather - it melts and cakes in heat. But I love it for the cooler months as long as you re-apply!

This product is great. the Original is better for those with drier skin. i had originally gotten the Matte formula and it made me look cakey (just a little tip in case you may have wondered). also, it doesn't look like you are wearing makeup and even if you have a blemish or a breakout, all you need a little and it covers. and it really did make my skin feel and look better!  however...  it had the tendency to rub off on my clothes or on hands if my eye itched or something. if i cried (or drops of water get in my face) or let's say i hugged someone and my face touched a part of their clothing, it would easily come off :(.  other than that, this makes your skin look so radiant and smooth, in pictures and in person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical of this product and definitely hesitant on trying it, especially since I've had issues in the past of finding a foundation that does NOT make me break out (even with it saying its hypoallergenic). And promises of my skin looking better after using it? Impossible! But so true... I have had fewer breakouts and my skin looks better! I am in love with this foundation and I never want to use anything else!

reviews.review_title: Doesn't live up to the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start by saying that this isn't a bad mineral foundation, I just think that there are better products out there. For the amount of attention this foundation gets, I really wish it had delivered better for me. The coverage was okay and they did have a good color match for me but it made any dry areas on my face stand out (even with a moisturizer or a primer on first). I know this is a personal preference but I didn't enjoy the way it feels like a powder at first and then starts to feel more like a cream foundation after it's been on for a minute.  I do want to mention my biggest plus for this foundation is that it never made me breakout or have any irritation. My advice would be to shop around before investing in this product.
The ONLY foundation out there that doesn't clog my pores!

Ok, so although I rated this product 4 stars I will not be purchasing it again. Simply because I am dark skinned and the product made me look like I had a tan- which I did not need! I do think the sephora girls matched me correctly but the product just has a warm glow to it which fair skinned girls might love but darker tones will not. It gives even coverage, doesn't settle into lines and is not drying. I think the quality of the product is excellent.
I love this foundation. I've been using it for years and won't use anything else. Love it, Love it, Love it!

reviews.review_title: Great make up...lasts a long time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for 4 years now and I refuse to switch to anything else
I get asked all the time, What do you do to get that perfect, flawless look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage! Makes my skin look flawless, while so natural it doesn't look like I'm wearing anything.
Great coverage and light feeling. It's like you wearing no makeup at all. Makes our skin look radiant.
I love bareMinerals. The powder blends nicely with my skin and doesn't clog my pores.
Works so well I just keep coming back.
I've been using this for years now and it is simply amazing. Does not make my face break out and looks very natural.

Love this makeup. It always makes my skin feel great, and Ive not had near as much skin issues since I started using it three years ago. There is no buildup, and it doesnt look like you're even wearing anything.

I love this make up. It goes on great and it isn't heavy at all. It hardly looks like I'm wearing anything at all. However, I really believe that each step in the system is imperative. The primer makes everything go on smoother and I find I can use less make up with it. The bronzer is great and the mineral veil makes everything look perfectly blended. Lovely make up.
Great foundation, have used it for years. I've tried other less expensive brands, but always come back to this one.

I had hopes really up for this foundation, but it all went down when I started to use this. The foundation sticked to one place and it was impossible to smoothly apply all over the face.
