Right away I also noticed, how this product made my face feel sticky and uncomfortable. It also didn't make my skin look any better than without makeup. I might try out the matte version...
Completely dependable!
I HAVE USED $5.99 HAIR CONDITIONER THAT IS BETTER THAN THIS $24.00 OVERPRICED ITEM. IT DOES NOTHING FOR CONDITIONING YOUR HAIR..VERY WATERED DOWN PRODUCT WITH NO RESULTS!! VERY DISSAPOINTED!

So amazing for sensitive skin. Its the only foundation I can wear everyday that doesn't irritate my skin or cause a reaction. Feels really light, like your skin can breathe. Doesn't cover enough for photos, but good for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was first introduced to bareMinerals by a friend and I fell in love with the whole company. It covers so well for it to be so light of coverage. I have really sensitive skin and this really helped my skin and didn't break me out in fact it probably helped my skin. It's also really good for oily/combination skin because since it is a powder it will help soak up some of the oil. Overall a good product. I gave 4 stars due to it not being a heavy coverup. It didn't cover as a full coverage foundation, and I felt I had to reapply it a couple times through the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not a powder foundation girl. I prefer my liquid foundations but I will not deny that this isn't an amazing powder foundation. It is very fine powder so it doesn't look cakey (which is very important to me). It also has very decent coverage for a powder. I don't wear it that often because I'm not a huge fan of loose powder foundations but I will say that if you are someone who loves powder foundation, this is as good as it's going to get. Just find a great kabuki/buffing brush and buff it into your skin, it leaves a pretty luminous finish for a powder so you still look natural. I'd think this would be pretty great for oily or combination skin although the product might separate on your face if you are too oily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product since my senior year of high school and have never gotten tired of it! I have always just bought kits and have never purchased the foundation by itself. I wonder is this bigger than the kit size? I love the way it makes my skin feel and look and would recommend to every woman under the sun. Bare Essentials has a wide range of awesome products and this is definitely number one on my list!

reviews.review_title: Love the product, hate the container
reviews.review_text: I miss the old containers without the lock and go. The product gets stuck on the sides in between the jar and the shaker and unlike the old ones, you cannot remove the shaker part to get the rest of the product out so you end up wasting product. Not impressed. Wish we could choose which one we wanted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes me shiny and makes my pores look enormous. Also, it smears on the screen of my phone. Gross.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: did not fall in love with bare escentuals bareminerals spf 15 foundation...I felt as though it was chalky and did not give good coverage. It wasn't long-wearing either, which is definitely a problem to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: What can I say about this foundation? Its amazing. I have been using it everyday for the last 5 or 6 years! This was the first makeup I ever used and it will probably be the last! I love this foundation because I deeply despise liquid foundations, so this works perfectly for me! love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this foundations with low expectations, but i wanted it because I have been breaking out with almost every foundation i have tried recently. I got color matched, and i really liked the way it looked, because the woman put it on over top of the smashbox bb cream (which i should have bought but didnt at the time :( ) i took it home and the colour was very nice, but i dont like how my skin looks in pictures with it on, and how it looks in general. covered well and stayed on for a long time...i just dont like the look of it

I have worn this on and off since high school. Love the way it makes my skin look at first, but the product does not stay on. Mind you, I work 12 hour days and get rather sweaty. It also makes me face ich when the weather gets warmer.
This is a great product if you prefer powder foundations.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for problems with red skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product looks very natural on. It also does a great job at covering up any redness in my complexion. Also it really doesn't take much so it last quite a while. Really the only bad thing I can say about this is it doesn't do much for my dark under eye circles. That said it also doesn't settle into my eye creases, so that's great! I will continue buying this product and just get a good concealer for my dark circles :)

reviews.review_title: Great, but not for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It's soooo natural and makes your face look as if you don't have any make up on. However, I have oily skin. I feel like this foundation brings out the oil in my skin. Other than that this foundation is perfect. I really have to try the Matte foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just turned 34 and needed a new make up to take better care of my skin, prevent wrinkles and not look caked on and THIS IS IT! I feel like my skin is clean, fresh, it lasts all day without smudging and takes a quick brush across my face to frshen up to go out at night. AMAZING AMAZING

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly was so relectant to try this but I am so glad that I did. I started using it because I knew I had to find a product with SPF that I could put on anytime during the day. Moisturizer and foundation wouldn't do so I got this.  So happy that I continued to use it because at first it did make my skin break out but that is completely normal in any product that is suppose to clear your skin. Your skin needs to purge all the crud before the beautifulness comes out.  I love this over Diorflash airbrush make up even and that stuff is 3 times more expensive. I kept using it during special occaions but have now realized that this ultimately just looks better in pictures since it has such a flawless finish. I will always use this and have given up foundation forever.  Use it over some Smashbox primer and you're good to go. On special occasions and on Saturday party nights, I will use the make up forever HD High Def powder to set it and it lasts all night (just a little oil blotting an hour or two in).  Just overall great coverage, thankful for the SPF, and looks amazing in pictures. Even used this before my very first half marathon and by the end of the race I had about 30 pictures of just me sprinting and I still looked great :)... hey, just sayin (here's the pic to prove it!)  Just love, love, LOVE!!

reviews.review_title: The Best Foundation a Girl could dream of!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a loyal BE user for 8 years. Before BE I used a matte finish liquid foundation. Loved the finish of my matte foundation, but hated the way it made my skin feel. I tried several different liquids (from drugstore to high end) before discovering BE.  A few months ago I decided to try to the matte finish BE foundation. Big mistake for me! I have combo oily/dry skin. The matte finish looked caky. And it seemed to age me. I missed the dewy glow that the original formula gives me. Now that I'm no longer 20 something I don't need help looking older.  About a week ago I went back to Sephora and purchased the original formula again. I have received a lot of compliments on my skin this past week! Everyone tells me that I look younger and wants to know what my secret is. I love that I can build up coverage or I can use it to just even out my skin tone. It's gentle and does not irritate my dry areas of my face.

I've used bareMinerals for 2 years, because I'm afraid that liquid foundations will ruin my skin. The Matte foundation looks natural and evens out my face, but it does not cover redness or blemishes. This is only good for people who already have good skin. Now, the minerals help cover the oil from my oily T-zone. This product is water resistant and does not need a primer. This is the only SPF that doesn't break me out, but SPF 15 hardly offers protection against the sun (trust me, I've done science experiments with SPF). Overall, if you have good skin and need something light for every day, this is for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for almost 5 years and I will probably continue to use it for as long as they make it. I wear it under the Smashbox BB cream or by itself. I love that you can build the coverage without looking too powdered down. The only gripe I have about this product is it isn't long wearing. I have to do touch-ups every 5-6 hours because I have combination-oily skin. Other than that, I have hardly any break-outs from this foundation and I love the SPF 15. It's great to begin caring for your skin at an early age!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation I will ever use. It feels great on my skin, doesn't make me break out, AND has SPF coverage. I was recommended to use this by my dermatologist after having a biopsy on my face, because it is safe to wear and wont interfere with the healing process. I don't even need to use concealer with this product, because it works so well. It never looks chalky like other mineral makeups, and I get complements on my complexion ALL the time. LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this as a teenager....I had very difficult skin and this was the only product at a decent price point that didn't give me reaction. I've grown out of just powder foundations but I still rely on this as a finishing touch and setting powder...or for the days i dont feel like doing a full coverage face

I've been using Bare Minerals foundation for about 7 years now and I've never turned away from it. Its so light weight, but still covers up blemishes so well. This was the beginning of my love with all Bare Escentuals products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best mineral foundation out there. I have been using this product since 2006. I have tried other mineral foundations and they do not add up.

reviews.review_title: Best thing to happen to me!
reviews.review_text: I love my bareMinerals foundation..I struggled for years with liquid makeup and now this is simple and feels great on the skin....make sure you get an oil control lotion if you have an oily complexion.

reviews.review_title: Love this product but not the packaging
reviews.review_text: I hate to say this, but as much as I love this makeup, I am very tired of getting loose powder all over my clothes. I have been using Bare Minerals for 5 years. When I first started using their products, you could control the amount of powder which came out of the container by poking small holes in the paper covering. Now, there is this cumbersome plastic tab to tear off of every product--I have needed my husband's help to remove it. Once removed, it is difficult to control the amount of powder which gets shaken out of the container during regular use. It almost seems like I am being forced to waste it.  Like I said in the intro, the product is great, but I actually might buy something else from time to time in a more user-friendly container.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation. At first, i didnt care too much for it, but once I applied the prime time foundation primer, it made all the difference. You have to layer to get the coverage you want, but I find that with the primer, I don't even need that much. The color blends perfectly with my skin tone. will now be the only foundation that I use.

reviews.review_title: Possibly the BEST foundation out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this foundation for years -- since it came out, even. I have tried every other new foundation as well (I'm definitely THE consumer that gets sucked into trying the new stuff), but I always come back to this. It does take some getting used to if you are a newbie, but seriously, it provides as much coverage as you want or need, it lasts for hours (especially if you use a primer, which I do because my skin is so oily), and it washes off completely with soap and water. Not to mention, it has sunscreen in it, which I have put to the test (I burn very easily)! I really like using Benefit's Erase Paste to cover redness, blemishes, or blotchy spots first, then top everything off with this. My only complaint is (as with ANY foundation I have found) that I am super fair, and the lightest shade is still not completely right -- so I mix in a little of my favorite transparent loose powder or even the Mineral Veil is okay. And I definitely love the new packaging of this foundation, with the twist-top -- a lot less messy and certainly less wasteful! Awesome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the only foundation i'll use! I've been using bareminerals since i was in middle school, and i love it. it lasts all day, and just kind of melts into your skin so it looks like you're not wearing any make up at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only thing I will wear on my face now because I love it so much. I first purchased the getting started kit and ran out the small foundation so I reordered right away. It makes my skin tone so even and I can't even tell I'm wearing makeup, which is important to me. I don't want to feel the heaviness of foundation nor do I want to see the cakiness of it and this product is just perfect for what I want in a foundation. Worth every single penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used the foundation for a while and it does what I need it to do, but I've moved on and no longer use it. It gives sheer coverage and makes my skin look like I don't have any makeup on at all.

I really really love Bare Minerals. I used this foundation in Fairly Medium. Before I used this I had terrible looking skin and this has truly changed my skin for the better. It's oil free, creamy feeling, and goes on very smooth without settling into fine lines around my eyes and mouth. Over time it has evened out my skintone. Unfourtunately this would settle into my pores even with the Prime Time face primer. It made me break out after using it for a long time even though before it didn't bother me at all. I also found that it no longer covered the way I really wanted it to. It's too sheer and I really wanted something that would cover more. I don't really find that it's buildable either. It also wasn't long wearing either. It would basically just come off after about 3-4 hours of light sweat. I now just use this as a touch up instead of my foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It gives me the natural look I feel best in and smooths and brightens my complexion. It lasts all day and feels great. It does a good job of keeping shine under control, even at that time of the month when my skin gets more oily than usual. I used Urban Decay's mineral foundation for a while but it had a weird smell I couldn't get past. It didn't brighten like this foundation, either. I came back to BE and couldn't be happier.

I've been using this foundation for years and it is truly wonderful. I shake my head at the girls at my college who pile on thick, caky liquid foundation, I think it's a terrible look and I try to avoid looking like that. Wearing Bareminerals, I've had many people compliment me on my skin, some even ask if I'm wearing makeup at all because this product is so light and airy but still provides the perfect amount of coverage for blemishes and uneven skin tone. I am very pale and used to use fairly light but realized it was too orange for me. I switched to fair and it is perfect. No orange tones, just a beautiful, milky light color which is the perfect match for my skin. This last all day when set with the mineral veil. Be sure to moisturize before you put it on though, because it won't work properly on dry, flaky skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: This product provides excellent coverage and is definitely build-able. Just use a kabuki brush and apply it all over the face and you're done! Its a super quick and super easy foundation application. Another pro is the packaging-- it allows you to dispense as much or as little product you want. Also it paraben free... etc. So its better for your skin that some other foundations/powders out there.  Cons: I have combination skin-- my t-zone tends to be much more oilier than the rest of my face. I find that this product doesn't work too well on the oilier parts of my face-- it tends to settle into pores and run. Also, when using this product, stay away from water! Water can easily cause streaking. This goes with sweat as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my terrible, acne prone skin is transformed into a flawless, natural looking complexion thanks to Bare Minerals. I have been using BM for over 7 years and I've tried other mineral make ups but I always come back to this one. The Golden Fair shade is a very light shade with warm, yellow undertones. It's perfect if you have fair but olive skin like I do without a tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did a lot of research for wedding day makeup and decided on my daily favorite, Bare Minerals. People say it will turn you 'white' in professional photos, but it did not with me. I used the Ready Veil throughout the day to keep me shine-free. My skin look natural and flawless.

reviews.review_title: The only foundation that I will wear
reviews.review_text: Bare Escentuals foundation is the only foundation that I will wear. I've tried many different liquid types and I absolutely hate the way liquid foundation looks and feels on my face.  This foundation gives my face a pretty flawless look. I'd say that I go light with the application unless I have a nasty looking blemish. I always pre-moisturize and prime before applying the foundation in a circular motion.  The foundation feels like I have nothing on my face. My face never feels gritty, dirty, or gross. It doesn't make my skin breakout or cause any visible damage.  I've used this both with and without the mineral veil. The mineral veil gives my face a lovely glow but sometimes I question if it makes my face look unnaturally perfect.  I'm extremely happy with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It took a while for this to grow on me. I tried the matte one first,. and did not like that one at all, so I was very hesitant in trying the original formula. It was too bad I didn't try this one first before the matte one, because everything I hated about the matte one I love in this. The matte formula felt heavy on my face, and creased in lines I never knew I had. The biggest thing I look for in a foundation is that it feels light on my face. This was definitely that, no matter how much of it I put on. Normally I wear sheer coverage, just enough to even out my skin tone. I don't really need much more than that. This does a fantastic job, and the finish is a beautiful glow. I was worried that this would make my face shiny and look overly done (I had a friend who wore this and it looked awful. Maybe it was something she wore with it) but the end result is that my face looks amazing. Fresh and dewy (I never thought a powder foundation could give me a dewy look!). Here's the best kicker: when I drink alcohol, my face gets beet red. One time I decided to try and cover it up with this. Holy moly, did it ever cover. FULL COVERAGE ON A FULL RED FACE. The best part, alcohol dehydrates your skin, and normally anything I put on top of my face after having some alcohol in me results in the nastiest foundation application but this never settles into any lines, or accentuate any dryness. Would buy this over and over (but one container lasts so long I don't need to worry about that for a while)

reviews.review_title: Great product, so easy to use!
reviews.review_text: I've been using Bare Minerals foundation for 5+ years and could never go back to liquid foundation. This is so easy to apply. I would like to let the packaging engineers know that I do not care for the new container. Admittedly it is great for travel because you can close the spout to reduce spillage...however I find it very difficult for everyday use. I used to be able to get a little product above the holes on the container side, now I have to sprinkle product into the cap but can't find a way to get only what I need onto the brush! So I wind up using much more than I need on my face--ick. I am only one week into the new packaging so maybe I will get the hang of it, but I preferred the old packaging where I put my brush in the container and used the lid to swirl before applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have had trouble for the last 8 years finding a foundation that doesn't make me white, pink or orange. This foundation matches my skin tone perfectly! My only issue is that I have dry skin, espeically on my nose, and the foundation drys my face out even more. I have to use plenty of moisturizer and a moisturizing non-greasy primer/base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this was the greatest thing for the first 3 months I used it. It is a great alternative to makeup -- it has amazing coverage, gives you this pearlized glow, and is actually healthy for your skin.  I was convinced it was the greatest thing since sliced bread.  Until I used liquid foundation again one night. And marvelled at how moist and dewy my skin looked. This is good, everyday wear that I would use for going to the gym, hiking, running errands -- but it just does not compare to liquid foundation when you really want to look good.  As a point of comparison, I wore it when I went out hiking for a friend, and she commented that my skin didn't look as good as usual. Nothing like the bluntness of a good friend...  Again, I think it has its place, but right now I think BB creams are just as healthy and much nicer look -- but I will say this is still a good option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Love Love the coverage that I get with bare Minerals....I also appreciate that the product is long wearing and it feels as if I am not wearing make-up :)

A lot of foundations or makeup/concealers look cakey or unnatural. this product makes my skin look flawless and gives a natural glow. it looks great in pictures. i was worried with the loose powder it wouldn't do as good a job covering up blemishes but its great and it doesnt clog my pores! however it depends on your skin color type. It worked wonders for me but my sister tried it and she said it looked unnatural on her skin
Staple in my makeup bag, can't do without it.
I've been using this foundation since you could only buy it from infomercials! Great for sensitive skin.

I love the bareMinerals Foundation. It goes on smooth & easy, it's the only make-up that doesn't promote break-outs on me & the only make-up I can forget to wash off before going to bed! I've read reviews where some say it doesn't work with their older skin but it does mine!
This does cover well and look natural and luminous on younger people, but I wouldn't reccomend for anyone over 25 because it makes skin look old and dry.

reviews.review_title: Lots of compliments on my skin
reviews.review_text: I love Bare Mineral products. You never know how closely someone is looking at your skin until they pay you that compliment your skin is so smooth. I've received several and I'm actually shocked. My cousin wanted to know what I was wearing.

As much as I would want to have all my skincare and makeup be from the same brand, I can never find anything better than Bare Escentuals foundation. The convenience and lack of build-up look is ideal. My boyfriend has bought me my last two so it is super easy for someone to go pick it up for you too.
very natural looking, long lasting, only need a little of the product so it goes a long way. Best foundation I have ever used.

I love this foundation, the color fits my skin perfect and it makes me looks like me and that I'm not trying to cover who I am up. The coverage is pretty great, once you learn how to apply it . I love the fact that I could sleep in this and I wouldn't have to worry, it also hasn't made my teenage skin breakout which I love! It's very natural if you like the look of caked makeup , this isn't the foundation for you.

I love this product and love it even more with a primer I don't need to reapply with a primer. I'm glad I went into the store they helped me get the right color. I have been wearing one too light. If you can go in to match your color. Aloha
I use everyday. I think it's the best foundation I have ever tried. Keeps my skin balanced never had a problem with breakouts.

This is a good foundation. Just good. Not great, because it doesn't get the coverage i would like. I can layer and layer and layer, and it doesn't help that much. It is light, hasn't caused my skin to break out, etc, but I will probably not go back to this.

As much as I appreciate all the lovely in-store helpers at Sephora, I think I'm not a bareMinerals gal. This is the 3rd time I've tried it - different tint every time and it's just not for me. It does not have amazing coverage, it is not a smooth finish, and it's not what I expected.

This is one of the best makeups that I have ever used. The reason that I like it is it allows for flaws to visible just not noticeable. It is never thick or mask like. However if you want quick 100% coverage this may not be the product for you. It does take time to master the application technique and the layering process to cover flaws.
great Bare minerals makeup!n

I have tried to stray from this brand but always come back because it is the best for me! I have a port wine stain birthmark on my cheek and this foundation provides me with full coverage without a concealer.

I love this product! I have tried at least 20 different foundations and this one causes the least amount of break outs. It is a bit expensive but for me it is worth it. The color matches and the only downfall that like all other powders it can be a little bit messy (aka some powder falls on counter when applying it )

I had gotten away from Bare Minerals as i felt its was making my face, cakey, and settling into my fine lines and wrinkles.. but this time i bought the primer and what a different it makes....NO longer cakey and I had switched to Clinque liquid makeup. which just seemed look mask like and broke my skin out. My husband suffers from rosasea and I applied some of the minerals to the areas and they were gone in a day!!!

I bought this at the sephora store at my local mall because all of the great reviews on here. It makes my face look way to cakey. I've only used this product twice. I wasted that money for nothing. Doesn't work that great.

I really love this product. I have acne scars, and have blemishes most of the time. This foundation covers everything. It has a dewy finish, which I love. I also like to use it when my skin is broken out. One thing I don't like about it, and it's mostly because I have really oily skin. It slides off my face towards the end of the day if I don't touch it up. Also if you don't use some kind of primer, pores and fine lines are sometimes visible, but that's pretty normal with any powder foundation. I need to try the Bare Escentuals primer. Anyway, this is a great product that I keep in my collection at all times. I think I've gone through three containers of it.
Trusted, tried and true!
Ever since I started using Bare Escentuals, I have refused to use anything else.
this stuff settles in fine lines and large pores. also, don't use this if you have oily skin because the oil will make it run and your face will look dirty.

Wonderful product w/ only a few flaws, It goes on easily and stays for hours w/ a few touch ups. I don't like the design of the container because it doesn't allow you to use all of the make up. I feel I'm wasting approximately a weeks worth of coverage due to design of container. I've bought this product for 3 or 4 years and will continue to buy it.

I have been wanting to try bareMinerals since it first came out, but I was worried it wouldn't cover my uneven skintone... Love the coverage, I don't break out much but I have old acne scars that make my complexion splotchy. I can cover it all perfectly with this! So glow-y and natural looking! You can use smaller brush to conceal pimples, dark circles etc, it applies a heavier coat that way. Love it!! I'll never go back to liquid!

I never buy into the bandwagon thing, but seriously there is a reason why this is so popular. Nothing else can make your skin look this pretty. Period. And the more you blend (without adding too much product) the lovelier and more perfect and even it gets on your skin. When you think you're done blending, do another 10 seconds.
I've been using bareMinerals foundation for several years. I was tired of liquid makeup caking in my wrinkles. I love the coverage - not too heavy and highlights my natural skin color.
I like this foundation it blends well, it is extreamly light and it works extremely well with my pale completion.
I've used it for four years and won't use anything else
I'm new to this brand, but really liking how light it feels on my skin. Lasts most of the day.
I have used this product for over three years every day! I use this product over a tinted moisturizer. It is buildable and looks very natural. It makes my morning routine go very quickly.

i love this foundation!! its so light it doesnt feel like your wearing any at all. ive never been a fan of powder makeup so i always use liquid foundation. ive been using the kit for about a week and a half now and my skin is so much more clear! it goes on flawlessly and the coverage is awesome! i have a really hard time getting good foundation that matches my skin tone well since i have a very rosy complexion so most foundations come off looking too orange. this stuff is just amazing!! definitley recommen!

reviews.review_title: Couldn't love it more if I tried
reviews.review_text: I have acne-prone, combination, freckly skin, and this is the only product that reliably evens out my skin tone without making my skin problems worse. I can't wear sunscreen under my makeup because every one of them makes me break out - with this I don't have to. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE.

This powder foundation goes on so light and feels clean on my face. I use it heavier on my sun spots to cover them well, and it does not fee greasy or oily at all. The associate helped me select the perfect color match for my face. I don't always get it right and she was so helpfu.
It stays on for quite a long time and I really really liked the color and the coverage. It makes my skin a lot smoother and lighter. I love it :D

I too have noticed that I have to apply more powder. Also, it does not stay on like it used to. I use the primer by Bare Escentuals. That does not help. And....I still do not like the container. I started using Sephora minerals after BE came out with the new container which was hard to use and price went up with less powder. Sephora was great and then it was discontinued. So I had to go back to Bare Escentuals. I have to mix the first 2 colors and this is extremely difficult. I finally this morning took a small wire cutter and needle nose pliars and cut the top off to get the powder out to mix the two. PLEASE.....Bare Escentuals if you ever read these.....change the container and fix whatever has changed in the powder.

I first purchased this product a few years back, and loved it. I felt like it had light, yet excellent coverage and long staying power..but what has happened to this product? I bought it a while back and I feel like I have to load it on to provide any coverage (and I have good skin to begin with).Plus it literally disappears after a few hours. I come home and look in the mirror and not a speck is left. I purchased the primer in hopes of giving it some staying power..doesn't help. The only thing is that my face feels like an oil slick, yet the makeup is still gone....VERY DISAPPOINTED. Definitely will not be purchasing again ever.

I like how easy it goes on, but I feel it doesn't match my skin very well! I can get a flawless finish but not in my correct color! I think it gives me an orange finish! I don't like how it rubs off, and gets all over my clothes!! But it has helped my skin, that's the only reason I still use it!

Overall pretty good coverage and long wear. I wouldn't recommend if you have dry or flaky skin because it tends to crease and collect on imperfections in your skin. I use it over a cream foundation and it works pretty well but alone, I would not recommend for daily use.

I stopped using bare minerals for about a year and switched over to liquid foundation....I just started using it again and will never venture again! Within days my skin was free from breakouts. I have a little bit of redness to my skin and this foundation, even though it is a powder, covers any imperfection as well as liquid foundation. After i put it on, my skin feels like velvet. I also use the bare minerals bronzer in faux tan and if gives my skin radiance without it looking orange. Love love love this product and will never go back to liquid!
This is the best foundation I've ever used. I'm never going back to liquid.

I have been using bareMinerals original foundation for four years now. Something I have to say, is that moisturized skin is a must for this. You will get the best pay off and coverage with moisturized skin, applying this to a dry complexion is no good - I personally neglect primer, but don't seem to need it with this foundation. It is exceptionally blend-able and versatile. It will give your skin a natural look, and feel. No cakey-ness or greasiness. One of my complaints though (because I don't believe in a perfect product) is that in a humidity heavy environment, this foundation can increase shine dramatically so. That could be attributed to my combination skin type, or my neglect for a primer that helps keep things matte. If you're looking for more matte finish, try out bareMineral's matte foundation instead - some people really like it, I personally feel I do not get enough coverage with the matte.  Overall: I recommend this foundation for people who don't like applying heavy foundations, but want to even out their skin tone. It wears long, too!
That is a must for my make up. All the other make my skin itch, I feel that is on my face. But not this foundation, its great my skin can breathe plus I dont feel that I have it on at all

This is my second purchase of this product and I love it. I put off trying it for a long time, even though it got great reviews, because I didn't think a powder foundation would work on my then 48 year old, dry skin. I was wrong. This is the most natural-looking foundation I have ever used. It's completely buildable and never feels heavy. One of my all-time faves.
I just love this product. It works so great with my skin.

This stuff is the best makeup I have ever used. I love how light it is. It doesn't ruin my skin. I'm not sensitive to it at all. It evens out my skin tone perfectly and it lasts forever (with primer applied before application)

Ive been using bareMinerals powder for years! I tried to switch to a cheaper face powder but I HAD to go back to this! It evens my skin tone on my face and its very light so it doesn't look like I have a ton of make up on!

I love bare minerals! My face has never looked better. I prefer the shinyer type not the matte. It looks like it clogs my pores to much. But the spf 15 is great and the color choices are great for when I get a little darker in the summer!

Love the powder foundation and coverage achieved with light brushing; however, when I first bought this product, the interior top was removable so you could use every last little fleck. Now, the new container design doesn't allow you to use all of the product. I figure I could have another few days to a week of use if old design was still in use.

I've been using this product for a few years and really love it. Previous foundations did not match my skin color as well; this is exact match. It's also very easy on my very sensitive, thin skin (eczema prone). My skin has never looked better.

I love Bare Minerals, and so does my skin! However, this Medium Tan color makes me look like I went to the fake-n-bake. It's too bad, because the Medium is too light for me, and the next darker shade is too dark, so I had to leave Bare Minerals and go to another company for my foundation.

i was very pleased with the bareMinerals i purchased. I am a make-up addict and i have added this to my favorites. i purchced another one because i ordered fairly-medium and found it a little light but decided to keep it so i got medium and the two together are a perfect match. I like the coverage and it is very easy to use. The only thing i find wrong is i find it makes my pores look alittle more noticeable but i can live with that. I will purchase it again.

I work at a Sephora so I get to try a lot of different products. When it comes to BE foundation, I think it looks amazingly natural and it can go from a sheer coverage to a full coverage. If it can cover my red cheeks from rosacea, I know it has a good coverage. The only issue I found with it is that I noticed that on dry skin types, it tends to dry the skin out even more. So if you have dry skin you definately need a very hydrating moisturizer while using it.
Covers beautifully and looks like I don't have anything on.
I absolutely love that this product offers good coverage but feels really light weight as well!
Love, love, love this product! I get compliments on my skin all the time and this is the reason why.
Great coverage, easy to use, looks natural. This works better for me in warmer weather, sometimes the powder looks dull on parched winter skin.
My husband hates liquid foundation, so i went back to Bare Minerals. He loves the look and I love the way it feels on my skin. Bonus it give a nice healthy glow.

Far and away my new favorite foundation! I used to use Makeup Forever HD foundation... which is awesome but it's very full coverage and I wanted something lighter for spring/summer. Goes on very smoothly and looks 100% natural. Doesn't feel tight like other powder foundations. I'm so happy I bought this and only sad it took me so long to discover this!! My new beauty staple!

Bare Escentuals does a satisfactory job. It's not complete coverage by any means, but it does provide a thin layer of coverage to even out skin tone and still look natural. I use this OVER foundation to set. This color was too light for me but Bare Escentuals in general is a fine product.

reviews.review_title: this is the only foundation I will use
reviews.review_text: Goes on so naturally. blends perfectly.

I was dragged into purchasing this after seeing a commercial every three seconds on tv last summer. My acne had long gone and i needed something that would be light and easy to wear. At first it was great, i swiped it on and i was done! Then a few days after using it i started getting irritation and spots on my face. I stopped using it because i would need more coverage, my acne would then clear up, i went back to it, and more breakouts. I realized that bareminerals was the culprit. They use ingredients that irritate the skin such as bismuth oxychloride and talc which caused my recently achieved flawless complexion to be ruined. It can look cakey if you try to cover more than a freckle, photographs like you have oil for a face, and the shade range is absolutely awful. Seriously do yourself a favor, DONT BELIEVE THE HYPE.
I love the way it makes my skin look. Its very light and holds for hours. Great size and great price.

reviews.review_title: skin never felt so soft and gentle
reviews.review_text: i switched to bareMinerals nearly 8 months ago...noticeable decrease in lines, pits, and breakouts doesn't look like Fake Face

I am coming to the make-up game later in life than most women and I have discovered that I love bare minerals. It's quick and easy to put on the foundation primer, this foundation and the mineral veil and it makes an incredibly smooth and subtle difference in my appearance. It has really helped me to feel more comfortable about parts of my face that are broken out. I'm not the kind of person to usually say this, but it helps me to feel better about myself.

I have seen the commercials for this stuff since I was a little girl, but I never really believe what I see on TV. After trying a number of different products on my face (I have oily, sensitive skin), from foundation to simple bronzer, I decided to give in and try this out. It took a little bit of getting used to, but the coverage is impressive. A little bit goes a long way. It's very light weight and natural. I have noticed that my skin seems to be clearer since I have started using this. I bought it with the starter kit. Best purchase I have made in a while! Highly recommend it!

When my skin started to get clearer, i wanted to quit using liquid foundation, i wanted something light, like a loose powder, so i tried this. when i used this product, i got light to medium coverage. if you have blemshes and you were thinking of buying this to cover them up, than you sould get a more matte type of powder rather than this one. But, sometimes on my breakouts, i do tend to use this to finish my look. I give this product 4 stars because i am not particulary in love with this product, but this product is the perfect price. something good to have in your make-up cabnet for those bad days, or everyday look. Good for: normal to oily skin, i guess people with dry skin can wear this, if you do have dry skin, let me know if this product works for you. :)

Just love this stuff. Will NEVER go back to liquid foundation. I like the original better than the matte finish. One oddity...the color of fairly medium appears lighter than the light shade. Light has more yellow undertone to hide redness. But, that's the nice thing about this..you can play with & mix shades for an awesome look!
I've used bareMinerals for years and love how there is a perfect shade for every season! This product plus a good kabuki brush makes me unstoppable!
It looks natural and feels very lightweight. Easy to apply, too.

I was hesitant when purchasing this product, as I am use to using a compressed mineral powder. I have been using this product for a few weeks now and am very pleased. It provides a very natural look, even coverage and doesn't feel heavy on your face.

I didn't think I'd fall for something that was on a infomerical, but I've been using bareMinerals for the past few years now and haven't found anything better than this product. I use golden medium and it fits me perfectly. It doesn't feel like it's ever given me a look where it looks I have an inch of foundation on my skin.It doesn't mess up my skin like other foundations have in the past. I've tried other mineral-style foundations, but bareMinerals is still the closest one to my skin tone. I only wish they sold these in bigger sizes and the sifter part could be a little bit easier to open.

reviews.review_title: Oily and looks like foggy layer on top of my skin
reviews.review_text: I stopped using it after the first few times of using since I bought it. It's suppose to make your skin look very natural at first, but SHORTLY after it gets oily looking, and then it forms into like a layer of foggy powder on top of my skin mixed with oil (I have combination skin, I am not oily on anywhere else besides slightly my nose). It just looks bad. I'm really surprised to see that many good reviews on this product. I would never recommend this to anyone. I feel like I wasted money.
I'll go bare before I'll go without my Bare Minerals.

This is the only foundation I've been using for the last three years. It doesn't clog my pores, lasts all day, and is very light. I know it is a little expensive, but I think flawless skin is worth it!
I love this powder make-up. It goes on light and has great coverage.

reviews.review_title: Would go back if packaging was different
reviews.review_text: I loved Bare Minerals from the time I started using it. I did wear concealers under the foundation and then sometimes Bisque on top if the blemish still showed. However, I stopped using Bare Escentuals entirely because of the packaging. With this new sifter, it makes it impossible to get the last bit out powder because the container doesn't open all the way.  Leslie Blodgett seriously needs to design better packaging for the loose minerals.

I absolutely love this product, however, I still use a little of my regular liquid foundation underneath because I like a lot of coverage and feel. I have problems with my T-zone and apples of my cheeks getting really oily and looking shiny but, with product I know do not have to worry my makeup stays matte all day long.

reviews.review_title: Love it, Only one Problem with it.
reviews.review_text: After using other liquid makeup for a while my skin went psycho on me!! Went back to Bare-M.  What I love: Its amazing at light coverage. For the extra coverage use a canceler brush for problem areas and apply afterwards. I also use the regular primer from BM because the oil-mattifiying one gets clumpy.  What I REALLY don't like: When I sweat it makes my skin itch, its like a slight burning sensation!  What is that about BM !!!!!!!?!!!!!!  so close to being perfect...so close...

You have to love bareMinerals Foundation. I don't think I will ever use anything else. It looks so natural people doubt that I'm even wearing makeup! I have super red cheeks and I always put on bareMinerals to tone down the redness. This product is flawless!

Just bought the Tan shade to mix with my Medium Beige foundation. We are going to Mexico in a couple weeks and I've been pre-tanning. I usually wear Medium Beige but it does not work after tanning a few times. I tap both shades in the lid to get the perfect color to match my skin tone. I just add more Tan as I get darker. I also change to the Tinted Mineral Veil and Voila! Perfection.
love the way is easy to brush on and cover the un even skin tone
I have been using Bare Minerals for about 10 years now. I will admit...I have strayed a time or two, but always came right back. These products are phenomenal!!/
I just recently went back to the original version. The matte seems to make my face too greasy. The coverage is great and lasts forever.

This is my staple foundation. Has been for a long time. Word of advice though for people with dry skin, put on some moisturizer first or it can look really powdery and uneven. Also, not a bad idea to note that a little goes a LONG way. Too much can look caked and make your pores look bigger, so be aware of how much is right for your face/ coverage needs.

reviews.review_title: Dewy, natural, best for problem skin
reviews.review_text: I have uneven red splotchy skin :( and it's prone to breakouts, so I've been hunting for a foundation that both had good coverage and didn't break me out. I've found that a lot of liquid foundations (even with primer and set with powder) just disappear by mid-day with my skin (oily). I've been trying bareMinerals for probably 4 months, starting with the matte foundation. I've found that for oily skin a powder foundation like this one has much better staying power. The matte formula is very matte but to the point that it looks very fake at the beginning of the day. The original foundation formulation, on the other hand, looks very natural and youthful, even at full coverage, you just have to apply a small amount at a time, buff and build, it takes some practice. It does have a tendency to settle into fine lines, even with primer, so I keep away from the undereye area and use a creamy concealer there instead.  So far this foundation has done wonders in terms of not breaking me out! I would recommend a temporary switch to this foundation to anyone who thinks their makeup might be breaking them out.  I do miss the ability to blend cream blush and highlight on top of a liquid foundation, but the staying power and lack of breakouts make it worth it to me.  Also, sorry bare escentuals, but almost any other brand of brush is nicer than the brushes that they're selling. I use ecotools.
I have been using this make-up for years and I will not use anything else. It looks so natural when you put it on and I love it.
Returned item because it was not the right color for me.

This is my standby. I don't go out of the house without it! It is so gentle that I can sleep in it.  It can be lightly dusted or layered on depending on what coverage you want. I sometimes have dry skin, so I use a primer only on the dry patches and let it completely dry before putting on the foundation. This works great for my combination skin!

This foundation is amazing! Gives me great coverage, while looking natural! It literally looks like there's nothing on your face!!! BUT THIS FOUNDATION MAKES ME BREAK OU!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! So angry because I love this foundation! Going to try the matte version to see if it works better :) Recommend this to everyone!!!!!
I've been usiing this foundation for 2 years and I'm very hpy with it. It's easy to apply and natural looking
This product is easy to use, looks great, and feels very light. Love it!

I love this. The coverage and color are excellent, and it still lets my skin show through. It hasn't made me breakout, which is something I can't even say for Clinique foundation that I was using before.

I always use this product because it goes on smoothly and looks great. I use it in the morning for class and at night before I go out and it never fails. I have very sensitive skin but have never had a problem using this product. I strongly recommend it to anyone looking for a new foundation to try out!

I'm going to be honest and admit that on my past visits to Sephora I never approached the Bare Escentuals Section and this was because of my grandmother. The story was that my grandmother raved to everyone about this foundation and like everyone other granddaughter out there I simply smiled nodded and labeled Bare Escentuals as a grandma brand never to be used. That was such a big mistake on my part. A month ago, this lady I work for gave a a brand new Foundation kit which she ought two of, and luckily she was my shade.After having it laying around for a while I decided it wouldn't hurt to give it a try. I freaked out and called my grandma to tell her I was officially a fan. So far it's had to bad effects on my skin. It's long lasting and with a good moisturizer/BB cream beneath it, along with a natural looking blush, it is perfect for a no-makeup makeup everyday look. I really cannot express how lovely it is to use and how lucky I feel that I decided that one day to give it a try.
great for my skin tone and texture. LOVE bareMinerals

Heard great things about Bare Minerals and I really wanted to love this--but I had to return it! I used it for a week before deciding. I found it too chalky, almost like a talc, and it didn't last AT ALL. I applied it around 6:30 am and it was all but gone by lunch. It felt like it sat on top of my skin all day and very easily wiped off. I also felt it was too shiny or dewy looking so I ended up looking greasy even though I tend to have dryer skin. I know lots of women who love this product, but it's definitely not for me.
I love this foundation! Doesn't feel like I'm wearing any, and it covers nicely!

Love this foundation! I have been wearing it for years (about 5 actually) I've used others but I always come back. I recommend it to everyone and I knew a lot of people who use it as well. Disclaimer: I wear fairly light.

I got roped into buying this last year by a very dear friend of mine. She knew I hated make-up for various reasons, the big one being it's a hassle to get it right every single time. She made me get this, and I've been wearing it everyday since. Doesn't cause break outs, easy and simple application, no need to reapply and best of all it's healthy and natural.
Coverage can be adjusted from light to total. Never makes my skin break-out.
This provides just the right amount of coverage. Does not look powdery.

Several of my friends have used this product for years and love it, so I decided to give it a try. I am sure it works grea for others, but it just didn't do well for me. I found it to be very drying after a few hours. It looked great upon application, but a few hours later I would look in mirror and it seemed to be splotchy and cake up in several areas as if had absorbed moisture from my skin. This was very unusual for me as I don't have particularly oily or dry skin typically and have never had an issue like that.

i'm totally cool with the way this product works: using mineral (not chemical) powder to conceal and even skin tone. this is something i definitely want. i chose a powder foundation (and, hence, bare minerals) b/c i hate the way liquid foundations work on my skin: clogged pores, creases, etc. however, the original bare minerals formula left my skin looking weirdly android like, with this very strange, fishy sheen, no matter how i applied the 'warmth' to it. having experienced that, i thought i'd try the matte finish. this was also disappointing (and will be included in its own review) and so i wound up returning the whole set. if i'm going to spend a significant chunk of change on makeup, i've got to *LOVE* it...

I have been using Este√© Lauder's Nutritious mineral makeup for the past 3 years and when it was discontinued, I went on the hunt for a new brand.  I stumbled across BareMinerals and saw all the 5 star reviews and decided to give it a try. I LOVE it! It is natural looking, yet you can build it up to get more coverage when you need it. You also only need a very little amount so it will last a long time.  The only negative I have to say about it is that it looks a bit paling on me without the Mineral Veil on top. I would 100% recommend that you get the Mineral Veil with the foundation to complete and perfect the look!

I recently purchased this in fair (which was a mistake because it was too light) and it has changed my life! Even though it was too light my skin looked so even and beautiful after application. I will be exchanging it soon to get a more natural color!

reviews.review_title: I've won't use any thing else
reviews.review_text: I've used this since high school. It covers my dark spots perfectly and makes my skin look brighter. It always feels light and my friends don't know I'm wearing makeup.

The only bad thing I have to say about this product is coverage. But then again, maybe I just don't put enough of it on... I love that it's not heavy and super easy to apply. Will never go back to a liquid foundation.
I love the coverage but I can't apply it to my nose at all.

This is the only product that feels like your barely wearing anything but yet covers everything! I will say that you need a little knowledge on the brushes to have the most coverage. I have 3 different tones and spots on my face - this is the only product that blends well and makes me look like I have one facial tone (Tried several brands and several colors)

In the past I had always used liquid foundations such as Make Up Forever HD foundation. However my facialist had suggested I try a mineral foundation. I was a bit skeptical only because I love liquid foundation. I've been using this for a few weeks now and absolutely love this product, in my opinion it is a million times better then Make Up Forever's HD foundation. I will buy this again and again!
Lasts without getting cakey. Perfect matches to my skin tone. Hides my dark circles and blemishes well.

At first I had thought that this would be my HG. The first month my skin was fine, but after two months of using the product, my pores are more obvious and my skin breaks out more. What's weird was that after I removed my makeup, I still got a lingering feeling of the powder still being on my face. I chucked the whole package and kept the brushes.
I love the coverage of this foundation and how it blends into my color so nicely. This is my third time re-ordering it. love it.
awesome product--only bummer is when I run out! won't use anything else....!
This make up will change the way you think about your skin and make up. I will never use liquid foundation again! My skin has never looked better.

I love love love Bare minerals foundation if I could have discovered this in high school my make-up would have looked alot better. I love the results I get from bare minerals it light and makes my skin look absolutely amazing it's a wonderful product.

I really liked this foundation. It's the only one I wear. I don't have many imperfections on my skin, besides a bit of redness and a couple of small scars, so it works beautifully. I'd suggest it to people that want light and natural-looking coverage. The only fault I have with it is that its matte-ness doesn't last as long as I would like. The first month or so, when I bought it, it worked wonderfully. After a while, though, the texture on my skin because a little bit more creamy in a sense. It may just be because I have slightly oily skin.
This is the only foundation I will use. I like the natural look and BareMinerals meets my expectations.

I stopped using this about a year ago and started using another brand of mineral product. I recently started using bareMinerals original again. The first day I used it, a co-worker said I had a glow to my face. She also mentioned that my skin looked great! I told her it was bareMinerals. She's going to start using it again now too!  The only downfall of this foundation is it rubs off. It gets all over the colors of my pull overs, coats, or anything that touches my face. A nice to have would be a color stick or color stay in this foundation.

reviews.review_title: It's the only thing I use!
reviews.review_text: What can I say? Love it! Love it! LOve it! After a lifetime of searching for something that works, looks good, and does screw up my skin, this is it! It might seem a little expensive, but I use a good amount every day and one jar lasts me up to 6 months! Don't hesitate! Buy this product today!!

the best foundation! I have combo skin and BM really helps by hydrating my dry patches and absorbs excess oil down my T-zone area. Love how you can control the coverage. original is great for people with dry / combo skin! if you have oily skin, go with the matte formula.
THIS IS SO GREAT!!! WE LOVE IT!
Bare minerals is the best foundation.

reviews.review_title: I wil only wear bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation
reviews.review_text: I bought bare minerals once before, several years ago. I loved it then, but tried several products since then. Recently I decided to return to bare minerals, but I was not sure which shade. I went to Sephora and asked for help. A young make-up artist helped me select a shade and I am in love with it. It is light, natural looking and easy to apply. I have sensitive skin and it does not cause break outs. I will only use this product from now on!

I have used the Bare Minerals Foundation for years and I can't imagine ever using a different foundation! I know that many products say that you can't feel the foundation while wearing it...I can HONESTLY say that I do NOT feel this while wearing it. It last that full day and this includes hot summer days. I would recommend this product to everyone! Give it a try it's GREAT!

I am always very skeptical of foundation. I have tried so many from liquid to powders and nothing seemed to cover my old acne scars or enlarged pores.  Not to mention I don't like the heavy feeling or caked on look of foundation. But after being recommended Bare Minerals by my sister (who has tried a LOT of high end brands of foundations); I decided to give it a try.  I tried it today for the second time and let me just say... I'm no longer a skeptic. This foundation really does live up the hype. It does everything it claims and then some.  It even covered my enlarged pores and minimized the look of some really bad acne scars. My skin looked flawless! It has never looked so good before with foundation! ...and best of all it leaves a natural looking finish without the caked on look.  One thing to keep in mind though -- less is more with this foundation. With a good foundation brush you should need very little to get the coverage you need. Apply a little at a time, and build.

I have quite sensitive skin, so I love the mineral makeups and after having an instore demonstration of how easy this is to apply and build up depending on your look, I feel in love and it is all I use. I loved it so much I only wore BareMinerals for my wedding.
Easy to use, matching color, natural look, natural finish, hydrating, just DA BOMB DIGGITY!

Perfect product! I LOVE the coverage and it gives my skin the perfect glow! I think it would be perfect for most skin types, my skins on the oily side but this product doesnt break out my skin at all! However they do have the matte one if this ones to oily for your skin but over all its amazing!
love it love it love it. I am a little bi :low maintenance, but do have a bit of a rudy complexion-this is PERFECT- fast, natural looking
I am 71 and I positivly love bare minerals foundation. people tell me I look like i am in my late 50,s since i have been using this product

Product covers my redness on my cheeks really well without caking, i do use a different concealer however under my eyes and wherever its needed, i dont like the powdery look if i use my BM under my eyes. i do recommend getting the mineral veil too. I thought i didnt need it, but it looks much better with it on top.

Bare Escentuals is the most natural looking makeup I have ever tried. My husband can't even tell that I'm wearing makeup with this on except that he has complimented me on looking particularly good and healthy. I have freckles, uneven skin tone, and psoriasis. I'm able to put on a light, natural layer that gives my skin a slight glow, then layer with the concealer brush where I need to cover up. My flaking is still visible, but reduced, and the redness and unevenness disappear without hiding all my freckles and color or looking caked. I use the Summer Bisque concealer for faster results, but the foundation does conceal perfectly well when layered. The only drawback is the messiness and it's well worth it! I'm never going back to liquid foundation!

Since using this foundation, I've received several comments that I have perfect skin, though in reality I do not. I use the flawless face brush to apply, and get fantastic, dewey, natural-looking results.
My 83 year old mom loves this product. She can apply it without her glasses, and it is great for rosacea.

I can wear this alone or over foundation, when I need extra coverage. Goes on evenly. Ever since I first bought this a few years ago, I haven't even looked at another powder. I will probably be a customer for life.
I love this foundation, it looks so natural, but better! It's the only one I use! I am 39, & have noticed some foundations settle in fine lines, but not BE!
You can't go wrong with Bare Minerals!
I've been using this foundation since the company began. After more than 12 years, I still get compliments about how great my skin looks.

ok ill make this simple: PROS: didn't break me out like all others i've tried, its non drying, has good couverage CONS: it gets very oily and gross looking by the end of the day, not at all natural looking, accentuates pores (A LOT) and none of them are the right colour for my skin tone they have a yellow undertone in the foundations,  all in all its the only foundation that provides enough couverage and dosent break me out even though everyone can tell im wearing makeup when i wear it.
I've been using this for years and love the lightness of the coverage.
works well on my dry skin
Good stuff! We (my teenager and I ) use it daily.
I started using this years ago and have never gone back to liquid foundation.

Love this stuff. Have used it for several years and would not change to any other foundation. Was very skeptical but went to a spa and had a makeover. Was completely sold even though they told me to wear it all day and make a decision later - absolutely not, I had to have it right then.
The best makeup for me ever !!!!!
Good product I have tried others and this one seems to be the best so farr for me.

I've been using this same foundation for the past two years and I absolutely love it for everyday use!I use golden tan. It's lightweight,non drying, and evens out my tone. I get compliments on how clear my skin looks all the time - people can not tell i'm wearing foundation! I've tried others before but this one is my all time favorite.

I've used this foundation for a while and I like it. It doesn't make me break out, does not feel heavy whatsoever, and doesn't look cakey. I think it treats my skin well, and my usual makeup routine is applying a moisturizer with SPF, using my BareMinerals foundation, bronzer, blush, and if I have any blemishes, covering them up with concealer. Overall, I'm happy with this product.

When I first saw the reviews, I was skeptical because I never thought a powder foundation could cover all my imperfections as well as my liquid foundation. However, I was completely wrong. With this foundation, you only need a tiny bit. It evens out my skin tone and covers much of my redness. It's also so much cheaper than the other high-end foundations. I'm definitely making this my go-to foundation.

I love bare escentuals - I got the starter kit where you can add in the full size foundation (per the recommendation of the staff at Sephora) - and I'm glad I did. I think the other kit had the smaller size foundation and certainly would not last as long - at least for me - as I do tend to use quite a bit to cover up my red broken capillaries on my cheeks. I love this stuff! I think the main thing to decrease the effects of large pores and lines - is to have effective moisturizing prior. I've been having problems with dry eyes due to an eyeshadow base - and it has taken a long time to rehydrate. I notice the foundation does show off differently on the dry areas around my eyes than it does on the rest of my hydrated face.

It made my skin look terrible. Made my pores look HUGE! I have small pores to begin with so something is terribly wrong here. I had wrinkles under my eyes that were not there before. I thought maybe it was that I was doing something wrong, so I had one of the girls at Sephora apply it for me. It was the same result. I have good skin and this made me look OLD. Like 10 years older. I will use the warmth and mineral veil, but this foundation is OUT. I really wanted to love this stuff., Very disappointed.
Love the SPF15, good coverage for red areas.
The bareMinerals spf foundation is one of the best loose powders I've ever used. It provides a flawless look and covers any blemishes.

I am a huge fan of BareMinerals foundation. I have very fair skin that is easily acne prone. This is the only foundation I have found that doesn't negatively affect my skin. I get a beautiful even finish.
The best stuff I ever put on my face!!! Won't use anything else!!

I love bareMinerals Foundation & All-Over Face Color Warmth. But, I have an issue with the container it comes in. Issue is when the make-up gets low it sticks on the bottom of the container and I can't get it all out. So much hoping for a rubber type lid that is removable.
Best coverage in a mineral powder I've ever had.
This product evens out my skin tone and creates a beautiful finish! So much better than any liquid foundation!

I wear a lot of makeup because I feel I need it however don't want the caked on look. Bare minerals gives me good coverage, looks and feels light and the color blends right into my skin. I've only used the powder and not the concealer, so I do use a bit of concealer under the bare minerals. I used to use Channel and Lancome and now will continue to use bare minerals.

This foundation is a quick, easy to use product that allows you to build the amount of coverage you want. It evens out your complexion and hides any redness or discoloration. My skin looks natural and even with this foundation. Love it!
when I was younger I could never find the right color liquid foundation. I started using bareminerals when it first came out and have not used anything but. Love it and will never use anything else.
This is the best foundation ever! I have been using it for years, and it's the only thing I will ever use
Perfect makeup for me. Skin looks natural but all the flaws are covered.
The the easy way to use this foundation, a no mess good look.

i love this stuff so much. i first started using it last year and i haven't been able to go to anything else. great coverage and makes my skin look great. i've noticed that it likes to settle in the wrinkles i'm starting to get on my forehead but it isn't noticeable unless you're looking for it.
It covers the areas I want it too and helps with redness!is the best foundation ever!

I love this stuff...I was so happy when they finally came out with some new shades, I wear fairly medium, which is a lighter color, but it is for people with pink undertones. The other light shades didn't quite match up properly with my skin tone. I prefer the regular over the matte even though my skin is oily. Sometimes I will buy both and mix them together, such as in the summer. The original has a very nice afterglow.

I wear this every day and love it. I am very fair-skinned with pink undertones and the fair gives just the right amount of coverage. I bought the full coverage kabuki brush, which helps give more coverage than the smaller standard brush. It is quick to apply in the morning, but does tend to wear off a bit towards the end of the day more so than a liquid makeup would.
Covers smooth and evenly and with a little shimmer.
love the way it makes my face look flawless. i started using bareminerals last year and the product is the best out there. You would love it!
Have used this product for over three years. It's great. Feels so clean!

This is the best foundation I have ever used! I've been using bare escentuals for several years; my skin looks healthier, I don't look like I'm wearing a lot of makeup, yet my skin tone looks even. You won't regret trying this product.

I really wanted to like it but it gave me huge spots. Now I am wary of any kind of mineral makeup. The few times I did use it gave me a nice, light and luminous finish but won;t be using again. I can see why people like it though.

I am 33 & have been wearing bare minerals since i was about 23...I LOVE this stuff :) It covers flawlessly & never feels like im wearing makeup at all. I work outside in the summer & it always amazes me that by the end of the day I still have complete coverage! AMAZING!!
i absolutely love this foundation!!! it works so well! i can barely even tell i have it on and it covers up blemishes so nicely!
Product is great! It is very light weight and when worn with the primer it lasts all day.

reviews.review_title: WOW! :D but.... CAUTION FOR DRY/ WINTER SKIN
reviews.review_text: this foundation is just.. so.. GOOD! it has the perfect amount of coverage minus the cake- face affect. the only bad thing is you pretty much cant take it anymore (its kinda messy) but thats OK for me. I suggest the multi- tasking powder from BE too. (its the concealer) that also works WONDERS. :D the good about BE powder is that there are SO many shades, so you are bound to find your perfect match. there is a reason why this is the best selling face product in sephora... BUT. if you have DRY skin like moi, this is not for you in the winter time. i reeeeealllyyyy wanted to use this in the winter but it looks cakey and just shows the dryness in my skin (which i want to hide). so if you have dry skin, only use this in the summer, thats what i do. i suggest applying this product with the sephora collection mineral powder brush #45, thats what i do :D (again.) haha i really suggest this foundation, you wont be dissapointed :_

I love this foundation! It goes on smoothly, and I can build up the coverage to conceal my undereye circles or any blemishes. The lock top is wonderful - gets rid of any possibilities of a powdery accident. It's super easy to put on, lasts all day, and flawless! Love it!
Love the coverage! Love that I cannot feel the make-up weighing on my face. I have received compliments on my make-up more than a few times. BareMinerals looks very natural on my skin.

I really enjoy using Bare Minerals because it makes my skin look amazingly flawless. I have gotten many compliments on the make-up i use and it makes me feel more confident about the appearance of my face. I do on the other hand wish that the cap of the make-up would be easier to get more of the minerals out the container cause it seems that there are more in there at the bottom. I do appreciate it and i am satisfied thank you Bare Minerals.
Not only is this a natural foundation for your face its not heavy and does not leave your skin dry or oily. I swear by BareMinerals!

I've been using this product for years and I love it. It sits lightly on my skin without the feeling of having caked on foundation on my face. It lasts throughout the day. In fact, it looks better as the day goes on! I've never had a problem with it getting on my clothes or other people's clothing. I've always gotten compliments on how great my skin looks! I've recommended this product to many people and they were happy with the results. I really recommend this for people with sensitive skin! (It's the only foundation that has worked for my mom.)

I love the bare minerals makeup because it produces such a light, even, and soft appearance. It feels good on your face and helps make everything look flawless. I've been in love from the first time I put it on and every minute after. This Golden Color is perfect if you are somewhere in between fair and light. Please do yourself a favor and buy bare minerals makeup! You won't regret it.
I matched this make up as close as I could on line, when I received it , it is darker than I expected...
My daughter and I both love this item, works well with her 16 year old skin with all it's issues and my 40 ish dry skin.
This is incredible stuff. It has lived up to all its rave reviews! Best foundation EVER.
I have been using this foundation now for many years. It always gives me a flawless look.
LOVE how this powder looks on my face. Has great coverage, gives a nice shine and color and I don't need to reapply at all throughout the day. LOVE IT.

reviews.review_title: Good & not so good things about BE
reviews.review_text: I've used it on and off for 4 years now, and the thing that kept me coming back was the way it concealed my redness. I didn't like the shine of the original version and stopped using it, but went back to it when the matte version was introduced. I loved the way it kept my oily nose shine free for longer than anything I'd used previously. I thought I'd finally found the product I would stick with. However, once I began using it on a daily basis, I noticed that my skin was constantly itchy and uncomfortable and I always found myself looking forward to getting home to wash it off. I can't stand being able to feel my foundation! At first I thought it was just the way my skin was, since I am prone to itchiness just about everywhere. One day I decided to try using a regular foundation and noticed that I didn't have the itchiness or the heavy foundation feel problem - I could actually wear something and not feel it! So while I loved the coverage of the BE matte, I had to give it up. It's just not for me. I also have to say that I found the packaging really inconvenient and messy. I am on the go all the time and hauling around the jar of foundation and mineral veil, plus a brush, was a real hassle and made mid-day application problematic. Why can't it be in a compact like other powders? I tried the refillable brush version twice in hopes that this would solve the problem, but I could never get the product to come out enough to actually create coverage - and I bought 4 of them thinking that maybe I had just been unlucky and gotten ones with defects. All in all I'd say that I gave it a fair shot, but had to move on.

i have normal to dry skin and i have a hard time finding a foundation that works well with my skin. Bare minerals matte finish works amazing and lasts all day! it covers the redness in my skin and never looks cakey. works best when used with the prime time face primer .
I tried another brand of mineral makeup and it didn't even come close to the smoothness of bare minerals. I will never stray again.

I am really pale, and finally have found a foundation that matches my skin tone. Perfect for concealer and overall smoothing of skin tone. I am so happy to have found this. If you have oily skin you may want to try the bareMinerals matte foundation or get the mineral veil!

I recently switched from the Sephora brand mineral foundation. The Bare Escentuals seems a litttle lighter on coverage, but makes for an overall more natural effect. Love that there's mineral-based (not benzones) sunscreen.
Love it! Don't use any other powder. I use it over a tinted moisturizer (Urban Decay) and they work beautifully together!
this is great foundation.
