I've been using this stuff for years. It works great! For a clean swept look, I brush it on over a freshly washed face. For a deeper coverage, I put on moisturizer and immediately brush on. The powder sticks well and is buildable .
Made my skin feel smooth and polished after, had a few problems with the correct colour match but other than that it is a great product.

This provides great coverage but it is time consuming and messy. Because of this it is neither my go to nor my fave. A strange thing I notice is that I do not really like how it looks or notice how well it is covering and or providing a flawless look until I am completely done with my entire face. This is a good choice if this type of foundation is your cup of tea.

I have very sensitive skin that stays on the dry side and never thought a powder foundation would work for me. I was having a horrible time finding a liquid that didn't break me out and matched my super pale skin, I gave in and decided to try BE and have never looked back! The color match (I'm fair) is awesome, the coverage is great and easily buildable.

reviews.review_title: Love the product - HATE the packaging
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for several years now, and I have recently switched to a different mineral foundation because of their packaging change. It really ticks me off to waste product, and makes me think it's just a ploy to make me repurchase sooner. I don't mind spending top dollar for good product, but I don't buy this stuff to throw it away. I won't buy this again until they fix the packaging.
I love the BareMinerals...I tryed a 60$ of dior and the Bare Minerals product on at the same time, the Bare Minerals was light weight and covered just as good ...just wish it was a little less messy.
This mineral powder is so light you don't feel like you're wearing any make-up but at the same time it has amazing coverage that makes every imperfection disappear. And it lasts all day!

I like Bare Escentuals foundation for the ability to customize color by blending the shades and its coverage level. This will never be my favorite foundation because it is so messy, though the new containers help with that. I
in a hurry,,just wanna touch up or need to add a final layer..this is it great amount of powder for the price;)

The best foundation for combination/natural/dry skin, period. Has buildable coverage, but might not be enough to cover up severe acne. If you do have acne though, I highly recommend switching to this light, mineral powder. I used to have acne on occasion, and since switching, my skin has highly improved. I get compliments all the time, and people usually think I don't even have any makeup on. I swear it will help you out!

This my absolute favorite foundation in the whole world. I am an African American woman and the colors do change on my skin because my skin is oily. To get around that problem I put 1 color on 1 side of my chin and another color on the other side and walk around with it for awhile. I pick out the one that looks like the right color after an hour or so.

reviews.review_title: 5 Stars Were it Not For The New Top
reviews.review_text: Been using this stuff for years. Got My Mom Hooked. LOVE IT! Only Problem? The new twistable caps. I used to be able to pop open the old inner top to get to the last of my powder. These new twistable parts leave less mess, but also leave 3 or 4 days worth of powder I can't access. They might as well be glued on. 3 stars because this stuff is expensive and I want to use all of it.

I have been using this product for years now and it is fantastic! Have tried to substitute with cheaper brand names but cannot compare. It is light and makes my face flawless. I suggest if first time user to get the Get Started Kit.

I usually go for a full coverage, really thick cake face makeup, but I got this customized starter kit and found barely using makeup. I use this foundation as a concealer for under my eyes as well so I saved a bunch of $. I also use the browner and mineral veil that comes with the kit, and even though the lighting in my mirrors make it look like it doesn't match my skin, I can see pictures of myself looking better than ever. Even my friends say my makeup looks really good.
I've been using this brand for years. Really good coverage but you have to make sure you put a moisturizer on underneath or else it will appear cakey. Last for a long time even with everyday use.

I used bare minerals years ago, but got tired of the messy counters and feeling like half my product ended floating around my bathroom. I decided to go back to it after years of liquid foundation and suddenly deciding it looked heavy and thick. I'm really glad I did. I have some skin flaws and I didn't think this would actually cover them, but it does. I've even stopped using concealer (for the most part). Pretty awesome. Oh, and the new system really helps with the product loss.
Nice light foundation - I like it for the weekends or days I want less coverage.

I came back to this foundation after not using it for a couple years. I have no issue with the product but the new package design doesn't allow you to get into the container toward the end...I felt like I had to toss it when there was still some left.

I have to say, I have been using Bare Minerals for over 6 years now. And it is the best product out there. My skin is always clear and glowing. I got my daughter to start using it about 2 years ago and her skin has improved drastically and looks Radiant!! I would recommend it to anyone. Love it!

I have been using bareMinerals for a very long time now. I love the product it is great for your skin. Decent coverage... if I need extra coverage sometimes I use a smaller brush with the bareMinerals or I use an additional concealer.
I have very oily skin and this is such a nice alternative to liquid foundation which makes me look shiny.

I've always been wary of foundation because I hate that cakey, obviously-wearing-makeup look (and I have breakout-prone skin). I was in the market for a mineral powder though, to even my skin out a bit when going out on the weekends. The Sephora girl immediately led me to the Bare Escentuals section, and tried a shade on my face (Medium Beige N20). She explained that I could wear it as light or heavy (by layering) as I wanted. She also mentioned something about there being 2 kinds - one that has a matte finish, and one that is a little more glowy (I got the latter).  It is a really light powder, and achieves exactly the effect I was going for. The package design is wonderful, and has a little turn-click mechanism that traps the powder in when you're not using it. They have a cute ritual insert as well that helps you figure out how to use it if you're new to mineral powder. Love love this.
I've been using this foundation for 4+ years. It continues to protect my very sensitive skin and attract admiring compliments. I recommend it every day.
I have ruddy cheeks and this covers the red beautifully. I wish I had bought this when I saw the infomercials years ago!

I have been using Bare Escentuals for seven plus years . As a flight attendant my skin would get dried out,break out ,it was horrible.Once I switched to Bare Escentuals my skin has been less irritated,fewer breakouts.I love this product and will never go back to liquid foundation again!

reviews.review_title: Covers without feeling like a mask.
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I've ever used. You can't tell it's a powder after you buff it on, it feels silky not gritty. This matches my skin-tone easily, unlike most products. It doesn't make me orange or yellow and it doesn't cause me to have acne.

I have been using bareMinerals foundation (in golden medium) for 5 years now. Was hooked since I bought the starter kit (comes with brushes, how-to CD and more).  It complements my skin perfectly, it's lightweight, has sun protection and best of all no harmful ingredients. This is worth the investment. I wear it everyday and it lasts me about a year or so.

For being a powder, it gives amazing amounts of coverage. You can totally get away with just putting some concealer on problem spots, and then just putting this on top, not even wearing any liquid foundation. This is especially good for summer, when you want a more light-weight feel. It gives skin a beautiful smooth, porcelain look and feel.

reviews.review_title: One of the best mineral makeups
reviews.review_text: Does not cause acne and covers pretty well. its easy to layer it on as long as you have the right shade. Doesnt last as long as id like (i go to school for 7 hours a day and have to reapply) but i think the fact that its natural and doesnt cause blemishes is worth it.

bareMinerals has been my go to for several years now. I can always depend on the smoothness of the look and wear. I have tried other mineral foundations, and they do not compare. This is my makeup for life

I started using Bare Minerals about 2 years ago before my wedding since I wanted flawless skin for my engagement and wedding pictures. Hands down this is the best foundation!! Complete coverage and has a soft look.

I have loved this product since the first time I tried it back in 2007. I have tried other knock offs since, and none of them are as good. I am happy to see the new twisty thingie on the container, so you can control the amount of powder that comes out. Wonderful!

I have been using this product for at least five years, it has a great light coverage that looks just a little more natural than liquid foundation. My only wish is that they would come up with more mixer friendly packaging. I love that I am able to mix shades and they blend so well together but the hardest part is getting the foundation out of one container and into another...aaagggghh:)

I love Bare Escentuals! It has great buildable coverage. I wear the Medium Golden and it matches my skin perfect. In the summer I just use a bronzer if I need alittle more color. Also this is the only foundation that doesnt break my face out :)

reviews.review_title: No pancake makeup look for me
reviews.review_text: I love the way bareMinerals SPF15 Foundation gives a translucent coverage. I don't like the thick look of other foundations.

I can't find anything that compared to this foundation. I usually buy one of the 3 lightest shades depending on the season and all of them match me perfectly. It doesn't clog your pores, isn't too powdery, and doesn't rub off.

Great foundation! Covers like nothing else. Great for my skin, and doesnt make me break out. Wish it did a better job of keeping my oil to a minnimum but other than that its the best. I do not use anything else.
I love this stuff. Goes on light, covers well. Traditional foundation always feels cakey, gross and fake looking to me; this provides a nice even tone that looks natural.

I am a belly dancer and had been looking for something that could hold up to multiple sets of performing. While yes I sweat it still holds stays complete doesn't streak. IT does not dry out or cause me to break out which is why I just restocked
This stuff is so amazing! I feel like I'm not even wearing anything it's so light. Trust me, your skin will look and feel 20% cooler with this foundation!

I love bare minerals original in medium beige! I have been using it for the last 5 years. For everyday coverage, I use a concealer and the bare minerals on top. If I want a more made-up look for a special night, I'll use a liquid foundation under the bare minerals. It looks fabulous either way, and it doesn't cause me do break out like some other products do.
*****Feels light on skin when applied but covers well. Much better than a creamy foundation.

I'v been using Bare Minerals for years.. I have oily skin and this seams to do the best for that problem.. No brake outs, no spotting or greasy looking when skin gets oily towards the end of the day!!! It's great! Im slowly switching over to their line for daily skin care.. (wash, moisturizer, primer)

i bought the whole kit just to see whats the hype about and i actually loved it. its the first foundation i have ever finished and i just recently finished all the products in the kit...i bought it like 2 years ago so it lasts a long time. it makes my skin look like i have naturally flawless skin and people always asks me if my skin is really this flawless when i wear this so its great. people should try it. i prefer mineral because it feels so light unlike the liquid counterparts.
I like it because it leaves my skin glowing. Also, it's not very heavy.
So far, so good. The best foundation that I have tried. Looks natural on the face, easy to use. Have used for many years now because I haven't found anything that I like better.

i use this in fairly medium. i bought the regular version because they had run out of the matte formula which is what i usually get. this worked pretty well. it stays as long as the matte, but i did notice that i get more oily at the end of the day.

I love the foundation, it matches my skin tone and it lasts all day. My skin is visibly improving also. It hasn't minimized my pores as much as I had hoped it would but I am pairing it with a pore minimizing facial cleanser and that seems to be helping. I will definitely be a loyal bareMinerals customer from now on.
I love this!! It matches so perfectly you can't even tell I'm wearing makeup. I bought mine and then my mom saw it loved it and bought it for herself.

i love this product. i was looking for a mineral foundation because i have acne prone and sensitive skin. i must admit that i have noticed my worst areas of redness getting slightly better after using this for two months. with this product though, you have to use a concealer because if you build it up you just look way too cakey and the foundation itself has a shine so a little goes a long way. however i heard people saying that it wears off by the end of the day but for me i dont have a problem with it, and i have REALLY oily skin. i def reccomend it.

i think its is the best powder foundation for summers.i have found my holy grail foundation. my skin has never been so smooth. i have even used it in winters so cant go wrong .....u must give it a shot.

reviews.review_title: Can toss all my other make-up!
reviews.review_text: I have lingering acne scars, so I've always needed a cover-up then powder. Not with this! A concealer brush and fully powder brush do the trick for full, all-day coverage. I travel a lot as well, so it's super convenient to just have one product. In love!

The Bare Escentuals foundation powder has been my go-to daily makeup since it was first introduced. It's the best for looking natural and holding up all day. Definitely use a primer for best results. If you want more coverage, use a tinted primer.

reviews.review_title: Great Product, Just a Tad Itchy...
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for about 6 months now and I really like it! The coverage is perfect for me, just enough to cover flaws and even out my skin tone while also giving me a very natural look. It's perfect for warmer weather when you don't want to wear liquid foundation or anything too heavy. I can't feel this on my face, so that's definitely nice! My only complaint is that recently it's been making my face really itchy to the point where the only relief I get is from washing it off. This could be a combination of things like my brushes or the environment but I think it might have to do with the bismuth oxychloride which tends to make people itch. So if you have really sensitive skin, I would probably avoid this product. Other than that, I really do love this foundation.

My roommate in college got me hooked on this foundation so I went out and brought the starter kit with all the brushes and everything, which is a GREAT place to start if you're unsure. I love how it just blends right in. I get the coverage I need without that weighed down feeling of most makeup. It seriously feels like my skin is naked and is great because it doesn't make my sensative skin react.  I also used this same foundation on my mother for her wedding and the before and after results are amazing. She looked about 10 years younger when I used the whole routine on her!!!!
I switched from Lancome and have never looked back. It is light and covers really well.
I love this stuff!!! I have oily skin and this works great as an everyday foundation!!

I have used this foundation for 5 years and could not live without it. I apply Josie Maran's argan oil spf 40 moisturizer as a primer, which works really well with the foundation as it's not too greasy and makes the makeup stay put for pretty much all day long. I usually have to do a touch-up at some point during the day, but overall it looks very natural and feels very natural. A little bit goes a long way.
I have used Bare Minerals for about 6 years now and no matter what I always go back.

reviews.review_title: I love this more than my bf I think!
reviews.review_text: I totally get that everyone says this.. But for real, I will NEVER use another foundation. You put a LITTLE on the brush, buff it on, and you're B-E-A-UTIFULLL! I have the worst combination skin you'll ever find, but you'd never know with this on my face. I'm in love!
great product, matches great into skin, looks natural, and covers spots well without looking made up

Yep love this product too . it does what it sappose to do as long as you apply it correctly . I use the primer vitamin base before the foundation & follow with the finishing veil lasts a long time for hrs , the only one I use . Good product all of the id BE are
I have been wearing BE foundation for 12years and have gotten lots of my friends and strangers to using this product i will never go back to liquid foundation.

I hated this product. It seemed to accent every flaw in my skin and magnify it 100 times. I'm sure this product would be perfect for Very young women with flawless skin, but for my skin (I'm in my early 30's), it looked horrible on me.

Ive tried several liquid, cream, and powder foundations but NONE have ever left me wanting more like this baby! It smoothes and covers EVERY imperfection! I have horrible acne and it help clears and treats my acne! I love this I love this I LOVE THIS! The only down side is that in the winter it cakes but im not taking away a star because its normal for winter skin! Thanks BM!!!!
I made the switch from liquid foundation to this great mineral powder a while back and couldn't be happier with it! Love the natural look and it stays on like no other!!! Even after a nap!

reviews.review_title: the last foundation you will ever buy
reviews.review_text: Very good for your skin. Offers good and natural coverage. It helps you look healthy.
I have been using this makeup for 6 years now, and I'm never looking back!

Love this foundation. You can put it on with a kabuki brush and decide how much coverage you want. Light to the point of feeling like you are not wearing any makeup. Im a medical school student with no time and this lets me still do my makeup in the mornings (takes less than five minutes to do)

I have used this stuff for forever, and it's the best! It's perfect for my sesitive skin. Everytime I try to switch to something else other then Bare Minerals, it gives me some sort of rash, but this stuff doesn't! It also doesn't dry my skin out, which is also another plus. It feels like im wearing nothing, and the coverage is so natural. Pretty much the best stuff ever.

I've tried BE mineral foundation during various points in my life over the past 15 years hoping to like it. Each time I came back to this foundation I've always regretted it. Every time I've buffed (as instructed per the manufacturer) this foundation on my face I would ALWAYS end up with a new crop of large pimples. I tried other methods of applying this foundation, and the same exact thing happened. Nothing else changed in my skincare or makeup routine, so I know that the new pimples were caused by Bare Escentuals bareMinerals foundation.  The other issues that I had with this foundation is that it leaves the skin looking abnormally sparkly, NOT naturally dewy. No matter how much I blended, it looked like I had foundation on. The color selection is also VERY orange-peach based. I have yellow-neutral undertone in my skin, and I purchased 3 different colors in BE but still could not achieve a good color match, even when I tried various mixes of the 3 colors together.  There are better mineral foundations offered on Sephora.com. I really did want to like BE, but couldn't for the above mentioned reasons.
Bare minerals have always been my favorite. Bought this as an extra to have n my makeup bin. Nothing to say but good things. Great coverage. I do have to reapply after a couple hours of hard work.
Brushes on without caking and my skin feels smooth and looks great! I would highly recommend it.

i have used BE for about 4 years and it had always worked for me with no problems. it doesnt give me pimples, it looks natural and its bbuildable coverage, so i can go as sheer or heavy when ever i like. I ONLY used BE, nothing else touches my face but BE expect my conclear cause i have really dark circles but its a great line and everyone should give it a try.

I was in the market for a new foundation when I stumbled upon bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation. I had initially ordered the set from an infomercial. The color I ordered turned out to be too yellow for my light complexion. I went into the Sephora in Palm Beach Gardens mall. I was then matched to the fairly medium. Whoa!!!!!!!!!! what a difference this this foundation makes on my skin. First off, its a powder with a creamy consistency. It has great buildable coverage and it matches my skin perfectly. Its not cakey or drying. Its not oily or tacky. This foundation covers up even the most serious flaws in your skin. Awesome foundation!
I have been using this foundation for years and have turned all my friends on to it! I find it extremely natural and light, which is the look i'm going for with foundation. Amazing. :)
Only foundation I'll ever use!!!
I find this a little messy to work with. Some of the foundation gets stuck underneath the cover and feels like a waste. Nice coverage but on hot days can leave you feeling oily.
Very natural. This is my first BaseMinerals product.
I love this product... I have purchased this several times and I will be pruchasing it several more!

I've been using this product for 3 weeks now and I am in love with it! I've used Clinique's foundation for years and it never covered smoothly, but with bareMinerals, i can put on a thin layer, and my skin looks amazing!

I love this line of cosmetics! Its clean, very light, covers the flaws! Its long lasting and comes off great with basic soap and water. If you want nice coverage with minimal work-this is the product! LOVE IT! Been using it fir four years!
The foundation covers well and goes on beautifully however, I must use quite a good amount in order to reach that coverage and the product is simply too expensive to be worth it.
It works beautifully!! Covers my skin nicely without looking cakey and I don't have to use foundation unless I want to! Will definitely by this again!
This powder is not at all what I was looking for! It leaves a shiny film on my face. My Sister noticed it right away :( It does cover well, however I wouldn't purchase this product again.

Great coverage, does not dry your skin. A little bit goes a LONG way with this stuff. You are in control of how much coverage you want, whether just a little or a full face cover. Works its best in combination with the Bare Essentials Primer.

reviews.review_title: Do not like new lid design
reviews.review_text: Itmis impossible to get all of the product out due to new lid design. Hate wasting $...

Bare MInerals makes the best foundation I've ever used. It's lightweight and pure and doesn't make me break out. They have a million awesome shades but as far a bronzers are concerned, I love Warmth the best. The application process is messy because it's loose powder with a Kabuki brush so it will get all over your counter top but it's worth it. Plus, it lasts long because you don't need to use so much. I'm just annoyed that they shrunk the size of the containers. The larger diameter was easier to tap and swirl for more even application.

reviews.review_title: Coldn't believe such a perfection exists
reviews.review_text: I have an oily skin and always tried to mask my pores and red spots on my face. In my life I can say I tried almost every fluid and powder foudation there is on the market since I became a teenager. Bare minerals is a mineral powder, it covers every pore and every blemish without even showing on your skin. My face looks natural, the layer of powder is thin but it hides what I want to be hidden and doesn't leave on my skin thick mask that I could feel and everyone could see on my face. After I tried it for a first time I could not believe how well it covers and that I can't feel wearing makeup on my face and most imprtant how could I live without it so far. Strongly recommend to every lady either you have very uneven skin tone or you just need to add a perfect glow to your face. I also use the other powder-one you apply under your eyes (great to appy with a thin brush on your most reddish spots as well before applying foundation). You may think initially it is not there but if you compare another eye that you didn't appy it yet to-you can see the difference!!! Simply love it!!!!!!!!!!!
Great foundation for medium coverage, I went back to using bareMinerals after trying other products for a few years, but I'm glad I made the switch back to it.

reviews.review_title: I love my bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation, but...
reviews.review_text: the clerk who assisted me with chosing the color for my foundation chose a color that does not blend very well for my wintertime complexion. She chose medium tan. It will be fine for the summer, but not now.

I am really on the fence about this product. I have been using it off and on for a bout 5 years now. Some days it will give the most amazing flawless skin ever and I love it! Then other days it will go on super weird, like even with just one layer it will look super cakey in some places and have absolutely no coverage in others. My skin is pretty normal, I get a few zits here and there, but nothing major. I guess it just depends how my skin is on certain days. I would still definitely reccomend to anyone to at least try it, with a primer of course.

love this foundation for my off days. It doesn't give a ton of coverage, but it is build able. I wouldn't recommend doing that though because it is kind of pricey. The color selection and payoff is great and i love it! Overall, this is for you if you aren't looking for a Full coverage foundation. Love!
This foundation gives my face a smooth sleek appearance.
This is my go to product! It feels like I have nothing on. I also love that i can sleep with it on and it wont clog my pours.

reviews.review_title: Best natural looking foundation out there!
reviews.review_text: I don't know what I would do without my bareMinerals foundation. My skin isn't that great - I'm 18 but I still have random pimples scattered across my face. This foundation completely covers them up (when I use the concealer brush, which comes with the value pack kit), and makes my skin look completely clear and glowing! I always get compliments on my skin when using bareMinerals! It never looks cakey or like I'm wearing makeup. Natural is always better! Highly recommend (I have been using it for three consecutive years now, and plan on using it forever!).

I have been a faithful bare escentuals user for five years. This foundation was gentle on my skin, did not feel heavy and looked well. Unfortunately I did take off a star for that fact that during the winter this causes your skin to become dryer than usual. When your skin does flake due to the dryness this foundation does amplify that making your skin look odd. However if you do use moisturizer you will not have this problem. Also at times this foundation may not look as natural as a liquid foundation would.

I've left bare minerals and tried other brands but I always come back to it because the match is perfect and I don't look like I'm wearing make-up. I get the most head turns and most compliments when I use this foundation.

This is the best foundation for me. I have acne-prone skin that's relatively clear now, but I'm still dealing with hyperpigmentation. This covers all that up without the made-up look of a liquid foundation. I make sure my face is moisturized and usually wear Smashbox primer underneath. Oh, I also love the newish design with the ability to close the container!
I love bareMinerals and this product is the perfect shade and gives the most flawless coverage!! It looks so natural and covers the face to give it a glow! A must have!!
Love this for concealing bags under eyes and little red volcanoes on my face. Looks and feels natural.

I love this foundation !! wouldn't use anything else on my face. love the coverage especially when used with bisque & mineral veil. i have sun damage on my face & bare escentuals covers as if i have perfect skin !!!

reviews.review_title: Color is a little pinker than I expected
reviews.review_text: My perfect match is Golden Medium mixed with Medium Tan, so I was hoping that buying the Golden Tan would be a good mix. It's not. It's VERY pink. So I have to buy an additional tub to mix. :( I wish they could get a good mix for my asian/latina mix.

I became allergic to most cosmetics a few years ago. I found I can use the Bare Escentuals line with no problem. Fortunately, I also love the way it looks on me and hoepfully it is healthy for my complexion.

I have used bare minerals since my college days, and took a brief timeout to use coverFX foundation due to my belief that I needed more coverage. The more I use bareminerals on a regular basis, I can see the appearance of my acne diminishing. I am shocked to say that this actually covers better than the liquid foundation that i bought from coverFX.
Never liked liquid foundation. This foundation is great and so simple to use.
the more you buff the better, and a little goes a long way- i like that! the only issue i have is that it seems to come off too soon, but hey it works and the price is alright.

reviews.review_title: Perfect foundation for my fair skin w/pink tones
reviews.review_text: After years of trying to find my perfect match only to have a drawer full of too-yellow foundations, I finally went back to Bare Minerals and found Fairly Medium which is the perfect foundation for my fair skin with pink undertones. I was so tired of everything being yellow and looking fake on me. I use the Sephora bronzer brush and it is awesome. My skin feels great and looks airbrushed. My dark spots and redness disappear. It is the perfect foundation for blush and bronzer. Can't say enough good things. If you're like me and you tried it years ago and couldn't find your shade - try it again. You won't be disappointed.
Just an all around great product line. They know how to make your skin tone look even but also look as though you aren't wearing make up. Just love it!
Will never be able to change back to a liquid foundation! The coverage is awesome
I have found my dream makeup

i love the bareminerals foundation. it gives you that airbrushed look without all of the trouble. the one thing that i would recommend is to use a primer to ensure that you have a long lasting smooth complexion.

I really like this foundation powder because it provides coverage and doesn't feel cakey or heavy. However, it definitely needs to be used with a good face primer and a finishing stay if you want it to last more than an hour. I use the sephora face primer and the urban decay dew me finishing spray last and that seems to make it last all day.
This is my absolute favorite, I'll never switch! It is so natural looking, yet provides really good coverage. I love that it has built in sunscreen too. Highly recommended!!
This is the perfect foundation for my red skin. It hides blotches and blemishes easily. I use it as concealer as well!

this will alway be a staple of mine. i have tried other mineral make up by nobody seems to come close to the natural coverage of Bare Minerals. i love it when people say, your makeup really looks good today...

I'm not one who likes having a cake face and this was perfect! goes on evenly and light but it really evens out my skin tone and tones down my freckles. It looks natural. i have oily skin and I use the matte formula, it doesn't make my skin oily. i love it and got my mom and sister hooked on it now too!
No other foundation compares. My skin glows and it doesn't break me out.
Great coverage. You don't even look like you're wearing makeup!

For those people who haven't tried Bare Escentuals, you are definitely missing out! I've been using the powders for years now and I would NEVER go back to liquid foundation. This is light on your face and it lasts FOREVER! I only have to buy a new one about once a year, so for the price, it's a great deal! Looks extremely natural as well. I'm always getting complimented on how good my skin looks!

More proof that BM is the best...I decided to sit for one of the mall kiosk demos and try their mineral-based make up. OMG it was horrible. I couldn't stand the feeling on my skin. A true blue BM fan!!!

I switch back and forth between liquid foundations and minerals, but I always come back to Bare Escentuals. The coverage is good and looks natural, but gives your skin that lit from within look. Someone actually said that to me one day :) How can you not love that?!

Before trying bareMinerals, I had a long routine of starting out with primer, then using concealer, then applying liquid foundation, touching up concealer then finally dusting on powder to set it all. Now, with the extreme full coverage of this powder, I just put on a primer or a moisturizer then put on a tiny bit of powder and I'm done!  I have BAD acne scars around my chin/mouth as well as scars on my cheeks from doing a face plant into a patch of poison ivy a few years back and this covers it COMPLETELY without all the excess buildup of other products and minimizes the risk of looking cakey! It doesn't wear off during the day unless you are bad about touching your face.  For $26, this is a steal! I was using a drugstore powder that was half the price but didn't have the ability to last all day like bareMinerals does so I was constantly touching up throughout the day (aka: wasting product).
I have tried all kinds, even different kinds of mineral makeups, and this is the best! Great coverage, does not irritate skin and wears well all day.
I love bare minerals. It really doesn't get much better than this! I would never go back to any other type of foundation again.
I bought the one in Golden Tan, it is my perfect shade and it makes your skin seem so natural. RECCOMMENDED.

reviews.review_title: The Best Foundation I have ever tried
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely the greatest foundation on the market. It goes on smoothly, covers flaws beautifullyand does not flake or look powdery. It hides, rather than accentuate fine lines and wrinkles. My skin looks almost flawless and younger when I use this.

I got this foundation in Golden Fair, which was the perfect match for my skin! I absolutely love this foundation. I use this every morning before school. The reason I took one star off is mainly because it's just a teensy bit too drying between my eyebrows, and it can sometimes make my skin look flaky, especially on the sides of my nose. Overall, just use a moisturizer//primer before brushing on the foundation......tadaaaa! FLAWLESS SKIN.
I love this makeup. I use c10 fair, and it looks great. Evens out my skin, and feels nice, light, and smooth.
Love this stuff! Quick and easy, everyday use.

I know this product gets a lot of good reviews, but I just do not like it at all. Even with a very light application, it looks cakey and dry, although I don't have dry skin. I've never experienced this with any other mineral foundation, so will not use it again.
I swear by this foundation. It's so light but it still does a great job of covering up any redness.

The Bare Escentuals Light Foundation gives your skin an even, healthy looking glow and compliments your complexion to highlight your natural beauty. If you are looking for a new foundation, bareMinerals is the way to go. There are many helpful employees at Sephora that can aid you in finding the perfect tone for your body. What are you waiting for? Go to Sephora today!

I have literally used almost every concealer / foundation under the sun in search of one that provided coverage yet maintained a natural, not cakey look. Well, that's what I have FINALLY found with using this product. It's very important to use the correct brushes to achieve the coverage you want. AND it is extremely important to follow the steps on how to properly apply the make up, swirl, tap, buff!!!

Ever since I tried this foundation when I was a teenager, I've been hooked. I have sensitive skin, and this is the ONLY foundation I can use on a regular basis that does not irritate my skin. I've also had people comment that the look is so flawless, they can't even tell if I'm wearing make-up or not! It is great. And it lasts quite a while, so if you think it is a little pricey, you will be happy with how long it lasts. Give it a try! You won't regret it. :)
I've been using bare minerals foundation for several years and it has the perfect coverage

I was talked into buying this with the Bare Minerals foundation kit while I was at Sephora, but I am so glad!! This color is the perfect match for my skin tone (I'm Asian) and is so light and easy to sweep on!

love this make up. easy to use,lasts a long time and doesnt cause any irritation. also good for concealer. ive been using this for about yrs, and have tried other stuff but find myself coming back, so i just decided to stick with it.

I've been wearing this for years and I'm still in love with it. I prefer a natural look, especially for work, and this makes me look good without making it look like I'm wearing too much makeup. You definitely need to wear some primer with it, or it will look funny and wear off very quickly. With primer, I'm able to look good throughout a 12 hour shift. I also love that they have different colors for people with warm or cool undertones. I'm very fair and had difficulty with other products in finding something that wasn't too yellow for me.
Goes on beautifully. Just the right amount of coverage without looking like you painted it on. Looks great all day long!

I've been using this foundation for the past 5 years. It is truly the best foundation for any skin type. My favorite part is that it really perfects and enhances your skin tone, without making it look like you're wearing a ton of makeup.

I have used Bare Minerals for a few years now, and much of what I have to say is good. First, one containers lasts forever! Second, it covers really well and leaves a really nice finish. Third, you can also use it as a light concealer. Fourth, it covers everything even my mom's rosacea, but it has to be reapplied throughout the day. I've recently decided not to use it anymore, and I will tell you why. First, it rubs off very easily. It just sits on top of your skin and will rub off of your coat collar or shirt easily. Second, it needs to be touched up during the day (at least for my oily skin). Third, once it wears for a few hours it seems to sink into little wrinkles or accentuates them more. Finally, at the end of the day you can literally scrape it off your face with your fingernail. At the beginning of the day, it feels light and sheer. At the end of the day it starts to feel cakey. Maybe it's just not great for my oily skin. I have started using a tinted moisturizer now, and it seems to wear better throughout the day.
I love this foundation! I love how it easily glides on and NO mess! My only problem is that it doesn't really long as much as I want it too.

I wasn't sure I would like this product. I have only used liquid foundation in the past and am turning 40 this year. I watched the video that came with the kit and found it extremely helpful for me as a first time user. I also really love the product. It doesn't do down into creases the way liquid makeup does and it makes my face feel very soft and healthy. It erases any red spots that I have and evens my skin tone beautifully.
The product is good. I have tried other brands of minerals and I still keep coming back to this one.

I've been using this foundation for about two years now because it's gentle on my skin that's prone to getting red and blotchy. It does a nice job of evening my skin tone. The downside is that it definitely doesn't double as a concealer at all. My blemishes still come through loud and clear.
This foundation has great creamy coverage and never makes my face break out. I can't say enough good things about this product.

This didn't work for me at all. They must have changed the formula because I have used this in the past and had no problems at all. This time around I found that this did little to cover any problem areas and even out my skin tone. No me gusta
LOVE the product, hate the twisty top...wastes so much product that will not come out.
I have been using this product for five years and it provides great coverage. Very lightweight and blends right into your skin for a natural look.
I have used this product for years. By far the best foundation I have ever used.

This is my fourth time purchasing this powder foundation. I actually use a tinted moisturizer first and then the bareMinerals to set. It has and SPF of 15, which was a major consideration when buying this product. It goes on smoothly and stays on all day.
I love this foundation. It gives me wonderful coverage. It also blends amazingly well. It is completely worth the money.

I love bare minerals foundation however this was not my color. I was trying to get an in between, something that would completely match my skin tone but there is just no color for me. I do like the foundation but the colors just don't look good if they are to light or too dark.
Actually makes your skin look and feel better. I never wear any other makeup because they don't have the same quality as bareminerals.

Just like the title says, best make-up ever. Looks natural but covers everything. I've used it for over 5 years and plan to use it as long as I can! I would caution against it for wrinkles. It is a powder, which can settle into creases. But it is definitely worth a try, it doesn't do this to everyone. I am a former make-up artist, and have applied this make-up to many faces. I've seen it look beautiful on older skin, and I have seen it enhance lines as well. But like I said, worth a try!

This product is absolutely worth every penny! When I put it on, it doesn't make my skin feel dry or tight, and my skin feels silky smooth with it on. It's so light-weight, I can't feel it on my face.  My skin has a few pimples here and there, and a little redness in some areas, but not bad. Now, I have large pores. bareMinerals actually majorly reduces how visual my pores are. It has just the right amount of coverage without looking cakey. I love it!!  bareMinerals helps me feel confident about my skin, and feel that my skin is beautiful.  Thank you, Bare Escentuals, for helping me feel good about my skin! :)
I love this product. I am pale and I use it as a bronzer in the winter. It does not feel like I have powder all over my face. it makes me look glowing and alive :)
Excellent coverage Have used this product for years

I don't have horrible breakouts, just redness and a few pimples here and there. It gives me just the right amount of coverage for my needs. I have sensitive skin and break out to most foundations but this I do not!!
This is the best coverage I've worn. I don't use anything else.
I absolutely love this product. It is good to my skin and has a nice natural finish. Great value in the gift box .
I have moderately bad skin and would never wear this by itself without concealer at the very least, but I use it to set my foundation if I want even more coverage and I like it a lot for that!

i bought the kit a few years ago when mineral makeup was just new on the market and i was glad w/ my purchase. i finally gave it a try after seeing it on infomercials every night. it covered all the imperfections yet it feels really lightweight, it's like not wearing anything at all. people can't tell that i'm wearing some kind of foundation.

When i first decided on getting makeup i was a little worried because i have a big birthmark on my neck and i have tried all types of makeup and none of them would cover it up. Until i tried bare minerals it covered it perfectly i was so surprised. When i use it i do not need a lot and i love how natural it looks.

I have used this foundation everyday for about 4 years and not only does it apply very nicely, but my skin has actually improved over time! I recommend this product to women of any age and style. applies beautifully to all skin tones.
I love the way the bare minerals goes on. It never feels dry even though its a powder. I have sensitive skin and it does not irritate or cause breakouts.
I don't like liquid foundation this is great. Great finish!

I love the natural, un-matte, non-cakey finish. For my asian skin, I switch between Light and Golden Medium depending on the season. Bummer, noticed the inner lid doesn't pry off, which makes it impossible to use every last bit of powder.

I don't like that the powder leaks all over the place if you don't close it perfectly, but I guess that makes sense for such a fine texture. Everything else is fabulous. I'm a makeup minimalist, and it really feels like there's nothing on my face while making the tone more even and smoothing it out a bit. Primer is a must-use, though.  I tried the Light, but it made my face look sort of yellow-orange. My colors seem to be Fairly Medium and Fairly Light depending on the season.

reviews.review_title: Bare Escentuals bare minerals SPF 15 Foundation
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years. It is the BEST foundation that fits my beauty regimine everyday. I have never used or found anything better than this foundation. I love it and can even afford to sleep overnight with it when I am just too tired to wash my face before bed. Great product!
i really like it because of the natural full coverage! it look like i have no make up on yet covers and balances my skintone. since it is lose powder adding the switcher thingy was genius!love it

A bold statement, no doubt, but I am in love with this foundation! I had tried it a few times in little sample sets and decided to treat myself on my birthday to a full size jar of this wonder product. I am so glad I did. My main skin concern in uneven/blotchy skin tone. I also have acne scarring around my nose. This covers the scarring effortlessly and evens out my skin tone beautifully all without looking or feeling like I'm wearing anything. It honestly just looks like I have amazing skin. I do use this foundation over a primer and it lasts all day. It never feels heavy or looks cakey. Overall, this is hands-down my favorite foundation and potentially my favorite beauty product!

Foundation should be like a good push-up bra. No one ever needs to know you're wearing it, but they should think you just naturally look fantastic all the time. And this is why this is only foundation for me. It blends perfectly, I never end up with a line around my chin and jaw and it provide even coverage. If this is your first time using this foundation, be sure you are using a good kabuki brush. It makes a big difference. Best results and coverage are also seen a few seconds after application once the powder is warmed by the skin, so you need not use much. You can always apply more until if you need it and it will never feel cakey or masky or icky. I also do not have as many break-outs when using this, even if I end up accidentally falling asleep with my makeup on. I experimented with using one shade darker and one shade lighter than my typical shade (Fairly Light) and you really can't go wrong. I would recommend this to anyone.

I have pretty clear skin. Except for freckles on my nose. I like covering them up and I didn't expect this to cover it, so I was holding off on buying it. I finally bought it, and I was sooooo happy to see that my freckles were covered and the rest of my skin looked perfect. I reallllly recomend this! my new favorite!
I love this product, I have been using bare minerals for almost a year and I will never go back to another makeup. It's lightweight, good coverage, and doesn't look cakey.

reviews.review_title: Gets better as the day goes on!
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing makeup for 15 years, and this is one of the best foundations I have ever tried. Because I had just bought a new powder and bronzer, I didn't buy the whole kit, just the foundation. It provides great coverage for hours and hours. I put my makeup on at 8 a.m., and it still looks fresh and non-oily at the end of the day. The only negative I see is that I feel like my pores are more noticeable than with some other foundations. I plan to try the mineral veil after my powder runs out, so I hope that will fix that. I like the foundation enough that I'm willing to try.

reviews.review_title: Used to love this stuff, but...
reviews.review_text: ...I swear they've changed their formula. I actually returned a recent bareMinerals purchase to Sephora because it wasn't going on the same as before. The coverage looked dry and cakey and the color was just...off. The woman at the register told me the company has recently changed some formulas and they've been hearing this from some people lately, so I guess I'm not crazy.  My years of sun worship and then the crummy effects of birth control culminated in my once-perfect skin turning into a porous, blotchy mess in my late twenties, so I was happy in that time to discover this foundation. It really helped me fake it for a while. I keep using this stuff now because I hate liquid foundations and I don't know what else to use in its place, but I'm really not a fan anymore.

I've been a loyal Bare Escentuals customer for 5 years and I see no need to even experiment with other products. The finish is flawless and lasts all day. In fact, I splurged on the Clarisonic Mia just to be certain I remove all of it!
I've been using this foundation for years and I always love the flawless complexion it gives me. Even through my hot-flash years, this makeup doesn't run! :)

reviews.review_title: Fantastic Cover, Light Feel, Perfect Results
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for over 6 years. I'm continuously receiving compliments on my skin and I attibute the natural cover to bareMinerals.
love love love !!! i've used bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation for yrs and i so love it !! my mom uses it too now !!

Since BE added new shades they now have my perfect one. It's buildable coverage that's never drying or cakey. It looks very natural and not mask-like. I was tired of applying my foundation and then getting dressed only to get some on my top. Doesn't happen with BE. I also find it quickly heals any acne I have. The only complaint I have is the newly re-designed container. When you're almost out you can still see some inside that will not tap out. A couple times I've broken it apart so I could get to the last of it.

Yes, I stole the tagline from a radio commercial I heard for bareMinerals foundation, but I think it's an apt description. I've been using this foundation for about 2 years now, and I'm addicted.  The makeup goes on smoothly, and I love that I can just use a more focused concealer brush with the same exact foundation powder to cover up any blemishes or under-eye circles as opposed to needing a separate concealer. The makeup looks very natural. Also, the makeup really lasts.  Before switching to bareMinerals I used to use a liquid foundation, concealer, and powder foundation so that my face was literally caked. I received the bareMinerals starter kit and LOVED it. After using up the goods in the kit, I tried to go back to the cosmetic aisle goods, but there was no comparison.

I used to only use bareMinerals for years, and was quite happy with it. However, in the past few years, other favorite brands have introduced their own versions, as a result, I have opted to use the Korres mineral make-up and prefer that one.  Recently the two Sephora stores nearest me were sold out of the Korres foundation in my color, so I had to use up my old bareMinerals and even buy a new one since the two stores did not restock my color in time. My observations are that I will use this only until I find the Korres in my color.  The bareMinerals color closes to me (a Sephora staff member even tried the two closest shades on me to select the best color as it had been awhile since I last purchased this product), leaves me looking tan and I don't feel the coverage is as good as the Korres version.  So if I add more to create more coverage, then it looks like too much foundation. I have yet to try the Laura Mercier mineral make-up, but chose Korres because it is more natural.  Also, in my experience, the original version of this foundation works better for my skin, I was very much looking forward to the matte version as I have combination skin, but it left my skin looking too luminous, I felt it had to opposite effect of matte.
Have used this foundation for several years, love the make-up but I do not like this fairly new container as it makes it hard to get the last bit of make-up.
Beautiful makeup. Goes on nicely and smoothly. Gives great coverage. And it doesn't make me break out.

I've been using Bare Minerals for years and just love it. I'm terrible about washing my face before bed and I just don't worry about it. My daughter is 11 and when the time comes that she wants to wear makeup (in years and years!), then I'll feel better about it all with her using BM.
I've tried other foundations and always go back to bare minerals... There is nothing like it...it's the best!

I've used BE for a couple years now and tried switching to a different brand but I had to come back to BE! It leaves my skin so much more healthy, I don't break out as often, my skin looks radiant. I use the golden medium with my olive undertones and it matches perfectly!

A little goes a long way. Great coverage and sweatproof. I have pigmentation all over my face from the sun and/or hormones and this covers the best without feeling cakey or heavy.  I am happy to find that this latest purchase of bareMinerals had the removable inner lid. I like to mix the bareMInerals with the Laura Mercier power which has some shimmer to it. The last few bareMinerals I purchased (maybe they were the foundation powders?)...I was dissappointed to find the inner lid did not come off. I also ended up having to toss (recycle) the container with still 2 days worth of powder that I could not get out completely due to the lack of a removable inner lid.

I really wanted this product to work on me from all the hype and rave i hear from others. Instead it broke me out and clogged my pores which made my acne worse. I have oily and acne prone skin. I tried using it with the Bare escentual primer and setting it with the powder wich still doesnt work.

reviews.review_title: THE BEST FOUNDATION OF BE FOUNDATION!
reviews.review_text: bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation (REGULAR) is the best in the bare escentuals line.

I'd never used any Bare Escentuals products before, but was very intrigued by this product because of it's ingredients and overall rave reviews. I ordered Fairly Medium which I was nervous about because of my pink undertones, I didn't want to accentuate them. But this product did exactly what I wanted it to do! It gives great coverage without looking cakey and matches my skin tone while giving me a nice even (not pink) color. I've never experienced a foundation like this - I don't think I'll ever use anything else!

I have been using Bare minerals for four years now and I don't plan on switching back to my previous make up. This foundation covers ones flaws without feeling heavy. If you have never used bare minerals and want to give it try you should by the starter kit, it is a great value. Once you try this product you won't want to use anything else.
it's the only thing i've used since 2005. I wouldn't change it for the world- it's healthy way to look good since your pores are breathing.

I bought this after hearing that it was first designed for people with rosacea. Well, I've used it now for about 6 months, and after two years of breakouts, I'm breakout free, and not even taking oral meds for the roseacea. My skin has never looked better (well, at least since roseacea reared her ugly head). I've really pleased, and don't think I'll ever use another makeup.
I am a long time user. I usually purchase in store.

I have used this for about 3 years, and my acne-prone, oily skin has seen fewer blemishes and a more even tone since using this foundation.  In hot, humid, sunny Florida, this stuff is great. While other girls look like their face will melt off or dent if you touch it, this foundation will make you look like a natural beauty. The coverage is natural-looking but still covers like a makeup should.  My skin is very oily, and I do need a touch-up part way through the day. For this I use the mineral veil. Blot with a tissue, TP, or rice paper and apply with the blush brush. It doesn't look cakey when it grabs the oily patches, and the color of the foundation holds well through blotting.  Try it!
I'm a 58 years old and think that this foundation looks very nice on my skin. It makes me feell light, fresh and more natural.

I like this product because it does feel bare on my skin and doesn't collect in my pores as much as the liquid foundations I have tried, but it does not have complete coverage which is a bummer due to my acne so I am still on the search for my perfect foundation!

reviews.review_title: Fresh & Glowing Skin w/ Good Coverage
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way... That sure is true with this foundation! Simply tap some into the lid and load your brush. Go over your face once and your set! Don't overload your brush because too much will give you a cakey look. What I love about this foundation is that it could double up as a concealer. That's right. You don't need to buy an extra product. What I do is I get just a tad, put it on my ring finger and rub it into my dark undereye circles or any blemishes I may have. It's perfect! I feel fresh after putting it on and it even gives me a nice, healthy looking glow. Best mineral make up ever! And what's even better... it lasts throughout the day. ;D

This made me feel like I could have model-quality skin everyday, it was absolutely fantastic! I don't ever wear makeup because I feel that if I start young, wrinkles and what not start younger as well. And also, I LOVE the natural look, so whenever I bought and tried liquids or powders, it felt like a mask. However, with this it made the natural quality of my skin improve when I wasn't wearing the minerals. And it felt great, not like a mask at all.

reviews.review_title: Best Foundation I have ever used
reviews.review_text: I love Bare Minerals! I have very dry skin that is prone to breakouts and this foundation covers flawlessly and manages to look natural even when I am having a bad skin day. To combat flakiness (that may occur because it is a powder and tends to dry out already dry skin), I use the Hydrating Mineral Viel and plenty of moisturiser.

I dont have great skin but with this I look like I do!! Hides imperfections and looks natural. My skin doesnt break out like it used to and my skin looks and feels nicer even when I am not wearing make up.
Definitely love the cover this product gives me. I tend to break out. I find that this product is very good with my sensitive, oily skin.
I have used it forever! It is the best!

I have used this for years and still love it. The new inner lid is great to keep it from shaking into the top part while in my bag. I just love the results, nice blending of uneven skin, and looks very natural.
This is by far the best foundation available! I used to use a cream foundation, but received Bare Escentuals as a gift and have been sold on it every since! a terrific product! give it a chance!

I absolutely love this product. I have very sensitive skin and this is the first foundation I have found that really evens out skin and doesn't make me constantly break out. It also looks very natural on. I would recommend this product to anyone, but especially to anyone with sensitive skin!
Never disappointing! Goes on even, lightweight and I always get compliment on my skin and make up. I only use original, new matte formula Broke my skin out

I've been using this product on and off for the last 5 years. I keep going back to it to give it another try since it's so well reviewed, but everytime I end up searching for something else.  The main complaints I have are: 1. My skin tends to be dry and so the foundation really shows any dry areas. It also collects on tiny blonde hairs on my face and makes them stand out. 2. The makeup does not last very long. People just assume I don't wear makeup when I use this because it wears off quickly. 3. Or the opposite of #2, it looks cakey. I've never been able to find a happy middle ground with this. 4. My skin is naturally a little oily and the makeup does nothing to keep that at bay.  That being said, I love BE shadows, brushes, primer, blush, and mineral veil. I really love anything from Buxom. Overall I love the brand, I just have no luck with the foundation.

reviews.review_title: Not for those with enlarged pores
reviews.review_text: I love products without excessive chemicals in them, and wanted to like this. But it completely sat in my enlarged pores (nose) and made them look larger than they are. Not sure if that's all mineral powders or just this one, but a definite no-no for those of us trying to minimize pore size.
This foundation was great. If you find the right color, it looks like your not wearing any makeup at all. Stays put all day long, and doesn't cause my skin to break out.
Covers great and does not irritate my skin like other foundations. Very light, like I have nothing on!

I am not one of those women who have to have make-up on 24/7. I don't consider this make-up. I love it. I put it on like I put on moisturizer in the morning. It is easy to use and blends perfectly. I have sun damage and it hides it well. I have been using Bare Escentuals for 3 years and cant imagine using anything else.
I purchased this for my son's GF who does not like makeup and after just one use she is hooked! She said it is amazing and feels so good one.

reviews.review_title: Not really sure what the hype is about
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and was hoping this would even out my skin tone, with staying power. Instead I found it too dark/orange for my fair skin. I don't have the palest skin ever, so I used fairly light. Maybe the lighter shade would have matched, but I wasn't happy with the performance of the makeup so I wasn't going to try again. I found it looked shimmery, and didn't stay on my t-zone area. I didn't find the coverage all that great either. Thankfully I found another powder mineral foundation that works perfectly.
like the product, but the packaging stinks. I made a mess and lost most of the product in the sink when I opened the bottom to mix. I hate the packaging!
I have been using this for years and love it! It covers and (and all) imperfections!
I've used this brand for a few years now. My friends all think I have flawless skin when I wear it, but of course I don't.
I've been using this for years and nothing else will ever touch my face. The finish and feel of this is just delicious. Plus, it's good for your skin! Must have.

I have such a love/hate relationship with BM foundation, but I always seem to come back to it. I have oily/acne prone skin and this does give me natural coverage and literally makes my skin seem to glow (not in an oily way!) But due to old acne marks on my cheeks, I need to literally build the coverage and use the concealer brush. There really is an art to applying it. If you are used to liquid foundation, it may make awhile to get used to it. It doesnt seem to be covering at first, but you need to layer. My issue is, that you need alot of product to swirl on the brush to get a good application. Therefore, when its starting to run out, you just can't get a good application, you might as well be wearing nothing. The case does not last nearly as long (for months) as a liquid foundation, but its really better for my skin and keeps my breakouts to a minimum. They have a new larger size, maybe I will start buying that one.

I've always loved Bare Minerals. Minus one star for the price, but other than that, it works well.  I work in kitchens, where makeup is generally discouraged, so I wear this and some waterproof mascara. No one can tell, and I don't look tired and washed out.  I'd love to try the matte, but it is a much smaller quantity for a bigger price. No thanks!

I have been using bare minerals products, specifically the foundation, for over 9 years now and I know it sounds cliche... but it really did change my life! My skin is oily and prone to breakouts and I had a hard time finding makeup that wouldn't make my problem worse. I tried bare minerals and was surprised how good it is for your skin. After using this product I began to realize that my skin was clear. It had a greater effect on my skin than any breakout clearing products did! And also the coverage you get with this product is unbeatable! After trying BM, I trashed my other liquid and powder foundations and never looked back!
I always like this brand and I don't see myself using any other mineral makeup. It's light and it doesn't make your skin more oily.

I'd heard all the hype about this brand and finally decided to try. I absolutely loved! I wasn't sure because I've never been much of a powder person cause I have dry skin, but was very surprised. Made my skin look soft and flawless. Great coverage and very long lasting.

So good. Found my perfect shade unopened at my work and brought it home to try out.  Has great coverage and doesn't irritate sensitive skin.  Only complaint is that if your face sweats, the foundation can become a little patchy and noticeable. Somewhat drying too. Still love it!
By now you have seen the commercials and read the reviews. Bareminerals may seem pricey but it is long lasting not only through out the day but throughout the months.

I would never use any other foundation on my aging skin. Nothing covers my acne scars and age spots more naturally. I am not a cosmetician so I also appreciate how easy and effortless the application is. Always looks even and smooth.
best product ever! buy this and you will never be disappointed!
I have combination skin, with acne scarring, and prone to breakouts. This foundation has been a life-saver. It is so light,but covers so well. I'm very thankful for this product.

The only makeup that is light enough for my fair skin and natural enough for my minimalist makeup routine. Light coverage to even out my skin tone and I never get greasy or turn orange. Simply the best!!
Ive tried them all, and this is the best. You can adjust the coverage, and there are plenty of great shades to make this baby perfect for you. Love it.

This product covers better than any foundation I have used. I've used the product for 5+ years and whenever I've strayed to other foundations, I always end up returning to Bare Minerals. Great for covering scars, acne, or any other flaw.
i must be the only woman on the planet that does not like this! All of my friends love it... It makes my skin look old, wrinkled and crepey.. yuk. I wanted to love it, I really did.

I have tried many different foundations, but by far my fav is this one. I really love the coverage and natural look. That is why I have used it for many years. One little trick I use is to mist my face with an enzyme spray made by My Chelle. I do this after application of my foundation and blush. My make-up melts into my skin for a really smooth and natural look. Lasts all day. Try it.

My daughter is craxy about this foundation. She is olive complected, dark black brown eyes, and is only 25 years old. She knew exactly her color as she borrowed mine from my first kit. I am happy with the shade lighter but this is perfect for her. She also has slightly oily skin so the powder is great. I feel it is a bit drying myself but the finish is so unflawed it is worth it.

reviews.review_title: I'll never use another make up
reviews.review_text: Let me just say when my husband and daughter say that this make up does away w/the line of demarcation, makesme look natural and well polished w/out looking like I have tons of makeup caked on

I have to say that I'm very pleased with this product. I got the Fairly Medium (original) and it's a perfect match for my skin. I used Sheer Cover's mineral powder foundation before I switched to this. I apply it with a Too Faced teddy bear hair powder pouf brush. This foundation gives a wonderful, natural, smooth and flawless look. It doesn't feel like you are wearing foundation, it's light and creamy. No skin irritation at all. I'm very please with my purchase and I will continue to use bareMinerals!
This color fit me to a tee! I've been a long-time user of bareMinerals off and on, but this color is perfect. The coverage is excellent which you can apply based on your skin type and needs. Love it!
Fantastic as usual, love the coverage, love the feel. I also really like the new packaging. Be sure to take the bottom of the jar off to get all the product out when you're close to empty.
been using this product for years now. never makes me break out, not cakey, & gives you FULL coverage. BEST foundation out there.

I like the packaging to control the amount of powder. You don't know how often it's spilled and I've wasted the precious product. I have tried cheaper version of mineral powder but always go back to Bare Escentuals. Do not raise the price or cut the amount. Keep it the same.
Great coverage without over doing it.
I love this product and have been using it for a year. It's easy to use, feels good and looks great.
I love this foundation, it's light, but covers up all my skin color irregularitis.
Perfect color, love it, covers what needs to be covered, but you will still look natural
seems to cover well. have received lots of compliments on my complextion. looks fairly natural.

This is absolutely one of my favorite products! It is pretty lightweight yet full coverage. I feel very natural when I wear this and I actually can't stop wearing it every single day. I also like the silky feeling and the fact that it is actually very creamy even though it is a powder. Another thing that I like is that it naturally glows and looks healthy, although I sometimes question whether I should go with the Matte version, but still.. I'd highly recommend it, along with the brushes of course!
This is by far one of my favorite products for lightweight yet full coverage. I feel very natural when I wear this. I couldn't bare with heavy concealers and makeup.
I love this makeup. I have been using bareminerals for years and I can't imagine ever going back to heavy liquid foundation.

This is pretty much the premier light coverage foundation as far as I'm concerned. Literally conveys the illusion that you have no make up on. Also, the formula is so thin and natural that if you were to leave it on overnight by accident it would be unlikely to cause breakouts. Definitely a great price for the quality and quantity of the product. I still prefer this original over the Matte, and I have tried both in a few different shades (I have 3 shades which I use throughout the year depending on the season/vacations) Great for individuals with redness.. the coverage is buildable, although it still may not be thick enough to cover individuals with severe acne or blemishes. I will say though that I am a firm believe that people with acne issues will see a reduction in their number of breakouts if they switch to this product and continue using for a few months.

Odd as it sounds, I'm fascinated by mineral make up, since I've just 'discovered' it. This foundation feels so silky, and the coverage is quite impressive, but I wish it lasted longer.... by mid-day, I need more of a touching-up than with liquid foundations. However, I have found this is more moisturizing than liquid foundations, and seems to be the answer to the dry patches I'm starting to get around my nose/cheeks.

This foundation would be perfect for someone who has perfect skin. I don't normally break out but i do have a few discolored spots on my face that need to be covered and this foundation absolutely failed at that.

I love this foundation. It makes my skin glow. its so easy to apply, very lightweight! i dont even think about trying something else.the only thing that bothers me a little is that bare minerals used to be organic. But unfortunately not anymore. but its just me,I am crazy about organic stuff=)
Matches my skin color perfectly.

I love the feeling of a clean face and with this product, you don't feel like you're wearing make up at all and it gives you as much, or as little, coverage as you want. I use all of the Bare Escentuals products, from skin care to make-up......nothing else for this face!
The best foundation. I love BE products.
Love love it blends perfectly really light
This is always my favorite! It's great for me & my teen daughter. Covers blemishes very well & is great for oily skin.

Sometimes I can't live without bareMinerals, while other times it's my worst nightmare. My skin seems to be much too dry to wear it this time of year. The product seems to want to stick to my face and not go anywhere. I use a really good moisturizers, so I can't think of why this product doesn't agree with my skin in Winter. I'm sad to say I had to return it.

i've been using BM for 8 yrs and this is definitely my go to makeup. It provides good coverage without that heavy and cakey feeling. I recently tried the BM in Matte but didnt like it so much since it makes my pores stand out more so i switched back to the original. I'll continue to use this product.
I have used this for years and still love it. It is quick and works well.

I have tried LOTS of foundations. Granted, I have very unique combination acne-prone skin. Liquid foundations don't work on me. Cream foundations look caked on. Tinted moisturizers make me break out without fail. So I moved on to mineral foundation: Sei Bella and RAW didn't have the right color, always too yellow and unnatural looking. And they both made me shiny half-way through the day. Now I bought bareMinerals in Fairly Light, and it's the PERFECT color!!! This is the best foundation I have ever worn! It lasts pretty much all day, depending on my activity I might have to do minor touch-ups. If I put more coverage on a blemish, it doesn't look unnatural or a different color from the rest of my face. Every other foundation would make under my eyes very dry and sometimes flaky, but I can use this foundation to cover up my dark circles as well. It's basically a foundation and concealer all in one. So convenient and I'm so in love :) I use the Handy Buki Brush and a small concealer brush and I'm good to go. The only time I broke out from wearing this foundation was when I forgot to wash my brush, but that was my own fault. I would definitely recommend this foundation!!!

I have always heard about how good Bare Minerals was from my friends and so I finally checked it out. from then on I have never wanted to switch to a different cover up. It lasts all day, not greasy or cakey, and gives a nice amount of coverage. Definitely worth the money

I have used BM for several years. I have some mild acne scarring on my cheeks and forehead. This covers the scarring and any redness I get from hormones. It makes my skin radiate! I love that it covers without the feeling of wearing heavy foundation. Thank you, Leslie for creating a great product.

reviews.review_title: fairly light must to be on my face
reviews.review_text: a lovely easy brush on gives you the best tones on your face and is very light on the face
I've tried almost every base makeup known to woman...this is definitely the best.
Wonderful. I've found a powder foundation that doesn't make me itch like crazy. Yay for me :)

I've been wearing this since 6th grade when I didn't have any acne to cover but now being a 15 year old teenager I love this product! I honestly cannot do my makeup without this anymore. I have acne scarring on my cheeks and with assistence of my concealer it seems to help cover it pretty well. Go get you some ;)
I have extremely rosey cheeks and this is the only product that provides me with natural looking coverage all day.

I used BE years ago and since then I have tried many others...Avon, Sheer Cover etc. The other day I decided to stop in the store to pick up some things and I asked a sales associate to help me find a color in the BE line to purchase. (Your hands are NOT the same color as your face!!! LOL) Well, we tried 4 colors before she tried the Med Beige...then perfection! I have some redness and some acne scars and poof it was gone! NOTHING covers like BE and looks so natural! My girlfriend who was with me commented immediately on how great it looked! (We're in our 40's by the way) It's light weight, and buildable and when you look in the mirror your complexion looks fabulous and youthful again. That's it...I will never stray again!

reviews.review_title: As always, this product makes me glow!
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation and would never dream of using anything else ever again. <3
I have been using Bare Escentuals for a very long time and LOVE all of the products. I have very troubled skin and Bare Escentuals does not add to my skin worries. I highly recommend it!
This product is a sure winner. Have been using it for 10 years. Flawless, not heavy and glowing. For beginners, I would recommend the Starter Kit. You will be hooked. Great bang for your buck.

This is my go to for foundation. I don't know that I will ever use anything else. It has helped with my complexion and acne. IT looks natural and not caked on. It doesn't clog my pores like cream foundations have. I LOVE IT. The only drawback is that it doesn't totally give coverage for scarring that I have.
I switched to a liquid foundation a month or so ago and it was awful! Bare Minerals is always perfect and never disappoints! I'll never switch again!

I had my doubts about whether this would cover my acne sufficiently, but it actually covers surprisingly well. It's buildable coverage allows you to keep adding until the redness is covered up without ever looking caked on. It's also good for covering blemishes smoothly, unlike liquid foundation which can cake around the dry edges of a blemish and make it more noticeable. I also have very oily skin, which usually makes my makeup feel dirty after only a few hours, but this feels clean all day.
