I can use blotting paper to reduce my oil shine about midday and the makeup stays on my skin very well and does not rub off with the blotting paper as you might expect. Overall, I am very pleased with this, even for my difficult and high maintenance skin.
looks natural and stays on through out the day
Even coverage and doesn't settle in lines or wrinkles. Gives a smooth look to skin and skin tone.
I have been using this foundation for several years and will not put any other brand on my skin...perfect for sensitive skin/Acne
Love this product. I've been using exclusively for years.

This is BY FAR the BEST powder foundation that I have ever used. I am now a Bare Escentuals girl for life! Has excellent coverage without looking cakey, long lasting all day wear, and when used with a primer~ PERFECTION.
Have tried other mineral foundations and I always come back to this one. And when then added this color I kinda stopped looking.
One of my needed pieces of make up and it never makes you feel like you have too much on.

reviews.review_title: wanted so much to like it
reviews.review_text: but I didn't, so returned it. Thanks Sephora for the return policies. I've never returned a makeup product before after trying it out, but I was so disappointed. I never even wore it out of the house. I read so many glowing reviews, but found it to be too heavy and chalky for me - no matter how many times I tried to achieve a lighter coverage. I tried enough times to see if I could get over the learning curve, but was left with a feeling that either I'm not smart enough to apply it correctly or its not the product for me.
Love this product..feels so natural and light ..stays on all day..would recommend this to all my friends and family

I have been using bareMinerals for some time. Once you find the perfect shade it is easy to conceal blemishes. It also provides a natural finish when you get the technique down. My biggest tip for anyone using this product is that you NEED a face primer. Mostly because adding so much powder to your face can age anyone. I also dont use it under my eyes, I use a cream concealer for that. When Im done with my makeup up I use a very fine spritzer to mist over my face so that my natural oils and the powder blend and create a more natural finish.
Sometimes, I use the fairly medium and combine it with the fairly light to get the color closest to my natural skin color.
My skin tone is actually in between the fairly light and fairly medium so sometimes I buy both and combine them.

reviews.review_title: Cakey, does not last, rubs off easily
reviews.review_text: This foundation did not work for me. I have oily combination skin. Although it does provide full coverage, you have to be really careful when applying this as it can have the cakey look. iI tends to sit in the fine lines and make them look more prominent. Also, I noticed it does not last for more than 3 hours. I had to touch up three or four times thoroughout the day. Also it rubs off really easily. I really wanted to like BE, but it was not for me. I will not be buying this again.

I have been using BE foundation for years. I have tried the other brands and after 1 application go right back to BE. Coverage and quality cannot be matched by the others. If you are looking for a natural looking finish this is the foundation for you.
Used this for some time now and it is a great product. Won't go back to using liquid foundation ever.

This foundation is absolutely amazing; makes you look and feel flawless while feeling so sheer and smooth!! 3 steps in one, replaces foundation, concealer, and powder! Highly recommend to anybody. :) Love love loveeee it!
My skin isn't usually oily but this foundation made it extremely shiny and greasy...I usually go for the matte version but wanted to try this out. Not the right choice
I love this product! Good coverage, feels like I have nothing on!

This is something that i cannot live without. This foundation truly gives flawless coverage , some times i forget to wash it off at night and I have white sheets and never leaves make up on my pillows. I love this product and I recomend it to all my friends and family.

This has been the best foundation I have ever used. I've been using it for a few years now and will never go back. It is healthier for my skin, has more coverage than other foundations, doesn't feel icky and heavy like liquid foundation and looks so natural! LOVE THIS STUFF!!!!!
I absolutely love this stuff. I can dust just a bit for a natural daily glow, or pile it on for a stage performance. GREAT coverage!

reviews.review_title: best foundation ever! great for dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is great for several reasons.  1 - Good for dry skin - t's great for my dry, flaky skin. I went through so many liquid and mousse and liquid to powder makeups and they all did the same thing to my skin - highlighted all the skin flakes so they were really obvious and noticeable. This is the first, and so far only, foundation that doesn't settle around dry skin flakes and make them stand out like little flags on my face.  2- Natural Looking - this foundation doesn't look cakey or overly fake on my skin. It looks really natural, even up close. A little goes a long way and people always tell me how lucky I am to have such NATURALLY even and beautiful skin. If only they knew!  3- Natural Materials - It's good for my skin. It doesn't clog my pores and I love that it's made of natural minerals and isn't harsh on my skin. I don't get breakouts from this, my skin stays clear and healthy. Very breathable!  I've used this for a while now and I can't imagine going to anything else. This is my very favorite foundation of all! Thank you Bare Minerals!

I use to be a big fan of bareminerals but I really don't like how powdery this makes my dry skin look. It evens out my skin tone and matches perfectly, but no matter how little I use I can't get rid of the powdery look. I've watched the dvd and everything. Just doesnt work for my dry skin.
i hate whenever i am forced to have to use any other foundation. my skin improved overnight with bare escentuals. best full coverage with how fair i am and my acne scars
I have been using bareMinerals for around 6 years now and I will never go back to liquid makeup. This item was just another great experience with the bareMineral brand.
I love the way my dkin looks with this makeup!
A daily essential. It attaches so well to your skin that it doesn't even come off on the pillow.

I have tried many Malthus over the years. I have struggled all my life with skin issues. I don't have much confidence. I have been through A fee surgeries. This makeup just feels like you have nothing On your skin. It's truly Bare and clean!

I have sensitive skin and tried using various types of drugstore foundation (neutrogena, physicians formula, etc.) and although none of it caused me any ill effects, it didn't really do anything for me either. This make up is the best i've worn. it's very light (so much so you forget you even have it on) and it covers much more than you'd think a powdered foundation would. For new users i would suggest getting the kit with the warmth, mineral veil, and brushes in it. I will never use another kind of make up.

I had tried bareMinerals years ago and thought it was too much work to look natural AND I would never look natural. I used Medium Beige, then, and it wasn't a perfect match. Never understood the craze but I thought I would take another look since my sister-in-law swears by this stuff. I was happy to discover bareMinerals added new shades, more specifically- Golden Medium. This is the perfect shade for my complexion. Now, I totally get it! My complexion has NEVER looked better. I recommend using the Heavenly Face Brush or something similar; cuts application time in 1/2.

I know that I needed to switch to a mineral-based foundation however I was worried that it would look bad. I really didn't like the colors (tones) and most appear flaky or pasty. That was until I found Bare Minerals. I love this foundation. It goes on easily and looks natural and it's good for my skin. Awesome product.

I've used bareMinerals for years and found that it is the only foundation I will wear due to its light and easy application while still letting your skin look like skin...but healthier. Some of my friends complain that it settles into their lines which I can understand, but I really think it is all about the application technique and the amount you use. I've found use the bare minimum and add more if you need it. It doesn't last long in humid climates especially if you are sweating but what foundation does. One thing I noticed is that it goes on much prettier if you wait 30-60 min after cleansing or if you use a really good moisturizer before applying.
Having an application done is the best way to get a perfect color match. I have no demarcation lines on my jaw or an un-natural color in bright lights. The shade is perfect and matches my skin tone.
Great to wear for cold weather! My skin feels light and flawless!
Have been using Bare Escentuals for years, the foundation is the best and the mineral veil by far makes your skin look incredible. Cuts down on shine and makes your face look flawless.
I alternate between this and the Sephora brand, but since I haven't been able to find my shade in Sephora anymore, I'm back to this. It's light, just enough coverage and long lasting.

I really like the bare minerals foundation. It makes my skin look smooth, isn't greasy and goes on really easy. The only negative I think is that you might need to re-apply later on in the day to get the same look as in the morning when you first applied it. Also, the brush the trial kit comes with I didn't like so I bought a more compacted brush that gives you a heavier application. I would recommend it to anyone that had sensitve skin and is prone to break outs.
No one knows that I have make-up on! My fiance loves the way it looks and is always complimenting on how natural it looks

I am a loyal Bare Essentials customer! I used YoungBlood mineral foundation for about a year and struggled with issues of poor coverage and the fact that it would wear off; however, I needed a mineral foundation that was good for sensitive skin. My mom introduced me to bareMinerals foundation and I've been using it religously for about 3 years now. It is amazing, gives great coverage, hides acne spots and other skin imperfections, lasts all day, covers my dark circles (which nothing else has been able to touch), and does not irritate my sensitive skin (pron to eczema). I prefer the original over the matte...I think you need more of the matte to achieve the same coverage, and I also love the slight amount of illumination that is in the original foundation. My only thing that I don't use from B.E. is their kabuki brush....I much prefer Sephora's mineral foundation brush #45 (I think thats the #). It is a much softer, better quality brush, and has a better and quicker coverage for the same, if not, less money.

I was compelled to sign up just to write this after reading the review of another person on here. I have used bare minerals for years, I've used both the original and the matte versions, and both are great! I actually currently use both, I apply the matte to my T-zone, and use the original to conceal under eye circles and redness around my nose, and also use the original on my cheeks which tend to be a bit drier. I use this foundation daily, and I go through one container about every year. I admit that I'm 27, and my skin issues are dark circles and fine lines, blotchy cheeks, and a some left over acne marks, and I mainly use this product with the concealer brush over problem areas and then lightly brush over my entire face after I've concealed (which I believe is the appropriate way to use this foundation if you watch the how-to videos). And I get full coverage. If you're using full-face full coverage, you might go through a container every 6 months (as my mom does). But if you are like the reviewer who said that a container only lasts her 1 month, you are probably misusing this product or using it on more than just your face. I really love these foundations and I feel I get great coverage and they last me quite a long time and are very affordable for me (even when I was a college student and completely broke). I just wanted to rave on them because I love them and I've recommended them to friends and family several times over the years! I use the shade fairly light, my mom uses light and my sister in law uses medium. I find that this brand has shades do well with a range of ethnicities. P.S. The Sephora starter kit is definitely the way to go if you don't have any of the bare minerals brand brushes these are essential to putting on the product the correct way, plus it comes with warmth and the mineral veil, both of which are great products!
perfect color and great coverage even for acne skin.

I have been a loyal Bare Escentuals customer for over five years now and I am never disappointed with any of their products. I have very fair skin, and this foundation in the fairly medium color provides the perfect coloring for my skintone and stays on all day if I use the Bare Escentuals primer before applying the foundation.
U can't go wrong here. Doesn't make your skin breakout but gives you great coverage. The only down side it trends to go fast. I use it sparingly and get maybe a month of use.

I've been using Bare Escentuals Foundation for several years, now and it's like home to me. I don't like liquids and since I am almost 50, I need a foundation that actually is good for my skin. I blend two shades together to get my skin tone and it really gives a foundation and smooth tone to my face.

I love this foundation. I have been using it for almost 5 years now and in my opinion nothing else can compare. I have extremely sensitive skin that's very acne prone. This foundation covers all of my acne and blemishes perfectly while not causing any new breakouts. It's so light making it feel like I'm not wearing any makeup at all. I use this as both a concealer and foundation. I use the concealer brush to apply the powder to any blemishes or problem areas. Then, I use the larger brush to apply powder all over my face. This foundation gives you complete, full coverage. I wouldn't use any other foundation!

reviews.review_title: Works well for my sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: Like gracelove's review (12-10), I have acne-prone, sensitive skin. I've been using BM for 6 years (maybe longer) and I love the airiness in its appearance, yet the coverage it provides (including SPF). I use a combination of 2-3 colors (light, fairly light, and medium beige), swirled together for regular application, depending on the season.  The foundation works very well concealing blemishes, redness, and dark spots (for my fair skintone, fairly light is a great match when lightly applied in a tapping motion and slowly building from there). In addition, the skin surface is smooth and natural, after a full application. While I've periodically tried other products, I always come back to BM.
I love this stuff, on thing that does not make my face break out and has great coverage

reviews.review_title: Bare Mineral made me look my best.
reviews.review_text: BareMinerals has been the best makeup for me. As a young lady, i had a lot of dark spots from years of heavy acne. Whenever I used Deepest Deep Foundation, my entire face appeared spotless. The foundation also diminished the size of the bumps on my face. I wore bare minerals to every party i attended in college, because it control the oil on my face, it did not stain my close or get smooched when i had sweat on my face from dancing for long hours. I was able to inspire 5 of my friends from college to use bare mineral as their ultimate foundation. The pictures I have up are pictures of me and my older sister. We have been using Bare Mineral for 5 yrs and we are not ever going back to any other makeup brand.
My favorite. Makes skin look luminous.

Total coverage--creates a silky smooth finish that lasts for hours. Using it over a little bit of liquid foundation works even better. Not the most natural looking, but a little blush makes it work out.  Definitely worth having around, especially since it's pretty cheap for a good foundation.
I buy this for my 21 year old daughter all the time. She loves it.

reviews.review_title: Not the Best for Oily Skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage and finish that bareMinerals foundation offers, but I have an oily t-zone and there is just no making this stay on my nose all day :( I wish the matte version had the same coverage as the original, but so far no luck.  If you're not oily it makes a truly beautiful foundation. It really covers redness and discoloration - so well that you'll need a bronzer/blush to add a little color back in (not a complaint!). It also looks very natural, just doesn't do well with oil!

I love bareMinerals foundation for so many reasons. It's light and doesn't look cakey. It matches my skin tone so nicely. Even though it's light it still covers all my blemishes. It lasts a long time since it's in loose powder form. AND it has SPF built in.

I have used this makeup for years and love it. I have tried other mineral makeup and nothing compares. I recently went to my dermatologist and he recommended that I use mineral makeup for the sunscreen properties. I was please that Bare Escentuals was the one he recommended to me.
The only foundation I'll use!
I use this as concealer with makeup forever hd foundation.
Love all your product. Everyone tells me how good my face looks. So natural.
I have oily skin and the foundation stays matte almost all day without drying my skin out. I usually make just a slight retouch in the afternoon. Looks very natural and not cakey.

reviews.review_title: The only foundation I wil ever need again
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed and so so so happy I tried it. I have tons of blotchy freckles and am extremely fair. I got the lightest shade they have, and I love it. I love how you dont need to use tons of layers to get the medium coverage I want. Also, I get a bit red or blotchy sometimes and it covers it easily. I have dry skin as well and it goes on smooth and doesnt leave dry patches like other powders do to me. I wont need to try anything else. :)

I just purchased this fondation today and i HATE it! i really wanted to try this because liquid foundation can cake up, but this was way worse than any liquid foundaion i've tried. Honestly i would rather wear drugstore makeup than this. It rubs off on everything so easy! i was wearing a brand new shirt today , and when i took it off it had makeup all over it from barely touching my skin. Overall it is a very poor foundation and i expected more.
Love this product! Covers well enough that it doesn't look caked on. It leaves my skin glowing.

What can I say that hasn't been said before? This stuff rocks! Honestly, like most wormen, I have strayed and tried other brands. I am always disappointed and come back to BE. It covers well, has SPF and no icky chemicals. What more could a girl want!
Love bareMinerals. I have combination/sensitive skin, and have never had a problem with breakouts when I use this foundation.
Loved it so much I ordered it for my mother.

will never change foundation again - this covers just enough but I'm able to build if i need to cover just a spot. It doesn't break out my face or settle during the day, and DOESN'T SLIDE OFF during the hot humid summers here. I've been using this foundation for 3 years now and don't plan to change!

I have been using bare minerals for a couple years now and even though it is a bit pricey it is worth it. I have tried many other mineral make-ups and this gives me the best results. I have problematic skin and I don't have to worry about this make-up clogging my pores ...plus, it covers really well!
I always come back to Bare Minerals, it really is the best for my skin, for the coverage, and for the price.
yet provides decent coverage; matches my skin tone perfectly, and it is good for your skin!
I have never found anything that works for me as well as bareMinerals.
another jar of the most perfect mineral powder. A couple of times I cheated on it by using other foundations but went back to bm. Never again, it was a mistake and it didn't mean anything!!!)))))))))

I've been using bare minerals foundation for years now and am completely hooked. The clean, lightweight feel makes me forget that I'm even wearing foundation until I look in the mirror and see the great coverage. Between the foundation and the mineral veil, I look 10 years younger and who wouldn't love that? I'll never go back to liquid!

I bought the Fairly Light starter kit about 5 years ago as a birthday gift to myself. I had seen the foundation advertised on TV and decided to try it. I'm so glad I did and I will never use liquid foundation again! You can put this on with your eyes closed and you really can't make a mistake with it. One jar lasts me 6 months or more, so it is really a wonderful buy for such a wonderful product! I also use Laura Mercier's Mineral Primer underneath the bareminerals foundation. It is great for teens too - won't clog pores. I started my daughter on this foundation and she loves it!
Can't live without it. I always get compliments on my complexion.
I like it okay, but even with a primer and a light hand it's still a bit makeup-y for me. Maybe I just need to become more skilled at application?

reviews.review_title: Great new container for a already great product
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for several years now and each time I'd run out of foundation it was always frustrating to know that so much of it was wasted because I could not shake it out or because too much got through the top while traveling and spilled when I opened it. WELL, the new design allows you to open and close the holes and because to holes are a little larger you can more easily release the powder from the bottom portion of the container. The new design helps to make the already great product more useful.
I finally gave bare minerals a try and I really like it! I do think that the color I was told to use is too dark, but I think once I get a lighter color I will really like it.

reviews.review_title: Best foundation I have every used
reviews.review_text: I have used bareMinerals for about 10 years. Prior to using this product I would experience periodic break outs, however since using this product I have had no problems at all. It is so easy to use and I get complements on my skin all of the time. It is the closest you can come to look like you are wearing no makeup, but have a wonderful even skintone. I highly recommend this product.
Best foundation ever! Keeps me from breaking out and lasts a lot longer than other foundations. Only drawback is that it tends to be a bit messy

reviews.review_title: Exactly What I Was Looking For!
reviews.review_text: I had been looking for a product that felt light, was good for the skin, and natural - and that's exactly what I got when I ordered the bareMinerals 9-piece get started kit. I highly recommended this brand/product!
Good shade for me. I love all the bare escentuals products

I purchased the bare mineral foundations for one of my besties her shade. (late bday gift) I never understood why she doesn't use anything else, until one night I asked and she showed me how it gives her flawless appearance on her face.
A little goes a long way. It lasts all day and really helps even out my complextion.
love this brand. This product is lightweight with great coverage. I have combination, sensitive skin and this is great!

I wear fairly light and really love it. It lasts longest and looks best when using Prime Time Primer under it and Mineral Veil on top. I also really like that I don't use a seperate concealer because the coverage is buildable, I just use the concealer brush and I am all set!

This is my go to make up. I have really fair, hard to match skin so I love how the coverage is buildable so it looks natural. Furthermore I have sensitive, acne prone skin and this doesn't irritate it or break it out. Have already turned my sister and friend on to the brand!
I have been using this foundation for about 6 years. There is a reason it is voted best foundation over and over. It just simply is the best
The powder is really great!!! It's light and doesn't block pores which is good for my skin because i have pores problem. I definetely recommend it!!!!

and I do, very sensitive skin. I'm allergic to wheat and I saw on Facebook that some foundations have wheat in them. There was a recommendation for BareMinerals. So I thought, well I should try it. Since I have to wear sunscreen on my face sometimes wearing foundation seems like I have too much stuff on my face. This is so light and yet it evens out my complexion. I really like how I look with it on.

I have used BE for more than 6 years and I love it! I have tried many other mineral powder foundations but I always come back. I do love the new lid, when I travel it doesn't spill everywhere. AND TO EVERYONE WHO HATES THIS NEW LID BECAUSE YOU CAN'T GET THE LAST IF THE PRODUCT OUT: the bottom of the container pops off. I always just take a pen or end of something and pop it off with no problem. Hope this helps!

I just love the Bare Escentuals Foundation. It is so much better than the liquid foundations I had used in the past. It's easy application and stays put. The SPF rating is a real plus also. I will never go back to a liquid again. I just can't say enough good things about it. You just have to try it for yourself. I don't apply it under my eyes though, because it does seem to make the fine lines more visible. .I just use a light, moisturising consealer under the eyes. The fondation really is a great product. If you haven't tried it yet you should!

I love the product and wouldn't use anything else. The new packaging however is awful. You can't get the last little bit out plus you can't mix the colors very well which I like to do. Otherwise I would have given it 5 stars.

I have used Bare Minerals for about 6 years and it is ALWAYS made my skin look and feel great! I love their products.  Since I have such sensitive skin, these mineral foundations work well and help keep my Roaacea in check.  As always, a great product!
I purchased bareMinerinals foundation for the second time and love,love, love it! My skin has never looked better!

reviews.review_title: i use to love this stuff...
reviews.review_text: I can't explain it, but ever since i finally used up my product from my first purchase in 2005, it's just not the same. It sits in my pores immediately unless i use the concealer brush to smooth it out. If i don't do this it emphasizes my pores like no other powder. I have oily combo skin, and this stuff dries out my cheeks, creates lines on my face i don't even have, specifically outside of the laugh line area.

I've been using Bare Minerals for about 3 years now and have had no desire to try anything else. After all, if it ain't broke, don't fix it. I've used other mineral makeup products that were ok, but not as good as this line. It covers what you want covered and still looks very natural. You don't have to use very much of it and it's very easy to use. I'm light skinned but it was recommended I use medium by the lady who assisted me at Sephora when I first bought the starter kit. This is the perfect shade. I wouldn't have tried medium otherwise, so it's smart to go in and let them recommend the right shades for you. This is also a reasonably priced line compared to many others.
Won't use anything else. Period.

I really like this powder. It covers the ALL the redness on my face but I do think this powder is a little hard to blend. I swirl my brush in the powder then the cap and tap off the extra powder and apply it to my face. Where ever I set my brush down, it applies the most powder and I try blending it with a different brush and it helps a little but I can tell there is more powder in one spot then the other. I will try putting even less on the brush, but if I can't get that to work, i think this will be my last time buying this product.

This is an awesome product. People who don't like it don't know how to use it. You need very very little, like hardly any and the right brush, and it evens your skin out like magic. You can build, but very very little product. WIth a big big brush, like eco tools. And the shine, luminosity is so subtle, like better than skin, perfect skin. THe shine factor, done right, is just gorgeous, and no skin irritation. More color options would be nice. I need yellow base and fair/light. I use golden fair, best match, but still maybe too light. I would be nice to be able to mix, but you can't open the container. But you can still mix, more time consuming....If you don't know how to use it, watch a bare minerals video. LOVE IT, nothing compares for coverage, lasting power, lasts in the swimming pool and lumiosity light weight feel.

I've been using Bare Escentuals for about 5 years now and I absolutely love it! I have combination skin and easily breakout. I wasn't too sure about this product at first. I didn't think it would provide me with the right amount of coverage or help eliminate shine, but I was porven wrong! You only need a little bit to get full coverage, the shine on my face has greatly reduce, signs of breakout have practically disappeared, and it so light weight that you forget that's it's on. I've received so many compliments on my complexion. People seem to be in disbelief when I tell them I'm wearing make up. This is my miracle product and Ill never go back to any other foundation again.

everything about Bare Escentuals is remarkable; the products and their ongoing commitment to service and improvement. Even the subtle improvements are appreciated b/c they make a big impact. Way to Go Leslie!
Bareminerals foundations are the best. Once you start using them, you will not go back to a liquid or cream foundation. So natural, and light, with buildable coverage.

I've used this for about a year and my mother kept borrowing it, so I bought her some of her own. She loves it. She thought it was a little shiny at first but she changed the Mineral Veil she was using and loves it so much now!
i love the original BE foundation - its buildable coverage, light, breathable, good range of colors to choose from; i use fair for winter and fairly light for summer

I had read such favorable reviews and I really looked forward to this product and was so disappointed. It looks terribly chalky and accents any wrinkle or pore. I thought it was an application problem, so I studied the technique via videos and tried 3 more times. it appears I did it correctly so either I'm not smart enough to use this product or its just not a good fit to my skin. Regrettably it was an absolute waste of money for me.

I've been using bareMinerals for over 5 years now and I will never use anything else! In my early 20's I used to have really bad breakouts. After a few months of using this foundation I was getting compliments on my skin all the time and years later, continue to. It blends nicely with pale skin with out looking orange or unnatural. I have something I will truly stick with for as long as possible.

reviews.review_title: I've been using it for 4 years
reviews.review_text: Pros: Natural look, easy to use, good coverage, does not irritate your skin.  Cons: 1. you'll mess up your table with a lot of powder on it. 2. Somehow after a few hours, it leaves visible lines of powder on my forehead (probably from my bangs), and it looks funny. So you want to check yourself in a mirror once every several hours.
THE BEST FOUNDATION THAT THERE IS! IT COVERS ANYTHING! I would NEVER use anything else. If you really want the full effect, I totally recommend Bare Essentails Foundation Primer.
I've been using bareMinerals foundation for over a decade. My face stopped breaking out, it works as a sunscreen and I never can feel it on. I wear it everyday. Can't live without it!
Not sure how I ever lived without this foundation. Must finish with Mineral Viel to get full benefit of this product.

reviews.review_title: Hope my daughter enjoys this gift set!
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing this product for several years myself, and finally talked my daughter into trying it too, so she will open hers on Christmas morning! As far as a product review goes, I can tell you that I don't use ANYTHING ELSE but this product on my face, and look forward to trying out the eye shadows soon too! I LOVE mineral makeup, and everyone tells me that it takes years off when I use it! GET YOURSELF SOME!! It is worth every penny, last a long time, and does exactly what it claims to! This is GREAT makeup!
i don't often wear foundation but i have been using this one for years. it is quick and easy to apply and covers up redness and uneven skin without looking like you are wearing foundation. i dig it.
I have very combination skin and I love this foundation. I have tried many different ones and never found one better.

i just can't live without my bareMinerals! my skin's never looked as flawless and more radiant - and i'm in my mid thirty's! it feels soft on my skin without ever feeling caked on. and it covers every imperfection =) thank you bareMinerals!
So I love this product. It doesn't make me break-out and feels light on my face. It also makes my skin look like its glowing. I just wish that you got more powder for the price.
Its like an eraser, it hides blemishes very well. A must try! I use it everyday, and the fact that it has SPF 15 is an added bonus!

reviews.review_title: Stick to Matte for Oily/Combination Skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I purchased the foundation, I chose the matte version based on my skin type. Before the product ran out, I bought the original foundation because I did not see the matte. It seems pretty obvious, but there was a noticeable difference between the two. For me, the original version leaves my face very shiny, so I will definitely stick to matte in the future. Otherwise, I love this product for its natural ingredients and impressive coverage.
This is simply the best choice you could make, better than all the rest out there. Make your skin glow, and I have been swearing by this product since 2006.
im a long time lover of this stuff. fantastic.

I found this product to be very irritating to my skin. After putting it on over my moisturizer, my face itched very badly for the rest of the day. It also gave my face a greasy look to it. Some may call this dewey...but it just looked oily on me! The coverage was not too bad, but this just isn't the product for me!

This is the best, healthiest foundation ever. I'll never use anything else.  Having acne-troubled skin, I was actually extremely skeptical that a powder foundation could provide the coverage I need and not look pasty. When I got married, I inquired to have my makeup done at one of the best salons in our town. They only use Bare Minerals makeup, so I set up a trial appointment to make sure I didn't look hideous. Well, it was the best that makeup has ever looked on my face, and I've been hooked on Bare Minerals ever since.  If you've never used it before, I would suggest getting a professional who knows the product to show you how you can apply it the first time. I'm pretty intuitive about figuring out the best way to do things on myself, but a lot of others are not, and, for this foundation, HOW you apply it is much more important than traditional foundations.  As a quick tip, buff the stuff to death on your face. For like 5 minutes, I'm not kidding. It mixes together better with your natural oils, and I find that the more I buff, I'm not buffing stuff away from my blemishes, it seems to cover them better (which sounds counter-intuitive, I know!). After that, if you need to spot-correct, you can do that with the concealer brush and foundation. I usually have to do that a little bit. 99% of the time I haven't used a separate concealer since I started using this stuff, which I find amazing.  Good luck!
I have bought bareMinerals foundation for years. This product is great.

I hate to say negative feedbacks on products, but I had to return this item (my very first return of cosmetics! usually I feel too sorry when returning cosmetics that I've already opened. But I had to do with this one).  This foundation doesn't blend on my face, dries up my skin so much, and make pores more visible. I'm usually a generous reviewer but I'm giving one star to this one. I'm sorry this award winning product doesn't fit to my face...
i like to switch up my liquid foundaitons but i always go back to buying bareminerals powder foundation! such a great product- looks so natural and makes your skin look awesome

I LOVE this foundation after years of testing/playing with others I finally found it.... great coverage, very light, gives skin a nice healthy glow (when applied properly). Use a lot or use a little, does the job without causing breakout.

I currently am on Accutane and am so thankful I found bare minerals before I went on the medication. My derm highly recommened it and I already had it so it worked out. I do not feel like it offers enough coverage for acne prone skin, but I love how it is so natural and never causes added breakouts! It has literally saved my skin, and doesn't clog my pores or look disgusting and cakey with the dryness I experience from accutane!

I only trust BareMinerals face make-up. It covers so naturally and beautifully, and I've recently discovered (after about 5 years of use) that it has great buildable coverage. If you are a person worried about shinyness, redness, and a natural look, this foundation (and beauty line) is the one for you!!!
I really like the bareMinerals Foundation. It is a nice, light way to even out skin tone and conceal blemishes without a heavy layer of makeup. I find it also clears up my skin and keeps shine down.
Love it! Very light and airy but covers well.

As with their other products, Bare Minerals produces another great foundation. Great coverage and finally a color that matches my skin tone, not too light or dark. Its a great color for people who naturally are a little tan during the winter. Awesome product!!
Medium beige goes with almost every skin tone..and it gives you a nice natural finish..

I am 23 years old and have never worn make-up in my life. my best friend took me to Sephora and they showed me exactly how to put it on. I have rosacea and so I have to be careful with what I put on my face. I have been using it for about 3 weeks now and it covers up my redness wonderfully! I also don't have an issue with it irritating my skin! I love it!
wonderful I use this instead of heavy make

I love the product...HATE the container it comes in. I liked it MUCH better WITHOUT the cover w/ holes...whatever it is called. I can't get to all of the product and it is difficult to use. I used to be able to pop it off, the new design I can't even do that.
i love bare minerals, i will use nothing else. it does everything it says it does plus i look good in it

It is the best thing I have ever put on my face...I typically don't wear make-up or at least I didn't wear foundation until I got BareMinerals. It actually keeps my skin clearer wearing make-up than not! I recommend it to all my friends, and they always say the same thing! Definitely worth the money!
Buy it! I have been a loyal user for 6 years! Nothing comes close! LOVE IT!!!!

At the age of 30 I developed adult acne that has left dark scaring on my face. After treatment for the acne my dermatologist recommended bareMinerals as a foundation. The coverage is amazing. People look at my face and compliment how clear it has become! I Love IT!
Light, fresh, and buildable.  I wouldnt get this if u have shiny skin, as it has a shimmer to it
Love this product. My girlfriends use it as well. Love. It.

Bare Minerals is the only face makeup I will use. It looks very natural, feels like air, and stays on quite well. It even lasts me a few months of daily use! I have very fair skin but I use Fairly Light for an extra boost of coverage for redness and blemishes. I highly recommend buying the accompanying primer and mineral veil for the best looking, longest-lasting results. My only gripe is the cost-I'm about as far as it gets from wealthy-but I constantly splurge because it's absolutely worth it.

reviews.review_title: Will not use any other foundation!
reviews.review_text: I've always been skeptical about wearing foundation as I have such sensitive skin and am prone to breakouts. I've been using Bare Minerals for over a year now and my skin looks great! I love how the minerals give you a natural look. A definite must-have for anyone who wants great natural coverage.
I have been using bareMinerals for 7 years now. Before bareMinerals I never wore make up, well not foundation. I love that it's so easy to apply and makes your skin look natural.
I'm quite simply in love. I have insanely sensitive skin, and this not only doesn't make me get a rash, and it really does work and m skin feels great.

Like my title says, I heard alot of hype about bareminerals and have seen it advertised everywhere for years. My roommate uses it and loves it so I decided to finally try it. It did not fall short one bit. It's so easy to apply and just disappears into my skin, leaving it extra flawless!

I just purchased this product a week ago and I am very satisfied with it. I always have trouble finding a light enough foundation for my skin, but this one is the closest I have found to my skin color. It is still slightly to dark, but it really is the closest I have found. I am also happy with the finish and it doesn't make my acne worse than it is.

I've used mineral make-up from bareessentuals for several years. It takes getting used to. It is powdery and dusty, so now I have a wash cloth with my make-up bag which I place the brushes and powder on. I've worked out the correct amount to make my face get that flawless look, also using the concealer brush for eyes and problem spots. Overall, this is the best solution for me.

reviews.review_title: I would be LOST without this stuff!!!
reviews.review_text: Hands down, this is the best foundation in the world for me. I love the light feel and the coverage is absolutely amazing! The last one I bought lasted over a year! Now THAT'S a bargain! Truly a quality product. If you've not tried bareMinerals foundations yet, you're really missing out. You'll love it.

Ok, so I am not new to bareMinerals foundation. I have tried it and have a problem with thinking theres always something newer and better out there, so I am constantly trying new foundations. I have to say after trying many, many, many foundations I keep coming back to bareMinerals. If you haven't tried it, it's definatly a must to check it out. In my opinion it's the only thing that I have tried that does what it says it will do. And who doesn't love a foundation that will not break you out if god forbid you have a late night out and forget to wash your face?!!
I have been using this product for years! Great coverage, light weight feel. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: doesn't cover as good as a liquid
reviews.review_text: Really not impressed. Doesn't really offer much coverage and if you do end up putting enough on to get full coverage, it looks horrible! Not only does it look fake but it settles in to lines and I mean EVERY line! Both my mother and I have the same opinion so it isn't just me. This is only good if you have absolutely perfect skin. Not to mention it is the messiest product I've ever used. It gets all over everything and traveling with it is a joke. The only thing I like is Mineral Veil and again...I need coverage so no thanks. Plus, the weird bronzer type powder you get in the set is worthless if you are fair skinned. No matter how I use it, I end up looking like I smeared red dirt all over my face. Just isn't for me!

This is my second bare Minerals Bare Escentuals foundation purchase. I originally bought Medium Tan and I liked it very much, however it brought out a grayish purplish hue that I had to blend with warming powder, blush, and the mineral veil in order to look natural. The Golden Medium is just the right tone I need without producing the puprpling effect. It does go on really yellow but once blended with blush a little bit of warming powder it looks extremely natural; like I'm not wearing anything.
Never thought I would be fairly medium because I am very fair. Perfect match. Stays all day and no shine! Love it!

I am VERY picky when it comes to putting things on my face because I have really sensitive skin. This doesn't break me out and evens out my skin tone really nicely. Doesn't even feel like I have anything on my face nor does it really look like it unless you're up veryyy close. Will purchase more in the future.
Still love the stuff, but what's with the hard to open packaging?
I've used this product for years and love it!

I originally bought this to use as my foundation on days when I wasn't really going anywhere or didn't feel like wearing liquid foundation, but let me tell you, now I am HOOKED! I wear this all the time and while I still like the look of my liquid foundation, this just makes my skin look awesome, and I have even noticed a difference in the way my skin looks without makeup. I use m $3 elf powder brush and it gives a great finish and lasts for a long time...if you are on the fence like I was, just try it!

reviews.review_title: The best foundation for blemish prone skin....
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years as it is the only foundation that doesn't break me out....have tried others but always come back to Bare Minerals..

Several years ago I tried a knock off mineral foundation and hated it. But my future daughter in law told me that she loved this brand -- and I love her -- so I decided to give it another try. I have light skin and use the light original foundation. It looks too light at first -- but when I add the Warmth on top, it looks perfect.

The last Bare Minerals foundation I bought months ago had 0.3oz/ 9g of product. The same one I just got has 0.28 oz/ 8g. I also noticed these are now $26 instead of $25. Just like everything these days you get less product for more money. Company's try to be sneaky about it too. Other than that, this makes your skin look great and I will continue to buy.

I really like this foundation. The more I wear it, the clearer my skin looks. The only thing I DON'T like is their new inside lid. Product is almost impossible to get out when it gets low in the jar. I end up throwing away product. PLEASE bring back the original container, with a sifter that can be removed.
Best foundation ever! Only one that doesn't make me break out. Oh and it also makes my skin look great :)
All other foundations caused acne. This foundation made my skin loo flawless.

I have been using this foundation for many years. It helps keep my skin clear, hides redness and feels and looks natural. I would not want to be without it. The color choices are amazing. I've always had very difficult skin to match. I buy a couple of different colors and blend them for the perfect custom shade. It lasts forever. I apply with Kabuki for maximum, easiest coverage. I used to have the stinging sensation that is a common complaint of the product. I stopped using the mineral veil and that stopped.

I have been using Bare Escentuals foundation since the first infomercial came out on TV--which must have been over 10 years ago (although I must admit, the concept of loose mineral foundation seemed odd many years ago). I will not use another foundation. I don't know what took me so long to actually write a review. If you gave me liquid foundation, I will throw it away. This gives the most flawless coverage while you feel nothing on your skin! Your pores aren't clogged and your skin will never feel icky or yucky with this foundation like you do with a liquid or cream foundation. Since I've been using this I've gotten so many compliments on my complexion. I have turned many friends, colleagues, etc., on to BE, and I highly recommend it to anyone and everyone! Oh, and one more thing...and if you ever fell asleep with this makeup on, you will not break out (something I would never, ever have done with a liquid foundation!)...That's how good it is!
This is the best foundation out there for an every day wear. I've been using it for about 5 yrs. I've tried to use other ones, but nothing compares. Love it. Just not to fond of the new packaging.

One word - amazing! I was skeptical that this would cover my sunspot and little mole I have but it covered them completely. I have had many complements on how good I look, have I lost weight, there is something different about you... and it's all due to this amazing little product! Don't hesitate, buy it today!

I heard great things about it, so I decided to try it. Bad decision. Apparently I am allergic to something in this. Right after putting it on, my skin felt like it was on fire. Even after washing it off, my skin was inflammed. If you're thinking about buying this, try a sample first!

I was looking for a mineral powder foundation that was compatible with my skin type and this powder worked very well. Once I put it on my face the coverage is flawless and it doesn't feel like I'm even wearing it. So far this is one of my favorite mineral powder foundations.

I have always heard great reviews abou the BE products from friends and Co-workers, but after I tried it myself for two months I was very disappointed with the results. This makeup was great when first applied in the morning but after about two hours of wear it became very uneven and i had lines all over my face where the product had worn off in places. i have very oily skin and this product did not keep shine away and came off competely around my nose, cheeks and around the jaw line. Even with primers this product did not stay. I also got very little coverage with this product. I will not purchase this product again.

I have been using this foundation for a few years now and I could not be any happier with the results. I can take my time in applying it or if I am in a rush, I can can apply it quick. My boyfriend knew I was out of the foundation and surprised me one night with a new one in my makeup drawer.

My eldest daughter tried to get me to use this for a while but I didn't because I have very dry skin and i thought it would make my skin look drier. I finally did and what a surprise! It did not have that effect at all. This foundation is awesome. I have been using this for about 2 years now and I have also recommended this to others.
I love this product. It's awesome on my skin and doesn't make me break out. It's light and I love this product
Great light coverage that lasts, protects, and provides nutrients. Who wouldn't want that? To look good and, feel good, and be healthy is no longer impossible thanks to bareMinerals.

I am 24 and I have acne prone skin. I decided to try this foundation based on the rave reviews. In the past I used to be a MAC Studio Fix kind of gal -- because it was the only product that would cover up some of my acne scars. Well, this stuff has me converted to Bare Minerals! I have fair skin and the lightest shade is the perfect match, which is awesome because I usually have a hard time finding a light enough shade. When I use this foundation I can control the amount of coverage so I don't even have to use concealer with it. I use a tad all over the face and more where I have acne scars. Since I've started using this product my breakouts have dramatically decreased and my skin looks more radiant on a daily basis. I applied this foundation at 5:30am and it lasted all through 11pm without caking or fading or losing any coverage, amazing. With MAC Studio Fix I used to have to re-apply the foundation ever couple of hours, this stuff is much less maintenance. It has improved my quality of life. And I love the Original finish it has this wonderful light reflective quality.

Goes on smooth, feels light, fairly good coverage. If you have acne spots youll want to spot treat first because this product isnt thick enough to cover spots...BUT using a thick concealer all the time is terrible for your skin, smothers it and CAUSES acne. So, use a spot treatment and then cover it with this amazing product.
I bought as a gift as its very expensive in the UK so I get it for my friend she loves it I DO NOT sorry !!

This is one of those products that has rightfully earned its title!! It is popular for a reason! Not only does it look natural on your skin, but it is made with all natural ingredients! I love the feeling of putting something that is GOOD for my skin on my face! Its fabulous :)

I have wanted to try bare minerals for some time now but never did. I just recently purchased the starter kit in golden medium and it is amazing. It blends so well and looks so natural. It is never cakey like liquid makeup and it lasts most of the day. My skin looks brighter and feels better. Im def a firm bare minerals believer.

This is a great foundation; have been using this for over 8 years. It looks natural and is buildable if you need more or less coverage at times. I sleep in my makeup almost every night, and do not get breakouts from not washing this off. :)
Everything you've heard about this foundation is true. Looks natural while covering everything. I don't even wear concealer anymore.

reviews.review_title: I don't leave the house without it!
reviews.review_text: Does the job, big or small... love, love, love, this foundation!

A few years ago, after seeing several infomercials about Bare Escentuals, a Sephora employee brought it to life for me with a demonstration. Some facialists have determined I have rosacea, but even if that is not an accurate evaluation of my skin, it's still very SENSITIVE and RED. I have never used a foundation or powder that has provided both full coverage without looking cake-y but also with the type of natural ingredients that keep it from clogging my pores. I'm 43, and just yesterday a very young 20-something was washing my hair at my salon and said to me, You have such even skin tone. Are you wearing foundation? Believe me, you won't be disappointed.

I cannot say enough good things about bareminerals foundation. I made the switch when it was still relatively new and haven't looked back or used anything else since - it's amazing. Smooth, even coverage that minimizes pores and looks like your own natural skin. Flawless without the look of makeup. I have sensitive skin and it never causes irritation, redness, dryness, or breakouts. In a word - perfect!
I have very sensitive skin and it seems like i am allergic to everything! This product is awesome! I have been using it for about 2 years now and its my dream product come true :)

I've been using this for the last ten years and this is absolutely the best powder foundation on the market. I always get compliments on how beautiful my skin is. (only if they can see me without this foundation on!!) it evens out my skin tone and gives it a natural looking glow. I also use Clear Radiance by Bare Minerals which give a little shimmer on the cheek bones. really a great product. I can't say enough about it. Must try!!

reviews.review_title: The Best Foundation for Oily Skin!
reviews.review_text: This is the only foundation that lasts all day. It absolutely removes the shine and provides maximum, flawless coverage when my skin breaks out.
this is the perfect color for my winter skin - not chalky and not too dark. it's a great coverage so long as you use the right brush with it (kabuki really does work) and controls my breakouts.
Light, but comprehensive coverage. Doesn't feel like your wearing a ton of makeup. Can dry me out a little, so just make sure you use a good moisturizer, too.
Been using for 5 years, stays all day, finish looks great

I have been a faithful BE user for over 4 years, and I am totally hooked! Never do I consider going back to liquid foundation. I like that this provides great coverage, but the best thing of all is that it's not greasy or sticky. It never gives me breakouts or irritation. Love this foundation!

I always used to use liquid makeup, but this is soo much better. I unfortunately have a case of adult acne, and this does a great job hiding it. My face doesn't feel sticky and it blends it great. I wouldn't use anything else!
Been using it for years and love it.
This is a GREAT product but does not last as long as expected. Also, who has the money to buy a SPECIAL BRUSH!?!?!? It does not have THE SAME EFFECT unless you use THIER BRUSH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I've been using this for the past year and I will never switch foundations again! I've tried all sorts of liquids and powders, nothing compares to the coverage and lighweight feel I get with BareMinerals. Just like with any powder, make sure your moisturizer and/or primer is completely dry before applying, otherwise it is a tad streaky. BOTTOM LINE - LOVE IT!
Bare Minerals looks so natural and feels so light on your skin!
Ever since I switched to this stuff I cannot see myself using anything else....or going back to liquid.

I've used bare minerals before (borrowing from my mama) but that was a few years ago. I was in the store and decided to try it again because I loved the way that it made my skin look when I was younger. No difference here. This stuff is amazing. I put it on over my primer and use the mineral veil and my skin looks great. Will definitely be sticking with the product!

I use both this and the matte bare minerals. So far, this has given me less skin problems than the matte version. I like how it settles with time and love how light it feels. I've used many other foundations and compressed powders but they usually felt very cakey. This is light but at the same time has great coverage.

This is great for my light skin with pink undertones. If I'm particularly pink or my skin is inflamed, this is a little too light for me. But the coverage is good overall. I find that my skin looks a little dry for the first few hours, as this is a powder. Like any other foundation, if you put on too much, you can look cakey and the skin looks really dull.

reviews.review_title: As amazing as the hype suggests
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It's the perfect foundation that looks amazingly natural, and covers up imperfections so that you don't have to rely too much on concealer. Though the powder form takes some getting used to for a first-time user, it's sooo worth it. Love it.

Since I ordered the introductory kit, I have not used anything else. I no longer like cream or liquid because it gets on my hands when applying and it feels heavy. bareMinerals makes my face look smooth and glowing. I just celebrated my 68th birthday but this makeup helps me look younger, in my opinion. If only the rest of me looked as good.

I've been using this on and off of 5.5 years. I sometimes veer away from it because it's a little drying, and go the liquid route. I feel like liquid foundations clog my pores though. This doesn't seem to do that. Whenever my skin is breaking out, I go and switch back to this. It usually is good with breakouts and covers them up well too. It doesn't necessarily clear them... but it does not make them worse, I know that to be true. I wish it was a little less drying... that's my one thing I dislike about it. I wish bare essentials would make a liquid version that didn't clog the pores. that would be amazing!

I love this foundation. I swear by bareminerals. They have a great range of colors. I use medium dark which is the perfect color. Great coverage and does not make my face breakout. Also works great with the primetime facial primer.

I've been using BareMinerals for a little over a year now and am obsessed! I have really good skin to begin with (I've never had any problems with pimples or acne or anything like that) so the light coverage bareMinerals offers is great. 2 thumbs way way up! The only negative I have to say about it is that in the summer it would make my face a little greasy, but I suppose that's a problem with most foundations.

reviews.review_title: Little black dress of mineral powders
reviews.review_text: This powder is great. There's not much more to say, it gives excellent coverage without feeling heavy or oily like liquid foundations often do, and has a neat closing mechanism that makes this perfect for traveling and on-the-go touch-ups. However, TO ALL YOU ASIAN GIRLS OUT THERE, this color tends to be a little on the yellow side, try mixing it with a lighter shade or balancing it out with a lighter tinted moisturizer underneath. Overall great product.
This product does what it says :) It gives good coverage without looking cakey & does not irritate or clog pores. I recommend this product to anyone who has problems with acne or oily skin.

Have used bareminerals foundation off and on for a few years. Love the way it feels on my skin, not thick and cakey to me at all. Doesn't crease and show wrinkles for me. Doesn't cause me to breakout at all. Just lightweight and airbrushed looking. The only star I took away is because when I have more that I want to cover up on my skin I feel like ColorSciencePro pressed mineral foundation actually covered way more! However, that one felt slid off of my skin too much, which is why I went back to bareminerals. Unfortunately I noticed it FELT better, but didn't cover quite as much, though it covers well enough. I'd say 85%

I have been using this foundation for years and I still love it. Has good coverage when applied correctly and is great for anyone with acne prone skin. I also like that it doesn't have all the bad ingredients.

I am so glad Bare Escentuals added Fairly Medium to their SPF 15 Foundation shade options. I have light skin with a a little bit of warm undertone, but so many light-to-medium colors are way too yellow, or they go the other way and are pink. This is right in-between and pretty sheer. I finally found my perfect shade. In the summer, I mix it with Medium to accommodate a slight tan. In the dead of winter, I can mix it with Fair or Fairly Light to make it paler and a little more ethereal. The formula, of course, is what bareMinerals is known for. Light, weightless, with as much coverage as you want. Buff lightly for a sheer effect, buff a little more for more coverage, use it with the concealer brush to perfectly cover blemishes or discolorations. You definitely want to use a good moisturizer under any SPF 15 Foundation. Without at least a primer, it gives a little of a dry-skin effect and can make pores more visible. A layer of moisturizer prevents that from happening.
This is a good product. It does a great job covering imperfections and evening out skintone. But for some reason it gives my skin a cakey look & feel. Not sure if it's because I have really dry skin.

This cult favorite, best selling, award winning foundation is really worth the hype! It's blends in so creamy, leaving an almost air brushed flawless, yet natural finish. It has buildable coverage, so you can always customize your look. And it's natural, and is actually good for your skin. It claims to improve your skin over time, and it truly does. I saw an improvement in the texture and clarity of my skin after a couple of months of regular use. The only problem one might have with the foundation is the staying power. You MUST, I repeat MUST, use a primer with this foundation (my personal favorite is Hourglass Mineral Veil). Without a primer, this foundation doesn't last long, but using a primer not only smooths and preps your skin for the application of foundation, but really ups the staying powder of your foundation by giving it something to stick too. I also recommend using a lightweight translucent powder to set it (I like the BE mineral veil or the MUFU HD Setting Powder). With these two tricks, your foundation should last for hours leaving your skin looking smooth and flawless. Must I say it again? This foundation is well worth the hype, leaving your skin with a flawless yet natural finish, it buffs in so smooth and creamy, AND it's good for your skin, what more could you ask for in a foundation?
I have a sample of this in fairly light. It looks dry and cakey on. I would get liquid foundation instead.

reviews.review_title: It did not work for me
reviews.review_text: It covered up my horrible redness, but did not conceal my acne spots nor did it help cover my dermatitis. It also made my combo face feel very dry like I was wearing a mask. I used the primer and did everything correctly, but I am 21 and using this stuff made me see lines and wrinkles I did not even know I had. I am so sad I really wanted to like this stuff :( returning.
This is my favorite makeup, gives great coverage and no breakouts to my sensitive skin! Love it!
I love love love my bare minerals! Makes my skin look and feel great!

The coverage is amazing. It looks so natural, I'll never change. Perfect for all ages and I'm 58. When I am around some of my friends I notice their makeup is not as smooth and natural looking as mine. And thats in any llight. I love bare minerals.
it is quick and easy and covers rosacea

I've used bare minerals for a few years now. Sometimes I try out new foundations but I always come back. I love that it's light and looks natural. When I was in college people thought I just had great skin, never knowing I used this! The only issue I have is that I can't seem to find a single shade that matches my skin so I usually mix Medium Beige with Medium tan - it's worth getting two because they last so incredibly long. I'm a loyal fan and I don't think I'll be switching any time soon.

I always have trouble finding a color match but the huge color selection from bare minerals made it easy. I love the coverage which is light to medium and buildable. The amount you get lasts a long time. This is my go-to foundation when I just want a nice even complexion. I do have dry skin and this seem to work well and not make my face look super flaky and obvious that it is dry.  The only issue I have is that no matter how careful I am I always get mineral powder everywhere on my vanity and it drives me nuts. And foundation always get stuck on the edges of the cap and when you turn it around to close your container it gets everywhere.
Golden medium is perfect for olive skin tones.

I started using bare minerals almost 10 years ago when it was available via infomercials and have never stopped. It provides the best coverage without feeling gunky like liquid foundations and the color match is amazing. I'm Asian, so it's hard to find a shade that match my skin tone without making me look too pink or yellow. I find light to be a perfect match. Makes me look like I have flawless perfect skin! I tried the matte, but going back to the original.

I just started using this a couple months ago and i love it. I wish it had more coverage, so i use a liquid foundation under it, and it looks flawless. It never gets flakey on my dry skin which is hard to find. Just looks 100% radient.
I have been a fan for years and still I love it! The top and bottom of the container are one piece so you can't use all the make up inside. That's my only complaint.
Love, love, love...if you are a first timer get the starter kit!

This foundation continues to be the best. As someone with rosacea, I was thrilled to find BareMinerals. I've been using it for about 10 years. LOVE IT! But, as someone with fine lines (small wrinkles?), I've found that blending the foundation with Mineral Veil works best. One jar foundation + 1/2 veil is my blend. Just seems to keep it light and fresh. Easy, easy!

I don't know if it's not working as well because I'm not using a primer, but this make up is mediocre. I've always been terrified of foundation so this was a gateway out (not to mention all the good reviews!).  However, this make up hasn't done anything for me. You literally have to have perfect skin in order for this to work. I have redness and pimples as well as some scabbing/damage, and this does a VERY light coverage.  It brings color to my face, and doesn't cause more breakouts, but it isn't anything amazing.  I've used this product for 2 years (and counting) because I can't find an affordable foundation.
This powder is great, especially for the summer, its light, covers all the imperfections and leaves your skin glowing. Everyone with all the skin types should give it a try. It will change your life!

This is the only foundation I will use for daily wear. I appreciate that this has an SPF 15 and lasts all day. Application is very important with this foundation - swirling the brush, tapping out the excess, and buffing it onto your skin lightly produces better results than just smearing it on. Love it!

I'm really particular about my foundations. I don't like the cakey, heavy look, and I've never had much luck with powder foundations. . I am hooked on Bare Minerals. I makes my skin look healthy and natural. It blends well with my skin tone, and is really gentle. I suggest giving this product a try- especially if you have sensitive, acne prone skin. The fact that it is made with natural ingredients instead of chemicals I can barely pronounce is a huge plus in my book.

i used to love bare minerals but had to stop using it because everytime i would sweat my face would itch. the guy at sephora told me they had fixed that and they have. however, i actually had people all around work asking me if i were ok and telling me i looked tired. i went and looked in the bathroom mirror and was horrified. i actually looked older! returned!
GREAT coverage! I got this stuff to see if it would help with concealing my redness and it does better than any other foundation I have tried!!
I can't live without my bare minerals. I wear it everyday.

I love this stuff and use it every day that I wear makeup--- so almost every day! It is wonderful and you can sleep in it because it is actually good for your face. I love the container, and I also have a cool little refillable kabuki brush that I use to apply it. Wonderful product and absolutely magnificent line. (Great skincare too).

I was hesitant about starting bareMinerals because I wasn't sure if it was going to give me the coverage I needed. After I used a sample, I was hooked! It gave me a more natural look, controlled shine, and it's buildable coverage. I don't have to put any blemish cream on before. Love it!

reviews.review_title: Best mineral makeup I have used
reviews.review_text: I keep trying different brands, and yet I keep coming back to this one. Cheaper brands just don't work as well, and more expensive brands aren't worth the price.
Like this makeup very much. It's light weight and has great coverage. Feels very soft after you put it on.

I assumed because my skin was on the dry side I would always have to use a liquid foundation, but it is annoying and messy so I decided to try bare minerals. I like the foundation, I bought medium and it's just right. I do need to use a liquid concealer for my under eye circles, but the foundation does a good job at hiding other imperfections.
I use this everyday! Sometimes my skin is too dry for this powder but the primer or daub of vaseline helps this.
This foundation is very light, covers all blemishes and I even feel younger!

I like the new design of the container, which prevents spillage and controls the flow of the powder. It can be a bit tough to break the initial plastic seal, but just go at it with a scissors to break through. Same great formula though!

will I ever use liquid foundation after knowing how awesome mineral foundation is! You really do have to try it to know what you've been missing. Sheer coverage that never makes me break out (unlike my experience with liquid).

Just love this makeup. On occasion I use it over a cream foundation for evening wear. Once you get the hang of applying, it's easy and quick. I do use a mattifyer first. I have to buy two colors and mix them for the right shade.

I have been buying this stuff for awhile now, and I've been completely satisfied. I use it pretty much every day. The powder is very light, but covers quite well. It covers any redness in my face and evens out my skin tone. I really prefer it to liquid foundations.
I have been wanting to try bareMinerals for a long time and I'm so happy I finally did! I love the fact that it provides coverage without feeling caked on.
I have been using BE for a while now and l love all their products.
I've had issues with my skin in the past. Once I started using bareMinerals Foundation, my face started to improve vastly! I'll never use any other foundations or powders!
love this for coverage.
This product is well worth the money. It gives excellent coverage without looking or feeling cakey or clogging pores and it even makes your skin feel soft to the touch. I absolutely love it!
amazing coverage without outting alot on ,alittle goes a long way
Its not lumpy, it doesn't leave streaks....it's just amazing! It does a pretty good job of covering up my freckles and any breakouts I get. It's also very light with a natural look
I love that it feels so light. I also like being able to wear just a little bit or for those days that I have a pimple or flaw I can use more to cover.
Coverage without making you look like you have makeup. Does not get into creases
Love the fact that you can build up coverage without this foundation looking 'caked on'. Goes on very light, and allows my skin to breath.

I have used mineral foundation for awhile, but this was my first time to tray Bare Minerals and I like it. The tray help you tap out just the right amount and the shade is perfect. I am very fair skinned with a golden hue, so I use golden fair and it's an exact match. It goes on very easily, with good coverage and lasts all day.

Love this for providing a smooth natural coverage. Need to definitely use a moisturizer daily before you use it or it does show the wrinkles but the subtle shimmer in the powder gives you a great glow and is good for even difficult skin like mine.
great product have used it for years. it's good for my skin and no problem with dryness. Highly recommend this.

This is my go to foundation. I absolutely love it. It blends very well and it feels as though I have nothing on. The coverage isn't as great as I would like, but I can't complain seeing as though it safe for my skin. My esthetician recommends this for me because it doesn't clogs my pores

I used this foundation for a while after tiring of liquid foundations. I liked it but found the color range at the time limited. I also found that it had a subtle sheen to it, like tiny glitter. Not really impressed and seems like the price has gone up? Overall, not thrilled but worked for a while. Would I go back? No, there are better options out there, albeit, more pricey but Clinique offers solid competition.
I like the coverage and the application. But it doesn't last long even with a primer. Plus I have oily skin and it makes it more shiny. The Matte formulation is ok but doesn't last either.
matches me perfectly and makes my skin look flawless.
Found my perfect shade. Love how it makes you look flawless yet still natural. Long-lasting and really feels like you're not wearing anything on your face.

reviews.review_title: This is my favorite make up.
reviews.review_text: Years ago I had trouble finding a make up that wouldn't show my fine lines. After about two years of trying different brands I tried this one. I have been using it ever since. If you want a natural look this is the make up for you. I will probably never change.
Best natural looking foundation, especially for sensitive skill.

I've been using this for years and I love it. I live in NY where the climate varies season to season and I use it year round. A little in the summer, more in the winter. All natural, suitable for vegans and vegetarians, great coverage and lots of shades to choose from. Great for my dry sensitive skin, and my mom's oily skin!
Love this foundation, definitely a difference from any other powder foundations I've used in the past.

I recently started using the bareMinerals foundation again after at least two years of using the disgusting liquid foundations, and I can not believe I wasted those 2 years! Long story short, the other day a new friend of mine and I were talking and she was studying my face and finally said You're face is beautiful, your skin is so tight! I couldn't believe my ears...I'm 46! (She also informed me that she thought my 25 year-old daughter was my sister!!) Loving life! Thank you thank you thank you!

This is something I use for special occasions only, because it breaks me out. It was supposed to be noncomedogenic (won't clog pores) and it isn't working for me. I have fairly good skin, and this still breaks me out.

Have been wearing BE for about 6 years. I have rosacea and people can't tell. It feels natural, never cakey like liquid foundations, and doesn't 'slide' off the face. My skin keeps getting dryer as I age, but now love the matte in this for summer when you can look like you have a little sheen from persperation.

This is the best mineral make-up I've ever tried. I always come back to it. I wish it were on sale more! It greats fantastic coverage while still looking natural. I have also used the Sephora brand which is cheaper and also relatively good, but this covers better and feels better when it's on. I also feel like this last throughout the entire day.

I switched to Bare Minerals for it's natural purposes. It took a little bit of getting used to (I had used a pressed power), but now I love it! You can really control the type of coverage you want using the different brushes. Bare Minerals is one I will continue to order and recommend.

After using Bare Minerals for 4 years and loving all their products, I finally convinced my 80 year old mother to give it a try. Swirl, tap and buff has now become part of her life. Her skin is very fragile and her eyesight is not that good. I wanted her to use something good for her skin that required little effort and you always look great. Bare Minerals was the solution. She sleeps in it most nights and her fragile skin looks better every day. 80 year olds still want to look pretty and if they are like my mother still using the makeup they used from there younger years that often looks like a clown. There is no way to mess up with the Bare Minerals. Pass this on to anyone you know who has an elderly mom or aunt that hasn't tried this product. It is the best.
LOVE this fondation. Always gives great coverage and makes my skin feel great. I have been using this product for 5+ years and any other foundation I use feel so heavy in comparison!
I don't know what to say, except that I can't live without it!
The best mineral foundation on the market
the girl at the counter helped me find my perfect shade and this was it!  goes on smooth and covers as little or as much as you want it to. love love love this makeup!

This used to be my favorite powder/foundation in the world. My skin must be changing, because it has started making my skin look very dry and not covering the flaws it used to. Oh well. I did have to return it.
