Best foundation I have ever used. Have been using for years. Very natural looking and I have received several compliments about how clear and soft my face looks.

I tried this and liked it for about a year or so and I always but on to much because it would come off and it started to look cakey if I actually wanted it to stay. I just stopped wearing foundation because I have acne anyways and it wasn't the best to get a rid of it. Now my acne has cleared up but I'm not sure I'm going to use this product again. Not sure if it is for me.

reviews.review_title: Never going to stray away from this
reviews.review_text: I've been using bareMinerals for YEARS, but had was totally using the WRONG color!!! I was noticing in pics that my face looked sort of on the pink-ish side (I had been using Medium Beige), but have not switched to Medium Tan + it's PERFECT! The coverage is GREAT + gets rid of all the tiny imperfections + red/pink blotches (which I have alot of). The only downfall is that I sometimes find my skin a little oily at the end of the day, but I'm pretty sure that happens with or without the bareMinerals.

I made the mistake of trying other foundations over the past year. I finally went back to bareMinerals and am so pleased with the results. It is by far the most natural foundation and it covers everything (I have rosacea). I couldn't be happier with the results and am so happy I switched back! It is the best for sensitive skin.

i had to stop using this foundation, it didn't deliver as promised. powders in general are too drying for my skin, but i also didn't like the coverage; Ii found it to be too sheer and was gone by lunch
Been using this for years, love it, it covers without any heavy makeup look. Great Stuff
I love this product because it's flawless on my combination skin. Also, it's smooth and doesn't draining my skin. It's a good choice for a natural finish!

reviews.review_title: Over A Decade of Loving It!
reviews.review_text: I have been using this bare minerals foundation for over 10 years, and I'm still loving it! I get the everyday coverage plus SPF protection that I need. My skin looks flawless every time.
I've been using Bare Minerals for years. You don't even feel like you're wearing make-up and it covers all the flaws. Love it!
great for me..i have really great skin....and this doesn't cover it up!
I don't care for this at all. It looks cakey and mask-like. It feels heavy, even though I use a light touch when applying. I won't buy this again.
I like this product since I am older and my skin tends to be dry This product covers the redness on my cheek area.

I was reluctant to try a powder foundation after using liquid for years. I like that this product allows me to decide how much coverage I want. I still go back to liquid occasionally, but I like the way this makes my skin look dewy and fresh.
usually I have such a hard time finding a foundation the matches my skin tone but this one is perfect. It matches me just right and I'm very happy with my purchase.

I love bare minerals, and so far have found nothing like the foundation. I have a huge problem with the poor packaging, however. I must have fifty jars at home with stuff still stuck in them, but no way to get to it. Wasteful. Still love this product but getting fed up.
I never wore makeup before but my daughter suggested I try bare essentials a few years ago and I am hooked, I love Leslie's products!!!
I have used this product for many years and absolutely love it. I hated wearing heavy makeup and this makes you feel like you have none on but still have great coverage.
I absolutely love it...it's so natural looking and so light you don't even feel like you are wearing any makeup! My absolute FAVORITE!

I normally don't like to spend (or have the money to spend) this much on make-up. I'm a pretty simple person when it comes to products, but this product is worth every penny. It looks so natural and I wear it all day without feeling greasy or gross. Be careful not to put tooooo much on. A little goes a long way. Love love love it.
I work at the beach and it is difficult to find a product that doesn't melt off, but this one stay for my entire 10 hour shift and looks natural the whole time.
I love this product. So easy to use,and the new design keeps the minerals from going everywhere!
Have used this for YEARS, can't recall how many. The ease of mineral foundation and the look is just what I love.

I think this product is great, it has wonderful coverage and it feels like I have no make-up on. The makeup consultant was great and she was very informative, people always give me a darker foundation which made me look darker than I already am, so when she explained to me that I could use warmth during the summer months to level out the color i thought it was amazing!

reviews.review_title: bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation Bare Escentuals bar
reviews.review_text: I've always loved the foundation and I really love the new packaging. The addition of the top that closes is great!
I love the way this make-up literally looks just like perfect skin. Never powdery or streaky looking. Plus SPF 15 - bonus!

I wore this foundation a couple years ago, and found it to not be too long-lasting so for the past couple years i have worn different types of liquid foundations. I finally went back to it one day after being frustrated with the cakey look liquid foundations can sometimes give, and i am in love! I think it is because i am now using it in conjunction with the too faced primed and poreless foundation primer and the urban decay all nighter spray, which helps it to last all day. I wore it a couple days ago while at work (i am a waitress) and it lasted me through an 11 hour shift in which i served 9 tables all at once). when i got home and looked in the mirror to see that it still looked extremely good, I knew i was sold! I also think it looks good because i applied it with the ELF flat top powder brush. this helps to pack the foundation on without it looking cakey. Seriously, this is the best thing ever! Try it :)

I have always had trouble finding makeup that is light enough for my VERY pale skin, but Bare Minerals matches my shade perfectly. It is easy on my skin, and covers very nicely. you can definitely get full coverage out of this with the right brush, which i didnt expect when I first started using mineral makeup. Love it!

This is the best foundation I have ever used. It is not messy and oily looking like liquid, or cakey looking like powder. It is a truely unique formula that really feels like cream on your face, but absorbs oil, looks natural, and is quick and easy to apply. I have terrible acne and it covers it easily, with no concealer. You can blend these foundations to get the perfect color for you. The fair is actually fair, for once, and I am very happy about that. Since this is only 26 dollars, why not try it?

I am using this product, and will continue, but I'm not sure it is the best foundation for me. I am 58 and large pores are my biggest issue, next to dark spots from sun damage, not lines or wrinkles. I am able to cover dark spots beautifully!, but to me my pores really stand out. (Mostly on my upper lip) No foundation has been any better, so I will stick with this because the color match is great and it's really good for my skin. I know that if I used a primer it would be better, but I haven't found one that I can stand the feel of. Everyone I know who uses this product loves it.
So i wore this foundation the whole day to make this stopmotion video, it took about 5 hours indoors and outdoors and my face still looked flawless. I love it so much! it is my go to foundation!

my cousin has told me a million times to try this stuff. i have used liquid foundation for years and i just started putting on powder foundation recently because i've found that it gives me a better overall look. well, after a few weeks of using my old powder- i started breaking out like crazy. so i switched back to my liquid foundation until i could finally do the smart thing and take my cousins advice. i drove to sephora and bought bare minerals. im in LOVE. it works sooo much better at covering up those spots that you dont want seen, it feels light, and it just gives your face a nice young look. i love what it does. and i would be willing to spend the extra money to get it again and again and again.
My 20 somthing daughter gave me the starter kit for xmas and I am hooked!

I have used this product for several years, and though I occasionally stray and buy something else, I always come back to bare minerals. I sometimes feel the coverage is pretty sheer for my age, but so far, I haven't found anything I like better.
I have worn this for years and love it. It covers sun spots and broken blood vessels in my cheeks. Does not look like foundation on, but covers everything that needs to be covered.

reviews.review_title: I pray they are in business FOREVER!!!
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareMinerals for Years! I have always had problem skin and nomatter what issues my skin may be having, this makeup covers, comforts, and conceals. It is truly amazing ... it is magical! I know it may sound like overkill, or exaggeration, but it is pure truth. I can't even tell you how many complements I have gotten on my complexion, but I just got another random one today ... at the post office!! I'm telling you, call it what you want, magic, miracle powder, or sheer genius ... just go get it!
I love bareMinerals! I used to be a loyal MAC fan and since I started to use bareMinerals I have not gone back. I do suggest you purchase the Mineral Veil as well so it will last longer!

This is a great product. I use it on a daily bases. But if you are in your 30's you may want to purchase an under eye concealer. I recommend TEMPTU Under Eye Concealer for some spots that give you a little more trouble. I own a bar, so I am up late nights, and it helps with dark circles as well. BareMinerals is light and a great product!!

This was my second time buying bare minerals foundation. It is by far the best foundation I have found. Since it is a powder, it never feels too heavy. Somehow it still provides excellent coverage. I also think my skin has improved since using this. I am able to use less make-up or none at all because my skin looks healthy and glowing. Many of my friends use bare minerals and love it as well.

this stuff will cover anything, is able to be layered for different levels of coverage, and doesn't leave you with a cakey look, even though you'd think since it's a powder it wouldn't be sucessful at any of those things. I'd watched the infomercial a ton of times, and just didn't believe it, but it's totally true. I'm on my 5th or 6th pot of this stuff now. The original covers better than the matte FYI, and the kits are a better deal than separate, and you can get multiple brushes that way, and keep one in your purse or whatever.

I have been using bareMinerals for years now. I love that I don't have to put foundation, concealer AND powder on my face and clog up my pores. This is lightweight, easy, and natural... Only thing I would recommend is, take a friend with you to look for your correct color. The salespeople always get it wrong.

it looks bare when you have it on. A younger co-worker hooked me up with this, and I have been a fan ever since. In the summer I use the darker color, but I can't live w/o this makeup. Love the new twist shut tops-so much better for traveling.

Once I found the correct color (Medium), it became my makeup for both summer and winter by adding more or less bronzer. I have large pores and combo skin so I always use a primer, altho not the BE primer. Once it settles in, it covers my pores as well as any makeup has throughout my life (68 yrs old).

i'm a big fan of this product. i asked for help in the store to match the perfect color. it was difficult to figure out on my own and i needed help. light weight with high coverage...overall a great product.

I have used BE foundation since 1999 and it's the only foundation for me so far. I've gotten bored from time to time and tried other brands/foundation types and always come back to BE mineral foundation. I like not having to rub foundation into my skin with my hands. I love the idea of just using the kabuki brush for quick, easy application. You can use as little or as much as full face makeup. If I do accidentally apply too much I simply take a slightly damp hand towel or wash rag and press it on my face gently. It helps remove the excess powder look. Anyway, it looks great, gives my skin a porcelain look and is too easy to apply to every be without. They also offer many variations of color from pink undertones to yellow, neutral, etc.

reviews.review_title: Like product but not the price
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for 5 years now. I'm annoyed that every year the price goes up and the package gets smaller. I especially noticed this lately and then I found out that Shiseido bought out BE. Love the product but am thinking of switching due to price

This is amazing for my acne-prone skin. I ran out of this and tried a liquid foundation that I used to like... I broke out like crazy! When I went back to using this, my skin cleared right up. It covers blemishes effortlessly, and when used in conjunction with the BareVitamins Primer, stays all day and leaves my skin shine-free. Best of all, it looks incredibly natural. I can't say enough good things about it.
It is soft on the skin and easy to apply. When applying it gives a flawless coverage and a natural tone.
I have been using BareMinerals makeup for years and still love it!!
I suffer from Rosacea and have very sensitive skin. This product is the reason I can still leave the house with confidence. People comment how great my skin looks.
If I were stranded on a desert island and could take one thing from my make up bag, this would be it. Great, natural coverage and doesn't clog my pores.

Little messy but I have never found a foundation that feels as light and natural as Bare Minerals! I adore this product and have bought this same foundation a few times now. Lasts much longer than you would think!

Living on two coats is very eye-opening in terms of realizing just how much climate affects your skincare and makeup's performance. In New York, this foundation doesn't work for me at all. It looks cakey, leaves my skin ashen and grey, and just doesn't look good in general. But in LA, this works much better (I think due to changes in humidity and perhaps water hardness?) Over there, this sinks into skin, looks natural and flawless, and is soooo good for your skin. The only complaint in LA is that it does tend to get drying and can be cakey if you build the coverage a lot.  I think this is a great foundation for everyday use (work, etc), when you don't really care about looking spectacular and just want your skin to be healthy. I don't quite like it as much as liquid foundation for going out, however.

i bought this and i feel like mabe its good over a liquid foundation i mean for this price its not bad but it dosnt really cover that well and i find if you build it to cover someting it dosnt but if you have really good skin its probly good or a deeper skin tone i just feel like it dosnt do too much but the pacaging it great with the revolving inside so u dont loose product.
i LOVE bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation !!

I use Bare Escentuals Mineral Veil daily and love it. Based on the reviews of the foundation, I had really high hopes. I've tried it a few times, even with a cosmetician from Sephora applying, and it was TERRIBLE. It went on cakey and became more cakey on my skin with time. I have combination skin and this was really not for me. Sigh.

reviews.review_title: Great foundation - blends perfectly with my face
reviews.review_text: Got help from makeup specialist in the store (Valley Fair Mall, Santa Clara) and was very pleased with the recommendation. This color blends perfectly with my face and makes it look smooth and free of blemishes and crevices. I love it!
I have dry skin, so in the winter it is not my favorite, but in the summer I have never used any better

BareMinerals is by far my favorite foundation! When I wear it, i feel as though all my imperfections are covered yet i barely know i'm wearing makeup. It also leaves my skin feeling soft and doesn't clog my pores. I tried the bareminerals matte and wasn't as much of a fan....i suggest sticking with the original.

I got medium beige and it is a little fake-tan like on my skin. I cannot see a foundation line on my jaw but it just doesn't look right. I had gotten this over the medium since the medium stated pink undertones and this one was supposed to be neutral.

I wanted to get that Bobbi Brown look I so admire with her cosmetics. I can NOT use BB foundation so I began to explore what could I use in the BE line. Medium Beige gives me that all in one look I like. The down side if you wear a bronze face wash (Little bit of Sun, Faux Tan) I have found it gives me to much tan. I can only wear Medium Beige alone to give me that all in one look.
I love this foundation and am so glad I can get it from Sephora at a great price. I was recently in New York City and visited Sephora to stock up. Your staff was absolutely amazing!

I got the starter set for my Mom as a gift and just repurchased the foundation for her (along with the primer). She loves both, and she says there really is a quality difference between this and drugstore brand mineral foundations.

I was really hoping to love this product after dealing with skin problems my whole life (acne, redness, enlarged pores,dry skin ect.) so when it arrived i was so excited to try it out. lets just say i was more than disapointed! it felt heavy and almost chalky on my skin it highlighted every flaw on my face and just wasn't what it promised to be . disapointed and still looking for a decient foundation. :(
works great..looks great:) i love this stuff

I've used this as my main foundation for years and years now. I always hated traditional liquid/cream foundations, so finding this was a lifesaver. It evens out my skin tone without making me look heavily made up, unless I want it to, then I can just add a bit more.

I have used this product for many years. It is the only makeup I will wear, because it is very light and does not feel like makeup. It covers perfectly and lasts all day without the need of a touch up.
This is one of the best foundations out there. It doesn't look cakey and blends well.

Love this foundation! I recently decided to venture out and try a few different brands. In the end I came back to Bare Minerals. Nothing else compared. The coverage is exactly what I'm looking for: I can build it up if I want to or I can have light coverage. Great Product!

it had been a while since i was able to buy bare essentials. I was pleasantly surprised to find a new shade that was perfect for my fair but warm skin. I also loved the click lock to keep it from spilling out in my makeup bag.

I don't care for liquid foundation because of how it feels. BE foundation is so light and goes on for a buildable coverage. I wear Fairly Light (D10 Light in the Sephora brand mineral compact powder) and the color is perfect on me. For whatever reason, just this foundation alone makes me too shiney, so I always wear Summer Bisque Concealer, MineralVeil, Foundation, and then more MineralVeil. It's not 100% matte, but it looks natural & I love it. It does stay on better than the Sephora pressed powder, but I wish BE would make a pressed version of their foundation for easy to-go touchups. I'd highly recommend this foundation...and remember to use small amounts at a time! The longer you use it, the easier the application gets. Have fun!

I have used Bare mineral foundation and the other products as well. Decided to try Laura Mercier way to heavy for me gave me the powdery affect. Will stay with Bare Minerals for sure! Great foundation light, good coverage perfect for all skin types. Get compliments all the time! Thanks Bare Mineral!
Great coverage for my skin type, I have beem using it for 4 years and love how my skin looks.
Perfect for a natural cover up

Love it! I have light/light medium skin and got this powder in medium. I was afraid it was going to be too dark, but it's not. It blends so easily w/my skin tone. I have really oily skin so I'm always trying to find a powder to keep the shininess under control and I found it! It gives me a nice glow and never looks cakey. I have also noticed that my acne is going away just by wearing this during the day. Great product!

I LOVE this stuff! The coverage is perfect and my skin has never looked better. It is the perfect foundation. I even have my 14 year old daughter using it and she rarely gets a blemish because she uses this foundation.

reviews.review_title: Best foundation I've tried so far
reviews.review_text: I seriously hate cake-y looking foundation. I like my skin to look natural and not painted on. This foundation is amazing- it matched my skin color so well and it was very easy to blend in. It doesn't even look like I'm wearing foundation! The only complaint I have is that it does look a little powdery so I always just dab my face with toilet paper after applying. Otherwise, this product is amazing. I will definitely be purchasing this when I run out
I usually don't wear foundation, but this one is light enough that you can't tell I'm wearing it. It doesn't dry out my skin, and stays on throughout the day, even when I only put a thin layer on.
I used this previously - then for some reason tried a few other brands. NONE compared to Bare Escentuals for coverage or feel or wear!

I had a hard time for a long time to find a foundation that would cover my acne and acne scars. This is it! The only problem I have is when my acne is healing and my skin is flaky. Because this is a dry foundation, it adds to the flakiness. However, this is my ONLY hitch. I LOVE THIS FOUNDATION!!!
When I started using it, I started receiving compliments on how I looked younger. That's all I use now.
cant live without bareMinerals. Have been using it for nearly 5 years, won't go back to anything else
Awesome coverage. Easy to use - apply and go! Never leave home without it.
best foundation I have ever used. Covers nicely yet looks natural, no made-up look.

This is my first loose powder foundation! And I LOVE it!! I've always avoided mineral foundation because I have a flaky breakout-prone skin but I decided to give this product a try! First of all the coverage is just what I needed, it is enough to cover fine lines, large pores and blemishes without looking too heavy on your face! I use a large sephora brush to apply it all over my face then a smaller one to target the spots where more coverage is needed! Since it's a loose powder I would recommend applying it over a sink because the powder falls everywhere!! I got it in Fair and it's a perfect match for me which is a big plus because every foundation out there is darker than my skin tone!!

reviews.review_title: Can't believe how good this is!
reviews.review_text: My electrologist recommended mineral foundation to cover up the redness left after treatment. I was using liquid foundation, but it was clogging my pores and causing pimples. I can't believe the coverage this product delivers. I bought the recommended brush for best application (though you may find a better priced brush elsewhere). The color is flattering and the look is flawless. I didn't think a powder could work this well.

I love Bare Minerals, but hate the new container! I makes it much harder to get the very last drop out and I do believe the container is weighed in with the foundation; therefore giving the customer less in the container.

This is the only foundation I will use. You can't feel it on your face like liquid foundations but it's not drying like other powders. It really does live up to the hype - definitely try it if other foundations don't work for you or if you hate the idea of wearing foundation.

I'm the type of person that likes to wear my foundation without looking like I have any on & I have finally found the one foundation that gives me that. I have tried everything form liquid to powder and nothing has given me a flawless, natural finish like this has. I have tried foundation to foundation & finally I have found one that I will stick with forever. I went into sephora asking one of the employees to help pick my foundation that matched my skin tone and when she put it on I fell in love. If you're the type of person that wants a flawless, natural looking face without looking like a clown and looking like you have no make up on, I highly suggest you purchase this. It's also so easy to put on & trust me when I say that because I like things easy and fast when it comes to make up and this gives it to you. Everyone needs to buy this
This product has been great! It was suggested to me for acne prone skin and it's done a great job of keep the oil to a minimum on my face.

I have used bareMinerals for a couple of years now, and love it just as much as I did when I first started using it. I have very red undertones, and on some days I think that there is no way this powder is going to cover up my imperfections. It never fails to cover, and I absolutely love how it feels that you have nothing on your face! Can't say enough good about this product!

I hate that my face slough's off it's base before lunch time. I started using this with their primer and LOVE it. It has great coverage when put on in layers. It might feel a little dry at first, but it will get better...or you can try their spray moisturizer that you spritz on after it's on (it stinks, but it feels really good).

This is the best foundation I've tried. When I wear it people don't think that I'm wearing makeup they just think that I have great skin, and I REALLY don't I have marks from old acne as well as new acne. It doesn't make me break out. It actually minimizes my pores! I only gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because I hate the new packaging, not only does it come with less product but it's hard to get the product out,

I love bare minerals. I have acne and bare minerals provides great coverage if you need it and a natural finish. I don't like to wear a lot of make-up, but this covers my acne and I don't even feel it on. Its also non-irritating to my bad skin. Big fan.

reviews.review_title: 7+ year user - This Foundation is the best
reviews.review_text: Every once in a while I stray from BareMinerals and try another foundation or tinted moisturizer but I always come back. Nothing else seems to work as well with my skin, covering where I need it, looking natural, and not causing any breakouts. I've slept in this, and worked out in this with no issues.  If you're a first time user it does take some getting used to - it IS a different look than liquid foundations - it DOES settle into pores and lines. However using this with a foundation primer, mineral veil or other invisible finishing powder (Laura Mercier is my fave) will take care of that issue. Invest in the brushes and especially the small concealer brush. Give it at least a week and change up the other products you use with it - you may not like the mineral veil or the blushes but that doesn't mean you can't wear the foundation.

I wanted to love this foundation, but I just didn't. I have extremely oily skin with acne. This product had great coverage because of it's ability to build, but by the time a got good coverage it felt so heavy. I also ran out of this foundation about 3 times faster than my usual liquid. I think this foundation is great normal skin or skin with redness.
I have been using Bare Escentuals for a few years now. It is great for a long-lasting but natural foundation.

reviews.review_title: only for dewy and moistured skin
reviews.review_text: i used to hate this product so much, that i returned everything. somehow, one friend convinced me again, and this time, it actually worked out pretty ok. the diffrence ??? GOOOD DEWY SKIN before i put any of the powder on, o prep my skin, and make sure they are SUPER moisturized. for me this is the ONLY way, that will make this foudnation work.
I really like the fact that I can use it around my eyes without worrying about the fine lines becoming too noticeable like powders do.

I have been using this product for over 7 years and I love it! It provides such amazing coverage without looking caked on or clogging my pores. A little goes such a long way too. it's also another bonus that it lasts all day long too! Highly recommend!!!!!

I absolutely love bare minerals! I have been using it for about 5 years. It is light on the skin and gives you good coverage. I love using it daily. I would recommend it to anyone who wants a healthier foundation with adequate coverage.

reviews.review_title: Not so great.. have they changed the formula?
reviews.review_text: I bought this in Warmth - Tan in hopes to use it as a bronzer... not a good idea. The bare minerals doesn't work well with my skin, it gives it a dirty look... I don't remember it ever being like this, I'm not sure if they changed the formula or if I'm just using it with a different face powder and it doesn't work together.
THIS IS THE ONLY FOUNDATION I USE. I HAVE DECENT SKIN AND AM AFRAID OF OTHER FOUNDATION PRODUCTS. WITH THIS FOUNDATION ALL YOU SEE IS ME

Have searched years for a lightweight not cakey foundation that would cover all my imperfections...finally found it with this...have been a loyal user for the past four years and will never swtich to anything else

I've been using this bareMinerals forever and love it. It goes on even, covers all problem areas and lasts all day. Unlike other foundations the mineral-based foundation is light and you don't feel like you have a heavy mask on all day. My one complaint would be that although they have improved the packaging to be less messy, it still is. That would be the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars.

I love this foundation. I range from fair to light in this brand, depending on how much sun I get through the seasons. I have always hated cream cosmetics. When I wear a cream based make up I feel like it is sliding down my face by the end of the day. Love a powder base. I can apply more where I need it and keep it light elsewhere.
I like this makeup a lot.

i love Bare Minerals to DEATH! almost everything that i use day-to-day is Bare Minerals from my foundation, to primer, to eyeshadow, and even mascara. this is my 5th powder purchase, and i will never go to anything else! i have very sensitive skin and i'm allergic to a lot of makeup, but this has never caused me one problem! I LOVE IT! <33333

the packaging was horrible! i used a good quality powder brush and even tipped the container upside down and still could not get enough product to cover my face. i gave this product two stars becuase i LOVE bare escentuals
This stuff is amazing. I shy away from liquids so maybe I'm biased. I don't even notice the shimmer in the original formula. It goes on matte for me. I love that the brand covers all four undertones.
it has buildable coverage
I have been using this product for almost a decade. I have adult onset acne and this actually cures it. I no longer take antibiotics. Worth every penny.
I just can't live without my bareminerals. I have dry skin and who would have thought that a mineral powder would make if feel so creamy. I Love it.

I love how light this foundation feels on my face and how quickly it goes on with a brush. Easy, good for your skin and SPF coverage - it's a no-brainer. Also, I'm not really that great at make-up application (usually just in a rush in the morning) and this helps speed up my morning routine.

I understand the hype on this foundation completely. It covers what you want, as it is very buildable on the coverage front. A few minor gripes: a)I own the original version and will use up that one, then buy the matte version, b)there is so much GLITTER in the original version. It actually cheapens the product, in my opinion.
Color matches perfectly. Long wearing. Will purchase again.
Always good :) That's why this is at least the 7th one of these I have bought!

I finally found my shade! I'm in between olive and tan. I can tan very dark, but I can quickly wash out. I have yellow/olive undertones and my shade is Golden Medium. It is lighter than what I consider myself, but twice in a row, in different Sephoras, this was the shade chosen for me. Once it is applied, it looks a bit chalky, which made me nervous, but I was reassured that the longer the make-up sits on your face, it warms up and blends in. So I gave it a few and it looks flawless..kinda weird, but it felt great to finally find a match! Leaves a naturally radiant finish. Still learning how to apply it flawlessly in a jiffy.
It takes a few quick strokes of the brush and your complexion is smooth and beautiful!
Easy application. Excellent coverage. No creasing. Love it!
Powder is just as good as ever and the newer slide top is almost spill proof perfect. Power gets stuck underneath it so it isn't a full 5 stars.

i have used this for over a year now and im not sure but i think this caused me to breakout! because i never had zits like this before i started using this! so i quit using it! im trying clinque now and i think i will really like it! but like i said not sure if its this or something else! i do love the coverage though! good luck everyone who trys this!!!!)

reviews.review_title: Best foundation out there!!! By far
reviews.review_text: There is nothing like this line for foundation! I'm A huge advertiser, I worked in a salon that sold it & well I should really say all I did was put a little on clients after a color service & 9 times out of 10, this product sold itself! People asked what I was using, how great my skin looked!!!
Have used this product for several years and continue to like it.

reviews.review_title: Perfect indeed. Makeup that doesn't look
reviews.review_text: It's the best foundation I've found--NOW that I have the right color. My initial choice, made from the computer, wasn't really right. I finally went to Saphora, and a lovely girl tried several shades on me, and found the perfect one. I'm so happy with it.
I purchased Bare Minerals Foundation in a Sephora store and I couldn't be more pleased! The product was great and the service was amazing!! Thank you Sephora!! I'll be back!!!!!

I've been purchasing this product for years now. Tried many other brands of mineral foundations but, never with the results that I get with Bare Minerals. It is simply the best! I love that I can vary the coverage without it caking up on my skin. Gives me the most natural coverage. If I had to give up all makeup & could choose to keep only one product, this would be the keeper!

When I first got this and applied it, I was not too impressed, to be honest. However, one day when I had run out of foundation (and was pretty sick of using it, too.) I decided to give this product another chance. -- A year of not using foundation later, and I love it. While most everyone applies it with a brush, I do not get very good results with it. However, when using a square, flat make-up sponge, It works wonders. Many didn't even realize I had stopped applying foundation, and on numerous occasions told me I had a beautiful glow. Now, it isn't going to erase every single bump on your skin (especially if you are a teen like me with acne) but it WILL conceal redness and hide smaller bumps. I love it -- No more concealers or foundations for me. Just some Bare Minerals in the morning and I am good to go :)
Good coverage and quick to apply.
Got the right color and it looks nice and natural. I am still working on application.
not dry at all, goes softly on my skin and stays clean all day long, it's perfect for my skin!

I have been using this foundation for over 5 years and love it! I have combination acne prone skin with acne scars and this is the only foundation that covers it. Bare minerals is my security blanket, I don't know what I would do without it.  I have found that using less in the winter helps the foundation look smoother when my skin is dry.  If your confused about your color I would go to a Sephora store and ask an associate.

THis stuff is actually amazin. BUT tricky to do right. It offers a subtle glow, which makes you look better, like more interesting, better skin. You need very very little, like so tiny, perhaps a pinch and a the right brush, big enough to allow blending with some firmness, and a brush that fits the sides of the nose, so you don't miss it. You have to work it in, otherwise it will sit on top of your pores, exposing them. It is great cuz it is very water resistant, lasts all day and does not come off on your clothes. SInce they added the golden light color I have come back, as the others were too pink based for me to use, as I am fair but with Rosacea, and I don't need anymore pink, need yellow. THis one is yellow based, perfect. SO A VERY LITTLE GOES A LONG LONG WAY. You want your freckles to show through, it makes skin better, not mask it with a heavy caking! Luckily,the bismuth doesn't bother me at all.
i have tried all different types of foundation, and this is by far the best! a little goes a long way, and actually makes skin feel smoother. its also super long lasting!

I have been using this foundation for at least five years. I have strayed a little bit and tested out other foundations but I keep coming back to my bareMinerals foundation. I love that the colors are so forgiving. I am a light - medium skin Latina, so whether I hibernate in the winter or go out in the sun during Summer I can still pull off either the Light, Medium Beige, or Golden medium (I have tried all 3). Just make sure you check your undertones and you'll be able to get a color that suits you with no problem. I don't think my little review here gives this product justice, because I would be lost without this foundation. The added SPF is awesome! Try this! I have combination skin and do tend to break out at times, but this product has never caused any problems. I trust this foundation completely. Have I mentioned that you should try it?

Of all the foundations I've tried (and I've tried many!), this one is the best. At first I thought it was weird to use a powder as a foundation as opposed to a liquid one, but I wish I would've switched sooner! It's not heavy and covers well. And it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. Everyone always compliments me on my skin and I owe it to this foundation. It's cost effective too! One container lasts me 3 months!

I finally caved and decided to try Bare Minerals. I got the whole starter kit to be sure I had everything I needed. I really didn't not like the way the makeup looked on my skin - couldn't get the right level of coverage. It also seemed to wash me out, so I gave another change and got a darker color and still same result. Felt like it was minimal coverage and what was there was gone a few hours later. The worst part was that it gave my skin this burning sensation ,especially when exposed to the sun. I have sensitive skin, but had been assured this product was very natural and perfect for sensitive skin. Needless to say, I returned this product and will probably go back to liquid foundation. The one positive s that it did feel very good/light on your skin.
This is by far the best foundation i have ever tried. It is so soft and blends perfectly into skin. I have acne prone skin, and this is making me break out less. Oh, and it's really moisterizing!

I love this foundation in the matte. It goes on so natural looking. The only complaint I have is that I wish they would come out with more in between colors. For instance, in the winter I am a golden medium. But, in the summer the med. Tan is pinky, the tan is too dark, and the golden tan is also too dark so I can't use it in the summer months due to not having too many choices in shades. Please Leslie come out with a color for those of us with skin tone like J-Lo who get slightly tan in the summer.

I have been using this foundation for about 3 years. Used to break out and since I've used this I have not had any issues with acne!! Wonderful coverage, easy to apply, and lasts several months, even when applying twice a day.
I will never use another foundation as long as I live. Light and beautiful, I get compliments on my skin constantly.

This is the only foundation that I use now! It has great coverage withouth looking overly done. I don't like to use founadation, but this is so natural looking. It's great for uneven skin tones and covering up the occasional blemishes. This jar actually last a very long time, even if you do use it daily.

I first tried this in the starters kit for Bare Essentials, I found that this shade was too light for my skin, but it works great as a concealer (especially for my undereye circle). It has great coverage without caking. It's long lasting. This is a definate buy!
Great all day coverage.I teach yoga and the bare essentials look nice throughout.very natural

I have a classic t-zone skin type with a lot of fading acne scarring. I have used every foundation (literally, EVERY foundation), and Bare Minerals is the only one that 1) covers my acne scars; 2) keeps the oil slick on my t-zone under control and 3) lasts all day. A lot of people are skeptical because it is a powder, but trust me. It is creamy. It blends with your natural skin oils to create a flawless, matte finish. The color is buildable and blends with my skin tone perfectly. My mother was a HUGE skeptic, and told me that she could never use a mineral foundation, because she was certain it would settle in her wrinkles and fine lines (she is 57). She tried it, and it worked perfectly and completely covered her age spots and rosacea. It works. It also lasts a looooooong time and is well worth the price.

I've loved this product since I started using it 3 years ago. It's worth every penny because you don't need a lot. It covers every imperfection on my face and gives a great finish. I absolutley cannot live without this product
I was told this product was hypoallergenic but I had an allergic reaction to it anyway. That really frusturated me so if you are allergic to makeup i wouldn't reccomend this product

After using the bareMinerals original foundation for three years I tried the Matte foundation and returned it immediately! Original is best. Flawless coverage (with a dab of concealor) for life's little imperfections. I love that it doesn't give you that 'she's wearing make-up' look. It's more like 'she has great skin' look! Make the purchase, you won't regret it! I do recommend trying a few colors first or perhaps more than one for the perfect coverage.

reviews.review_title: Great for light to moderate coverage
reviews.review_text: Bare minerals is awesome. I love that with this particular powder especially, you can use just a little bit of powder or build it up without it looking cakey. I have a loose powder bronzer by Clinique that I have been using for quite a while and the two seem to work well together, as well as with a non-mineral blush that I use as well. Comes of easily with soap and water and never feels too heavy on my face. I will be using this product again.

I've used this makeup for about 8 years now and wouldn't use any other. But this container which is different than the original is terrible! I never close it and its difficult to get the last amount out (when its almost empty) of the container. Anyone else frustrated with this? Why change something that works!
this was a great product with flaws. the powder is overly thin..... coverage can be light but really good for acne i would recommend the product with flaws it has

I have been using this foundation for years. I often have people ask me how old I am and they find it hard to believe that I am 53! Leaves skin soft and natural looking...I really love the new top that they put on the container...it really minimizes the powder overspill that the product had before. I will use this product as long as Bare Escentials makes it. I have converted many of my friends and now they are a loyal customer just like me!

I always thought I had the type of skin that needed a liquid foundation to get a flawless, full coverage appearance....and then I found Bare Minerals. This gives me a flawless, radiant appearance without a cake like feeling. This make-up truly is magic. AND it is amazing for your skin. I never had bad skin, but I always would get a breakout from time to time. I realized I was breaking out because of the type of make-up I was using. I've used this makeup now for the past year and I literally have perfect skin now. I never breakout and my skin tone looks more even than ever before. Try it and you will fall in love!

i love bare minerals, i sware by it. i've tried so many foundations with oily skin, and this is amazing. it has buildable coverage and its so easy to apply. it feels like i have nothing on. to get better coverage for under eyes/ blemishes, i use the bare escentuals maximum coverage concealer brush, and my face really looks flawless. its honestly not that pricey if you look at other brands that are $30-40 each, and this is only $26! and it lasts forever! i've had my tub for a couple of months and i'm not even close to finishing it! love it

I keep trying other less-expensive mineral makeups. They all make me look dull and tired. This one is worth every penny. I get compliments all the time on my pretty skin! My skin isn't that pretty - it's uneven and pink and prone to breakouts. It's the makeup people! This magic powder makes me look luminous and flawless.

reviews.review_title: Foundation your skin can breathe in
reviews.review_text: I love and have loved bareMinerals since I started using it in 2005. I cannot recommend it enough. My only quibble is with the packaging because although the locking mechanism is great for keeping powder in, that fact becomes a real problem when you get low on powder. It is very difficult to get to the last bit of powder and I don't have the patience to slam and rotate and tap the thing into oblivion to get it all out.

its alright but i just dont love it. And its too expensive to repurchase considering im not thrilled about it. Good coverage but i get better results with my make up foreverhd foundation and a translucent powder or loreal mousse make up. However i do think it worked great on my oily skin cause i was shine free for a looong time.

MY DAUGHTER AND I WERE THRILLED WHEN THEY CAME OUT WITH THIS NEW COLOR FOUNDATION. IT IS HER BASE AND I AM A MED. BEIGE GIRL AND USE THE GOLDEN TAN AS MY COUNTOURING COLOR, ESPECIALLY DURING SUMMER. THEN FAUX TAN IS MY BLUSH. IN WINTER I WILL USE WARMTH AS BLUSH.

This is one amazing product. I have dry skin and i was skeptical on purchasing this product considering the fact that every time I use a powder on my face it makes me look cakey and very dry. This makes my dry skin look flawless and radiant. I love this! The spf is great for the winter time when i dont use sunscreen but theres still harmful rays that many people don't know about. I have very pale skin and fair was great for me. It hasn't broke me out and i break out very easily. My face feels so smooth and soft whenever i use this. Thank you Bare Escentuals!
I had used (and loved) the same product, one 'shade' lighter. I was surprised how much darker this one turned out to be. Good if you want that, a bit much if you were looking for a subtle increase.

I bought this for my 15 yr. old granddaughter, who I got started on this brand to keep her skin beautiful like it is now. I've been using Bare Escentual products since Leslie came to the public with them, through a TV shopping channel. I use her products every day and I love them all. It is the BEST stuff going. Buy some and try it, you will agree.

reviews.review_title: Who knew? I guess everybody but me!
reviews.review_text: I was slow to get on this BE bandwagon but now I am on full-board. Who knew a powder could give this much coverage? I have acne scars from my youth and they are barely visible. The feeling is very light and not gunky like liquid foundation. I have tried other brands of powder foundation and this is by far the best. Some have talc, which doesn't have coverage and feels weird. Some have sparklies in them. Not what I want in a foundation. This one is just right. My skin looks flawless and much better features can shine through.
To find a foundation that is the perfect shade and looks totally natural is a neat trick. Plus, for those w/sensitive skin, it's perfect--no chemicals!

i love bare minerals original foundation. it makes your skin luminous and makes you appear younger!!!!! a must if you are over 30! the matte foundation provides great coverage but pales in comparison to the original

Have been using Bare Escentuals for years now, and was replacing after I recently ran out. I don't know when they changed to the turn dial dispenser lid, but I'm really liking it. Less waste of powder in the contain, I think.

No wonder this has won so many awards. For the past 5 or so years I have used this, and in the meantime have tried other foundations as well. Nothing is as good as this. It blends so well, covers imperfects, makes your face radiant. Nothing compares.
smooth natural coverage. A definite staple in my arsenal
amazing.  provides medium coverage thats very natural looking. only drawbck is the container, i liked the old one where u dont have to twist it, my always gets stuck. still a 5 tho!

I love the lightness of this make-up and it's natural finish. It doesn't aggravate my sensitive skin and it leaves my skin looking flawless.  I didn't give it five stars because I still have to use something to help it stay on longer (primer). I tend to have to touch up quite a bit with it, especially during hot weather. But, given that, it's still a great trade off for the usual liquid foundation which, for me causes break-outs and clogged pores.  I am now a Bare Minerals convert!!! I've even converted a few friends. Perhaps they should put me on commission!

I adore this foundation! I've been using it everyday since I was 15 and I love it!! Not only can I use it as a foundation, but also since its buildable, I can use it as a consealer. Its also really breathable, so my skin loves it too! Plus, its totally affordable, so when I run out of it (which is only like every few months) I don't feel super guilty when I buy it. If you're looking for a great foundation, you should totally look into getting it!

I was reccomended this over the matte version because I have oily combo/acne prone skin and slight dryness from Retin A. Despite trying various combinations of moisturizers & primers for the better part of a year, I found that having to buff in the foundation only accentuated dry spots/minor flakes. Also, if you are extremely oily, one of the ingredients that gives the luminous glow will make you look greasy. Of course you can blot or re-powder, but that may not be an option if you are in the midst of working. On a good note, I did not break out from the foundation, and this did look great during fall/spring.

I am a 10 year BE convert. There isn't enough space to say everything wonderful about this product. Want light coverage use a lighter hand, having a bad face week? Dab on those bad spots, great coverage and fool everyone into thinking your skin is always fabulous. Long last, cost effective. LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT.
perfect for my skin tone.. been using bare for a year now.. & i love it!!

This is a great foundation. I feel like I am not wearing any and I love it! It gets really hot where I live, so I don't like to wear liquid foundation on hot days because it just feels like I am melting away. With Bare Escentuals, it is just perfect in hot days. I still have the coverage and I don't feel like I'm sweating it off.
not bad- somedays it makes my skin look smooth n silky n sometimes dry

This doesn't look the least bit natural on me. It just seems to sit on top of the skin like a mask, and it accentuates every line and pore on my face. I gave it two stars because at least the color suits my hard-to-match super fair skin.  Since it also made me itchy and dried out my already dry skin, I'll be returning this ASAP.

So I have been waring Bare Minerals SPF 15 Medium Baige foundation for 3 or 4 years now. Im writing this review based on my skin. This product is not for everyone but for me it is the most amazing thing that ever happened to me. I always was trying to figure out why my face was oily or super dry so I was trying different face washes but i noticed it was my make up. I didn't want foundation like mac (more of a stage make up I do love them though) or any cheep brand even though i ware cheap eyeliner and other things (hey they work) but I wanted something to last me and work so I went with this face make up. It lasts me for months so thats why I don't mind the price and it makes my face look porcelain and my uneven skin tone is very even I tried going to other ones after but I keep going back. But my skin is not like everyone else's so thats why I do get it when they say it does not work because one of my friends cannot ware it because it looks very powdery on her skin and very hard to match her tone. That will be my one complaint is that they dont have that many shades in between I always have to mix in Warmth but, other then that I love this make up and will never switch.
Most makeup makes me breakout but bareMierals leaves my skin feeling amazing. The colors match up great too.
use it everyday. I do not breakout and it doesn't look cakey

The powder covers my blemishes completely without having to cake it on with several layers. But if I need several layers, it doesn't look as if I caked it on, but instead looks natural. I was able to quickly find one that was close to my skin type and have been using it through winter, summer and now into fall.

I have tried many,many different kind and brands of Makeup, and by far Bare Minerals is the absolute best! I love it! I last longer than any I have ever tried! I used to be a makeup hopper now I'm commited to BareMinerals!
love this stuff, just stocking up again!
I love the coverage of this foundation and how my skin breathes when it's on. I'm so glad they expanded the colors of this foundation.
I love the bare minerals this is the first time using it and I am hooked
Wouldn't use anything else.

I can't believe I waited until now to try Bare Escentuals! I love this foundation! This foundation reduces redness which has always been a problem area for me. Easy to apply and doesn't have that makeup feel. Great coverage!

I have been using this product for 2 years now. I love it for so many reasons. It has a natural feel, stays on all day, and looks natural. I have tried to switch over to several other high-end traditional foundations. They always end up feeling way to bulky, and after a few days of wearing, I start breaking out. BM does not make me break out. Sadly, like a few others on here, I do not like the newer lid. I can not stand that I can't get the last of the product out. However, I did not like the old lid either. If it got turned upside down, it all came pouring out. So, I am sure there has to be a solution!?!?
amazing! would definitely recommend
Can't use anything else after I tried it!

When I first started using BE foundation, I wasn't sure a powder could give me the coverage I was looking for. I was surprised. It covers really well without being heavy or cakey. Depending on what kind of brush you use, you can get different levels of coverage. Unless you just pile it on like crazy, you'll have a really pretty airsbrushed look, and your skin shows through. There are also a HUGE variety of shades, so anyone can use it, from the palest of pale to deepest of deep.

I have used Bare Minerals for 14 years. I read reviews and try other foundations and keep coming back to Bare Minerals. It never breaks out my sensitive skin, the colors blend beautifully. It makes your skin look like your skin, only better. I do use a 'finishing spray' to set it and keep it looking 'dewy.'

This makes you feel like you're not wearing foundation. It brightens my complexion and I look so much better, more awake, prettier when wearing. It easily covers blemishes & provides a even look/color all over my face. Doesnt cake up. Have to buy the brush to get the perfect blend on face. Face dont look like different color than neck

I've been using this foundation since Spring 2008. It's the only make-up I use...mainly because I don't know much about make-up but also because it works for me...although after some time, it makes my faces shiny.
came bundled with brushes and finishing powder

I have wanted to try this for a couple of years and when I finally did, I wasn't disappointed. I was doubtful that a powder could provide such good coverage. I am now a believer and feel like I have really done my face a favor by not bogging it down and clogging my pores with liquid foundation daily. I highly recommend the Bare Escentuals line of products!
As always, I love BareMinerals. I have been using it for about 5 years now and I can't imagine going back to liquid foundation. It's amazing!
I love this product, I use it every day. Very light , easy to use. Wonderful product.
Works so well at a reasonable price. Really makes my skin look so great, and conceals blemishes well. Best thing I've used.

Compared to other mineral foundations I've tried, this is a great product. It dries out my skin a bit so certain areas turn flakey mid-day but otherwise it's pretty darn good product. I'm normally quite fair but have found that the fairly medium is a good color for me right now (have to consider it is summertime).

Of the many types, brands, and coverages I have tried - this one is best. It is a soft buildable finish that doesn't ever feel cakey or thick. I love the click lid feature too. I only suggest that you use a good primer underneath as sometimes the pores need help with coverage.

I have been using this product for years. It does not irritate my rosacea at all -in fact it seems to help calm flare ups. It gives a very natural glowing look -not at all powdery. I often receive compliments on my complexion, and I am very forthcoming about the products I use. No woman needs to walk around with blotchy skin!

There are some things I love about this foundation - it is light, fun to apply (I like brushing it on), and it seems to keep my skin clearer than liquid foundation. What I don't like about it is that it seems to settle into and accentuate wrinkles and lines. I am contemplating switching back to my favorite Clinique liquid foundation because of this.

I have been a Bare Escentuals fan for a long time and I will continue to be. The foundation is so light and easy to use, you don't have to be a make-up guru at all! It gives me great coverage during the day and at night. Highly recommend.

I have BE SPF foundation in Medium Beige. I love that it gives a naturally luminous finish without irritating my sensitive skin. I switched to BE after a terrible rosacea outbreak (according to my Dr.) and have not had any problems since. I recommend using the BE brushes with this, as I find other brushes either offer too little or too heavy coverage.
it's been a while since i've had to buy this product, but i absolutely love that they added the sifters. less messy. love the foundation itself because it's very light and natural
Ever since I switched to using Bare Escentuals my skin has never looked better! I hardly break out at all!
If you haven't tried BareMinerals, you are missing out. This make-up covers flawlessly without clogging your skin or even making it look like you have make-up on!
I mix it with all over face color...
Great coverage, doesn't feel sticky and heavy.....Doesn't settle into fine lines and wrinkles......Can't imagine going back to a liquid foundation!

I'm surprised the reviews are so high for this product. The coverage was very heavy and I found it to be too 'fake' looking. I guess if you have splotchy or bad skin then this would be good, but if you're just looking to take out shine and even things out a tad, this is too much.
This product is perfect for my sensitive skin!

reviews.review_title: Would never switch to anything else!
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing this makeup for about 5 years now, and I get compliments all the time! People always tell me how nice my skin is, but when I take my makeup off, what they don't know is my skin is kinda actually splotchy from faded acne marks from years ago. With my bare minerals on, nobody knows that. It is perfect whether you have dry, oily, or normal skin. Try this and you will NEVER go back to any other type of foundation.

I love this powder makeup. I am 47 and love how it erases those tell-tale signs of aging. I sue the spot brush with a lighter shade of bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation in my mouth and nose creaser and the lines between my eyebrows. With the foundation brush I swirl in the next shade all over my face, neck and chest. SPF 15 helps protect my skin. Don't forget Mineral Veil; it gives the perfect flawless finish. I use the one with the higher SPF to double protect my skin.

i[ve been useing bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation for yrs. But This was for my mom. She Loves it. and it always looks so natural and beautiful. We both love the fact that it looks so natural and has SPF 15 in it !! WE LOVE bareMinerals !!
I have been using this for years and never never switch to something else. My face look natural like no make up on. Love it love it

This is the best makeup I've ever used. I've been useing it for 2 years now and can't believe how good it is. It gives great coverage and it dose'nt lump up on your face. It just gives you a healthy glow. I'll never use anything else.
Have used this for years. I have sensitive skin and have never had a problem

I get compliments on my skin all the time when I wear this foundation. Other foundations start itching after 8-hours or so, or crease - not so with this one. It's a wonderful beauty product with the added benefit of natural sunscreens.

reviews.review_title: The #1 staple in my makeup collection.
reviews.review_text: If I could choose only 1 product for my face for the rest of my life, this would be it. I'm so glad I decided to try it a few years ago. I've never looked back! The coverage is fantastic. It has a natural looking finish. I also have to say that it has improved the condition of my skin incredibly. It's so healthy and natural, that I can actually sleep in it and wash it off in the shower the next day. My acne-prone skin would never have survived that sort of treatment with a liquid foundation in the past.
Another great product. What did we ever do without this stuff. Love it.
Uhh, on top of me saying I use this EVERY day, it lasts me ATLEAST 1 1/2-2 years!!

I have been using Bare Escentual products everyday for at least 6 years. I have extremely sensitive skin and I hate the feeling that I am wearing makeup so this is just a wonder product for me because it doesn't irritate my skin at all and I don't ever have that heavy makeupy feel.  Plus, it's good for your skin!!

I just started using BE products about 2 months ago. I have moderate to severe acne and other products always looked cakey. Since switching to Bare Minerals my face has looked noticeably better, I've even received a few compliments on it. I also love how light it is, I almost forget I'm wearing makeup at all! I am now a believer and am recommending making the switch to all of my friends.

This truly is the best foundation I have ever used. I have the most sensitive skin - everything I tried in the past would make me break out, or would dry my skin to the point of flaking. I receive compliments almost daily on how flawless my skin looks. Couldn't be happier!

I've struggled with problem skin my entire life and this is the only foundation that has successfully covered my blemishes as well as making my skin appear healthier. It doesn't look as if I am wearing any make up at all.

This is my fav foundation so far! it's so easy to apply, looks so natural, gives a wonderful glow to my skin, covers all the imperfections. And it adapts to my face color so there is never any color difference between my neck and face. love it love love it!!!! And also i like the fact that i dont need to buy special spf lotion for the summer!
I had tried a friends foudation and decided to get one myself. It just light and gives the skin a healthy glow and takes the shinny/oily away. That's my new favorite

I have fair skin and this shade covers most of my rosacea without looking too dark. Bare escentuals foundation helped clear up my complexion and never feels heavy.  I use a Bare Escentuals Full Coverage Kabuki Brush to apply this product.

I just wanted to let you know how much i love bare minerals. I was in Sephora looking at make-up and saw a lady buying bare minerals, and i have seen the commercials and wasnt sure if it really worked, so i asked her and she told me how much she loved it. So i decieded to buy it and i have been buying it ever since.
I've been using bareMinerals for a couple of years now and can't imagine ever going back to liquid make-up. Goes on evenly, covers color inconsistencies and no make-up lines!

I've used bareMinerals foundation since I was a teenager and wasn't able to find any other foundation that didn't cause my skin to break out. Once I found and tried bareMinerals, my skin has been beautifully clear and looks flawlessly smooth. I'm so happy with it, and I recommend it to everyone I know! Try it. You won't be disappointed! :)
bare minerals is by far my favorite foundation. It has great coverage and isn't heavy feeling. The SPF 15 is also a good bonus aspect.

I have always worn liquid concealer with a powdered bronzer, but recently decided to start wearing foundation instead of concealer with the bronzer. This was a great choice! I love how well it covers small red spots and blemishes, and I don't need to use concealer with this product. I thought liquid foundations and concealers were the only thing that would provide full coverage but I was wrong. bareMinerals was a great find and I will continue to use this in the future.

Natural coverage. Non-greasy. You can fall asleep in it and not worry about breakouts. The only thing is, I think it's best if you already have pretty good skin. I don't see this as maximum coverage if you have a lot of acne to cover up.
i put it over my regular foundation it gives an amazing complection .....!

I have used many different brands of makeup but have never found what this one can do for your pores, texture or youthful appearance. I am 48 yrs. old and have seen a significant change in my skin. Will NEVER use anything else!!!!

This is a good powder foundation. I changed to it initially becuase it lacks the chemicals that other foundations have, but I am very happy with it. I can put it on to cover my moderate acne, then put on liquid concealer and it covers very well, while still looking natural. I didn't see a big enough difference between the Matte and the normal to spend the extra money on Matte.

This is going to sound like a Bare Minerals commercial, but I LOVE this stuff. I don't use any other products! It works as foundation and concealer! It gives you great coverage and one tiny container lasts FOREVER! I use it EVERY day. Don't hesitate with this amazing product!

I used to be a MAC powder foundation girl because I loved the coverage it gave me, but I've been using BM products for about 6 years now and won't use anything else! I love that it's natural, but it also gives amazing coverage and gives just the right amount of glow. People also compliment on my porcelain skin and ask if I get facials and what expensive products I use, but they are always in disbelief when I admit that I just use the BM products! I've turned many non-believers in to fans of the SPF foundation, but also the bronzer and blush. It's the best!

reviews.review_title: Don't want to live without it!
reviews.review_text: I've always had super sensitive skin and most foundation and concealers just couldn't mask my redness or would be terrible for my skin. This foundation applies so fast! It builds up very nicely so I don't even use concealer anymore. It covers EVERYTHING, redness, freckles, breakouts, you name it. This foundation stays put! No sliding around on my skin. The mineral veil which comes separately is a must have for making large pores disappear! People think I have flawless skin he he:)
To keep it short: this makeup works. Great. All the time.  So natural you can sleep in it without feeling guilty, yet skin still looks flawless.

This powder was ok it covered good but my oily skin still became oily by the middle of the day and I had to touch up with my power I think the matte verison will be better for my oily skin other then that it was a good foundation
great foundation without a lot of chemicals is what I was looking for and found.

I have not until now found a foudation that did anything for me. I tried the sample of bare essentuals and was amazed!! I love the way it evens out my skintone and takes away the shine without noticing at all that I'm wearing anything!! It goes on like satin and doesn't clog or emphasize your pours.. It works beautifully with the veil finish. I apply it once in the morning before work and it lasts all day without any touch up. I will always use this foundation.

I have been using this product for five years and love it. I love how it goes on. It feels light on my skin as if I am not wearing any makeup. I love blending multiple shades to make the perfect one for my skin. I wish it lasted a little longer.
Most used product in this house of 3 women during the summer. natural tan enhancer

Goes on easily and hies every flaw, evens the tone and keeps my skin looking good for hours and hours! No heavy pancake feeling... this is my first experience with this type of cosmetic and I am so pleased!
I have been using Bare escentuals for years now and I am constantly being complimented on how nice my skin is. It is a wonderful product and I am a fan for life

that I have been using this. I bought another foundation at CVS, a cream kind just to see what it was like again. After 2 uses it went into the bin. I love the feel on my skin, I love the coverage, and I love how the hot humid summer weather is no match for this stuff, my face stays matte and not shiny through a whole workday without touch ups. Evens out the redness in my skin, hides the flaws, but never looks heavy or thick. LOVE IT and will never switch back to anything else again. Pure perfection.

I first got this foundation for Christmas a couple years ago and fell in love with it. I decided to try other foundations to see if i liked any ones more than bare minerals and can't find one that beats it. I love the way it feels on my skin. I tend to break out a lot and this covers it so well. Definitely worth buying. Can't find a thing wrong with it.

After using various brands of departmment store foundation, it was wonderful to find this product. My skintone is uneven and this product provides beautiful coverage without looking made-up and lasts much longer than any product I purchased from Macys. Not a big fan of the prime time product, but this works so well with my moisturizer that I stopped using prime time.  Easy to apply and easy to remove with a facial cleansing cloth. I love this product.

reviews.review_title: Look like a million bucks in 60 seconds
reviews.review_text: barMinerals Foundation is quick and easy to use, providing an even finish reducing flaws without the know how of a professional make-up artist. It does not enhance wrinkles as much as many other foundations. It also does not make you feel like you have a mask over your face.

I bought this foundation purely because of all the great reviews it got and how it supposedly contains no acne causing ingredients. This is false. Afte using this product once I gained about 10 new blackheads. After cleansing before bed, I applied a toner, and realized that my skin still had the product soaked in it because it came off all on the cotton ball. This product absolutely suffocates your pores. And unless you thoroughly scrub, the buildup will create more and more blackheads.

This foundation is a pretty good product but takes some getting used to. Exfoliation is a must, as flaky/dry skin with this foundation looks HORRIBLE. I always apply moisturizer right before (1-2 mins) applying this foundation, and it seems to look better that way. I also love the foundation since it doubles as a concealer for acne blemishes if you use the concealer brush. You should experiment with how much foundation to use since too much looks a little cakey, and too little won't show up enough. Practice makes perfect with this stuff! overall a good buy and a good value since it takes me several months to use up the full size foundation.

I have been using BareMinerals for several years and love how it feels on my skin, like I have no makeup on but my face looks so good. I am 70 years old and have been told lots of time how good my skin looks.

I use this mainly as a concealer for my acne scars and under eye circles with the small Full Coverage Brush. It works wonders! However, like all make-up, it will look make-upy if it is layered too much.

reviews.review_title: Learn how to use it...Give it a try
reviews.review_text: Okay I know this powder does not seem like it would cover blemishes, redness, or imperfections, but it does. You have to give it a try and learn to use it right, also it IS necessary to use concealer if you need it. I actually use Laura Mercier concealer under.

This is great for light coverage during the work week or for a day out shopping. It is definitely buildable for a nice, smooth, even toned finish without having to use another powder to set it! It's easy to apply, there is no smell, and it covers up redness well.  The one thing I have to be careful of is that it can sometimes dry me out. But I've learned that its all about proper skincare/moisturizers that makes the difference! So make sure to moisturize really well prior to applying if you have dry skin.  Also, I'm sooo happy to know that this product has SPF protection and is approved the the Skin Cancer Foundation (check out their website for a list of Seal of Recommendation approved products)! I still wear a facial moisturizer with SPF underneath, but its nice to know that this has good protection too :)

my super sensitive, acne prone skin screams with JOY with this makeup. As a teenager and young adult I suffered from bad acne and always wanted to cover it up without making it worse....finally discovered this product 6-7 years ago and I almost cried wishing I had had it in highschool. Weightless, even coverage that actually feels good on my skin and doesn't make me break out! Hallelujah!! Wish there was more in each package, but that's my only complaint. Using a little water on the concealer brush covers anything amazingly without standing out. It is so customizable you can do anything with one product. I can't say enough good things. It's the miracle makeup my skin has always yearned for.
I absolutely love this product. It provides me with the coverage I am looking for. The product has a long shelf life and is affordable. Did not make me break out.
I've used this for years! Excellent coverage, so quick to use! The girls at Sephora say they recommend this over any other mineral makeup--by far.

I have been using Bare Escentuals for more than two years now, and I still love it! I have dry skin and had my doubts about the foundation, but now I'm hooked. It looks wonderful on my skin, and I love that it has SPF 15.

This product gives you the face you had when you were younger. It smoothes out blotchy skin tones, it eliminates those ugly lines beneath the chin, and it leaves the overall look of the skin fresh and dewey.

A lot of makeup breaks my skin out, but this is a blessing from above! :o) Since I have switched all of my makeup to bareMinerals, my skin has cleared up immensely!  I love the fact that this goes on so perfect and does not transfer to clothing. I can actually hug my boyfriend when her wears black and don't have to worry about it getting all over him. LOL

I have been using bareminerals for 5 yrs, i love it, it feels great. It covers blishes very well. I would never go back to liquid foundation, i like the natural look that this delivers. Just make sure you regularly clean your brushes.

the perfect foundation for my fair skin -- I love that it covers up the redness/flaws in my skin without being too masky or covering up my natural rosiness and freckles. GREAT product, and totally recommend for natural-looking foundation for people with sensitive skin or light acne.
I have ance still at 31 years old! This is the only makeup that works for me love it!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Never ceases to meet my expectations. good coverage. great color for my olive skin tone, even in the summer. blends well. i love bare minerals.

Ever since I tried this product about 5 years ago, it's been a must-have for me! I have extremely sensitive skin and this foundation gives me coverage without breaking me out. The finish is amazing and natural!

I've used bare minerals for a few years and everytime I try another product always go back. About a year ago I started using the Golden Fair tint. It's perfect for my in between coloring and it transitions nicely from winter to summer if you're not a sun goddess but still get a tad darker.

I've been using bare minerals for years and had an almost perfect match but not quite. Made my skin yellow but was the only thong I could stand. Then they introduced fairly medium for fair skin but a step darker than the fair for light skin. Now that is a perfect match. And, as always, feels amazing on my skin. Looks great and I don't feel like I'm wearing any type of foundation. I get coments all of the time about how great my skin looks.
This is by far the best makeup line I have ever used! This foundation is incedible and covers all of my blemishes beautifully. Def worth the $

okay soo...i absolutley love love LOVE the matte version of this foundation and ive been using that one for about a year now. But im running out and i'm debating on wether to get this one or the matte one which i always get. i mean i love that one. but sometimes its to mattee to the point where my laugh lines kinda pop out so idk what to do i have a dillema. help please! thank you
I get these comments when I use this product: you have a perfect complexion your skin is so gorgeous well it must be nice having perfect skin I have none of these. It is this makeup. Enough said!
I bought this product back in january! I don't see what all the hypes about! Its just typical! it's way to sheer for me! i don't find its visible!
its so light weight and covers amazingly with out putting to much on. I LOVE IT SOOOOO MUCH!!

I am IN LOVE with this foundation! After having problems with MAC Studio Fix, I decided to give this one a try, I am so glad I did! It is a light to medium coverage, so if you have pretty bad skin it might not be for you unless you layer it with a thicker foundation. It gives your skin a really nice, healthy, natural glow. I really recommend this foundation!
