I have tried a few different foundations before I tried this one and since I started using Bare Minerals, I haven't stopped! It's awesome! I would recommend it to anyone!

I have been using this foundation now for 6 years. It has never clogged my pours and my skin always looks fresh and healthy. I lived abroad for a year and had my friends and family ship it to me, because I could not go a year without it. If you are looking for a nice, radient, fresh looking foundation this is your best option. It is affordable, lasts for a while, and leaves your skin looking gorgeous.

OH MY GOD THIS IS THE BEST FOUNDATION I HAVE EVER USED!!!! I don't like using liquid foundation because I feel like it looks fake no matter how light I was using it so I was looking for something that is natural looking and leaves my face looking naturally flawless and I have found it with this product :) I apply, buff and I'm done so simple so easy I'm in love <3 you won't ever go back to liquid foundation lol I know I'm not going back lol

I'm a bare Minerals user for life! I haven't found anything else that blends as easily and looks more natural. The coverage is perfect and it's easy to apply. It also is about the only foundation that doesn't make me break out and actually makes my skin look and feel better. I've fallen asleep with this makeup on and didn't wake up to a face full of zits like I would have with another type of foundation. I will never go back!!
I love this foundation! Once you perfect how to also use it as cover up, it's awesome.
Perfect shade and the coverage is perfect. Very good coverage without being heavy or cakey. Very comfortable and easy to apply.
I'm a DIE HARD bareMinerals fan. This is by far the most lightweight, smooth finish and cleanest foundation that I have ever worn. I will be a customer for life!

I had been using the Light powder and noticed it was really white so i would use the bronzer on top. So once i finished the light power i ordered this one. Its so much better and a good cover up. But you have to use the primer if not it seems to fade as the day goes and you will get shiny.

i love that this is natural. i have SUPER SUPER sensitive skin & it covers/blends nicely w/o aggravating my skin. it absorbs oil to provide a nice clean matte finish. most people can't even tell that i'm wearing foundation with this because it looks soo NATURAL. this was the first makeup i ever started wearing seriously & i've been hooked for the past 5 years. i recommend this stuff to everybody with sensitive skin like me or any skin type really that just wants a nice natural finish.
This is a long time favorite. I try other fondations but I allways come back to Bare Minerals.

My favorite foundation. I have tried the Sephora brand and Philosophy brand mineral makeup. Sephora's didn't cover well and was flaky. Philosophy was very oily and shiny. Nothing compares to BE foundation

i really love this foundation, it doesn't clog pores and looks super natural. what i like best is that the formula is light and airy but still stays on even after being at the beach. the coverage is awesome, 1 layer is all you need. oh and don't cheat shades go natural it looks even better

There's no doubting that this make-up is better than most other products out there, but the pricing is too high. Also, the new sifter is annoying, it wastes a couple of uses worth of make-up because you cannot get it out. Also, if you do not take the time to apply it correctly, it looks just like any other brand of coverage. So make sure you have the time to apply it the way it tells you to, and that you have some spare time to do so.

I absolutely love bare minerals foundation. I had to bump up to medium from fair in the summer. I was able to mix them and get an incredible result. My skin looks great! I will not be buying any other foundation again.

reviews.review_title: Great coverage, yet a natural look
reviews.review_text: This powder gives you surprisingly great coverage, but it does not look overdone. Blends easily into your skin and lasts for hours. Excellent skin tone choices.
you can get everyday minerals for 1/3 the price, it covers better, and i lasts longer..

love how its natural and good for your skin. really good coverage but you kind of need to use a lot which i dont like to do cause its a bit expensive... also, if you have dry skin it kind of makes the dry parts really noticeable...but as long as you put lotion on before it works great!

I started using bareMinerals about 8 years ago and love it. I have very little time to put on makeup and use just the basics. bare Minerals gives me the even coverage I need and does not emphasize my wrinkles.

I have very oily skin AND a lot of cystic acne scars. This does a great job at evening out my skin tone and making it look smoother and more matted. I don't see going back to any other kind of foundation.  Also, it feels light on my skin.

Ladies, I too dislike the new container because I used to buy two shades and mix them to make the perfect one for me. I just called the bare escentuals line and found out the new container can be opened!! The bottom of the container will pop out by using a penny or a spoon or a knife, whatever you want to wedge in there...problem solved!! No more wasted product and I can mix my own favorite shade!
I LOVE this foundation & have used it for years! However, I do not like the new containers with the twist top because you can't get all of the product out.

This is without a doubt the perfect foundation. I have never been one to wear heavy make-up and this foundation gives my face a flawless look with a barely there feel. I never have to worry about the color being off or having a make-up line. It blends so well. I can honestly say it is 10 times better than even airbrushed foundation. For those women who do feel like they need a heavy foundation, please, give it a try. Don't be fooled by the powder, it will cover up every imperfection.

I like the feel. It is light, but sometimes it makes me look too made-up. I don't like the shimmery part of the product. I have sampled the matte version, but I will get it when I make a big purchase soon.

This used to be my favorite foundation, but I am discontinuing use due to the new sifter. With the old product, not only was there more makeup in the container, but you could easily remove the sifter and get the last bit of product out. Now, there is always makeup that goes to waste because it is impossible to get out with the new sifter. I had to drill a hole in the container just to get it out. Like I said, the makeup is great, but the hassle with the sifter is just not worth it.

Having used bareMinerals for almost a year, I have not found any foundation comparable in effect. BareMinerals creates a natural, flawless appearance, leaving a dewy, youthful glow. Easy to apply, bareMinerals works like a powder but boasts the smooth texture of a cream.  I have a very light olive complexion, and Golden Fair is a perfect match.

reviews.review_title: If its not broke...don't fix it!
reviews.review_text: Although, I agree that BareMinerals is my favorite foundation...I must say, I don't like the new containers with the adjustable shaker. It's almost impossible to get the last bit of product out of the container...and there is enough for at least two or three more applications left in the jar. You can't even take the shaker top off like you could with the old containers. I had my husband try and figure out how to get it out and he took his drill and made a big hole so that I could get the last of the product out. It cost too much to waste any of it. The old shaker top would pry loose and pop off so that you could easily get to it. It i not an improvement at all.
Leaves my face looking and feeling natural! Love it!

When I purchased this powder, I had 2 other mineral powders of different brands in my drawer. This one has the best, smoothest coverage. Someone told me it didn't look like I was wearing makeup at all! That's a keeper.

I love mineral foundation for the most part over liquid foundation. My only issue is that there seems to be so much that is wasted in the brush and in the lid. That is probably the reason that I have given it a lower rating. I also have never been able to get by with the very small amount of product that they tell you to use in the infomercial.
Wasn't sure what color to pick, but this one turns out to be the perfect shade for me! Makes my skin glow :D Is never heavy. I have pretty clear skin, so the sheer coverage works ideally for me.

I've been using Bare Minerals SPF 15 in Light for 4 years now. None of the other foundations come even close. As a finishing touch I like to use The Balm Mary Lou-Manizer - the effect is stunning. Amazing coverage and subtle glow without heaviness.

reviews.review_title: Perfect! What else can I say?!
reviews.review_text: Lightweight Gorgeous Natural Flawless Perfect color matches Super easy to use  I can apply a very thin layer of foundation or layer it on depending on the condition of my skin or the weather.  The list of pros could go on and on! I won't be searching out another foundation for years. I've got everything I could possibly want in a foundation right here in this one! Thank you Bare Esentuals!!

reviews.review_title: Not enough shades for tanned olive skin
reviews.review_text: I use the golden medium shade and find that it's too light. So I went to Sephora to find just a shade darker. The next shade was literally like 5x darker and red. The associate told me I could mix them to get the color I need. So that leaves buying two foundations. Why can't they just make more variety for olive skin tone?! I do like the coverage and lightweight texture, that's the only reason I stick with this foundation.
I've used this product for over 5 years every day! It has the best coverage for my fair, freckled face! It also looks natural and is easy to apply.

Have always loved Bareminerals since I tried it.... Has helped clear my face up.... can't say enough about it... love the original in the foundation... doesn't stay as put in the summer time but I've found nothing better.... My skin is better because of it... I'm hooked. Just get the right color for your skin--- have someone help you with this.
I have been using bareMinerals for about 3 years now, it's awesome stuff! Never harmful, I get tons of compliments on my skin and it lasts forever!

I actually changed the color to Golden Beige the same day of purchase. I tried Med Beige & Golden Beige & learned that Golden Beige is truer to my skin tone. I've always liked Bare Minerals foundation, now I like the ease of returning products to Sephora.

I used to be a liquid make up junkie...not anymore! This foundation gives me natural looking but thorough coverage. I also love how it makes me skin glow, yet is not too over the top. My skin is relatively clear, but I do get the occasional monster zit or surprise break out. I find that for me, this foundation in conjunction with a bit of concealer always does the trick for me. :) You can put on as much or as little coverage as you need.

I just bought the Bare Minerals starter kit a few days ago, and I can already tell I'll be buying this foundation for years to come. I have been trying for YEARS to find a makeup shade that matches my yellowy-olive skin, and I finally found the perfect shade with Golden Medium. I also have acne, and am amazed that a powder can cover all of my blemishes and acne scars so well. I will never buy another cheap liquid foundation at the drugstore ever again.

reviews.review_title: Reduced volume amount for same price
reviews.review_text: During the summer I usually wear powder based foundation, it's a great product I was just bummed to see that the amount of foundation was reduced but the price still stayed the same.

I have been using this foundation for 7 years and while I have tried different brands of mineral make up along with all different kinds of foundations none of them can even compare. This make up is just simply amazing. I love it and strongly recommend anyone to try it. I am sure you will love it
I've never felt as pretty as I did when I wore the Bare Escentuals and flawless!

I've been using this foundation on and off for years. The only reason I've purchased other foundations is that I like to try different products. But I always come back to this one. It minimizes the huge pores I have on my nose and makes my complexion look like it was airbrushed. It also blends great so there is no harsh line between my face and neck.
I love the color Golden Fair in the Bare Minerals SPF 15 foundation. WIth a primer, it stays on well and has good coverage.

II LOVE THIS FOUNDATION!!! I HAVE USED bareMINERALS FOR ABOUT 7 YEARS. IT GIVES YOUR SKIN A SMOOTH AND FAWLESS LOOK. YOUR SKIN LOOKS SO RADIANT. MY COMPLEXION HAS CHANGED FROM OVER THE YEARS IT IS SO CLEAR AND SMOOTH.
Really natural and light. Love that they changed the packaging which was the only thing wrong with BE. Love love love!

I precently purchased Bare Escentuals Bare Minerals and I absolutely love it! I will definately purchase it again once it runs out. It makes my face my look flawless. It doesn't feel heavy or make my face feel cakey. It's a perfect item to buy if you are looking trying to buy something that looks like you aren't wearing makeup at all.

I started using Bare Minerals 3 years ago when I started breaking out a lot. I also never thought I'd be able to use a powder. This is the best, it works like magic covering up your trouble spots and is easy on sensitive skin.

I love Bare Escentuals! I was very skeptic about using a dry foundation, especially since my skin is dry. I cannot imagine using any other make up now. I had to patient at first; it took just a bit longer to apply. Once I got the knack, it took half the time to apply. My friends and colleagues immediately noticed there was something different about me.
The foundation is an even, poweder based concealer that does not clog pores. Love bareMinerals <3
I love the way this foundation gives you coverage in a natural way. I have oily skin and find that liquid foundations make it worse. Its nice to have an alternative to liquid foundation.

Discovered bareMinerals foundation during a makeup demo at sephora and haven't turned back. The first jar lasted 2 years. Lightweight, easy to apply and just enough coverage to make my skin look smooth without looking caked-on. Outstanding product.
Awesome product - especially for a younger look. Light and natural

I have been using Bare Escentuals Foundation for years. I absolutely love this product. My skin is somewhat blotchy and has the beginnings of age spots, but this foundation covers and provides an even tone.
good light makeup---covers a lot...I love it!
I've been using this foundation for 4 years now and I am a huge fan. I have very sensitive skin and this is the only foundation I've found that doesn't make me break out.

reviews.review_title: Excellent for my Asian olive skin tone
reviews.review_text: I was initially suspicious about this powder foundation, but after trying it (and now I've been using it for more than 6 months) I totally understand why people are so crazy about this product. It goes on easily with a brush, feel very light on skin, and gives a very natural, medium coverage. I tried the color Medium first. It works but it's slight redder than my skin tone. After reading Bare Escentuals' website, I realized that my color should be Golden Medium, which turns out to work wonderfully.

I started with the original bare minerals foundation years ago and loved it. It applied easily, did not clog my pores, and offered a great alternative to more artificial foundations.  I did switch to bare minerals matte because I am inclined to be a bit greasy.

I have super oily combination skin, very acne-prone (years of cystic acne and still tend to break out if I'm not very vigilant about my routine), very sensitive. My problems with foundation were far and wide: cracking, peeling, separating, sliding. I almost exclusively wore drugstore concealor over my blemishes and called it a day. My friend made me go to Sephora two years ago and they recommended Bare Escentuals. I wear this every day. Sometimes I just dot on with the concealor brush. Other times, mostly at work, I go all over with the powder. I love how it blends, and that I can layer and layer for more coverage without a nasty mask effect. This doesn't dry my skin at all (hah! that would be nearly impossible). Love, love, love.

Did they change the formula? This foundation used to be a miracle for my skin but now it's absolutely horrible. The coverage & color are perfect, but it dries out my skin so bad and doesn't even blend in well. It clumps together in certain areas and rubs off in others. It also makes me break out and the bare minerals brush smells really bad. I'm sure it would be way better if you have oily skin.

I've been using mineral veil for years. I now use the tinted SPF version and I can't be without it. It looks great over any type of foundation. I can't tell you how many people tell me I hav flawless skin and at sixty that's pretty amazing. I owe that flawless look to mineral veil. Love the new delivery system, too
good coverage, light weight. very natural appearing.

Wow! i received this as a gift from sephora a few weeks ago. It was sitting in the bag until i decided to take it out and give it a try. AMAZING! Love the way it looks on my skin. Not thick and cakey like most foundations. looks so natural. i am ditching my current liquid foundation and buying a full size of the BE. The best part is this is cheaper than my current foundation. in am in love.

I've used this product for years and am never surprised by how great it looks. I switched from the Matte Finish to the original one since it's summer time and it seems to be less thick feeling and a lot cooler!

From about the ages of 16 to 50, I searched and searched for the perfect foundation. Every time I would buy foundation, it would be a different brand! Finally, about five years ago, at the age of 50, I found it! The perfect foundation! This stuff is amazing! It covers everything -- makes my skin look perfect; it lasts better than anything -- I don't even have time to look at my face much during the day, and at the end of the day it looks just as good as it did in the morning; and it's economical too -- one of these little jars lasts me 6-8 months! As a bonus, in the past five years, my skin has just kept looking better and better. No more breakouts, no more oil slicks, etc. The only way I will stop using Bare Minerals is if it no longer exists! I'll never switch to anything else!

I've been a long-time fan of BE. I've tried other mineral foundations (Philosophy, Sephora Brand, Smashbox, etc.) and for some reason I always come back to BE. Although I have oily skin, I prefer the original foundation to the matte finish. I find the matte finish too drying and a little cakey looking for the amount of coverage I need (hyper-pigmentation and blemishes).  I am light/golden medium in the winter and medium beige in the summer. I like that BE has a full range of skin tones and undertones. I have olive/yellow undertones that I have hard time matching with cheaper makeup.  I also love that BE has an SPF and is all natural. Don't have to worry about synthetics clogging my pores. Doesn't make my sensitive skin break out.  Overall, continues to be my fave. Will turn to it everyday knowing I will get a results I want.
Natural coverage that is perfect for summer heat.
I love it!! It's light and I feel confident wearing it without worrying about my pores getting clogged.

i love be fndation.. the only downfall is that I have to mix both 'tan' and 'medium beige' to achieve my skin color (tan olive skin/ latin complexion) once i mixed them though its fantastic and covers blemishes, scars, etc without looking cakey or making me break out! i can literally sleep in this stuff and wake up flawless and radiant next day (yep, its that good!) recommended!
great product reallly light feeling on the skin don't feel like I am wearing a mask. great for summer especially since we are in a heat wave and regular foundation would melt off my face.

This foundation is great for my skin. It is light and gives a smooth, natural-looking finish. I switched from a compact-powder make-up to this because the compact powder gave me a too made-up look. I would recommend this powder to anyone who likes a natural-look with a bit of finish.

I've had bad acne for years and this is the best foundation I've found for covering that up. It doesn't feel heavy, and I love the glowing look it gives my skin - I even get compliments sometimes. I would 100% recommend this foundation to anyone.
I prefer the matte color, especially in the summer. As with all B.E. products, a little goes a long way!
Works so well, and I love the new case. This make up always manages to keep my skin looking fresh, not looking like I have a pound of make-up on!

Having very sensitive fair skin, this is the only makeup that I have found that won't make me break out when I sweat during the hot/humid summer months. i love the fact that I can create a natural look for most days and build the coverage for nights out when I want to look totally flawless.
I have been using this product for many years and have recommended it to all my friends. It has a natural looking cover. Blends and hides imperfection and never looks cakey.
Love this stuff! Great clean, light feel. Does not bog your skin down like liquid foundation.

This foundation is an essential part of my morning routine since I discovered it in 2005. I've tried two of the other powder foundation competitors that arrived on the scene in the past two years, but they are either too fine and don't cover well or cake up and won't brush on. It covers nicely, allows for targeted blemish coverage, and works great as a facial sun screen.
love this product, have been using it for at least 5 years.

I have been using this makeup for over 4 years now. I love it. Not only does it cover up blemishes but it doesn't cause them either. I tend to have a problem with breaking out and so i am very wary of which makeups I use...this does the job for me. I approve :-)
This is the best make-up I have ever used. I love the way it actually stays on your face all day. There is no wear off or rub off.
Best coverage for my sensitive skin!!!! The best part about it is when people compliment me on my make up they don't say your make up looks good they say your skin looks good.

I absolutely love my bare escentuals. I just bought a 4th jar of this foundation. My tip: your face needs to be well exfoliated and moisturized before using this product, otherwise it will end up looking powdery and dry. I use it with a concealer , warmth and mineral veil for a flawless look.

I've only used the foundation once, but so far I absolutely love it. The coverage is amazing and it feels extremely light on your skin, almost like you're not wearing anything. Definitely worth the money!
I love this product. I have used it for a couple of years now and I think my complexion has improved while using it. I love the feel, the coverage, and the SPF!

I have very oily skin but this product makes me feel less oily and it actually has help my skin. I've notice less breakouts and this doesn't leave a powdery look. At times it looks like i'm not wearing anything at all so I do add a hint of tint or blush to my checks and forehead but I like it and it works for me.

What I like best about this product is that it absolutely does not cause any break outs. If you have skin (like mine) that is really finicky with foundations and moisturizers then this is THE product for you! It also provides good buildable coverage and is light enough for my pale, ginger complexion.  That being said, I only gave this product four stars instead of five because after a few hours I notice that it tends to produce streaks or weird film-like areas on my face where the make-up has done something weird with my natural skin oil. I apply the makeup with a brush and I don't notice any streaking after application but after a few hours it tends to become a little heavy. Other than that I have no complaints and I am now on my third container and plan on buying more when I run out!

Love the way it looks and feels! Just be very careful not to let the powder fall onto your clothes. I have had little bits fall onto my chest and it meant a full wardrobe change cuz it didn't just brush off.
This is the best foundation out there. I use it for all-over coverage, and the mineral veil is great too.

reviews.review_title: Yay for finally having golden tones!
reviews.review_text: My biggest complaint before would have been that the foundation color tones were unsuitable for Asian, yellowy, olive skin... But finally bare minerals has brought out a golden line that fits! Love this foundation..only thing to be aware of... Primer makes a big difference. Tried it without the primer for a while, but it just doesn't stay on. Also, it makes dry flakey skin kinda more noticeable so make sure to exfoliate and moisturize before!
easy to use and looks lovely

This foundation works just as great as everyone says it does. It goes on very smoothly, and provides great coverage. I apply it with the full coverage brush, and then use the concealer brush to cover dark circles and pimples. It works amazing and it really feels healthy for your skin.
My daughter and I love bareminerals. It is really hard to go back to liquid foundation after you learn to use this. It always looks natural and we get alot of compliments.

I am cosmetic product addict and don't even know how much money I spent ( in many cases, wasted) for it. I have tried sooooo many foundations including mineral products...... I have been using bare minerals for about 10 years and always been really happy with it, but being cosmetic addict, I have tried many other mineral foundation such as yougblood, sheer cover, and Jane Iredale but I must say none came even close to bare minerals. My skin is oily, sensitive and extremely acne prone. This powder does not cause break outs, the finish is really natural, but have great coverage. I have been told by many that they thought I do not wear any make up but just have really beautiful skin. Best of all, this is the only foundation do not streak or become patchy when I sweat. ( you know, those patch left on your skin after blotting off your sweat?) I cannot say enough good about this product. I really think this is my perfect foundation, the search is over.

I was skeptical about this product because I've never used a powder and it just at first glance looked too light and it didnt look like it would cover up very well. Luckily, I listened to the other positive reviewers and found such a wonderful foundation! This is my first time using a foundation that isn't drugstore, and I am glad I made the switch, even though it's a lot more expensive. Theres a nice,light, barely there feel when you put it on and it covers so well. I highly recommend it. =)
My face sweats and this foundation stays put. It does not bother my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: People with Senitive Skin DO NOT USE
reviews.review_text: OMG where do I beginning ... basically it was a great product when you used it now and again (like once a week). However, putting the product on everyday was horrible for me after a week. My skin looks spotted and dark. My skin looks burnt!!! Hyperpigmentation everywhere including my eyelids (since it has SPF). For a product that claims it's so gentle you can sleep in it and it's for all skin types, it's a load of ****!  Also if you have drier skin with some lines and wrinkles, go with liquid foundation rather than use this. I tried it with the brushes and with a wet makeup sponge (which I cleaned every time I used this product, and still this product caked into lines and wrinkles and made my skin look drier.  Yes I am annoyed and angry, but how would you feel if you spent money on something that promised all thiese things and instead gave you more issues than solutions??

what can I say? I wont use anything else. Goes on wonderfully, hides blemishes naturally, and minimal touch ups needed throughout the day. You can even sleep in it without feeling yucky in the morning, and it doesn't damage your skin leaving it on. The whole line is fantastic, and I'm a devoted fan.
I went in and told the salesperson that I need a warmer color to match my tan. She selected and tested two then matched me and it blends perfectly!
great coverage, but with a natural glow so I don't look cakey. Stays on all day, too.
I get compliments on my skin all the time now. If I happen to leave it on all night - no break outs. This is make up that is actually good for you face!

If i was on a deserted Island and could only own one kind of makeup this would be all I need. This product gave me back my confidence in myself, made me feel beautiful again, made my acne even go away. I am just blown away with the quality put into this product. I am so happy, if youve never tried it, your missing out big time!
I've loved this stuff for many years. And the new packaging keeps from wasting the product

I have been using Bare Escentuals since 2006 and totally love the products. Other makeup is not an option. Bare Escentuals always looks very fresh, does not change colors on your skin and is good for your skin. It really does not get any better!!!
I started using bare mineral foundation last year. I haven't used any other because it's so light weight and I love it.

So happy I could find this product in a full size. The smaller sizes lasted quite a while so I know this will last even longer. Don't have to use a lot to get the coverage you want. Great deal and great product!

This stuff is amazing. I ran out of it and tried to go back to my liquid foundation that I had been using for years and I just couldn't. Bare Minerals feels so clean and light. Besides doing a great job at covering up imperfections, it also improved the condition of my skin.

I LOVE this makeup! It hides my age spots without looking heavy. The only thing I would like to know is how to use all of the powder in the container. I still see some, but can't get it to come out. Any suggestions?
I've been using this product for years and have no plans to switch to something else. I love that it has sunblock and sunscreen, matches my skin tone perfectly, and doesn't look too made up.

reviews.review_title: The only foundation I'll ever use
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for years njow and I'll never use anything else

I've been using this for years now, and I will never go back to any other. This is the only foundation I've used that doesn't make me breakout. I tried the matte and didn't care for it. This provides the perfect coverage while protecting you from the sun!
I love this product. I only use a small amount and it stays on for most of my day. It is light and it doesn't get cakey. And it covers all those unwanted marks.
I love this makeup. Goes on easy and looks natural.

I've been using Bare Minerals for almost 6 yrs. now. I like it so much, I don't think I would switch brands or go back to liquid foundation. I do see a difference in the quality of my skin, and I finally have the flawless look I've been searching for since my teen years. I will say that I do need to mix 2 shades together to get the perfect match for my skin, but it's well worth it!
I have been using for years and it is wonderful! Makeup that doesn't feel like you are wearing makeup!
I have been using Bare Minerals for years. Their shades are varied enough to match any skin tone, and you really can sleep in it! The longer you wear it, the better it looks.
I love how this foundation doesn't look cakey at all on my face. It has a nice finish to it and makes my skin look naturally beautiful! By far the best foundation i have tried out.

reviews.review_title: Been using it--and loving it--for years
reviews.review_text: Bare Escentuals is, and remains, a remarkable foundation. If it could cook, it would be a priceless. ;-)

I love it! This provides really good coverage and doesn't look cakey at all. I bought the get started kit, which 2 brushes, too foundation containers (which last a really long time), and a concealer brush.  I also love how you can build up to your desired level of coverage.

I have tried lots and lots of products so i am able to have coverage but not have my skin breaking out bare m is one of my best products for this it covers redness and pimples but can look cakey at times but over all it is a very good choice for foundation and will last a very long time :)
I brush this on right over my concealer and primer for a soft glow. This nourishing formula is great for any skin type and looks so natural.

I like how you can put a little on for light coverage during the day or heavier coverage for night. I have a very yellow undertone and feel like foundations are usually too pink or beige. I use Light and Golden Medium and it matches my skin perfectly. SOmetimes it is dry on my cheeks but if i use a little primer underneath its fine. Love this product.

this is absolutely the best makeup going. i've tried a million and always come back. now i just stick with it! i have dry skin so i use a moisturizer first. i don't need one with the sticky sunscreen because bareminerals has a natural sunscreen. if you follow the directions, it will cover flaws and give you a great glow. i often get compliments on my skin. i put a piece of kleenex underneath to catch any stray powder and there's no mess.
Great product! Light coverage but covers well!

I love the sheer coverage of this foundation. I can cover any redness around my nose and the occasional pimple that appears ans still feel as if I am wearing nothing. I often get compliments on my complexion.

LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!!!! :) I'm very picky with choosing foundation products and I've tried so many other brands including make up forever, lancome, estee lauder, etc. As a V.I.B. member at Sephora, this is my first 5 star rating I'm giving for a foundation product. I first got to try the Bare mineral's foundation along with moisturizing creme and the mineral veil for I got them as a free gift for being V.I.B member. I'm sooooo glad I got to try the sample for if not, I would've never knew how great this foundation is! It is simply AMAZING!!!!! It Makes your face look so hydrating, natural, glowy and young!! My mom asked me what product I used the same day I first tried this, and she asked me if she can try my sample. She loved it too and her friends told her she looks so much younger!...She and I both ended up getting the full sized products in different colors; my skin is darker than her so I got in golden medium color while she got the fairly light one. We both LOVE these so much!!! I'm also thinking about purchasing the moisturizing creme once I'm done with the sample I got :)
Wonderful product - fantastic results. I stay oil free all day!
The best foundation that I have ever found. I can never go back to liquid. Lasts quite a while, covers blemishes perfectly, and does even better with a good primer.
Love this foundation! You get great coverage with a natural look.
I love this. It is easy, works to cover blemishes as well as overall without mess and mask looking in the end. Can't find anything better.
I have been using this foundation since the early 90's (when you could only get it from the TV ads). I have been distracted by bright shiny objects', but I always return to bareminerals.

I'll start off by saying that I love natural products, and I appreciate that this foundation is made with minerals that are good for your skin. However, this foundation didn't work for me. It was impossible to get the desired amount of coverage required my oily, acne-scarred skin without it looking powdery and fake. Throughout the day, it just slid off my skin. And none of the colors were right for me-either too chalky or too yellow.
Love the softness it giives my skin, great coverage and yet extremely light. My skin never feels smothered.

I absolutely love this product. I have been wearing this product for years. I recently had a sephora consultation because I was getting married and wanted to make sure my pictures came out flawless and they changed my foundation to a liquid and I hated it. I wore my bareminerals on the day of my wedding and I worked beautiful. Stick with this product and you can't go wrong.
really like the coverage and it last all day
keep going back for more! especially in the summer time when you dont want anything greasy or heavy on your face!

I will never stop loving BE! I picked up Fairly Light for the summer months when Fair is just a bit too pale/pink for my face. Fairly light, on the other hand, is just a hint more yellowish and thus looks like a little bit of sun on an otherwise porcelain complexion. Like all other BE foundations, the coverage can be fine-tuned to your needs - a little bit buffed on in certain areas, or build up as much coverage as you'd like.  If you've never tried BE foundation, you are doing yourself an injustice. You have to at least try it! It's improved the quality of my skin incredibly and the foundation gives my face an incredible glow. No matter how sleep-deprived and literally depressed I am, people I run into in my building that I haven't seen for a while tend to say, Wow, you look great! and it's NOT because I've lost weight or anything :) Woo hoo BE!

This is the best and only foundation I ever use. If you've been watching the infomercials and wondering if it lives up to the hype--yes! It gives a wonderful soft focus look to my skin, which has mild acne scarring and redness/uneven tone, but it still lets my freckles show through, which I love. It covers and conceals, but reveals just enough so that I still look like ME.  One note- I have moderately dry skin even in summer, so I suggest using a good face moisturizer and giving it plenty of time to soak in before application for the most natural look--the powder foundation can make dry skin look more obvious without a good moisturizer, but I suppose that's true for any face powder.

This is the only mineral foundation that I have liked. I've tryed some from the drug store, but they just dont have the amazing coverage that bareminerals have. It's very light feeling, I use a matte lotion under mine. And it doesnt get oily on me at all! Its worth it and it last along time.

I love this foundation, Its all day coverage, something you can fall asleep in (not on purpose of course) and not have to worry about having icky skin the next day. Ive been using it for years and it's the only foundation i use.

Anything Bare Minerals works great for me! I have dark hair and olive complexion and this product lets my skin breathe while still giving me the coverage I need. My skin does not get oily with this product like it normally would with regular foundations. I'm hooked!

I tried mineral makeup as I have very sensitive skin. The main problem is that you really have to wait until your moisturizer sinks in before applying. I don't find that it provides great coverage, but ok for the summer. The good thing is that Sephora will give you color samples to try.

I love, love bareMinerals foundation! I love how my face feels and looks. I use it with Illuminating Mineral Veil for a fresh dewy look. I sweat a lot in the summer and I've noticed that my foundation doesn't slide off my face as with other brands.
This a miracle! It hides all blemishes and spots on my skin.My glows radiantly as i apply the bare minerals.I am a great fan of Bare minerals.Thanks to my cousin who introduced me to this product!

I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! It is my summer shade. I use medium tan and the coverage IS flawless. I love the way it blends with my summer tan, that I don't look made up, and the best part is, it also gives me added protection from the sun. Ladies, TRY THIS, YOULL LOVE IT! Marti

reviews.review_title: It looks great at the end of the day
reviews.review_text: I have a combination skin, oily side in the summer but decided to try the original for the first try. It actually feels a little dry and flaky when I first apply it but after I let it sit for 10 min or so it blends in with my skin very well. My skin does get shiny after some hours though, for now I just pat my face with blotting paper and the skin looks fine. I might try the matte next time.

The foundation is lightweight. Doesnt bother me untie summer months (temperature here can reach up to 50 degrees Celsius). Stays on till u remove it. No clogging of my pores. Perfect fit for my imperfect skin. just make sure to prep and dry your skin before applying to avoid streaks on damp skin.
I have been using it for about a year and I love it. I love how it feels extremely natural as if your wearing nothing at all.

reviews.review_title: Bare Minerals is worth the cost
reviews.review_text: It leaves your skin feeling soft, smooth, and younger looking. It also has a radiant quality. I loved it from my first brush stroke.
I love BareMinerals. It is so lightweight for the summer.

This is a great foundation, powder combination. It is so light yet covers and blends your skin tone. I sometimes go to bed without washing my face and forget it was on in the morning because it is so light.

I just got the shade Golden Tan today, and I tried it out almost immediately. Great first time mineral makeup! It buffs away perfectly. I have dry skin so I used my moisturizer prior to applying the product. I was skeptical at first because of my dry skin, but it binds to the skin in a silky and a non drying way. Great price for the size and amount. The lock in place setting helps with spillage too, Awesome buy :)
It's all I ever use, couldn't live without it!
It looks and feels like I am not even wearing makeup. This never makes me break out. Love it.
I love this foundation and I will not use any thing else!!!!

The original doesn't cover as well as the matte. Even though I purchased both of them in Fair they are noticeably different colors. The Original is much lighter and cakes up when applied with the concealer brush.
i love the matte look of this powder. looks natural w/no powdery residue
Great for younger skin, but will settle in lines and wrinkles
i've never tried the new matte foundation, but i love this powder. Even coverage that feels like and makes my skin look natural and smooth. I highly recommend :)
Found the right shade for me. This product does double duty can be used as a concealer on those dark circle, blemishes, etc as well as over all coverage.

reviews.review_title: Love it...but concerned about break outs.
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE the way this foundation makes my skin look. It gives me a glow that people actually notice. I have been using this foundation for about 9 months. I have never had problem skin but around the same time I started using bare minerals my skin started to break out. I'm trying to pinpoint what is causing these break outs...as they are only in my t-zone area. I guess I am just wondering if anyone else has experienced negative changes in their skin after using this? I can't imagine such a great product with great ingredients would make my skin break out ...but I am not sure anymore. Help! I don't want to stop using this product because I love it! lol
Great coverage, better than all the high priced famous brand I used. great for oil control as well. I regret for not trying it earlier.
great coverage i ever use, long lasting and perfect for sensitive skin like me.

so along with all the other reviews, i am super duper satisfied with this product. it keeps its promises. over time, i've realized that some of my acne scars are gone because of this. it also makes my face less oily during the day, and it stays for a long period of time too. so i would recommend this to everyone with any kind of skin

This makeup provides build-able coverage and doesn't cause clogged pores or breakouts (at least for me, and I have very sensitive skin). Also, it wears a LONG time. I work 12-14 hour shifts and only have to touch up once a day, if that.
The best foundation ever!

I love bare escentuals I've been using the foundation for years now and haven't come across another I've liked better its lightweight although does sometimes make my pores appear bigger so I try to not put too much on my cheeks but otherwise is a great product

I've been using this foundation for a few years now and nothing beats it. Make sure you use a good brush so the make up goes on well and doesn't get wasted.  I mix the light and fairly light shades to get the perfect shade for me.

reviews.review_title: The best camouflage product on the market
reviews.review_text: I am a seasoned woman with many skin imperfections. I also have extremely dry skin. I have wasted quite a bit of money trying to find a true camouflage makeup. this is it!! I have been using this product for approx 6 years with great success. I am constantly being complimented on my great skin.
great coverage and no clogging pores. good for all year round use!!

I hate wearing makeup in the summer but want my skin to look flawless. That's why I wear BE. You never look or feel like you are wearing makeup. It stays put and just makes your skin look better. Never feels greasy or heavy. You can even sleep in it and your skin still stays healthy.

reviews.review_title: There's nothing bad here at all
reviews.review_text: To the people who say it made them cakey-I guarantee you're putting it on wrong. I had bought some a while back, and quickly went back to my original. Then I was in the states and there was an actual Bare Escentuals store and I got them to show me how to apply it. It's now my only makeup. I can build it up to suit where I'm going, it lasts all day, I can blend shades to match my summer and winter skin, it's cleared all my blemishes and my skin is better than ever. I think it did my taxes. I do love/hate their brushes. I find, to put it on the way they taught me destroys the bristles, but a general kabuki brush was too soft. Their eyeshadows also last forever and stay on all day-and eyemakeup gets sucked into my eyeballs within an hour.
Nothing compares to Bare Minerals. At 60, I love the coverage..Never greasy, cakes...but ultra light, with awesome coverage. Simply the best!

Creates the most flawless, airbrushed-looking coverage I have ever seen. It covers all imperfections, and I find that it typical covers at medium coverage, but if you put on enough, can be a full-coverage foundation. I have found that it actually makes my skin better, actually reducing the acne I had when I started using it, to the point that I don't have any at this point (Note: I did not change my skin care regimen at all, so I can definitely attribute it to the use of this product!).  I think this is a lovely product for girls who are acne-prone, and those who need to cover redness, and scaring from said acne. I was introduced to this product by my friend from college who has dry skin, and it looks equally fabulous on her. I have since introduced it to my mother, who wears the matte version, and my sister, who now wears the original. Bare Minerals is quite addictive, clearly! :)
Love this makeup and after years of using haven't found anything to compare.

Excellent product. A little goes a long way and makes my complexion look flawless. However, I was disappointed to receive the old packaging which is messy and wasteful. I called customer service and was told that they send out what Bard Escentuals sends them, I would have been much happier with new spin top packaging.

reviews.review_title: I don't get the hype on this stuff
reviews.review_text: It made my face look too powdery and cakey. I thought it might be because I put on sunscreen and primer first... but, my other powder foundation goes on just lovely. I read all the reviews and try this every couple of years.. and, I always am disappointed. just hype.
Bare Minerals is without a doubt the BEST!! DO NOT accept imitators!!

I never used a foundation until I started to get hyper pigmentation spots in my late 20s. My friend took me to bare minerals and I loved it! I wish I would have worn this all along because it's natural and protects a little from the sun.
I love this stuff. It has never made me break out, and makes my skin glow. The new packaging keeps the powder from making a mess, a great improvement from the previous packaging.
i used it 2 years ago and recently switched back. natural and feels great

Finally...the perfect bareMinerals SPF Foundation shade for me....I was always in between. Medium was a tad dark for me, and lighter shades were too light. Thanks bareMinerals & Sephora for carrying this one!

Love this foundation! Very light with buildable coverage. Recently used this for a wedding in Jamaica. Did my makeup and the brides. It stayed in place all night long. The wedding was outside on the beach along with the reception and if you haven't been to Jamaica, it is HUMID!
I really like this product. It is great for oily skin.
I really like the bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation. It goes on beautifully, the only thing I wish it did better was erase the lines completely! hahaha

I love Bare Escentuals but will occasionally try other things for any other product but the foundation. I am an athlete and work on a farm and although Im out in the sun my face never burns and always stays even. It is truely sweat proof and gives a great glow! Love it!
love it, as always, just wish they didn't keep making the product smaller and increasing the price. otherwise, perfect coverage!

I rarely buy the same thing twice (I just like to switch stuff up), but this is the exception to that rule. I've been using this stuff for close to three years and I'm always amazed by the great job it does of covering problem spots without looking thick or cake-y. I absolutely recommend this for everyone!
feels light, great to use a small brush to conceal first, then buff to smooth out. have been using this for years

I can't say enough about bareMinerals. I've been using the products for about five years and absolutely love it! My skin has never looked better and I get compliments all the time on how great my skin looks. It very natural looking.
I have used for years. I love the way it makes my complexion look. It is hard to make a mistake with this product.
I love Bare Escentuals. You can't tell I have on foundation. The color matches my skin tone perfectly.
Love bare minerals make-up is great! My skin has never looked and felt better!

Been a Bare Minerals foundation user since 2005. I love it. I have to say my last purchase will be a test. Generally this foundation lasts me easily 5-6 months. The time before this purchase only lasted me 4 months. I use it everyday. Everyday. I know my makeup. We will see. If it it only lasts 4 months again, I may switch to another product.

I've heard all kinds of bad this about bare escentuals from real makeup artists but I like it ok. It is easy and cheap but I only get it when I'm in a financial bind and really can't afford the good stuff. The lightest shade (fair) is too dark for me and looks like it is sitting on my skin instead of blending in with it, but not too horribly.

This foundation is out of this world! Applies easily and flawlessly, no streaking during the hot summer months. Would never go back to a liquid foundation. Having a teenage daughter, this foundation is easy for anyone to use.
Hey you over 50's, I still have oily skin - what's up? I tried the mat finish . . . but returned to the original. This makeup is the best I've ever used. Less is MORE!
gives a nice even color , does not give a heavy cover which is good. But does seem to wear off as the day goes on.

Must work good for some, but I have used many different powders, and this is the only one that has ever left an uneven color on me. There are spots that are a lot darker than other areas. Looks bad on me.

This foundation is amazing. Not only can it double as a concealer when you use the concealer brush from BE but the coverage is amazing and looks so natural. It also helps pull toxins from under the skin for the first few weeks you use it, and that means less breakouts! If you have dry skin, don't worry about this being a powder foundation. The primer and a good moisturizer before use will help you out. If you have oily skin It's great because it is a matte foundation and if you want a healthy glow you can use BE Raidiant all over face color which is great for highlighting. I also use the Jade powder which is good to use all over the body for extra definition in legs, and collar bones. I also like to use it in my hair for a little bit of extra shine.

this stuffs great for all types of skin, it stays on all day long and doesnt let your skin get oily. the best part about it is you can cover up any type of marks or flaws without using much. it gives you a natural flawless look while improving your skin! make sure to go to sephora & get the perfect shade for your skin :)

I've used Bare Minerals before, didn't care for it. Now I'm giving it a second chance. The girl who was helping me did not test the shade before she sold it to me, and I had to go out in the sun an entire weekend before the color matched my skin. Other than that, the product gets better with practice...
I continue to buy bare minerals because it is my favorite powder that makes your skin feel natural and it also provides a good cover.. The spf is great too.

I am young but still have problem areas on my skin. I have used this for years, but I think I'm giving up on it. Whenever I put on the foundation it looks disgusting. I'm too young to have any wrinkles, yet somehow this stuff somehow manages to create them on my face. I didn't think you could put too much powder on, but even if i just want to cover up the redness on my skin, I can't do it without the foundation looking cakey and gross.

reviews.review_title: not a good foundation for dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would get this if you have oily skin but not dry skin. I felt like this foundation was starting to bake and melt off my face when I was in the sunlight. It dried out my face so much that my cheeks turned red.

I was not too keen on this new packaging, I mix two colours together to get my foundation shade perfect for me. Which I thought was now going to be very difficult as you can't removes the sifter as with previous style containers.....  Then a Sephora lady enlightened me, you can removed the BOTTOM of the container !! Look at the bottom you will see there is a lip/ groove going round the circumference of the base, use tweezers or similar to gently (I repeat gently or the powder will fly out every where) lift the bottom off....mix your shades, or refill your container...click the bottom back on, flip it over and hey presto, your done!  I am pretty sure that is not mentioned on the new container/pots packaging, why not....it is very useful in my mind.  Thanks to Lisa the Sephora lady!

A wonderful Sephora member did my face in bareMinerals foundation for the first time and I was impressed with the coverage and how lightweight it felt. Unfortunately the minerals also clung to my peach fuzz and it looked... awkward. I guess not for the peach-fuzzy gals. Another star got knocked off for being too matte - I like a little bit of sheen as it looks more natural. All in all I think it can be a great product for some, just not for me.  PS - BE does get extra points for including fair skin shades w/ olive undertones - foundations can be very hard to come by in this combination!
this foundation looks natural on. its perfect for all occasions and I don't break out if i forget to wash my face in the evenings. Its also buildable,

i dont really use a foundation every day...but i use this as a concealer to hide dark spots ...sometimes i even use it under my eyes and as a base eye shadow...it is a multi-purpose foundation...i dont think i'll be buying another concealer again...amazing product!

The bareMinerals foundation has a lightweight feel on your face. The texture and feel is not cakey at all. I made the switch to bareMinerals 4 years ago and have used it ever since. I like that it provides spf 15 in the product. The product itself lasts for awhile, which makes it nice so you don't have to purchase a new one right away.
I've been using bareMinerals for 4 years now and I have yet to find anything better. It gives a very natural look and if I want more coverage, it's very easy to build it up.
I'll never marry a man, but I've wed this foundation. Every time I stray, I just kick myself and return.

I love this! It definitely lives up to the hype. It looks so natural on my skin and matches perfectly--not too light, not too dark, which is usually hard to find for my skin tone. I got the shade fairly medium. I would ask one of the workers to match your skin tone though to make sure you're getting the right one. That's what I did, and he was able to find the perfect shade for me right away. Love this! :)
I've been using bareMinerals foundation for over 5 yrs now.My skin has never looked better, it covers the redness on my cheeks better than any liquid I've used!

I have using bareminerals for years and see no reason to change. I use a very light application and mainly use it in my nose area to even out the skin tone. For my over 40 skin, a light application will not emphasize wrinkles and make sure to have skin moisturized before application. The best thing for me about this product is that it lasts all day.

I have used this product for 7 years and love it - nice coverage and doesn't feel like foundation. I have oily skin so the coverage doesn't last as long as I'd like, but nothing does! I struggle with acne and it covers nicely and doesn't make the problem worse.

This is really the perfect foundation. You can use as much or as little as you need without looking like you caked it on. I definitely need to moisturize my skin first, because any dryness will show up tenfold. However, we should all be moisturizing daily anyway so we can keep up that beautiful skin! This makeup is one of the few foundations that doesn't make me break out. It hardly feels like I've got anything on my face. Also, the new closing top is a life saver.
I have been using this for a few years now. The coverage is light but I love the feel and and I the way it has improved my skin. This ia ll I will wear for founation. Looks great too

I love this foundation. About once a year I decide to try something new (usually a liquid) and end up coming back to BE every time. I love how easy it is to apply, and it's buildable for more coverage in areas where needed. It's my go to foundation!
My skin tone is hard to match because I'm so fair. This make up matches my skin perfectly and it applies quickly. I will never use any other brand!

Lets just say I have, and always had bad skin. I started breaking out in the fourth grade believe it or not and my skin was just so excessively oily! I stumbled upon this about a year ago and thank goodness I did. I will never be able to just go natural with no makeup because my skin is so oily/bad. This stuff is heaven. The coverage is soo light yet it covers all of your imperfections. It is also obvious that my skin is much better

I am ritualistic over this foundation. it provides flawless coverage and i have dry skin and it doesnt make it any drier infact it conceals and my skin has improved since ive been using it. It feels light and it lasts all day.
Bare Escentuals mineral foundation gives me the best, most natural looking coverage. Plus, it's good to my skin and lasts all day!
I have used this for a few years and there isn't a better foundation oout there as far as I am concerned. It provides good coverage but still natural looking. And it is good for your skin!
Always in stock.. always the best of everything in the store
i love everything bare minerals does - genius !!
I love bareMinerals. It is the best. The new container that turns to open and close is great.

I am fair-skinned, and usually foundations don't work with my skin tone. This easily covers ALL blemishes, and it blends with my face color to look natural. Usually I don't believe informercials, but when I saw the Bare Minerals commercials after trying this product, I had to agree with every claim that was made about this product. It covers everything, and I can sleep in it without getting extra blemishes. It even has SPF 15, which is important for a fair-skinned person like me. I would recommend it to anyone!
Easy to apply. Lightweight.

i love sephora and browsing and buying make-up and beauty products however im actually rubbish at applying make-up but this is just perfect. the best ever. in my life ive tried at least 30 brands of foundation and this is THE BEST. no contest. ypu have to buy it if you havent already - the hype is true!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Have always used the medium beige color After decreasing my sun exposure this past year, that color was just not right anymore. I feared the other options would be too pale, but this color ended up being awesome! Still gives my skin a warm glow and it is a perfect match.

I'm the type of woman that doesn't like liquid foundation. I have dry skin and find it rather uncomfortable to wear. Bare Minerals allows me the luxury of the coverage I'm looking for in a light powder that doesn't even feel like you're wearing make up. I've gotten so many compliments from others on how 'fresh' my skin looks. Literally from the first use. HIGHLY recommended

I would be careful when using the shade finder online. It gives a very natural look to the skin. I am a guy and have hereditary rosacea. I've tried lasers and pills, nothing has seemed to help. This product gives me natural coverage without it even looking like I'm wearing foundation. It completely covers my redness and makes my skin look healthy and clear. I will say the one thing when choosing a shade is don't be afraid to go darker than what you think you are. I'm Caucasian with a medium skin tone. I tan fairly easy but my skin doesn't look nearly as dark as the model shown. My advice would be to go into your local boutique or sephora and let them try different shades on you. I can say from personal experience that the right shade makes all the difference. I started out using medium beige, which completely washed me out and it didn't look natural. I then switched to golden medium which was still too light. Eventually I tried golden tan which was the perfect match. This product has honestly given me such a confidence boost and I'm no longer embarrassed for people to look at my skin.
Love it! Great coverage, I wear it everyday!!

I have fair, oily, acne-prone skin. Actually, my skin is more see-through than fair--it's almost like I have hardly any pigment in my face. A friend told me about Bare Minerals and I didn't think it would work for me because I need a good amount of coverage. I gave it a shot and was so impressed because you can get full coverage without looking like you have a ton of makeup plastered on your face. Another plus is that touch-ups look natural and blend in very well. I have been using the powder foundation in fair for a few years and my skin has never looked better.

Been using bareMinerals for about 5 years. Love, love, love this powder. Goes on as heavy or as light as you want. And for someone who is sometimes too tired to wash her face at night it works out well.
not enough coverage and too drying for around the eye area, but if used with another concealer can be a substitute foundation for the summer.

When I first tried this, it was because it was given to me as a gift from my sister who fell in love with it! Honestly, I wasn't sure if I would like the powder foundation (I was using liquid foudation at the time). Oh my...what a difference! I immediately fell in love this product also! It feels so light on my face; feels like I'm not wearing any make-up at all. And I love the fact that you don't need to use a lot and yet it covers so well. Also, I have very sensitive skin and I have never had a problem using this product. In fact, my face is much healthier...no breakouts, no problems areas...since using this!!! Now, I can't imagine how I could've ever worn liguid foundation..just the thought of that heavy make-up on my face makes me cringe! The bareMinerals Foundation was the BEST gift I ever received. (Oh, and by the way, a third sister has made the switch from liquid to bareMinerals after trying it once!!)

reviews.review_title: The right shade is the secret
reviews.review_text: Friends have used this (and raved about it) for years. I could never make it work for me. By the time I got the coverage I wanted, I had too much on. Long after I had given up, I tried a darker shade and I'm raving about it. The right shade made all the difference. - takes very little to get the (sheer) coverage I want and it's so easy to use. If you're having the same problem, don't be afraid to go a little darker.

For people who want to feel naturally gorgeous, this foundation is the one. This product feels so soft and creamy on skin and it will actually improve it too! My skin tends to be an issue because i have a weird combination of dry, oily, and acne skin, but this product makes me look naturally flawless. It is also very versatile too. Works as a foundation, concealer, and a finishing powder (you only need a little bit). I will continue buying this :)

When I lived in Phoenix, AZ I could not use this foundation because my skin was so dry that this looked super chalky on me and it really accentuated my dry patches on my face. Fast forward a few years and i am now living in Miami, FL where the heat factor has changed from super duper dry to nice and humid! I literally had to change all of my face makeup and skincare regime and it took my awhile to figure out what worked best for me out here. During the summer months this foundation actually looks amazing (although make sure you are applying it correctly or else it will look chalky/cakey). It stays on all day and it gives fantastic coverage while looking and feeling super natural, just like my own skin. I do use a primer underneath and that may help with the staying power and no splotching but it may be just fine on it's own--I have never used it sans the primer. I use Laura Gellar spackle but I also like Korres primer and I am going to buy that next. Overall, I have learned to really love BE and the natural but still sexy looks you can achieve with their products. The eyeshadows, face powders, blushes, faux tan are unbelievably gorgeous, long-wearing, and very lit from within looking. No cakiness or overdone look here.
I have been using Bare mInerals for 2 years I think. I love all of their products. But be careful not to use too much...starts to appear powdery on the face. around eyes and nose.

I love this powdered foundation -- it makes my skin look silky, and you can't tell I'm wearing make-up! I also love that it has an SPF in it, and is very good for your skin. I have tried Bobbi Brown's powdered foundation, MAC's, and many more, but this one top's them all!

My face is really prone to redness and this is the only product that I've tried that actually covers that. It's mostly natural looking, if a bit dewy. I don't need a ton of coverage each day so it lasts a while. I've liked it even more since I started using a foundation primer with it. I don't always use it with the mineral veil and it still looks good.
I am a fan of the bareMinerals foundation. I have been using these products for about 2 years now. I love how natural they look, and how light and clean they feel while wearing.

This, I felt was very lightweight and easy to blend and apply. I'm used to more of a heavier coverage seeing that I have some hyperpigmentation issues. I have oily/combo skin, so I figured this could help keep that matte look. I ended up breaking out and my skin always felt itchy. I'm not sensitive whatsoever so I don't understand why that happened. I never bought it again and went back to my usual foundation. Atleast I gave it a shot to see what all the hype was about. Not for me, I guess.
This foundation is great!! I love it and i can use it any time. It looks so natural.

I love this makeup on days when I feel like I'm having a good skin day or don't need quite as much coverage. It has a beautiful luminosity, nice texture, feels great on and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin, but I have a hard time getting a full coverage finish without looking overdone. I need to wear a concealer with it to cover blemishes and under-eye darkness. I think it would be great for someone with good skin who needs a medium coverage, it's just not enough for me.

Great loose mineral foundation with great natural looking finish. It's been years since I have used bareMinerals, but after being frustrated with other products, I'm actually very satisfied with this. I am so impressed with the array of colors to choose from, but honestly my most favorite thing about this product is the packaging!! It's so convenient for traveling and not wasting any product due to spillage. I can't stress that enough how important packaging is for us girls on the go. Go buy this now!

This is just too shiny and greasy-looking for me, even right after I put it on. And it just doesn't seem to blend in that great. If you're skin is non-oily it might work ok for you. I love Bare Minerals MATTE.
As always, the product works. My only complaint is that at the end of the container its difficult to use it all up. Sure wish there was a on-the-go size for the purse.
I have rosacea. This foundation provides great coverage but it does not look like you have on foundation. It makes my skin glow.
Can't imagine prepping for the day without it!!!

This foundation is fantastic! I'm not extremely skilled at applying makeup but when this goes on it looks like a professional makeup artist applied it for a photo shoot! Coverage is excellent and not too shiny; it is very natural looking.

Love this makeup! I normally switch foundations whenever Im done with one but I have stuck to bare minerals for about a year now. My skin has never been better and the coverage is easily controlled. On days that I need more coverage I can get it by just putting more on. On days that I just need a little coverage bare minerals is perfect for that too. I also dont need to get another shade in the winter, it always matches my skin tone.
I love this product! It goes on easily and stays put all day!
Great coverage for a powder foundation. I love how you can control the coverage and the almost creamy consistency when blending.

i found this product in my sister's makeup bag one day, so i decided to try it out. i had to buy my own because i haven't stopped using it since! it gives my face such a flawless, fresh and healthy glow that i don't want to take my makeup off at night. a little bit of this goes a long way! i'm really happy with this product!

I tried bareMinerals SPF foundation for the first time a few weeks ago. I like it very much. It feels light on the skin and gives anywhere from very light coverage to full coverage depending on how many layers you apply. It doesn't sink into lines and lasts all day.

reviews.review_title: Good product, but I prefer the matte mixed in
reviews.review_text: Bareminerals offers awesome, buildable coverage and once you apply it, it feels like you don't have anything on!  However, my only qualm is that sometimes when there is a concentration of the product in one area, it tends to create a greyish tint. I asked the employees in the Bare Escentuals store about this and they told me it was because of the mica (a shimmering mineral that gives you the luminous finish) in the product. Now, I mix the Bareminerals matte with the original foundation to avoid that issue.  Another note: The original Bareminerals has a slightly pinker tint. while the Bareminerals matte offers a more yellow tint.  If you found this review helpful, check out my blog:  addicted-tomymascara.blogspot.com

I never use any other powder. I am fair and have pretty dry skin, so most powders just look flaky. This one really manages to stay looking fresh for hours without getting clumpy. A little goes a long way! You can apply it very sparingly for excellent coverage. Great for covering zits.
I could not live without my bareMinerals foundation. It always looks so natural and blends perfectly.

If anyone is still on the fence I would just like to reassure you that this is the ultimate foundation! My skin was a mess before I started using bare minerals over 4 years ago. I was oily and would always have breakouts. Also, by the end of the day my skin was like an oil slick. I couldn't wait to wash my face at night. Now all this is different. My skin is amazing - even and not oily. The foundation looks and feels amazing. It is very natural and looks like I just have awesome skin. I know that I can put it on in the morning and look great all day. My skin has cleared up and I am always still receiving compliments on my skin. Do yourself a favor and change your life! My sister also just bought this since she always admires my skin and she has had the same results. Her breakouts are lessening, her skin is even, and she looks beautiful. Love, love, love!
I really like Bare Minerals. It gives good coverage and it is makeup I can feel good about wearing. No chemicals and yucky stuff in it.

I used Bare Minerals several years ago, and kept it on hold as a fail-safe makeup in case I had no other option. I have used every brand of makeup at my grasp, and there's nothing like B.M. I have naturally slick skin, and the fact that BM doesn't leave my skin greasy after ten plus hours wearing it, like every other brand of makeup, makes me feel confident in my own skin. If you can afford this, don't pass it up!
This product is so great! It is so light and flawless!

This is the only makeup that doesn't make my somewhat dry, sensitive and breakout prone skin freak out, I have been using it for nearly 3 years and love the results, The light natural finish couldn't be more comfortable, I will never switch as long as this product is being produced.

so much better than liquid foundation. lasts a very long time (i usually wear sheer to medium coverage), and feels relatively light on your face.  only complaints are that it's a little shimmery when you try to get more coverage, and that as it is a mineral based foundation, it doesn't last the whole day.  however, the finish is a lot more natural looking that liquid foundations, and a little goes a long way. my skin has been clearing up; i don't break out as often. however, i feel like my pores are getting bigger (perhaps it's because i'm getting older). but it's definitely the best alternative to another other make up i've tried. makes me look very fresh and awake. however, i have a very oily t-zone and i have to check ever 3 hours for shine and sometimes i have to reapply. next time i'll try the matte bare minerals
Been using it for 2yrs... Love it!

I have been using bareMinerals for a couple of years now and I swear by it! It so lightweight yet provides amazing, even coverage. Many people believe that liquid foundations are the only way to go for complete coverage but many of my friends have been converted to this powder. Its a must have for any girl looking to correct her complexion without feeling weighed down.

This works as a light foundation for daily wear. It is easy to apply and lasts all day if you use a primer underneath. It has made my skin very dry in some areas but it is not that big of a deal. Overall, great foundation and does not clog pores.

I'd tried powder foundation before and although I liked the look, it dried my face out AND made my sort-of-sensitive facial skin irritated. And liquid and mousse foundation makes my skin look greasy by the middle of the day (plus the liquid is messy!). I like cream to powder, but you can't really get light coverage with cream to powder - it starts off heavy.  THIS, though, is perfect. First of all, big props to the male associate at the Times Square store who helped me color match my skintone (I'm Golden Dark). Second of all, it has all of the benefits of the powder foundation without drying me out. Usually when I wear a full face of makeup (which is almost every day) by the end of the day I am running home, I can't wait to get the gunk off my face. But not this. Even though I wear the primer, this foundation and Mineral Veil...it feels light, like I'm not even really wearing makeup. And of course it doesn't make my face itch.  Not only that, but WOW does it look nice. I know it sounds gimmicky but it really does give you a natural luminosity. It makes my skin look smooth and beautiful and especially with the primer diminishes my pores to nothing. I also had two large whiteheads on my chin and tapped a little over my chin with the concealer brush (I got the get started kit). Of course they didn't disappear, but they were a lot less noticeable.  A note, though - if you've never tried before, go to your local Sephora and get your color matched or at least try it on your face. My facial color looks nothing like the picture of Golden Dark on this website. It looks really different in the jar and on your face.

I have been using this foundation for a couple of years. I do like that its lightweight, but when I do have breakouts it doesn't cover (even using concealer). Also, I am getting tired of the powder mess it makes in the bathroom.

I have always wanted to try Bare Minerals since they started having infomercials many years ago. I didn't think it was an option for me because the color match would be difficult. Since I've been shopping at Sephora for the past few years, I saw that they have wide selection of BM foundation colors, so I decided to give it a try. I love it! I have super sensitive skin and am allergic to so many things, so I needed something natural. My skin does really well with the Bare Minerals Matte foundation. I tried the Original and had to return it because my skin was irritated by it (I was warned by the salesperson that my skin might not agree with the Original formula). But the Matte formula is great! Love it with the Illuminous Mineral Veil on top.
I love this foundation! I would never go back to anything else after using this. Its lightweight, and never powdery looking.
Great product! 2nd time around using it...light weight and fresh feeling, perfect for those who are afraid of cakey face makeup!
I love my Bare Minerals foundation as it doesnot feel like I am wering makeup.
This is the best foundation you will find. Full or light coverage and it keeps skin from outbreaks. Easy to apply & good color match.

this foundation covers great and does not feel as if you have anything on your skin. i hardly ever have a breakout since i started using his product. I don't have to worry about what shade to pick, since there is a color that will always match any skin color. I wear a lighter shade in the winter and my golden tan in the summer. thanks Leslie, your great!!!

This is the only makeup that does not make me break out. And its so light but it covers and looks great. Healthy looking skin! Ive been using it for years but Im so glad they came out with the golden tone colors. They are perfect for my complexion.
