My friend always suggested that I use this product. However she's the type that likes to wear a lot of makeup on a daily basis. I like to keep my makeup looking natural. After sampling some at the store, this instantly blended in with my skin very well. I was so impressed I bought it instantly. The only thing I don't like is that it is too heavy to wear out in the sun or if you know you're gonna be sweating really bad that day.

I've used Bare Minerals for a long time now, and I have to say I keep going back because it's dependably efficient. You get REAL buildable coverage, and it doubles nicely as a foundation and a concealer. It generally looks very natural. Until I wear it for a few hours. I have moderately oily skin and I look REALLY shiny after a few hours. Nothing a touch up, or some blotting papers won't fix. I have tried the matte formula and I really disliked it. I broke out, the color was NOT the same as the non-matte formula, and I thought the coverage was really cakey and unnatural. I do recommend using an oil absorbing lotion before application if you are combo/oily skinned. And the circular buffing motion is very important for even coverage. All in all, for the price, Bare Escentuals is worth a try.
Still the best. I love this product.

I have been using this foundation for over 5 years! I don't think I will ever be able to switch! It feels like nothing is on your face and leaves your skin flawless. Propable not the best if you have a severe acne problem but if you have pigment issues or under eye circles, it's perfect!
This blends with my natural skin tone to produce flawless, shine-free, and even looking skin

Glad they designed a new lid to help with product spills, but unfortunately, it doesn't seem to be removable. That makes it harder to get the remainder of the product out when it's almost empty. Oh, and something I just learned: I tend to sunburn on the top of my head where my hair parts-I lightly applied this foundation at my part, and I didn't burn even in the hot Texas sun. Wonderful!

This powder offers the coverage of a foundation without the weight. It goes on light; I can't even feel it! Plus, I don't feel like I'm wasting as much product by using brushes to apply the powder. I love the shade finder the website offers. It made picking my shade a no-brainer (golden medium).
I love the fact that you really can't tell you're wearing a foundation. It goes on as light or as heavy as you want. The only downside is that it can be messy but it's not a big deal.
I love all of the Bare Escentuals line. Great products.
I have problem skin. The only makeup I can use is Bare Minerals. I love the coverage and how light weight it feels. I used to bounce around from product to product, but not any more!
Love it would not use anything else
I love this product, best cover-up I have ever had. It works really well.
Text of my test review

I've been on the hunt for the perfect foundation for quite sometime. A great employee at Sephora helped me select the color for my skin and it matches perfectly. If I use a light finish, you can hardly tell that I'm wearing makeup. I prefer a natural look and feel. At night, I typically use a heavier foundation with darker makeup. Tried to buildup the foundation and it got a little cakey. I also dislike the messiness if the powder. The directions instruct you to shake the product into the lid and use the brush to apply. Problem is that when you go to put the lid back on you either have to dumo the remaining product back in or dump it someplace else. It's either wasteful or messy. Still, all in all, I love the foundation for the natural finish.
The Bare Escentuals foundation is simply amazing. It dusts on lightly making your skin tone look even and flawless. No cake face here. It matches your skin colour to a T.

I have been using this over liquid foundation for 3 yrs. It has more natural look and blendability than anything else out there. I love the fact that it has a built in sunscreen as I love in the Arizona desert.

reviews.review_title: LOVE IT!! Only foundation I will EVER use!
reviews.review_text: I've used drugstore liquid foundation in the past and was not too pleased with that. Then I came across this and honestly, it is the best foundation I've EVER used. It is so easy to put on, the coverage is great, it does not looked caked on, its so lightweight that it doesn't feel like I'm wearing make up at all! I'm not sure about others but it adds a slight healthy glow. It gives you a perfect, natural finish that lasts all day!

Although the package seems like it's pretty small, the foundation has lasted me two months. The makeup looks best about 30 minutes after application and using a foundation primer really helps. I was having some skin problems and switching to this light foundation has really helped me get my acne under control.

I have used both the original foundation and the matte foundation---I love the original foundation and I am not a fan of the matte foundation. I have oily skin so I thought I would try the matte----bad mistake--it broke my skin out terrible and seemed to cause acne. I went back to the original foundation and my skin cleared up again and was not as oily. I love the original in medium.....P.S. the original formula also blends faster and smoother than the matte which means you don't use as much and it doesn't take as much time to get ready!!

I am a regular user of this foundation. Love it. I can layer it as lightly or heavily as I need to. My skin is on the dry side, but still breaks out. This foundation provides the coverage without clogging my skin that liquid and cream foundations don't. I'll keep using this--maybe forever!
I had started using other products due to cost but NOTHING, NOTHING can compare to this great product.

My skin has completely cleared up since I started using this foundation & looks so much healthier. Not only that, but the coverage & flawless look that I get from this foundation has made me a Bare Essentuals user for life! I would definetely recommend this to all my friends!

I have been using bare minerals for over 3 years now and get complements on my skin every time. It blends with my skin so perfectly, it leaves an airbrush result and its minerals has improved my skin tone and overall condition. Its so light and soft and easy to put on. It will continue to be an top allure beauty product of all times.

My skin appearance is younger, fresher, full coverage with less makeup feeling. Very light, comfortableand natural looking. I had not received that many compliments about my skin since I was in Highschool and that was 23 years ago. Great for reducing the appearance of wrinkles and softening the skin tone.
I have used this for a few years and i love it. I hate when make up looks cakey and gross and this is far from it.
I had high expectations for this product it covers well but dried my skin out and caused breakouts!

I am absolutely happy with the bareMinerals foundation. It is the best make up by far! I get scared looking at the ladies at M.A.C. they all look so heavily powdered and unnatural. This foundation looks great and makes you look flawless and natural. I recommend it if you don't want to look heavily made up. The coverage is great and doesn't make my skin break out.

this was just an OK product for me. To make it look decent i HAVE to use the primer, I dont like having to use a primer i like the option, just another added expense. If you are willing to spend the extra money on the primer I would say go ahead and get it. One plus was it did not irritate my sensitive skin., for that reason i am giving it 3 stars.
Amazing coverage and amazingly natural
How did I not use mineral foundation until now? It's feels so much lighter than liquid foundation and my skin has never looked better!
I love this stuff it blends and looks so natural and the coverage is amazing.
Amazing product! It even covers my rosacea.

reviews.review_title: still ove it after yrars of use
reviews.review_text: I have been using bare minerals for years and I still love it. It covers and looks natural with out clogging my pores. I plan on continuing to keep using this product.

I'm a product junkie and am always straying from my favorites in order to find the next best thing but I think I've decided this product is just irreplaceable. I've tried MAC, Laura Mercier, Makeup Forever, and more, only to always come back to this. The application is basically idiot-proof, the colors are natural looking, AND it's good for your skin. Every time I come back after I've strayed to another brand, I'm amazed all over again as to how good this product looks on my skin. It's not cakey like most powders, and combined with a makeup primer, it makes even my skin look airbrushed. As long as they keep making this, I'll keep buying it!

Great product. Just a little bit goes a long way, and it doesn't run if you sweat. You will need a touch-up after a few hours (not like the infomercials say), but I tend to touch my face alot. Very light-weight and a HUGE range of colors. One container will last you months. Highly recommend.
I have acne scars and this is the only thing that would cover it 24 seven and I only have to applied once a day . Perfect and I love it !!
I really love this product. I use it and my daughters who have acne really love it too. It covers very well and they don't have to worry about it clogging their pores.
LOve this, have tried other brands but the coverage is not as good, nor is the texture.

I started wearing this foundation about 6 or 7 years ago when I had really bad acne because my derm recommended it. Now I barely have any acne but still wear it because it gives a great matte finish over my liquid foundation and has sunscreen.  Tip: If wearing alone prime face, because it comes off after 7 or 8 hours.
I usually use the Fair formula, but I recently bought the fairly light for the summer! I love it and can't use anything else for coverage.

I used Bare Minerals for years and was really satisfied with the results. I was convinced that I could never go back to liquid foundation after Bare Minerals. I have occasional acne and I figured that using BM was the way to go since they advertise that it's so good for your skin, so I never would have assumed it was the bare minerals that was making me break out so much. I read about this happening to other women and lo and behold, some women do have reactions to one of the ingredients causing breakouts. I switched to makeup forever liquid foundation a month ago and haven't had a pimple since. i really liked how bare minerals looked on my skin, but unfortunately it makes me break out.
i have been using this make up for years now. its the only make up i have found to cover up my dark under-eye circles. stays on all day, blends well and doesn't leave that cakey feeling.

reviews.review_title: Great alternative to foundation for the summer
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation because i tend to wear a lot of moisturizer with sunscreen in the summer, which tends to make my skin greasy. This foundation reduces the shiny and evens out my skin tone perfectly.

I really love the foundation. It's not like most foundations where you feel like you're wearing a lot and it doesn't have that cakey effect. It's really hard to tell that I'm even wearing makeup at all and it works well as a concealer as well.

I never wore foundation because I have sensitive skin & couldn't find one that didn't irritate my face. But as I got older I felt I needed some light coverage. Sephora workers suggested Bare Minerals & I've been buying it ever since. Very easy to apply. Stays on all day. Does not irritate my skin.

Hate the container. The sliding cover is just annoying and makeup gets trapped underneath it. Though you can pop it off to get at it. I just removed it (then it's always a mess when you open the lid...) so as tempting as it is to remove the sealing cover in it just leave it be. It also did not last me as long as last time, I may have just been using makeup more often though...? I really like this powder foundation it is not cakey and looks smooth, it seems to coagulate around my nose and chin crease though later in the day. Now, I just do a small dusting to set my liquid foundation and do NOT use this as my primary foundation or as a concealor because there is a build up later on.

I tried BE foundation for the first time last November. i was frustrated with the cakey look and feel of my liquid foundation and wanted something that felt lighter, but still covered imperfections. This was perfect and just what I needed! if you are thinking about switching to mineral foundation, I highly encourage you to give it a shot. Also, get the primer to go with this because it makes the product go on so smoothly. Love this product and I will be a life long customer!

Love this product. Ever since I was introduced to Bare Escentuals minerals I've been totally hooked. It certainly provides me with a pure natural, radient, and healthy appearance. So lightweight.. don't feel I'm wearing make-up at all.

I was a bit hesitant about using bare minerals because I wasnt sure if it would give me the coverage I wanted, but it did!! I looks very natural and it covers imperfections. Down side is that I broke out when I started using this product. I continued using it regardless and my skin got used to it. I really recommend it.
I have used Bare Minerals for about 5 years and am a big fan! I won't use any other foundation.
This foundation is not quite as good as the liquid I am accustomed to. Coverage is fair, I found I had to layer. The plus is a natural look.

This product is almost perfect, and the fact that they don't test on animals is an absolute A+ in my book. Why other companies STILL do this is beyond me. The coverage is excellent, stays put, and they got it right with less pink and more neutral shades. My only complaint is the new, horrible packaging. While it's convenient and less messy, unfortunately, you can't ever get the last remaining foundation out of the jar and the lid won't come off at all. I must have 20 almost empty jars sitting around. Is this just me, and is there really a way to get them open, or is this the biggest mistake they could have ever made with their packaging? Anyways, HUGE kudos for non-animal testing and for excellent product.

I got the perfect shade with the help of a sales rep, she was very patient and very helpful! Usually, sales rep at other places don't give me my perfect shade...cuz I'm very pale, but she did and was very patient. This foundation lasts VERY LONG. I use it almost everyday...i've been using it for almost a year now I think or even longer, and there's still some left. It's also very natural, not sticky, not cakey, and doesn't break me out.  My only complaint is that the lid is kinda hard to spin open...at least for me it was. And bits of clear plastic off the rim have broken off more than once.

This foundation is very esay to apply and it blends with my skin very well! Its covers up my random...beauty marks...moles...whatever you want to call it and it evens out my skin tone. You don't have to be a pro at applying foundation to use this!

Amazing! I always sleep in my makeup with this its never gave me any problems. I have alot of dents in my face from picking when i was younger and it covers them very well along with awful big pimples. You will enjoy this i promise!
Fantastic as usual :)
I love this stuff. I was worried that this wouldn't provide the coverage that I need, but it does. It also leave my skin feeling natural and not cakey. It looks so natural.
i'm in love with this loose powder foundation. it doesn't look cakey in any way which is the best.

I thought this color matched; however, it is too dark for my skin and didn't give the even skin-tone I was expecting. I'm sure it would work well if it matched. Just be leery of the foundations that are warmth, because you might end up looking like you spent a little too long in the sun.
Wears well, looks natural and luminous. Let's my skin breathe.

I've only used this foundation for a couple days so far, but from what I can tell...it's wayyy better than my liquid foundation! (I wanted to try something not as heavy for the summer.) It's light and airy, completely buildable. My only slight complaint is that I did get a little oily throughout the day, so you might have to touch up a bit. However, my skin is already looking better and it's really as amazing as they say. Give it a shot!! Sephora has a GREAT return policy; you have nothing to lose except that old school foundation!!

This product is seriously amazing, especially if you use the help of the Sephora staff. If you're not someone who typically wears a lot of makeup or who really enjoys the look of natural, you will love this product. You'll love this product if you don't care for the natural look either, because it's easy to build on. I love this product. I went to Sephora and was very interested in using foundation because I have some redness to my skin. It covers it wonderfully without caking and of course in it's mineral-ness is fresh and unnoticeable. If you have ANY chance of going to the store as opposed to ordering online do it because the professionals will hellp you find your perfect color.
Love this makeup it feel like you are wearing no makeup at all
i got my perfect shade with the help of a worker and bare minerals is my favotite powder foundation so far!

I have been a loyal Bare Minerals user almost since it first came out. I've tried other mineral powder products and nothing compares to what BE gives you! Great buildable coverage, fantastic array of colors... just an all around great product!

I am a Mary Kay Consulatant and use Bare Minierals foundation exclusively. It's light & airy. I live in San Antonio TX and it's super humid and this make-up doesnt melt. Only down side, is that it does come off on clothing or if you blow your nose or wipe your mouth it comes off.

I've been using bare minerals for six years. As someone who has adult acne, I have found that this does not aggravate my skin the way liquid products do.  Early on, I got a great compliment from a girlfriend who saw me putting on my make-up. She asked me about bare minerals and stated that she never saw any coverage lines around my jaw line the way she sees with liquid foundation and wanted to know how I liked the product. She's been using it now for four years and has dry skin. She loves it.  The Fairly Light is a good shade but a smidge pink...however, I can wear it just fine. I think I'm the only one who notices the color. However, by adding a bit of the new shade Golden Fair, it creates a perfect match for my coloring.  I also found that I like to blend the original finish with the matte finish. Ever notice in photos that people who are not wearing make up still have a sheen to their skin? If you don't and you are standing next to them, it looks a bit odd. A blend of the two is a nice mix and looks natural, no matter how complete the coverage is.
when product is left it's not easy to click off the back to get the rest of product out.

This is the only foundation that doesn't dry out my skin, make my skin oily, or cause me to break out. It lasts a 12 hour shift at work where I'm constantly running around. Definitely won't ever switch to another foundation.
The staff was very helpful and answered the questions that I had regarding Bare Minerals foundation. Overall great experience at Sephora.

Before this product, I would occasionally forget to remove my makeup before bed... and as a result, I would get tiny white and blackheads all over my cheeks to the point where it had become really embarassing. I have been using bareMinerals foundation for a few weeks now and my skin has done a complete 180 degree transformation. The acne has completely vanished! I feel this has a lot to do with the natural ingredients in this product... they promise it to be natural enough to sleep in... and now I'm a believer! I would just be careful about choosing the right shade... make sure a Sephora professional does a colour test!
just love it.! is the best foundation i have ever tried

I have been a fan of Bare Escentuals for 5 years. People tell me all the time how smooth my complexion is. I tell everyone it's not me it my Bare Escentuals! It covers dark spots and evens out my skin. I love it!

So, I finally bought this product because of all the hype. I just got it today, so too soon to tell if I like it because I'm still waiting for my brush to arrive. Anyway, I will review again once I try it, but I just wanted to say that the shade finder available on this website is super and really works. I used it and picked my colour. I went to the store just to double check and the sales associate picked out this shade and tried it on me and it was perfect. It really did look amazing when she applied it, but I will review it again once I get a feel for it myself :)

I used to break out so badly whenever I used liquid foundation. This was reccomended to me. It's been two months since I begin using it and my adult acne is gone. For the first time since I was a teenager I don't have a single pimple! Not only is this product great for oily/acne prone skin but it makes my skin look flawless. Just make sure that you use the mineral veil with it for that perfect finish!
I love all of their products, also use sephora blush wish they made make-up bags big enough to hold all products including moisterisers and brushes and shadows
bareMinerals Foundation is easy on the skin and doesn't promote acne. It's light and stays on all day and does not feel oily when applied.
very easy to use, and the coverage is good enough. My favorite part is I can sleep in it!
this foundation is the best coverage i ever have.
I've been using this foundation for the past couple years. It covers, looks natural, and doesn't break my face out. I will never go back to liquid foundation!

I have been using BE for a while now. Periodically I will purchase a new foundation but I will return to BE eventually. Why? I can control the foundation, at the end of the day, I look very natural. I look like I have flawless coverage while I have a ton of foundation on. If you want to achieve it, remember to use a mineral spray over your face and you will not have to wait for the end of the day. I love this foundation but I always cheat on it because I cannot control myself .Maybe one day I will remain faithful to it. You will love it. Try it just learn how to apply it correctly. Highly recommend getting the starter kit with the DVD to learn how to use it. When I first purchased it a few years back, I didn't get the started kit, used my own brush and watch the infomercial, it was the product for me. But thankfully I gave it a second chance and I bought the kit, had someone show it to me. it's great.
Now that I have been also using the all-over face color powder, I PREFER that over the foundation. This foundation is good but the all-over face color seems to blend easier and not look cakey.
Easy to apply and remove while staying there as long as you wish.
I got a sample of this and I was immediately hooked! It gives nice, natural coverage and my face feels a bit softer when I use it. If you need more coverage, simply add more. This stuff is great!

I really enjoy using bareMinerals original foundation. I've used different shades, and they're all good in a different way. They all cover well, give your face a flawless-looking finish, never feel heavy or like you have anything on, and look pretty natural. I don't think I've ever gotten breakouts or anything from using them.
I love the coverage of this light powder...its amazing! It goes on smooth with a great finish. I HATE using liquid foundation, therefore, I LOVE this product!

I've been using this for a little more than a year and it's my favorite foundation that I've ever used. It looks very natural. In my opinion, the best part of this product is that you can also use it as a concealor. I still have my concealor brush from my bareMinerals starter kit and it saves so much time because it blends so wonderfully!
I have been using this product since it was first introduced. It goes on so evenly...it is light and airy. You don't feel like you have make up on and your skin looks flawless!
great foundation. not cakey, looks great, stays on all day, covers all blemishes. love bareMinerals! and it has SPF!!
I really enjoy using bareminerals make up. It's very natural.
I have been using this makeup for years...I wont use anything else
I have used this product for 3 years and don't think I will ever change! Give it a try!
covers great. feels amazing. leaves skin soft and smooth. have tried many other makeup foundadtions and bareminerals by far is the best product i have used!!
I am a big fan of Bare Minerals. Never wanted to put it in my purse when am on the go intell now. the inside cap twist shut so it doesn't get all over the place.

I've been using Bare Escentuals for about 3 years now, and this is the best makeup I have ever found. I am in my 70's and it brightens and evens the color of my skin--never gets stuck in wrinkles. I use the whole line of makeup.
This is a staple in my make-up bag. Perfect color, love the powder formulation and I really love that it's all natural.
Doesn't break me out at all. Coverage was only ok. When used on top of my liquid foundation, it looks great!
Have used it for a number of years and would never go back to liquid. Easy to use, stays put and covers evenly.
Gives my skin a more even look without being heavy.

This is my go-to foundation. Been using for about 4 years-all my daughters use it also, ages 18-31. Since you use only a smalll amount, lasts quite a long time, so it's a good value. Very easy to use and looks very natural - enough so friends & family have asked what type of foundation I use. Also use all-over face color and mineral veil, both of which I love.
Very natural; looks great with the mineral veil powder. My favorite thing is that it works as concealer by layering more product over blemishes, etc.
Love it I have been wearing Bare escentuals for many years.

This is my favorite mineral makeup. I've used it for about 4 years and can't think of using anything else. This purchase was for a shade darker than I usually wear so that I can give my face a healthy, tanned look.
Same great Bare Minerals foundation, but with an improved packaging design. I love that the powder stays put during travel, and there's less waste.

reviews.review_title: Been using BM foundation for years now
reviews.review_text: Love the exact color much and that it does not clog pores, but do not count on its SPF alone. Still need to wear a sunblock moisturizer under.

reviews.review_title: Please Change Back to Original Packaging
reviews.review_text: Love the Powder hate the waste due to new packaging, ive used this for over 10 years and am looking into a new foundation only because I hate how much waste is always left now. I buy these more often now and it annoys me that they have changed such an amazing product.

I have been using bareMinerals foundation for about 10 years now and can't imagine going back to liquids or creams. I had a sample of a high-end liquid foundation and couldn;t wait to wash it off my face. After using Bare Minerals, everything else feels like goop. It's also great if you have any redness; it seems to sooth the face. Just be sure to read the correct way to apply and it will work beautifully.

reviews.review_title: I don't use liquid foundation anymore!
reviews.review_text: I love bareMinerals! I just wish there was a better way for application as the powder does fly around in the sink.  Otheriwise, I love the product and the appearance of my skin since I started using it when the product first came out.

I've used bareMinerals for years now. I have mild cases of rosacea and adult acne. When my skin is reacting, this is what I turn to for a foundation. It actually helps to calm it down. The look is natural and pretty. You can completely control how much you put on to control coverage. This foundation provides the most coverage of any out there. Recommend using a very moisturizing moisturizer when you use bareMinerals.

I have been using this for years. It is pretty good coverage - medium-ish. What I really like about it is that it feels like you arent wearing makeup. It looks natural and does not irritate my skin. Good stuff
Love, love, love this product. It covers all I need covered but never too heavy...plus it has SPF so I never have to worry.
Siimply put, Bare Escentuals is absolutely fantastic. It hides imperfections and stays on all day. Unlike other powders, it will not sink into lines or creases and make you look older.
I had to return product since the color was too light for my skin. I normally go with a medium tan and medium was too yellow for me.
This is a great product. -So natural looking and easy to use.
I've always loved bareMinerals, but with stress of a new job and wedding planning my skin has been breaking-out like crazy. bareMinerals gives great coverage without being think and nasty.

You must have a great foundation for anything, but especailly when it comes to your face. Its wonderful and smooth and it does not dry out your skin, and covers very well. I loveit and have used it now for a few years.
Love it!! Great over a lighter color when using the lighter color as a concealer for blemishes.

reviews.review_title: flawless skin starts with flawless skin
reviews.review_text: I would add more glowing reviews to the hundreds already, but wanted to add a caveat. This product works best if your skin is already pretty good. It has to be smooth to look good - not dry, or the powder sort of stands up on the dry patches. Not too many blemishes or same problem. It works exceptionally well to cover and blend over minor discolorations, like skin tone uneven-ness, a little redness, or pale freckles. I think it helps nourish skin too, but you need to be on your way to flawless skin already. Overall a great product, so natural looking.
The BEST, once you try it you'll never use anything else!!

reviews.review_title: Surprisingly easy to layer for spot coverage
reviews.review_text: I think I've probably tried 20 or 30 kinds of foundation, ranging from drugstore brands to Chanel. And this is the best I've found. If you have a spot you want covered, you just use the concealer brush, and layer a little on. Kinda surprising how well it works, really.  So why not five stars? This stuff is crazy messy. It will dominate your bathroom counter. And the packaging isn't great. The new sifter top is better, but it's SO frustrating to not be able to really empty the container.  Difinitely looks natural. Also, this products means the end of foundation lines...it's always a nice imperceptible blend at your jaw line.
This by far is my favorite powder foundation. I love how it feels like I' am not wearing any make up. and gives my skin this healthy glow.
I have used this product for many years. i occasionally try some other foundation, but always come back to this one. never feels heavy, or runs. Very light and covers well.

reviews.review_title: USED IT EVERY DAY SINCE I WAS 18
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product in fairly light since I was 18 years old (now 21) and will never buy another foundation. In summer I go one shade darker. This foundation gives you full but not overpowering coverage and if you have acne or blemish prone skin this will help you out. Does not clog pores. I highly reccomend. People tell me all the time I am so lucky I dont have to wear makeup, little do they know, I do, but bareminerals gives you the look of not having it on at all. I prefer the original, the matte you can kinda tell you have makeup on, but would suggest both.
Bare Escentuals has the best foundation ever! Very easy to apply, looks very natural, stays on all day and has SPF 15! What more could you ask for?

This is the best foundation I've ever tried. Before I started using this regularly, I was completely against foundation due to all my bad experiences, but I needed something to cover the dark circles under my eyes when I'm not feeling well/overtired, so I got the BareMinerals Get Started kit because my best friend recommended it. This foundation is great. It doesn't feel like there's anything on my face. It doesn't break me out or irritate my skin (which nearly every other brand of make up has). It's long lasting -- I can put it on in the morning and it will easily last until the night. It looks incredibly natural and blends perfectly into my skin. It also gives my skin a nice glowing appearance. It covers up any imperfections quite well, and you don't need to use much so it lasts me a very long time. Because I use so little, the cost is probably just the same or less than using a drug store brand. It's so quick and easily to apply, too. This foundation has completely changed how I feel about makeup, and I'm really glad I gave it a try.

I have very sensitive skin and I also have yellow undertones which makes it a bit hard to find a foundation that look natural. I often find that most makeups are too pink for my skin. The first time I tried any Bare Escentual products was in high school when my mom bought me a kit for my birthday. When I went to college it was a bit to expensive for me to use so I switched to another minerial makeup. I wish I hadn't because I have had troubled skin ever since I started living on my own. I haven't found a product of theirs that I don't care for. This is by far one of the best foundations on the market and it really does last a long time so the price is worth it.
Bare Escentuals... love it! I actually use this to mix with Warm Tan to create a custom color for my winter complexion. Love the new goldens they've introduced... perfect for me!
I PICKED THE RIGHT COLOR THANKS TO SEPHORA'S COLOR CHART, I LOVE THIS PRODUCT

I know this product works well for alot of people, but it was terrible for my skin. I used it almost every day for about 1.5 years. I experienced breakouts along my chin and jawline, but didn't connect that to the Bare Minerals because the product is known for being gentle. Finally, after hearing that others experienced breakouts because of it, so I stopped using Bare Minerals. Within two weeks, my skin was back to normal.

I must admit I have cheated several times on my bare minerals foundation. I have come to fully appreciate this product and promise not to stray ever again! There is nothing as good as this foundation.

reviews.review_title: the only product i can use for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: this is amazing-- it makes my skin look fantastic! i have really sensitive skin and this is the only product that doesn't make my skin extra dry or make me break out. they seem to have a good color selection but i wish they had a shade that was slightly lighter since this is almost too dark for me.

i've been using this consistently for about a year and a half now.......i occasionally waver back and fourth using liquid foundation, but i just get so many comliments on my skin when using BE. to be honest it's a pain to use when rushing on late mornings because it takes a little while to put on and is messy when attempted in mass transit....but i still love it.
love this product! I am extremely fair, and this is the only foundation that seems to match my skin tone. I also have a lot of redness and it seems to cover it pretty well, without being too heavy.

bareMinerals offers a great foundation that goes on natural and looks great all day. I love that it has SPF 15 (who wants to load up on facial sunscreen on hot, humid summer days?), and it feels light and breathes well on my skin.
I've been using this for years and am addicted. Great coverage but doesn't feel heavy

LOVE the makeup. Covers surprisingly well without looking fake. Not a fan of the packaging so it had to lose 1 star. Difficult to get the makeup out of when you get down to the bottom. You just have to give up and toss it although you can still see makeup inside.
I really like this foundation and am totally converted. It's light on my skin (which is oily and acne prone) but still covers well.

You know how it goes.....if you had one makeup item you could bring to a deserted island what would you bring?....well, I would say Bare Minerals Foundation for sure. I lived in Hawaii for 9 years and even the heat and humidity is no match for this makeup. It stays on and doesn't suffocate the skin. It feels like you aren't even wearing makeup yet all of those pesky scars and pimples that surface on occasion are covered beautifully. Flawless skin even in the tropics!

I love the way this goes on, thin and light, Just covers imperfections without a heavy , greasy or pancake appearance. Airbrushing is more like it. If you need more coverage, just keep applying until you are happy. I use the Fairly Medium and have both a peach and pink blush depending on what color eyeshadow I will be wearing. I was shocked it didn't dry our my skin. It does prevent blemishes. Use the brushes they recommend.

This foundation does not work with my skin at all! I don't need a lot of coverage but I do have dry skin that is prone to the occasional blemish. This foundation dried my skin out further, causing flaky patches to appear and it would clump around my blemishes making them even more ugly and obvious.  This foundation does not look natural at all. Instead it makes my skin look powdery and it's very obvious that I'm wearing make up. The drugstore foundation I used to buy for half the price did a much better job than this.

I will never use another make-up. This has the perfect amount of coverage, and does not clog your pores. It's true, this is a make-up you can sleep in. I also love that it has SPF in it to protect my fair skin.

always good for skin that is NOT dry. if your skin is dry, this will show up looking cakey and dry. however, over time, using this product DOES improve the texture and moisture of skin. i love it, but right now prefer non-powder foundation because my skin is so dry. if you have normal or oily skin, this product is ideal. as long as you dont have dry patches, try it. I am about as pale as they come, with bluish/pinkish undertone to my skin, and I use the lightest shade possible, it looks natural and evens out my skintone wonderfully!
I was using Bare Minerals and decided to try Sheer Cover. What a BIG mistake. The medium color makes you look yellow; needless to say I went back to Bare Escentuals
I have very oily skin and this is better and longer lasting than any foundation i have ever used. If you want natural looking skin, this is the way to go!

reviews.review_title: I wish I could give 4.98 stars...
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this makeup. I have both the matte and regular formula, I like both but really appreciate the extra coverage of the matte for photo-filled occasions and during the summer. I have VERY moody skin that has a mind of its own, this makeup looks so natural but really covers up any and all imperfections. I have blemishes (some scars, healed discolorations, and fresh PMS pimples!) as well as very enlarged pores and I am ALWAYS getting compliments on my great skin. Ha! My skin is also very sensitive, and the only problem I have with this makeup is that sometimes the kabuki brush can give me little bumps on my chin/neck when blending...but they fade quickly and I am positive it is the bristles and not the makeup.  The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it can get very messy and while I have been wearing it for several months now, I am just starting to get the hang of the swirl, tap, buff method. I feel like sometimes I am wasting some powder because of the excess that may go flying or that gets puffed off the brush. I love the new tubs with the locking plastic inside, it helps keep from getting the huge amount of powder just sitting inside the lid waiting to make a mess...

This is a great product. I've been using it for the last 5 years and just can't stop. It looks really natural, you can use it as a powder and concealer (just depends on the brush you're using) and the color matches me well. It also doesn't cake up on your face, like other powders.

I love BE. The coverage is great and it's excellent for your skin. I don't really find that the click and locking mechanism on these new jars works as it was intended to. It's slightly harder to shake minerals out onto the lid and the lock doesn't really keep the minerals in. The powder is messy but the product itself is great so these minor discrepancies can be overlooked. Product is highly recommended.
I'm a pale olive in the winter and much more tan in summer, and I can wear this year round. It's not too matte and I can really see the difference it makes when I see pictures of my skin.
Great foundation, the only one I use!
Feels great on my skin. You can build coverage from light to full coverage. Love that it is natural product. Will continue to use this product as I have for years.
I have been using this makeup for about two years and am still loving it. Now that I have discovered Prime Time, I love it even more!
Love this stuff. Feels like you aren't even wearing make-up!

Love this product. Could buy other over the counter products of this type; but this is the best I've ever used. Long lasting and great coverage with only a little product used. I am over 60 and this does not look overdone or like pancake makeup. Very natural.
First tried this as a sample last year. I've never found a power so light that gives such total, smooth and glowing coverage. I bought the full size this year because I've fallen in love with it.
Love the new case! Keeps my powder from spillin everywhere! light good coverage and evens out my skin without being bad for my skin. Great for my sensitive acne prone skin
I've always had good skin and love having a foundation that gives sheet coverage and is so easy to apply. I haven't used goopy liquid foundation in years.
I really liked this foundation cause I didn't feel like it was so heavy. I was able to build it up on troublesome areas, dark spots etc. The only thing is after a week or so I started to break out.
This foundation is perfect in every way, light, good for the skin, good coverage and natural. I get compliments on my skin all the timje now!
i love this product! my skin looks so good when i have it on. i only us the fair one because my skin is like porclien but i cant live without it!!!!! i HIGHLEY recammend!

I don't have problem skin to begin with so this is just the kind of powder I need. It's light and goes on so well with the right brushes. Always a good idea to get the start up kit the first time you use bare minerals.  The only issue for me is that without using the mineral veil I get really really really oily after a few hours.

Its very hard to go out without makeup for me because my skin is so red and i have medium sized pores and very very oily ( you can fry an egg on my face!) But with all that said I can go for 6 hours with this makeup on and feel as confident as when I first put it on. And for oily skin that is amazing. A little goes a looooong way. Very buildable coverage without the cakey look. I have never looked cakey in the 8 yrs i have been wearing this make-up. Also umm hello the price when the average foudation is 45 bucks shelling out 30 is nothing! it last as long as the other foundations and my skin looks better with time.

I originally got a sample size set as a gift with this included. I loved it and, when it came time to buy the full size, I thought maybe the matte would be an even better fit for my sometimes shiny skin. I couldn't have been more wrong--it looked fake, powdery and overly made up. I bought the original foundation instead this time and, again, I LOVE IT. It just looks so natural and gives you the good kind of shine--it reflects light nicely. If you're torn between Matte and Original, go for the original! (And pairing it with the Mineral Veil really gives you that flawless look. Don't go without it!)

I purchased another brand of makeup for a short period ... I thought it was better ... nope. The coverage of BE is spectacular. The color is easy to match. Minerals easy to apply. I have been wearing BE for many years. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is that it doesn't stay as long as I'd like it too. I am a nurse and work 12-14 hour days / nights and by the end of my shifts, I feel like the makeup is almost gone. But honestly, it's great foundation!

reviews.review_title: I wanted to rip my face off my head.
reviews.review_text: I want to like this foundation because it covers up nicely and it looks natural and feels light on my face.  BUT it irritated and itched my face in a few hours. My face turned really red and hot. I was itching really bad that I wanted to rip my face off my head. I had to take it off immediately. It gave me bumps and acne. This is the worse makeup experience ever. If you have sensitive skin DON'T buy this product. Stupid bismuth oxychloride they put.
Bare Escentauls is terrific make-up

reviews.review_title: New packaging extremely hard to open
reviews.review_text: I love the powder itself, but when I bought the last one the plastic covering was almost impossible to open. The container lid screwed off just fine, but the pull-tab inside the container was completely useless. I had to use a screwdriver to break the 5 different points where the tabbed section was attached to the powder cover.
i love it. It's light and natural and covers my blemishes.
This powder really covers up everything! It works and blends with almost every skin tone.
I like the way it covers and is so light.
I have a few acne scars and blemishes, and I didn't think this had enough coverege for me. I also noticed that I had to reapply this many times throughout the day.
At 41, I was ready to exchange my OTC makeup for something better. I am thrilled with Bare Minerals. Totally lightweight, but looks like creamy coverage. Completely satisfied. :)

Always have this! The only foundation I will use..So lightweight and natural..Gives great coverage and doesn't break me out..Great for your skin too! Beware of the new matte version, it broke my skin out and I didn't like it at all..Sticking with what works for my skin...

I recently bought this foundation and loved it. I have really oily skin and I found bare minerals to be perfect for me since summer is coming and it doesn't feel like you are wearing makeup and you don't have to worry is your sweating and your makeup is coming off.

After I decided to try bareMinerals I haven't looked back. I was looking for a product that didn't look caked on but still had the coverage I needed and this was it. Add in the SPF and it is even better.

reviews.review_title: The only foundation I ever use
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for five years, and I will never switch. A little goes a long way, and this makes my skin flawless. I never am worried about chemicals, or clogged pores with this. I have dry skin, and this never irritates or dries it out. have never had acne, however, so I'm not sure how well this works in covering up problem skin. Although I think it would be good for oily spots.

I have been using this stuff for 8 years. I have tried other foundations and always return to this one. you have to use it on well moisturized skin. If your skin is dry use a good moisturizer and you have to let it sit for about 20 min before it starts to blend with your natural oils, it will look a little powdery at first but will turn into a natural glowey finish that usually you can only get with liquids. i switch between this and the matte and use just a tiny amount all over using a synthetic brush just on the areas that need a bit more coverage.

Based on the reviews, I thought for sure that I would really like this product. Unfortunately, it just did not work for me at all. It felt like it sat on top of my face. It looked powdery and I felt like it highlighted where my blemishes were rather than covering them. The only thing I liked about it was that it did not make me breakout.
Have been wearing this for over 5 years, natural look, covers my rudy skin perfectly, stays on thru out the day.

I like how quick and easy it is to apply and does give good coverage. But it doesn't blend very well and sits on top of my face. It also runs off when my face gets oily at the end of the day, or when I'm sweating. It rubs off, and I do break out a little while wearing this. I like to keep it around the house for busy mornings, but it's not the best makeup.

I had a hysterectomy 7 years ago, with it came obvious hormonal changes and excessive sweating. I would put on the foundation I had worn for years and feel like I was sufficating. My sister-in-law turned me on to bareMinerals and its the only make up that I wear. I do not sweat, my skin breaths & it covers my adult acne. It is natural looking but gives you the coverage you desire, weather a little or a lot. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND ALL of bareMineral products! You will not be sorry!
I love this product! It's easy to apply, makes my skin glow, and doesn't clog my pores.

I've been using Bare Escentuals foundation for years. I've always used a darker colored foundation, but recently stopped tanning so I needed to go several shades lighter to match my natural skin tone. I noticed right away that the Golden Fair shade seemed less creamy than the darker one I've used for so long. It seemes to sit on my skin and build up in my larger pores as soon as I apply it. I've started to mix a little of my darker shade with this new one and that seems to be helping a bit, but I'm still not as pleased as I'd like to be.

i switched to this foundation from a drugstore liquid during my pregnancy to get away from all the chemicals. i would never, ever go back to liquid again! not only does my skin look better than ever (normally oily/acne prone, but much less breakouts since using this), but this stuff becomes one with your skin making it seem like you're not even wearing foundation. you just look naturally flawless. it also doesn't change, shift, or settle into creases throughout the day. more expensive than what i was used to, but it does a far superior job and lasts longer. so i'd say it's worth every penny.
Have loved this product for years and continue to love it. It blends well with my complexion color, stays on well and looks pretty natural.

I love this foundation so much. How I wish there was a color that matched my skin tone. I thought I had the palest skin in all the land (and I swear, I really do), but there is no BE foundation to match it. I tried Fair, and it looks yellow on me. I tried Fairly Light, which was better, but still made me look like I belong in a casket (too yellow). I know the Fair is supposed to be for pinkies like me, but it just wasn't pin enough, I guess.  I still use it, because there isn't another mineral makeup out there that is as good at keeping my fair skin protected from the sun without a bunch of rotten chemicals, but BE...can't you make something for me?
I am truly happy with this foundation!

Though I like this foundation, I couldn't find a shade that matches me even when this brand has so many to chose from. Otherwise the foundation has medium coverage and is easy to apply when there's little time for makeup.
Both my eighteen year old daughter and i have been using this makeup for years. It's the best I've ever used. I wiish it had been around when I was a teenager, it would have been great.

I continue to use the product, I love the light coverage and flawless natural appearance. It's a wonderful product and I have used it for over 2 years. My opinion, I do not like the new design of the container it is packaged in. I remove the top insert immediately. I get the concept, but feel I loose too much product in between the swival closure that was meant to save on product waste...

i have been using this foundation for four years, and I can never like other liquid foundation or anything else. It is not a completely Matt looks which i really like about this. I like the fact that they changed the container which is spill free, but I wish i could get the bottom plastic layer open easily, so that i don't waste the last bit of powder

This is the best make up ever it makes your skin feel light as a feather not heavy plus you will like what it does for uneven skin, I have vitiligo and it covers my skin the best. If you never have tried this make up please do. You will not be disappointed ! Love It !

I've been using bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation since high school (I'm now 30) and I can't say enough good things about it. This is my third or fourth time buying it. The benefits are that it goes on easily with a brush (you can even choose different brush styles for more or less coverage), it blends in beautifully, and best of all it just enhances the look of your skin without looking like you're wearing make-up at all.
This product lasts a long time and isn't heavy on the skin. It provides full coverage but doesn't feel cakey
Great covering, light foundation! I've seen a great decrease in breakouts since I started using the Bare Minerals!
soft and natural and blended really well in to my skintone. the only downside is that it does wear away but only after several hours. great for people who hate liquid foundations.

I've been using bare minerals for about four years, and love the product. I pair this with the bisque multi tasking to cover up blemishes, being that this is lighter coverage. The reason I have stuck true to this product, is anytime I have switched to another I see a huge change in my face. This seems to help keep a nice balance (not dry or oily) and I now have very minimal breakouts. Overall, great product, just recommend using it with a good concealer first for better coverage.
Nice and natural coverage, but tends to dry my skin and look flaky.

I just want to say sehpora sells this product for the best price! I love this foundation because it is very light weight. Very natural looking and adapts so flawlessly to your own skin texture and tone. I also purchased the bare minerals primer that it the first step before applying your foundation and it enhances that wow factor of this product

I recieved this foundation yesterday by mail and was impressed. I was not sure about the color since it looks different everywhere online and my skin is pretty light/ But medium (wich I ordered) is close to my natural color and it's sunny outside so I'm ready to get some tan =) It's very lightweigt. I can't even feel it.I always feel hot with most of foundations and powders but I don't feel it with BE. You have to be careful with this product. It's loose powder so it tends to get messy but with some attantion you won't have any troubles. And honestly liquid foundations are much more messy. Also don't use too much! I need some practice before I got used to it but it's better to work the amout you have on the brush (and believe me you will have lots of powder on the brush even if you can't see it) than keep on reapllying and end up with cocky skin. My concern is it doesn't cover as good as ppl say but still it's a good coverage. If you have small brakeouts you will be very satisfied. Also it doesn't control oils as good as I thought it oud butstill it's better than everything I've tried before. What I like most of all is that it doesn't clog pores and removes easily with make up remover. I definetly recommend this product =) PS: Read instructions. It helps =)
The best foundation I've used hands down! Perfect coverage and color every time!

This foundation is wonderful! I was skeptical because I had never used a powder foundation before, but this stuff is the best foundation I have ever used! It provided great coverage and I couldn't feel it on my face. My face did get more oily than usual as the day went on, but then again I do have very oily skin. If you have oily skin, make sure you have some blotting papers to use throughout the day. I highly recommend buying the Sephora professionnel mineral powder brush to use for applying the foundation.

I really like this foundation. It is very versatile and can be worn for light to full coverage. It blends very well and matches my skin tone great! They have a ton of shades and it is easy to find your perfect match with the help of a Sephora employee. Being that it is a powder, I do not think it looks cakey. However, the more you apply, the higher the risk of it being powdery. You only need a small amount. It would be great of oily or dry skin (I have dry skin). The only thing I don't like is that some product gets stuck in the new sifter cap, but it does help control from it pouring out everywhere! :)
I was hesitant for a long time, but gave in and finally bought Bare Minerals. It is so soft and flawless. I'M A BELIEVER NOW!

i've tried liquid foundation, tinted moisturizer, airbrushed foundation but i have combo/oily skin and this is the best. i don't have plans on switching anytime soon. it looks so natural and airbrushed! i always get compliments on how awesome my skin looks when i wear it. it lasts a while too, a little goes a long way. very easy to use. i don't think i can go back to the traditional bottled liquid stuff again
Once you get used to applying a powder foundation as opposed to a liquid foundation, it looks very natural.and is very light on your face. Not greasy feeling. Love it !

I have made attempts to stray but I keep coming back to the mineral makeup... Recently my in store beauty consultant explained to me that the bottom can be pried open. I must have banged my near empty container for those specks of makeup at least 50 times.
This color matches me perfectly thanks to a store associate who helped me match my color better than I could have. She even took me outside the store so I could see how good it looked.

Bare Minerals is by far the best foundation I have ever tried. It's light and airy, doesn't cause break-outs, and looks A-Mazing. The coverage is wonderful and I wouldn't go back to other oily liquid foundations. Bare minerals is the way to go.

Pro - The feel of the makeup felt great on my skin.  Con - Couldn't find a color that matched my tan Asian skin tone well. I'm between Medium Tan and Tan. The foundation didn't photograph well because I noticed in all of my pics that I seemed whiter and had a shimmer effect that wasn't noticeable in person. Also, if you don't have perfect skin you will need to cake on more foundation than usual.
I really like how this product has helped improve the clarity and texture of my skin. However, I wish it had better coverage.
This product is great. I have used it for years and have been using it on my kids as face sunscreen. It works better than any of the lotions I have tried and doesn't sting.

reviews.review_title: My go-to, perfect, accept no other foundation!
reviews.review_text: I've been using BE for about 8-10 years now and I LOVE IT! It's lightweight, covers well, yet doesn't look like you are over-doing it with make-up. I prefer the original and not the matte.
I've used BE since I was a teen and it's still my go to product!

This is the first time I every wore this foundation and it's wonderful! It's so easy to apply! It gives great buildable coverage for my under eye darkness and my uneven skin tone. My husband usually can't notice a difference when I switch to a new beauty product but when I applied this he complimented how nice my skin looks :) This is definitely an awesome product and I have received so many compliments on my complexion! It stays on long, doesn't feel like you have anything on, makes your complexion look great and healthy, and to me feels like it's keeping my skin hydrated! It's the best thing out there.
Maybe I don't get the concept of mineral makeup but this stuff looks really fake and too sparkly for me. The color and coverage is fine but it just looks weird.
the best coverage yet feels very natural and airy. Cannot do makeup w/o!! Check out my video on foundation using this products as one of the steps to erase dark circles! good Luck!
I've been using these products for the last 4-5 years and love the natural look and feel - no heavy makeup feel.
it's ok, i feel like i could get a little more coverage from foundation, but this stuff is nice and light and does take a little shine out.

I was rather hesitant at first to purchase this due to the price but eventually my desire for a better foundation finally won... and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. It is very lightweight and sheer but still provides full coverage (I have uneven skin tone and blackheads/pores that I've battled with my whole adult life) without looking like I am wearing a ton on makeup (or any at all for that matter!) I am a full time student and part time fitness specialist so I am on the go all nonstop but have never had to reapply on a normal day (ie. a day I wasn't training/working out). However, even if you don't purchase the brush by Bare Escentuals (I already had a different one) you MUST get a good quality brush to get the full benefit of this product. Hope this helps!
Now that I am over 40 this makeup provides coverage with out making me looked aged or overdone.

I have used bareMinerals before and like it. But now that I got it again, I love it! I experienced a bad breakout due to a medication and while I got rid of the pimples, the scars stuck around. I would have to cake on liquid foundation and then pile on powder to try and cover them but it was obvious how much makeup I had on. Now that I have bareMinerals, I only have to use a little to cover my imperfections. It feels lightweight and covers great! I even have pretty oily skin and it stays about 85% matte all day (which I think is really good). I do recommend a primer first, however, otherwise I have noticed it settled into my larger pores as the day went on. But otherwise it looks and feels great!

I have super finicky skin, and bareMInerals doesn't aggravate it at all. It conceals blemishes fabulously and goes on smoothly. It looks and feels completely natural. I can barely tell it's there. I will never use another foundation.

reviews.review_title: Best foundation ever, for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: 15000+ reviews. WOW so many of us for using this product, do i even need to write a review? This is the best foundation i came across. Specially for my sensitive skin. I use it everyday for concealing my spot.

reviews.review_title: first makeup I've ever been able to use
reviews.review_text: I love this makeup; in the winter I use more than in the summer; it evens out my tone and with my problem skin it's wonderful!
I love this foundation. It's light-weight and perfect for everyday use.

I really like the coverage of this foundation. You can add as much as you want to get the coverage you want. I also use the Prime Time primer it recommends to use with it. The only problem I have seen with all Bare Minerals make up, including blush and eye shadows, is that it does not last all day. I am a teacher and start my day by 7 AM. By the time I leave work, I feel as if I have No make up on. I look in the mirror and am horrified! I love that is quick to apply but now after a year of using I am looking for something else.
I love this product, I don't love this lid. Mine doesn't stay locked and the minerals come out just like the old sifter top. The product is perfect!
I truly think this is by far the best foundation I have ever used. I am so thankful my boss/friend told me about this product!
LOVE MY BAREMINERALS BEEN USEING FOR 8 YEARS NOW .
I just love this product. Can I say it was a wonderful shopping experience. The staff treated me like a queen for the day and were oh so very helpful.

This is absolutely the best foundation I have ever used. Not only is it a quality product, but also the price is great! I never feel like this foundation is too heavy, and it really perfects my complexion. My skin always glows after I use this and the Mineral Veil. Believe the hype! I'll never use another foundation!
I have been using this for 4 years now. It truly is an essential!

this is my everyday foundation because it is so fast, easy, and yet natural! it can be a bit drying in my opinion so make sure you moisturize welll beforehand. I even layer this over liquid foundation when I want extra coverage for special occasion makeup. it works great and helps set it!
The coverage is natural and glowy..just what my skin needs.

I have used bareminerals for many years now and I love the stuff. However; not real happy with price going up and the quanity going down...The new containers....I dislike because I can not get to the last bit in the jar like I use to....ugh
Makes my skin look flawless. Stays put for majority of the day; suspect it would all day if I used a primer underneath. Matches my skin tone well. Never once broke out with it. No complaints.

I love that it blends well with my skin. It's a very light makeup and doesn't feel like I'm wearing any at all. You can build the coverage to suit your needs. It covers well. You can wear it all day and still look good at the end of the day. It doesn't run, disappear. Feels light and natural. I've worn it for years and it's the only makeup I'll wear.
Used bare minerals for several years now love the products, great price, and last for quite a while especially this one. My skin tone has improved greaty using these products.

I've been using BE for over 10 years and love it. I'm VERY dismayed with the new packaging and agree with some of the reviewers that there is less product in the container. I find myself having to purchase more frequently. I hate to say that this might be a reason for me to stop buying BE. Please bring back the old packaging...there was nothing wrong with it!

The best makeup I have ever tried .5 years ago my sister bought BM and tried it on me. I will never wear anything different. I had mild acne before now I have an occasional pimple. My pores have shrunk. Like I said before the best makeup ever.

I love this powder and have used it for about 10 years now, along with getting many people hooked. I use this with a conceler from a different company and my skin always looks flawless, I receive tons of compliments on my compkection! There are two things I can't stand about this product, the new packaging and how messy the powder is. The new packaging seems to have less powder in it, that may not be true but I do know that I cannot get the remaining powder out as I did before. I used to be able to pull the top off and have access to all of the remaining powder with the new packaging I can't and have quite a bit of excess waste. As for it being messy, it's not only messy while putting it on but it also gets on everything, including my boyfriends shirts from when I hug him. It can be embarrassing when you hug people and have to apologize for leaving makeup on their clothing.

reviews.review_title: in love with how reliable this stuff is!
reviews.review_text: Finally decided to give Bare Escentuals a try and couldn't be happier with the results. My skin is oily and breakout prone and it gets the coverage it needs from this product without a 'caked' feel. I prefer makeup that doesn't mask the real me, but instead enhances it..breakouts excluded. Overall, a great investment!

I work in industrial security, and a big part of my job is being outside where there are a lot of foreign materials and contaminates in the air. Combined with my oily skin, and my makeup rarely last past lunch! I recieved the starter set as a birthday present, and loved it the first time I put it on! But I REALLY loved it when I wore it to work the next day, and not only was my face still flawless and radiant, but there was also NO SHINE!!! There was also none of the pesky black dust I work around stuck to my face. I will never buy another brand of makeup again!

This is the only foundation I will use now. You can get a little coverage (and no one even knows you have make up on, but it evens out your skin tone and hides spots and blemishes) or a lot (full-on glam). But even when glamming it up, it still leaves a natural look to it. You can layer with their Warmth or blush. My favorite part: none of those nasty chemicals that are in other foundations!
I have used bare minerals for 10 years!! You will too once you've tried it! My friends all use it, too.

reviews.review_title: Not great for all skin types
reviews.review_text: I had a terrible allergic reaction to this. I would itch when in the sun or working out. It was the bismuth oxychloride in this. In addition, I looked very ghostly in pictures. I am light medium complected and was wearing the medium and it still didn't look like I had any color in pictures. BE was sold this past year to Shiseido and because of their animal testing policy (they are one of the only that still test because it's cheaper to the company to use animals instead of humans) and I liked that BE was an individually owned business prior to their sell. This coupled with the actual negatives of the foundation I will not purchase again. Also, I looked a little drab in any shade especially in photos.
The foundation is light and airy and feels so clean going on and wearing it throughout the day.

This is the best foundation I've ever used. Although it looks best when coupled with a primer, it even looks great when you just brush it on super quick when you're running late. Covers fairly uneven skin perfectly, however, refrain from touching your face often when wearing this product, as it is a powder that can be brushed off pretty easily, especially when used without a primer. I would NOT recommend buying this product first time online. Buy it in the store first so that you can test all the shades and find the right one.

I love this foundation. I've been using it for years and it has definitely improved my skin. I was a die-hard liquid foundation user, but I wanted to try this because of all the good things I've heard. This is the best and I will never go back to liquid!

i bought this foundation in hopes of covering up the pimple or 2 on my face. Other foundations made me look papery so i bought this one....i look absolutely radiant in the morning...but come mid afternoon, it was slick and looked totally fake.
Works fabulously, as always :)
I love this product! I consider this shade my 'winter look' because I am pale as a ghost. Hopefully the weather will get nicer and I can get some color. Then I switch to medium beige.

if you have dry skin stay away from this it leaves your skin nasty and dry and caky so i suggest use a good moisturizer this powder has good coverage bt wen you apply a lot it looks too powdery be careful it contains MICA which is known to cause breakouts(google it ) titanium dioxide is also bad if you have overly sensitive skin! overall wen applied a normal amount it gives full coverage

I started using this 6 months ago and never went back..Im the type of person that bought a new foundation every week, in hopes that it was THE ONE. so i have tried hundreds of foundations. and with having oily skin and acne, it was really hard. But bareminerals covers up and gives you amazing skin.

This foundation is okay. It's very good at hiding blemishes and red areas on my skin, you just blend in circles with a big brush and it covers well. It just doesn't really last all day and has a tendency to slip around a bit in my T zone. Seems a little oily, if you have oily skin to begin with. It's probably better on normal skin. Give it a try!
Just wouldn't do without it. It great!
Love this product1 Have been using it for years, my skin looks flawless with it on
I love the coverage and feel.
I have to look great and fresh and the Bare makes it so easy then top it off with Warmth.Perfect
this foundation goes on super light and they have a variety of colors to match various skin tones. i love it and i use it everyday because its easy to use and makes my skin look great.

reviews.review_title: The Best Foundation by far- my daughter & myself
reviews.review_text: We had used liquid foundation before trying Bare Minerals. And now, we're completly hooked. We both feel that this foundation is not only better for our skin but provides the coverage we desire without appearing as though we are wearning tons of makeup.

In the past I had bought a Get Started Kit which had the shades Light & Golden Light. I had used them both together & separately & they never seemed to match my light skin. So I decided to give this foundation another try & go for the shade Fairly Light, its perfect for me!! I use a light tinted moisturizer underneath & Faux Tan All Over Color to give me that healthy natural glow. I use these products together daily & I love them!! Now I'm eager to try the matte formula for the summer months!!

reviews.review_title: a llittle too light for my skintone
reviews.review_text: This shade is not even close to Medium. I thought that the Medium was perhaps a little too dark and that possibly this new shade would work better for me. I was wrong; it was much lighter that the shade I had been using. Too light for me. So I just gave it to my mom to try.

I only gave it 4 stars because the color was a little dark for my face, however, that was my fault for not trying it out in the store which I would highly recommend. I like the new dispenser. I tend to do my makeup in the car a lot (not always the best idea) and this dispenser is much less messy than the old one and makes it a lot easier to get the right amount without spilling everywhere. It blends well, builds for additional coverage, and if you have a concealer brush, it even works well to hide blemishes without looking cakey. I will definitely continue using this foundation (although, I will go to the store to try out the different shades so I can find one that's a little better-I had wishful thinking that I was more tan than I actually was!) At least summer is coming soon so it will probably match better after I get some sun!
Doesn't dry out my skin, soaks up oil && blends perfectly! I wouldn't switch to any other foundation.
I can not live without this foundation!

At first I wasn't sure about this powder. I had good days and bad days with it. But then I started using MUFE's HD foundation and found that it worked perfectly in combination with this powder. First I lightly put on the HD foundation then my mineral powder and top it off with MUFE's HD setting powder. It give you a beautiful and soft complextion!
Always pleased with this product. Have used it for more than 5 years. LOVE it. Only criticism; sneaky pricing; the size has shrunk, and the price has remained the same.

I got this in the new fairly medium shade. Before this, I used medium, but found that it was a little too dark for me in the winter when my skin is paler. After switching to this shade, I have received compliments on my skin even though I do have some blemishes hiding under this makeup. My routine consists of first putting on moisturizer and letting it soak in. Then I start by covering blemishes with the small brush, and then lightly going all over my face with the larger brush. Sometimes I follow with the mineral veil if I'm feeling like I want to look especially nice, but it isn't necessary day to day. I have slightly oily skin, which is actually a plus with this makeup because the makeup absorbs some of the oil. I'm sure when the summer comes this shade will be too light, but it is great for the winter.
I'd recommend for anyone with sesitive or acne prone skin. When wearing, I have to moisturise my face very well or I feel like powder looks caked on dry skin.

I have been wearing this foundation for 5 years now and I will never switch to anything else. I love the weightlessness and ability to add more or less coverage depending on your mood... SPF is an added bonus! So important to take care of our skin and this is such a simple way to do it!
I will stay with this line. My skin looks great and is in better shape then ever. Simply the best makeup line.

I've tried a number of foundations, but I keep coming back to BE. I love this matte formula! I have clear skin but it can get oily during the day. This is light, matte and allows my natural skin to show through. I like wearing the new Givenchy pink jelly blush under this for a natural look. I definately would recommend this to a friend!
i love this product!!!!

I love love love Bare Minerals foundation. It applies so easy and has a glow on my face even those it starts as a powder. Awesome coverage and lasts all day. Plus it has sunscreen and provides a very natural coverage.

reviews.review_title: It really dries out my skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this foundation/concealer and is covers well, very buildable. My only problem with it is that is really dries my skin out. When I apply it under my eyes, it gathers in the corners near my nose and enhances my few wrinkles. It tends to separate on my nose (my friend has the same problem with it). We both have combination skin. It also separates on my chin and forehead which aren't very oily so it can't understand why it does this. If you want to use this product, I recommend that you use a lot of moisturizer first. I have also found that I have to carry it around with me for touch ups when it rubs off or separates. It's very good for covering blemishes and since it's drying, it helps dry out any pimples which makes them disappear faster.

I have fallen in love again! I had used bareMinerals before and thought it was nice but I made the assumption that all loose powder makeup was equal. I used other powders for a while and broke out really bad (not due to my makeup change). I got the break outs under control but I now have acne scars that still make me look like I'm breaking out. I'm getting rid of them but in order to cover them, I had to pile on my other makeup and you could still see them! I put on my bareMinerals this morning and the scars are virtually unnoticeable! I love that it feels lightweight but gives me flawless skin! I also have pretty oily skin but it keeps the oil under control. Love it!

I have tried every mineral makeup out there, and many many foundations. I have very oily skin and nothing seemed to stay on my face without getting cakey a few hours later. The ORIGINAL formula (Not the Matte) along with the Oil-Control Prime Time have been absolutely amazing for me. No touch ups needed during the day. I do use witch hazel as a toner beforehand as well as the primetime. The Mineral veil is a must, as well! It also covers all my acne scarring with minimal amount, which was a HUGE plus.

Ive been using this foundation for about 3 years now and I will never EVER use another foundation again!:) It is a little on the spendy side but it is so worth it and lasts quite a while. It's a must have:)

I picked fairly medium based on Sephora and Bare Minerals websites. My skin tone is definitely fairly medium this time of year in Colorado and this made me look like a ghost. Turns out I am medium beige, again wouldn't have this problem if I had a store anywhere close.
I love this foundation. It covers well and stays on all day. This is the only foundation that I will use!
Bought this for my daughter and she LOVES it. She has sensitive skin and has been wearing this for several years. Natural, fresh, light and GREAT COVERAGE. A keeper.

I haven't used makeup for over 5 years.
