Now that I am graduating school and entering the work world, I wanted makeup that would be easy to apply, that would not be heavy or cakey and would not blemish my skin. My best friend; a make-up artist, suggested this product since she knows I am a no fuss girl.  This product is amazing and I am wearing it every day now. I look forward to the routine in the morning. The first day I wore it to work, my colleagues were commenting that I had a new glow, but they didn't realize I was wearing make-up. I love the fact that it is good for your skin!!! I like this ingredients in the product so much that I got the skin care line and a few of their other sets.  Definitely a bareminerals girl for LIFE!!!!

Original Medium is my savior. This color is perfect for my skin tone. I am a blonde with medium skin, and this color is perfect. It's easy to use, it's got a great natural sort of glow (which is why I prefer the original to the matte colors by BE), and they blend so well with other BE blushes and highlighters. I would be lost without it! Use it everyday, and everyday my skin looks flawless. :) Even if I fall asleep in it (God forbid!) I don't break out. Love it.

I have been using bareMinerals for 2 years and I LOVE it! I have tried to use regular foundation a few times since I've started using bareMinerals and I always go back to the bareMinerals. It looks very natural but is excellent for covering imperfections.

I have been using this foundation for about 7 or 8 months now, and it is the best I have ever used. It blends very well and conceals skin blemishes effortlessly. I don't think I'll ever use anything else!

I have been using this foundation since introduced to it 5 years ago and absolutely love it! My skin is sensitive and I'd had problems with other liquid based foundations in the past. I'll never go back!

I've been using this foundation for years. It doesn't take much so the pot lasts a long time. Good value. The foundation blends in perfectly with my skin tone and looks like I'm not wearing anything, like beautiful, more perfect looking skin. Feels weightless on too. I really love this makeup line and my daughters in their 20s do also!

LOVE THIS! I have very dry skin and it doesn't flake or make me look matte at all, which I love. I've had to work out timing of this and my (super heavy duty) moisturizer, because if I put it on right after it gets a little caky. I've been using it for a few weeks now, and have started to use noticeably less than I did at first. It lasts through rain, running, lacrosse games and 18 hour days. I have slept in it a few times too, and it had no noticeable negative impact on my skin. I would recommend buying this in the store--the people are very helpful with color matching etc. I wound up being the palest color they make, which was not what I expected and not what I would have bought online. As an added bonus, this is NOT tested on animals, something I demand/appreciate in my cosmetics.

i have been using this foundation for about 5 years now, and i will NEVER go back to another foundation. i struggled with pretty bad acne for several years. between using this & philosophy's purity made simple cleanser my skin is now clear and healthy. i cant even imagine my life without this product - seriously :) if you are on the fence about buying this i would HIGHLY suggest it.

I hate foundation and always have. I always refused to wear anything and just dealt with slightly uneven skin ton, until I started using Bare Minerals about 4-5 years ago. I love it and will NEVER use anything else. The coverage is great and it lasts so long!

reviews.review_title: Love it, love it, love it!
reviews.review_text: I started using this foundation three years ago and will never switch to another product. I started using this as a 40 yr old woman who struggled with acne, not horrible acne, but usually broke out with one to two large red pimples all the time. After I made the switch to bare minerals, I've finally broken free from the acne. This stuff doesn't clog my pores and is everything it claims to be.

I have tried every mineral powder out there. This is the heaviest, cakiest one I have encountered. That being said, maybe some consumers prefer that in a mineral powder. I prefer one that I can layer, or self-adjust. This felt more like chalk-dust and not mineral powder to me. My teenage daughter (who is JUST starting to try different mineral powders) decided to keep her. I think it looks cakey on her, however the color is superb for her skin tone.

Best foundation out there by far. Have been a loyal user for about three years now and I have no interest in even trying another foundation because my skin looks so pearly-perfect after application. So people think I'm not wearing any make-up and comment on my 'flawless' complexion.  Having combination skin however, I do find myself using oil-blotting sheets on my t-zone and occassionally having to reapply a little bit to that area to freshen up. No other complaints nonetheless :)
Love this product!! It covers well, makes my skin look flawless, lasts all day, and has even improved the look of my skin!! Will definitely be purchasing again!!

This product is not as great as it seems. They say its great for your face because supposedly it wont clog your pores.I have acne because of make-up never had acne before then so I had to change something. I chose this because what it stands for. Apparently nothing has changed on my face have been using it for a couple of months and i can say my face is either worst or the same. The cover is okay, i like the pearly finish. It makes your skin look healthy. BUT i will give it 3 stars cause it is not as great as they make it seem.
Amazing coverage, nice glow and better skin condition.
I really love this! it's natural looking, and gives you a flawless glowing finish. it doesn't irritate my skin, and conceals blemishes.
I have been using Bare Essentials for over five yrs. Covers well and lasts all day.I like the fact that it is good for my skin.

I have been a bareMinerals fan for a long time. It is a product anyone can and should use. On this day I bought the foundation for my daughter. She tends to have breakouts on her forehead now and then, and I know bareMinerals is the best foundation for keeping those nasty pimples under control. Being the kind who is diametrically opposed to chemicals, it is a foundation I would recommend to anyone because of what is does and more to the point, does not, contain. This is an exceptional product, not only because of the ingredients, but also because of its ease of application, and its amazing coverage.

For a person with combination, acne-prone, ultra sensitive skin, this is my favourite mineral makeup by far! Easy to apply, won't make you break out, leaves a nice luminosity but you'll need some oil blotting sheets for the t-zone. My only critique is that I wear the Fair shade and it's a little yellow for pale-pink skin, and it can be a tad drying - but it definitely balances my skin out! Not so oily a t-zone!

I really like this foundation. Its easy to apply, has very good coverage and it doesn't feel like i'm wearing any makeup at all. I've been using this product since 2006 and has become a staple in my makeup collection. Just remember to use a light hand and to buff it in well because otherwise it might look cakey.  I have very oily and acne-prone skin. Due to my ongoing battle with acne I'm left with a whole lot of hyperpigmentation. Yet somehow when I use this foundation random co-workers would tell me, Your skin is so nice!. Ha!.. If only they can see my bare face.. I'm sure they'll take their compliments back in a heartbeat.

This foundation is perfect on me! it goes well with bare escentuals minreal veil! My skin looks amazing and even more flawless! some foundation usually makes my face looks cakey but using this one gives me a natural finish. My boyfriend actually noticed it too! Now i cant leave the house without this!  im just glad i picked the right color on me. Im asian, and i picked the golden medium..
Love it! It provides great coverage and is so easy to work with

This powder goes on smooth and the coverage is amazing. I love that it can be layered to achieve different types of coverage - I no longer need to purchase concealer! It's been great for my acne-prone, sensitive skin. The first couple of times I used way to much, less really is more. Use the buffing brush to blend, blend, blend for a full-coverage finish that doesn't cake.
No makeup compares to BareMinerals. No icky feeling and feeling of caked on. Light and just feels great!!!

Out of all the foundations I have ever used, this is my favorite so far. Not only does it cover good, but it also gives you color and can match your skin to your exact shade & undertone. It's relatively cheap, depending on whether you want original or matte. I usually get original because It's cheaper and there's really not much of a difference. This is also good for you're skin. It's lightweight. You don't even have to take it off before you go to sleep, it's so natural. :)
Testing upload of photo to site 11:09am
testing to put video up on site
testing#2 to load photo
Testing picture uploading to site

Bare Minerals is the only foundation I have ever used that looks and feels natural. I actually go out of my way and/or holdout until I can get to a Sephoria to buy this product. I wish it was more accessible closer to home!
This product is great on videos
This product looks great on photos. Very Natural Look
This product rocks during workouts

reviews.review_title: Keep Coming Back to this Foundation!
reviews.review_text: I've tried other mineral foundations and none of them compare to the bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation. You can use a little for a light coverage or build up coverage by adding more. No matter how much you use, it feels very light and natural. The trick is picking out the correct shade so it doesn't look unnatural. What I like to do in the winter is use a tinted moisturizer fiirst and then apply a coat of bare minerals. My skin gets pretty dry in the winter, so this helps with the dryness. My only issue with bareMinerals is the brushes. They're soft at first, but even if you buy the special cleansing soap for the brushes, they're never as soft once you use them for awhile. I'd try another brand (my MAC brush has lasted awhile and is still soft).
variety of shades, natural so it doesn't even effect sensitive skin!  i love it. i use medium beige and sometimes mix it with a bronzer or blush to chance the hue...very natural looking
I can't live without this product. Den if I do t leave the house I use it. My skin always feels better with it and after wearing it
Easy to use and feels like I have no make-up on at all. The coverage is not as complete as I had expected, therefore needing to reapply later in the day.

This is a wonderful foundation. I have wandered off periodically looking for that perfect one!! But I always come back. I am prone to breakouts but never while using the bareMinerals!! Gives a nice glow, but not oily look. Highly recommend!!!
Once you know youre shade, this product has great smooth finishing covergage. I stoppped using liquid foundation. This is SO easy. Great Value with this 8g size

I have been looking at the bare minerals line for quite some time now. I have very fair yet oily skin and am prone to breakouts. I need a medium to heavy coverage foundation and wasnt sure that this would meet needs. Well, it exceeded them! I cant say enough about BareMineras foundation. I would definatley reccomend it to anyone who has had an interest in trying the product line.

I actually love this foundation a lot! It blends really nicely onto your skin and has great coverage. It stays on throughout the day but a primer does help. However, the missing star is due to it be kind of messy. But it is a loose powder so I guess you have to take the bad with the good. I feel like when you place a kabuki brush down onto it, you lose so much of the powder and it gets everywhere. I switched over to Philosophy's Supernatural because I thought the attached sponge would be less messy. It was less messy but it did not apply on skin well so i ended up switching back to bareMinerals.

I started with bare minerals and then tried several other mineral foundations over the years. Bare minerals is the best. It can be a little cakey looking when I put in on right after moisturizer but it soaks in and lasts most of the day. Its worth going to the store to get color matched.

I like this foundation so much because it feels like I have nothing on. I don't like the feeling of having too much on my face, i feel like my face is dirty but this is perfect and last the whole day. I got the golden tan and goes perfect with my skin tone. I even got my sister to try and she loves it as well!

ive been using bareminerals for 6yrs, and i love it, i always get compliments on my face since. now i can get away without wearing anything on my face with how good it looks over the years..i reccomend this product highly.

Bare Minerals are great - so light weight but you get tons of coverage. Despite having acne and lots of dark spots on my face, I seem to always get compliments on my skin and how it looks even and glowing... My only complaint is that when I first started using Bare Minerals, my face started breaking out like crazy and I couldn't understand why...my friend also told me that the primer that comes with the starter kit has a tendency to make you break out so I thought I'd throw that out there. But the second time around Bare Minerals didn't make me break out and I think this is a great day-to-day foundation that I will continue to wear!
I always find the staff to be helpful. It's nice to know you are working with people who know the products

I LOVE this foundation! I have extremely hard skin to match a shade to and extremely sensitive skin, so it's always been hard for me to wear makeup anyhow. This stuff is the first stuff I've found that actually covers my blemishes and doesn't aggravate my skin too much. I still get a little itchy feeling if I've been sweating alot while it's on but I never break out or anything like I have with other things. It also is, for me, hard to get it to stop being powdery and showering my bathroom with dust. And it's a tad pricey. However, I'm willing to live with all those things because I can't say how happy I've been with this product. It really does do wonders for my skin!

I have been using bareMinerals for over five years now. I will NEVER use any other type of make-up!! My skin always feels smooth and looks wonderful. I have always struggled with acne and have just a few scars. bareMinerals covers and conceals everything. The dark circles under my eyes are almost invisible. I LOVE THESE PRODUCTS!!!!!
I love it!!! it's light on my skin and has a good coverage. I think I am going to stay with it for ever!

After years of wearing Studio Fix and having bad skin from it, I welcomed this mineral makeup. The new packaing is great too because you can lock the powder in and not have it spill everywhere when you go to transport it. I constantly get compliments as well on the natural look it gives.
I love this product and Sephora always has what I want. Great Service!!!
I have used bare minerals for 7 years and I love it!! It gives full coverage without the feeling of having makeup on.

reviews.review_title: Ideal for all ages of skin
reviews.review_text: I love mineral foundation because it feels very lightweight and comfortable on my skin. I started with Bare Minerals when I was in high school and I've been very happy. I find that a jar lasts a very long time for me, since I wear a rather minimal layer of foundation and am not a daily makeup wearer. I adore how easy Bare Minerals is to apply - not much blending or precision needed, just dust it over your face (and dust again if you want more coverage or see that you missed a spot).  My mom tried Bare Minerals because I liked it so much, and she loves it too. She's in her 60s but her students refuse to believe it - because her makeup is't heavy, caked, or cracked like the heavier foundation worn by other older women these teenagers have interacted with.

I love, love, love bareMinerals! It always leaves my face so fresh and clean looking, like I don't have any makeup on at all. I also love that it has SPF 15, I have very fair skin and live in the southwest where the sun is shining all year long, so it is so wonderful.

reviews.review_title: Great color, not so great for wrinkles
reviews.review_text: Everybody knows that bareminerals is a great product. The only problem is with my aging skin - the powder goes right into the wrinkles. i don't want to use a primer just yet (too much on a daily basis). Can't they come up with a bareminerals for aging skin that is a filler too?

Another reviewer commented that this foundation looks powdery on your skin, and I agree. When I first started using it it didn't, but after a while it does start to look more powdery. I keep coming back to this though. Its expensive but in the end it covers up the most imperfections and smooths out the skin more than any foundation I've tried before. Plus I swear it makes my skin look better when I wash off my makeup!
I have been using this foundation for over 10 years. I absolutely love it!!!! I have yet to find a foundation that can give me coverage & not feel like I'm wearing anything & not cause break outs!!!

I've used this product for quite sometime and love what it does for my skin. The new click-n-go container is a vast improvement on the old one. The product is excellent..one I will continue to use to achieve the look I want for my skin.
I've been using Bare Escentuals for years and wouldn't change to any other. I love it and recieve more compliments on my skin since then.
you can't go wrong with Bare Escentuals! The bareMinerals goes on smooth and covers all my flaws!!! Sooo light weight and makes my skin glow.
I feel it‚Äôs one of the greatest products on the market today. I have tried many brands to compare and bareMineral is the best by far.

reviews.review_title: Best Loose Powder Foundation I've Tried!
reviews.review_text: Very nice. Good for those days when you just want a light coverage & quick application. Unfortunately though, it tends to look very powdery on the face.

Have been using this product for quite some time now and really love it. You can have full coverage if needed and still look natural. Love it even more since it became travel friendly with the twisting lid.
love the medium-beige tone- goes well with my skin tone be it summertime tan or winter time pale. helps even my skin tone and doesnt cause breakouts on my sensitive oily skin. recommend for all!

I tried a few other cheaper brands over the last 2 years and none compare to Bare Escentuals period. Other brands could not get the color right and made my face feel itchy. Bare Escentuals is the best.
nice.... like all Bare Escentual products. Never disappointed.
best foundation ever. covers well, light and smooth, buildable, water proof, love the stuff. you should buy it.
Love this foundation its looks like i'm wearing nothing and hides all my flaws.

This is the first powder foundation I've tried, but I love it! It looks much more natural on me than liquid foundation, and it feels great on. I also rarely break out anymore since I started using Bare Escentuals foundation
you cant go wrong!!!

I've been using this product for eight years, and it still amazes me how natural it looks and how perfectly it covers. After applying it, I notice that within a short time it actually morphs into my skin. Twice I tried popular liquid foundations for a comparison, and I truly felt as if I had applied a mask over my skin. bareMinerals mineral make-up is the best: it lasts a long time, is a great value, and most of all, it will enhance anyone's natural beauty.

reviews.review_title: IS IT JUST ME THAT NOTICES A DIFFERENCE?
reviews.review_text: Ok, so I don't want to sound like a crazy person but ever since they changed their name from i.d. bare minerals to bare minerals original I have noticed a HUGE difference in the foundation!!!! I have been a user of this product since it first came out and I loved it because it had full coverage. Just 1 dab and you are good to go. Now, it barely covers anything and it dries my skin out sooo bad. Instead of the flawless finish it gave me before now it looks like I don't even have any make up on. IS IT JUST ME THAT NOTICED THE DIFFERENCE???

I have never been disappointed with Bare Escentuals products ESPECIALLY their foundations! Their ingredients are non-processed so you could literally go to sleep with it and not have to worry about it creating pimples all over your face. Also, when color matching, this product is very forgiving. If you don't get a perfect match it won't be devastatingly noticeable :D And for those of you that are used to the liquid foundation feel, you can mix a little bit of this powder to your moisturizer and apply! In sum: I won't put any other foundation on my face and havn't since I've been using this product.

Overall, this is a great foundation. Recently discovered that they added a fairly medium shade which is great news for me as I used to need to mix fairly light and medium to get the perfect shade.  This foundation allows for amazing, full coverage, but is still natural-looking and gives the skin a nice glow. I prefer this formula to the matte version which can look cakey. My only complaints would be that it could last longer (I need a touch-up by the afternoon) and that it is messy to apply and travel with (although the new packaging has improved this issue).
I love this makeup, and have for about 5 years. I always feel like I'm glowing after a few minutes when the makeup settles in!
This stuff is fantastic! I will never use another powder or foundation again!!
I have been using this for a bunch of years!! still luv it

I have been using Bare Minerals foundation for over 5 years, and I love it! Whether I use it over a liquid foundation, or by itself, it provides coverage without looking cakey or fake. The only downfall, is that the product can be very messy.
I think I'm in my 10th or 11th year as a bareMinerals user. Can't live without it. The only reason I don't rate it excellent is that I wish somehow they could formulate it with better staying power.
Lots of my friend have used BM. They all say you love it or you hate it. Well, I hate it. Didn't sit well on my skin and tryed 4 shades, none looked good.
whats not to love about BE
Bare Escentuals foundation, concealer and Mineral Viel are the very best. I have tried 3 other similar products over the years and nothing compares. I won't waste my money again.

i love this stuff! it makes my skin look even tone without it lookin' over done. i use it daily and it also helps keep my skin clear from break outs since it is so gentle on the pores. a small amount goes a long way too. i love the matte shimmer finish as well. never will i go back to liquid foundation again!

This powder seems thinner to me than the normal tinted foundation, but I notice that when I use it, my makeup has less of a tendency to rub off. It's great, and I would definitely recommend it if you already use the Bare Minerals foundation.

I've been using BE for a couple months now, after switching over from a liquid foundation. Pros: BE lets me customize how much or how little coverage I want, which is nice for days when my skin is not being cooperative. It's very easy to apply and can be done quickly, which is awesome becuase I can be running late, and still look put-together. Even just mascara with the foundation, warmth, & mineral veil is sufficient. Cons: BE is VERY drying to the skin. (Hence 4 instead of 5 stars.) I noticed a distinct difference in how dry my face was after I started using BE, but since I was able to address the issue by using more moisturizer, I kept using the BE. If you have really dry skin before using makeup, you may want to test this makeup in the 20-dollar trial before buying a full kit. The new containers that are designed to prevent spillage do a decent job, but are not foolproof, so you still need to be careful. Overall, I'm very pleased with BE, and will continue to use. I would definitely recommend this to friends.
I have been using bareMinerals in medium beige and I won't use anything else. its flawless and not heavy. Comes off easily at night!
I have used bareMinerals foundation for years. It is easily applied, looks natural, and covers any imperfections on your face you wish to hide. I highly recommend it.

This foundation is perfect for my skin! It does not clog pores, so I had no breakouts and my skin stayed smooth ever since I began using bareMinerals. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a foundation for normal (not dry or oily) skin and who wants an even foundation.

this product is absolutley amazing! i purchased this in the summer and i'm on my second one. since i bought it in the summer, i was a couple of shades darker. but now im really pale and when i put it on it makes my skin look very glowing! i have it in medium beige and i love it!

I used bareMinerals religiously years ago than took a break and used NARS and TooFaced press powders. I just recently purchased bareMinerals and it is still my favorite.  The coverage is light and non-cakey or chalky looking. It is perfect for someone who doesn't have many blemishes and is just looking for an easy and minimal coverup.
I really like the bareminerals foundation. Covers well and can be blended with similar colors depending on how your skin tone changes (like when I get tan in the summer) Highly recommend.

started using this product when it first came out then eventually went on to other foundations; mineral, liquid, cream, etc. and have now gone full circle and come back to bare escentuals. after one week my skin is clearing up and looking better

I have rosacea, so was looking for something without harmful chemicals to put on my face. I was also concerned that the makeup that I use to cover up the redness was looking fake and cakey.  This was just what I was looking for! It is unrealistic to look for a makeup that will cover up every single blemish and make your skin look completely uniform - if you're looking for something that is going to provide that level of coverage, you are not going to get natural looking makeup. I love that this evens out my complexion, and provides natural coverage. Does it even out every aspect of my rosacea? No. But it improves how my skin normally looks, and makes me feel great, as well as concealing the worst of my blemishes well.  It is not the fastest to apply, if you are using it correctly with the other products. It takes me a good 5 minutes, so if you are looking for something that has super quick application, this may not be your thing. Still, I would recommend you try it. Using this product as a concealer was fantastic, it is the most realistic coverage I have found so far. The click-lock system so far has been fantastic. I have been using this for two weeks, and have yet to get my makeup bag messy with the powder. I think you will be fine if you use common sense and make sure the product is properly closed before tossing into your bag. I have not found using this product to be too messy, no more than any other powder makeup.  I bought this as a part of a set, so I use it with mineral veil and the 'warmth'. and am extremely pleased! I do not think I will ever change this foundation, I love it.  I would definitely recommend this product!
I have been very happy with all the Bare Minerals products I've purchased, especially this foundation.

The Sephora in store consultant helped me select the right shade for me. This original formulation is a little more illuminating than I normally prefer but the following application of the Mineral Veil tones it down.
I started using this about two years ago and it is my favoite product. It feels light and looks totally natural. I love this brand!

Being 41, with wrinkles, I feel like this foundation doesn't make the wrinkles stand out like they do with regular cream foundation....I also tried sheer cover, but it pales in comparison with bare minerals!!!!
I love the sunscreen protection and flawless finish.

I have been using this product off and on for a couple of years and every time I go back to it, I wonder why I chose something else! It is natural looking - does not look like you are wearing makeup. It is light and is an exact match to my skintone. No streaks/lines and blends perfectly. The only thing is that it can come off on clothes. Otherwise, I loooove this product. Highly recommended!!

This is the first foundation I ever used, but as I've gotten older I've found I require more coverage. This doesn't quite cut it for my super uneven skin, but it was really good for me when I had a more even skin tone. I do like how it breathes really easily. I would suggest this for younger girls and girls without big pores/wrinkles because I've also found that it kind of sinks into crevices.

This foundation is easy to apply, stays on and even better that it has SPF in it. It's very sheer, but if I'm looking for more coverage I apply it over tinted moisturizer and it's perfect for going out!
I love this product. I now only use BE products on my face. They are so light and pure.
I love it, I feel fresh all day!

Love this foundation, used to have horribly mismatched concealer and powder. This has been a life-saver. No need for concealer anymore this foundation works great for any blemishes and under eye circles too! You won't regret getting it, but if your skin is oily you may want to check out the matte foundation or make sure you use the mineral veil.

I'm asian and Italian so I have golden skin with hints of olive AND I'm much darker in the summer and very pale in the winter. It can be difficult to match my skin since there is so much color and shades going on. I use golden tan and its 100% the PERFECT shade. I've never found anything that matches my skintone so perfectly. I honestly cannot see where the makeup starts and my skin ends. Its so lightweight but covers somehow? I will be using this foundation as long as they make it or until something else miraculous comes out. If you haven't tried this... try it. Perfect for everyday, even out in direct sunlight. I have combination skin, very oily T-zone and this has never created a problem for me. I don't break out anymore than I did before I started using it.

After my previous powder foundation was continuously sold out in Sephora stores, I decided to ask someone for help. I have very pale skin with yellowish undertones, and had been previously using a foundation that was colored more like this line's fair. Bare Mineral's golden fair, though, is perfect and works very well, and I love it! It's very natural, and I would definitely recommend it. It took me a couple of tries to work out the sifter, but now I find it really great and easy to use. This is a wonderful foundation, and it won't break your wallet, especially compared to many others.
I have been using this products for a long time and am very happy with it.

I started using this product just 1 year ago, at the age of 39..I was still batteling break-outs and oily skin...I love this product. My skin looks smooth, it doesn't need to be reapplied, and my skin has cleared up tremendously..barely a break-out. Play with the powders to get the perfect match and you will be in love also!

I like the new design of the container, it's much more spill-safe! After taking a break from this line I decided to try it out again and I'm pleased with the results, although I think I might have gotten the wrong shade, it blends well and doesn't look unnatural.
This is the best foundation ever ! I have sun-damaged skin and this foundation covers great without looking dry plus it lasts all day. I have tried plenty of other brands but this is the best by far.

I know I'm just preaching to the choir here, but I love this foundation! I love how easily it covers, and it looks incredibly natural. It makes my morning routine that much quicker and keeps my skin looking flawless all day. I also like that I don't have to get a separate concealer. Using this as a concealer doesn't last as long, but It's still wonderful and a perfect match!
Fabulous ... it's my go to for work day makeup.

I have been using Bareminerals for years, and nothing tops it. After trying several other products, I have an addiction to it and use it every day! It makes my skin look so much better, and doesn't hurt my acne-prone skin.

This is the foundation I've been coming back to again and again for the last 6-7 years. I occasionally try other brands or other formulas, but this one consistently works well for me. I can build coverage on the days I need more, but it can stay light on days where I need just a little. I always use this over a primer (various brands) and that seems to help it last longer and look less powdery. I like how it makes me look like I have great skin and am not just covered in makeup.

I've tried MAC, Benifit, Makeup Forever.. the list goes on and on but nothing compares to bareMinerals. I have oily skin and I have always had a hard time finding a good founation. When I first heard of bareMinerals I was skeptical because i've always used liquid founation and wasn't sure how i'd feel about a powder but there is nothing likeit! My skin looks flawless and I get compliments all the time. Before I couldn't wait to wash my makeup off I felt like I had a mask on bareMinerals feels like I have nothing on I love it and will contiune to buy forever.

reviews.review_title: THE BEST OF ALL MINERAL FOUNDATIONS!
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THE NEW SHADE'' FAIR GOLD'',BUT BARE MINERALS IS REALLY THE BEST BECAUSE YOUR SKIN LOOKS NATURALLY BEAUTIFUL AND IMPROVES WITH THIS FOUNDATION AS WELL AS ALL THEIR PRODUCTS. I TRIED QUITE A FEW OTHERS BUT THE RESULT WASN'T EVEN COMPARABLE!!!..SIMPLY THE BEST !
Love this foundation! Covers great, works on dry skin also!!
Been using it for years and love it.
little bit of foundation goes a long way. great coverage. lightweight on your skin. lasts all day.
The bareMinerals Foundation gives me a natural look. I think my skin is even in better condition too.
This is one of the quickest, flawless foundation powders i have ever used. I can actually get my makeup done in about 5 min with this foundation and other quick and easy makeup.

reviews.review_title: Good quality but not for me
reviews.review_text: When I bought this I was recommended to get it to use it more as a bronzer than a foundation. I ended up returning it because if I wanted a bronzer I would have just purchased one. The color was all wrong for me. There's nothing wrong with the product but I favored MUFE powder foundation more. I love the idea of the twisting cap to limit the amount that is used. It's a very light power and applies very well. May purchase it in the future in my shade.

I have never loved a foundation so much. It's light, it's smooth, it covers my imperfections but looks so natural because it still allows my freckles to shine through! I'm simply addicted to this product!!!

I have been a BE fan for several years, over ten actually. I have tried many other foundations but none has been such a perfect fit for me as BE. I love that it doesn't feel like makeup, goes on light yet I can build on it if I choose too. Excellent coverage without being heavy. Doesn't cake, stayes on until I wash it off. Has a spf and is good for my skin.

reviews.review_title: Nothing is as good as bareMinerals!
reviews.review_text: Bareminerals is awsome! My skin is not bogged down and I breakout less frequently. Great coverage that lasts all day!

I have tried the knock-offs and there is NO comparison....Bare Escentuals bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation is the BEST! Beautiful, natural coverage that enhances my skin and stays fresh looking AND feeling, all day long. :)

I waited and waited, afraid to give bareminerals a try. I have extremely sensitive skin and after trying so many types and brands of foundation had pretty much settled for a tinted moisturizer which did nothing to cover my redness or blemishes and still managed to break me out. On a whim I stopped in and let them try a quick buff. I sprung for the entire kit and I'm absolutely in love. It's been over a month and my skin seems to be improving. No itching, drying, oiling up in my zone and able to cover without looking heavy or caked. I can't recommend enough. **Note, I'm light skinned and wound up with a medium shade so be sure to go in and let them try it on you before you buy. I would have been about 3 shades too light.
I've found this product best for my skin...oily and acne prone. I prefer a natural look and also find it does not settle into wrinkles. Love It:)

As a huge makeup lover, I've tried just about everything out there. This is by far superior. I've been using it for 3 years. Amazing color selection, with natural, buildable coverage. Use this as my concealer as well. I have very fair skin with pink undertones, and 'fair' was a perfect match. My skin is combination and acne prone, and this foundation doesn't irritate it or settle into fine lines. Great coverage and pretty long lasting. I use BE's primer, and finish with mineral veil. Also love the slight glow it gives. Tried the matte version, and really didn't like it.
I absolutely love bareMinerals loose powder foundation! It blends really well into my skin and balances out my skin tone.
I started using Bare Minerals about 2 or 3 years ago and love it! It gives a natural look, goes on light, and helps one feel natural AND beautiful.

this is the best foundation i have ever used! it goes on so smooth and even, it never clumps! i have very fair skin so i used to cake on the foundation so i would look tanner, but with the bareminerals i dont have to do that anymore. it looks very natural and they best past is that it is not full of parabins or sulfates!!
Seems a little grainier texture than previous Bare Escentuals make up. However, seems to be same coverage and like the natural look of the make up.
love this product.friendly service.
This foundation alone cleared my skin within a week. The coverage is full, yet it feels clean and fresh. Amazing!

This is my all-time favorite foundation. I started using this product a few years ago, and for some reason stopped buying it... within a month or two, the heavier liquid foundation I was using made me break out like CRAZY. I switched back to this and voila, clear skin again.  It is super light, but can build up coverage if you have reddish skin (I do in some places) or breakouts. It looks super natural, which I love.
I love my bare escentuals bare minerals foundation. it is comfortable for wearing all day. it doesn't feel like i have any makeup on at all and it looks like i just have naturally good complexion.

I've used this foundation for a few years, but I'm ready to move on. It doesn't have much staying power. Mostly, I hate the awful mess it makes on my countertop. I switched to Laura Geller's pressed foundation, which was much better, and better looking on, but Sephora doesn't carry it any more. Since I order from Sephora regularly, I think I'll try something new from them.
Great foundation! Looks completely natural!

This is a great product from Bare Escentuals. I have acne prone skin so I know when I wear this, it won't break me out. I used it all on it's own for an everyday look, however, if I want a flawless complexion, I like to wear a creamy concealer underneath.

Well... like a lot of people I thought this was another beauty scam, promising the best results and really not working at all. But you know how we are we go into a Sephora and look for something to spend, so I did. I was told by my aunt to use it and that it really works, I didn't believe her but I really wanted to spend some money that day, so I bought the Baremineral's kit, and it is THE MOST AMAZING makeup I have ever tried. I have really disgusting acne and nothing worked for me because you know oil and skin don't match, and I was afraid this was going to make it worse like all the other makeup I have used, but it didn't. It actually covered about 95% of the acne, it looked completely natural(I was amazed) and it didn't feel cakey like other makeup. It didn't make my skin breakout, it has actually helped my skin. LOVED IT! oh, I even use it at the beach, and guess what? NO CLOGGED pores and SPF all in one... LOVE IT!

I have always had a hard time finding a great foundation. Ready to finally splurge a little I went to Sephora and sampled a bunch of the Bare Minerals foundations. I think the coverage is amazing! It gives your skin such a smooth look without looking fake like a lot of the liquid foundation gives you. Plus, I can barely tell I'm wearing it. I got the whole kit with the bronzer and mineral veil and just really love the look I get. It lasts all day long and I can even tell when I'm at the gym at the evening that my skin still looks even after my workout. I even use the concealer brush to add it around my eyes and it takes away the veiny look to my eyelids. This product works great for me because it gives an even tone to your skin, without making it obvious you're wearing any makeup!

I have acne prone skin and a lot of scarring. I think the whole point of wearing makeup is to have a natural feel to it. This powder is very sheer and will not cause complicated breakouts. You'll have a very natural finish and you can always layer if you're not happy with the coverage. I suggest watching the DVD if you're unsure of how to apply the makeup. Also if you're getting a dry powdery feel to it, try setting it with some spray on water. It'll give it a dewy look!  Very happy with the results!

I have used this product for years and have just switched colours. I was using the fair for the longest time but it was just suggested to change to the medium and it looks great. Very natural, still loving the product.
I love this product. My skin feels like porcelain and the finish is so natural.

I've been using bisque for a while to cover my dark circles, red areas but it was always a fine line to looking too cakey. This foundation covers and stays where you put it. It doesn't move into the wrinkles, has great coverage and gives me a wonderful more natural glow.

I was always the sceptical observer when it came to new beauty products, but I have to say I truly love bareMinerals products! I changed my entire makeup regime because I was having problems with acne breakouts for the first time in my twenties. BareMinerals makeup is so pure, fresh, and clean, my skin just adores it! It washes off beautifully, doesn't leave any residue, and delivers a flawless finish. It actually improved my skin's appearance so much that I now feel beautiful in the gym without any makeup. I turned to bareMinerals makeup after I had tried just about every other brand in the market and now my entire life has changed and I am super confident when it comes to my fresh, pretty face! I wish someone had told me to try bareMinerals first!

I'm in my 40s now, and cream foundations just don't look good on my skin anymore. So glad bareMinerals is out there! The finish is just what I need to even out my skin tone and look refreshed every day without foundation building up in the fine lines I now have.

Very lightweight and feels like you have nothing on. Definitely not the same feel as liquid make ups which I really like. It gives you a very nice smooth look. A couple cons. It doesn't photograph well if you're doing pics that involve professional flashes (ex. wedding pics). It can give you that sheen look like the Tinman has in the Wizard of Oz. Also if you're skin is super dry it won't stay on well. More mature skin is iffy depending upon the individual.

I love the original bare mineral makeup. I experience less breakouts, as long as I use daily antiseptic brush cleaner. The new applicator needs improvement; at the end there is powder left in container that cannot be accessed. Also, I recently tried the matte powder in Warm Tan and the color has too much red in it. So, I must use concealer with the original powder to get better coverage. The combination is nice, once you find the right color.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to scratch my face off
reviews.review_text: I purchased this while on a trip to New York in January thinking it would be the end-all, be-all of foundations. I was wrong. It seemed to separate with the oils on my face and when I got back home to FL, any type of heat made my face itch like crazy. It was all bad. I will not buy this again.

I love bare minerals. It does the best job at covering. Lately I have been breaking out and I don't know what I would do without this stuff. It covers my blemishes better than anything else. It also gives your skin a soft porcelain like finish. Just make sure you get the right color. You can also mix two colors together to get the ultimate combination.

reviews.review_title: Excellent Foundation for Almost All Skin Types
reviews.review_text: I started using Bare Escentuals foundation in High School, and have never looked back. I have classic combination skin -- very dry patches on my cheeks, and a very oily T-Zone -- and 98% of the time it gives me perfect, natural, even, and comfortable coverage...but the other 2% of the time, in that dead, cold, bone-dry portion of New England winters when my skin is rough and parched, it SOMETIMES (not all of the time) gives me cakey coverage. However, like I said, the OTHER 98% of the year, it is the BEST foundation ever; it breathes and doesn't just feel like a second-skin, it feels like YOUR skin...all while giving great coverage, and I feel good about putting something so natural on my skin. On an endnote, I've been reading some of these reviews that claim BE foundation made people break out horribly, to which I have two things to say: 1) Do remember that there is always a possibility to have an allergic reaction to anything you put on your skin (ie resulting in bumps and rashes that may look like acne), so ALWAYS do a test patch, and 2) ESPECIALLY with BE foundation -- which is not only brushed on, but buffed into, your skin -- you have to FREQUENTLY clean your brushes...I can't stress that enough! Even with the best foundation like BE, if you don't clean your brushes, you will be buffing old foundation, dead skin cells, oil, dirt, and bacteria onto your face which will make anyone break out...so clean your BE brushes to get the best result with BE foundation!
I have been using Bare Minerals for about a year now. I love how it makes my skin feel and gives me an airbrushed like finish to even out my skin tone.
I like this for light coverage on days when I don't have the time to wear foundation. It really is barely there, but I know it's hiding my blemishes and for that reason, I really like it.
This is the only foundation I've used in probably 7 years. My skin is so much clearer. No more make-up lines ever!

I used this a while back about 3 years ago. I loved it at first i used for about 3-6 months then I noticed it made my face itch. I don't know if it was the kabuki brush because I found that to be rough or the makeup itself. The coverage was great (I used fairly light) the only thing was the itching. I'm actually contemplating trying it again in hopes that they changed the formula or the brush.

I used liquid foundations for most of my cosmetic applying career. I had pimples and breakouts all the time. After I switched to this stuff the breakouts went away and I haven't had a pimple since. It looks good on and it lasts forever. I have to restock about once a year.
I was not satisfied with this product. I expected more coverage than it actually gives. I have red spots and acne scars on my face. After applying the makeup you can still see the imperfections.
I love bareMinerals. It is light, yet it covers. It leaves no lines on your face, and doesn't make you break out.
I did not like BM at all. They don't have the perfect color to match my skin so one color was too dark and the other was way too light. It's just not for me.
Love the blend, love the coverage. Love it not coming off on my clothes!

I have faithfully used Sephora's brand foundation for the last two years until a friend told me to try her Bare Escentuals foundation. I went and purchased my own, and I love it. It goes on smooth, stays all day, and blends my uneven skin tone well.
This is my 3rd refill of this stuff. I am a big fan of this foundation, as well as the matte foundation. It doesnt cause breakouts and looks so natural! i love it!

Well, I must be in the small group that does NOT like these products. It made my face break-out with terrible acne! Once I stopped using it, acne got better. After much internet research, I narrowed down the culprit to be bismuth oxychloride - which is often used in powder-based cosmetics. I tried another mineral foundation that did NOT have the bismuth in it, and had NO problems. However, in the end, I switched back to liquid foundation, as it had better coverage for me and lasted longer on my face.

I decided to try this in December, and boy was I surprised! I am obsessed! The coverage is wonderful and the finish is beautiful. This does not feel heavy or oily. It feels very light, like you are not wearing any makeup at all! I am hooked for life!

I tried this foundation in the past and didn't love it. Well I know why now, because my face had dry patches on it and it would accentuate those spots. Now I exfoliate and moisturize and this stuff ROCKS!!
Works for me with or without a tan, somehow!
I've been using BE for about 2 years. I can't say enough about how good their products are. If you are using a regular liquid make up, once you try BE, you'll never go back to your old type.
The coverage is awesome! I love the new packaging! It makes it so much easier for travel. The price point is good also.

The coverage is sub-par. If you have acne, discoloration, blemishes, or whatever, this is not the foundation for you. I have mild to moderate acne and quite a bit of red spots/scarring from pimples. The Bare Minerals does a bad job of covering it up. No matter how much I try to build onto my face, it just doesn't cover it. If you have clear skin, it's great. I used to have clear skin up until a year or two ago, and didn't have a problem with it before. As for the makeup, I am making the switch to Everyday Minerals when I finish up this container. If I could give it 2 and a half stars, I would. But I couldn't, so I went with 2, because 3 would be too generous. :P  (Also, my mom said it left an oily sheen on her face by the end of the day. I never had this problem, but she has very oily skin anyway.)
This make up is relatively affordable and all-natural. It blends well, and the sliding cover to close off the dispenser holes is a major improvement from the original packaging.
I have used bare minerals for about 12 years I try to switch to something else every once in a while and always go back to my minerals.

I've been using Bare Minerals for years, during such time I began having acne, which I never had before. Never thought it could be this makeup, as it is marketed as so pure and good for acne. However, after a long time of embarrassing breakouts, I discovered this was the cause. Will not touch these products again! It's amazing how my face cleared up so fast after discontinuing all of BE face products.
I've been using it for over a year.
Love this makeup. It covers all of my flaws and I love the new plastic liner to prevent loose powder from getting wasted.

I love Bare Minerals. I've been using it for over 15 years and won't use anything else. Oh, yes, I have tried the latest and greatest new and improved foundations and my skin always breaks out. I love Bare Minerals because I don't have to worry about that, ever!
Great coverage! I loved it!

Love it. Have been using this product for about 3 years now. I was a little worried at first about coverage, but it covers as well as any liquid foundation I have every used. Can't imagine going back to a liquid! I even have my daughter using it now.

I generally use liquid foundations for better coverage and a smooth look, but Bare Minerals give me great coverage with a much lighter feel. I recommend getting matched very carefully, on your whole face, because what matched my hand did NOT match my whole face and was too dark for me. Very good product.
the absolute best foundation ever. covers everything - looks so natural.
Slightly too yellow for my skin.
The only foundation I will ever use. Covers everything. Is smooth, clean, silky. No lines, true to facial color.

reviews.review_title: Have been using this for a year now
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a year now, and I'm wondering why didn't I try it sooner. It's very natural, at the same time give good coverage. I would recommend this to anyone.
I like this because it is a nice, natural foundation that does not appear too heavy or caked-on.

I have been using BE makeup for a couple of years now, and can't imagine going back to liquid makeups. It's quick, easy, and just the right amount of coverage to make me feel done up but still feel natural. Love BE!!!
Love this product. I use it again and again!

This gives that airbrushed flawless base to apply other make up to. It's a concealer, and a foundation...completely weightless and in this hot Florida humidity we need it. If it works here it'll work anywhere

I LOVE LOVE LOVE Bare Minerals foundation. I have used it for at least 4 years now and cant imagine ever wanting to use anything else. I only have one complaint--I hate the new containers the foundation comes in with the salt and pepper shaker type opening. I feel like there is less actual makeup in the container and more of it gets wasted since I can't control how much powder comes pouring out.
Have been using this for a few years now & I still love it! My skin is actually better since I have been using it. No more breakouts!

I tried this produc on in the store and it made me look gray. I still bought it and tried it again and the same exact gray/ashy look occured again. I am dark skin with reddish undertone and it did not work well with my skin. Two of my friends had the same issue and they are 2 or 3 shades lighter
love that there is SPF in this great powder foundation. new colors make matching my skin tone easier.

I used Bare Escentuals for 4 years, but stopped last fall for financial reasons. Well, after using traditional liquid and compact makeup for 5 months, my acne prone skin looks and feels horrible and I'm broken out constantly. I couldn't take it anymore, so I bought my Bare Escentuals again last week - for $112, I needed everything - and it's completely worth it because my skin is already improving and I feel good about my appearance. I can't put a price on confidence, so I've learned my lesson to keep these products in my budget no matter what!
Will never go back to anything else... lasts a while
Great for overall coverage and spot concealing. I use another concealer for under-eye darkness, but this is great for everything else. It doesn't feel heavy or clog my pores.

reviews.review_title: I must not be using it right.
reviews.review_text: When I use this; my boyfriend thinks I look 'wrinkley' under/around my eyes.

reviews.review_title: Why did they change the container?
reviews.review_text: I love this make up and would normally give it a 5 star. They have changed the container and it is difficult to open - a lot of make up is left in the container because you can't pull the top off. Change it back!

I have dry skin, but still need powder over my moisturizer to make sure I don't get too shiny. I thought this was just like any other powder but it's definitely not. It feels creamy and extremely lightweight, leaving a slightly dewy/glow-like finish. I also love the fact that it has SPF. I am now obsessed with this foundation and have gotten two friends (one combo skin, one oily/acne), both my sisters (one oily, one oily/acne), AND my mom (combo/aging) to switch over to Bare Minerals. It honestly works on all skin types!

The coveage is good, and it makes skin look healthy. BUT, contrary to the videos claims, it can't be used as a concealor if you need any real concealor coverage(dark circles or redness from acne). And maybe my skin is just weird, but I was classed as a neutral... So I tried the fairly light and it's too pink toned for my skin, then i tried medium beige and it's too orangey for my skin. I guess I need to go get my skin tone re-evaluated.

This foundation gives me a natural skin look. People comment I have gorgeous skin when I'm wearing it. I have good skin that I take care of but I do not have pefect skin. I am very pale with under eye circles and I have the ocassional breakout I need to cover up.
I love this foundation! I have oily/acne prone skin & it has great coverage without being cakey. I made my sister try it & she has really dry skin & she loves it too!

i have noticeable pores and blemishes, and this makeup does wonders in covering it all. i do also have sensitivity to all other makeup cause of the chemicals in them and my face starts to itch anytime i dont wear anything that is not natural. once i tried this i was hooked. face looks very even with no blemishes or pores and best of all i dont feel it. wonderful foundation!!!

reviews.review_title: Didn't think I'd like it, BUT...
reviews.review_text: I really love this foundation. The trick is correct application. You really can't just dust it on like you do loose powder, you really have to work it into your skin. According to bareMinerals, the product works by blending with your skin's natural oils, so it's important to take some time with the buffing process. My only real complaint is that the process does take time (if you use both the foundation and mineral veil, which I recommend as it smooths everything out and makes your skin look more uniform). All in all I will continue to use bareMinerals because of how great my complexion looks!
love this lightweight full coverage foundation. I have used this for years and my skin loves it also. I purchase a lighter shade to mix with my darker shades for winter when I am not tanning as much
Bought this color for my daughter. But I love the product as well. I have vitaligo and I can get coverage without the cakey look useing the right tools and layering two colors.
the best foundation - goes on really well and doesn't clog stuff up!

reviews.review_title: Love it! No other mineral foundation compares.
reviews.review_text: Have used this foundation for 8 years now and plan to use it forever. Foundation itself is smooth and provides whatever level of coverage needed based on amount used, and with the special cover-up brush, it is the best touch-up for any discolorations, including acne breakouts.
Whenever I am in foundation doubt, this is my go-to.
Love the natural coverage.
Great coverage, illuminates skin and feels like you're wearing nothing.

I have been wearing this for awhile, and it still is just as good as I expect. I have to switch my colors with the seasons and that can get kind of tricky finding the right shade. I have Fairly Medium now, and that seems to work well with my olive toned skin that looks pretty pale in the winter. Goes on even and covers well.
This product conceals my face' red and dark spots. A foundation and concealer in one!

I have oilyish skin that can be sensitive and redish. Every liquid make-up I tried, even if oil control, by about half way through the day my skin was oily. I do not use much of the product, just a light dusting of the regular foundation and the mineral veil. It covers my red cheeks well, doesn't bother my sensitive skin, and doesn't make my face oily by the end of the day. I would not recommend this to people with dry skin, however with me the natural oils in my face mix with the foundation and give me a dewy look, which I love. I get complements on my make up all the time...people don't even realize I have powder on! I have read the reviews and I can see that this product is not for everyone, however, it works for me.
always have, always will. the key is finding the correct shade

I have been using BE for over 5 years now and I have not even thought once about switching my founation. The Warm Tan color is right on point and I love how natural it looks. I suggest that anyone who hasn't tried this product to take the plunge.. you will not regret it!
This product which was an impulse buy caused my face to itch like crazy...perhaps it doesn't match my skin chemistry.

reviews.review_title: Used to be a favorite but not any more
reviews.review_text: Been using BE for 6 years and I used to love it. Not any more. So much seems to have changed -- formulation, packaging -- and it just does my skin no justice.  Cakey? Yes.  Drying? Yes.  Irritating? Mildly so, yes. Probably a reaction to the bismuth oxychloride (a by-product of lead and copper refining and NOT directly from the earth, as the marketing department would have you believe).  Stuffed with unusable filler? I don't know what's happened, but each time I open up a new container, I see more and more of those tiny hard balls that seem to just take up space and waste my money on product that isn't actually usable.  Accentuates pores? Sure does. Like a giant shining spotlight. And I have dry skin!  So, off I go to find its replacement.

Now, I tried to matte version before (I got a free sample, good thing) and it really didn't impress me. My face looked dull and flat and too powdery for my liking (I like when skin looks more on the luminous side). This is perfect! It doesn't accentuate my visible pores and my face looks totally and completely natural. My skin is also a tiny bit uneven and it helps with that also. Trust me, you will not look like you're wearing makeup when you wear this foundation, trust me. You just look like you have better skin. My mom uses this too, granted she's older, but her skin looks great with it too. It's sheer-to-medium coverage, so if you have the most awful, red, nasty pimply skin, I'm not sure if it will work for you. But definitely try it out, I'm very happy I did :)
love bareminerals! Have been a long time costumer and I'm never let down!
I liked this color with my light/olive skin.

I love love love this powder foundation! I have been using this stuff for a year now. I ordered this product online and just guessed what shade I would be by looking at the swatches, and since I believed I was a medium, I ordered and voila! It was perfect. It's very easy and goof-proof to use, doesn't look like you are packing on the facial makeup and doesn't look fake at all.I like to brush this on my face with my sephora powder brush. I would highly recommend this product to everyone!

I have been using bareMinerals for 6 years now. I have tried all the expensive brands and I love this foundation. I am hooked and won't use anything else. I love the natural coverage. It makes your skin look radiant.

So I've tried all of the well-known make-up brands, expensive and cheap, but bare minerals has been, by far, THE best foundation I have ever used. If you're like me and hate the cake-y look you get with M.A.C. (and not to mention the clogged pores and breakouts after), but think that something like the laura mercier tinted moisturizer is too sheer to be useful, than THIS is the product for you.  Before I started using this product, I didn't have horrible skin, but I had a few breakouts every now and then, especially on my chin and around my mouth. Everything I tried was just worsening my slight acne. So I started using bare minerals every morning (and the trick is to apply light coverage with a kabuki brush, wait five minutes, and if you want more coverage, then apply more), and I was happy to find that my face wasn't oily or in need of a touch up at all by night time. Ever since I've used this product (about 5 months now), I've had super soft, clear skin. When I told my sister about this, she started using it too and it worked for her as well! Her skin is acne free and we both swear by this powder now. And the best part is, it looks like you don't have any foundation on and your complexion is naturally even - several people have complimented me saying this too. This is a must buy! :)
I love this foundation and the sales associate helped me find a great match to my skin color.
Best foundation out there, period. Try it if you haven't, you won't be disappointed!

this foundation is my best! i love how it doesnt look unnatural while at the same time gives good coverage. it is a perfect color and is easy to apply. i also like that there's no foundation face after i've put it on, meaning that there isnt a line where i stopped putting it on. it just blends in so nicely! this product is well worth the $ and a great foundation for probably any skin type. i am so glad i bought it.
Best foundation I have ever used
I love this product. It is so user friendly & gives a finished & polished look to everyday life as well as dressier occasions

I love this makeup...had no problems ordering online and my order came quickly. No complaints here! I recommend everyone try this stuff - so light-weight and easy to apply...and no makeup lines - woohoo!

I love the original version of this - the matte just doesn't give the glow that this does.  I'm still a little on the fence about the new sifter, but the product rocks and lasts for like 6 months. I only have to use this once a day and it lasts. It doesn't irriate my skin, it gives great coverage when needed, and it simply the greatest investment I ever made in my skin. Everyone should try this at least once. You'll never go back to liquid.

I'm sure that most people have tried this by now. We all know that it has fabulous coverage and blends well with skin. The only issue I have with it is the price. I still buy the foundation from Sephora, but have started purchasing the mineral veil and bronzer (minerals) from stores like Wal Mart from the Maybeline line. I know that sounds cheap, but I get the same look and I'm not paying $25 + $19 + whatever the bronzer costs, every time I need foundation.

I like that this product lets my face breathe. However, it is extremely messy since it is loose powder. And, if you're not careful and put too much on, you'll get this weird cakey look especially if your skin is on the dry side. Other than that, a decent product.
I have used Bare Minerals for about 5 yrs and it's the best foundation I have ever tried. Leaves your skin looking flawless and i always get to many compliments about how amazing my skin looks.

I always go back to this foundation. I love that it's a matte finish. I tried to go back to the original bare mineral foundation and it was just way to shiny. I really like the coverage of this foundation and a little goes a looooong way. I think each container lasts me at least 6-7 mo.

I have a super fair complexion and I've struggled with finding a foundation that matches my skin tone for years. Both liquids and powders were always too orange or too pink. I finally tried BM and I was so pleased with how well it blends with my pale skin! And I'm now a believer in the natural mineral formula. It's gentle and my sensitive skin has never felt better. I'm hooked on their whole line of products now!
The new sifter lids adds to an already wonderful product!!!
I have used hte bareMineral products for quite a while now & love them. They are perfect for any complexion.
Thank you for the opportunity to say that I love Bare Escentuals/BareMinerals Foundation. It has wonderful coverage without feeling made up. It does the best job of covering up my racoon eyes.
Easy to apply,natural look and that's all we need!

I LOVE this foundation. It covers really naturally and it doesn't even feel as though you have anything on your face. It's just smooth and actually feels softer after applying it. The whole bareMinerals/BareEcentuals line is wonderful!! I'm completely hooked!

reviews.review_title: I'll never use another mineral product!
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying bareMinerals. I must say, There really is a difference! I've tried other mineral products and didn't really notice a difference from liquid makeup until this. I also purchased bareMinerals mineral veil. I will definitely continue to use these quality products!
Natural and subtle enough to be used as a daily make-up. I can even cover up some of dark spots using this.
I absolutely love this stuff!!!! My skin feels so great like I'm wearing nothing at all. Doesn't look cakey or dry, blends perfectly with my skin... LOVE IT.. I'm a fan for life!

I just wanted to let you all know that you can open the new Bare Minerals containers (Click - Lock - Go) from the bottom in order to get out the last little bit or make your own mixture.  Just turn your container over (close it first) and there should be what looks like a full plastic circle (goes almost to the edge of the container) and it will have an edge that sticks up - use something to pry underneath that edge (tweezers, spoon, etc) and it will pop out.
I love this foundation. I especially love the new closure that helps to keep it from spilling out. Have loved it from day one when I first tied it and will continue to use it.
I have been using this product for several years It is so light, yet covers well. No more sticky, heavy foundation that rubs off on my collars!
Awesome, full coverage and I don't feel like I am wearing any makeup. Face looks flawless.
Love this stuff! Covers all my pimples and under eye circles and does not make me break out. Plus, love having that SPF! Excellent stuff.

I never thought I would like a powder product, especially since I'm older with fine lines that powders tend to highlight. But, this product was great for covering what I want covered, and did not lay in the wrinkles. I think wearing the foundation primer really helps. I like that the product is paraben free. This stays put all day, unlike many liquid foundations I have used.
During the winter months I use this over my foundation and it provides a smooth coverage. During the summer months I use it by itself, because of the high humidity. It provides a nice coverage.

I loved the look, but the feel is so terrible it's a NO-GO!  I gave Feedback directly to Bare Escentuals and a BE REP e-mailed me back and even admitted that due to heat or activity this may cause such sensations as burning and itching. Ok, so if hundreds of people are complaining about the same thing you would think that they would address the issue and come up with a new formula?  Google Bare Escentuals reviews and you will find hundreds of the same complaint. This make-up is NOT good with heat, even if you are in the sun for only 5 minutes. Heat and just a little sweat will make this make-up BURN and ITCH!!!! It makes me want to rip my face off! It's really drying and not moisurizing at all. I have tried the Primer and it burns too!
love this foundation. Have been using it for about 8 years now. tried some other brands, but always come back to this one. it is much smoother and the colors are better

This is the best foundation ever. At least for me. I've been using Bare Minerals for almost 5 years now. I've tried other mineral foundations, but they just don't compare. I have blotchy skin and this stuff hides and evens everything out so well. And it doesn't cake or settle into lines like a lot of foundations do. And it lasts all day.

I've tried this product many times before at the Sephora store, and in Bare Minerals lightest shade Fair. the texture was great, and left a light, natural look to my skin. But the color was to dark on me!! I wish Bare Minerals would come out with a lighter shade! then i would DEFINANTLY buy this!!!!!! But, it is the BEST powder foundation I have ever used, sooo if your not super pale like me u should try this!!!! I WISH I COULD USE THIS!!
After trying several other mineral powders I am back to bareminerals. Much better coverage and colors.

I got this a few days ago and i absolutely love BareMinerals. It covers very nicely for people with blemishes and it doesn't look fake like liquid foundation looks. I LOVE IT. I will never go back to my old stuff. It's a little pricey but worth it in the long run.
I've been using this foundation for over a year && I will never go back. Its on the pricey side, but definitely worth it.
I've been using this powder foundation for a few years, and I love it . . . and now that the new 'lid' can open or close, it's even better! Good job Sephora and Bare Escentuals!!!
Stupid title I know! I just love the Bare Escentuals make up. I was a Merle Norman customer for 15 years and I needed something easier to apply and blend in my busy life!
Best foundation I have ever used.
always greeted nice and very nice people that help you with any questions you have on a product. Thank you Darlene

reviews.review_title: Best finishing powder and a staple to my regimen.
reviews.review_text: I need extra coverage so I use a liquid foundation and then apply this BE foundation over for maximum coverage and even out my skin tone. The golden medium is the perfect shade and its perfection every time. One of my can not live without products. For more subtle days when I'm at home, I just apply this by itself. It's better than bare skin as it blocks out free radicals of the environment from seeping into my skin. Now with the new sifter, how can this get any better? Love Bare Minerals for life!

i went to the bare escentuals store 3 times to find the right foundation shade and none of them matched my skin. finally i decided to try sephoa. the makeup artist there found my perfect shade. i also like the fact that sephoa offers a money back guarantee.

This product is absolutley phenominal! My face was red and pimply and I needed something to cover it up but not to make me look so fake. All of my friends told me to try it because it was amazing. I bought it and went home and immeadietly tried it. I was blown away with my results! It made me look so natural and flawless! I reccomend this to anyone.

reviews.review_title: Love the coverage, packaging not as shown
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage. Very natural and long lasting. However, the packaging was not the same as shown, so using the product is somewhat messy and wasteful.
I've loved this make up since the first time I tried it. I've tried cheaper brands of mineral powders but none match the light, clean feeling on my face that I get from bare ecccentuals.

I decided to try out this product because it got so many great reviews. I was debating between this and the Temptu and when I tried both in store- I was sold by the BE one. It provides AMAZING coverage, looks great in photos, and goes on so smoothly! STRONGLY RECOMMENDED. I use Med. Beige, which is probably the most common color.

I had always wanted to try this product, but never got around to it. It is FULLY worth every penny, it lasts all day, it looks fantastic, I never worry about it, I look younger and fresher, it's just amazing and I recommend it completely! If yo don't like it, then you must be applying it incorrectly.
Three years ago, I had serious acne problems. When I started using this foundation, it completely cleared up! I love that it covers everything without looking heavy. Love this foundation!
I love this product. It looks natural and feel good on my skin.

Love this makeup!! I have acne prone skin with a lot of scarring and it really covers well. It is very gentle and does not irritate my skin and I love it. I have tried other foundation but always come back to BE.
This gives amazing coverage as well as feeling like I'm not wearing any make up at all. I feel totally secure wearing this no matter the weather I know it will stay just where I put it.
I love this foundation! I get the light coverage I need without a heavy look or feel. I have received more compliments on my skin since starting this makeup than I ever did before.
This is an amazing foundation. Lightweight but really helps your skin look wonderful. Love it.

I love BM and have gotten many friends hooked, as well. Great, natural coverage. Haven't had any issues w/break-outs or irritation. And w/the magical concealer brush, gives you great spot coverage. But had to write and say how much I love the new packaging. No more leaking and wasted powder. About time! Thank you!! Now if they could only do this for the to-go kit...

This product is a MUST HAVE! It provides the coverage that I need, as well as providing a flawless finish. The new lid allows me to shake out just the right amount with no waste. No beauty routine is complete without it!!
I like how it matches my skin tone so well and gives a real natural look.
Bare Minerals covers my rosacea without clogging my pores. I get compliments all the time on my beautiful complexion which is amazing after years of being embarrassed about the rosacea. I love it!

I cannot say enough about this foundation. I am very fair skinned and it is hard for me to find a color that matches without looking like I am wearing makeup. Also, it does not clog my pores and cause breakouts. I wish they had this product back when I was in high school. This gives me that finished, glowing, natural look. I love it! Except no substitutes.

reviews.review_title: Perfection in a small plastic container
reviews.review_text: Love this shade! I recently started tanning and this shade works perfectly with my skin tone. It covers well and gives me the right amount of color without looking like an Ooma Loompa.

reviews.review_title: Great color, not so great texture
reviews.review_text: I've been using BE for years and have always enjoyed it. This particular foundation is a great color, but its texture is terrible. The powder comes out in small clumps. It's not nearly as fine in texture as other BE foundations. I don't know if this was a weird batch or what, but I'll think twice before buying BE foundations again.

I always walk into a make-up store dreaming of walking home with the perfect, MIRACLE product. Especially mascara, foundation, and shampoo. Well I found the foundation! About three years ago, I told a rep at Sephora how sick I was of pounding cream or liquid foundation over my super dry face and how thick and heavy it feels. I don't even really need foundation, to be honest, but I have some redness on my eyelids and discoloration and because my skin's so dry, I want to have that glow. So anyway, long story short, she put this on my face and I was sold! Haven't used any other foundation for my face since. People are saying Korres is pretty good but I don't really want to switch. It's like I've built a loyalty for this product.  Feels so light, gives my face a glow, one box lasts me at least 2-3 months. Covers under eye circles, blemishes, redness, pimples. The handy buki brush is the perfect applicator. I love, love, LOOOVE this product so much. Did it change my life? Yeah it did actually!

As a liquid foundation user, I was worried this won't give me enough coverage. But I was so wrong. A friend of mine recommended this to me b/c she said it's not heavy like liquid foundations, does good coverage and is good for every day wearing.  I'm a big fan of looking natural in foundation, not cakey not fake.
