I also have very sensitive skin so I definitely have to do face mask and all that whenever I wear foundation all day (it clogs up my pores, even with primer etc).  Go for this! I highly recommend this if you have oily skin as well. I find that because of the cream/powder base it sucks up the oil in my skin, making it last all day even without primer. It looks really natural and blends in with my skin. Go into the skin and have an associate pick out the color for you. I was given the medium toned color even though my skin is really light. And it blends out perfectly when I put it on! I wouldn't have even though that I should use medium toned one without speaking with a sales associate first.
I tried other brands and went back to Bare Escentuals!
I've used Bare Escentuals foundation for 3 years now and love it. it doesn't dry out my skin, blends smoothly and doesn't leave lots of make up residue on my turtlenecks and coat collars.
I was so unsure to try this but I love bare minerals. You never look like your makeup is caked on and it really does cover blemishes. Highly recommend it.

I have been using this product for over two years. I first got the starter kit because it came with all of the brushes. As far as using the brushes, I only use the concealer brush and the kabuki brush.  The foundation is extremely lightweight, doesn't leave creases (or that nasty ring around your face), you don't need very much to cover your whole face (but it's so light that it's easy to go overboard), and it doesn't cause breakouts.  I've been in emergency situations where I haven't had my bare minerals with me and ha to settle fr a drug store foundation. There is a huge difference, you literally cannot feel bare minerals on your face,. and it feels so natural.  I suggest this to all of my friends!

As I've got very fair skin, I ALWAYS have a difficult time finding makeup that doesn't make my pink/blue based skin look orange or yellow. I had been interested in trying bareMinerals for a very long time, but somehow never got around to it. But I am SO glad I did!  As a girl who usually always despises wearing a full face of makeup, (especially one that's unnatural and cake-y) this is AWESOME for me. Very lightweight, natural-looking and awesome for my baby-sensitive skin! Buy this, you won't be let down!

This foundations is wonderful. It does a great job of evening out my skin tone, it blends into skin seamlessly and I love how smooth it makes my skin look. If you use too much, it will rub off but a little goes a long way. Since I've started using it, my skin has actually improved. It's radiant!

I've been using this for years and I love how little I have to use to even out my skin tone - without clogging any pores or feeling like I'm painting on my face. I never have to worry about blending - it's so natural looking. Love the built in SPF - great coverage.

reviews.review_title: The Best Foundation for your skin.
reviews.review_text: In the past, I usually looked bast bareMinerals SPF15 Foundation, assuming that it would not work for my skin since I usually have dry skin and live in a country with a cold climate. I also could not fathom the idea of a powdered foundation properly covering up any blemishes. However, I received a mini trial sample with a kabuki brush in the Fairly Light shade, and decided to try it on even though I have a medium skin tone. To say I was impressed would be an understatement.  The coverage is simply flawless. It leaves your skin tone looking even and feeling smooth, and stays on even after applying blush and bronzer, something I feel most liquid foundations fail to do. It also gives you an overall NATURAL glow.  I first used an SPF lotion all over my face (Clinique's SPF 50) before applying bareMineral's original foundation. To get the most of the product, simply empty some of the power in the lid and twirl your brush on it. The foundation immediately catches on and then you can spread it across your face in a circular motion.  I felt that this product also absorbed the shine and left my face looking less greasy. I did not need to use a loose powder to get rid of it like I usually would. The blush I used after putting this foundation on was Make Up Forever's cream blush and the bronzer was Too Face'd Sun Bunny bronzer.  Although other reviewers say that the shades available are poor, I believe otherwise. It is better to use a lighter shade because it gives your skin a glow while also lifting the color a little. My skin also felt great, smooth and there were noticeably less blemishes on my face days after I used this product.  I am definitely going to purchase this product and use it as my main foundation. For the excellent quality, it is worth much more than $28 CAD!
.... I were to be stranded on a deserted island, and I only had one thing to bring...this would be IT!!!

I'm not sure what it is, but I couldn't get this to look good no matter what I tried. I got the Golden Light which seemed to be a good color match, but it wore off early in the day and accentuated pores. It just never enhanced my complexion at all. I even tried it with the BE primer (which I like) and the Sephora mineral brush (which is awesome) but still no luck.
This is the first and only foundation I'll ever buy for my girls when they are ready. I love the application, feel and results it gives.

First of all, I have oily skin and I've never had a problem just throwing powder on and going. But I really don't like this product in Original or Matte. It makes my skin look disgusting. Like I have not put moisturizer on my face since forever and it's winter time and peeling disgusting.  I don't really like their color choices either. I love Bare products and used to work for them. It looks beautiful on most people, and I very much appreciate their products and how far they've come and how they created the Mineral rave, but it's not for me. It's really worth giving it a try.
I just love your makeup. Some makeup makes your face feel so heavy Not your stuff.. Love Love it..

This foundation covers everything!! I bought it right before I went on a road trip to FL. I drove straight down, no hotels or anything, and omg, my face was a disaster!! Since I couldn't was my face I put this on top of old flaky makeup (gross, I know!), and vola! My skin looked close to perfect! I had the hugest dark circles on the planet (movies, driving and no sleep will do that to you!!!), and they covered up nicely! I was so pleased I could move on with the day looking good! :) Love Bare Minerals!!!

I've gone to so many derms, used tazorac, epiduo and everything OTC for what they called the most difficult kind of acne to treat (white bumps/clogged pores all over chin). the derm said try this foundation; I resisted for a while but now that I have my skin is already changing...I can't believe my TM or reg foundations (LM, Dior, Chanel, BB) could have contributed....but it clearly has, because my skin is finally, FINALLY starting to calm down. I love the coverage (don't like the matte one, though) and love that it lasts all day. I'm a believer now.
Does any other foundation go on so easily and look so good? Highly doubt it! It's the perfect backdrop.

I have been using fare BareMinerals, and I have been loving it since three years ago. I newly discovered the Matte, and it's more suitable for people seeking a more intense cover up for redness, possible acne, etc. I love it all!
I'm loving the bareMinerals! This is my second jar of the foundation. Color (med. beige) is perfect for me! And...it stays fresh looking all day long!
this is awesome. i have tried others but i always go back it is great.it makes your face feel silky.

I bought this foundation a while ago and just started using it again, but i really like using it as conceler for redness/blemishes because it doesnt wear off during the day and covers pretty nicely. I was wondering if there was another bare minerals product that would be better for conceler for blemishes. Still this is a nice product.
Starting Using BareMinerals 5 Years ago and complexion cleared fine lines faded and everyone noticed

reviews.review_title: love the powder hate the new container
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for many years and just love it but I really hate this new container..The powder gets stuck in it and when there is not a lot of product left you cannot get that out therefore you are putting it in the trash. Please change the container......and make a bigger size!

reviews.review_title: A free sample has become another
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years and been very happy with it. As one of my free samples, I chose the Sephora brand primer, WOW!! Mae my way to the local mall right away! I won't go without this wonderful new find!!

Ever since I started using Bar Minerals a couple years ago, I haven't gone back. You can wear it lightly, or layer it on for more coverage. I also use it for concealer. My skin has some texture to it and some pretty bad adult acne, but it's always done it's job covering and not clogging. I wish I had discovered this when I was a makeup artist, I would have used it all the time!

My skin is aging and do to hormone issues is worse than a teenagers! I used to wear makeup only on weekends and had an awful time with monthly breakouts. A month ago I started wearing atleast the foundation and mineral veil for the SPF protection, but found it is controlling my terribly sensitive and breakout prone skin. I love it and will continue to wear it daily.

First time user and delighted with the results. Was looking for something suitable for use daily and the product delivers. Offers a light flawless finish that lasts all day. Container smaller than expected but a little goes a long way.
I really like the powder. However, I couldn't find a shade for my skin tone and I'm not going to buy 2 shades to mix. I don't have time to mess with that.

reviews.review_title: This is the best for year around use
reviews.review_text: This looks great when used with the faux tan in the summer its better than the fair which is slightly yellow. This has more of a pink undertone so you can wear it all year round.  You have to try the summer bisque concealer it works really well to cover acne and dark circles. They have a bisque which is a lighter color concealer but for some reason I think the summer bisque blends better. I also use the summer bisque and faux tan with the medium beige towards the end of summer.
excellent coverage. light feel. the only foundation i use!

I've always had a lot of acne and i noticed that since i switched to this foundation as opposed to my usual liquid that my acne has gotten a lot better. i would like a better coverage, though, and sometimes the sparkly pieces of the foundation get caught under my eyes and around my nose

I have been using this product for almost 5 years. I am completly happy with it and recommend this to everyone I know. I have not had a blemish since I have switched to bareMinerals. Also this makeup will last me almost 6 months which is a great value.
I love the new twisting lock for the powder. It definitely makes the makeup last even longer!
Love this product! actually reduces the size of pores and hides imperfections/discolorations. The condition of my skin has also improved- more hydrated. my skin has a glow! Great Value too!

Always adored this product...but was constantly wanting a less messy container...finally....my wish was granted...and now its a 10 plus product...when it says flawless...its exactly correct....nothing beats this product...and believe me...I have not tried all....but almost all....you can not go wrong....
You can wear this sheer for day or build it up for more matte coverage for night. I love the healthy look and feel of my skin plus it lasts through moderate exercise! Very true to color.

LOVE this product! This is the first time every I've had a makeup that feels and looks natural on my skin. It lasts all day without melting off and covers my flaws nicely. I can't believe I waited this long to finally try it. Definitely worth the investment.
This shade is a perfect shade if you are medium to fair and want a bronzed look!

reviews.review_title: Can a makeup get any better than this??
reviews.review_text: If I could give any advice on external beauty, it would be to pick up this foundation. I am generally not the type of person who will go out of my way to review a product. However, being that I am extremely satisfied with my purchase I am doing so. Not to be over the top, I can truly say that the product changed my life. Not only did I finally find a coverage that works and looks natural, the product has improved the overall quality of my skin. Oh, forgot to mention if I pass out without washing my face I am not concerned with clogged pores or scared to look in the mirror in the morning. Truly a remarkable product.

reviews.review_title: Great coverage with a natural finish
reviews.review_text: This foundation looks so natural while providing great coverage. After two applications, my skin is still able to breathe, which I love! Also, a little goes a long way, so the price is very reasonable. If you're someone who loves the natural look with little makeup, then this is a must buy!
One of the best products I have acquired recently. Easy to use, looks natural - which is perfect for daytime and professional business use. Will definitely add this one to my must buy list.
This is a tried and true product. I love having discovered it!
most awesome foundation and I've tried most. keeps your skin flawless and without fine lines !

I have been using this foundation for 6 years now and it is my absolute favorite. Soon after I started using it my sister and sister-in-law both purchased because they saw how beautiful and flawless it made my skin appear. I have combination skin so I have a hard time finding a foundation that won't make my skin greasy or accentuate the dry spots and wrinkles, but this works wonders for my complexion. The only suggestions I have for anyone using this makeup is to be sure to exfoliate your face before applying it and use the BareEscentuals Baby Buki brush for the best results. I have noticed that if I have dry, flaky skin it stands out when I wear this, but if I exfoliate (facial cleanser on a washcloth is usually sufficient) my skin appears flawless and healthy. I love that it doesn't take much to get superior coverage that lasts all day. It is so clean and light that I am able to sleep with it on and not get any blemishes. Phenomenal product, I recommend it to everyone!!!

Wish I had this option when I was in my teens and 20's-i would have had better skin protection. It is the best mineral make up, and I have tried a number of them. U can also use a makeup sponge for excellent -Just don't use much makeup and the coverage is phenomenal

Basically in my opinion if you're looking for a full coverage I wouldn't be able to recommend this. Just this past year I was battling acne due to my IUD that I had inserted a few years ago. It got to the point to where I was getting cystic acne and I tried everything and I mean every kind of foundation there was to cover it up without looking heavy. I tried BareMinerals and covered it okay. I was looking for something with a fuller coverage. I discontinued the use of this foundation for a whole year until my skin started to clear up again after I discontinued the IUD. This foundation is all I use now. I still need medium coverage for my scars that are slowly going away and this does the trick without making me look like I have too much on. I also recommend the bisque to cover up those red spots. I highly recommend this foundation if you're looking for light to medium coverage.
Loves it! I only wish I hadn't waited so long to try it!

I so badly wanted this to work after reading all of the glowing reviews on this and similar BE products. However, for my skin tone there is not perfect color match. I'm very fair, but something was off about the lightest shade. Switching to the second lightest shade was too dark. I also noticed caking, but had not started using a primer at this point. I would suggest this product to someone who doesn't have incredibly fair skin because it felt great and gives a healthy glow. I would also suggest using a primer because it helps make loose powders look much more natural. The BE primer is great!

reviews.review_title: Not bad for my first real foundation...
reviews.review_text: I tried this product in college but I wasn't really ready for foundation and sent it back. Now I wanted something to smooth my pores and hide a few small acne scars, and this (in conjunction with the B.E. concealer) seems to be doing the trick. I've always been called high yellow, and, indeed, the Golden Medium shade seems to work well for me in general, but not ALL of my face is yellow, so the parts that are pinkish or tanned (like my nose or cheeks) tend to look a little strange until I also apply an All Over Face Color on them as I would blush (I'm actually mixing the two tones that came as a Valentine's Gift, which alone would be too dark and the other too pink, but together they worked fine-AFTER I got the hang of the application process).  If you don't REALLY want to use foundation, I recommend a tinted moisurizer (I do like the new Philosophy Hope in a Tinted Moisturizer) and perhaps a little B.E. Mineral Veil (I chose the B.E. Brightening Gold Duo), and skip this foundation or you might end up with more make-up layers (e.g. plus blush) than you're used to or desire.

i use fairly light on days when i'm just running errands or going to class, etc. it provides good coverage and doesn't feel heavy on my skin, nor does it make me break out, but it photographs HORRIBLY and if i'm wearing this in pictures i might as well just not be wearing foundation at all - it usually looks fine in person, though. during the winter, my skin gets dry and this foundation really accentuates that.
Hve always loved bare Minerals good cover, helps my skin stay breakout free
I am fair with blonde hair and use this foundation. It brightens my skin and looks great.

I've been using bareMinerals for yeras. I love how it covers everything and makes my skin feel like nothing is on it. I tried switching brands when everyone elsed started with mineals, but the product was not good. The foundation shades couldn't be matched. I will be a bareMinerals user for life.  Mary Lee Rooney, Louisiana

reviews.review_title: Oh how I missed you bareMinerals
reviews.review_text: Ok, I honestly forgot how much I love this stuff. I stopped using it for a while when I was using lots of medications on my face and it flaked a lot. Now I can use this foundation again, and I love the way it feels and the way it looks. Pretty good coverage, and if you need more coverage using the concealer brush with the foundation works pretty good if you're in a pinch.

reviews.review_title: Don't know what i'd do without you!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE the bareMinerals original foundation! I've struggled with acne and very sensitive skin my whole life. This product lets my skin breath naturally and unlike other powdered foundations, it doesn't leave my make up looking like it was caked on. After one year i've noticed an absolute 180 with my skin.
I have been using bareminerals for about 5 years. i love what it does for my sking and how light it is. And so easy to use. Also very easy to travel with, it is not a liquid.

I have a male friend that analyzes EVERYTHING - down to an eyelash out of place :) During a recent conversation, he mentioned how a date got make-up on his shirt and how he feels that less or no make-up at all is better - like me. Boy was he in SHOCK when I told him that I wear bareMinerals!!! His response after a moment of silence, But I can see your freckles.. - Classic!! I luv this stuff :)

This stuff is AMAZING!! The best type of foundation that doesnt feel caked on...it defintely feels like you, and fits into my quick morning routine. I love this product and would never change it for the world!
I love the new click lid to keep my powder from spilling all over. This product works as well for me as it always has.
I just love bareMinerals products - they are simply the best!!
awesome foundation...just makes me GLOW~~
It is the best foundation that I have ever used. I have been a believer for 3 years now. I won't purchase anything else!!!

reviews.review_title: Couldn't ask for a better makeup
reviews.review_text: I have been a faithful Bare Minerals customer for three years now. This makeup is the only one I have ever found that matches my extremely fair skintone without looking too yellow. It's very light and natural, and doesn't come off on clothes as much as some liquid makeups do. I am never going back to my old makeup!
love this stuff it feels so light on my skin

reviews.review_title: finally found what i've been looking for!
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product. for the past few years ive been searching for the ideal product for my sensitive skin. My skin doesnt have many flaws, but it isnt perfect either. Ive tried liquid foundation and i hate it. Its also tedius to put on every morning. Ive also tried pressed powder but I could never find the perfect shade for me. It also looks unnatural most of the time and i find myself reapplying it many times during the day.  i was interested in trying mineral foundation and i chose bareMinerals. makeup-wise, it was probably the best decision ive made. They have different shades to choose from (im a medium tan) and its very quick and easy to apply while leaving a natural finish. Since ive been using this product, i have NEVER had to reapply it during the day. it lasts all day even during the days where I sweat. Like ive said before, it looks really natural too. people have been complimenting me on my skin saying it is flawless which indeed, it isnt. I guess this makeup is pretty much doing its job if people say that! Theyre also shocked when I tell them that im wearing makeup because it doesnt look like it. That is what a foundation SHOULD do :)

I loved this item. Just make sure you use it with a soft brush. It was an easy way to apply makeup when you dont want to spend so much time putting it on. I dont like the primer that Bare Essentials sells so I would try something else. It lasts for a while too. I definitely dont have to reapply for hours.

Made me breakout, after using urban decay(which worked pretty good) i wanted to try a different mineral powder so i went for BM this made me breakout in small little pimples and the shade is much tanner then my skin tone i have a yellow undertone and the(golden color) seems to have a pink under tone.Horrible product over all, returning it.

I'll never forget the year I first bought bareminerals... it was 5 years ago when I was in 10th grade, when most girls are packing on concealer and eye makeup. I recieved so many compliments from girls my age and even my friends parents. I've been loyal to bareminerals ever since... the makeup really does provide great coverage while looking natural and giving you a glow. In no way will you look like you caked on liquid makeup. One tip I have is to use a spot concealer on troubled areas (for me, pimples usually leave red marks that last about 3-6 months) I dot concealer on these spots first, then use medium beige foundation, warmth, and tinted veil. best ever!!

This makes my skin look beautiful! I'm extremely acne prone and this is the only foundation I've found that doesn't make me break out. It also provides a good amount of coverage. I still need a concealer but bare minerals covers a LOT. The only issue I have with it is the container- even with the new lockable sifter I feel like a lot of powder gets wasted from the packaging and the way that you dump it out and swirl it around.

I got the starter kit last month. Before this product, I always had the problem of overdoing it. Bare Escentuals is easy to use. I m happy with the coverage and more happy that it doesn't look like I am trying to cover anything up. My husband even noticed the improvement. I noticed recently that I also have less skin problems. So yeah, the commercials mention skin improvements and it is not just advertising. This make up improves the skin too.
Use it every day! Have for years. Will continue to use for years. Never feels like I have anything on, yet covers blemishes and uneven skin color.

reviews.review_title: Good lightweight coverage for oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this foundation mostly in the spring/summer when the humidity sets in and my skin is oily. Good coverage and while when you first put it on it looks like it is just sitting on top of your skin and a bit powdery, give it an hour and it will sink into the skin just fine and lasts most of the day. Coverage is good. I have old acne scars and this product does a good job of covering them without having to add a blemish concealer underneath it.

This foundation is very hard to match if you have a Yellow under-tone. I have tried two different shades: golden dark and medium dark and both shades were too dark for my skin. I went to Sephora and the wonderful make up artist was mixing colors for a half hour trying to find a good shade, with no luck...No foundation should be this difficult to find a match for. Obviously, Bare Escentuals/Minerals is missing out on a large number of consumers.  Unfortunate, because it feels good, but does not look good.

I've been using BE foundation for years and I might go and try something new but always come back. I have very acne prone sensitive skin and this does a great job with out cakey coverage. Bare Minerals never lets me down!

I love this foundation! I'm pretty sure I have reviewed this several times (this being the 5th one I've purchased), but I always seem to find a new reason to love this product. I recently had an allergic reaction and broke out in a hideous rash all over my face - this foundation covered everything!! Lightweight and buildable coverage, no irritation, long-lasting, and luminous finish. The only foundation I will ever use!
this goes on perfect, gives a soft finish and stays fresh all day
I've been using this foundation since first introduced several years ago. The SPF really works and the coverage is natural but still complete.

I don't care to wear a liquid foundation, but I do need to even out my skin tone a bit when applying my makeup. This product does it all in one step, and feels weightless on your skin. It's easy to match your skin tone and maintian a natural, flawless look.
I was using L'Oreal minerals before. This product is lighter. Not as much coverage - but it looks more natural. Love the brushes!
I went from liquid foundation to bare minerals about 5 years ago and I haven't looked back. This is an awesome coverage. Love this makeup!!! My husband always says it makes me look so natural.

This makeup is nice and light when you just put on a touch, but if you want coverage it gets cakey and its also very flat. Powder foundation i've used in the past always gives my skin added vibrance. This makeup does the opposite.

I have to say that this mineral is the only one i have used. This helped clear my acne just a little bit and it didn't irritate my skin at all. I have been using this product for about 3 years and i always go back to it. Before i would use MAC foundation and it always seemed to clog my pores and make me break out even more. But seriously this product does not make u look like you have it on its all natural.

This is undoubtedly the best foundation I have ever used. Natural looking, amazing coverage, leaves my skin looking radiant - almost like I'm not wearing anything at all. I was skeptical at first i.e. how could a powder cover like a cream? But I am a convert and will never use anything but this product from now on. Absolutely amazing!

I love that you don't have to worry about blending this prioduct...the only sown fall is that if you sweat the make-up does run a bit....it gets a little chalky. So if you are going to be onstage under lights, or doing physical activity...you want to make sure and put something under neath it

I have been a BE user for many years now, I have occasionally tried other foundations and whether liquid, powder (mineral or regular), whether drug store or high end..I keep coming back to BE! I use as little or as much (cover up the occasional blemish) as I want and it always works. Love that I don't feel like I have foundation on..ever. It wears well and does not irritate my already sensitive skin! Couldn't be happier to stick with an old faithful!
Does not have the greatest coverage but does give a flawless finish that works with your faces' natural oil.

reviews.review_title: Use the bare mineral color finder
reviews.review_text: I needed a new color for the winter months since a glowing tan doesn't naturally occur these months. We are not near a store so shopping online made me weary. I used the color guide available and was so pleased with the color match.
This product is the best. It feels super natural
I have been using this foundation for years now and still love it. So easy to buff on and has great coverage. Definitely try this if you haven't already!

I've used this foundation for over 6 years and it is simply the best, period! I have oily skin and am 59 years old. This foundation helps with the oiliness, but does not settle into my fine lines. It lasts all day and your skin looks totally natural! Try it; you'll never go back to something else!

I have been wearing bareMinerals foundation for four years. I am always getting compliments on my skin and asked what type of products I use. It provides great coverage yet it looks like I'm not even wearing make-up.
I buy this for my granddaughter. She loves it.

I love this product. I used to use liquid foundation, but once I tried a mineral foundation I was hooked. It looks more natural, and feels lighter than a liquid. The best part is I don't have to worry about falling asleep with it on- it never makes me break out!
great coverage for normal skin. looks very natural without any effort.

This is great foundation I have rosacia and seborrhea on my face and it does not cause breakouts and it does not irritate my skin its great easy to use and it feels like you are not wearing makeup. I highly recommend this product.

This has got to be the best foundation i've ever tried!!! Goes on flawless and smooth. Doesn't leave those nasty streaks you get with liquid foundation and layering this stuff doesn't give you a cakey look!! Love this stuff!!! Please NEVER discontinue this product!!!
Thanks for this color. It is perfect. I have worn medium for years and finally tried this new color. I love all things BE!!!!
This is perfect...nothing compares
This took a little getting used to. It gives my skin a shiny glow which I'm not used to but I figured out that less is more.

As usual, I'm very loyal to this product. I had multiple family and friends trying to talk me into the Clinique brand mineral makeup over the holidays. I refused to believe their product was comparable to the BareMinerals. Now these same friends and family members are experiencing buyers remorse with the Clinique product.
love it, even stays on while swimming

I use this as a powder over my foundation since I need a lot of coverage. It is a bit orange on me, but I really like the finish and extra coverage it gives. Using it on its own is nice, and it provides a very light coverage then. If you bring it down on your neck, it looks very natural of course.
Great coverage. Fills in fine lines and covers age spots for a younger look to your face. I'm 60 and people often mistake me for being 10 years younger.

I love this makeup, it totally change my skin. My skin is acne prone, this makeup doesn't make me flair up. The makeup so pure you can sleep in slogan, not true. Will still cause breakups. I wouldn't recomend sleeping in any makeup anyways.  If you want full coverage, definately purchase the concealer, layering this product is very noticable.

I really was reluctant to try this product....I tried a friends and it appeared blotchy on me. Well...not the case when I was 'tested' for the correct color. I have Melasma, from having children and I am REALLY self conscience. Typically I wear a heavy coverage to try and conceal the dark spots. This product actually works! I had layer my coverage (and use concealer), but if feels like I have nothing on! I am HOOKED....and I love all the products I have tried so far by BareMinerals.
I have very sensitive skin, and this product works great! I have been using this powder for 6 years now. Love it!

I really enjoy the bareminerals foundation. It has great coverage, which is totally controllable based on what you need or want. Also, it looks very natural. I have a little bit of try skin and the makeup made it look worse ~ it was only in a little area, but it was a little bit disappointing. Overall I really like this foundation.

reviews.review_title: MUST have for my makeup bag!
reviews.review_text: The first time my niece saw me putting this on, she said wow, it really makes a difference! I am one of those people that cannot leave the house without some make up on because otherwise I look ill due to dark circles and sun pigmentation. Although I do not recommend this for the dark circles or for concealer, its such an awesome basic foundation. It really doesn't cake, you can build it up, it lasts for several hours, and it doesn't feel gross!

I was at first skeptical about mineral foundations and their benefits along with their coverage. I'm surprised that this foundation has an excellent, natural finish that doesn't leave your face powdery. I have oily skin, especially on my t-zone. Bare Minerals covers that great. Although it would only last for about 3 or 4 hours without looking greasy, I could quickly build on another layer throughout the day without looking fake.  Great coverage overall, especially since I have uneven skin tone. Pair this off with Bare Minerals' mineral concealer for those pesky under eye circles and you are set with a healthy, radiant face.

This is the best make-up I have ever used and I'm 56 years old! Thought I couldn't use a powder because of dry skin, this actually heals my dry skin and gives my skin a beautiful luster without any caking. Only makeup I will use!
Love this foundation. It's make my skin glow and controls the shine.
I've been using this product for years and love it!!!
I have used BareMinerals foundation for 6 years. I won't go back to anything else. Once you try it, you will be addicted too!
Love the product. Don't like the new container
easy application, great coverage, long lasting

reviews.review_title: Great powder foundation, but beware the container
reviews.review_text: I bought the foundation together with the Mini Refillable Buffing Brush. The foundation is great, giving me a really natural look.  However, be warned about the container: it's supposed to be designed to enable refilling of the Buffing Brush - you're supposed to be able to open up the bottom and click it shut after, which is what I did properly. However, after that, when I tried to open the container the regular way (by twisting off the top cover), the click bottom came loose and spilled most of the contents. I tried clicking it shut again, making sure it was clicked into place, but the spilling reoccurred when I tried to open it the regular way again.  Plus, the Mini Refillable Buffing Brush often doesn't work (check out the reviews) - just stick to using the foundation the regular way from the original container.

Honestly, this stuff is like confidence in powder form. I'm a 16-year-old who's struggled with problem skin since the age of 11 or so, and while the worst of it finished a year or two ago, I still get regular breakouts, especially hormonal ones. Before, I used just your basic L'Oreal liquid foundation, and honestly, I have NO idea what I was thinking, using it with my oily skin‚Ä¶ I was at Sephora about 2 months ago, and decided to buy the Get Started Kit, despite the high price. And I am so glad I did. As soon as I stopped trying to cover my blemishes with pore-clogging liquid makeup, my skin got so much nicer looking! At first, it was a little awkward trying to cover the blemishes that I had left, but the frequency and severity of my breakouts has diminished incredibly in the past two months. Now, I just use Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel (also incredibly amazing) and Clinique concealer underneath to take care of any problem spots, and I've found it works perfectly. My skin is softer, prettier, CLEARER. I feel so much more confident and beautiful. Though it's a bit pricy, it lasts a LONG time (the pots that came with the sample size have yet to run out, and they're a third of the size of the normal ones) and I think it's completely worth the money. The only problem is if you put too much on, it can get a little obvious that you're wearing powder makeup, so only use a little at a time. I guess I'd say the coverage is buildable, though the more you put on, the faker it looks‚Ä¶ With the way it clears up your skin though, it's not a problem after a few weeks. I even wore this to a part and my makeup still looked pretty good in the morning, even after dancing all night long! I'll definitely be buying this again! Love love love it.
I've been using this foundation for about 3 years and I will never use anything else. Love it.
I'm hooked on Bare Minerals! It feels so clean and light on my face. I hardly even feel like I'm wearing anything, and yet it still seems to cover everything from blemishes to dark circles.
Usually I put this on over my foundation to even everything out, but when I moved and couldn't find my makeup I found out that this works just as well by itself.
I've loved this product since I first started using it about 6 years ago. And I recommend this product to all my friends.
As usual, BE keeps up with top quality mineral foundation. I have tried different ones and even the classic liquids but I keep going back to BE always. Great!
I love this foundation. My skin feels and looks great using this product

I used this foundation for a very long time & then switched back to it. I love the way it looks, & I don't break out as much when I use it. My only issue with it is that when I sweat, it makes my face itchy. This could be because I have very fair & sensitive skin, but it can get pretty uncomfortable until I take it off completely.
Love this stuff, I'm pretty sure it's magic. Don't think I'll ever go back to a liquid foundation.

I use this when I'm in a hurry and don't want to deal with putting concealer over any spots. It covers better than my tinted moisturizer, and I like that it acts as a sunscreen.  I feel that it looks less natural than I'd like. I can tell I'm wearing makeup - it doesn't seem to blend into my skin. It looks like it's sitting on top. I used to use this regularly a few years ago and don't remember that being a problem. It might be a new formula, or maybe a result of a moisturizer or sunscreen I'm now wearing underneath.  I have to give Bare Excentuals credit for producing so many colors. I have extremely fair skin that's tough to match. Very few companies make makeup/concealer light enough for my skin. I use Fair and does the job without looking too orange.

I've been wearing this for years and haven't found anything as good. It covers well, feels light, and doesn't look cakey. I've used two different shades; Medium and Medium Beige. Medium beige is my favorite, but both blended well and matched my skin.

I got this to replace my pressed powder that was running out and I've got to say, I now use it for everything-concealer and all-over evening out. I like that it doesn't overdry my skin, has a nice shimmery sort of effect, and doesn't seep into my creases like many liquid or stick concealers do. expensive..but versatile

reviews.review_title: Best foundation I have ever used
reviews.review_text: I have tried numerous foundations to try and find a balance for my skin. I tried a liquid base, and I feel like it didn't really cover or even out anything and it just made my skin more oily. Pressed powders never really did anything for me either, so I decided to go for this loose powder foundation in medium beige. I absolutely love it. It is so easy to apply and lasts so long (especially if you apply the prime time foundation primer before). I feel like my skin looks more even and it actually makes my pores disappear. I also like that there is some sunscreen in the makeup, so it helps prevent sun damage. I would recommend this to anyone with oily prone skin.

This is a great foundation if you are someone who loves a natural finish and doesnt need to cover much. But it's just okay for me, because I naturally have some red in my cheeks and this just doesnt do much for me. If i try to cover the unevenness in my skin i find that im using to much and it seems like it would run out in a week and a half. The only reason i gave it four stars was because it does mattify the skin and is nice for touching up, but overall i didnt find that it was heavyduty.

don't hesitate to try this, it is the best!! much better than the matte foundation - even for oily skin. definitely use the primer first, as it makes application and look of this foundation 90% better. also - you MUST finish with mineral veil. mineral veil is the key to preventing oilyness. you can use it as a base before applying this foundation and after! this foundation is also very illuminating, it is fantastic and a definite must have!

I am in love with this product! I have gone from liquid foundation to tinted moisturizer to cream powder... and could never find anything that I was completely thrilled with. But THIS stuff is ALL I will EVER use, so long as it is never discontinued. It covers all blemishes and feels like you're face is naked still. I even had shingles on my forehead recently (totally unattractive thing to be walking around with on your face) and this stuff covered it so well, no one knew I had shingles until I told them. Now THATS powerful.

If you are looking for an absolutely flawless, gorgeous look without feeling like you have much on at all, this is perfect. Goes on so fabulously, especially with Prime Time. I cleanse, use Prime TIme, dust on a dash of the Bisque concealer under my eyes, and then use #2 Fairly Light and I tell you, people all the time are asking me what I do to my skin. It looks flawless.

This is the first time I've bought Bare Minerals foundation and I love it! I have problems with rosacea and fine lines. This is the first foundation that gives me coverage for redness, doesn't irritate my rosacea (and in fact, it's been getting better!), and covers my fine lines.
I always use this product and my complexion always looks perfect.
Ja, das ist einfach ein tolles Produkt. Ich bin sehr zufrieden.

You will never want to buy a different foundation again! This stuff makes my skin look amazing. I highly recommend it. I have uneven skintone and acne scarring, and this foundation covers it to make my skin look nearly flawless. Plus, it does not irritate my sensitive skin.

After hearing all the hype I decided to try this foundation and I was extremely let down. It doesn't cover anything (I had the Get started kit and used all the products in there, still not great)..if i'm going to wear foundation I want it to actually cover imperfections! The colour (fair, the lightest one) was perfect for my porcelain skin tone, its the only foundation that ever worked colour-wise....however it irritated my skin really badly! The whole day my face felt itchy and irrated. Will defintly be returning this :(
It was pretty good. Very Sheer though, but it did look natural

I do like how light this feels on my skin, but I've noticed if I'm not moisturized enou it will cause my chin area to get a tad flakey. Otherwise it is a great alternative to liquid foundation. I just hope they make a formula someday specially formulated for dry skin types.

reviews.review_title: this is the only foundation I use
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareMinerals foundation for three years now, and would never consider swithching. I have combination skin, that becomes very oily throughout the day. I also have some broken blood vessels around my nose, and minor skin discoloration. This foundation covers everything, but looks completely natural on me. It absorbs the oil, but isn't drying and feels very lightweight. The trick is not to over apply. I work in a restaurant and often receive complements on my complexion from my guests. I always attribute it to bareMinerals. This is also the only foundation that I have tried, that does not cause breakouts, or clog my pores. I often recommend it.

I've been using BE foundation for about 2 years now. Recently I switched to liquid foundation-- just to try how it worked on my skin & maybe see if there was a different look. Totally wasted my time. returned the Nars Sheer Glow & bought my ol' trusty. I apply the foundation with a flat brush-- not BE brushes but something I bought online. the coverage is so much better and I dont feel caked on and it stays on my skin longer than if I used the flawless application brush.
it doesnt make you feel concered about you having make up all over your face, you feel free and at ease and fresh!

I LOVE this foundation. It covers my skin flaws and gives me my porclein complexion. It doesn't cause my skin to break out like the cream foundations do and it has SPF 15 which protects my skin from sun damage. I'm an avid fan since 2008!

reviews.review_title: Finally a foundation I want to wear!
reviews.review_text: I have always wanted to wear makeup but most feels heavy or rubs off by the end of the day. This stays on all day. It doesn't irritate my skin. I bought it for my wedding day; I didn't have to reapply and my pictures look great!
only make up that covers my rosacea cheeks.
BE is amazing! I love this foundation!

Love the product. However, the brushes must be improved. I am on my second set of brushes in less than a year. Purchased a second pair because my first pair was leaving hairs all over my face. Was told by a Sephora assistant that I probably needed new ones. Same story with the new ones. Company must improve them.
This is essential for your makeup routine. It is proven to be the only over the counter makeup that doesn't clog your pores. I absolutely love it!

Product: Bare Escentuals bareMinerals Foundation in Light (25.00 for 0.28 ounces) Shade: Sheer light golden cream  >> This product speaks for itself. It's made from pure, crushed minerals straight from our planet. It feels like a cream because it's so finely milled, applied like a powder - but never looks caky, and makes the skin like you've layered silk on it. It's the makeup that feels and looks like no makeup - but your face will be perfected. It's made without Parabens, Sulfates, Synthetic Fragrances/Dyes, Petro-Chemicals, Phthalates. Parabens are said to lead to cancer in woman, while synthetic items are not healthy for the skin. It won't irritate the skin or cause breakouts, which is a relief to all ladies~! According to the statistics on Sephora 98% of woman said their skin looked softer, smoother, and younger. 90% saw IMPROVEMENT in their SKIN with continuous use - a foundation that makes you not need to use foundation. 93% noticed that their skin looked more radiant!  >> So, what's my true opinion? I have 2 containers of this foundation, both mini sized. (10 Day Full Face Samples from Sephora.) They have lasted me for a year of light usage from day to day. (Not everyday of course, maybe 2-3 weeks of full face usage if you add it up.) What I'm trying to get at is this stuff lasts. The samples - that were free - lasted a good time for being a sample. I don't have the full size product, I want to get it, but I can bet you that it will last just as long. Obviously longer because it's bigger! Another nice thing is that it comes in so many different shades. I always feel annoyed when I look at a foundation and think, wow. There's 5 shades, and they're all for pale skinned girls. Really, leaving people out in makeup! Not cool! Being light skinned, I don't have a lot of problems, but some of my best friends have olive and darker skin. It's not fair that they can't use my favorite foundation, especially if we have the same skin type. This foundation comes in 20 shades, so any girl can find their perfect fit.  >> Besides that this foundation is certified organic it feels just plain good on the skin. I like to buff this on with a Kabuki Brush (small, dense, face brush.) for perfect application. The key to awesome looking skin is to begin by getting a chunk of product on the brush. Now swirl the brush in the cap to get a thin layer of powder on each bristle. Then, tap on the side of the cap so the excess falls in, and voila! You have a brush with the perfect amount of powder evened out. It has light to medium coverage, depending how much you layer it. It works good on girls who have redness, light blemishes, light acne scars, un-even skin tone, etc. If you have bad acne, and dark acne scars this might not be the best for you. But don't feel down! Apply your favorite foundation on first, and then apply this on top. It leaves anything powdery and fake with a soft natural glow. Of course, no sparkle.  >> The packaging on this is simple and sleek. The bottom is clear so you can see how much foundation you have, the and the top is matte black. To finish, this foundation has sunscreen, something every girl needs. Obviously you want to apply a sunscreen prior to foundation (apply a separate one for more protection of course!) but this adds a little more strength.  Effectiveness: 10/10 Value: 10/10 Packaging: 8/10 Ease Of Use: 10/10 Overall: 10/10  Grade: A+ Love this product all around - it's a great buy!

I've been using bareminerals foundation for 4.5 years after using various dept make-up brands including MAC. this is truly the best foundation. it is hard to believe that a powder can cover blemishes, red spots, freckles, but it does without looking cakey at all. i have combo skin and live in the desert. i do not get the streaky look during the summer even after sweating, and the colors match my skin really well. bareMinerals foundation is a staple to my daily makeup routine.

I used M.A.C studio fix foundation for 4 years and I was in denial as to how much it clogged my skin. I thought bare minerals was pretty gimicky and never gave it consideration. I'm glad I allowed one of the sephora rep's to put it on. It looked natural, fresh and wasnt shiny or chalky. When i removed the makeup my skin actually looked better. Most importantly, It doesnt clog my pours! I'm glad to be a reformed M.A.C. addict.

reviews.review_title: Hands down, the best for sensitive/ acneic skin
reviews.review_text: When I first saw Leslie Blodgett's Bare Escentuals infomercials on TV about a decade ago, I laughed at all the ladies swanning and gushing over her products, thinking, Oh here we go again. Hired actresses peddling snake oil to the masses. I am 30 with sensitive, acne-prone skin, and like all other ladies in my position, I could finance a revolution with the amount of money I've spent trying to find products that will cover my existing bumps without causing new ones. I have been using bareMinerals foundation for about 7 years now, and not only does it still do a killer job of evening skin tone and covering occasional breakouts, but I need so much less makeup to get the look I want. Every so often I hear of some new wonder product or foundation and briefly stray to experiment, only to break out horribly and return to bareMinerals on my knees. As silly as I once thought it was, if someone asked me to be in one of those Bare Escentuals infomercials now, I would be the first one on camera to kiss Leslie's toes and thank her for this amazing foundation. So, if you have sensitive, acne-prone skin, I highly recommend trying this out and hope it works for you too!
This stuff looked great but after using for a couple of days my face started to itch and break out. I took it back! Returning it was super easy! Great customer service.

I have used bare minerals before and loved it. Then I went back to a foundation because My skin was breaking out severely and bare minerals just wasn't covering up my blemishes enough. Now my skin is healthier and I have returned to bare minerals. I love it just as much as before
not only is this healthy for your skin, it is so light and powders on perfectly & my face is radiant yet matte....this is the best foundation out there & worth the price

For some reason, I always steered clear of Bare Minerals. I guess after seeing all of the Infomercials, I just sort of associated it with all of those other dumb products that don't actually do what they say they do. Boy, was I wrong.  I used to use NARS pressed powder, but it started making me break out really really bad (I have oily, acne-prone skin). I decided to throw in the towel and switch to a makeup that wouldn't keep harming my skin. So, I started reading reviews of Bare Minerals, and they were so overwhelmingly good that I had to try it. Plus, the get-started kit is such a good deal, I couldn't pass it up. I didn't like it very much at first, but once I switched to the Matte formula and found my perfect color, I was blown away. It makes your skin SO smooth, and it doesn't look like I'm wearing makeup at all. The best part is that my skin has actually started clearing up now that I've been using it, and my overall skin tone seems better too. I will probably NEVER try another foundation again. I'm going to start convincing my friends to switch as well. I'm so glad I decided to try it!

reviews.review_title: This was okay, but not enough for my skin
reviews.review_text: I tried bareMinerals when my friends raved about it. It was okay, definitely my first powder foundation I would go to. My skin is combo/dry and this just wasn't enough for me. I didn't see enough coverage. I would recommend this to anyone who prefers a minimum amount of coverage.

I have been using Bare Essentuals for years. I would not use anything else. My skin use to be oily, and blotchy with several break outs. After using Bare Essentuals foundation, my skin has cleared up and I have no sensitivity issues anymore. I don't get that end of the day oily shine like I use to. I can brush it on in the morning quickly and be on my way. The SPF is an added plus. There are so many shades offered in their foundations that I found my absolute match with this newest color of Fairly Medium. I've tried their new matt foundation formula, but for me, the original is my favorite.
Love this stuff. Does not dry out my skin and I never wear much makeup but this looks very natural and does not feel like I am wearing any makeup.

I had old style container before, and loved the new lid design. It keeps power not to come out inside the lid and keeps neat. I am asian and have fair-medium skin tone and Light color works perfect. I just turned 30 but I receive many comments that I look 20. Thanks to this powder my skin is absolutely flawless.

When I tried it in the store, b/c it was only one spot, I was in love but once I received it and tried it all over my face, the end result looked really oily and I have dry skin so it's not my face. Also I don't have wrinkles I'm only 30 but this shows all the creases under my eyes. You have to really pat it down in the creases with the finger but this doesn't happen with a compact. Maybe it was the applicator (brush vs pad) but I love the color and that's the whole reason I bought it. It rubs off really easily on clothes too.I haven't tried it but maybe the matte version would solve the problems.

I have already loved BE for a very long time, but I loved that they introduced colors that were in between the originals. Fairly light was always too light for me and light is too orange. This matches well with my slightly olive/pale complexion. The only issue I have with it is that they are some little clumps in the powder and if you get them on your brush and brush your face it makes a line. So in applying, I have to be extra careful and break the clumps up beforehand. I have never had to do that with BE product before that. I still love it!

This is my third round of bareMinerals foundation. I love that you can adjust the level of coverage so easily. It stays on all day and I've gotten tons of compliments on my skin since I started wearing it. It comes off easily at the end of the day, too--just with regular face wash. Good stuff at a great price.
It is very good - its so natural
I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!

I purchased some bare minerals kits for my daughter in law a few christmas's ago. I have wanted to try every since. I finally broke down and purchased for my self. I am so sorry for not getting it sooner.
I love the whole bare minerals line. I've been using the foundation for years. It's the only kind that works for my sensitive skin. Love the shade, as well.

I use just this and the BE blush in Glee everyday. It gives me a nice healthy glow. I also feel like it is protecting my skin from the harsh Michigan winter. I am a student at U of M so I spend a lot of time walking around campus and this product has reduced the amount of irritation and dryness that I feel due to wind and cold. Also everyone compliments my skin now, which is totally new to me since I have acne scarring on my cheeks which is really embarrassing for me. It doesn't break my face out or interfere negatively with my acne meds so I'm pleased.  Note to dark skinned women. I love this product but it looked horrible on my dark skinned friend. The BE and the Philosophy mineral makeup either looked ashen on her or red/orange. So I would recomend something liquid. My friend personally looked beautiful with the tinted Philosophy moisturizer. Her parents are from Nigeria so she has beautiful dark, even skin with little acne and blemishes and the liquid Philosophy tinted moisturizer just gave her a healthy glow and accentuated her already gorgeous skin.

I have been using BE for over 5 years now and would NEVER use anything but! I have problematic, oily skin and BE is the only thing that keeps it under control. I don't find that it is messy at all as I see a lot of people complaining about and, it lasts forever ! This foundation will last me probably 6 months and thats with just about everyday wear
Great in the Arizona heat, and the dryyyyyyy winters!
This foundation is amazing. My skin looks flawless when I use this. I would highly recommend this.

Was recomended over pressed powder, but I would prefer to go back to the pressed powder. It is messy and not at easy to apply as a simlpe powder. I can see how someone who wear make up religiously would like it because it has a decent natural finish, but for an occasional wearer like me, I would not recomend it.
good image for this product
Nice image + video #1rated product
I just love this product

It took me so long to try this product because I just couldnt believe a loose powder could give me the liquid coverage I liked. I was so wrong, this is the best foundation I have ever tried. The coverage can be as light or full as you like while always feeling light and natural. Please dont wait years to try this like I did!! The only reason it did get 5 stars is because I didnt like the shiny glow, I like a more matte finish. Which thankfully BE just came out with!
perfect for my oily-dry skin combo. doesnt cause any breakouts too!

At almost 60 yrs of age, I have tried everything under the sun, most of which was heavy, drying, dull and just made me feel older looking. Bare mineral products are amazing. The compliments such as I can't believe your age, your skin is so soft, where are your wrinkles and flaws & on & on make me feel like a young woman again. I have used these products for 1 1/2 yrs now and will never try another thing. I am a customer for life!
I have been searching high and low for a great mineral foundation. bareMinerals is IT! My skin feels soft and silky after I apply. And my foundation stays on all day, which is a MUST!

I absolutely love bareMinerals foundation. I've been using it for about a year and don't know that I'll ever use anything else. It goes on smoothly and feels so light on my skin! It provides the perfect amount of coverage and blends great. I have somewhat sensitive skin and a lot of make-up products cause me to break out, but this never has. Love it!
Love the makeup and really like the new packaging!

reviews.review_title: I don't even take it off at night.
reviews.review_text: I love BARE MINERALS! This foundation is so light and natural. It evens out my skin tone without looking like I just painted me face.

I purchased the set where it could be customized by ordering the foundation. After reading the descriptions the Golden Fair sounded right. It turnied out to be too pale. I returned it to a Sephora where the salesperson helped me match the correct color. NB-the color that matched my skin looked darker in the container but looks good on.
Nothing left t say....once you go Bare, you don't go back.
One of the best foundation's I have ever had the pleasure of using. It blends in so naturally with my skin. I adore this product.

I've been a BE convert for years(going on 6 now), so I'll continue to post awesome reviews for this product.  Be sure to try the different shades as you tan through the seasons(or pale during the winter months) otherwise I find the coverage appears to be...disappointing. As always, if you get the color wrong, just return it to Sephora and they'll happily help you find the right shade. These are the full-sized containers, and one usually lasts me around 2months with daily, sometimes 2x's daily, application.

I LOVE this product. I have worn a different brand for years, and loved that too. I really only decided to try something new because I have several girlfriends that rave about bare minerals. It is FABULOUS. I can't stop telling everyone how much I love it. I like it the most because it doesn't feel like you're even wearing anything - it's that light. I feel like I could go without washing my face and I wouldn't break out. Would highly recommend to anyone looking to make a change.

When I turned 40, my skin became noticeably drier. I'd been using liquid foundation as I thought it'd be more moisturizing, but I thought I'd give bareMinerals a try and absolutely love it! The brush/powder application is super fast an easy and I can definitely see a difference in the clarity of my skin after only a month. My skin is quite pale and it's really hard to find a color match light enough (in most brands), but 'Fair' is perfect!!

I have always been a little scepticle about using mineral foundation for fear it would not give me good coverage, and would look chalky. I received a sample of this makeup and began using it and could not believe the results, it has great coverage and not chalky like I expected.

I'm 22 and I use several topical acne medications that dry my face and sometimes with liquid foundation it tends to cake and crust around my breakouts. I'm happy that BareMinerals looks and feels more natural and it allows my skin to breathe, it definitely lives up to those standards, and since its powder it has good shine/oil control. I just don't feel like it gives as good coverage for those of us with acne pigmentation/dark mark scarring. My review may be a little premature since I only tried it a few times since I've bought it and I'm still learning how to use it. Overall I'm happy with the natural look/feel, but not so much the coverage. I bought the starter kit for $48, and I like the brushes, but I think for those of you looking to buy it, you can do without all the things that come in the kit. Just go for the foundation, without all the frills its cheaper.

The foundation never disappoints me. If you've never purchased it before it's worth it. It lasts me about 7 months. It's wll worth the money. In the beginning I found that the product caused my skin to itch quite a bit. I changed my moisturizer and the itching stopped. Other than that I don't have any issues with the product.
bareMinerals is an amazing product. Stays on all day without making your face greasy. Love it!
It is a wonderful product, I have waited a long time to get this line and stick to it. Thanks!!

i'm 24 years old, and live in new orleans, where it can be quite humid and gross. i've never really worn make-up before, but since i graduated from college, started looking for jobs and i know i look younger than i am, i've started wearing more than just mascara. i have pretty sensitive skin, but this stuff has been awesome. it's the first foundation i've tried and i'm not sure that i want to keep looking for something better! it's so lightweight i hardly feel like it's on and i haven't had any sort of reaction to it. i'm lucky enough to not need much more than just a little foundation to cover up any imperfections, and this one, combined with a little blush, leaves my skin looking dewy and fresh.

I hadn't tried any of the Bare Minerals foundation products - I've used their Skin Revver-Upper, as well as lip products, but never their foundation. I like it - it provides amazingly light but effective coverage, and doesn't flake off but also doesn't appear oily at the end of a long day. Smooths over the skin nicely and evens out tone. Overall a great product.

I love love love this foundation. It makes my skin look perfect. i have a couple of acne scars on the sides of my cheeks, and with a little bit of this product, it completely covers any blemish or imperfection on my skin. I've gotten so many compliments about my skin while wearing this product. After I used this foundation, my friend immediately noticed how clear my skin looked and said she was going to go buy this product herself. Unlike other foundations I've used in the past, this foundation is light. it doesn't feel like I'm wearing pounds and pounds of makeup.

So I purchased this after using Laura Mercier's mineral powder and not achieving a desired look. My skin is nowhere near perfect (oiliness in the t-zone, dryness on the cheeks, some breakouts as I am still going through my teenage skin phase, and a few imperfections)..but with this on top of just moisturizer/primer, or alone; it's fabulous. I don't even need a concealer anymore, I can get ready in 10 minutes. I am still trying to find the perfect shade, but right now medium is doing just the trick, as golden medium and medium beige were slightly too dark. I might even go to fairly medium. Also people have said that my skin looks flawless, and it looks much more natural than the MUFE concealer and LM powder combination I was wearing before. Try it out; and a little goes a long way if you use the tap, buff swirl process!
Surprisingly good coverage! The primer from BE (others don't work with it as well) is a must though.

love bare minerals! LOVE LOVE LOVE! but be careful which color you buy and take the time to get yourself color matched. Ive gotten the same color in the past but since its winter and my skin is much more fair i got a shade lighter and it makes me look chalky and extremely pale. But other than that i love how natural it makes my skin looks and i will always be a fan!
light as a feather looks perfect! I am fair, so everything shows on my skin. This just melts onto my skin and feels and looks like air brushed skin.

I have been ussing Bare Minerals for years now and still love them as much today as I did the first time I put them on. This foundation not only gives you great coverage but feels so light you don't even know you have it on. What I love most is that It last all day and well into the night. A great product....

I have never written a review for anything online but I felt compelled to write one to say what a great product this is. While I was pregnant, my skin was horrible and I finally accepted that I was just going to have to wear tons of heavy foundation to cover my acne and the scars up. Not true! The Bare Escentuals foundation provides great coverage without feeling cakey/greasy/heavy by the end of the day. (Make sure you watch the instructional DVD that comes with the starter pack, and be patient with your application technique). Also, a lot of those heavy creamy foundations are not oil free so while they cover up the redness, they actually make the acne worse. Since I started using Bare Escentuals my skin has actually improved! My only complaint is that (because I use it to get a lot of coverage) a jar doesn't last that long, so it does get to be a little pricey. But now I'm hooked! I wish I had found Bare Escentuals years ago.

I have been using mineral power from different brands. This is my favor so far. I even like the design of the case, which makes it so much easier to travel with. There are lots of shapes to choose from. If you have not use it before, I recommend you go to one of the stores, get a salesperson to match the color with your skin.
It says full coverage, but i'm not so sure... i have to use a base foundation under it. but maybe i just like a heavy makeup look
This foundation gives you a smooth, natural look. The only bad thing is that it accentuates any dryness or bumps on your face. Other than that, it is a really good foundation!

I love, love, love this foundation. Great coverage, light as a feather. No line of demarcation horror as we've all seen with traditional foundation (unless, of course you are way off with your color!). I tell everyone about this & won't even consider another brand!!

reviews.review_title: I'll never buy another brand of foundation!
reviews.review_text: I've seen the infomercials for this makeup for years,my previous foundation was making me breakout,so I decided to pay a little more. I love it!! It blends perfectly,covers imperfections and blemishes and no breakouts! The mineral veil works awesome for shine too!!

reviews.review_title: Works great on my acne-prone skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive and acne-prone skin. The bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation is the only foundation I can use daily without breaking out. I tried other liquid and mineral foundation products but they will eventually cause me to break out more.  I've used this product for 2 years now and it's the only foundation I'll put on my face. I've just purchased the new bareMinerals SPF 15 Matte Foundation and am looking forward to trying that out.

I wanted to try this for a long time given all the hype. I got colormatched at a BE store, where they applied a TON of makeup -- because it felt so mask-like I thought this wasn't for me. But given all the great reviews, I gave it another go with a sample from Sephora and WOW. Using less makeup, I can get a really natural finish. Before I started using this, my skin was very sensitive, inflamed, and acne-prone. It has now calmed down to the point that I barely need any makeup.

Started to use after SKII discontinued their Air Touch foundation, thought nothing could be better. Bare Escentuals are different, but give you a great coverage & doesn't look cakey on the face. I'm getting a lot of compliments after I started using it. Recommended it to few friends & everybody like it so far.

bareMinerals is never disappointing. At first, I was expecting too much from this foundation because of the raving reviews, but I realized that the coverage isn't like natural foundation. It gives you a natural finish and a kind of dewy look. My tip: Don't expect too much from this product !
I don't need an all over face foundation, so I just use this as a concealer. Absolutely love it. Been using it for over 5 years now and nothing can touch it.
Bare Minerals is absolutely the greatest mineral makeup on the market. Coverage is fantastic. I won't use anything else.

I can't say enough about this product. It goes on easily, is mistake proof, covers everything, and lasts all day. I used drug store liquid foundation before bareminerals and it would wear off after a few hours and my problem skin would be showing through. With this product, my flaws are covered all day. It feels lightweight despite its incredible coverage. It is a foundation that I will buy again and again.
Flawless finish with just enough coverage. Feels great on and looks great too. I've tried other products just to see what they are like, but I always come back to this one. Love it.

I have very fair skin and the fair shade is perfect for me. It blends very well and you can build on coverage. I also have sensitive skin and this is the only foundation that doesn't irritate my skin. I swear by this stuff!

I have tried many foundations both liquid and powder and nothing compares to this one! I love the coverage it gives me and its lightweight so I don't feel like i have that caked on makeup feel. Its very easy to apply and has done wonders for my skin as well!

I totally love this! There were so many different shades that I could match with my skin tone flawlessly.  I am a bareMinerals/Bare Escentuals convert. After resisting it for the last four years I finally caved and totally loved it! I can determine the level of coverage I want. I kept getting frustrated with my previous cream/liquid/power foundations, either too much coverage or not enough. This was definitely money well spent.  It is messy, but it is a LOOSE POWDER foundation, so I don't understand why people keep complaining that is messy. hello! loose powder!

If I had to choose one, I would say this is my miracle product. I never believed the hype behind it, but now, now I am a believer. When used in conjunction with the Prime Time primer, this foundation stays on for the WHOLE DAY. In heat. In air conditioning. At the hair dressers. On a road trip. On a 10-hour plane ride. Yes, it really does! It's silky and smooth and makes my face look healthy and glowing without looking overly made-up. It blends easily and provides coverage where I need it. It doubles as a concealer. It is paraben-free. I feel like my face can 'breathe' when wearing it. If I could give it 10 stars, I would.

I love this product! I use this with mineral veil and the dark color that comes with the get started kit, and it always looks great! I use just a bit of the dark on my nose and it gives tons of natural color! It is so worth the money!
I love this product because it is light weight and gives a more natural finish. Since my skin is on the deeper end of the spectrum it blends better.
Finally a good foundation that doesn't make my blemishes stick out even more by highlighting them in a shade that matches my skin tone. Really blends in well! Love using it!

I recently tried to transition to the golden fair shade, to no avail. it must have been too dark for my skin because i often looked ruddy and felt compelled to apply twice as much to achieve proper coverage. so, now i'm back to the fair and i couldn't be happier. i've been a be convert for 6 years now and i haven't looked back!
I love Bare Minerals. I don't feel like Casper the ghost - I feel like it still allows some of me to shine through while also covering up my flaws.
the color is long lasting, it's wonderful.

I'm using this product for years by now and think that it's the best so far. It covers all imperfections without getting messy and cakey. Receiving complements all the time about how perfect my skin is!

reviews.review_title: Great coverage but I am allergic
reviews.review_text: My eyes got itchy with the product so I didn't get to keep it. Plus the color didn't really match my skin tone and after a few layer of it,I can tell the powder is caking on. I got YSL's matt touch compact foundation with SPF20 instead.

Not only does bareMinerals go on flawlessly on its own as a light foundation that never looks caked on* but I wet it with a small brush and use it in the cover as concealer as well. It always looks great. It's easy to work with and is great to mix with other bareMineral products to make middle tones or add a little shimmer.

This is the BEST foundation/powder/concealer I have EVER used. It is comfy, easy, and effective! I was in a Sephora store with a Bday gift card, looking for something to buy. I was standing near the Bare Minerals display when a woman came up to me and just raved about this product! I wasn't even looking for foundation, but she totally convinced me and I have never used anything else since. So, Thank You, mystery lady! I will never be the anything but a Bare Minerals girl!
love it, have been using it for years now!

the makeup is not good if you need real coverage. ive been using it for years, its light and clean, but under the eyes can accentuate any wrinkles. this particular shade looks pasty and has a slight pink undertone, which my already pale skin did not need. i let my 13 yr old wear it and its perfect for her. WILL NOT cause breakouts. perfect makeup if this is a concern, just find the right shade:)
Love the Bare Minerals regular powder foundation vs. the matte. With the regular, your face has a special glow. With the matte, it looks pale and plain.

first, i just want to say that even the fair shade is too dark for me (and while i'm very pale compared to the general public, i'm not really that pale compared to other pale people).  forgetting that, i think this product is alright. i like to dust a light layer over my foundation if i need extra coverage. i do like that it feels light on your skin and does make it look a bit more radiant, but i dislike that it's so powdery. obviously, since it's loose powder, it's going to be powdery, but this can look really cakey if i'm not very careful.

ok, this foundation is the best of all foundation. i have dry skin and this one dos not dry it at all! it doesn't make my face look cackey like other foundation does.  My skin is beetwin light and meduim, so I take the shade Meduim Beige and i'm happy whit it. It's a bit too dark, but I don't put a lot and it's okay!

I got this foundation hoping that it I wont have to search for the perfect foundation anymore. The texture is great and blends into your skin making it look like your natural skin and not cakey foundation powder on top BUT I couldn't find the right color for my skin tone. it was either a bit dark or a bit light which showed a lot in pictures. =( sad. but if you can find your color then DEF go with this. its an awesome product.

Time and again BareMinerals is exactly what I need, want and expect. I've been using the product for 2 years now and I don't see myself switching to another foundation any time soon. So easy to use, and I'm always learning new things about the product. It's light to the touch and so easy to apply. I love that the new full size jar has the twist top sifter so you can avoid spills and only use as much as you need each time. Love it!

I bought the starter kit first and loved this foundation. I just ordered the regular sized foundation since I used my starter one up. I was pleasantly suprised at the size of regular-sized bottle. It also has a nifty twist top on the inside that allows you to open/close it and shake out how much you want to use into the lid (versus the sample size that pours out into the top if you turn it upside down, etc.). The foundation lasts too and absorbs oil throughout the day. This is definitely a favorite of mine.
