bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation is amazing. I used to use Mary Kay mineral powder foundation, but now I am a successful converter. I wanted something that would help minimize shine throughout the day and provide and nice sheer coverage and this is it. The buildable coverage aspect is a bonus, not to mention the plethora of shades you have to choose from so you get your color just right. I can use it heavy for all over full coverage or light for a more natural day to day coverage. Not enough good can be said about this product.

I've used bare minerals for over two years now, and I love it. Some days my skin is really broken out, and that's when I use bare minerals over a liquid foundation, but for everyday I just use this alone. It covers small blemishes and completely gets rid of any redness. I LOVE THIS.

I have used the bareminerals products for years and still love them just as always. Coverage depends on the application so you can get light or full depending on the amount you use. I would recommend!
Love it, love it, love it!
It gives me a natural look and goes on great. The only problem i have is that you have to find a specific brush to use it with or it will not give it the same effect.
nice gift and nice coverage . my daughter loves it!

I love bareminerals! How fast and easy it is to use, as well as my face doesn't feel like its being choked with makeup, yet I still look nice! I just wish it came in lighter shades for the winter months.

I have really bad skin - comes from my father. Everything ive tried never IMPROVED my skin but did a good job at keeping all the redness and acne covered up.  This does EVERYTHING. In a matter of the first 3 days of using it, the improvement in my skin was amazing. Excellent product, i dont think i will ever go back to drugstore makeup. So worth it. Dont knock it 'til you've tried it. Very natural looking, too. Does not look at all like im wearing makeup. Makes my skin beautiful. Very easy to use and LOVE using it!

I have this product in two colors - Fairly Light and Fairly Medium. I like both of these colors, but the Fairly Medium looks more natural on me due to its pink undertones. I find that the Fairly Light washes me out unless I have absolutely no trace of a tan. The Fairly Medium looks natural on me when I have a slight tan. In the winter, I like to mix both together so I look as close to natural as possible.  I like the quality of this products; it doesn't completely cover my flaws (such as very bad blemishes) but it covers up the redness in my cheeks, evens out my tone and makes pimples, spots and other blemishes much less noticeable. I prefer powder foundation to cream or liquid because it takes a lot less time to apply and looks almost as good! It doesn't dry out my skin and it rarely falls into the creases or wrinkles I have - only if I've buffed too much of the product over my face.  I didn't give this product five stars because it can't cover up all blemishes as well as liquid foundation. However, I use this product almost every day and will continue to purchase it!
I have used this for years now...and I will never go back to anything else! In the winter I use a tinted moisturizer under it to add some color and a bit of dewiness. Love it!!!!
My skin has improved so much using BE. It covers all my flaws. Have gotten compliments on how good my skin appears.
natural looking,easy to use,flawless
it's long lasting,matches well,easy to use, great coverage
I tried bareminerals and i fell in love with it.But i am older and it shows up my fine lines. But over all it's great stuff.
This is a very light product and feels good on the skin. I put it on top of a foundation and it really sets the make up in place.

I swear by this foundation. I've been using it for years and it's the only product that won't irritate my extremely sensitive skin. Every single foundation I've tried has caused a bad reaction, except this one. It covers my redness pretty well and generally stays put all day. I sleep in it all the time (oops) and it still doesn't break me out. I can't really speak to concealing pimples because I don't get them very often. I use this mainly for hiding my redness and just evening my skintone out and it's perfect for that.

reviews.review_title: good foundation with a few draw backs
reviews.review_text: i never wear foundation mainly because my skin is clear and even and i don't really need it. i bought this in several shades (depending on the season and my skin tone) for special events. it made my skin look flawless and airbrushed. it def made me feel more beautiful and glamorous. compared to the few times i have worn foundation before this was a lot lighter and natural looking. after a few hours though my skin began to feel greasy, like a film was on it. i tried blotting it and the tissue had grease on it. the next day i noticed tiny bumps, probably tiny breakouts, which i hardly ever get. it was easy to put my other makeup on top of it and for the few hours at night i was wearing it i guess it was worth it, but it is nothing i would wear every day. i just didn't like the feeling of having a layer of something on my skin. it did do what it promised though, give me a flawless look and it was extremely easy to use/apply. if you always use foundation this is probably one of the best out there.
Forgot to attach the right video in my previous review! Anyways, love this product, use it everyday, my favorite skin product EVER I love it so much I added it in my everyday skin video (:
Beautiful makeup. Goes on smooth, clear, and it's good for you! I really love this product...it blends so well with all my other make up! Best investment in a long time.

Love how natural and even it looks on my face. It has become a part of my everyday skin routine =D Can't live without my bare minerals!  Made an every day skin routine on my channel, so you can see how Bare Minerals transforms my face.
I Love how it cover up your pimples. Also it doesn't dry you skin out. The best thing is it doesn't rub off on your phone when you talk on it.

This is my first time using BareMinerals and I really like it. I used their technique on how to find the perfect match but I seemed to have ordered 1 shade too light. But I am able to build it and it doesn't feel cakey. It does not cover my blemishes too well only the ones flat on my skin not the erupted ones. I think if I had the correct shade I could build it better. Overall it isn't hurting my skin but it's not helping it in the way the product claims it does.  I think for $25 it should be a lot bigger. Also I hate the locking system. I've locked it and when I open it again it's open and their foundation under the locking area and I can't get it. (it's a large amount as well)

Bare Minerals foundation is the most effective, beautiful foundation I've ever used. I've been a tinted moisturizer kind of girl in the past and was worried about switching to powder, but this stuff goes on easily and stays on all day. It doesn't dry me out, either. It sits on top of my skin, unlike other powders, so it doesn't bring out my fine lines or clog pores. I love love love this foundation!! Worth every penny.
I love the way my skin feels and looks when wearing this.

I know most people love this foundation. I have combination-oily skin, and found that this foundation made my face look way too shiny. It also made my skin a little more oily than usual. I exchanged it for the matte version, and like that one a lot better.

I really like this makeup--very easy to apply and blends very well with my skin tone. My only concern is that as I get older my skin is getting drier, so sometimes it looks a bit crusty at first--after a few minutes, it seems to get better. Not sure what to do about this, as other products clog my pores!

This is just the best mineral foundation ever. I've been using BE for 3 years. Just love the ease of application and blendability. Have very sensitive skin and this works well for me and non drying. Would highly recommend.
Great coverage, great colors to choose from, and coverage can be layered according to where you need more.

bought this product recently for the new year in hopes of finally finding a make up that makes my skin look even and so far i LOVE it. however, it is not make your skin flawless if you have a pimple or something you still need to use a concealer. Overall though, it really is a great product. My skin looks even and glowing and I have gotten many compliments.

Since switching to bareMinerals foundation, I will never go back to liquids. I have sensitive mature skin that has actually improved since I starting using this about 8 years ago. My face stopped breaking out & has gotten smoother & healthier!
this is natural and healthy looking. Sheer- full coverage. If you put on to much then it gets orange looking.
I bought the wrong finish. I prefer the matte finish. This is WAY TOO SHINY!
It is STILL my favorite and I will continue to use it as long as it is being sold!!! Some people think it will not cover like a liquid foundation, but it does!!! I just love it!

My younger sister turned me on to Bare Escentuals years ago. I am 55 and have been using Bare Minerals now for 10+ years. I previously used Lancome and once I started using this, I will NEVER go back to a liquid foundation ever again. Bare Minerals is the purest foundation I have ever experienced. The coverage is perfectly natural, you don't look like your face is painted with make-up. It is so easy to apply and is just the best foundation out there period. Don't try to use the imitators they are NOT at all the same. There is only one Bare Minerals. Thank you Leslie for the perfect product!

I have tried many foundation over the past year and I always get compliments when I wear this. My fine lines and wrinkles seem to vanish. I feel as if I have nothing on, very easy to apply, don't feel as if I am wearing anything and very natural looking.

I really love this stuff, it's leaves your skin baby soft and a nice natural finish while I buff it in to my skin but the one reason I give it four stars and what I don't like about it cuz it clogs up my pores around my nose everytime.
I swear by this stuff. My skin used to breakout a lot.
good!liked it,feels very light.
I love this product and I absolutely love bare escentuals, it's all i use!
Wear it every day. Great coverage and staying power, however it takes way too long to put it on. If it wasn't such a process to put it on every morning I would give it five stars.
Love this foundation--have been using it for several years now. It even flatters my 60+ yr. old complexion!

I LOVE this foundation. I have acne scars all over my face and this provides the right amount of coverage without looking like a mask. It matched my skin tone perfectly! And best of all, I feel like I'm not wearing any makeup. And as if all that wasn't enough, this has even helped to improve the overall quality of my skin.

reviews.review_title: give it time - get used to it
reviews.review_text: i first used bare minerals, and didnt quite get how to use it. After watching dvd and following guidelines, I love it, does not cause breakouts and unbelievable that this powder can actually have great coverage.

reviews.review_title: Good Foundation, Sephora Brand is Better
reviews.review_text: I like BE products and have used them on and off for the past few years. I like the fact that the lid is large enough to get a mineral brush into to actually pick up an even amount of product.  Personally it takes forever when layering enough to get a full coverage look, and sometimes it can look fake. I like lightly layering this over a liquid or a cream foundation to set it for a super flawless look.  In my opinion the sephora brand is better and matches my skin tone better than BE

I love this product. Since I started using this a couple of years ago I won't use anything else. It's amazing how it covers my red patches on my cheeks and my under eye circles. None drying and a little goes a long way I have finally found the perfect foundation. YES!!!!!!!
It's light and airy and looks great--a fabulous product

I love the new twist top container that keeps the powder in - even if you put it in your purse. Kudos to Bare Escentuals for adding that feature. This is the best mieral makeup on the market IMHO. It has great coverage but looks totally natural. I am and will always be a loyal Bare Escentuals user.
This particular shade has been bought for my daughter stocking gift. She uses it for a few years and loves it.

I've been using BE for a few years now and its still the best foundation I've found in terms of color match, natural finish, buildable coverage, doesn't break out my skin. The negatives remain the same as they have been from the beginning - messy, annoyingly time consuming with the application,I can't take it with me during the day for touch ups (even the mineral veil doesn't keep me oil free all day) and powder is still not a great foundation solution in the dry cold windy Chicago winters when you need hydration hydration HYDRATION (and I have super oily skin.) Its the best of the worse and worse is having to wear foundation in the first place :(
and so easy to use--love, love, love BE foundation--so good for your skin no matter what your age--my 3 daughters and granddaughter also use it--simply the best

I have been using Bare Minerals for over a year and I love it. If you follow the directions on how to apply it, your makeup will always look natural.and flawless. I have received numerous compliments on my makeup and how pretty my skin is. It only takes a couple minutes to apply and stays on all day.
YEAH on making a container that can seal the powder after each use!
Goes on smooth, blends in really well.

I have been using this foundation for years now. It is an excellent product for aging skin. Goes on cleanly, no lines, good coverage, sheer. People often compliment my skin. I also mix this with medium beige when I begin to get a little color.
This is the best foundation ever. It covers really well and has a very natural finish. I love Bare Escentuals.

I have very sensitive skin and I get rashy and pimply when I use most foundations. bareMinerals foundation was a revelation. I bought it in light and I have been using it for 4 years. My mother and grandmother are now hooked too. It does not make you powdery, but rather a natural, dewy complexion. However, I suggest going into Sephora and allowing them to help you pick a shade becaue the starter kit is a bit of a waste. (I didn't even use one of the colors they gave me) I would absolutely recommend this product to any of my friends. You should buy it!
After age 35, EVERY other makeup brand I tried, including hypo-allergenic, botanical, etc., caused my skin to break out. BUT NOT BARE ESCENTUALS!!! Thank you for such a wonderful product line!
This is now the only powder I will buy. Great for acne-prone skin. It won't make you break out.
I've been using bareMinerals for over a year now and can't imagine using anything else! I love the new design that keeps the powder from falling out everywhere while I'm traveling!

I used to fly a lot for work and when they started putting limits on liquids in carry on bags, I tried bareMinerals to replace liquid foundation and loved it. It's not too cake-y for me, gives coverage, but looks very natural and lasts longer through the day. I battled shine with liquid foundations and don't have that issue now. Also, my skin breaks out less.

Bare Minerals foundation gives great results - evens out my skin tone and gives buildable coverage where needed. Easy to wear (non-irritating) - I can't feel it on my skin but the visual results say it's there!
This is my second time purchasing this foundation powder. I have had numerous compliments on my skin with this foundation on. Very natural finish. I will be 50 years old this year.
i love this makeup! its basically amazing, it covers everything you want perfectly!

I have only been using BE for a year now, but I am truly addicted. Their foundation is so light, yet it covers all my flaws. My favorite thing is that it makes me look naturally beautiful without feeling like I have loads of make up on.
had the starter kit. was on my wish list xmas 08. now i've bought it for myself. goes with my earthy persona. i've had a gazillion compliments on how nice my skin is. definitely a great buy!!!

This powder is silky and can be easily applied and lasts all day on my normal/combination skin. I am AA and the golden tan matches my skin perfectly. I would definitely advise you to go in the store to get matched up first before purchasing. I may need to purchase a darker color in the summer, but for now, I have the perfect coverage. It'd definitely worth the price.
I've been using BE foundation for several years now. I LOVE it! I've tried going back to liquid & can't do it. I've tried other mineral make ups & they just aren't as good as BE, for me anyway.
i dont know why everyone raves about this stuff. it did nothing for me, made my complexion appear worse, and looked cakey. i returned it.

I struggle with acne as a 30 something adult and this not only covers any blemish but helps keep me from breaking out to begin with. Pair this with some prime time oil control primer and you have a perfect match for your face.
I have tried all kinds of foundation, from liquid to powders, and I always return to Bare Minerals. It feels good and with the proper shade, does not look mask-like.

I wanted to try another type of foundation for a change but why fix something that is not broken. This is the best foundation for those of us who sometimes are too lazy to wash our face at the end of the day.
I loovvve the way this feels, it gives me silky feeling skin. It covers up what I want, and if I make a mistake it's easy to fix.

Overall, I am not completely impressed with bareMinerals. Every color that I have tried on my skin never matched, and that is my problem with it. It always made my skin look orange. Other then that, I really have nothing bad to say about the product. It has great coverage, and that is just what I look for. Unfortunately, it just isn't a color match with my skin.
I love BE! It is such a great product. I have combo skin, and it works wonders in the dry climate I live in!

reviews.review_title: LOVE! Will never use anything but this again
reviews.review_text: I love bareminerals foundation. I've been using it for years now and I love the finish (which looks totally natural). I first tried it with the kit and I used it with warmth and mineral veil and I think altogether the look is amazing! When I get lazy I only use the foundation and it's still ok - I don't look washed out like I do with liquid foundation (my old covergirl) or other pressed foundations (i used to use clinique and neutrogena). This can be messy but it's not terrible because you can brush it all away anyways. I won't ever try anything else. I think I've found the one product that is good for me, made from natural materials, and makes me look the way I want to. BTW it's actually creamy when you put it on! I didn't believe this at first because it's a powder but the Sephora guy told me that it has a creamy texture and it really does!
Good coverage without looking like you have make-up on. I have sensitive skin and Bare Esentuals works great on me.
Great makeup, can be slightly messy though! Helps with my acne prone skin and seems to stick aroud all day! Highly recommended!!
Is exelent, my number one foundation I love it.
This covers really well for something that looks so natural. I have very pale skin and it can be hard to find foundation that looks right on me but this product is perfect.

i've heard nothing but good things about bare escentuals so i decided to give it a try. it is amazing. i've gotten so many compliments since i first started using it a few weeks ago, that my skin looks more healthy and has a more refreshed and awake look. applying it is easy, and it blends flawlessly with my skin tone. i absolutely love this product and recommend it to anyone looking for a new foundation.

reviews.review_title: perfect for people who want less.
reviews.review_text: It's sheer enough to let skin shine through but can also be full coverage. It feels like i have nothing on. I use the matte version of light and it combats oil and shine wonderfully. the only down fall is that you must reapply through out the day if you have oily skin. Yet, it is the ONLY foundation i can use because it looks and feels very natural.
Wonderful best foundation i have ever used!!!

I've used this foundation for years, after being dissatisfied with other products. I love the texture and lightness, as well as the blendability of this wonderful foundation. My skin tend toward dryness, not a surprise at my age (67) but this still looks natural and un-made-up, while providing generous and invisible coverage.

i am soo amazed by this product. i got it in the color fair, which is the lightest shade, and it is perfect. when i first applied it, i made the mistake of applying too much. next time i will not put on as much. my mother got it in the color fairly light and she got it demoed on her face in the store. i definitely suggest buying this in the store instead of online and get some help picking the color out. there is a color for every skin type and it looks like you aren't wearing any makeup. i have a lot of redness in my cheeks. this totally covers it. i also have very dry skin and this doesn't flake which amazes me. i used to use a cream foundation especially for dry skin and it still flaked. this is the best foundation i have ever used. my mom, my cousin, my grandmother, my aunt, and i use it. that shows that it is great for all ages.

I have used this for about a year and at first it was PERFECT! Looked amazing and I got so many compliments on how my skin looked, However, my skin is becoming more and more dry as I continue to use this product. Sometimes my forehead is itchy and there are multiple places on my face that are flaky and red :( I am switching to a moisture infused liquid makeup!!

skeptical at first like everyone else, but after a year of using bare minerals I can proudly say that this is my foundation and I will use nothing else. Skin looks flawless, no caking, nice glow, and doesn't sweat off my skin. One recommendation, although it is long-lasting, I still use a skin primer so I don't have to reapply (which happens sometimes). I use the bare minerals primer.
this is the only make up I use and I am over 60 and it has been the only make up not to draw attention to my winkles. it evens out my skin tone too

This is a must have. Even if you use a liquid foundation at times, This just good to have on hand. I use this when I go to the gym, just to have a little color on my face. Great for summer, just something that every women needs to have on hand.
The consultant helping me was very helpful with helping me find my colors.

I have been a bareMinerals user for years, and this foundation is perfect! The shade matches my skin perfectly during winter months, and I have had tons of people tell me what beautiful skin I have and they couldn't believe I wasn't wearing any makeup. Of course, I was, but bareMinerals gives such flawless, natural coverage, you can fool any body!
Great foundation. I have been using it for years and it looks very natural. My sister always comments that my face looks great even though I have blemishes.
I like this product. It is not thick and last all day long.

The best foundation I have used in my 66 years. I have been using bare minerals for approximately 11 years. I have extremely sensitive skin, with broken capilarries and uneven skin-tone. I constantly get compliments saying how good my skin looks and how much younger than 66 I look. The coverage is great and it does not look like I am wearing make-up.
I love the bareMinerals brand, but this foundation was really pink too sparkly. I returned for a shade out of the 'matte' collection.

I've used bareMinerals for years and this product is really not up to par. The Matte foundation is so much better. This one actually accentuates pores and makes it clearly evident that I am wearing make-up, despite the fact that I am very careful to use as little product as necessary. I suggest spending the few extra dollars and purchasing the Matte foundation.

I have been skeptical about how a powder could give you full coverage until I saw a friend use it. I was in Sephora and decided to have an makeup artist choose my shade. I'm SO glad I did because I would have been about 5 shades off. It really has made a difference and pretty easy to apply - my kind of make up! I highly recommend having someone help with the shade.
i love this, it goes on easy and looks great. at first it looks a bit powdery, then turns into a natural kind of dewy finish. can build up coverage. use a thicker brush for more coverage.

reviews.review_title: The best foundation I've ever used!
reviews.review_text: This foundation is AMAZING! It covers everything and MORE. I've been on the search for a good foundation to hide my blemishes, acne and other imperfections, and this has been the only product to truly hide everything. Highly recommended!  I did knock one star due to the lack-buster packaging. The click-lock is good in theory, but I end up wasting a bit more product by trying to get it out of the container. :( Despite this flaw, I will continue to buy this brand, since it's the only one that has worked for me.

reviews.review_title: my skin is so much better
reviews.review_text: I started using BE earlier this year and I love it! My skin has really improved and to be honest, I did not know it needed to be improved, but I've really noticed a difference. I would never use anything other than a mineral foundation now. Definitely recommend!
used this for about 5 years, love it, I use nothing else

reviews.review_title: One of the Best Makeup in the World
reviews.review_text: This was the first foundation I have ever used in the whole life. I have oily skin with acne. This makeup will not clog your pores or cuase any sort of irritation. One thing that I don't really like about this is that it can get messy! I spill it sometimes. Also, I don't feel it covers up pimples during my break outs and sometimes I don't feel the coverage is full enough. But, without my break outs, this makeup has made my skin look its best. I recommended this to a friend and she loves it! Everyone should give this a try!

This is the worst makeup I have ever put on my face. It must not be made for my age group . It accentuates the wrinkles and doesn't cover the flaws. Made my face feel tight and dry. I looked 10 years oldr, I woud have been better off with no makeup on at all.
My skin looks great, decent coverage. The best mineral makeup of all that I've tried.
I've used this for over 6 years and now my daughter (who tried many other kinds of bases) told me she wanted to try Bare Minerals, so I purchased it for her & she loves it too!!! Can't beat it!
My last order were all bought as holiday gifts. I was always happy with the products I have purchased and used myself, so I felt great ordering them as gifts. Everyone seemed happy. Thanks.
Works great, have been using bare minerals for years.

i have used the bare escentuals for several years. I am over 50 years old and it provides adequate coverage but does not accentuate the wrinkles and lines. wouldn't use anything else. Medium beige is the color most caucasans use.

reviews.review_title: I can't live without this stuff
reviews.review_text: I caved to all the hype on the mineral makeups and tried Bare Minerals. I LOVE IT. I can't wear any other make up. I have finally figured out why my face broke out for so long. I haven't had a breakout in the past month - it's awesome!!

I am unhappy with bareMinerals new packaging of this product. It doesn't allow all of the minerals to come out and I end up having to throw 25% of the product away which makes me very unhappy. I will be looking for a new brand!
I love this product, but I should have went with the light color it was a little too dark, but wonderful product love it!

I love this product. I have been using it for about four years now. I used Mary Kay for years and they changed their formula which left my skin looking like I had a lot of pours that were not covered. This product covers those poors and gives me an over all smooth appearance.
I rate bareMinerals high on my list of makeup! I have been using their products for 5 years and I have no regrets!!

Iabsolutely love this mineral foundation. Have use others, but no comparison to Bare Escentuals. Color goes on smoothly and evenly, and you barely know you have it on. Colors are true and last all day.
Love this! Covers everything! light weight. Everything is just perfect!
I Love, love love, bare minerals! I don't like to feel a lot of makeup on my face and this basically feels like nothing while still concealing everything needed!
This is the best foundation ever!
All BE products are fantastic. I prefer the MATTE myself. Purchased the regular because it is cheaper. Love the BE products.
This is the greatest foundation ever! It gives excellent coverage and evens my skin tone perfectly! It never feels heavy and always looks natural.

I have porcelain skin, so I chose the lightest shade. It blends nicely and looks great all day. I have oily skin and usually have trouble with breakouts from foundation, but I don't have any problems with this one :)
This is the perfect foundation!!! It doesn't break my skin out, I don't have a make-up line, and I don't look like I'm wearing makeup!!!!
Don't leave home without it!
perfect controllable coverage, perfect luminous finish, and my skin loves it!
I have been using this product for over 4 years now and still love the way it makes my skin look!!! thanks bare essentials!!!!

my skin is SUPER prone to acne & even though i use a pretty well-known acne skin care regimine, i tend to break out from my time to time. this foundation is the only product that i have found to work for me. i don't have to use a lot & the coverage is fabulous. it's light but totally takes care of all those pesky broken out areas (should they appear) & honestly, i can sleep in this stuff and the next day, my skin LOOKS BETTER! Crazy, I know, but true. this product is a miracle & if you've NEVER tried it, you are doing yourself a great disservice.

reviews.review_title: Medium is just right for me
reviews.review_text: Having always thought of myself as being fair-skinned, I've realized recently, that I'm more of a medium. I've tried medium golden, but it seemed to make my skin look a little yellowish, so I've mixed it with the faux tan to give myself the right color. I decided to try medium, which seems to be just right! I cannot say enough about the BE line of products - I have extremely sensitive skin, and my skin feels completely natural with the Bare Minerals, and people say they can't tell I have on any makeup at all. That's a great compliment to this line!!!
This is the best foundation. Powder goes on flawlessly

Okay, I know I am the 15000th (almost literally, here) person to gush over BE foundation, but it is seriously the most wonderful foundation I have ever used. I have combo skin with the occasional breakout. I was using Clinique liquid foundation when my mom bought a BE starter kit for my sister about five years ago. I was hesitant at first - I couldn't believe that this powder would offer coverage the way a liquid did. I was wrong - the coverage was better, and more natural-looking to boot! I have tried both the original and the matte and I go back and forth depending on the season. I love this makeup. It's so easy to blend; no more foundation line at my chin like I used to have with liquid. I don't feel like I am even wearing any makeup. I have also found that using the foundation dabbed on with the concealer brush works just as well - if not better - than the Bisque product for a concealer. I have tried several brushes and have found the one that works the best for application of the foundation is the Heavenly Face brush - TOTALLY worth the moolah, there.  I LOVE BE. I don't know what I would do if they quit making it! This stuff is magic.
I love how light feeling this is but it has adequate coverage. Doesn't make my skin break out

Bare Escentuals has always been a great ace in the hole for me. This foundation ultimatly attracted me because of the SPF factor, and, being a porcelain living in the desert, I always need some protection from the sun. My color is Fairly Light, and it matches my skin tone perfectly. Theres plenty of coverage, and when I sweep the smallest bit of the Feather Light Mineral Veil-little goes a long way- my skin looks radient and glows with a subtle, natural matte finish.
Feels and looks great!

I love bareMinerals products, but the foundation shades always seemed a little off for my skin tone - UNTIL NOW! Fairly Medium is a new shade offering, and it is the perfect match for my skin tone. I absolutley LOVE it. It covers imperfections beautifully.
Accept no substitutions. You will love this make-up.
I love this product!
I have tried so many brands of foundations and i have always come back to Bare Escentuals as the best one! The coverage is unbeatable and so fast and easy to use!
Nice coverage, good color, very natural and light.

I purchased this back in August in Fairly Light and I love it! The coverage is good because its buildable and gives you a natural look, but I just wished the foundation would last longer. I do however suggest that people who have dry skin should switch to a liquid instead of a powder foundation. This is excellent for oily or combonation skin though. I think I might purchase a shade darker than Fairly Light due to its actually lighter than it looks in the picture and I have to use Warmth brozer to make the right shade. All in all, I like using this powder foundation and will continue to do so.
I love love love the BE makeup! it looks natural and dosen't make me breakout like most makeup. Five Stars!!
Ia a perfect shade for me, golden medium, and it evens out my skin tone for a flawless look!

This mineral based foundation seriously changed my life. No joke. I have oily skin and very sensitive skin, which lead me to breakouts most my teenage life. I always wore heavy liquid makeup to cover any imperfection. I didn't believe in this, that it could cover and make me feel secure still, BUT IT DOES! It's amazing, it covers so much and ever since I started using it several years ago my skin is amazing. My skin is SO healthy now and I seldom ever get breakouts. I couldn't live without this product!
Is the first time i use it and i love it!!!! I dont think I want to go back to the liquid foundation. Is great, easy and fast! It looks natural and covers every imperfection.....
bare escentuals is the only way to go!!
I got this foundation in a customizable BE kit. Love it!
This make up is so clean. When I switched to using bare minerals my face just cleared up.

I love Bare Minerals so of course I thought this was perfect. This is my second purchase of the foundation. Great results everytime and the new locking container really helps to eliminate spillage and unecessary wasting.
nice buidable coverage (light to medium). doesn't break me out. blends nicely

This foundation really is all it's made out to be, if you are using the right color and right brush I don't know how you couldn't be happy with the result. I always hated wearing foundation because its so heavy, this product makes you feel like you don't even have makeup on.
My favorite foundation - helps make my skin look awesome and clears it up too! Always get lots of compliments on how well it matches my skin tone. Definitely worth it!
I bought this product a few weeks ago, and I use a light dusting over my MAC studiofix. It gives me a nice glow :o)

reviews.review_title: Great for the look, bad for the skin.
reviews.review_text: I have very fair acne prone skin. I used Bare Escentuals for a long time. I love the coverage. It goes on great, covers well, looks great. If I was only grading on that, I would give this product five stars.  However, I get these tiny bumps on my skin, like tiny little whiteheads. You can't see unless I get very close and show you, but I know they are there and I hate them. They form mostly on my chin. I saw a dermatologist who told me that since it it made of minerals, which are basically like ground up tiny rocks, that when you wash your face, you can't possibly wash it all off. The little pieces stick in your pores and your body produces oil to cover the foreign substance.  So, basically these bumps I was getting were due to the mineral powder. I stopped using it and saw immediate results. After months of not using the powder any longer, my skin is clear. So, it's a toss up!!
Love it! After 6 plus years ? Nuf said I think...
You can't go wrong---master the BE technique--swirl, tap buff and you are on your way to perfect skin! I get compliments all the time---I am happy to tell everyone it's not me--it's BE!
bare minerals foundation is my favorite, its nice and light and easy to apply.
Love this product, I have been using BM for about 8 years now and I am still totally in love with it.

Nice natural coverage but after an hour or so, it looked very worn like I ran through dirt. I was also using this foundation for a light coverage for some acne blemishes and after half a day of wear, i severely broke out even in places i didn't have break outs before. Not meant for everyone :/

LOVE THIS PRODUCT. Initially, I choked at spending $25 for foundation. But, honestly, this product lasts for forever. I had my first two foundations (one for summer, one for winter, as I get quite tan during the summers) for nearly 3 years. Well worth the price.  I also have very oily skin, and needed a foundation that would work with my skin to avoid making it even more oily - this was perfect.  Additionally, it caused no breakouts, and very few people could tell I was wearing any makeup whatsoever (not to say that the coverage wasn't phenomenal -- it was just natural looking!)  The only catch is to wash the brushes every month or so, or else the bacteria will get trapped in the brushes, and might cause breakouts. Other than that simple microbiology fact (which applies to every single foundation known to womankind), I'm thrilled with this product.
Good coverage, but must start at side of face or the powder will settle in the pores on your nose and chin emphasizing them
I love the natural but very good coverage.
This is the best foundation for coverage, natural looking, glow enhancing and stay power. I would never try another because this is the BEST!

I've had such trouble in the past finding both a foundation shade and consistency that I like. I love this foundation! The shade finder was so helpful. I recommend using that because the swatches are a little misleading. This foundation is gentle and light, but manages to cover even my acne scars.
This, by far, the best foundation I've ever used. Have been using for over two years and have never had a reason to change.

I have been wearing this product for about 4 yrs. now. I always come back to this color. It covers enough without looking like coverage which is a plus for older skin. My younger daughters use it and love the product as well.

I have always struggled with skin issues coupled with using cheap foundations. And skin issues caused by the cheap foundations that appeared to be doing their job, but apparently the job details were much more than making your skin look nice! This is such a wonderful product, no pores plugged, no greasiness, and it takes away any hint of redness for me. This is a fantastic product, well worth the buck.
I will never use another foundation. I love the coverage that covers any imperfections and doesn't feel heavy like a liquid foundation! LOVE IT!
I can't live without this product!
Love this stuff! Great coverage and actually improves skin.
Has a very natural finish, doesnt look heavy, feels great!
Excellent product, even on older skin. Good coverage, non-drying and no irritation.
AM 70 PLUS,WISH I HAD THIS PRODUCT LONG AGO, AMAZING FOR MY STILL OILY SKIN

This is a really great product. The buildable coverage allows me to use it alone with concealer, or on top of a foundation. It has a true, natural, no makeup look finish, which I love. Perfect for any skin type, and lasts through the entire day!

I use this product to set my liquid foundation, along with the other powders in the kit, and I always get a flawless finish! The new click, lock, go packaging isn't very effective in keeping the powder from spilling.

Over all i would say this is one of my favorite products. If you need light to medium coverage this product is AMAZING. You can add more for full coverage but i usually need a little bit of concealer when trying to cover recent blemishes. Good for all day wear, you might need a touch up but not likely. I would recommend this to anyone!

feels like there's nothing there, while evening out my skintone and providing a layer of smoothness and cover-up to my face. My only complaint is the dispenser. Lots of powder gets wasted or caught in little nooks and crannies of the container from just traveling around with the foundation in my makeup bag.

If you are looking for good make up, this is it. You can build it for coverage or keep it sheer. You can cater it to your mood and occassion. I love this product. Just remember to use a good base and a little at a time and brush it on. If you think you look cakey, use a spray to set the make up at the end. I love this and I have tried tons of foundation. Every time when I use this, someone compliments that my skin looks great. Only set back for me is that it doesn't last as long as I want. Just need to touch up at mid day after 5 hours.
I like that it has SPF!
love it. hides blemishes and i don't feel like there's anything on my face.
This stuff is great....feels weightless on but gives you that beautiful almost airbrush finish we love....and good for your skin to boot.....i never want to be without it.

I think Bare Minerals is great for every day wear. I have decent skin, a red bump here or there sometimes and coverage is great for it however, I know people with worse skin than me who need more coverage and my older female relatives don't think it gives them enough wrinkle coverage. Guess we'll find out....
If it were the only make-up product I could own I would be very happy. I've been wearing it for three years now and love it....its quick easy and flawless...really!

reviews.review_title: Great foundation - no so great container
reviews.review_text: As always the Bare Escentuals foundation is exceptional. I've been using it for 10+ years. However, I don't like the new container which gets clogged and won't allow the entire container to be used. I have discovered that the bottom can be popped off - so I scoop out a few spoonfuls into an old container and it works great. - Please go back to the old container.
since i started using the bareminerals, i have not used any other make ups. this makes really natural looking skin. i love it.
Since this is the ONLY foundation that I use, I obviously love it! Covers great yet you never look like you're wearing make-up. I have rosacea, but you'd never know it :o)

I like the original but I love the matte BE foundation. With the original I find myself having to apply the mineral veil in the course of the day because I tend to get oily. With the matte I never have to worry about reapplying anything else from the first time. I don't get the coverage I want so I have to put on a cream concealer, my favorite from Amazing Cosmetics, and then I apply the BE foundation on after my concealer. It looks absolutely flawless. BE for me is the finishing touch to my makeup regimen. I have acne scarring so to conceal I need to apply something other than BE as it doesn't give me full coverage. It gives you a natural look like you're born with beautiful skin. The first time I used BE foundation I didn't apply it correctly and sent it back. After some time I went back and gave it another shot and I'm so glad I did because it's something I cannot live without. I apply way more than the suggested amount. I see powder on my bristles, unlike how they present it on tv. Heavy handed or not, you still get a natural look. This was my initial experience with BE. Matte is my go-to product and makeup finisher. And it will always BE.
Good value for the money and great coverage.
love this product, use it everyday!
i tried sample package which is small container but it lasted me almost a year, this was my replacement and think will last me about two years.
Light fee, perfect shade, makes my skin glow and so soft!
Now with SPF..great. Love how this feels on my skin.
This foundation is great for blending away blotchiness and uneven skin tones, and it feels like I have nothing on my face even though it wears through an entire day. Very good product!
Can't go a day without it. Once you use Bare Minerals you wont turn back. :)
I love bareMinerals! It goes on easily and I can apply how much coverage is needed. It looks very natural ~ like I don't have makeup on ~ just better than without it!
This is my favorite foundation. Blends well, doesn't cake, good for your skin..
I have used bareMinerals for over 10 years and I love it. It evens out my skin tone and looks so natural that people think I wear no foundation at all. I love it.

Unfortunately this foundation made my forehead itch like crazy and break out in tiny bumps. Too bad, good color but not worth enduring itchy skin. Also something to consider when buying this: you don't just apply and go in the morning; you have to swirl, tap and buff. Morning routine took a bit longer due to application method.
lovely and flawless can't fault it, lovely to use and easy
I havent used anything else for years. Once I discovered this product it was a wrap for everything else I tryed.

I love this stuff. I hate the feel of makeup on my face, and I've been using bareMinerals for years now. I don't feel like I'm wearing makeup at all. I'm not sure about this new top. If I have extra in the cap to dump back in, it's a little difficult to get it back into the right area. I'm sure I'll get used to it - at least I won't have makeup everywhere when traveling now!

reviews.review_title: love the product but hate the new containers
reviews.review_text: Note sure what the deal is but I hate the new containers and the quantity has been reduced. I love the product but I'm sure I will love another as well. I have been using BMinerals for years.

I love bareMinearls foundation. I used liquid before and switched to this foundation over a year ago. It makes a huge difference for my skin by keeping it looking fresh all day. I wouldn't use anything else!

I've been using this product for about 6 years ago and love the way it covers. I will not got back to the cream foundations that you just can't spead evenly and melt on your face during the summer or exercise. Like iI said before great product!
I have really oily skin, so the matte is perfect.
i love this stuff. it covers up all my acne scars and doesn't leave my face looking like im wearing a ton of makeup. the best part about this is that it doesn't make me break out because its natural.
I'm in love :) Natural looking and does not cake! woohoo!!

I had been using liquid foundation for a while, and always felt like my skin couldn't breathe! Now, I'm SO glad I started using bareMinerals loose powder. It lasts all day and I don't feel like my pores are clogged! It looks natural and feels light.

this is not working for me. I like the mineral veil but i feel like the colors are either light or dark. Make something almondy? I have used sheer cover for a long time and switched to this bcz its easy to buy in stores.

this stuff is awesome. i'm in 9th grade so i still get acne. this is great for covering up the redness of acne and acne scars. it doesn't look like i'm wearing a bunch of makeup. in fact it looks like my skin is naturally radiant. you only have to use a little bit for it to work. so it's gonna last me a long time.

I have dry skin so I usually just use this product to settle and hold my tinted moisturizer. The coverage is great! But if you have dry skin it will leave you feeling dryer. So just make sure you use the right amount and a good moisturizer along with it.

I have been using BareMinerals foundation for years. I still love the stuff. This is the best mineral makeup I have ever tried. (I have tried a lot). It goes on smooth and doesn't dry out my skin. I love the new locking device on it now. Overall great product.
Love bare minerals foundation - it covers without being heavy and doesn't make my sensitive skin break out. LOVE IT.
No matter what other product I try and always come back to bareminerals because it is the best one for my skin and coverage
This is by far the best makeup i have ever used!!!!
Incredible how so little does so much! You look like you have a flawless complexion. Works great as a concealer too!
The best makeup I have ever used. It covers well without the cakeed on look. So natural. I get so many compliments on my skin. Thanks Bare Escentuals!

I thought that my over-50-year-skin would need a liquid foundation. I keep returning to bareMinerals which I have used for over 10 years. The only adjustment I have made is to use a moisture mist to complete the look to keep it looking dewey. It is easy to use very forgiving even when in a hurry.

I tried this foundation as a sample in a past Sephora order. I liked it so much, that I ordered my own full-sized foundation.  This foundation is very natural-looking and doesn't bother my skin at all. I have acne prone skin and it does not clog my pores.  I guessed what my shade would be, and for the first time in my life, it was actually spot on. I have very fair, olive/yellow-toned skin and it's nearly impossible for me to find a foundation that matches me correctly...but because BareMinerals has such a great shade range, I was able to find my perfect shade. Awesome! I also LOVE how there's descriptions of the shades!  I have skin discoloration and I don't find this product to be much of a problem for that. Like any foundation, you need to layer on more for areas that need it.  Since this is a powder foundation, I'm not sure if I would recommend this for dry-skinned people. If you have dry patches, or dry skin in general, try exfoliating your skin and moisturizing it before applying this foundation so it doesn't emphasize your dry areas.  All in all, I love this foundation. It's great and I think I'll order my mom some!
I have a pale yellowish skin tone and it's really hard for me to find a foundation that matches it, but this does almost perfectly. I won't use anything else.
Covered my pigmentation better than using concealer and foundation, left a very professional look.
Does not look like powder when you put it on right. Just nice light coverage and a bit of protection.
I absolutely love bareminerals! If you use the brushes correctly you get an absolute perfect coverage. I am never afraid to fall asleep with this on. I love it.

I love this makeup! It creates a nice glow and lasts all day. I have oily skin and break out easily, but i can wear this makeup all day and even sleep in it and i don't breakout at all! It doesn't however cover dark circles well so i would recommend using a conceler for under eyes.
I love Bare Minerals products. The foundation covers well and looks natural. I do not have breakouts since I began using this product. Will never go back to liquid makeup.

i love bareMinerals! i do still use my Clinique Even Better liquid foundation when i'm really broken out and need full coverage but that doens't happen very often now thanks to bareMinerals! it really does allow your skin to breathe which is awesome for me since i work almost everyday (which means i'm wearing makeup basically everday) and can't always give my skin a makeup break. i've always been a bit of a concealaholic because of the redness in my face but paired with a dense, kabuki style brush, this foundation covers nicely. the new travel lid is great and they have several shades to chose from with pink, yellow, and neutral undertones. i also love that there are no harsh chemicals and that the price is pretty decent. i have oily skin and it keeps my face matte without that flat look. it lasts about three months for me and i use it almost everyday. basically this foundation is pretty great, so go get it :)
I've been a BE girl for a few years now and I won't use any other foundation. The coverage is great!

reviews.review_title: Bare Minerals .... best for oily Skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing this makeup for about 4 years and will never change. My oily skin looks flawless with this easy to apply powder makeup. I almost never even have to use coverup.
The best! Nothing beats Bare Escentuals.

I love my bareminerals. My skin is so sensitive and even when properly cleaned and moisturized it tends to peel and get flaky when foundation is rubbed or wiped on. The mineral foundation applied with a brush is the perfect solution for me. I do not think that I get as good of coverage as they advertise, but it is so natural looking that I am ok with not being 100% perfect. I use urban decay pencil concealer as the bisque concealer by bareminerals is too dark for me. This is the first container I have bought with the new twist and lock sifter and so far it works good, but it doesn't seem to be completely leak proof.

This foundation looked really good for about the first fifteen minutes, and the half hour I spent applying the makeup was basically worthless. I have used this product for about three years now, and have just not been happy with the coverage.

Although I'm more of a tinted moisturizer gal, I thought I'd try out bare minerals to see if it'd help me with my 17 year old acne scared skin. It does a pretty decent job, but the coverage isn't like my tinted moisturizer. When I use this stuff I usually use my tinted moisturizer then add a little of this on top to get a matte look. I love all my bare mineral products but the foundation is just okay if you have semi dry skin and acne.
I finally found the perfect shade for my asian skintone. I am absolutely in love with this product.

I've been using BareMinerals Foundation for 7+ years and I won't use anything else. It makes this 54 yr. old Lady look 10-15yrs younger. Properly applied, it covers years of abuse. I also love that it doesn't feel heavy and icky.

This is by far the best foundation ever made. Whether you want a sheer or full coverage you got it. I like the fairly medium the best for my skin tone which varies from light to medium during the year. The fairly light and fairly medium are made for skin with pink or no undertones. I have combo skin and this foundation is perfect.

BareMinerals is in my opinion the best makeup ever- it goes on light but stays put all day and covers anything without feeling like you have a bunch of goup on your face it is both foundation and concealer, I love love love it! it looks natural too!
I've tried them all, and for me, Bare Minerals is still the best foundation out there. The new golden tone blends flawlessly on my light olive skin. Most other makeup is too pink for my complexion.

i've been using bare mineras for a while now... perfect coverage (you totally control it) great on skin (sometimes i dont even wash it off at night and no breakouts). Only problem was that it was hard to travel with cause the powder got every where, and now they've fixed that.
I have only been a bare minerals user for a couple of months but never again will I use anything else!

I have ance and scars that i really do not like. I tried a lot of makup to cover the scars, but the foundation was so heavy that it cause me to break out more. Once i tried bare minerals i notice it had a creamy feel and it made my face flawless. Not only did it cover my scars, but it has improve my skin. This is the only makeup i will be using because I trust how it makes my skin flawless unlike other make up.

Bare minerals SPF medium foundation is my daily basic start. I've been using it on my elderly (I'm almost 60) skin for about 4 years now and very happy....people mistake me for much younger all the time.
I bought this product before to try it and loved it, but tried something else also. I've since returned to bareMinerals and will continue to use this as my face make up. Well worth the money.

Love, love, LOVE this stuff. I have pink areas and dark blue under-eye circles (Oh, the curse of see-through skin!), and I don't even need a concealer when I use this stuff. It's also mattifying. Great product! (Just wish they had an SPF 30 version.)

I really liked how it covers all my red spots and pimples, but the clean look only lasts up to 5 hours during work, after that it starts to look like heavy makeup, but compared to other stuff i tried its a lot better.
Great foundation and love that it's SPF 15!

I started using Bare Escentuals several years ago after watching an infomercial and it was the best impulse buy of my life!! I have complicated skin and have always hated liquid foundation, not only for what it did to my skin but also because of the made-up look that it produced. I teach in a high school and prefer a more natural look to a glam look and Bare Escentuals has answered all of my prayers. My skin loves this product, I have had no negative reactions, no skin congestion, just a fabulous, even, natural looking glow. I have recommended this product to many of my friends and my sons' girlfriends. They are all now avid Bare Escentuals users and fans. The purchase is well worth the investment and I am loving the new click and lock dispenser!!
wonderful product covers well, great for oily skin!
I've been using this foundation for about 6 years now and still love it! I use just a bit at a time so it lasts for months.

I received this foundation in a set and i really like it. it has light to medium coverage depending on how much you use. its totally fool proof because its so easy to apply and it doesn't look cakey. it gives a glowy finish that makes your skin looks healthy. overall a good mineral foundation. oh and it has not broken me out.

I have had acne scars since I was in middle school and I have tried heavy make up to try and cover it but you could always tell. With bare Minerals I just put on lotion with SPF which leaves my skin more moist and makes it stay on better. it covers the hardest blemishes, and discolorations. I love bare minerals and have been using it for years and will continue to use it for years!

this takes practice to learn how to get it on correctly. Must be done in thin layers and then it is addable. It can not be put on heavy or it looks like dirt. I like it but since I am older it can go into wrinkles and lines. Must be careful about that.
have been using it for several years. Fast and easy.

I can't say enough how much I love the Bare Minerals products. My skin used to be problematic and I'd get breakouts of cystic acne regularly. I started using BM a couple of years ago and although it's not a medical product per se, my skin has improved in leaps and bounds. I can actually leave the house without makeup now, but I rarely do since I love the products so much. Make sure you get the right color, and the right brush, and you'll never regret it.
Always get compliments when I wear this foundation.

I have used B.E. foundation for years. I love it. I have only good things to say about it except in ONE area- used by itself (with primer) it does become undeniably shiny. A little too much so. With foundation (liquid) I don't seem to have the problem... But if I just want to wear this I get shiny. Maybe I will try the matte formulation soon.  Buttttt- overall it's an excellent product! I use this as an everyday concealer as well. I use a small angle tipped eyeshadow brush for that. It works wonderfully. It blends well, has great staying power, and looks extremely natural, and it's pretty affordable compared to some other powders. You get a good amount of powder.
My favorite make up. Leaves my skin looking flawless and has a very natural finish. You don¬¥t look as if you had make up on.
I use a lighter color as my concealer and a darker verson to warm and even my skin tone. These are great. I also use the brushes that came in the starter kit.
I love this product! It really is a great foundation that doesn't feel like foundation and it's so healthy for my skin!

I am not generally loyal to a product, but this won me over. I have used this foundation for several years and won't consider another. I would never go back to liquid foundation! While my skin is not perfect, I often receive compliments saying that it is. One of the things I hear frequently is Your skin is so pretty and with no makeup! Hahahaha! It takes a little practice to perfect the application but the effort is well worth it. I only wish I'd begun using it sooner.

I love this foundation. For my skin tone I use fairly light, and it works great. I have mild rosacea and it covers very well and evenly. It is much better than all the creme or liquid foundations I have tried in the past. You can use very little and it goes a long way. The brushes are great also. I haven't used anything else since I began using this foundation over 2 years ago.

When I first tried BE's mineral foundation 6 years ago I wasn't sure how I would like it. I absolutely love this stuff. It's light weight, doesn't feel cakey on yoru skin & it goes on so evenly. I would never go back to a liquid foundation again. This stuff is THE BEST.

I switched to bareMinerals from another brand of foundation with this product, and I am very glad I made the switch! Excellent coverage, a good price, and the new attachment in the jar keeps too much powder from spilling around in storage!

I've been using Chanel foundation for years. Just started using Bare Minerals and have gotten many comments recently from friends and strangers alike about how good my skin looks and how natural my makeup looks. Never had anyone comment before so there is definitely a noticeable difference! And it's a good difference!  I think it is very easy to use, covers well, feels great, looks great! I use Warmth as an eyeshadow as well when I just want a simple, natural look during the day.  For anyone thinking about trying Bare Minerals - don't wait! Do it now. I had thought about giving it a try for a long time but just had a hard time switching from my favorite Chanel products. I'm saving tons of money using Bare Minerals since I finally made the switch a month ago.
i would like to think that i will never stop using this wonderful stuff
I love this line of products. Very nice, light coverage without a makeup feel.
I have used this produce for years and my skin always looks flawless. It lasts all day and does not need touchups.

I love this foundation as I use one product to conceal and even out my skin tone. No more trying to match different products. For any Bare Essentuals users/future users, I have one piece of advice: to keep it from looking cakey and powdery, go into a Bare Essentuals store and ask for a demo on the best technique with which to apply the foundation. You need to put a little into the top and push down with your brush to actually break the powder down into a finer powder. Apply pressure also when applying it to your face and you'll get great coverage without the cakey look. The ladies at the stores are pros.
i do like this and it does what it say its flawless coverage . i know i will not be changing my foundation any time soon. so go try this you,ll love it
better than matte in every way and is creamy and never settles in lines. matte is ok for light coverage in summer months.

This foundation gives pretty good coverage and matched my skin tone. The problem is, when I wore it for more than a few days in a row, my pores got extremely clogged. I can only use it once every few days to prevent this. It also dries my skin. The advantage is the coverage is so good that you do not need any additional concealer, powder or liquid foundation.
I love this foundation. I don't require a lot of coverage so this product is perfect. Very light, yet gives me the perfectly fresh face!

I tried this makeup as a package deal which included foundation,bronzer,mineral veil,primer and brushes. The foundation caused my skin to itch like crazy. At first I didn't realize it was from the foundation(it was allergy season). So I used it for about 2 weeks before realizing it was because of the foundation. As soon as I stopped using the foundation the itching stopped. It did not cover very well.To be fair I have acne prone skin and previous scarring and did not feel it did a good job covering any blemishes,etc However It did feel light and did not look cakey or dry. Foundation seemed to be completely gone within a few hours of wearing. overall not that impressed for use on my skin.

reviews.review_title: Foundation I Come Back to Time and Time Again
reviews.review_text: I Love bareMinerals foundation.

This product is everything I will ever need for a perfect natural complexion. At first I felt that I needed to pack on the product but its all in the buffing, I get more coverage by using less product and buffing more. Now my pot lasts me a good while. Doesn't make me break out, and has SPF! L-O-V-E!!

I have been using bare minerals for 10 years and couldn't be happier! please try it if you are skeptical! i my skin has gone through different stages over the years. i had more of an oily t-zone problem when i was younger and these products are great at absorbing oil and mattifying without looking dull and caked. you just GLOW! lately i have had some redness issues and the minerals cover great but it still looks like your skin. i have slight freckling and you can see them through the makeup if you dont use a ton :) the other awesome thing is that you can wear this stuff for a loooong time. i often sleep in it and it doesn't make me breakout and even looks better than when i first put in on the day before! i will use it FOREVER!
BARE MINERALS MAKES MY SKIN LOOK SO SMOOTH AND FLAWLESS; i HAVE TRIED OTHERS AND THEN DO NOT COMPARE.

I was surprised by how poor the coverage was. It didn't seem to improve by layering. I tried to pat some more on the blemish I have and did not see any coverage. It made my skin look dry and pallid. Later in the day it made my face look oily and pasty and was melting off around my nose. Not a good look. I'll stay away from mineral foundations.

It has taken 30 years for me to find a decent foundation product that doesn't clog pores, doesn't feel heavy and doesn't produce shine. This is it. I can't say enough about how this product has changed my view of foundation. I can reapply it throughout the day with out it feeling heavy or cakey. This the BEST foundation out there.
Excelletent leave my face flawless

Can enough good be said about this product? I have oily skin and was wary of powder foundations--we've all seen that girl trying to cover up shine and ending up with a pancake on her face. However, this stuff is amazing! Fewer breakouts, less oil (especially when combined with a mattifying primer), and a natural finish that looks like you're not wearing makeup, just perfect skin. I wear this every day, out at night, even on my wedding day. And, it takes all of 10 seconds to apply--it's idiot proof. Love!

I love love love Bare Minerals. I work as a flight attendant and this is the only make up I can wear on a 15hour flight without touching up once! It looks the same when I step off the plane as when I started the day. I get so many positive comments on my skin when I wear it. I love how light weight it feels on your skin.

I've been using Bare Minerals for several years now. It's my favorite foundation. You can have as little or as much coverage as you want and it feels like you have nothing on at all. I've tried other brands but keep going back to Bare Minerals......it's the best!!!
This is a great foundation for day and night. It provides great coverage.

The 2 best things I love about this product, other than being so gentle for my sensitive, breakout prone skin, is how quick and easy it is to apply. 1. No more messy hands trying to rub in a liquid makeup. 2. I eliminated 4 products to one; my undereye concealer, my acne scar concealer, my liquid makeup, and my powder to set. This does it all with the right brushes all in one.

I have been using this for 10 years now and I would never go back to liquid make-up!!! Bare Minerals is the best because it is light weight and you don't feel like you have make-up on. The design of the container is great for travel. If you haven't tried it, you need to seriously consider it!!! You will be hooked immediately!!!!

I love this makeup. I never used foundation before Bare Minerals because drug store cream foundation NEVER matched my super-fair skin tone. If you have pretty clear skin already and just need something to take down some redness in your face or cover minor imperfections, this will be perfect for you. If you have a lot of blemishes, the coverage might be too light. I do use a foundation primer, but I'm always impressed when I can actually see the foundation on my makeup wipe at the end of the day. It lasts longer than you'd think.

I have been wearing this color and powder for years. It is my #1 go to color for my skin. I have always had trouble matching my skin tones, but finally I found a makeup that does. I do not have to use much to make my skin look great so it also lasts me quite a while which I love. I have also tried the matte powder. I liked it, but I like my natural glow so came back to this one. I do recommend the matte version for anyone with oilier skin.
I love this make up. I will never go back to creams.. This is great stuff

I love this product. The only problem I have is getting full coverage and find my self needed to re-apply half way through the day. This is the only product I can use to keep my skin from breaking out.

I have medium to olive skin and I use this in a medium. Its a very natural surprisingly creamy finish. You have to be careful not to overdo it, so that it won't look cakey. Otherwise, a great product. Especially like it in the summer and for the day time.

I love bareminerals. I've been using it forever and the shades are really natural. It looks way more natural than wearing liquid foundation or cakey powders. My only complaint is that it can occasionally highlight blemishes and settle into fine lines. But mostly, I love it!
i have used this product for years. i am not really a makeup person, but this turned me on and it has changed my life.

reviews.review_title: perfect cover up on an aging woman
reviews.review_text: My daughter, who I lost to cancer a little over a year ago introduced me to Bare Minerals. It is so soft and easy to apply and it helps cover up some of the old age lines on this 71 year old woman. This is perfect for me because I do not use a lot of makeup, just the foudation and the ID cheerful rouge. Thank you

this foundation is wonderful--have used it for 5 years--I introduced my three daughters to BE and now my granddaughter is using it--its great for all skin types and ages--there has been no more searching for the perfect foundation since we found BE!
I've used this natural-ingredient foundation for years and have loved it!! My favorite thing, besides the fact that I get compliments all the time is that I don't have to wash it off every evening!!
Love this! Swirl, tap,powder - ready for The World! If you have fair skin; this works! Light on face - like a cloud! :)
I love bare minerals and they made it better with the new container that you can twist open and closed. So much less mess!

I have been using this foundation for a while and i still love it. It covers my imperfections wonderfully. It matches my complexion so that you can't tell if I have anything on. I would recommend it to anyone.

I've used this before, and then switched to other foundations because I felt like my skin was too oily for this. I tried the matte one & liked it, but I just got one of this kind again and re-fell in love with it. It really is the best. Just wish it weren't quite so expensive; I use a lot & go through a container pretty quickly.

reviews.review_title: Never going back to liquid foundation!
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for a good 8 years now. I used to wear liquid foundation before this and I will NEVER go back. For those of you that think this does not provide adequate coverage believe me it does. I first started wearing bareMinerals when I had acne and bad skin. It covered my pimples and made my skin so much better. You just have to know how to apply it, otherwise you may think it doesn't work. Great value too, considering you only need a small amount of powder everytime. The only thing is that if you have very dry skin it may flake. I had this problem but I found that if I applied a lightweight moisturizer before, the foundation would go on just fine.
I know everyone loves bareMinerals but for me it doesn't have good coverage. I can't even tell I have it on. I wish I loved it as well as others! :(
I recently decided to try other foundations and came back to this one. The light weight coverage is perfect.

reviews.review_title: Perfect product - tone just too yellow for me
reviews.review_text: This shade is heavy on the yellow tint, product perfect just too yellow for me. I have used bareMinerals foundation for approx 15 years and at 44 years old people constantly comment on how young I look. I love this foundation.
I have used this product for several years and it never lets me down. Easy to use.
Love this base powder! It's light enough that I don't feel too made up, but it still covers my imperfections and evens out my skin tone. Not great under the eyes, though.

As always, bareminerals is the way to go for powder foundation. It's so easy to put on in a rush and has excellent coverage. I also love the fact that it has spf mixed into it. I have been using bareminerals for 4 years now, it's a keeper!

This wasa replacement purchase, I used already all the make up from the started kit I ordered a year ago. It lasts for a long time, it's very gentle and people don't think I have make up on. It's very natural  I got my manager and a couple of friends hooked up on it.

My three daughters and myself have all used Bare Escentuals bareMinerals Foundations for years and I also use their eyeshadow. They are so much easier and simpler than liquid foundations and quite effective for all ages.

This foundation gives my skin the perfect FLAWLESS finish! This version gives a nice glowy look and I also use the bareMinerals Matte when I want a Matte finish. I definitely get the most compliments on my skin with the original formula, though! I apply with a kabuki brush. I love that you can customize your coverage by applying a little extra product where you need it without looking cakey or overdone. Beautiful beautiful beautiful!
I wont use anything else....Period.

This product is the answer to all of my skin problems. I spent most of my life being very self conscious of my acne prone skin. This foundation has given me the skin I've always wanted... naturally beautiful. My acne problems improved once I started using it... and the minor problems I have now are easily covered. It's a perfect match to my skin... and I will NEVER go back to liquid foundation. I LOVE bareMinerals Foundation!!!!

reviews.review_title: Why are there no numbers of the powders??
reviews.review_text: This is so frustrating! I use an NC30 shade and I want to go a shade lighter...how am i supposed to know which one it is just by pictures and descriptions?? Pls fix this!  and YES i love the powder!! :)
This foundatioon is easy to use and lasts all day. I don't like to retouch my make up. This works well.
love it as always!!!

I have been using on and off for this bare mineral foundation last couple of years.. I purchased this product few weeks ago and I think they made huge improved.  I tried a lot of foundations but I never seen this kind of light and super coverage with it.  Buy this ....do not spend your money for wrong product.
Even after 5 years of using this foundation, I am still very happy! I will never change!
I love the light weight coverage and the SPF 15 protection of this product. It covers my under eye circles and small ruddy places on my face. I would recommend this product to everyone.
Started using this product last year, great coverage, light feeling. Makes my skin look so much younger!
I love this powder and always will. I've never found a product. It turns my splotchy skin perfect everyday. This is my one makeup must have!
As a mature woman, I have tried soooo many products but the Bare Escentuals Foundation is light, clean, long lasting and I just Love it!!
I've used BE makeup for over 7 years and love the foundation, you can mix colors depending on your skin tone and also if you tan or now. The foundation hides flaws and goes on easy.

reviews.review_title: Golden Shades = Perfect for SE Asian Skin
reviews.review_text: Years ago, I switched to this foundation and it changed my life. No other foundation provides such great coverage with such a light feel on your skin. At first, I had trouble because my closest match was too pale, and a step up was too dark. The new Golden shades fixed that and now it's perfect.
Amazing. It's so natural looking!
As always, beautiful, smooth, hides imperfections, lasts and lasts, love this product, as I never liked liquids, etc. This is a gorgeous finish and will use this as long as I can.
This is the only foundation I will use. It doesn't make my skin oily or dry. Also, it's the only one I've tried that doesn't make me break out. Love it!
i love this foundation, better than anything i've ever tried! it gives me a really natural glow throughout the whole day, and the coverage is really good!

I am amazed at how little you need to use to get great coverage and a flawless finish. I was used to foundation, eye cream/concealer and powder. Now I just put this on (with a little of the well rested) and it looks so natural and feels so light! I can't believe I was wearing so many layers of makeup before. Not needed with this!
Use with Prime Time Primer and you have a look thats never oily and very natural looking. It's the perfect line of cosmetics for a person who can't stand liquid or thick foundations.

Love these products. I have introduced all three of my daughter to Bare Minerals and that is all they use. It has now become a Christmas Tradition that they get Bare Minerals from Santa Claus in their Christmas Stocking. Great products!
I like using this fundation in summer, since it is easy to apply and it works well for a whole day.

Ever since I discovered Bare Minerals a few years ago I have not used any other foundation. It looks completely natural and feels weight less. I would definitely recommend this to anyone. I like to consider myself a polished natural beauty... :)

I have been using Bare Minerals for about two years now. I don't spend a lot of makeup but this is a must. I would NEVER give it up.
