Before I started using this, I would still get pimples even though I was in my 30's. Now my skin is healthy and I get compliments on my skin often. As a busy mom, I love how quickly it goes on and how it feels like I'm wearing nothing at all. Yet, it gives me the coverage of foundation.

Everyone tells me I have great skin. I have roscea, but this foundation does great things for my skin! But if people think my skin is great---I won't argue. I like the feeling that I'm not wearing make-up.. My favorite...
Purchased the kit with this color, which was recommended by a makeup consultant at another store. She was right on with the color. It totally enhances the skin!

This is hands down, the BEST foundation I have ever used. I have dry sensitive skin and tend to get redness in my cheeks. The bareMinerals foundation has honestly changed my skin for the better. After using it for about six months consistently, I have noticed that I haven't had hardly any blemishes at all. The redness in my cheeks is very easy to cover while looking natural, not gloopy or streaky like other foundations. If I need more coverage in one area, I can just add more.  I would recommend this product to anyone with any skin type. It's that good!

I have always been complimented on my skin, but this makeup has actually made it better! Looks and feels very natural, like no make-up at all, but with no flaws. Rosacea---gone! Red nose--gone! Dark circles--gone!

I have been using Bare Escentuals for almost 3 years and I absolutely love their foundation! Feels light, doesn't make your skin oily and evens out your skin tone with a very natural look. Looks like you're not wearing makeup but you get all the coverage! Love the new mess-proof design for the cap as well, keeps getting better and better!
I love bare minerals! no complaints! goes on smooth and no flaws!

I have been using Bare Escentuals for about 3 years now. It works great! I have very fair and often red skin, but this gives me a perfect complexion. The other thing I like about it is that it takes almost no time to apply.  Also, I can't even feel it on my skin. I briefly tried a drugstore mineral foundation to save money, but it couldn't compare.
The best!! I've tried others, but BareMinerals never disappoints. I would recommend it to anyone and I have!

I have been wearing this foundation for as long as I can remember. Absolutely love it. Covers what needs to be covered and does not feel like it weights down my skin. Big fan of Bare Escentuals anything.
Natural appearing and provides good sun protection as well.

I went to Sephora yesterday and I really wantred Makeup Forever HD Foundation, but the lady that worked there said that I really didn't need foundation and showed me bare minerals because it was more natural. And i total don't regret buying this because i love it so much it and its great. But it did look kinda dry on me but juss because I had dry skin. And if your in a rush in the morning this only takes seconds to apply. I totally recommend this to anyone looking for a natural and glowing foundation. :)

TOO shiny. Made me very oily. I wanted to try after reading all the outstanding reviews and didn't notice it came in matte, so my advice is to consider your skin type before making this purchase. I'm going to try it in matte medium beige and hopefully that'll make a world of difference.
This is definitly the best mineral foundation out there, I've tried to find another one that can compete, but there just isn't one.

reviews.review_title: It's been 4 years and still going!
reviews.review_text: I've been using Bare Escentuals for about 4 years now and i have difficult skin, it's the only product i trust! I'm only 22 and I'm sure there's more make up out there that is perfect for me but I have not found it and I don't think i will. I

I do like this foundation but it does get a little cakey by the end of the day. I like the matte version better BUT the lightest color (fair) is not as light as the fair in the original and so the matte doesn't match my skin tone unfortunately. It covers really well and stays on throughout the day. Definitely a plus that it doesn't cause breakouts. Overall a pretty good product.
This makeup is amazing! It's the only makeup I've ever tried that doesn't aggravate my acne. It covers great without looking cakey and makes my face glow!

Wonderful, natural-looking coverage, with excellent ability to hide red areas. Works better than heavy-looking concealers and the coverage can be easily layered, if needed. I've had many compliments on my complexion since using this product.
Has been and still is the best thing I've done for my skin
I love the fact this doesnt clog my pores and has buildable coverage. Covers and imperfections and still looks natural.
This makeup gives such a beautiful, natural and even coverage without the cakey feeling and look. This is the perfect match to my complexion, Love it!!!
I switched to bare Mineral foundation several years ago and I love the natural look. No longer look as though I have stage makeup on.
I prefer Bare Minerals to any liquid! It covers just as well, and my skin looks better without makeup!
Love BM! Can't say enough about this product! Goes on great, easy to apply and ends up making me look great in the morning and remains that way throughout the day with minimal touch up!
This makeup is the best ever! It comes in fast, and the coverage is amazing :)
I have been using Bare Minerals for 5 years and absolutely love it. It gives you coverage like liquid foundation but it feels like you are wearing nothing at all.

I have to say that I am very pleased with the  consistent great service that I receive from your store in Century City ( I believe it is #078 ) It's my new favorite place !!!! I get everything that I need and great customer service which is null and void these days. Love it!!!!
best foundation ever, never cakes

I had gone to Sephora 2 years ago during the summer season when I didn't feel like using a liquid foundation with all the heat and humidity. Then I came across this powder foundation and I have never used any other foundation after this. It has the very best and most flawless coverage. Also adds a real natural glow to the face. Love it!!!

I started using BareMinerals about a year ago. My skin can be dry and I had problems with foundations flaking on my skin. BareMinerals is absolutely perfect for me. I was worried that it wouldn't be enough coverage but it is! With a foundation brush (the one used with liquid foundations it works even better as a concealer than my liquid foundation (which I put on under the bareminerals)  I have pretty clear skin, but I don't have an even tone. This combined with a good liquid foundation is perfect!

I love BareMinerals. This foundation is great! I never wore any face make up until I tried this one and I dont even feel ike I have anything on. It is so lightweight and does a great job at evening out skin tone and covering blemishes or pores. Also, the primer is a great addition!
I have been using this product for a few years now. I love it. It doesn't break out my face and covers any blemishes.

i actually use this as a finishing powder after my liquid foundation, then over it i also use the translucent mineral veil for extra staying power... but i gotta say i really love this!! with a soft-bristled brush it goes on so wonderfully... it's so soft, refreshing, and a great finishing look to your foundation. it works really great, it helps foundation stay on longer, and my sensitive acne-prone skin loves it. it makes my skin look better and i love that bareminerals uses natural things so that it's good for your skin...:)  and trust me, even with it's price, it's a great deal!!! it lasts a pretty darn long time! :D i love it :)) going to keep repurchasing! :D
not for a dry skin, I felt that it accentuated my fine lines, color was nice and the coverage was ok.

I love this foundation! You can wear it very sheer or you can layer it on for full coverage, without it ever looking like you're wearing tons of makeup. It's a concealer & foundation all in one, with just the change of a brush! The coverage lasts all day and never runs, even in the rain or when you get a little sweaty yet it's easy to wash off! I've been wearing bare minerals makeup for about two years and cannot see ever changing my foundation again!

I am pleasantly surprised at the coverage this product affords as well as the color range. I have been able to perfectly match my skintone for both summer and winter with colors that look natural. It is easy to apply and you can build custom coverage easily. I really like that it has sun protection. This is for the person who wants a very natural look but good coverage with minimal effort.

It seems that this makeup not only covers but makes your skin in much better condition!! If breakouts before makeup are bad and hard to cover, put a bit of primer in the lid and voila!!! instant coveraqe.

I have used BareMinerals for two years now. I will never use anything different. This stuff is amazing. My skin looks flawless when I wear this. I get tons of compliments on how great my skin is and how beautiful I look. I think that if you have not tried this product before you should. I promise you will get great results.

Until scientists develop a mechanical, robot-esque artificial skin installation kit using nanotechnology or whatever, I will forever use this product. It lasts for ages, covers every skin problem I've ever encountered, and never makes me break out. Ladies, stop using that cream foundation. It makes you look like an alien baby. Mineral Powder for life!

This is my first time purchasing Bare Minerals and I have to say I am impressed! I have the worst dark circles and I am always covering them up with multiple concealers. With this product I no longer have to. I just apply the foundation with the concealer brush underneath my eyes and it does wonders

I love this stuff! I have bought it 3 times already. It lasts me at least 8 months, and it gives me a flawless application! I like it better than liquid foundation, because that stuff is too watery for me. This stuff is lightweight and the way to go! :)

I haven't had to buy foundation in a while since this lasts so long. I do really like the new twist lock feature so that if the container gets turned over in your drawer/bag it doesn't spill powder all over the inside. Good coverage.
my fav foundation i will never use anything else ever again it give you a brilliant glow and is so light weight you cant even tell your wearing make up
My son's girlfriend visited another store to choose the perfect shade. This was part of the try me kit and she loves it! Great idea!
This is the only foundation I wear. I started with it a few years ago and I love it!! It's so smooth

reviews.review_title: Still the One---It's simply the best
reviews.review_text: I have just reordered BE foundation again. I have been using it for 5 years. It is simply the best. There is no line, it is sweatproof, rainproof, and looks absolutely natural--nothing else on the market comes close.

reviews.review_title: The one product I can't go without.
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! The coverage is buildable, and whether you use it only to conceal imperfections or over your entire face it looks natural. It tames my oily T-zone and evens the color on my entire face.  A few words of warning, though: It doesn't magically remedy all of your skin issues like the commercials suggest. Covering problem areas takes a little bit of work. It tends to settle into the tiny lines around my eyes, though, so if fine lines and wrinkles are a skin concern of yours I'd definitely recommend trying before buying.  Most days, all I do is use a concealer brush to pat this on blemishes and redness and my skin looks good all day.

reviews.review_title: great way to be introduced to bare minerals!!!
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this foundation in tan, I loved the idea of a makeup that was pure minerals, however, I have combination oily skin, and acne prone skin. I like the coverage and the finish on this makeup but i felt that matte would be a better fit, so i had to switch to matte in golden tan which is a better match for me!
feels like you have nothing on but really covers. the only foundation i use
I loooove this foundation! It gives me fantastic coverage, is never heavy, never cakey and lasts all day long! I have sensitive skin so this is perfect and it never makes me break out.

reviews.review_title: I like it, not sure if it is the right shade
reviews.review_text: I like the coverage, but I'm not sure if I should have a shade with more olive tone.

After being frustrated with makeup for years, a friend suggested Bare Minerals. Applies easily. Very easy to learn the technique. Don't be afraid of using brushes if you never have used them before. I frequently suggest this makeup to anyone looking for a change. I also recommend using it with the Primer for all day coverage.

I have used bareMinerals for 5 years and I love it. I have tried other versions of the mineral makeup and not one of them can live up to the reputation of this product. I was formerly using medium tan and recently discovered the golden tan which actually matches my golden skin even better.

Not sure what happened I always have exceptional service and I love the product but I went home with the tester instead of the new Powder. I have been trying to return it but it's taking forever, the store needs manager approval.
My skin is: 1) sensitive 2) oily 3) dry I wouldn't use anything else on my face!
easy to apply has SPF 15
love it because it makes your skin look flawless without heavy makeup look. it gives your skin a sort of shiny finish so if your skin is oily you might stick to the matte version

I used to stick to liquid foundations but they always felt too heavy and made me break out, I decided to try Philosophy's foundation powder and it was ok but it made me break out, then FINALLY I decided to try bareminerals since it seemed to have lots of great reviews and I couldnt be any happier with my choice! it feels amazing and natural and doesn't make me break out. My face tends to get oily at times and this helped it alot and has buildable coverage. I use Fairly Light and then apply the warmth bronzer to create a perfect glow. Sonya Dakar Omega Oil for oily/combo skin works amazing with this and adds to the glow. I love this powder foundation and wont be switching to any other.
Works great on my skin, covers all blemishes <3

reviews.review_title: As much as I hate it, I can't move on...
reviews.review_text: So I've been using BareMinerals for at least 5-6 years now. I started using it when I started using makeup outside of formal dances and performances. There are a few things I don't like about BM: 1) obviously it is a powder, which makes it kind of tricky to apply while driving (not that I do that......), 2) on summer days in 100+ weather, it can feel icky -- but I think that's just how makeup feels generally, and 3) the BM brushes scratch at my skin and the hairs in the brushes start to fall out after a few washes.  BUT... I love that this makeup isn't irritating, truly does make my skin look better (I've had compliments about my glowing skin, and people don't believe me when I insist I have awful skin---I DO!), and is natural.  I've tried moving on to other foundations, but I can't seem to stop coming back to BM. And, I LOVE that there are many more color choices than when they first started. I bought Golden Tan and thought it might be too dark, but actually blends perfectly with my Filipina skin. I recommend it to all my pals!  p.s. I tried the Matte version and actually prefer the regular version. It is not as drying, and seems to keep my skin in better condition--the matte version isn't much of a difference in oil control.

I like the coverage of this foundation, and I love that it does not clog pores and if I fall asleep without washing my face I don't wake up broken out!  I didn't give a 5 because it is messy and more product ends up on the counter than I would like. But I love this product and can't see using a different foundation.
I found the perfect shade, finally. It is flawless and so is my complexion now.

for YEARS, i've been anti-mineral makeup. i thought it was too much work, however, i recently tried this out and i love LOVE this foundation. it's easy to apply, lasts all dang day, and IT'S EASY TO APPLY.  i am not good at makeup, in any sense at all. this foundation is SO easy to apply and build, and i end up looking like a 1930s movie star. amazing.  at first, i thought it accentuated my pores (and my one wrinkle - gah!), but i've actually noticed an improvement in my skin.  tip: be sure to let whatever serum/sunscreen/whatever absorb completely, as the foundation is only good if your face is dry and not sticky.
Very nice soft focus coverage. Need to apply extra over red spots with concealer brush. Like to follow it with mineral veil.
Since I have been using this foundation, all of my problems with my skin seem to have gone away. I have oily, acne-prone skin and this has helped tremendously.

I went in to get my winter foundation - I told the sales girl my summer color and she matched me perfectly! The Bare Escentuals line anticipates seasonal changes in shade but recognized skin tone stays the same; bareMinerals makes it so easy!

I tried Bare Minerals years ago when they first came out and fell in love with how my face looked and felt. Over the years I've tried many other products only to keep coming back to this. I must say the new twist lid to keep the product in until you need it is the packaging upgrade I've been waiting for! If you've never tried Bare Minerals - do it. You will not be disappointed.

I'm so grateful that BE expanded their shades. We live in an area with a lot of sunshine, so I tend to take on a golden tone when I get any kind of tan. This shade is perfect, & I no longer have to mix foundations shades. In the winter, I use the Golden Fair, and Golden Medium is perfect when I get more sun. I love how it covers any redness for me, making a concealer unnecessary. It stays on all day, with no streaking or color change. Once I put on my makeup in the morning, I'm set for all day..

I bought this foundation after my first choice appeared chalky, but worked well as a under eye highlighter. (Not even Warmth could take away the chalky appearance). This new choice is PERFECT. I love the way it goes on, blends, and feels I even received my first compliment on my appearance yesterday. It is easy to apply with no mess. I would recommend this product to anyone and everyone.
I absolutely love this product..It blends onto your skin and it last almost all day!!

reviews.review_title: Love the formula, not the packaging
reviews.review_text: I've been using BareMinerals for years, and I swear by the stuff. I have combination skin, and it works flawlessly in the dry parts and the oily parts. If I've got an extra red spot or dark circles under my eyes, I just add a little more to take care of it.  I'm not so keen on the new packaging with the twist top, though. It's great when you begin using the makeup, but then after you use about half of it, you can't hardly get the rest out. You have to pop off the twisty part (which is a feat itself), and even then you can't really get to all of the makeup like you could with the old packaging.  I still give it 5 stars because the formula is so amazing, but I really wish the company would fix the packaging.

I have used different brands of foundation (mostly liquids and cream foundation) and thus far, this is the best that has worked for me. What I like about Bare Escentuals is that the coverage is light and it blends in with your natural skin color and neck. It covers well and even if you have a lot to cover, it gives you a natural look. I have dry skin and thought it might make my skin look even more dry or dull, but was pleasantly surprise to see a nice glow on my face.

I was surprised when I went into the store and found a new shade that matches my skin tone even better! Great product....been using this product for about seven years and never have had a complaint. I am always complimented on my beauutiful clear skin!
I'll never, ever, ever go back to liquid foundation. I've been hooked on Bare Minerals for the last four years. I suggest BM to everyone I know.
I will never use another foundation ever again. I have been using bare mineral products for a few years now.

Second time purchasing bare minerals because it's simply the best foundation I've ever used. I recommend it to anyone who thinks they're allergic to every foundation out there because I definitely thought I was. Great for naturally dry/oily/sensitive skin!

I'm pleased with the overall effect of BE. I'm curious to see how long it lasts--how often I would have to purchase. I'm very pleased with the light weight of the makeup--which offers full coverage...we'll see...

Overall it rocked! The sales associate was not only a sweetie pie but very knowledgeable. I should have told her mgr what a great job she did, will do so next time. I love the bareMinerals products but have to admit I was most pleased by the service I received, so much so, I will likely make a trip into the store for my next product purchase.

I'm still using the Fairly Light foundation after many years and trying other brands. I love the natural finish and often get compliments on my skin. My only complaint is that it is not long-lasting. By the end of the day, most of it is gone. Wearing a primer helps, but for a wedding or other important event, wear something liquid underneath to help hold the powder on.

reviews.review_title: doesnt feel like im wearing makeup at al
reviews.review_text: i love BE!! it makes your skin look so much healtheir after continued use and it gives great coverage. i would never use any other foundation. the thought of gooy liquid on my skin makes me cringe! i love how they expanded the different shades avaible

I've been using this foundation now for 4 years. I love it! Before I tried it, I had the hardest time finding a foundation that worked well for me. My skin gets really dry in the winter, but looks oily if I use liquid foundations and I'm really picky about how my face looks with foundation on. When I wear BareMinerals, it looks as if I'm not wearing anything, except for I know it's there because my face looks even and blemishes are completely covered. My friends, boyfriend and family always comment on how naturally pretty my complexion is, but it's just because I'm using a great foundation that is hiding the imperfections without looking caked on or noticeable.
Granted it has good coverage, but it looks just like a mask. It's quite drying and accentuates all dry spots... First week I used it, my face was a little itchy.

I had been wanting to use these products for some time and I am so happy I did. The foundation gives one versatility as far as coverage is concerned; either light or full. I have uneven coloring along my jaw-line; there I use the full cover brush and everywhere else I use the light coverage brush. When covering dark circles under eyes, I recommend using a good under eye serum or cream before applying BareMinerals to this area or else it can look dry.
I love this product! The bareminerals foundation powder give great coverage with out fealing thick and ugly. I would recomend this product to anyone.
The new design is great; much user friendly

I just tried this foundation for the first time a week ago and I am completely in love! I had tried other mineral foundations before but wasn't satisfied with the coverage they provided. bareMinerals is the best I've ever tried! It's so lightweight it doesn't feel like I have anything on my face at all! And it covers like a liquid. I'm blown away and nothing but bareMinerals for my skin from now on!!
I have used this for years and thought I would try some thing new, well I am back to bareMinerals-it really just works the best!
blends with your skin, not heavy or cakey yet great coverage...LOVE IT!

reviews.review_title: Irritates my sensitive skin, the Matte is better!
reviews.review_text: I have been using bareMinerals makeup for a long time now. I have very sensitive and very fair skin. I noticed that when I used this product, the minute I would start to sweat, my face would start to get red and itchy, almost becoming unbearable and resulting in me having to remove the makeup. I researched the ingredients and came to realize that this product contains Bismuth Oxychloride, which gives you the glow in this makeup. This ingredient is known to irritate sensitive skin, so I have stopped using this product and switched to the bareMinerals Matte makeup as it does not contain Bismuth Oxychloride and I have had no problem with it.  Other than that minor set back, I feel like this product gives good coverage and feels lightweight; and with the primer it will stay in place all day! So if you don't have sensitive skin, I highly reccomend this product, but if you do, definitely try the Matte version. I love Bare Escentuals brand!

i had gotten a gift card to sephora and wasnt sure about it not ever coming to the store before, but i did come in and man was i pleased. the bare minarels tan med was just what i was looking for i was so please i cant wait to come back to purchuse more bare minarel products.
I've been using bare minerals for over 10 years and I love the products. It's so easy and it covers everything. Great for everyday use. Just a terrific product.

I love love love these products. I have been using Bare Minerals for about 3 years now and it just feels like you have no makeup on. I have my daughter hooked on it also. She has tried other products since using Bare Minerals and nothing compares. She has gone back to using this and absolutely loves it, It seems to also keep her face clearer.
My skin has a velvety finish when I use this product. It feels and looks very natural.
Best foundation I've ever used. Be sure to purchase Primer to use prior to dusting on this foundation.
best foundation ever!

I've been using BE foundation for years now and keep going back to it. I have to be very dilligent about exfoliating or the powder gets hung up on dry patches. I Iike the coverage with a kabuki brush. I am really happy with the new packaging design. The locking sifter is so much easier to get the right amount and great for travel.

Bare Minerals loose powder foundation does a great job at evening out my skin tone. It also has a perfect hint of sparkle - it doesn't make my face look shiny, but it does make me glimmer a bit in the sunlight. I've been using this stuff every day for years! I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_title: Golden Med. Color for Light/Medium Yellow Underton
reviews.review_text: Love this color! I have yellow undertones in my skin and this is absolutely perfect! I previously had the medium neutral and it was looking a little pink/ maskish on my face. Never thought I had yellow undertones with medium skin and brown hair & green eyes but I do. Heres a tip....unsure of your skin color. Try looking at your veins Green Veins = Yellow Undertone Blue Veins = Pink Undertone Cobination of Both = Neutral Undertones. I have been wearing the wrong shade of makeup for 10 years! I finally know that I am a yellow undertone now! By the way I am a true believer of this makeup. I have worn this for 5 years and still love it!! Covers so much, but at the same time its so light weight!
I just started to use for a while and make my look natural. so far so good.

reviews.review_title: Have been using it for years!
reviews.review_text: There's nothing better than a flawless complexion.. I've been using this product for 4 years now and it's come to the point where people don't even think I wear foundation because it looks so natural.. And I think after using it so long, the minerals have healed my skin. It's so healthy and sometimes it glows.. I love it! Oh and take my advice.. Don't buy the semi-new Matte formula that they have out. It's heavier and doesn't blend as nicely. It looks like makeup where the other one doesn't.
I have sensitive skin and this foundation is so easy to use and doesn't clog my pores.
This is the best foundation I've ever used. It covers everything I need it too and it stays on all day without sliding or running at all. You can barely tell you're even wearing makeup.

reviews.review_title: I keep coming back for more
reviews.review_text: No one does foundation better than Bare Escentuals. I have used it for years and will not change. BE makes you want to wear foundation again.

I LOVE Bare Minerals.... always have! I Definitely suggest getting the original base over the Matte formula if you have any blemish issues...... the Matte is thicker which you would think covers better but more like sticks on top & makes zits stick out more!
I have been using this color since it came out. I used to mix and now I don't have to. I have been using BE make up for years and have never found anything I like so much.
I love bareMinerals! I have incredibly sensitive skin and this product gives me a flawless finish with no redness or iritation.

reviews.review_title: stays on all day, doesn't cause breakouts
reviews.review_text: this has to be one of my all time favorite foundations..even when i get bored and try other foundations, i always go back to bareminerals!! great product! it's natural, covers well without feeling heavy, stays on all day, doesn't seep into my pores, and i don't break out while using this foundations..love it!

I've been looking for something light to just even out the redness & occasional blemish and this worked even better than I'd hoped. I'm not sure if it'd be a really heavy duty concealer, but it works for my very low maintenance routine.

Bare Minerals is the best cover up I have ever used. It covers everything with no lines or mask. It feels great and lasts all day. It not only covers but it keeps my skin feeling healthy and clear. It is the best stuff ever!

i never believed in powder foundation before, let alone loose powder foundation. but my sister wanted this so i bought her a starter kit, and then i bought myself one. the texture of this foundation is amazing: it is creamy when applied, and a very nice sheen will show as i go through the day. i have been using YSL, Hourglass and NARS liquid foundations before, but nowadays i find myself reaching for bareMinerals foundation a lot (even on the days when i have important business meetings)! i like the creamy, fresh-looking finish and my face does not feel sticky or heavy like i sometimes feel when wearing liquid foundations. i NEVER thought that i'd like mineral (powder) foundations, but now i'm convinced that there is a good reason why this product is selling so well. in the winter, my skin gets dry, but with good moisturizing, this does not feel dry at all. it's almost like a creamy liquid foundation in a powder form. use small amount when applying, then if you need more coverage, just add a little more, then you can achieve a beautiful finish. i love this.
Love this foundation. I've used this brand for years.

Love it!! Covers like a miracle and gives a healthy glow to your skin!! For oily/combination skin like me, I would use this foundation in the Winter and the matte foundation in the Summer! Good luck! :)

reviews.review_title: Love the product, miss the old container
reviews.review_text: I have to mix this shade with a little bit of the lighter one, and it's tougher to do with the new twist-top container. It's OK though - just weird to get used to.
I absolutely love BareMinerals and will never switch.

I have trouble with my skin and I have been looking for some time for a foundation that I could use that would give me good coverage with a matte finish and wouldn't clog my pores. I found the magic answer to my problems in bare minerals!! I will never use another foundation :) It's super lightweight it almost doesn't even feel like I'm wearing anything at all!

reviews.review_title: Great light coverage, but becoming more expensive
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage I get with Bare Minerals and having been using it for a few years. It was nice to find the additional colors to match my summer and winter shades; I especially like how my complexion looks in pictures since I don't like feeling like I have a lot of make-up on. My only complaint is that the container keeps getting smaller and the price stays the same :(
I have been using this product for several years now. My skin looks better than ever! I would recommend to anyone.
If you are looking for a natural looking coverage with SPF that is so light you won't even thik you are wearing anything - this is it!

I have enjoyed this product for many years now but I noticed the last time I bought the foundation that the container had been changed with a smaller amount of product inside. I already felt like the foundation was a little on the pricy side but I liked it and it lasted approx. a month. Now I'm in the process of looking for an alternative product for a more reasonable price. Saddens me because I do truly like the coverage but in this economy...not worth it.

It's fantastic! The beauty consultant took the time to color match me and I found out I would have picked the wrong color! I love the way the foundation makes my skin feel. I don't break out like I used to! It's love!

I've tried mineral makeup before but didn't like the coverage I was getting and used liquid foundation - until I tried this! This mineral has the coverage of a liquid, I'm sold! It's buildable coverage and the brushes that come in the starter kit are all you need to get a perfect complexion! I'm in love and am telling everyone I know they really need to try bareMinerals!
I love Bare Escentuals mineral makeup. I have very fair skin that is very sensitive. This foundation doesn't break me out and covers all the flaws. I love it!

Finally! Bare Escentuals finally came up with a shape thats perfect for my skin tone. Not too many company's out there make a close shade for Pacific Islanders (Hawaiian to be specific). I'm always buying to shades to mix together in order to find MY shade. Its okay, but I don't get the same results every time. So now they came out with Golden Tan and Warm Tan. Both of them are perfect for me. I wear Golden in the winter and Warm in the summer. Thank You Bare Minerals.

I love this product and have loved it from the beginning. I've tried other brands of mineral foundation and none of them compare to the quality of bareMinerals. I work upclose to people everyday and have been told many times, how clear my comlexion is and its all due to bareMinerals.

reviews.review_title: The never fail foundation, always have to have it!
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! it's so light weight and natural. This is the never fail, always go to back to when all else fails foundation! It has a nice coverage leaving my skin looking natural, air brushed and glowing!. In fact, it doesn't look like I'm wearing any makeup at all, it just looks like I have perfect skin naturally. I always get compliments on my skin when I use this. It does not irritate my acne or dry out my skin either. When I do have break outs I use the summer bisque as a concealor for more coverage on those problem areas.The bisque also works really well as an undereye concealor, just make sure your use a hydrating eye cream first so the powder doesn't accentuate any fine lines.
it goes on light and covers well
I am 25 and have been using this product for 5 years and always get complements on my skin! Occasionally I switch to Fresh's clay foundation when my skin is really dry and flaky.

I love this product. You can cover as much as or as little as you like, and its nice and light. With primer, 'Warmth' and the Mineral Veil, my face looks natural and it lasts all day. I've also had much clearer skin since switching over from traditional liquid foundations.

I've been using bareMinerals for over 4 years. I was hooked right away. I'm in my mid forties, have rosy cheeks and uneven skin tone. I used to use a stay-put liquid foundation to try to make my skin look better. A little bareMinerals makes a big difference and looks a lot more natural! The brushes are wonderful, too.
I love this foundation. Love the feel, the coverage, the way it lasts all day, the SPF 15. I have used this product for 3 years and my skin looks great.
I like this product but it seems to run out quickly. it covers evenly and I like it very much.

I use this everyday with warmth, and mineral veil. I love the 3 products all together. I'm not a big makeup person, so this is perfect! it doesn't make it look like you are wearing a ton of makeup which i like. it goes on so smooth and covers your skin evenly! i love love love this product!
I have been using bareMinerals as my exclusive foundation for over five years. Enough said.
I'm crazy about this product. thank you sephora!!!
I always dreamed of finding perfect foundation...and this is it. just GREAT

I have extremely dry skin and have been looking for something for years to even out my skin tone. I tried a few tinted moisturizers, but none of them blended very well and still dried out my skin. I got this foudation in the started kit and it works AMAZINGLY. It doesn't dry out my skin, makes my face feel great, and gives very natural looking coverage.

I have never liked a lot of foundation on my face, but I did however need to even out my skin tone and the overall look. Someone told me about bare Minerals products and how wonderful they are and encouraged me to try them. I have been using the Warm tan, SPF mineral based foundation for the last 3 years and will NEVER use anything else. It evens out my skin, matches my skin tone, leaves my skin soft and not oily and completes my daily look. I could not have asked for a better product to use for a daily foundation minus the liquid. I am extremely happy with this product and have now included other bare minerals products along with this one. I now use the mineral blush and eye shadows as well. All products last all day long and it looks like I just applied it, when in reality I applied it 8 hours ago : ). You have a loyal Bare Mineral User for life. THANKS!!!!
Long time fan of BE products. This is the best foundation I have ever used. Ever. Provides great coverage, yet very lightweight. Excellent for my sensitive skin

i've been using Bare mineralas for 4 years and still obsessed, i've tried other liquid and mineral foundations but nothing comapres. I just got my refill and love the new packaging and realize how much I rely on this product. I also love that if i want to use just a little or more if my skin is being crazy, it still does the job without being too sheer or too cakey. Love bare minerals, every woman should have this product in her make-up arsenal....and maybe even men too.
Always love barMinerals! No other product compares. Be nice if customer service at downtown Seattle location was just as good.

reviews.review_title: All the products I purchased recently...
reviews.review_text: Bare Escentuals bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation Medium Beige  Bare Escentuals Mineral Veil 0.47 oz Mineral Veil  Bare Escentuals Mineral Veil 0.47 oz Mineral Veil  Bare Escentuals bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation Medium  Bare Escentuals bareMinerals Blush Golden Gate  I really like these products. I wish the Mineral Veil were in a larger container as it is used more than the other products and some of them come in larger containers.
I really didn't care for this foundation. I returned it. I like all the eye shadows and mineral veil but this was not for me.

I have been using this makeup for several years now and although I love the product, I am really disappointed in the new packaging. Yes, it's great for travel, however, you're paying the same price for less of the actual product. (I actually measured and there is about 2/3 the amount of makeup in the new containers as there was in the old ones.) I don't mind paying for the makeup, but I don't want to pay for the fancy container. The makeup gets a 5 but the container only gets a 1.

I LOVE BARE ESCENTUALS! Looks so natural, feels like you're wearing nothing. I have uneven, sometimes acne-prone skin and I have never gotten more compliments on my complexion than when I'm wearing my BE.
i TRIED THIS FOUNDATION 3 YRS AGO AND HAVE NEVER TRIED ANYTHING ELSE SINCE. IT IS THE BEST!
I love all of the Bare Escentuals products...They look great and do not clog your pores...
Creates the perfect finish and last longer than other products I experienced before.

Love the foundation; hate the new packaging. Before, I could pop the top off so that I could use every last bit of the makeup. Now, there is no way that I can get all of it out (the new top does not come off). Please go back to the old packaging!!!!!!!!!
Being a make up artist, it is a product I often reach to. Very blendable, true color and great for all skin types and ages. It is the original and no one can copy it.
Really great coverage, and a smooth finish.

what can I say? still can't live without it and I won't:) now it has a great new jar that clicks to close and it's nice and neat!!!! I don't feel the need to have a full coverage but moderate one looks just right!!!

Okay, so it takes me longer to do my makeup now that I'm using this Bare Minerals, but it's worth it. I used Mac powder foundation for years and years and I could put my makeup on in 7-10 minutes. Not it takes me at least 15 minutes, but it lasts much, much longer. I just got back from Florida where they were having a heat wave and this makeup lasted through day-long perspiration without touch-up. I was amazed. My skin looks great and I've gotten many compliments. Two friends have switched to using Bare Escentuals since they admired my makeup. Highly recommend. Just be prepared to take more time in putting on.

I used the matte version over the summer and enjoyed it. My skin is pretty oily. However, I live in a very dry climate and thought I'd give the original a try for winter. BAD idea. I have tried every which way to reduce the shine (used the mineral viel, used the HD Microfinish powder, and finally used a basic powder from Loreal). All my attempts failed. The shine just came through! There's no stopping it. The last straw was seeing a picture of myself one morning directly after applying my makeup....in the mirror, my skin looked flawless, in the photo, I was all shine! The flash made it look horrible, but even without a flash, I looked greasy. I will be returning this after a 2 week trial run. I hate it!

Love this product. I have to switch to a liquid foundation in the winter because of the dry air/dry skin but I use this product during the spring/summer/fall months. My daughter uses it year round. It provides excellent coverage and for her (she is a teen) it is an easy product to throw on as she is running off to school.

I depend on this product to hide discolerations, large pores, etc. This is the one thing I can't be without. I keep some in my purse, my desk at the office, and of course at home. Doesn't give me the make-up mask and stays all day. Even if I get a little sweaty, I rarely, if ever, need to re-apply it later in the day.
I've been using this product for years and have not been disappointed. my skin looks smooth, poreless, flawless. I will not leave the house w/o it.
best foundation, very natural appearance. my skin glows!
I love this foundation. I have oily/acne prone skin and this makeup does not make me breakout. It is very natural and has excellent coverage. I recommend it to everyone.

reviews.review_title: Good, but cannot get past the mess
reviews.review_text: This stuff is good - build-able coverage that is natural looking and gives you a nice glow. I find that it can be drying and cakey though if you don't have a good moisturizer underneath. The thing I cannot get past is the mess. It gets everywhere. I am a clean freak, so if you are not like me, maybe you'll be ok with it. but I also feel like I might be breathing it in. The messiness is the main reason I cannot get with the BE. Plus, I think the marketing is a snore.
I've always loved this product and will always continue to use it. I don't like the new dispenser they applied to it but I'l; get over it. That's the only reason I gave it a 4 rather than a 5
I have sensitive skin so the bare minerals works well for me.

I absolutely love this product. I tried the twenty dollar set they had to see if I would even like it before I invested in the system. After using it for a couple weeks and ran out of the trial size I did go back to purchase the full size foundation, mineral veil, and bronze, plus all the brushes. I love the way this feels on my skin, its like I'm not even wearing makeup at all. My skin has never looked or felt better. Ther is a glow!
This item is best i've ever used. thanks sephora testing
i really love this i have such oily skin and this helped keep my face more matte then any other powder i evered tryed(:
best foundation ever!!
This product works wonders, I feel like I have no makeup on at all and the coverage is flawless!

I purchased a Get Started kit about 4 months ago - which lasted me FOUR months - and only recently had to replace one of the colors of foundation, in Fair. The coverage on this foundation is fantastic and brightens up my skin and makes me look more alive, to the point where people who haven't seen me in several months tell me how great I'm looking!
Best product I use everyday!

reviews.review_title: Used for years, great for fair skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation since I was 13, so for about 6 years now. I am very fair with dry, sensitive skin that has a tendency to break out. bareMinerals is the only foundation I have found that not only matches my skin tone, but also gives me nice medium coverage and doesn't look like I'm wearing make up. My only issue is that since my skin does tend to be on the dry side, I have to be really diligent with exfoliating and moisturizer otherwise this foundation does make my flaky skin look worse. Otherwise, great product! Going to keep using it for many years to come.

Long time buyer/user of Bare Minerals products. Love this stuff, easy to apply, great coverage, makes my skin look beautiful again. and I love the new shaker lid inside. Contains the product when I travel. Will continue to buy!

I might have already put up a review for this item, but I just want to make sure that everyone knows how great it is. This is great for giving a little bit of radiance/illumination: not too much like a highlighter but enough to hide little imperfections. Be careful not to pile too much onto the face or it'll look gray-ish on the skin. I rarely breakout when using this foundation. I don't think I will be able to use any other foundation after this one. However, I am thinking about getting the matte version of this after I use this up to see if it works better for me.

reviews.review_title: I could never use another brand
reviews.review_text: I've been using their entire line for a couple years now.. I LOVE IT!! I don't wash my makeup off before bed either - and I don't feel as bad about it now since it's natural and allows my skin to breathe.
I love the finish of this powder. My skin is incredibly sensitive, but I've actually worn this to bed a few times without breaking out.
great coverage, easy to apply! i love the light weight, how easy and even it is to cover your face. great that it incorporates SPF!

I've used this foundation for several years. I love it. I use a different shade in the summer since my skin usually has a little bit more color but this is great for the winter. I don't think I'll EVER go back to liquid foundation.
This is perfect for teenager girls because it matches their skin, covers inperfections and looks natural which is how teenagers shoud look. Not made up!

The foundation looks beautiful but makes me itch like crazy for about 10 minutes after application. If I can make it past 10 minutes, it wears very well. It does settle into my laugh lines a bit but if you just blend it out it's not so bad.
Have been using this line for several years. I mix several shades to achieve mine. Nice coverage.

I have been using this foundation for about 1 year now, and I absolutely love it. It makes your skin look great, and is not cakey. It's perfect for the girl who rocks the natural look (without being makeup less). It also works as a great base for a bronzer.

I absolutely love the click-to-close feature. When I travel, I no longer need to wad up a tissue to keep the powder from coming out. Same when I drop the container! Looks the the price went up and less powder. Thanks for thinking of the user!!!

I'm a big fan of the product, it melts in after a few minutes to look very natural. The shades are really versatile, I can even go up or down a shade without it being noticable. I like to new click-close mechanism, but it takes up way more space than it needs to and there's like half as much product in there as a result, which is why I took off a star.

reviews.review_title: love the product hate the new container
reviews.review_text: I have been a fan of bare minerals since 2006 but I dont like the new containers. I liked it when you could open it up and get the last of the minerals now you can't get the last of it and it's expense i want to use it all

I love this foundation so much, I don't think I'll ever find another one with this many benefits for my skin: I love how it's all-natural and doesn't make me break out if I fall asleep with it on. Even when I take it off, my skin still looks great! I'm also loving the new packaging, because I can have it with me in my bag without worrying about spills or a big mess. I highly reccomend!

I thought bare minerals was going to be a great new foundation, providing excellent coverage with no drying qualities. Boy, was I wrong, the foundation provides little if any coverage, and is completely drying. I find that used over a real foundation as a finishing powder the product is great. However, alone the stuff is really not as great as everyone says.
Purchased again. Definately never a reasont to try anything else once you've used this product

i LOVE THIS PRODUCT! it's absolutely lightweight, makes my skin so soft and radiant, and I can even sleep on it without braking out the next day! So natural looking! - FYI I have olive skin and I combine the tan colour with the medium beige foundation.

I have pretty pale and red skin, and I use the Light shade. It covers the redness wonderfully. As far as covering up all blemishes and pimples, on my skin it does about the same as a regular concealer but with a lighter feel and without the oily residue.

I had never tried Bare Escentuals, but I decided to check it out after hearing so much good stuff. It is a good powder foundation, and seems to be long lasting. I guess maybe I'm not a powder person, though, as I don't like the way it accentuates wrinkles and gets cakey. My suggestion - use a REALLY GOOD moisturizer underneath, and only use this on your jaw line and T-zone. That way, you are left with a little bit of a dewy glow.

I have been using this foundation for over 4 years now. I will buy nothing else. So you could say that I am hooked! I am in my 30's and have some dark spots on my face (from tanning when I was young) and it covers them nicely. If I could give two suggestions it would be to always use a moisturizer before applying foundation and use less powder then you would ever think. For the first time in my life I feel like I am wearing no foundation and it looks so natural too.

Since I started using bare minerals I have had far fewer issues with acne, and my skin looks great without any makeup now. I'm almost 39! Even when I did have serious acne (just a year ago) I found that this powder foundation provided excellent coverage, no caking.

For me, this was not a winner at all. I have mature skin, lines, large pores, and it settled into every possible bad area and made my skin look awful. My liquid foundation actually looked better, and the reason I was switching was to improve the appearance of my pores. I think my skin must be too dry for powders, even though this was supposed to improve my skin. I'm so disappointed! I even double moisturized before putting it on. I have no problem with the blush and will continue to use that.
Never makes me break out, always perfect coverage, goes on smooth and never feels heavy. LOVE it wouldn't wear anything else.

I've just returned to this after trying another powder foundation brand. I see no need to switch again! This one looks naturaland stays put all day. It never comes off on my clothes. I especially like the new closure sloder inside the lid! No more spilling when I travel!
I really like bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation. I have dry skin though and winter is coming so I might have to switch to a liquid.

Medium beige is the perfect color for my light (but not porcelin), untanned skin (I'm Irish & American Indian).  I love this make-up! It looks completely natural and gives me a glow. It evens out my uneven tones and gives a more consistent color. I still haven't mastered how to use the foundation as a concealer as well but I'm working on it.  If you follow the instructions, you will not have a cakey look or any loose powder anywhere.  I use with a Mineral Powder Brush #45.

I have been using this product for many years and love it. I have tried others but nothing compares to bareMinerals...I wish they would make it in a larger size...and it is a little pricey but worth the money.
love it ! It gives you a flawless finish and easy to use.

I wasn't a makeup type of gal until I got introduced to the BE line. Initially the colors don't seem to match well but they actually do work,  This foundation creates an airbrushed look and a little goes a long way. Covers better then any other foundation (liquid or powder) and doesn't feel heavy. You look and feel like you're wearing nothing at all.  Great coverage in little to no time. ANd I have actually seen an improvement in my skin. It has a natural glow and it appears to be more even.  ***It's true, you can sleep in it!!! I've fallen asleep with a full face of BE on several times. Not only did it not break out my skin but the eyeshadows don't irritate my eyes either.

reviews.review_title: Great coverage! Don't be deceived by the picture!
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! I have used it a few years now and the coverage is amazing. I have to say though, I almost didn't order it through Sephora due to the fact the picture they show is the old style of the container. BE has come out with a new container that has a sifter you turn so it doesn't spill out everywhere like the old style. Sephora--Please update your picture!
This is an amazing product. I have learned to use it alone for excellent coverage.
I love this amazing foundation!!! It really brings out your natural beauty.
I have been using this product for a number of years and I keep coming back for more. I LOVE it and I also love many over the others too! A++
I love this foundation. It looks very natural and I never feel like I'm wearing too much make-up. One caveat: sometimes the coverage is not complete and I have to apply a concealer.
This stuff is great, I've been using it for 3 years now and keep coming back for more.
I have used this for years and cont to love it. Lasts for 12 hrs even at work!

I just got the fairly medium shade, before I had to mix two shades together to get my color. This is the perfect for me. Very easy to use, buildable coverage, I can even use this as an under eye concealer.

I have really a pale pasty almost transparent skin tone naturally, uhg!, but this is the only foundation I have ever tried that actually looks good on my skin. It blends perfectly and still covers up blemishes and darkness. I can't live without it!

i used this product for two days and it made me looked washed out. My skin tone was even but I had no definition. I also think being 53, that my skin is too dry for powder foundation. The product worked great, just not for me.

Even though I have older skin I find that I appreciate this coverage. I have not had any trouble with foundation getting into my wrinkles except around my eyes. I use a cream base but a little Bare Minerals over the top.

I keep hearing about other better powder foundations out there, but none I've tried have even come close to how amazing this stuff is. I love it because... ‚Ä¢ It's affordable ‚Ä¢ I can't feel it on my face ‚Ä¢ It covers blemishes and dark spots ‚Ä¢ It's very natural looking, no masky effect ‚Ä¢ It's fast and easy to put on (literally one minute) ‚Ä¢ It's perfect for my sensitive and acne prone skin  I just love it. It's perfect.

Honestly, this is not the foundation I use every day, I find pressed powder to work much better on my skin, but of the loose powders this one is the best by far, and I have tried an enormous variety of them.
Looks caked-on at first. Also settles in wrinkles despite using the primer. Does offer good coverage though.
The coverage is slighty under heavy, which is exactly what I need/want. My skin appears very smooth all day. However, my skin gets seriously greasy when I use this.

I love this makeup! Every time I think I want a change and buy the new latest and greatest foundation out there, my skin breaks out and looks dull. BareMinerals foundation is what I always come back to.  Application is a bit of a mess, with makeup dust flying everywhere. Still, it's worth it. Get a good brush and buff well! This stuff is amazing.
I am a repeat buyer ... I can't live w/o this product :)

I am a repeat purchaser and can't imagine EVER buying another foundation. The product offers amazing coverage but looks totally natural. One of the few that deliver on all promises. It's also terrific as an undereye concealer, I struggle with dark undereye circles and there's nothing better out there.

Forget snapple- THIS is the best stuff on Earth! I wear this almost every day and have gotten my sister, Mom and friends to all use it regularly too! It is easy to apply and creates a flawless finish.
I love this foundation. It provides nice coverage without the heavy feeling. Would absolutely reccommend it!
the only brand of makeup i use!!! complete flawless coverage! I have big pores and blackheads so I have to be picky in what I use.
gives perfect coplexion., easy to apply, portable, non caky, I love it!

I was so excited to try this foundation a while back. With the hype and the ease of swirling a brush around the face - made this so enticing! Unfortunately, I gave this a try and couldn't last an entire jar.  For me the coverage was too glowey and it started to make my facial skin feel odd - almost like a creepy crawly feeling. Had to stop using this product and moved on to search for my HG foundation.
I love the BE foundation. It gives great coverage without looking like pancake make up!! The color is a better match than what I was wearing when I walked in the store!
this is the best foundation I have ever used. People compliment me on my makeup and I like that it has staying power. It lasts all day!
less in the container for more money but i think its gotten better. love it!

Please....bring back the foundation that does not have the locker sifter...I DO NOT like it at all. Now I don't know what to use because I am not going to order the locker sifter again. I need a mineral foundation like the first one...will you please bring it back. The foundation is great...I love it....but the container is not so that is why only 1 star...I would give the foundation a higher rating though.

reviews.review_title: New packaging is a big mistake !!!
reviews.review_text: I've been a loyal and very happy customer of BM foundation for more than 12 years and use it every day. The original packaging was ideal...you could shake what you needed and transfer to the travel tube or crystal power container on a dressing table. The new container is terrible....it has 4 holes that release very little product. The plastic top can't be removed for transfer to the travel tube or to any decorative powder container. Please don't force this new container on us !!! the simple one with the holes that can be removed pictured here on Sephora was perfect !!! Please bring back the original or we loyal users might have to defect !!!

Not for me...I used to use BM and could not figure out why I'd break out, until I realized bismuth does that to my skin. So it's been a couple of years, I thought I'd give BM a try again, as I love the glowy finish bismuth produces. Sure enough, my skin was itchy, and within a couple of uses bumps started showing up on my cheeks and chin. Sopped using BM, they went away. Bummer, because the matte version just looks too cakey for my taste.
The product you love with a locking lid so it no longer makes a mess when you travel - genius!

I didn't use foundation because I could never seem to find one that looked good when I applied it at home. My sister in law and a friend recommended I try Bare Minerals. A great sales associate at Sephora helped me to find the right shade. I have loved it ever since because it looks great all day and I don't get that unnatural look like other foundations. A little goes a long way and it feels good on my skin, not heavy at all.
I love all the Bare Minerals products and find that the foundation is so smooth with a natural finish. It is not a heavy foundation as so many are.
I've been using this for a natural flawless and natural look. IBeen using it for 2 years and will not use anything else. My daughter now uses it.
loved it! was awsome

My skin looks perfect and stays hydrated all day with this over my moisturizer. It doesn't clog my pores or cause breakouts. I even use it on my eyelids over primer to eliminate any redness and create a good base for shadow. And with so many colors, I bet you can find one to match. I use fair for my very pale, cool skin. I often have the problem that the lightest color is too yellow for my skin tone but not with the brand.
I've been using this for years and although at times I try other brands I always come back to the original. Always the best.

I'd been using liquid foundation ever since I began using makeup, and the idea of mineral foundation left me skeptical. I didn't think it could possibly so all the things it claimed to do in regards to improving skin condition, let alone provide good coverage. I was on the fence for a while, but I am beyond happy with this product. So glad I decided to try it!  Coverage: Light, and blends in with my skintone amazingly well. I use golden fair, and it's the closest match to my skin I've ever come across in a foundation. The coverage can be as sheer or as full as you need it to be. I have freckles on the bridge of my nose and across the tops of my cheeks that I love, and I can skip application in that area without it looking weird. It just makes my skin look the way it should: flawless and natural, without taking away my face's little quirks. Never fake.  Texture: Soooo soft! Leaves my face feeling silky. It's so fine that it really does feel like a cream. I have normal skin, and I haven't found it to be drying at all.  Application: Easy, great for a beginner. It's fairly messy, and you can see particles floating off into the air as you buff it on...which then stick to the package, your other makeup, everything. However, even with this annoying flaw, mine lasted a good 4 months with usage every day.  Other: As the description claims, I did see improvements in my skin's appearance as time went on. It doesn't clog my pores, and has never made me break out. Plus, it's natural! I don't feel like I'm slathering on chemicals for short term beauty that will harm my skin in the long run.  If you're on the fence like I was, I encourage you to try it. The hype isn't fake. You may just be surprised.
Bought this in fairly medium, I am not pale nor am I rocking an awesome tan so this color works great with my complexion! Love it and what it does for my skin
This is the best foundation that I have ever used...powder or liquid. The color blends superbly with my natural color as covers like no other.
I have been using it for a couple of years, and won't stray. It stays on for about 7-8 hours, and it has cleared up my acne!

I love Bare Escentuals! It is beautiful flawless coverage that really does improve the overall health of my skin. I will warn about being careful to find you're correct match. I tried to change to one of their newer tones -Golden Fair- and it absolutely made me look sick and sallow. However I changed to my usual color and am very happy with the results.

reviews.review_title: not the 1st time i have bought this
reviews.review_text: great product. i keep coming back for more.

when i first used bare minerals i did not get what all the hype was about,but then i actually worked with it,and now get the application and absolutely love it. i have occassional blemishes and uneven skintone and it somehow covers whille looking natural.
imitation mineral foundation isn't like this one...trust me...i have tried several

BASICS: So I got the full BM/BE kit two winters ago & miraculously haven't run out of it yet. I love how the minerals aren't sparkly or shimmery like many other mineral foundations. I also like how it helps minimize shine in the T-Zone area.  I DONT LIKE: The only thing I don't like is how when my skin is dry in the fall/winter, it really emphasizes on the flakiness/rough patches of my skin. The commercial/box says sweat proof/fade proof/transfer proof but honestly, it's only transfer proof. I found that by the end of my school day, starting at 7:30 & ending at 2:30, my foundation had all worn off.  I DO LIKE: BUT, I do like how you can either have natural coverage or more flawless coverage. BM/BE is definitely buildable coverage either way. Also, you only need to use a little bit at a time so still, two years later, I haven't needed to buy a new set yet(:  ALL IN ALL: I will definitely continue to use BM/BE because all around it's a great mineral foundation. It allows your skin to breathe & helps with excess shine. For sure, I will buy BM/BE when I run out of my current set; luckily, that won't be for awhile due to it's small everyday usage(: So yes, I would definitely recommend this for a friend. I've tried other mineral foundations & none of them can ever compare to BM/BE(:

I've used several other mineral powder makeups, and this one is by far the best I've used! Just a little more expensive, but completely worth it. My skin tone is really uneven and I have a few blemishes, but this stuff really helps clear it up without needing tons of layers. I put it on right on top of my moisturizer, gently sweeping it on in circles until it's all blended. My only complaint is I need to re-apply about halfway through work, but I'm also at work for about 9 hours so I imagine that's a given!

I loved the way this foundation looked on me..at first. I'd used this and then topped it off with mineral veil and it looked great. However, within a few months I noticed that I had stubborn milia on my cheeks along with some mild acne. I rinsed and cleaned my brushes every other day and thoroughly washed my skin after using BE, but my face didnt clear up. So i stopped using this product altogether and purged my skin of mineral makeup for a month and it FINALLY got better and I've stopped using it on my entire face since then. In conclusion, the short term effects of this foundation is great..but in the long run, it made my skin break out, greasy, and dull (and thats with weekly deep cleansing as well).

I have used this foundation for the past 2 years and LOVE IT. It gives my skin tone a nice even and natural look without ever looking shiny. It doesn't come off until I remove it myself; therefore, I do suggest to use face wipes (i.e. oil of olay face cloths) or you will notice the foundation will not come completely off and will begin clogging your pores.

I am still very happy with product. Gives superb coverage when compared to Laura Mercier, Jane Iredale or Pur Minerals. Love it .....does not break me out. I wear medium but just bought fairly medium for winter. Great colors to choose from. Hard to use anything else when you have found perfection!

reviews.review_title: The right coverage for me and it's natural, too.
reviews.review_text: I love this product ,the coverage is smooth and natural. I have discoloration from lupus and it helps cover it nicely. Thank you for making this product.

I've tried many mineral makeups, and I buy this over my other favorite MINERAL FUSION because this is a better price and more natural coverage.  What I like about this is the container-- it doesn't get everywhere because you twist the inside plastic cover over the sifter area so it stays in the pot. It provides natural, even coverage and covers most all my blemishes, discoloration, etc. Some adiitional concealer product is needed for any darker spots I want to lessen the appearance of.  What I don't like about this is that it comes off so easily; it's great that it doesn't take heavy cleansers to remove, but any light swipe of the face will remove a bit. The other negative is that after a period of time, it really settles into my pores and lines (even with the use of oil-blotting sheets and face primers).
The shade is perfect if you're prone to redness. It looks really natural. Love it!
Love it! Can't live without it!
great for senstive skin

i love this foundation. i had an acne problem and every foundation i used made it worse. i started using Prime Time and Bare Escentuals foundation and not only is my acne gone, but my skin looks healthy and happy.

Love, love, love this! I have several shades of this powder and I use it in light (medium golden if I have a tan) mainly as a highlighter for under the eye area. It gives a wonderful effect. Try this out.

I still can't find a good skin tone match in this line. I was excited to try the new Fair Golden color, because the old colors were either too light, too dark or too pink. Although I am golden-toned, this was TOO yellow.

reviews.review_title: If you're thinking about...seriously, try it!
reviews.review_text: I received a Sephora gift card for Christmas last year and had NO IDEA what to buy. I had seen Bare Minerals on tv and had heard good things so I figure why not. I've been using it for almost a year now and I LOVEEEE it! I used to use liquid foundation, but I can confidently say I will NEVER go back! My skin is much clearer & healthier in general. People tell me all the time that my skin is glowing. I think the best thing I did was to buy the starter kit to introduce me to the product, now I love shopping the whole line.
Got a good coloring at the shop, turned out to be too light for me. Going to exchange for a Medium Beige and I'm going to get it in the Matte too.... Matte is a better color for winter.
... and still use it everyday

I've worn BareMinerals for about a year and a half now and I won't put anything thing else on my face! And there are so many different shades everyone can find their perfect match! Since I first started using it I've noticed a difference in my skin; it's now softer, smoother, and I've had less breakouts. Defiantly worth the money and I recommend this to everyone.

I have used bareMinerals powder foundation for years and i love the way it looks. It doesnt look too think or heavy and it helps to even out my skin tone and cover blemishes in a natural looking way. I love it!

Smooths out discolorations,covers broken veins. doesn't settle into wrinkles. Lasts all day. Survives hot flashes better than anything else I've ever tried. Feels light and velvety, and you don't look like you're wearing a lot. Goes on quickly and easily. Takes away the oily sheen and keeps it gone. Doesn't break out my skin. Good Stuff!
I buy this religiously...and love it. It provides even coverage. I have normal skin, and it doesn't dry me out.
I've been using BE for over 5 years, and I find that the fair is a little too pink and the fairly light was too dark. The golden fair is JUST right. I love this foundation.

I have been looking for the right foundation for a long time, and i have to say this is the best foundation i could have tried. i have tried from pressed powder to MAC's mineralized skinfinish and that didnt work out for me. Personally i dont like liquid foundation, especially because i feel like it transfers and i also dont like feeling like i have any makeup on. so bareminerals was the best pick ive made
I use this as a eye shadow - it works better than their regular eye shadows. If you want it to be more intense, than wet and apply.

I have been using BM foundation for about four years now. Before it seemed to leave me glowing with the perfect amount of coverage. Now it seems too cakey and like it sinks into my pores, making them more visible than before. Even when I use a good primer. I was so happy before with this product but for some reason it seems to be different. Average now for me.
Love the coverage, the ease of application, the fun of swirling and tapping, love the longevity of it, love the new inside closeable lid...just love it all!

reviews.review_title: best powder for a natural glow
reviews.review_text: this is my favourite powder for daily use. it gives me a natural glow that everyone loves. with a little blush and mascara, i'm good for a full day of work and play.

I switched from MAC studio fix to bare minerals because I was breaking out badly. A week or 2 after I made the switch, my skin looked SIGNIFICANTLY clearer. I have been using this product for a few months now and I couldn't be happier. I can go a day without wearing makeup and not feel like a beast. (haha.) If you're debating on whether or not to buy it, do it!! You won't regret it!

I've tried a lot of foundations...I mean A LOT! (makeup forever, Dior, Guerlain, Chanel...) and have never found one that actually keeps my oily skin at bay. My oily skin aside, I have larger pores, and I've found a lot of foundations tend to settle into my pores...making them oh so lovely and large...eww! It was just a horrible cycle of spending money on a product I thought would work for me and didnt, I decided to give a powder foundation of try. I knew that the most acclaimed powder foundation that reduced redness, gave a lot of coverage and was very natural was the Bare Escentuals bareMinerals foundation...so I gave it a try. I have very fair skin with an olive undertone and I found the perfect shade in golden fair. I've been using it for a week now, and my skin actually has cleared up, and looks more refined. It is unbelieveable what this product has done for my skin so far....I'm excited to see how it will change in the next little while as I continue to use it. I'm totally impressed with this, and I have no intention of getting any other foundation for a very long time.

I have used this product for about 8 years now and I refuse to switch. I love the new upgrades to the container of the foundation. The only complaint that I have is that my skin does get oily at the end of the day but I think that's what happens with most foundations anyway. Otherwise, I def recommend this product.
I absolutely love this foundation! It is light and makes me feel like I don't even have makeup on.

Got this in a get started kit...gives a flawless finish, covers up redness, and works great with the concealer brush for extra coverage in small areas. Love this...use it with the BE Full Coverage Kabuki and Flawless Application Face Brush.

I tried this foundation when it first came out and it made my skin very itchy..Well i decided i would try it again and that was one of my biggest mistakes ever...It made me itchy and breakout worse then ever...I have never had more then 2 or 3 pimples at a time and after using this I had close to 50..I got a couple of the eyeshadows too which were very pretty but when I put them on my eyes would itch and water..Needless to say this went back to Sephora and I have done some research because my skin is still healing and its been 4 months since I tried it and some of the crushed minerals include nickel, copper etc..which probably induced the breakout or bismuth oxychloride..not sure...but definitely will not repurchase.

This makeup is the best thing ever created. I will never use anything else on my face again. I tried several brands that were supposedly simliar, but nothing compares to the real thing. Feels great on, and great coverage.
I like this product, it covers the redness in my complexion.

This foundation is one that I return to often. It has a good range of color to match with your skin and buildable coverage that, depending on your need, is nice to have. I will always keep this in my makeup case!

reviews.review_title: F O R E V E R
reviews.review_text: I will always and forever love this foundation. It is my longest standing beauty product. 6 years and counting

I have been using bareMinerals foundation for several years now and love the coverage and the way that it is healthy for my skin. The new packaging makes usage much neater, making a great product even better!
Love all bareMinerals products...they have helped my skin so much. My skin is flawless after years of trying tons of products, my search is over!!

I have been using this for years - it calms my sensitive skin and covers redness, broken veins, and flaws without making me break out like liquid foundation. It has SPF 15 and stays on all day. It even looks better as time goes on! I can apply a little extra around my nose to give more coverage. I love this stuff!!!

I went to the Bare Minerals store yesterday and got a free sample... I LOVE this stuff! I have dry skin, and i'm used to wearing a tinted mousterizer. This stuff is amazing. All i have to do is buff just a little onto my skin, and done. All of my redness, blackheads, etc were hidden. and not only that, but it also gives off a beautiful finish that just makes my skin GLOW! The best thing I like is that i dont even feel like I'm wearing makeup :) -the only thing i dont like is that it doesnt do much for my undereye purpleness. Myabe i need to get the conceler though.

This is a great product! It gave me a 'glowing' look but not shiny. I first tried the matte version, but discovered with the season change that I needed the regular instead. The coverage is wonderful. A little of this goes a long way. so be careful how much you apply in the beginning. Follow their application instructions! The color is natural. I chose fairly light and it matched me beautifully. It lasts all day. It does not make me break out. Alot of makeup does. I absolutely cannot wear liquid makeup and have tried other mineral makeup foundations, but this one seems to be the best that I've tried. I love it so far. We'll see how long it lasts and any skin benefits after I use it longer. So far, I'm very pleased.

I bought this in-store and was very eager to try it as I've known several people who use it religiously and positively rave about it. However, I don't know if it's just my skin or what but after using it several times I broke out pretty bad. Maybe it wasn't the make-up but I don't really know if I want to take that chance again! Pretty disappointing because it was expensive.
