This product is easy to apply--brush & go. It's my second experience with powder foundation, and I like this much better than the competitor's. Stays fresh, mostly all day, with minimum touch-up, and it goes on pretty evenly. I like it.
This is a light, natural, and easy-to-use product that gives me perfect coverage and a beautiful glow to my skin. Just don't apply it too heavily or it will look cakey.
It gives great coverage and doesn't feel like a heavy gooy mask. And has SPF 15! What more could you want?

I have been using this makeup for years. Occasionally I will try a new foundation, to see if anyone has come up with something better, but I always come back to bare Minerals. Great colors for all undertones (I use fairly light, which is neutral). Can easily adjust amount of coverage. When used with a concealer brush, it covers imperfections with a natural finish (not under eyes though!) I like to use with a primer (Lorac). And I also do a quick finger blending after applying with a brush so the powder doesn't sit on top of pores. Blending makes a difference. Lasts all day. Never irritates or causes breakouts. Basically perfect.

been using bare escentuals for a year or more. I like that you can control how much coverage you want and what kind of finish you want by adding a hydrating of shimmery product that goes on top of this, if you choose to add it. by layering the bare esentuals products u can customize ur look and I have not found any other foundation that could offer such good coverage and be so light. The more you buff it, the better coverage you get.

reviews.review_title: Mineral-based is the way to go!
reviews.review_text: This product has my skin looking soft, not caky, and radiant. I never was a fan of foundation until I started using this product.
I love Bare Escentuals! I use a light foundation in the winter. I use a medium in the summer. Do to sun exposure I need not worry.

reviews.review_title: The best foundation for acne prone skin!
reviews.review_text: I can't say enough good things about this foundation! BE foundation has literally changed my life!!! Before using BE, I was using typical liquid foundation, and it was a vicious cycle. My face would break out, I'd use foundation to cover it, then I'd break out again, you get the picture. The first time I used this (over 5yrs ago) I found BE Minerals foundation to be very natural and had excellent coverage. My skin didn't react to it at all, and in just a few weeks, my skin looked great. BE Minerals foundation covered all of my dark spots, made my pores look smaller, and gave me an honest and natural coverage. It never feels heavy and it blends in beautifully. I've never gone back to liquid foundation and have used this one faithfully ever since. I highly recommend this foundation to anyone, young or older, who wants flexibility in thier foundation coverage. You can use as little or as much as you need to get the effect desired and still look natural. They come in many colors, so I'm sure there's one out there for just about anyone. Don't bother with the rest of the mineral foundations, BE is the first and still the best! I can say that now I use the entire line of makeup products and have never looked back. I'm a true BE ADDICT!

I had decent skin to start off with. During this stage of my life, I should be breaking out constantly. I tried other foundations but they didn't satisfied me, so I bought this one. At first, I thought the coverage was too light; I could see my acne through it. But the next day, my skin already improved and I could see that my acne had somewhat faded away. I continued to apply this foundation and as my skin got clearer, the amount of coverage i use decreases. At this moment, I'm acne free. I've only been using this since last month. In addition, my complexion is so nice! II get compliments by people nowadays. Even they have noticed my improved skin. I also had random people asking me what foundation I use. This foundation is clearly the best.
There is no better foundation out there!! Golden Fair is the perfect match for my difficult-to-match skin tone. LOVE!!!
Great coverage with a natural look on my skin! Blends well and compliments my skin tone. Lasts throughout the day.

I love Bare Minerals products that I have tried so far (everything in the getting started kit. They make my skin look flawless, no matter how many dark circles or pimples I have. I also tend to get dry skin and cream's and other brand powders I've tried seem to make that look worse when I put it on. This foundation though doesn't make my dry skin worse (although it doesn't hide it either). I love the new click-and-go container since I travel a lot. I just wish they didn't cost so much. I'm a penny-pincher, but I still buy this product because I like it so much and in the past have bought other brands at Target & Wal-Mart and have never been as satisfied with them.
Gives very good coverage keeping a natural look - as if you were not wearing foundation.
This is the best makeup ever. The coverage is great and never a touch up is needed. Stays on all day and always looks fresh. The best I have ever used!
Ever since I have been using Bare Minerals, people will tell me what great skin I have. I've had strangers stop my teen daughter and I in the store to ask what skin products we use.

I love that B.M. came out with this new shade for fair people with red undertones!!! I used to have to mix medium (dark for me but pink based color) with fair (very light) to make a good shade for me. This color matches me perfectly and I have always loved B.M.'s coverage. I do NOT like the new containers that twist to shut, good idea but the holes are too small and don't allow enough of your powder to be in the top part of the container.

I love the product. I hate the new packaging and love the new packaging. I love the new no spill container but I use the empty containers to store jewelry findings, etc. I can not get the sifter out of the new container now. What a shame I have to throw them away now.
Excellent coverage - as much or as little as you like. Keep it on a steady surface as it's very disappointing when any of the minerals spill.
amazing foundation, covers everything, and light weight! looks very natural
This foundation really covers well and my skin feels soft afterwards.
Bare Escentuals bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation Always goes on well, no chin lines like wet foundations leave. Will never change foundations...I'm forever staying with Bare Escentuals!
I mix two different shades of the bareMinerals Foundation, but love how easy it is to apply, how quickly I can apply my makeup in the morning, and love how it smooths my skin tones.
favorite foundation. so pure, it never makes me break out. great coverage, from sheer to full. you can layer it to cover up more. matches my skin so well. I'm a loyal bare minerals customer.
I don't want to ever use anything else!

The foundation blends perfectly with my skin tone and it looks so natural. I have a patch of darker skin on my forehead and with a little foundation using the small brush, it becomes invisible. I have oily skin and it even seems to reduce the oil that collects on my face during the day. This has been the perfect foundation

Foundation is the one product that everyone will probably agree is the most frustrating to apply and keep looking fresh and natural all day. The one mistake I see so many women make is too much foundation. Whatever you are trying to hide or cover, slathering on foundation is not the answer.  The answer IS, however, this amazing product. I was not sold when I read about it. I thought it would most certainly make me look like a cakey ghost, no matter what anyone else's review said. Was I ever wrong...I barely brush a light coating of this stuff over my face, a little blush and I'm good to go. It literally takes ten yeras off my face, and when you hit 54, that's something to brag about. I'm not exaggerating here, it's amazing.
Awesome product. Just love this stuff. Best foundation I've ever used and very easy to apply and still keep that natural look. great for sensitive or breakout prone skin as well

THis product is pretty much my savior! I tried when i thought i had tried everything and every brand of high-coverage make-up, it was always a hassle bc i wanted something light and not cakey but i could never find anything light enough to cover my acne scars... i now swear by this!!! i love it & i will not ever giveit up! im just sad i didnt try it sooner :)
i LOVE this foundation. i've been using it for years and people are always asking me what i use on my skin. seriously, this stuff is amazing.

I started using bareMinerals when i was about 14 or so. The person who was consulting my skin said i needed sheer coverage and this would be great for me. Well after a few month i started breaking out everywhere and i couldn't figure out why. I read so many reviews on bareMinerals and didn't possibly think that this was causing my acne problems. I also found my self using a great deal of it. I would buy one every two months or so. It didn't stay well on my face even with a primer. I switched to another foundation and found that my skin started clearing up immediately. Once i stopped using it completely i saw a huge difference in my face. My sister uses it and she gets amazing coverage with it and looks flawless but for me it did the opposite.

I have been using this foundation for 2 or 3 years and it is just the best. Makeup gives me pimples, then I try to cover them up with more makeup of course.. it's a viscous cycle! Bare Minerals keeps my skin looking natural and has never given me any breakouts (I even sleep in it sometimes :P)

This is the first time I have ever used a mineral foundation. I like the fact that it doesn't have toxic chemicals in it like other brands. This foundation has a nice coverage and is light and covers well but is messy and is not possible to get a thick coverage. When using this product I need additional products to cover imperfections. I would purchase this again but also keep a liquid foundation for those bad days where I need extra coverage.
Havent found anything better

Best foundation ever! i have been using it since i was 15 and now im 20. so thats 5 years. I absolutely love this foundation and I always end up going back to it if I try another foundation. Its the only one that stays on your face all day and NEVER melts off your face.
I really like this product and will continue to use it!

i love this product and have used it for many years. I usually use a combination of light and fairly light throughout the year. This summer I got tan and used golden medium as my tan faded light was a little too light for me so i purchased fairly medium. This shade was actually lighter than light. The swatch online and color name are deceiving.
Never thought I would like these mineral powders but I'm becoming addicted to them! So glad I bought this. It's my second one. Love it!
Wonderful product! Especially if you have small pores to begin with....this gives a very natural lovely smoothness to skin.

I have been using Bare Minerals for 5 years now, and I love it. I can't think of any complaints except having to buy two shades for the summer and winter. Really, this is a fantastic product. I wear it almost daily.
i wasnt really expecting bare escentuals to be great but it is. Its a quick application and fully covers. Totally recommend this product

I had been using bare minerals in fair, but my face always looked a bit too pink, and the next shade was way too dark for my pale skin. This new shade is just perfect! Fair, with just the right amount of golden glow to it. I am in love!

at first i doubted it would do a good job of covering my acne scars but it did! i was so happy with that but it should be longer lasting because by the end of the day it was sarting to come off but it looks very natural and blends in well
The best foundation I have tried. It beats Clinique, Chanel, & Bonny Brown in my book. It doesn't feel heavy on your face, yet you can choose how much coverage you want.
Fairly light matches my skin tone perfectly. I love how light it feels and how completely it covers. I will buy this again and again!
I loved this but, I turned out to be allergic to the Bismuth. I will be buying the matte version which doesn't have bismuth in it.
This is the best foundation I have ever tried. I have a lot of redness and blemishes and this covers them up! It doesn't feel like I am wearing a mask as liquid foundations often do.

I LOVE this product. When it's paired with a great primer - the coverage is unbeatable. Even my boyfriend turned to me and commented about how even my skintone was - completely unprompted. 2 thumbs way up.

I usually never wear foundation, I hate that caked on look or seeing where people's make end on their face. I had the girl try this at the store and immediately became convinced that this was the product for me. I love it. You can't really see that I have any makeup on. In my opinion thats the way it should be

this is my first time every using any sort of powder/mineral foundation and i am absolutely in love with it. i will never wear liquid foundation again. it feels great on your skin and when paired with the warmth looks absolutely amazing. the only issue i have with this is that it definitely doesn't look completely natural like the commercials say but other than that i love it.

I have been using bareminerals for about 4 years now and have had people tell me multiple times that my face is glowing. I dont have awesome skin and break out also so i know that its the bareminerals that makes my face glow!

I ran out of this foundation back in July, but had no chance to get back to the store until recently. I had been using some drug store powder foundation I had lying around, and my skin lost it's beautiful shine I had become used to. As soon as I applied the bareMinerals foundation a week ago, my skin seemed to dance with excitement. My skin looks radiant again, and I will never go so long without it again.
I love this make-up. It doesn't irritate my skin and feels like wearing nothing.
I used to use MAC studio fix and changed to bare minerals i like that it doesnt look super thick on.

I have been using Bare escentuals foundation for 3 or 4 years. I decided this spring to try a top name department store mineral foundation for a change. It was alot more expensive and not nearly as good...within two weeks i had returned it and purchased some more Bare Escentuals. I use all of the face products from this line and won't switch again.
I said a yr ago i didnt like the idea of mineal makeup and i would probably never try it.Well i tried it a yr ago,Its all i use and i will probably always use bareminarls,and so should you!!!

This is the best make up for me. I need something natural that will not fade to my clothes when it is hot outside as my work consists of going in and out of the heat in FL. It contains a SPF, which is essential and helps create a nice, natural look. My face is a little on the t zone and oily in some places and this helps to dry those areas up. Plus, my skin is sensitive and this is the only makeup I can use that won't create break outs. To give it a finished look add the Bare Escentuals blush and transparent powder.

reviews.review_title: Having the hardest time finding the right shade
reviews.review_text: I've been using other brands of mineral makeup because I found (years ago) that Bare Minerals limited shade choices just didn't work with my skin tone. Recently I noticed expanded shade selections and made my best guess, but it's still off. Please provide samples!!

This stuff is great! I love not having to use gross liquid makeup anymore!! It doesn't make me look perfect but it does what I wanted it to do and I'm pleased. My skin is much less oily and my breakouts have almost completely stopped!!! It doesn't rub off on anything for me and it doesn't run down my face when I sweat-however the coverage lessens but that's pretty much what a normal person should expect.  I'm not sure about my shade just yet...it seems like light is TOO light while fairly light is a little bit too dark. Not sure what to do about this but I will have a lot of time to experiment and figure it out since this stuff is very long lasting!  It can get drying after using it for so many days in a row but that's actually fine with me since I hated having oily skin and was never able to wear moisturizer without breaking out until I started using BE! Winter is coming so I'm sure I'll have to moisturize under this foundation but it's no biggy.

Simply the best. I first tried bareMinerals years ago but chose the wrong shade and it did not look good on me. Years later I came back with my close to perfect shade and I have been using it every day. My skin tone looks really natural, my pores look smaller than with any other powder or liquid foundation, it's easy to apply and it seems to help take care of my sensitive dry skin. Love it!

reviews.review_title: Great product, but package is shrinking.
reviews.review_text: I have been a loyal bare minerals user for several years now, but I need to point out that Leslie Blodgett changed the package design, and subsequently gave us 1 oz. less of product for the same price. (Was 9 oz, now 8.) I also don't feel that the design of the new jar has made the foundation any easier to use. This was definitely a situation where a product was fixed which wasn't broken to begin with...Back to the drawing board, Leslie!

This is unlike any other foundation you have ever used. It's smooth and silky and good for your skin. I love the Bare Escentual foundation including Warmth, Mineral Veil and Summer Bisque. No breakouts with this foundation.

reviews.review_title: Super sensitive skin -- no longer irritated!
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation. It is as long lasting and covers just as well as MAC Studio Sculpt foundation, but feels so much lighter and better on my skin.  My dermatologist thinks I have rosacea, and on top of that I have the most sensitive skin my friends have ever seen. The rosacea is not nearly as bad as it used to be, but I still have problems finding foundations that will cover the redness in my skintone. (If it's a little windy or a little cooler out, my skin breaks out in puffy blotches of red) This by far works better than any Walgreens or Walmart foundation I've bought. It doesn't irritate my skin at all, and it feels like I'm wearing nothing. The true test will be in the cold winds of winter!  I'm not sure if I totally love the luminous look of the original foundation though, so when I need to refill I'm going to try out the matte option.  I also love the new lock and go feature. Perfect for traveling - no longer have to worry about tapping down the loose powder before opening or accidently forgetting to do that and wasting a good week's worth of makeup in a spill.

I took some pics of myself after applying this makeup for my deployed husband and they looked FLAWLESS. However, my younger sister commented that the closer she looked at my face the faker I looked. I like it but use it only on special occasions. The powder makes a mess if you aren't careful. I usually don't wear makeup other than mascara so maybe I just need more practice.
I do love the finish - subtle but flawless all at the same time.
Been using for over 15 yrs. I love this product..Try it for yourself, so natural feeling yet covers so well.

I am not one for wearing make-up since I have always been prone to breakouts. I love this stuff. It covers everything but feels like nothing is on and I swear it helps to improve my skin in the process. It doesn't irritate my skin or give me break outs. It is so light weight, but provides amazing coverage. A definite buy!

I have been using Bare Minerals for four years now and wouldn't think of using anything else. The coverage is great and it doesn't feel like you're wearing anything. Before I found Bare Minerals, I tried other foundations and mineral makeups, but they were either too heavy or too cakey. Bare Minerals has the perfect finish and I have recommended it to all my friends and family!
I've been using bareMinerals for years now and still love it. Works beautifully on my oily skin.

I have used this product for years now, I have acne scars and uneven skin. This product gives me great coverage and evens out the discoloration. I use it every day and it doesn't make me break out. At 21 this is already my be all end all foundation, and given 10 years of fighting with my skin this foundation has helped a lot.

You can't get any better. With liquid foundation at age 35 was still getting breakouts. Then I changed to bareMinerals and have not had a breakout since. It is now the only brand of makeup that I will use on my face!!!

I've been using bareMinerals since I first heard about it. I've strayed a few times thinking that maybe this or that product will be better, but I always go back to bareMinerals foundation. I get great coverage without a heavy feeling. bareMinerals has been there for me through teen acne, and monthly hormonal breakouts. bareMinerals is always there for me.

I Have been using Bare Minerals since the FIRST time i sampled it in a Sephora store 4 years ago. Since I purchased the starter kit I have never again put liquid foundation or concealer on. This product really is a miracle, It matches your skintone exactly no matter what shade you are & you can use the same shade year round - just use a touch more warmth in the summer. My skin also changes through the year, oily in summer & very dry in areas in the winter, Perfect all the time no matter what condition my skin is in. breakouts or flakiness; This still makes a gorgeous finish, layers well & you can use as little or much as you like depending on the flawlessness & coverage you're going for. So easy to apply & takes litterally seconds, Even when I don't wear makeup I buff a little on just because it makes your skin glow & look so perfect. The container lasts a couple of months for me & I use it every day, sometimes twice. All this & its very good for your skin too... Like I said - Miracle.

Coming from a product junky, I have boughten this for the last three years. It is lightweight and doesn't compare to any other liquid foundation that I have bought! Since using the foundation I have now started using the RareMinerals line as well. In-conjunction with using the makeup line and skin care line my skin has drastically improved! I will buy this again and again!
the best product out there..worth every penny and it's long lasting as well.

I have had acne ever since I was a young teenager and have struggled with constant blemishes and the unavoidable acne scars that come along with them. This is the first product that I have found that not only completely covers up my scars, but also prevents me from having breakouts. This product also has an amazing finish, and I have even been told that I look like I'm glowing. I will never use anything else.
it does not have a caked on feelling like liquid foundations or paste foundations, but covers just as well!
I have been using this powder for a few years, it is fabulous! Never a blemish, always so natural!
This is some of the best make up I have ever used. I love it! Can't live without it!!
love this stuff. makes me feel pretty.

Bare Minerals has changed makeup! It does wonders for my face and after trying comprable foundations, I can honestly say that it is one of a kind and there are no comparisons! I would definitely recommend watching the how to video that comes with the started kit for your first few times but after that it's like second nature!  I have broken blood vessels on my face and they are completely covered with bare minerals foundation. Try it!
I love this product & won't use anything else again!

I LOVE this foundation & have yet to find another product that makes my skin look so awesome! Just make sure you buy the correct shade for your skin tone or it will look cakey. With the right shade it looks so natural & so flawless though!!
I love the foundation! I can't go a day without it.

reviews.review_title: Great if you find the right shade
reviews.review_text: I had to try Bare Minerals a few times before I really started to like it. The first few times I was given the wrong shade, and as a result, was very dissappointed in the results. Finally, the last time I purchased I took the time to try all of the shades rather than the one the woman at Sephora suggested (Medium Beige, which apparently 80% of women wear). My real best match is Golden Medium which I've been very happy with!
As always I have to say that I love bareMinerals. And once again the service at the Holyoke Mall, MA was phenomenal. I tried a samply of a pineapple body was which I also loved.
My daughter introduced me to this product & my makeup has never looked better, absolutely love this........

I've been using this for a few weeks, and so far, I am impressed by the coverage. Goes on smooth and covers well without feeling or looking heavy. I'm using the fair, and I think it matches my skin well, but is still a little more yellow than pink as described in the product info. Also, this can get a little messy; when you tap the brush, some of the powder can fly off the brush onto your counter. But overall, I'm impressed. I think it's worth it if you get a good brush and color.

reviews.review_title: Great powder foundation for light coverage.
reviews.review_text: This powder foundation is great quality and very easy to use. There's no worrying about lines or getting the foundation applied well, as long as you have the right color matched to your skin tone, it's incredibly easy to use. It noticeably evens out my skin tone but without being opaque so I can still see my freckles. It's very light and comfortable to wear.
I'm a HUGE skeptic but i love this make up - try it and you will too!!!!

I love Bare Escentuals and have used it for several years but the new packaging doesn't work for me. When you get near the last 1/3 of the jar it is next to impossible to get it out without taking a screwdriver to break the top open.

Love the locking inner cover that stops all the powder from escaping into the lid area - I wish all my other bare escentuals had the same thing. It isn't as luminescent as others Bare minerals items that I ordered but it may be a matte color.
This make-up does every thing that I want it to do. Most of all, It makes me look like I have good healthy skin, not artificial.
I love this product! After three tries, I finally found the right shade - Medium Beige. The frist shade suggested was too light, the second, too pink.

I started using bareMinerals a few years ago and am obsessed! I would never even consider switching back and trying anything else. It seriously makes my skin look flawless. I would say, at least give it a try if you haven't already. and an added bonus is that you don't even feel like you're wearing make-up!

This foundation is great. It definitely evens out my skin tone without the flaky appearance of other foundations... Though Sephora has this weird click and go thing that goes over the holes where the powder comes out.. I'm not really sure of the point. If anything, it's just annoying because it gets in the way of the brush. I'd buy elsewhere.

Maybe I did not use it right but this product give me nothing. It looked nice in the morning but after 2-3 hours, my face look like grease pan. I exchanged it to matte formula. It was better and lasted a bit longer but still not enough coverage for me.  ps I purchased them with new starter kit. The only thing I love is Mineral Veil.

I had stepped away from this foundation for a while and decided to come back. Glad I did! I use the Fair and it blend perfectly with my light skin tone. The coverage is pretty decent, although it doesn't always cover my blemishes on the first go-around. I normally have to touch up those areas. You can't even tell you have foundation on and the coverage lasts all day, even through exercising. The foundation is easy to blend and it also doubles as a coverup for my blemishes and under the eyes.

THIS IS MY FAVORITE EVERY DAY FOUNDATION. I'VE BEEN USING IT FOR ABOUT 3 YEARS NOW. IT GIVES ME VERY GOOD COVERAGE, LOOKS SUPER NATURAL, AND LASTS ALL DAY. I LIKE IT BECAUSE I HAVE DRY SKIN AND THIS DOESN'T OVER DRY MY FACE. I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT.
Love and evens out my skintone!
Never leave home without it on...Great coverage. Light.
Great coverage and leaves skin feeling soft and clean.

I liked the matte, but it was too powdery. This is better. I still prefer the texture of a liquid foundation as it isn't powdery at all (I really like glowing, slightly dewy skin). If you prefer powder foundation, you'll like this though.
I love my Bare Essentials! This is the first time I am replacing my Starter container and I love the dispenser. I feel I'm not wasting ANY of the product!! The girl helping me was wonderful too!

I like this product so much better then going to CVS for physicians formula or some other natural makeup. But, I haven't tried other higher end makeup products like lorac or make up forever, so i dont really know how this compares to those. I really like this foundation. it isnt cakey at all and it blends well. I use medium tan in the summer and then medium beige when my tan is fading. it usually lasts me 1-2 months.

I use the Medium Beige shade, and I really love this foundation. Even though my skin is on the oily side, I prefer the original BE foundation to the new Matte version - I find that the finish to this one is much nicer. My skin naturally isn't that great, but I always get so many compliments on how I have such beautiful skin whenever I'm wearing this. It blends really well and you can keep applying for more coverage. It also works well as a concealer with the concealing brush from BE. Sometimes when I'm really concerned with my makeup staying put, I layer this over liquid foundation and that looks great too! I definitely recommend this to anyone, your skin will softly glow and you'll never have any gross foundation streaks.

I originally purchased the matte version of this product, but exchanged it for the original because no matter how much I buffed, it looked cakey and flat. I have very oily skin, and normally have to blot my face several times a day. When I use the bareMinerals, I only have to blot about once a day. It does have a luminescent finish that some may not care for, but it does not look cakey to me. Another thing I like about the product is that it is easy to match my skin tone, which has a lot of yellow in it. I blend the light and the golden medium to get my perfect shade. I also like that it has and SPF of 15. My only two minor complaints: 1. I have difficutly building enough coverage to disguise all the rosacea related redness that I have, 2. Any dry patches are more noticable with the powder. My favorite foundation is still DiorSkin Forever, but overall the bareMinerals is a good product. I would recommend it to those who do not have rosacea or dry skin.

I wished this foundation would of worked for me but it didn't. I started to break out really bad and I had little bumps all over my face. I knew it had to be this foundation so I stopped using it and my face cleared up and the bumps slowly went away. Maybe I'm allergic to it? Who knows but I had to give it to my cousin since I was unable to use it.
Love this stuff, it lasts and lasts! Never a mark between where it is and is not.

I just recently began using bare minerals and couldn‚Äôt be happier. The foundation makes my skin look great and it‚Äôs gentle on my skin. I essentially had stopped wearing makeup with the exception of nights out and special occasions due to everything making me breakout. This makeup is great ‚Äì no breakouts and it looks natural while still providing good coverage. I chose to write this review because I wanted to mention that I really wasn‚Äôt expecting much from this product due to it kind of being an infomercial-like product. My cynicism was unwarranted ‚Äì it really is a great product that deserves all of the positive reviews and awards it receives. When I run out of the regular foundation I am looking forward to trying out the Matte finish.

I just cant seemed to find a color that works for me in this line. I was looking for something to take over my perscriptives mineral powder now that they are no longer around. This product seems to enlarge my pores and wrinkles and I have very good skin to begin with.

I decided to try this a couple months ago because i really wanted something that would cover up my zits. I started breaking out and didn't know why. I talked to my dermatologist and she said it was proabably this foundation. I spent a lot of money on this because i bought the whole get started kit. I'm annoyed!
I haven't tried the original before but really like the container better than the newer one. The twist ability alllows me to throw it in my makeup bag without the lid becoming full of powder.

I can't say enough about these products. You protect your skin as well as get a nice matted overall finish. However, if you have large pores, it's best to use a base product first, wait 5 minutes then apply.. buy specialty brushes so you can use this as a quick blemish coverup and other brushes to use under the eyes if needed and a larger to use all over. I've also used it over a creamy foundation to set the foundation. Excellent products and they last forever.

I love Bare Minerals, I have very sensitive skin and I don't get breakout with this foundation. However I hate having to purchase it at Sephora because the staff are not helpful if you don't know your color. It's better to go to the Bare Escentuals Store if you want your correct color.

I'm 36 with acne prone skin. Years ago I decided you get what you pay for applies to most cosmetics. Every time I needed a new foundation, I read review and tried something new....from MAC to Sue Devitt to Estee Lauder. I'd wanted to try B-E but was concerned about the messiness factor. FInally, I broke down and purchased the starter kit and fell in LOVE. Layer for more coverage, felt like I had nothing on and WAS long wearing. The container has a sift so you only dispense what you want...not a mess. This stuff is the bomb! try it, you will not be disappointed.

I have been using this product for over 2 years now and absolutely love it! All my sisters use this product and tried to get me to try it....took me awhile but now i'm hooked! Feels like you aren't wearing make-up and looks great!

reviews.review_title: Not all it's cracked up to be
reviews.review_text: For years, I avoided trying this foundation because I was convinced I would love it and spend the rest of my life paying the high prices to wear it. When a friend finally did get me to try it, I was seriously underwhelmed. Even with very heavy application, it wouldn't cover blemishes nearly as well as my favorite drugstore concealer and liquid foundation. I ended up dabbing on some cream concealer (Lorac, maybe?) before leaving the store so I could finish shopping without feeling self conscious. I would only recommend this for someone who already has near perfect skin and just wants some light coverage or shine control.

I have been using this product for 5 years. I do love it but it makes me itch. Im not sure if its the brush or the foundation. I tend to get oily even with the Matt foundation. By far it works better than anything i have used, but its not for everyone. Im a faithful user and will continue to do so.

Sigh. I really wanted to like this stuff because it did make my tiny sunspots vanish...but it also created mini breakout spots all over my face!!! I usually don't have issues with my smooth skin, but I noticed this formed little acne bumps under the product after using it for about 4 times. Not cute :( returned it.  Kind of gets powdery/shimmery over time. Watch how much you use!

I wanted to love this! The overall effect of the makeup is really nice. I love the concept. I have been wearing this on and off for a few months now. I have combination skin, my t-zone gets pretty oily by the end of the day. I noticed that my skin breaks out more when I wear this than with my normal pressed powder. This is sad because I RARELY break out!

Love this product - I purchased this recently because my usual foundation was causing me to break out in rashes. This product is gluten free, because it has no binders, which is great. Good coverage, yet sheer - looking. I found a shade that matches perfectly, and it has definitely become my new favourite.

this is the best mineral foundation ive ever used. i can get exactly the kind of coverage i need and want and a reapplication if necessary is completely effortless! so glad i have a foundation i can count on!

I wanted to love this! Pros: 1. It comes in a multitude of shades, and it's almost given that you'll find a match. 2. It really does create a matte, flawless finish. All in all, it's a good powder foundation, but since my skin tends to be dry, I find that it settles into my fine lines, which detracts from its overall appeal.

I have very oily skin, so nay bit of make up on my face is noticeable especially if its powder. I bought this one and it look cake-y on my face. the Matt finish bare escentuals is much better and more natural looking.

I have used this for about 4 years so here are the pros and cons in my long experience with this product:  Pros: Great buildable coverage, looks natural, great for sensitive skin, quick and easy to put on, covers breakouts amazingly well if you use it correctly.  Cons: Can look cakey around dry areas, can dry out skin, comes off supper easy if you touch your face at all.  I have used this for years and i loved it when i had bad acne cause i could put just this on and it would cover everything and still look natural. Recently my skin has become dry and i find this drying for my skin and i find myself looking for something more moisturizing. I still use this but only because everything else so far has broken me out. It is a good product and one of the best foundations, and best mineral foundation on the market, but it is not for everyone.

I love this stuff. But i didn't buy the handi buki brush. I use the tiny kabuku by thebalm. I'm still getting/learning how to use it, but it's great. I was worried, I was supposed to get the Matte formula, but i tried the matte and it made my face look cakey. Very unattractive. So I tried this, and it worked perfectly! Turns out I don't have oily skin!!
Another product that my mother loves but its not good for full coverage and I feel personally I sweat it off.

reviews.review_title: This stuff is the best, hands down.
reviews.review_text: I can't imagine ever using another foundation. I love natural products that actual work. BE is the best!

reviews.review_title: Foolproof and Must Have for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: I've used Bare Minerals foundation every day for 5 years now and still love it. I have extremely sensitive skin that reacts to most make up and skin products and I also have mild rosasea. Bare Minerals not only feels light like powder on my skin but covers up the redness I get around my nose and cheek area. I've slept in this stuff many times and I can't recall every breaking out from it. I use this along with the Mineral Veil over top and my makeup stays put until evening. I swear by this makeup and would recommend Bare Minerals to anyone who has sensitive skin or just wants the coverage of a foundation without actually wearing foundation. Love this stuff!

I know so many people who love this product so I decided to give it a shot. At first I was thrilled as the Fairly Light was perfect for my skin tone and the coverage was very good. It covered the broken capillaries on my cheeks nicely. Sadly, about a half an hour after application, my skin started to itch and when I finally got home to take the makeup off I had a bunch of pinpoint size whiteheads on my forehead and upper lip! I have NEVER broken out from a foundation before so I returned it. Happy it works for others but it just isn't for me.

I am a 22 year old male and I have dehydrated skin, yet my face gets shiny from time to time. I have tried various powder foundations, but I thought I'd try this since it is on the TV commercials like 24/7!  I could not help but to write a review since I think everyone (including women and men) should have the Bare Escentuals foundation. I do buy things off of TV a lot and find out that the product is not as good as it is shown on TV. BUT! This product is exactly what you see on TV! Whether it be for the purpose of going out, day-to-day wear or a photoshoot, this powder foundation makes my skin look radiant, clean, poreless, shineless- at the same time, NATURAL!  It is hard for me to find foundation that looks like I am wearing nothing, but this powder really sets and mixes with your natural tone and skin and makes your face look flawless. If you have dry skin like me, I suggest applying this right after your moisturize since it can look a bit chalky at the drier spots. The moisture of the moisturizer really combines will with the creamy texture of the powder, creating a perfect blend.  Numerous friends have commented on how my skin looks absolutely flawless (and no one suspects I wear foundation!)  The price is pretty fair considering you do not need to put a lot on for this magical foundation to work! I will DEFINITELY purchase again :)  Definitely ESCENTUAL to all!

I always get compliments on my skin. No one can tell that I am wearing any foundation! I have very sensitive skin and although this product irritated my skin the first three or four times I used it, I can no longer even feel that I am wearing it. I have been using for about a year now.

BEYOND THE BEST!!! I started using this mineral make-up about 3 years ago. I will NEVER EVER go back to liquid (eewww!) foundation. My skin has never been smoother. Within about 3 months of use, all the little bumps & imperfections on my face disappeared. You couldn't see them - but I could feel them when I applied moisturizer or washed. YUK. All that is gone and my skin has never looked better! Added bonus - no problem with taking this stuff on an airplane!

I use it every day for more than 2 years now and I love it. It gives me a light coverage and evens my skin tone very nicely.It will not hide any major inperfections, ance, discolorations. I still have to use concealer under this foundation. But his does not bother me.

I have combination skin and always use day cream under makeup... Never the less this mineral foundation accentuated every dry spot on my face! The coverage is good but the color I've got (Fair) is a bit off... Ney...

reviews.review_title: bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation in Med Beige
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for several years now and it's the best! I've tried almost every other product from liquids to other mineral powders and this product beats them all. I have somewhat dry, aging skin and it's flawless finish covers beautifully.

I've been using this foundation for years, and it's just the best there is. It's like a powder, but it doesn't dry out my skin, and the blemish coverage is unmatched.  Plus, this foundation works WITH your skin, not against it. It doesn't clog pores, doesn't have creepy chemicals in it, and lasts a lot longer than a liquid foundation. A+!
I really love the bareMinerals foundation. It is the best mineral foundation I have used. Provides great coverage with a clean and natural finish, easy to use, long lasting, etc.

What can I say. This is fantastic, I use it everyday. Alone. Wet. Dry. Under Liquid. Under Cream. Over Liquid/cream as a finisher. It's so versatile, you can do so much with it. Yet so dependable, that it always pulls through for you. I've been using this for 3 years - exclusively for 2, and just now am playing with discovering ways to combine this with other types of foundation. Bottom line: ahlavet.

Gives flawless coverage every time, I LOVE THIS FOUNDATION! I would recommend it to everyone, of all ages and skin types. An excellent product for anyone who has acne scaring or uneven skin tone. My favorite part about Bare Minerals is that it is all natural and works well if your skin is oily or extra sensitive. So even if you do fall asleep with your makeup on, there will be no breakouts.

bareMinerals is the first foundation that I have been satisfied with. I use a combo mix of fair and fairly light - which shocked the heck out of me when I had my consultation at the Bare Escentuals store. After talking with other bareMinerals users,I feel that bareMinerals run a little dark so don't be surprised if the tone for your complexion is lighter than you expected. Also, critics of bareMinerals tend to be people who run on the dry side of skin. This stuff is definitely for people with oily to normal/combo skin.  I'm actually really loving the matte but the original foundation is great with a very natural finish.

okay, been a fan for a long long time. however, I have super oily, acne-prone skin and this tends to get pretty shiny on me. use a primer or oil control. it doesnt break me out and it is the BEST foundation I've found in terms of naturalness. it doesnt emphasize dry skin and covers redness amazingly. but you're gonna need a concealer for acne. anyway. love it! i do need to touch it up a few times a day but thats the norm for my skin.

Although I have been using this foundation, I decided to try others including liquid and cream-to-powder. Honestly, nothing else gives me the finish that this does. It makes me look natural and not cakey. I will definitely not be buying any other foundation. This is it.

I've tried many different foundations, but this one is the best. I have fair skin that is very ruddy and this is the only foundation that completely hides the redness while still leaving a lovely sheen to my skin. It truly creates the perfect blank canvas for you to add the rest of your makeup to for a lovely finish. I also love that it doesn't contain the harmful chemicals that other foundations do. Every time I try a new foundation for the heck of it, none of them can compare to this one, so I keep coming back.

I use the medium beige foundation and LOVE IT! I have been using bareMinerals for the past 2 years and couldn't be happier. My face has slight redness and what I love about this foundation is that you can control how much you put on. On days where my face is redder than normal, I can apply an extra coat to cover and it STAYS PUT. I love that I can go all day without having to reapply. Also, some nights when I get in and am too tired to wash it off, it doesn't make me break out! I love this stuff!!!

I use Fairly Medium and it perfectly blends in with my skin. It doesn't even look like I'm wearing makeup. It covers up everything: zits, hyperpigmentation, redness, etc. Been using it for years now, will never use anything else. LOVE IT.
I use it with the Kabuki brush sold by Sephora for $25.

Okay, so when I first used this product it didnt look as if it was going on well. I didn't realize that it takes a few minutes for it to show up and I used a tad too much. However, once you get the hang of it its WONDEFUL. I have never gotten so many compliments on my skin! Once you start using bare Escentuals products your skin will look unreal. Its the best product line I have EVER come across. I developed a little acne on my cheek in college and I still got compliments on my skin BY MEN! This stuff is almost magical. I love it and will never use another product line!

I like the feel of the loose powder and if you have a bit of spotty acne like I do, it helps dry it out. The only thing I do not like about it is when your face gets oily throughout the day it gets a tad paste-y and rubs off easily. It does look very natural and the color selection is fabulous.
I love it, as usual! Great buy, especially since I needed new brushes. I love this new customizeable kit. I will surely get another one.

This may be a plus for some people, but it completely covered my freckles. I have lots of freckles and tried this and was like, I look so funny. Then I realized that it completely covered my freckles. I didn't like it because I looked so fake. I felt like I was wearing make up and everyone who knows me was like what's wrong with your face? Maybe if I only had a few freckles it would be okay...  The worst part, besides how weird and fake it looked, was that it rubbed off everywhere. I've used other foundations that stay but this one doesn't. I don't like foundation on napkins or my shirt.  It's also messy, kind of pricey (for the amount you get), made me itch, settled into lines, and doesn't control oil. I don't get the popularity.
It's a very good foundation, I feel it could be a little better, but it's good overall. The biggest complaint is that it leaves a mess whatever space I'm using to apply it.

reviews.review_title: Had to buy after sampling BE
reviews.review_text: I had received a sample of BE foundation and Mineral Veil, and ended up buying the Get Started Kit because I wanted all the brushes and the warmth product. I also received a Prime Time to try. I already had 2 brush kits, but the BE brushes are made for the coverages you need. They are great brushes. Love the warmth and Prime time too.
Have ordered Bare Minerals Foundation many times! I think my skin is so much better using this foundation and I love the Fairly Medium for my Fair skin. This was wonderful for this hot summer!

I actually bought this for my daughter, who is extremely fair. We've had the hardest time finding a foundation that was pale enough, but this one works! Not only does it match her skin tone, but it also is gentle on her acne-prone, teen-aged skin. It also gives great coverage. She is ecstatic!

What can I say that hasn't been said before? I love it, it works great and gives a flawless natural appearance. I am not a big foundation fan, I hate how it looks and I would never in a million years go back to traditional foundation. The locking top was a HUGE improvement.
I like the way it makes my skin look. Not thick in layers and natural. I am very satisfied with this product.

LET ME TELL YOU ALL SOMETHING, I WENT TO A BARE MINERALS STORE ABOUT 3 YEARS AGO. THEY MATCHED ME, (OR SO I THOUGHT THEY DID). UNTIL I WAS FEELING LIKE I JUST DIDNT LIKE MY COLOR. I WENT INTO MY LOCAL SEPHORA AND WOW, BM WAS SO OFF ON MY COLOR AND NOW I LOVE MY FACE AGAIN!!! THANKS SEPHORA :)
it gives you a very natural and flawless skin , not too heavy not too less, just perfect !!
I have been using this foundation for 7 years, and have no plans on switching. Does not clog pores, very natural looking and covers inperfections great!!

The flawless skin and better sunscreen coverage apply this with a kabuki brush and layer it on. It won't be too much, promise. You will have flawless skin. If you have large pores be sure to used a primer. Avoid use on wrinkles though it settles in and makes them stand out. Best for youger skin prone to breakouts.

bareMinerals is my go-to foundation and I received a recommendation to try the Medium in the summer time for my normally Light/Fairly Light complexion. The tone is spot-on for summer. Paired with the feather light mineral veil, the two make an awesome duo.
i really like this makeup! it stays on for awhile..only thing thats bad is it wipes off to easily!
Love it! goes on smooth, feels like silk going on your skin and then your skin feels like silk.
This simple to use foundation (especially when used with Prime Time primer) makes me feel done. I recommend it highly.
This my favorite brand of makeup.I am 60 years old and no can believe it. Bare Escentuals makes my skin look flawless.
Love the new container which limits the amount of powder that I use at a time.

I love my BareMinerals foundation! I think it covers great and I can apply all of your makeup within 5 mins!!! That is amazing. However, I do feel it is a foundation which must be re-applied before going out that night. Mine does wear throughout the day. Overall I love the product.
I have been using Bare Escentials for about 10 years, this is the first time the shade is a problem. I have always ordered the same medium shade, but this order is definately a shade off!

reviews.review_title: not a fan of the new package design....
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product but do not like the new design where you click to open...I find it messy and not convenient.

The phrase, you don't wear any makeup, is probably the best compliment any girl subconsious about the uneven skin tone can ever hear. This product offers a flawless finish and a clean look. I love it.
Fantastic product - covers like no other. Bare Minerals has my loyalty!!!
I have been using this for many years and love it. Won't use anything elese.
I think plenty has been said about how great this product is I will wear nothing else.
Bare Minerals always looks natural. It makes my skin feel so soft. I love it.

reviews.review_title: Mineral veil with shimmer...Big thumbs up!
reviews.review_text: I tried the mineral veil with the shimmer this time, instead of the plain one. I like it so much better.

best. foundation. ever. i've been using this stuff for about 2 years and i still marvel at the way it makes my skin look. flawless coverage, even tone - even redness and acne scars really do disappear. simply magic.
I love this foundation. I don't think I could ever go back to other foundations anymore. Looks very natural and feels smooth.

I can't count how many times I've reordered this product. I love the light-weight coverage and the fact that it's actually good for my skin. It's also a great value. I love my Bare Minerals and I know I'll be coming back for more.

The twist top of the new foundations is so wonderful that I cannot wait until they are using this on all of their loose products. If you have not used Bare Minerals you are missing out. This is the best type of make-up you can use on your face, Also do not be fooled by the other immitation products out there. This brand is literally the best and using the starter kit is the best way to try it and go from there. Sometimes you may not even be able to get the right color for your face or seasons change and you are inbetween colors, then you need to blend. These are so easy to blend without looking odd or strange on your face. You will look like you are not wearing any make-up at all. Completely natural and feel great on your face too.
have worn this makeup for three years now and will never go back to liquid foundation
Using this for 8 years now, nothing better for combination skin! Helps cover up those blemishes really well.
love the coverage! ihave big pores and scarring but this makeup does great for hiding these!
I tried this on a at a Bare Esscentuals boutique and it looked good but, it was shiny. I prefer the Matte

This is the best foundation I have ever tried. My skin is oily and usually after a couple of hours my face is shiny. After trying this product over primer, it not only looks natural, but it keeps my oil better controlled.
love it and its the only foundation I use
thats the oly make-up brand I use, and adore it :)
I love the bare minerals coverage

I was skeptic at the beginning about the coverage of this product and its texture. I used it couple of times - it looks wonderful, I got plenty of compliments from my coworkers about my  gorgeous luminous skin , it looks really natural. I LOVE IT!

Having long used the original version of this succesfully, I was pleasantly surprised to find this version even better than the original. The redesign of the jar delivers more powder when tapped (hooray!) and the new formulation goes on smoother with a creamy finish. All in all, a new and improved that really delivers
It matches with my skin perfectly. Like the package design.
I have fair skin with a slight golden undertone. I was using to use Fairly light, but it has a little pink in it, for more of a nuetral undertone. This matches my skin perfectly.
the coverage is all right-- not amazing. but i will say this, i have seborrheic dermatitis and a lot of make up will irritate my skin. and the bare escentuals has not irritated me yet!
this product did not cover blemishes and made my face look super cakey

I am completely loyal to this foundation product. It is amazing and it doesn't look like you have makeup on. It's not greasy or oily and it won't melt off like liquid foundation. You don't even have to use a lot of it to see results.
I keep thinking I should use liquid make up and go back to it on occasion, but come back to bareMinerals because it's so easy. Plenty of coverage, not drying or cakey-looking.

I have been using bareMinerals for 4-5 years now. I have sensitive skin, and this product helped clear my skin up quite a bit, or at least it doesn't make my acne worse like other foundations may have! I am really excited to have a product with SPF in it!!!

Absolute BEST foundation I have ever tried. I love the full coverage without the heavy gross feeling. It feels so light and your skin and makes it appear flawless. And I love the way it makes my skin glow.

I have a great time going into Sephora everytime I am there. Whether it is to just look around or shop, the staff is always friendly and helpful. Everything is organized and looks great! Definitely one of my favorites stores!

i have combination skin with a very uneven skin tone and have tried EVERYTHING! this is the only foundation that gives me full coverage and evens my skin tone without being caked on or to heavy. my skin looks perfect every time i use it! i have used other mineral makeup brands (Laura Mercier, Mac, Lancolm) its just not the same.

I really like this foundation. It is light and airey and doesn't make you feel like you have make-up caked on. Also, since wearing this, my skin seems alot healthier (less break-outs). Great purchase as always!

This is the BEST make up I have ever used. My skin tends to look a little blotchy and I have slight acne- this make up covers it all! I can't tell you how many people have complimented me on my complexion since I've started using it. Someone even told me that my face looked air brushed! True, it's a bit more expensive than what you'd find at your local drug store, but it's worth every penny because the results are fantastic! I won't use anything else from here on out.

living in the oven called phoenix--up for 36 hrs at a time on call-spin class-wearing a surgical mask this is the makeup equivalent of a marathon. i've sworn by this for nearly a decade. i can look flawless in 60 seconds without a mirror and even at 2 am everyone thinks i have flawless skin. you can even sweat THROUGH it..just blot and you're good to go

reviews.review_title: THIS WILL BE AN ESSENTIAL IN YOUR COSMETIC BAG
reviews.review_text: THIS FOUNDATION IS AMAZING! IT HELPS ME LOOK MY BEST EVERYDAY. IT IS EASY TO APPLY, AND YOU HAVE CONTROL OF THE COVERAGE. YOU DONT LOOK TOO MADE UP. I LOVE THIS PRODUCT AND SUGGEST IT TO MANY OF MY FRIENDS.

I have used Bare Escentuals for 2 years now and I am so glad I took a chance and tried it. I actually love the matte formulation, but sadly this is 3 dollars cheaper (or 2 I can't remember) and I just stick with this and only use the matte for special occasions. An absolutely great product!

I am always looking for the next great product but sometimes you have to admit when you've found the one thing that really works for you. For me, bareMinerals foundation is flawless. Perfect in all temperatures (including humid Tennessee summers) and long lasting. I recently switched back to it from a liquid and a male friend said my skin was glowing: sold.

I am a loyal bareMinerals makeup user. I love all of their products. This new foundation came with a new type of lid that you can spin shut which is really nice. You don't have powder every where when you open the lid. I like the fact that I can buy all of my makeup products at once from Sephora.

I dont know what makes this foundation so special really, Ive watched the commercials on this product and I dont think it does what it says it does, except for it does last along time (thats why I gave it 2 stars if your wondering)... But I got this as a gift along time ago and only used it for when I broke out badly, which is not very offen.. I think I might have liked it at first and I think I might have but Im not sure written a review on this before, but anyway as time went on I noticed that there was nothing special about this product, I dont think it covers anything at all... I like liquid foundations the best for normal everyday use, but I like to use loose powder when I break out badly just because I think its gentler on my skin... Just my opinion but I would not recommend this product, I think its a waste of money... Im really sad that I dont like this product because except for the well rested producted, I love all the other products by bare escentuals that Ive tried...

I have used BareMinerals makeup for a couple of years now and still love it. It does not get cakey or crease in the humidity of Fl like other foundations I have tried have. I also have sensitive skin and have found this foundation to not cause breakouts or any skin irritation.

This is a great product. I love the creamness without oily feel. I love the SPF protection. I think this product improves my skin texture. I have used it for a couple of years now and I think my skin is a bit better for it. Easy to use. Great coverage. The Get Started Kits are the way to go to start using this whole line. You'll be hooked.

Best foundation ever I have never found a foundation that is better than this one. I have acne scars and when I wear it you cant even tell I have them I also have a really oily face and at the end of the day its the only foundation that stays on.

I've been using Bare Minerals for over 6 yrs. I love all the products. I get great coverage with the foundation. You layer as much product as you need, without it feeling heavy. I always receive compliments about how perfect my skin is, but I know that this makeup helps me greatly!
This foundation is just ok. When I put it on, it doesn't cover up much. I tend to have to use a bronzer over it to make it a bit darker.

This is perfect! I hate liquid foundation so this is the perfect alternative. Shades match perfectly to any skin tone. I am happy Bare Minerals brought out the matte version sans Bismuth Oxycloride because I am allergic and break out from it. This version is great!

I have used this foundation for two years now, and I have not bought anything else sense! It is pretty spendy to start, and being a college student, I admit I don't have lots of extra money. But Bare Essentials is definitely a MUST for me. I wont wear anything else sense I've started with it. It goes on super smooth and covers any blemishes or marks like magic! It looks like your face was airbrushed! And blending is super easy. The more you blend your makeup, the better it looks. And it lasts all day for me. Though I usually touch it up if I go out at night. All in all, it is the best foundation/make up line for my face, and I am very picky and sensitive when it comes to my make up! Also great for people who are prone to breaking out!
I love this foundation. It gives me great coverage and matches my skin tone perfectly. You can't use too much thought beause your skin will look cakey, but other than that, love it.

I have been using bareMinerals Foundation for nearly a decade now and I still absolutely love it to this day. However it never used to be very travel friendly... BUT now it is! I LOVE LOVE LOVE the newly redesigned containers! They keep the loose powder where it's supposed to stay... No More MESS! LOVE IT!

I love this product! I have been using bareMinerals for about four years now and love it more every day, I will never go back to liquid foundation. It's great to be able to get perfect coverage and control the amount of foundation you apply. Thanks for this great product. Love the new container which you can close, makes traveling with the product less messy.
love that that I can actually find an exact shade for my hard to find skin shade. it goes on easily and doesn't look cakey like some of the other wannabes.
I love, love, love Bare Minerals.
I LUV THE BE FOUNDATION. I HAVE TRIED OTHER POWDERS AND LIQUIDS AND KEEP COMING BACK TO THIS. TRY IT..............YOU'LL LIKE IT. YOU'LL GET USED TO THE TAP TAP TAP.
I LOVE IT I T VERY SMOOTH AND NATRUL
This is my summer color. I wear medium and medium biege for the rest of the year...I like this color better then adding faux tan or any kind of bronzer.
I wear it every day and goes great with my skin!

I started using bareminerals back in 2007 and have never looked back! my skin, which was prone to breakouts, is now healthier than ever, I dont break out constantly and the makeup is so light it feels like i'm not wearing any. the color is so blendable it's amazing now when I try other makeup brands I feel like it looks caked on, will never go back to that!

I absolutely love Bare Minerals Foundation. It is so easy to apply and stays on all day. It is so natural looking. I tan easily during the summer months and like the medium tan color. Get this product....you won't be disappointed! I have turned so many of my friends on to BM that I should be a paid spokesperson!
This is far and away the best foundation I have ever used.

I love this foundation! It makes me feel confident and beautiful, yet at the same satisfies my fiance who likes a more natural look. I know I can put on the amount of coverage I need without my make up looking caked or thick.
Absolutely flawless make up! I love it!
I love this stuff! Can't recommend it highly enough. Great coverage and consistency.

I have tried all sorts of mineral powder makeups and I keep going back to bare Minerals. They match my skin tone best, they dont wear off throughout the day (and need to be reapplied every 3 hours) and they dont make my skin look dull. The coverage is good and its a nice natural finish!! I have a ton of allergies to various ingredients in makeup so its really difficult to find things I can wear that dont cause breakouts or reactions. Some of the other powders I have tried I still have problems with...So far bare Minerals is one that I havent! I would definitely recommend them. Its a little more expensive than some other brands, but works the best!
i just love it, it is amazing never used anything like it.

Bare Escentuals original foundation is always a winner. I live in the desert where summers are very hot. This foundation reduces breakouts & doesn't run like many others when it's over 115 degrees. It also goes through airport security without having to be in the quart size bag.
I ABSOULTE LOVE BARE MINERALS. ITS AMAZING AND IT DOESN`T EVEN LOOK LIKE YOUR WEARING MAKE UP. i WOULD RECOMMED B.M. TO ALL MY FRIENDS AND FAMILY!
I absolutly love this product...I have used it for 2 years now and have only had to buy 3 of these...they last forever and have amazing coverage. Its easy to apply and looks natural not cakkey.

reviews.review_title: Gave me a gray-ish dull cast.
reviews.review_text: The lightest shade gave me a gray-ish cast that wasn't flattering. I also think these foundations made my fine lines around eyes and forehead more prounounced, which isn't what I was trying to achieve! I was disappointed, because so many people claim to love bM and thought it would be the answer for me, too. I can say that one positive factor is that it stayed put on hot, humid days in MI, unlike liquid foundation, so I do like that about it. It also didn't seem to blend into my skin very well, but rather sat on top of it even with using the BE Prime Time primer. When I had a Sephora makeup artist use a darker shade on me to see if that would solve the gray tinge I had, even she didn't like how it looked on me. So, sorry to say, I was disappointed, but probably worth trying for most people.
I absolutely love this foundation! It covers all the red and dark blotches and spots! It makes my skin look flawless. It's incredible!

This foundation is incredibly creamy (weird for a powder, I know) and light. I have acne scarring and this product never ceases to amaze me with it's coverage, while still feeling as if I am wearing no makeup. People always tell me I have beautiful skin when I wear this makeup, and I feel as though it nourishes my pores and makes me feel better about my skin. I have used this makeup for 4 years and it is by far the best of the 20 or so I have tried. I definitely recommend it to anyone!

LThe item I was looking for was out of stock , it usually is. When I finally got some help I wasn't real happy with the suggestion so made the purchase I thought was right and it turned out to be a good choic.

i like medium to full coverage, but i can't really seem to get that with this foundation. however, when i do use it, it looks very natural, and it leaves my skin very soft and hydrated. i have acne scarring that still shows through and same with some redness.
This makeup gives me a flawless look. No caking or flacking, just gorgeous.
bought this for my 15 year old daughter and it looks great on her. very natural.
this is the best foundation ever. love it and always havae to have it in my bag.
I was very happy I was going to buy another color. One of your employees help me and I got the wright color.  Thank you, Very Much
I was very happy I was going to buy another color. One of your employees help me and I got the wright color.  Thank you, Very Much

I've been using Bare Minerals for over 3 years and our relationship is still going strong! I never thought it would cover as well as a liquid, but it does and feels like absolutely nothing on my face! The minerals are so healthy that, even after I wash my face, my skin is better than before I started using Bare Minerals
Just as advertised. Flawless finish.

I like to use foundation as concealer instead of putting it over my entire face, and this isn't the best makeup to do that with. Also,it looks fairly natural at first, but if you try and build the coverage at all, it starts looking kind of chalky. I have dry patches, and I felt like this made them more visible. I think it would do a good job for someone who already has pretty good skin and is just looking for something to look a little more polished.

I use the entire line of bareMinerals products, but it's their full coverage foundation that makes it all look so great. I'm blessed with pretty clear skin, but I do have some redness in my nose and chin area. This foundations gives me really smooth coverage and you can barely tell I'm wearing make up. I can't tell you how many times someone has said to me, Hattie your skin is glowing! Everyone asks me what I use and I always tell them it's bareMinerals. Just a great simple to use product that doesn't take alot of time or ability to apply. I love it.

I've been trying to find the perfect foundation for 30 years!! This is the ONLY foundation that I will EVER use. It gives great coverage and feels like you're wearing nothing. I've always hated the feel of liquid foundation and am so excited to have found THE ONE.

reviews.review_title: Where have you been all my life?!
reviews.review_text: Seriously... I absolutely LOVE this product, more than any other foundation I have ever used. I don't know why it took me this long to try bareMinerals. It's light, it gives you a wonderful glow, and most importantly (and what I was most skeptical about), it provides amazing coverage. Buy this product...you will not be disappointed.

I have been using BareMinerals for almost 10 years, and I love the lightweight feel of this mineral foundation. I was reluctant at first to switch from liquid foundation to this mineral foundation because I didn't think the coverage would be as good...IT'S BETTER THAN I EVER EXPECTED!! It goes on effortlessly, and makes my face look like I was born with non-problem skin...love it!
This foundation exceeds the TV commercials and truly is the top choice in foundation makeup. I can't go back to anything you might find in the drugstores.
Perfect as always! Easy to use, Quick and Effective. Recommended for Teens and trouble skin

I bought this as a gift for a friend who tried mine and loved it. She bought a cheaper brand and said the quality wasn't as good. Sometimes a few $$ will buy you a lot more in terms of quality. Natural, flawless finish and won't clog your pores. love this stuff!
Love the ease of use and coverage. I'm 62!

As a user of prescription Retin A, bareMinerals Foundation turns out to be the only makeup that both covers without drying, and helps the daily healing. I had tried others, and this is still the best mineral makeup, and as someone who is mature, does not emphasize wrinkles!
i like how the foundation goes nicely on your skin without cracking

Bare Minerals saved my skin... I have suffered from breakouts since I was a teenager.... but ever since I started using mineral makeup, my breakouts have been cut down by at least 75%. This is my favorite foundation.... I will never change!
Application is a breeze, even over spots, Love Bare MInerals! But sometimes, it seems to make my oily T-zone even more oily.
Bare Escentuals is the best foundation ever! It provides full coverage and your skin can breathe. I wouldn't use anything else!

Just bought yet another refill and I love the new packaging. Has a little dial that turns now to turn off the flow of the powder so it minimizes waste and mess! This is the most fabulous foundation ever. Will NEVER use anything else!

I just found that this product was a little too messy for my taste. I liked it fine, but it just got all over the place and it was very hard to apply an even coverage. I don't think I'll be buying this again.
I don't think so. Nothing else has touched my face in years....oh, except for my husband's lips :o)
love it. I feels that i have no make up over my face. But there is a lots of difference from using it and having nothing at all.
I have been using bare minerals for 2 yrs and I love it, it looks natural fresh and feels like you are not wearing any make up. I love it, so easy to use.

It took 5 tries to find the correct shade. I have always fallen into the light catagory with other foundations, but with Bare Escentuals apparently I'm a medium beige. I LOVE this stuff! The coverage and ease of application is spectacular and it feels like I'm not wearing any makeup. My natural flush shows thru but all the yucky stuff is covered... How is that possible? IDK...I have never ever used a foundation that didn't discolor or slide or disapear by the end of the day until now. I'm hooked.

I gave BM several months to see its full effect. At first I admit I liked the light-weight, sans makeup feeling. However over time I developed increasing breakouts (regardless of cleaning the brush), dry, tight skin, and noticed the powder highlighted every tiny bump and skin flake. Als, I found it very irritating (found out later that BM is not 100% minerals or natural and uses quite a bit of 'filler').
Employes the BEST. WELL TRAINED

This is the only foundation i wear! It looks so natural when i put it on and its so light, its like im wearing nothing. i also have extremely sensitive skin and this doesn't bother me at all. The coverage is also amazing, and you can build it as much as possible. But remember to swirl, tap and buff:] I highly recommend this to anybody who's in search for the perfect foundation

I've used BE on and off for several years now. Although I have been pleased with the look it gives, I'm not pleased that I need to se a sunless tanner to use the palest shade. All in all, if you don't look like a Twilight vampire you should be AOK with this product.. But I really don't sugest this to the fairest of ladies.

Nothing has been better for my skin! I have good skin to begin with, but aging makes for uneven skin tones and lines start lining up. This powder not only blends the tones to look glowing and healthy, my skin has improved overall in minimizing lines and age. I'm 62+ and looking fine.

I love this foundation. I have 4 different shades, and I don't really know why because 2 of the shades will never match me. If you have dry-normal skin, I recommend this. But the problem I have is that it slips off of my face by the end of the day. I don't let it bother me because I really shouldn't. I am in highschool and only care if my makeup lasts for the 7 hours I am in school, which it does which a few extra hours. I have dry skin, but if you have oily skin it definitely will slip off of your face. oh, and I don't use a primer.
Awesome! Highly recommend!!!
I have used Bare Minerals for 5 years and I will never use liquid foundation again. There has been a huge change in the appearance of my skin and everyone noticed!! Feels like you have no makeup on.

reviews.review_title: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I've been using this for about four years and it is still amazing. I would recoment it to anyone! :)

I love Bare Escentuals!!! I used it in 2004 but i was complicated to match my skin so i had to mix two different colors and ordering by phone was tidious!!! Now that Sephora carries the complete line... I had a rep test shades on me (Med Tan) in one jar!!! Love it!!!

I don't know if the new packaged original line is using similar formulation as the matte line, but I've noticed a difference in the the new packaged original and the old school original line. I HATE, HATE, HATE, the matte formulation. Does not cover well and gives me that oily, truly no coverage look. This new packaged original line is giving me the exact same result and I think even worsening my acne. The original line covered perfectly, used it as both concealor and powder and would last me through the whole day. Thinking it was the same, I've been using the new packaged original line for three months now (hoping I was wrong, I tried finishing the container) and my face has broken out worst than it's ever been and looks oily and dirty without any hint of coverage. I LOVED bare mineral foundation and was a devoted client for years, but I now I have the misfortune to start a new search for a new brand.
will not buy any other type of foundation!!
This product is great - goes on easily & nice coverage. Will continue to use.
i have very sensitive and dry skin and this is the only thing i use! the colors guide helped me and i found my perfect match.

reviews.review_title: Not perfect but pretty darn good
reviews.review_text: I recently changed back to bareMinerals foundation after using a liquid foundation. The new matte finish works great, covering as good (or better) than the liquid. While some blemishes aren't covered 100%, this new formula is pretty darn good and doesn't aggravate my acne.

I love this makeup! I am one to not spend alot of money on makeup and I still don't if you know that this will last you alot long than liquid makeup. My sister n law interduced me to Bare Escentuals about three years ago and I have been hooked since.

I love this foundation. I was skeptical at first but my sisters talked me into using this type of foundation( i was a die hard liquid foundation user).
