But I really do love it and the best part is there are so many similar shades. So in the winter when im more pale i use the light and in the summer when im tan and I tan i use the golden medium. Its the best stuff!

This make-up is amazing. I'm not a huge fan of make-up, and have never really worn foundation, but Bare Minerals has the look of foundation, but is so light and natural. It's like you've been air brushed in real life. I'll never use anything else again.
I have been using this product for several years now. People always comment on how beautiful my skin is. It's nice to know that I don't look made up and my skin shows through.

i absolutely loved how soft my skin felt after using BE foundation, and i could use a little for 'good skin' days or a little more for the days i need more coverage, it also covered any oilyness and had very even and easy to layer coverage
Such great coverage this offers, while not being to dark or to light, really a great product usually lasts 3-4 months with daily application.
I LOVE the product! I LOATHE the packaging. The plastic filter is meant to control powder flow, however, it makes application difficult. And you can't completely pop the filter off.

I love this foundation! its the best- in fact I used to switch products frequently- but not after trying this foundation powder about 3 years ago- now I wouldn't wear anything else- goes on smoothly- and feels good on my skin- and only a little is needed!
Both my 17 year old daughter and myself use it and love it. I wish they had had this when I was 17.

After growing up on high-end liquid foundations, I tried Bare Minerals a few years ago and have never looked back. The coverage is flawless, my skin looks luminescent and healthy, and the product actually helps to keep my skin clear! My friends and boyfriend love the natural finish it provides as well; I get so many compliments on my look!
Finally --- the color that is right for me - I needed a medium with pink undertones - fair was too light - light was too yellow - fairly medium was just right -

I have been using Bare Minerals for about 3 years now and just love it. I never have that neck line where your makeup ends! It's wonderful, easy to use, easy to blend and lasts all day. What can I say, I'm a real Bare Minerals FAN!

I have some acne scars and redness and as someone with sensitive, acne-prone skin, I've been constantly on the lookout for a lightweight foundation that offers great coverage. My searching stopped when I found this product. I love that this foundation offers buildable coverage; I typically I apply three light layers to my face (I apply with Full Coverage Kabuki Brush), but I add more layers if I ever feel that I need more coverage. Fortunately, that doesn't mean my look has to be cakey. This is the most natural foundation I've ever come across (and trust me, I've gone through a LOT of foundations...designers brands to drugstore brands, I've pretty much tried them all). Not only do I love this product's coverage, but I also love that it is healthy for my skin (I can actually sleep in it); it doesn't irritate my skin, cause dryness or breakouts. I also love that this product offers SPF.  When I first started using Bare Minerals Foundation, I used Medium Beige..and I continued to happily use it for about a year or so, but I found that it was actually making my face look lighter than it really was. After consulting with a Bare Minerals employee, she recommended that I change to Light. She told me that the problem wasn't that Medium Beige was too light for my skin; it was that there were too many pink tones in Medium Beige...thus, it worked against my skin to make it look lighter. Light compliments my olive undertones (I'm Filipino with medium skin tone).  The only con: the new dispenser. I hope they go back to the original dispenser.

reviews.review_title: I Took a Star off Because They
reviews.review_text: Okay, I love this foundation... so why the 4 stars and not 5? Because they made it better. Not following me? Let me elaborate. I've been using Bare Escentuals for almost 6 years now and I liked everything about it, and I still do... except the new packaging. I hate it for a multitude of reasons but I'll just give you the main ones: 1) They put on a new dispenser that's supposed to be easier to use, but the holes are only on one side and it limits how much product you can dispense at a time. 2) The original dispenser (shown above) could be easily pried off so you could get another 4-5 days out of it before you needed to buy more. The new one is a fixed part of the container, and to get to that last bit, you have to get creative. (It took me a screwdriver and hammer to break the top to get it out.) 3) There is actually instructions that come with it that tell you step by step how to use the locking dispenser. Not only is it inane and wasteful, but isn't that why there's a lid in the first place? So if you've never bought it before, I still recommend it, but it had been better if they hadn't tried to reinvent the wheel, so to speak.

This foundation would be better if it had fuller coverage, but it's still very good and buildable. I still love it because it doesn't bother my sensitive skin AT ALL. You can use a wet brush with this, making a pretty good concealer too, so it's terribly conenient. And the finish is pretty natural looking, so this is a very good foundation.
First, I love that I can sleep in with this on and not breakout. Second, the color I chose is Golden medium so gives me a tanned look without looking so dark.
I love BE. I've been reading up on how a lot of products of toxic ingredients, but BE is all natural! Great product! Def recommend it to everyone!
I get the best cover from this product.
I love this product!
I love the Bare Escentuals line of products and have used them years now. I also like the help I get & variety of products when in Sephora's.
This is the best foundation I have ever used. I love the total coverage (SPF). No powder look... just soft and natural.
the finish is gourgeous and smooth, but only two stars as i found it impossible to find my shade,they were either too dark,orange or light,so i took it back.

The only foundation I can wear with my super sensitive skin that I know isn't making it worse. Great buildable coverage. The color matches my yellowly/olive tone skin perfectly (Medium Gold). Yes, the loose powder is a pain in the button and no, its not ideal for touch ups during the day but its worth having clear skin and knowing you're not making it worse.  Tip - it applies BEST with moistured skin. I use my regular hydrating hypoallergetic lotion and then a little primer too. Its helps with blending.  BONUS #1 its the only foundations I've fallen asleep wearing and know I can wake up and my face won't look like an atomic bomb hit it.  BONUS #2 I even brush on this foundation before I hit the gym or the beach to even out my complexion and its so light and blends perfectly that you can't tell I'm actually wearing make up...which I know my friends would give me grief over!

reviews.review_title: product great, still; container still not right
reviews.review_text: I've used this foundation for years, and continue to love how it goes on and how it looks.  They've changed the packaging recently to include a smaller area for the makeup to come through holes from the bottom section and allow for closing that section for less mess in the top section and lid. That's not bad. But previously the insert between the top and bottom could be removed when the makeup was running out, and you could get every last bit - several days' worth of use. Now, that insert cannot be removed, and I can't get to the last few days' worth in the bottom. So to me, the package design is different, but not better.  That's the difference between four and five stars for me.
My daughter and I love this foundation!! We use nothing else. We've tried different bareminerals items, but always come back to Sephora.

reviews.review_title: Ok, but not worth the price
reviews.review_text: I like the weightless feel and it goes on looking OK. By the end of the day it looks a little too orange, but maybe I just need a different color.
This is my secret weapon, I am constantly getting compliments on my skin and am always asked how do I take care of my skin. I just say it's genetics! Ha ha
I have tried many foundations and this by far is the best! It looks like I'm not wearing makeup at all, it's awesome.

I have been wearing make up for many years now. I've experimented with different foundations. This one is, by far, the best I've ever used! It's so light, natural looking, and super easy to use!! I love Bare Escentuals!!!
Love it!! It Helps your skin look nice and natural.
The best stuff, bottom line. Took me 25 years to discover and I'm never going to foundation hop again. This is the best of the best. Especially for oily skin that foundation never used to last on.
Great coverage and perfect for on the go quick overall fix.

reviews.review_title: Bare Escentuals and Sephora Customer Service
reviews.review_text: Recently, I stopped the Bellevue, WA store and was assisted by Vikki, and was knocked off my feet by the outstanding customer service!  My skin type is very sensitive and I'm intolerant to Gluten, Sugar, Dairy and Caffeine. And, as I've aged, the once clear rosy skin has turned into Rosacea with acne.  Although controllable with a very strict diet, it's not always possible to keep these foods completely out of my diet.  I had been using a cheap, knock-off version of the Bare Escentuals product I had purchased at a local retailer. But, I discovered my skin was being irritated by it. When it would get wet, my face would start stinging. And, my face was always red and irritated.  So, I asked her to help me find the perfect foundation. And, she chose Bare Escentuals.  She helped me sift through the ingredient list to make sure that the Bare Escentuals foundation had no ingredients in it that would cause me an allergic reaction.  She also, introduced me to skin care products that would work well with my skin type and meticulously sifted through ALL ingredients lists to make sure there were no allergens in them.  She probably spent an hour and a half with me helping me. To find customer service like that is almost unheard of.  I'm really happy she introducted me to Bare Escentuals because it helped me change myself from a gruesome embarrassment to being much more comfortable with my the way I look.  Thank you, Vikki! And, thank you Sephora for carrying excellent products like Bare Escentuals.
This is the only foundation I use! I will never use liquid foundation again.

I've been using this for a few years now and I've been very happy with it. Recently, a friend had bought a different brand of mineral foundation and it was the wrong color for her, but right for me, so she gave it to me. I've been very disappointed in this other brand, which just reinforces my positive opinion on the Bare Minerals. I can control the application of this product easily, the coverage is effective without looking clumpy or cakey, and it makes my skin look flawless.
it makes my face look very even toned and smooth but it is not easy to apply. most of the times i couldnt wear it without a primer
This make-up is wonderful. It's a great eye shadow primer!!
I've been using mineral foundation for the past 3 years and have found bareminerals to be the best. The new packaging makes it much easier for travel.

I tried BE seven years ago, but didn't start using the powder foundation until three years ago. I LOVE IT! It's just the right amount of coverage I want/need. I use the flawless face brush for light to medium coverage in the fall, spring and summer, and the handy buki brush in the winter. I will never go back to liquid.
i have tried several mineral powder foundations but always come back to bare minerals.

I cannot brag enough about this product or how great I look wearing it! I'm complimented on a regular basis because of my youthful, natural glow with people guessing me to be 5 to 10 years younger than I am. Several of my co-workers have become recent converts, too! I have three words for you....Buy It Now!
Great product and even better service at Sephora!

I love Bare Escentuals; the make-up is light, clean, and problem-skin-friendly. I have been using Bare Escentuals for about two years now, and this coupled with Philosophy's On A Clear Day face wash has finally cleared up my complexion.

good move with the turn and sift or close lid. This was way over due. The make up is good and I still think there might be another color between this one and the lighter one-but I use tan and put it on lightly-then again to get the coverage I need.

I always use liquid foundations but i decided to try something that would look more natural and would feel light. It actually felt really light on my skin and looked natural, hoped it would have had a little bit better coverage for my acne prone skin though
The salesperson took extra time to try a new shade of Bare Escentuals on for me AND, since it was my birthday month, I received a free gift for coming in! What could be better than that?

This color looked a lot different in the store than from one's that I have bought off the website but that could have been just the lighting in the store, but that could really throw you off. When I got it home, it was pretty much the same color but a tad different. Haven't bought in a few months, so they may have changed the color formulations since then. Other than that, this foundation works amazingly. Great coverage and feels very light on skin.
Love it! I have been wearing it for years. My sister recommended it and after asking more friends, found it is very populaar.
Love this stuff..A little on the pricey side for something I use so often. I want to try the Sephora brand mineral powder next tme.
I love this product,great coverage, very natural look.

I love the way bareMinerals feels. Not only do you feel like you're not loading on chemicals, but it leaves your skin smooth and silky. I have seriously sensitive skin and I've never once had a problem using this product, even when I (gasp) forget to wash it off at night.

I was hesitant to buy it because I was such a loyal MAC fan, but once I tried it, I have not gone back to liquid foundation. It feels really light on the skin and it's so quick. I have combination skin skin with occasional breakouts. I found that I broke out less using this foundation.

reviews.review_title: Great if you already have good skin
reviews.review_text: I have mxed reviews about this. Here are Pro/Cons based on my experience:  Pros -Great for summer (light, non-cakey) -Natural as makeup gets, don't feel like I'm harming my skin -Natural look, soft finish -Everyday, easy, lasts forever  Cons -Doesn't provide medium-full coverage. Light to medium at most without adding too much product to face. -Not recommended for blemished skin, it does nothing to conceal them -Can be drying for combo/dry skins  I currently am using it - but with concealer underneath to get more coverage and because liquid foundation is too heavy in the summer. However, when I need more coverage or if my face is breaking out, this makeup covers practically nothing.  I think this is a great natural foundation for someone with generally good (clear) skin who needs to cover minimally. I don't suggest this for people with lots of redness, bumps, or non-smooth faces. Also, not suggested for big events, since the coverage is minimal.
Actaully, there are many things I like about this powder foundation but I just wish it had a bit more coverage.

I love Bare Minerals - I've been using their products for the past 8 years! I will admit that i've tried many other like products but nothing compares to bare minerals! They are the best! Don't waste your time or money on anything else!!!

I love this brand for its coverage ability, staying power & feels like nothing on as you wear it. This particular color is my summer color so I can only use it as long as im very tan. My only critique would be that it seems like a huge color difference from the color shade right before this one which is Medium Beige. I think they could have made a color in between>

I always end up going back to Bare Minerals. I started using an oil-free liquid foundation because I felt that the powder wasn't covering up enough, but this was a big mistake. I started breaking out so much worse. Once I went back to Bare Minerals, my skin calmed down significantly. I also love that I can be lazy at night and sleep in it!
Smooth and even finish every time.

reviews.review_title: adaptable to any age and weather
reviews.review_text: I love bare minerals coverage especially in the summer days when it stay put inspite of the heat and humidity, and I feel proteced by the product's SPF.

I'm 56 years old, have tried MANY foundations, and have never tried one as good as this. Can have heavy coverage or light...lasts literally all day and all night. Unbelievable, really. Looks super natural and can never overdo it. I have very dry skin. This product is great!!!!!
This make up is wonderful for girls who want a light feeling makeup that want a polished look!

Love the product and have used it for years. The store clerk encouraged me to go lighter with my color, but I am not thrilled with the new color.....if you go too light, it makes you look pasty. Also if you have any pimples it makes them stand out even more.
lasts all day, doesn't transfer and is a great match. it is not as full coverage as my liquid foundations, but it is great for those light makeup dayst.
the greatest thing is the new locking cap!
I LOVE this product!!!

I have been using bareMinerals foundation for about 3 years and have absolutely LOVED it. However in this last purchase i received the new packaging and the product seems different. I haven't changed my face wash or moisturizing products and even have the same brush. I was using my bareMinerals foundation up to the day i opened the new package and there is a noticeable difference.. Am i just crazy? Haha
The color is really nice for summer, when you're skin becomes a little darker than usual. Really helps even out complexion.
The color is really nice for summer, when you're skin becomes a little darker than usual. Really helps even out complexion.
I've been using BE for ten years. Before that I tried evey foundation out there. I can't ever see myself using anything but BE.
I love this product!
I really like this lightweight foundation b/c it makes you look natural and it evens your skin-tone. It doesn't cake on like liquid foundations.

This foundation is amazing. I have been using it for a little over a year now and cant see myself ever going back to liquid foundation after using this. It is 100% natural which I like because its not good to be putting a bunch of artificial garbage on your face, but at the same time the coverage doesn't skimp. Its buildable too, so you could wear it light or build it for more coverage and it doesn't look cakey like liquid foundation can. WIll be a customer of this product for life!

After using this makeup for only a week, I could see my skin calming down. Redness went away and breakouts were diminished. It also works wonders on hiding my acne scars. I would not go a day without this makeup!

The medium tan bare minerals foundation is great in the summer when I've got a little more color to my face. I normally use medium beige when I don't have a tan. I also love the new twist to the container so the holes can be sealed off when I have it on the go!

This foundation is awesome, so easy to use and very light weight. I have freckles on my face and I love them! So i would hate to cover them up, and bare minerals lets me have an even looking complexion but allows my freckles show through, loves it!

This is the most amazing make up ever. It covers so completely, and it makes it look like your skin is naturally perfect. Not to mention, you will never feel it on you, you wont even realize you are wearing make up!

Bare Minerals is by far the best foundation on the market today. It provides a natural but flawless coverage that I haven't seen in any other foundation. I am a former Clinique user, and I can honestly say that switching over to Bare Minerals was the best make up decision I've ever made!
I love bare minerals products. I like having total coverage without feeling my face all caked up. Thanks Leslie.

I have been looking at this foundation for a long time, and I finally decided to buy it(along with the handy buki brush) I got shade matched at my local BE store and was glad I did that because it was different from the shade I figured I was. This foundation is so soft, natural, and LIGHT on your skin, it just feels so UN-cakey...

I love this foundation! I have acne prone and aging skin at the age of 31, already. Yuck! This foundation does not break me out and I have even seen improvement in my complexion since using it. It also lasts easily through a 12hr nursing shift without creasing and getting cakey at all. Just the opposite. When paired with the mineral veil, my skin seems to glow! Love it.
Love/hate new pkg, can't pry off top to use last bits

Great coverage, perfect for my skin. It feels very light and the shades match skin perfectly. So easy to apply!! The only problem I have is the price. I think $25 is a bit much but it still lasts a long time.

bare escentuals is superior to every makeup i've used since i started wearing make up 24 years ago. it doesn't clog my pores, it makes me look fresh and natural. the jar i bought this time has a sliding section to secure the loose powder when not in use. they should have had this from the beginning , glad they have it now!

I looove bare minerals. my skin is very acne prone, and i hardly ever break out now. i have actually fallen asleep with it on a couple of times and did not break out! i don't think i will ever go back after buying bare minerals foundation. with the right brushes, you can make it look very natural too. LOVE THIS STUFF!

bareMinerals is my foundation for life. It is one of the few foundations that is light enough for my very fair skin, and I love that it is actually good for your skin. It is the best I've ever used, and I honestly feel no desire to ever try another again. The last time I did, when I tried the temptu airbrushing system, it felt heavy and obvious on my skin. My facialist has even recommended it!

I used to use BE when it first came out then stopped... I don't know why, I think I'm just one of those people who likes to use the latest greatest thing... But now that I'm older and wiser I'm sticking to my BE mineral makeup... even on my older skin it does wonders to smooth things out in appearance & texture
This works amazing. Perfect for the days when you want great looking skin without fussing with liquid foundation. It looks natural when buffed into the skin.

I LOVE Bareminerals. I have really sensitive skin and every other foundation ive tried has broken my face out but not Bareminerals. I also have very uneven skin tone (acne scars, blotchy skin) and this covers everything. I get compliments all the time from strangers on my beautiful skin, and its all thanks to this foundation :)
A GREAT PRODUCT.I USE IT EVERY DAY,AND DON'T KNOW WHAT I WOULD DO WITH OUT IT.
Normally I wear medium but medium tan works so well for me in the summer. It gives great coverage like the other shades and still feels so light.
I really love this powder foundation! It doesn't give me a cakey feel and it feels like I am not wearing any makeup at all!
It perfectly match my skin color. It covers all the imperfections and looks very natural.

I have this product in the color Medium Tan and it truely is a great foundation! It adds the perfect hints of the color of your skintone and makes it appear very natural and it never looks like im wearing makeup. The coverage is amazing because its buildable. Its very quick and easy to use if your a person who never has time, this product is great for you. I love how fine and pigmented this product is. Love this foundation and plus its got SPF 15!!

When I was about 14, I received BareMinerals as a gift because I finally got to wear makeup. This is the only brand of foundation that I have ever tried, and I think it's nice, but not fantastic. I do like that it does not have harsh ingredients in it, and that's why I'll keep using it. However, it can sometimes highlight my pores, even though I have young skin, and it sometimes makes my forehead look a little cakey. But I absolutely love the bronzer because I like looking tan. Overall I would recommend it, but it's definitely a hit or miss depending on the person using it.

I've been using bareMinerals foundation for about 6 years now. I love it, and it provides the light coverage that I prefer. They redesigned the packaging so it twists closed and the powder doesn't pool in the top (causing it to potentially spill out upon opening - especially after travel).
This is a repeated purchase that I make whenever I run out. Love Bare Escentuals and would never consider using anything else.

I love the Bare escentuals line of products. I use the mineral foundation and mineral veil. There is a little feature in this product that I especially love that is not actually pictured in the product's photo. It is a little twist covering inside the black cap. You can twist it to prevent any more powder from coming out. This is so great especially when you travel - mine tends to all come out of the little holes. Then you have too much product to deal with - but not with this feature! Unfortunately, for some reason, the mineral veil does not have this twist cover feature - I wish it did!
This is by-far my favorite Foundation! So light that I swear, you can't even see it when it is on- makes my skin look so radiant and great!

Bare Escentuals is SOOOO worth it. I have been using it for over 6 yrs and I think that I actually saved money over time, by not having to buy lots of makeup from the drug store!! Bare Minerals covers great and feels great on and I have got 3 other friends and family to use it now and we all have different skin types and ages. Try it you will love it.
I 've been using this for many years, it feels and look natural. woderfull color, long lasting.
I really like the new shade fairly medium. I was mixing fair and fairly light to get the right shade and now I don‚Äôt have to! I especially like the natural ingredients. It never makes me break out!
Love BareMinerals its the only make-up I use. Even at 64 people tell me I have beautiful skin

I love my bareMinerals Foundation. It gives me just the right coverage with the added bonus of sun protection. I have fair skin and freckles. The bareMinerals Foundation helps to even out my skin tone without forming a cakey mess. The end result is a light, healthy and glowing complextion. I have both the matte and the orginal finish of the fairly light shade. The matte looked darker on my skin than the orginal finish, making it a good option for the summer when my natural complexion gets slightly darker. Think about trying the bareMinearls Mineral Veil. A brushing of this light powder will set your make up. It gives a perfect finish to my 5 minute face.

Bare Minerals has the perfect shades for woman of color. Whether it is summer or winter. I have yellow under tones, and in the summer i darken to a bronze color. Bare Minerals Golden Dark is the best color for my multicolored completion.

I love this stuff. It goes on so smooth. I can wear it all day without it rubbing off, or causing a breakout. I would recommend wearing with a lotion with a higher spf of course but, all in all a VERY good product for the price. This size lasts a long time compared to pressed/ or liquid foundation. VERY light weight! I would recommend this to all my friends/family.

I noticed the quality of Bare Mineral foundations has changed. Its not what it was before and I've been a long time user. The mineral has a thicker consistency and it wears off quickly even with a face primer. Even touching it up doesn't help. It looks like nothing happened. I used to love this foundation. I still use their eyeshadows though.

I've tried a number of foundations over the years - drugstore and even makeup forever however, this is by far my fav! I use the concealer (summer bisque) to cover up any dark areas then fairly light foundation (i've tried the other colors and just b/cuz u get a tan doesn't mean you should go up to the next color, it was way off). You can build the coverage based on your needs. My skin stays soft all day and I have a gorgeous glow. I love looking like I don't have a ton of makeup on, it's just right.
Flawless coverage is excellent.
Love the bare minerals. Great both as a sheer cover or as full coverage. I bought this color for summer and it gives a nice glow to fair skin.

reviews.review_title: I love the BareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation - it is so light and covers all my imperfections. What a blessing!

This product makes my skin look virtually flawless. It covers everything. I put a light dusting on, then take the small brush to go over the imperfections - red spots, broken capillaries, etc. The overall finished look is amazing!

Great foundation with SPF, gives you a polished look with no discernible makeup on your face. I am susceptible to acne, but this product has never made me break out, even in summer. And no matter how hot it is, I never get the feeling that it's melting or caking. I apply it in the morning and forget about it til I wash it off at night.  The powder lasts forever and is cheaper than drug store foundation in the long run. I will never use liquid foundation again.

reviews.review_title: I would never put any other makeup on my face!
reviews.review_text: Its the best, hands down. I'd rather go completely without makeup than ever put that disgusting liquid on my face. I have no idea how I survived without it.
I love Bare Minerals! I have no idea why I was not using it earlier.

I have tried so many products over the years and always hoped they would help my acne. After switching from liquid foundation to bareMinerals my acne is gone! I love it and couldn't be happier. It does take a little while to get used to applying it so give it time and a little hint if you overdo it and it looks cakey just blot some moisturizers on to smooth it out.

This is a great product...nice coverage, feels light, lasts all day. You can even sleep in it, because it's completely natural. After years of wearing a liquid foundation, I switched after trying this and would NEVER go back.
this is the best foundation. excellent for the skin.

reviews.review_title: Love the foundation but not the New Container
reviews.review_text: I love the product but the new container took me by surprise. 1. It can't be opened so that you can put your foundation in a travel container. I recently bought the travel container an will not be able to use it now unless I break the new container.  2. The new container allows you to close off the powder when not in use, but still when I open it, theres still loose powder.

I'v purchased many liquid, powder, and creme-to-powder foundations. This is a treat. I'm using the original formulation, not the matte. It looks completely natural - not at all powdery or cake-y. Natural skin tone is enhanced. It's easy to apply and is more predictable than a liquid foundation. It does not require a foundation primer and does not drift or melt into creases as the day goes by. I'm going to try additional Bare Escentual product lines.
great,goes on easy last all day,and ids great for your skin

reviews.review_title: Love the stuff hate the new containers
reviews.review_text: I have used bareMinerals for years now, love the stuff, but they changed the dispensing cap it now needs to twist to open and close. That's not the half of it, you have to take off the protective seal first. (very hard to do, and as if the other seals were any easier) I still have not figured out how I will get the last remainder in the bottom when almost gone.

It's a really great product. I'm getting laser hair removal and I use it to cover the dark spots left after a treatment. IMy chin looks nearly flawless after a few brush strokes. My only complaint would be that it comes off on clothes a lot so I try really hard not to hug anyone.

I had been breaking out after using tinted moisturizers and pressed powder foundations. I started using bareMinerals and really notice a difference in my skin. Its so much clearer and feels good to know I am not putting makeup on that will clog my pores.

I've been using Bare Minerals foundation for 4 years and would not use anything else. Before finding Bare Minerals, I literally tried everything out there. It is so natural looking and using as a concealer as well works better than any concealer that you can buy. Love it and can't imagine any other product that will take me away from it.

It's a great product, but a bit too expensive. While a little does typically go a long way, it doesn't last as long for some of us as it does for others, depending on the need for coverage.  Personally, I wish Bare Escentuals made a cream concealer.  The variety of shades is excellent, the product has great coverage, and a kind of dewy finish.  The matte version has a better finish, but is way more expensive, due to both higher price and less volume per container.  If you've got the cash to spare, it's a great product.  But don't forget to apply moisturizer and/or primer first! It can make even the slightest dry skin look much drier without either of them.
always use -always will tried so many other things and they just don't measure up!
i SO love bareMinerals !!

reviews.review_title: Love the product, Don't like the new packaging.
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for several years now and wouldn't dream of using anything else. I've tried several different brands that attempt to copy this formula. They're just not good enough. My only complaint is the new container it comes in. It makes it hard to get the product out and the last of it won't come out unless your break the thing. Other than that, I love it.
Love it, love it! Have used for several years. No longer have any clogged pores , looks natural.
I have been wearing Bare Escentuals for years and always get compliments on my glowing skin. I love the new sifter that it just came out with..makes it not as messy! :)

I had my doubts about this product and honestly didn't even think it was all that different from my regular makeup when I looked at it myself. After using the free sample, I had so many people compliment me on how nice I looked and they didn't know I was trying new makeup. It got such a reaction I decided to continue using it and after seeing the difference in pictures, I do think it looks so much nicer than using liquid/compact. After you get used to it, it is really a quick makeup routine that can cover very well.
This is an incredible product. It gives great coverage. It's light as air. Has a natural look. Your skin can be seen minus any flaws or imperfections. Its makeup without being made up.

I think I can only use this foundation. After using bareMinerals I cannot go back to using a liquid foundation, I've tried and they feel awful and sticky as well as heavy, thick and cakey. I've been using bareMinerals for about 4 or 5 years now. It gives me all the coverage I need and it is easily buildable. Usuall my skin is a combination of oily and dry, it's in the middle and overall my skin is pretty good but there are those days where my skin can be a bit more dry depending on the weather or what face washes I've used and then I sometimes run into an issue with bareMinerals as it tends to accentuate my dry areas but that usually acn be solved with a bit of moisturizer, so not big deal. Like I said I've tried using other foundations, including highly rated/popular liquid foundations sold at Sephora but after using this product I can't use anything else on my face, there's simply nothing else that looks and feels as good and as natural as this stuff.

reviews.review_title: Just the Right Amount of Coverage
reviews.review_text: This foundation covers really well and makes my skin tone look even without feeling heavy. You may need some extra cover up for particularly nasty blemishes and acne, but this really does the trick for small blemishes and freckles.

I have been using BE for years now, and this is the only foundation that I use. For those of you who are still on the fence--TRY IT. If you don't like it, Sephora will take it back, no questions asked.
This foundation feels like you are not wearing any foundation.

reviews.review_title: Bare Escentuals bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation Me
reviews.review_text: the Bare Escentuals bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation Medium is AMAZING! it is affordable, it lasts up to lke 5 months. It gives you full coverage with out the gross heavy feeling of liquid foundations! it doesn't leave makeup lines, and it looks completely natural! I love it and i never wanna switch what I use!
Great foundation. I've used it for 8 years. Everything else breaks out my skin. Tried another brand, not a good idea. Like the new packaging.

I've never worn foundation before, but recently, I wanted to find something that would help even out my skin tone. The salesperson at Sephora helped me test out various powders, liquid foundations, and tinted moisturizers. I picked this one, and I've been pretty happy with it. My skin looks smoother and more even-toned, but natural-- it doesn't look like I'm wearing a lot of makeup.

I love this product so much. I have used it for the past 4 years and can't imagine using anything else. I always get compliments on my complexion, and it might just be good skin genes, but I think Bare Minerals has something to do with that as well. I also feel good knowing it's got spf in it, so hopefully that will save my skin when I grow older.
I had to exchange the foundation to a different shade and had no problem. Everyone was very nice about it. Thank you.

I have been using it for about 7 months, my skin is sensitive, greasy and I have blemishes. And this producy helps me with all these problems. The only thing I dont like about it is that is a bit messy and even when your wearing it it leaves marks everywhere you put your face. Besides that is all good!!!!!!!!!
bareMinerals is great for people with sensitivities to the chemicals that are found in most personal care items. The coverage is great but it is so light it feels like nothing is on your skin.
Excellent product! Love the new packaging with the closable shaker top,

reviews.review_title: Eh, not as great as everyone said.
reviews.review_text: I am not that impressed with the BE foundation. I got the fair, and the color match was very good. I wear it on days when I am just running a few errands and don't feel like putting on liquid foundation because I won't be out for a long time. I dislike how the product feels on my face after about 30 minutes, nor do I like how it looks. Looks awesome at first, but after thirty-ish minutes of wear, it is like there is nothing left on my face and I shouldn't have wasted my time in the first place! Disappointed, for sure, since everyone seems to adore this foundation so much.
as always, good coverage without heaviness.

I have light skin and use the fairly light. I've used it for a year now and still love it completely. Simply the best foundation for day wear. I've even used it in small theaters for stage make-up and it worked wonderfully.
I love this foundation. Even in this sweltering heat..it looks great.
This color matches my normally fair but currently tan skin tone perfectly!! I love how natural it looks and how even the coverage is. My new summer color from BE!!
I like bareMinerals foundation, but as I get older, it doesn't look as good as it used to. The powder settles in my wrinkles : (...
I simply love the coverage I get with this foundation.
My daughter Loves this stuff! She can wear it light or go for full coverage. The sunscreen is an added bonus!
love this product! smooth finish-holds up in humidity
beautiful finished look on my face...light reflective. shade match was perfect!
I love Bare Escentuals products. This foundation offers a clean, natural finish without causes clogged pores and breakouts. It is easy to apply and lasts all day.

Love it! I've seen it on TV since I was in high school and finally decided to give it a try. I haven't been happier with another foundation in my life! The color match is excellent. I have very acne prone red skin and it balanced out my color with no effort. Very smooth application and I love that you only have to use a little bit for great coverage.
Best foundation ever...best coverage EVER...need I say more.

reviews.review_title: This is all I'll ever use
reviews.review_text: I adore this foundation. This is the only foundation I ever use on my skin. It covers EVERYTHING! I have a huge problem with dark circles around my eyes and this takes care of everything!

The gals at Sephora (Summit; Birmingham,AL) are wonderful! Each time I've been in the store, there is always someone to assist me, help me with choices for my skin. I don't shop anywhere else for cosmetics, now! bareMinerals is great, I'm so glad they have turned me on to the product! I receive many compliments...
5 yrs faithful!!!!! and will never go back to gooey, sticky, liquid makeup. I'll go without before I go back!
I've been using this for years, and it works great. I mainly use it as a concealer since I don't like to do a full face of makeup. It blends easily and does not clog pores. The best makeup ever.
I love the new twist for dispensing powder. Perfect for us girls on the go!

reviews.review_title: Love it, Love it, Love it.!!!!!!!
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing Bare Minerals products since they were introduced to all of us lucky women. I am 68 years old and get complements all the time on how great my skin looks. It is always my pleasure to tell them it is Bare Minerals. My daughters use it too.
This is the best foundation ever! I have a very oily and sensitive skin and this product was the only one that really helped me!

i live in Washington state where the weather is as unpredictable as ever!!! with that said i can where this foundation rain, shine, snow, hail and whatever the wind brings in. i cant imagine using anything else. i took a trip to san deigo to visit some friends and i felt confident wearing it on the beach in the hot sun and at the dance clubs. the best part you don't look like a zombie in black light and a clown in natural lighting. all the woman in my life agree bare minerals foundation is for everybody!!!
i love it and its good coverage and i cant wait until i try out the matte the original covers all my blemishes and im surprised because other products didnt do that for me i love this one

I like this foundation. I have gotten compliments on it, but at the same time my skin looks a little oilier. So, I have been blotting it more often. Overall though I like how natural it looks on me. The color was a perfect match!
As always, this is the best stuff ever!
I love this product. It makes my skin look flawless. Its light and feels great on the skin. I am so happy I switched to this foundation.
I REALLY ENJOY THIS MAKEUP. ITS CLEAN FEELING IS GREAT AND IT DOES NOT CLUMP LIKE LIQUID MAKEUP.
I am always very happy with the makeup and the service that I receive at Sephora.

It made my skin burn (I have never had a reaction to a foundation). It looks unnatural on the skin - like a paste applied over the face, even when it is lightly dusted on. It accentuates wrinkles, I believe. I did not think I had many wrinkles, but this foundation showed me that I do. Plus, I have fair skin tone and the lightest shade made me look unnaturally tan. But it does make the skin tone even, if u have blemishes.

Have been wearing this bareminerals foundation for 15+ years and never want to change. Looks fantastic AND natural; touches up great; my skin almost never breaks out, face is sun-protected, and I can sleep in it if I want. Just superb. I had used a few high-end lines earlier, before discovering this (like Ch-n-l and Or-g-ns) and this wins hands down.
I like to play golf in this because it doesn't rub off onto my clothes when it is 95 degrees

bareMinderals is the only make up that I have found that works so well. I will continue to use it until I am able to find something that works even better and for a lower price, and to be honest, I really don't see that happening anytime soon.  The powder blends wonderfully with the skin and doesn't leave streaks or orange blotches like other products that I have used.  I would recommend bareMinerals to anyone.
I love this stuff. How did I ever live without it? It stays on (especially when used in conjunction with PRIME TIME), it absorbs oil, it's flawless and healthy! Great stuff.

I've had problems with breakouts and oily skin in the past. The bareMinerals foundation gives great coverage and never looks cakey. It has a wonderful matte finish which hides the shiney appearance my skin can have.

I get real angry when a product changes packaging to hide the fact that they are decreasing the amount of goods you're getting. The new container is nice but I'd rather have the original amount of minerals.
excellent product wears well. love the new opening. last a long time.

reviews.review_title: I will never use anything else ever!
reviews.review_text: I've been using bare minerals for a little over a year now, and I can safely tell you I will never go back to another foundation again! It's not like any powder you've ever used. When you apply it, it sort of melts into your skin and you really do feel like you've got nothing on. The only thing I would recommend everyone who uses this does is : 1. wash your brushes regularly and 2. wash the inside of the cap. The buildup over time can breed bacteria and cause breakouts if you don't clean them.
They are a great product,I have a problematic skin and since I have been using them I have less oily skin and better coverage.

reviews.review_title: The Only Foundation I'll Ever Use
reviews.review_text: I've been using BareMinerals foundation in Fair for several years now, and after comparing it to the drugstore liquid foundations I used to use, I'll never go back! It feels like there's nothing on your face, and it only takes 5 minutes to produce great coverage. I haven't tried the matte kind yet, but the regular foundation with a face primer does good enough to control my oily skin. I feel like even if someone didn't have oily skin though, at the end of the day it probably would look kinda melted if they didn't use a primer, so that's the only concern. Everything else about it is perfect!
I have been wearing bareMinerals for 6 years now and have not washed it off since. I dont break out and bearly ever get a pimple or blemish. Its light and awesome and i will never switch!!

I have used bareMinerals foundation for more than 10 years. I recommend it highly. I get commments on how wonderful my skin looks and I give full credit to bareMinerals! This produce is wonderful for oily or acne-prone skin.
This Golden Medium is my shade! I have olive skin but with more yellowy undertones. This color is perfect and blends as a perfect match for my neck and chest. YAY!

one swipe covers ALL of your imperfections. i'm really impressed by this! i've never tried anything that covered all my imperfections so perfectly! this thing is amazing! you HAVE to try this! but if you have oily skin (i have combination skin), try the new matte version. but i heard that the coverage of the matte version isn't so great.
I have been wearing this for several years. Would never go back to liquid makeup...I get tons of compliments on my complexion.
Great on my skin and looks so smooth and flawless!
BE is the nicest foundation in the history of makeup! Using this along with the Hydrating Mineral Veil, my skin looks like satin and feels great, even in high humidity.
Have been using this for years. This is the first product that matches my skin and blends well without changing colors during the day. Love the new closeable sifter.

reviews.review_title: Most natural-looking coverage I've found so far...
reviews.review_text: I love that this provides good coverage, but does not look or feel heavy on my face. I am slightly between colors, but that may mean I need some sun. :) This is my favorite foundation at the moment.
GOOD FOR WINTER! BUT FOR SUMMER TIME IS A LITTILE BIT TOO OIL!
love it! its like i am not even wearing any makeup its so light and natural!
Its one of the great mineral foundation i found so far
This product is amazing! it goes on light and makes skin look flawless!

I've actually gone through 3 pots hoping to fall in love with this, but honestly I don't think I'll ever buy it again. It's ok and that is it. I don't feel like it lived up to all the hype or great reviews, and I really tried to love it!  I am currently using another brand powder foundation that I use less of and have better coverage & is cheaper!  The only thing that I did like about this is in the winter when I wear a liquid foundation I would finish with a light dusting of this for a softer finish and mid day touchups. But doesn't that defeat the purpose of this being a foundation....
great product - goes on smoothly

reviews.review_title: I won't leave home without this on
reviews.review_text: I use this everyday, great for covering blemishes with the small brush I fill in round my nose and cover any splodges. the I use the big brush for all over application. I am certain this powder has helped my overall skin health.
I just love this foundation. It makes me look younger and it convers everything without looking powdery and fake.

I have been using bare minerals products for a couple years now and I used to hate how the powder would shake through the dispenser. The new container now has a dial that you can turn to keep this from happening. Now everytime I open my makeup I dont need to worry about spilling it.

awesome. Easily my favorite foundation. i live in Florida where wearing a liquid foundation would simply not work. This products is sweatproof and always looks good from the morning to the rest of the day. Would love to meet the creater of this product to thank her personally!!!!!

I've been using Bare Minerals for over 4 years and absolutely love this product! From the first time I tried this product, people around me noticed how flawless and perfect my skin looks. I never leave the house without it!
Love it, try other foundations always return to Bare Minerals

I recently tried a different mineral makeup that was actually more expensive than bareMinerals but it had a built in sponge type applicator which I thought would be convenient and it was very disappointing. The applicator broke and product spilled all over my counter and clothing. I am returning to bareMinerals and don't plan on straying again!

I live in the south and the heat and humidity this summer has been staggering. I was using liquid makeup and could almost feel it melting off my face. So I decided to try the bare minerals and it has been wonderful. No melting or makeup transfer if I happen to touch my face. On top of that my rosacea is better. Less redness. Thank you BareMinerals.

The only fouondation I will ever put on my face! I can use a little to even out my skin tone or alot and I know it won't ever look cakey! Even if I put on sunscreen or moisturizer first! Or Both! Simple and easy to use, doesn't clog pores and looks completely natural! Always getting compliments on my skin and it's actually far from it LOL!
I absolutely love this product. I've been using it for several years now. My make-up looks natural and not cakey. I also never break out with this product!!

I was introduced to bareMinerals foundation after using a well-known national brand for 30 years. I now have strangers stopping me to ask what foundation I wear because they say my skin looks so perfect. Of course I highly recommend your bareMinerals and Sephora to everyone!
I love bare minerals foundation, it always blends in great, and even my friends ask if I'm wearing makeup!

reviews.review_title: Perfect light - medium coverage makeup! My fav!!!
reviews.review_text: Product: Bare Escentuals bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation Shade: Light  I have to say, this is my absolute favorite foundation. It doesn't feel heavy on your face, and it gives you that smooth flawless finish. Besides all of that great stuff, it's 100% natural; all minerals! Good stuff, eh? The foundations come packaged in black with a little sifter; the matte foundations come with a sliding panel that makes sure nothing fall out. (The only downfall to this, I wish they added the sifter to this one!!) The price may seem high, but you get a huge tub of foundation, and you just need a little tapped into the lid to get all over your face.  So how exactly do you use this foundation? Well it's good to start off with a kabuki brush, which is a densely bristled squat brush. Simply tap some of the foundation into the lid and swirl the brush in it. When it is evenly covered with the product simply buff it into your face using circular slow motions. You can double this up as a concealer if you place it on a pointed concealer brush and dab it on red areas or on blemishes. (Not the best dark circle cover-up obviously.)  Overall this is an amazing foundation, the soft minerals won't leave your face looking dry and hard. Plus it gives a beautiful natural finish without a glittery look; and you can add as much as you need for that flawless face! Oh, and with so many shades to choose from, you'll never feel left out!
I love this makeup. My skin looks flawless and never looks orange or caked on. The matte is good for humid summers and the original is perfect for winter months.
I have gotten this before, but the ones I just got were real glittery???? Did they change the formula??? :(

I am so glad to be back to the regular bare minerals! I tried the matte and it does not work for me...but the color of the medium beige matches my skin tone perfectly. It covers blemishes flawlessly, too. I have a been a fan for many years and can't find anything comparable.

Great coverage, stays on ALL day and never oily AND it has SPF, which means I can wear it in the sun! I've been wearing this for about 4 years now and I have seen a great improvement in my skin- I love having fewer breakouts

reviews.review_title: You should only use it if you have healthy skin
reviews.review_text: Since I heard of how amazing this foundation is, I was very excited to use it, but ended up hating this product. My mom bought it for me when I started to break out, thinking it will help my skin. To be honest, it actually made my skin break out more, and after a few hours, it made my skin look aged. I would not recommend this if you have dry skin, because it would make your skin look aged like mine. It also made my skin look uneven. I would only recommend this is you have a healthy and flaw-less skin.
Love Bare Minerals foundation. It makes my face look smooth. It feels like I am not wearing any make-up at all!
Bare Escentual is the best thing that I have ever done, I just love, Im now going on 3yrs Sweet
I've been using this foundation for years, and still love it! It's easy to apply, gives your skin a nice healthy glow & has SPF 15 which is an added bonus!

LOVE LOVE LOVE. This is the best foundation there is. It covers everything, looks natural, and makes your skin glow and look even-toned, even after you take it off. I got my Get Started kit at Sephora about a year ago, and I can definatly say that this has improved my skin. Just make sure you get the correct shade! Sephora matched me as a medium, and that was waay too dark! I went back and asked them to match me again, and I got Fair. That STILL wasn't right, so I tried Light. Finally, I gave up on Sephora and went to a Bare Escentuals Boutique, where the girls picked out Bisque (which I use first) and the foundation in Fairly Medium, which matches my skin and neck PERFECTLY! Don't get me wrong-I love Sephora, so no offense to them, but the girl I talked to didn't seem to know what she was doing! I will buy the makeup at Sephora as I need it, but initially, I had to go the the Bare Escentuals Boutique so I could figure out my proper shade. Anywaysss, this is the best foundation ever. I will never use anything else. It works, and it's good for your skin. I'm sixteen, and I plan on using this for the rest of my life.

I actually do not wear foundation as a practice, but at a recent facial it was suggested that I try this product. I've been using it for 3 weeks now and it's GREAT!! It's a little cover-up, a lot of sun protection and a little matte-ifying all in one and takes under a minute to apply properly. Consider me converted.

I like this foundation, but in the summer does not work as well as in the fall/winter in my skin... I love that I can customize the color and decide the level of coverage. What I hate: they are messy!!! Foundation, mineral veil, and blush all over the bathroom!!

reviews.review_title: I wouldn't use any other foundation
reviews.review_text: Truly, since I've been using Bare Minerals...about 3 years.....I would not even consider any other foundation. It is the best I have ever used. I will never be without it. My skin actually looks better when I am using it than when I am not using any foundation. Go figure.

I like that you can hardly feel the prouct of your face, however to does not wear all day. The only way I can get all day coverage is to make sure I wear a primer and concealer under this foundation. I rather just spend the money on a good full coverage foundation.

Tried it before. Loved it. Tried others. They never gave the best coverage, nor did they have the shade that worked best for me. This Medium Beige is the only one for me! I think you'll find the color for your skin type and tone, too. Best of all -- no roseaca acne breakouts with this product! Hooray! :)
The best, most natural cover up which does NOT make my skin break out (lack of any dyes or perfumes!!!)  I LOVE IT!

I was getting a lot more color being in the sun this summer and the regular medium was a shade too light for me now. So when I went to get something a bit darker for me there was a reallynice girl at the fromt that helped me right away and knew exactly what I needed and now the makeup looks flawless.

I've been using this product for four years, and I've never been happier with a foundation. I have incredibly sensitive skin and I am prone to breakouts, but with this foundation my skin stays clear. It's very natural looking. I get a lot of compliments on my complexion.
I have been using this powder foundation for about 10 years now. I've never been disappointed. Stays on all day and covers skin blemishs.

reviews.review_title: I don't wear this, my sister does
reviews.review_text: I wanted to give a quick review, my sister wears this and she NEVER looks like there's too much makeup on! it's pretty outstanding. Also, she said she broke out much less frequently when using this foundation. There's less residue to remove after cleansing your face and the particles let air get to your skin!!

I purchased the fairly medium shade and I love it. Easy to apply, great not too heavy coverage with a nice natural finish. I would like to applaud Bare Escentuals for offering the fairly medium shade for those of us too dark for fair and too pale for medium shades. Works great on those of us with fair olive toned skin.
It's about time, no more waste!! The new twist lid is great! Luv it!!
I've tried many other makeup brands and BareMinerals is the best by far! It looks natural, stays on and the SPF is great for my fair skin.

I have loved Bare Minerals since it was only available on late night TV. It really evens out my skin coloring without looking like I have makeup on. I really like the change they made with the container. No more loose powder flying everywhere when you open it.
Consistent product. I will never change.

This stuff covers like there's no tomorrow! I have very shiny skin and I would never wear anything BUT mineral powder foundation. Covers flaws/discolorations and makes my skin feel nearly perfect! Totally forgot about it have an SPF factor!... Even better! No need for an extra concealer either!

I've been using Bareminerals for about 3 years now. I was hesitant at first and my best friend convinced me to buy the starter kit. The foundation matched me perfectly and blends in like cream w/ my skin. BEAUTIFUL!!! I even started breaking out less when i replaced my old makeup company with BAREMINERALS!!!
I find this product to one of the best systems. it is smooth and natural looking.
I love this make up nothing even comes close to it and I think I have tried them all

I love this product! I can litterally get ready in 5 minutes in the morning and look great. The makeup stays in place well. The starter kit is a great way to try it out. If in a real hurry the foundation and mineral veil are enough.
Good product. I like the new design that keeps it from spilling.
love the new packaging alot neater

This product is okay, I was expecting a little more. The coverage is not that great and in order to get that coverage the make-up looks bad on skin. Someone suggested putting liquid foundation first and this second and that helps a little, if you have the right colors. Its nice for just a quick sweep on makeup for easy days.

reviews.review_title: Bare Escentuals bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation Fai
reviews.review_text: Outstanding coverage. Light so it's barely there!
This is the only foundation that doesn't melt off my oily face in the Florida sun.

The best mineral makeup around, I've tried others but this one is worth the price. Gives you flawless coverage with using very light amount, people are always telling me how beautiful and flawless my skin is and it's because of the bareMinerals foundation makes my skin look that way.

reviews.review_title: Love the Product - Hate the Packaging
reviews.review_text: Have used for years, love the product but have noticed the packaging size has been reduced and the new packaging with the spillproof lid takes away from the quantity of the product. would rather have more product and less packaging for the money.
The golden color is an awesome addition to the already fabulous color. Great job Bare Escentuals!
The bareMinerals foundation is something I can't live without! This is the only foundation that I will buy! Its amazing. Just by using this stuff, it helps my face stay so much clearer!
I have been using Bare Escentuals make up for quite some years now. I will never use anything else. These products are just amazing.
I truly love the Bare Escentuals BareMinerals. I have dark spots from the sun and it is the only thing that covers them and keeps them covered with reapplying contantly.

Have been using the powder for years, and I love the way it blends with the oils in my skin and looks natural. The updated packaging with twist closer (nice for traveling or carrying around without wasting powder) makes it an even better product.
I've tried other brands and nothing compares to their foundation. It covers well and looks natural. I will never try another brand again!

I purchased a sample kit several months ago. I used it occasionally but became truly convinced of the awesomeness of this product on a recent trip to hot, humid Texas. I used bareMinerals foundation and BareEscentuals eyeliner and shadows nearly everyday. I was impressed by how comfortable the makeup was in these conditions and by how well it held up after long, hot days. This is officially my favorite makeup, hands down!
I have always loved the foundation...but now I love the new case that prevents spilling if I travel with it!

Love it! Easy to apply, great coverage, you really don't need anything else! I have blotchy skin that is oily and tends to break out once a month, and this stuff works great on my annoyingly problematic skin.

This is a very soft and natural make up that covers red spots and uneven complexions very well. It can be a little drying so it's best to use a good amount of moisturizer before applying- especially in the winter.

I love this foundation. I wanted something light, fresh, and natural for summer but I wasn't sure what to get. When I tried this I knew this is exactly what I wanted for summer. It feels so great and my oils don't come through and make me look like an oil slick, which is saying something since my skin is producing sebum like crazy! <3

i am totally obsessed with bareMinerals! the powder is great, provides exceptional and constant coverage, and it never feels like makeup. as a bonus, it has spf, which is perfect for summer! i am convinced that there is magic in this stuff ;). i highly recomend it!
The powder is light and doesn't clog the pores. It goes on light but then blends in with my skin tone about an hour or so.

Love the ability to shut the top and the different colors. I have a very fair complexion and with the new colors they add a natural coverage with a natural hint of healthy hue. It also seems to take less of the product to get the same results.

Love Love Love the new twist to release caps!! Where have you been 'til now???? An excellent coverage foundation mineral powder that lasts for ages (especially with the new top to prevent inadvertant spils!)and keeps skin looking flawless.

Simpy the best, it looks natural and absorbs all the oil on your skin. It really looks like your erasing all the blemishes on your skin with a magic eraser! Great as a concealer with the maximum coverage brush.

How can you not love bare minerals? That being established... the new lid makes it so much less messy. You twist it, knock out the amount you need... len twist it back. No more trying to knock it all back down to the bottom. I'm very very happy with it!
fantastic product, good coverage, but very light and natural looking....long-wearing
Leaves a frosty revenue. Goes into cracks of lines on face which emphasizes them more!!
This is the best foundation that I have used. I have rosea and this is the first foundation that I found that covers and feels good on you without the look of foundation. it is natual looking
This, along with the Go Clear system, has completely cleared up my skin after trying several other products that just didn't work. Strongly suggest trying it.
Bare Minerals foundation works incredibly well.

This is a good, reliable product. I find that it works best when I finish with Mineral Veil, otherwise I tend to look too oily by late in the day. But topped with Mineral Veil, this one is my favorite mineral foundation.
Great new color that is the perfect complement to my summer skin.
SOOOO much nicer than liquid foundations. Haven't tried other mineral foundations but love this one!

I like the feeling of this, it doesn't seem heavy on my face. I have large pores across my nose and this enlarged them. I used makeup primer before and it worked very well. I several young women that use it and it looks fantastic on them.
great makeup fo summer when it is hot

reviews.review_title: The only foundation I will use forever.
reviews.review_text: I refuse to wear any liquid foundation, and this is by far the best of the best for power foundations. No skin irritations, blends perfectly into your skin, covers EVERYTHING, and lasts a long time!
I love it. It gives my face a natural glow.
Love the shade and the makeup is flawless! Very light for summer too!
Great long lasting makeup!
This is my favorite foundation. I have been using bareMinerals for over 4 years and wouldnt use anything else!!

I have used this product for years and I still love it! I have super sensative skin. I searched all entire teenage years for a foundation that would not cause me to have terrible breakouts. This is the only one that fit the bill. I will use this forever!

I like this though I bought the wrong shade due to buying online. It may earn a 5 when I get the correct shade. I also like not having to travel with a liquid. Seems to control oil during the day pretty well without the use of any additional product.

I love love LOVE bare escentuals! i dont know what i was doing before without it! ...oh wait, yes i do. wearing makeup that was too dark for me or too light for me. i either looked like i went and got a REALLY bad tan that only got on my face. OR i was wearing a mask that clearly made me look like a mime. Bare Escentuals now has a large variety of different shades to match YOUR skin tone! try it and you will fall in love too! <3
Product cakes and gives dull finish. The adds sound good, but not for me. I will go back to a liquid.
i got it in medium beige and i love it! masks all redness well and gives my face beautiful radiance
I have been using Bare Escentuals about three years. It evens out my skin tone and gives me a glow. It is a little messy sometimes, but it looks great on and I wouldn't use any other makeup.
I have used this foundation for about two years and I absolutely love it. I goes on easy and stays on all day. The best part is that you can keep applying and you won't look caked on. Fabulous

I have red coloration on my neck and never have had to wear makeup until this red came up. I was using my blush to even it out but it was still just red. Once I applied the SPF 15 Foundation, it completely disappeared. Everybody notices how healthy I look, and nobody knows why, unless the ask and I happily tell them.

I purchased BE from the infomercial when it first came out and consistently used it for a few years, only to find out I was cheating myself. I was always buying something to either layer it with to stay put, add some life to my now dull looking skin, or conceal. I give up! I have found so many better concealing, stay put, rich foundations that make this look like flour. If I have to try so hard to make it do what I need to it do for me then its not the right product. I was convinced for a while but all the layering took a fair amount of time to apply and eventually degrades your skin. I use a one step (no tapping and sneezing) foundation and I have since retired my BE foundation, forever!

I have been using bareMinerals now for almost a year and I absolutely love this foundation! It is the only foundation that does not cause me to break out and it blends perfectly. I only need to use a small amount and it doesn't even look like I am wearing foundation.

While in Vegas a few years ago, a friend noticed my red cheeks and nose and recommended I try her BareMinerals powder foundation. What a difference it made! This has done so much for my self-esteem, to be able to feel confident that my sun-burned look isn't the first thing people notice about me. I use a bit of liquid foundation first, then, brush the BareMinerals over that, and I'm good for 7-8 hours. If you need to hide facial flaws, or rosacea, try this. I bet it works wonders for you too.
This is a great product!
light finish and natural looking. i wear over a liquid base.
Love BareMinerals! its the best makeup i have ever found/used!
I love it, the foundation provide the perfect amount of coverage with out feeling like I have any makeup on. The color blends in perfectly to my skin tone!

I have dry skin (and I always moisturize my face before I put on makeup and before I go to bed, and I don't over wash my face!) and my foundation can look so cakey and this is the only one that looks so natural. I also love how they have a huge shade-range. I really have to look for something that matches my skin (I am french, portuguese, russian, spaniard, salvadorian, and chinese.)

I'm not as impressed as some of my girlfriends have been. The product settles into my laugh lines (I smile a lot), and if I get a little oily throughout the day, this foundation slicks off when I blot my face. It evens out my general skin tone ok, but as far as covereage for blemishes and under circles it falls a short.
Truly makes my skin the most flawless look I've ever had using a foundation. I have skin problems and it never irritates or makes blemishes look even worse like many other concealers/foundations do.

This foundation gave me a natural-looking effect. I have a very red face and the foundation doesn't cover ALL the redness, but I didn't expect it to. The mineral veil helps this foundatin stay on better to make it last all day.
best pink toned foundation i have found, blends with my rosacea, and my very pale neck :D. it's the end of the zombie face i got from fair.

Great, lightweight foundation that stays true all day long! Lightweight and complete coverage let you build coverage best for you!! I have ROSCEA and this helps hide all the redness and evens out my skintone!! I NEVER LEAVE HOME WITHOUT IT ON!!!
I LOVE this product. Its the best thing i have ever found to hide those little imperfection we ALL have. Totally recommend to every single person out there!!!!

I have loved this product since the first time I swapped it for my liquid foundation. I love it even more now that they have improved the container to release just the right amount of powder each time.
Great Product and great experience in the store!
I love this foundation, I will never use anything else. It is great for coving skin problems. Love it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I have always had the best service when in this Sephora Store. Everyone is always helpful and I never have to look for anything.

I LOVE THIS FOUNDATION! I tried this product three years ago and haven't used anything else since then! It's natural looking, long lasting, covers perfectly weather I just need light coverage or need to cover those tell tale signs of too many late nights!
great coverage, gives a very even look to your skin

Great coverage and it's the actually the best concealer for blemishes when used with a small brush. I use the Golden Medium as a highlighter to a golden finish. The only downside is you need a primer or it won't last all day.

reviews.review_title: Tried my best to like it
reviews.review_text: I've heard so many good things about Bare Minerals. I tried very hard to like it, but it just didn't work for me. I have sensitive skin, and after two days of using this, my skin broke out in tiny pimples and the powder emphasized each bump.  It does however deliver on its promise of radiant, very sheen and healthy-looking skin. The SPF15 protection is good, too. Still not enough to make me keep it.  I returned it after three days and stuck to my usual make-up.

I've used this product for 7 years... It's not a miracle or anything but I've found nothing else to work better. I really like it EXCEPT if I'm having dry skin issues, it doesn't do much to help this and it tends to not look very good on a dry skin palette... They should make one with out chemicals! If your skin is good it looks like your not really wearing makeup!
Color matches perfectly. And it doesn't cake up. Has very natural look.
Color matches perfectly. And it doesn't cake up. Has very natural look.

I used this foundation about 4 years ago, and after about a week had to stop because of the irritation on my skin. I decided to give it another try and received the 10-day sample with a recent order. A few minutes after I applied it, again it caused my face to itch.

I just started using Bare Minerals and I love it! The color match to my skin is awesome - still a light shade but with a little bit of a summer tan. This is the only foundation I will use now - I never thought I could get coverage like this with a powder but it is just creamy enough. The best part is using this product my skin is the most BLEMISH FREE it has ever been!

I have tried SEVERAL products over the past two years to cover blemishes and reddened skin. After having sampled Bare Escentuals at Sephora and after going outside to see the effects of the application, I was sold! I absolutely love the coverage and especially the light weight feel. I have been receiving compliments on my flawless skin.

reviews.review_title: THE BEST FOUNDATION AVAILABLE OUT THERE !
reviews.review_text: My friend introduced me to this foundation two years ago, bragging that it works wonders. I didn't believe her until convinced me one day to do my make-up. I couldn't believe the results ! It looks so natural and its super light. To this day, its my favorite foundation out there. <3
This is enough to last a year or more!!
I really enjoy using this foundation. It is easy to apply and gives light, but thorough coverage. It seems to be very good for my skin also.
Love this as my foundation. My face feels clean and never greasy. Coverage is so flawless and pretty without looking make-upy
It is very good, I got the wrong color but it ended up being okay not the perfect match but close.......
I love it It makes my face look flawless. It doesn't make my face all oily and nasty. I wouldn't change it for any other brand.
I love this foundation. I don't feel bad if I don't get to wash it off until late at night because I know that it won't be bad for my skin.
the greatest coverage +++
What can I say I am addicted to Bare Minerals especially with SUN SCREEN. It's how I keep that china skin look :-)
Blends in with skin well. Doesn't feel heavy in my skin which is good but it sometimes makes my face a little shiny.
This product never stops amazing me. Flawless skin with many levels of coverage and an ever expanding product line keeps me coming back for more.
Can be buildable coverage but requires a lot more time than simply applying a liquid foundation. Is great for when you have a tan and only need a little makeup.

every makeup product I wear for my face is bare Minerals! I could not live without it. I have very oily and acne prone skin and it is fantastic. Doesnt wear off, looks completley natural, covers well, and looks amazing. It still looks like skin only a million times better! I would recommend this to anyone and of any skin type

i've been using this for more than a year now, and it is very gentle on the skin. it also has really good coverage- is blendable, and works really well with LM primer beneath and MF HD powder over it!

This product is my favorite foundation and I have not worn any other foundation in over 5 yrs. It has good coverage, light weight, natural feeling, and none irritating ( i have eczema). I would recomend that everyone try and as long as you have the right color foundation ( sephora has associates available to assist you) then you will not want any other foundation as well.

this product is amazing! i'm 16 and i use it every single day and it doesn't look caked on or even like i'm wearing makeup! it's so great i recommend it to everyone, no matter what type of skin you have. hope this helps! :)

I went to the store because the Bare Minerals foundation color that I had purchased at QVC was the wrong color for me even though it was light. It had a yellow tone and made me look like I had jondous (sp). I looked really sick. The Rep who helped me right away knew the correct color for me and it is perfect for my skin color. She was wonderful and I can't thank her enough.
This is the only foundation I will wear!
Amazing, makes skin look luminous

reviews.review_title: Great Product, even Better package design!
