reviews.review_text: I fell in love with bareMinerals several years ago. The powder is easy to apply, reduces my blemishes, and evens out my skin tone. I use Light and Fairly Light separately or together at various times during the year (depending on my tan).  The only frustration I had with the product was the design of the container - which is now resolved with the new packaging. The twist lid secures the product for travel (no more pile-of-makeup waiting when I get to the hotel). The lid clicks securely into the holes. I hope that each of their products carries this lid from now on.

your skin looks flawless and bare it doesn't look like you have makeup on but it also doesn't look like you have any imperfections. i typed in a promo coed for a sample when i placed this order and all the bare mineral samples they had left were in really dark colors i got them any way and I'm so glad i did. YOU CAN USE IT AS EYESHADOW for a marvelously natural look buy some a few shades off from your skin tone and you have amazing eyeshadow it enhances beauty without anyone knowing it there. it doesn't slip slide or crease. its very water resistant. i read an article on beauty. and what we consider pretty as a society... has to do with different values. like in a black and white photo some areas are darker in value than other. the article said that this may be a reason that in many different cultures women wear eyeshadow and eyeliner. they add darker values which is what we consider pretty. this adds value but makes it look natural for eyeshadow that is. And for foundation it keeps you flawless.

You will never buy a better a product. I recommend this product to total strangers whilst out shopping! Get the shade right (it may be worth buying two and mixing) and use the warmer to boost your colour when you have a tan. Seriously good, you won't go back to a cream/liquid foundation; much quicker to apply, you won't get a 'ring' round your face either!

I have NEVER been able to find an exact match to my skin-tone, until I tried this. It matches my skin so well that sometimes I can't even tell that it's on, which I love!! It is soo light on your skin, you can barely feel it, the color is perfect, and it makes my skin look amazing all around. I have unbelievably sensitive skin, and this doesn't bother it in the slightest, which is really saying something about it! My skin looks luminous, bright, and natural! It's semi-expensive (at least to me), so that's a bit of a bummer, but it's worth it because it lasts forever and looks amazing!

I‚Äôve been using Bare Minerals for 2 year now and I LOVE IT! I've tried a lot of products and BM so far is the best that i've tried. I would recommend bare minerals for anyone who wants a fresh, effortless look without having to break the bank.

This is the first time I have tried bareMinerals and I have fallen in love. My face does not get oily at all as when I used liquid foundation. The color probably was a little too dark but I almost bought a darker color if it hadn't been for the sales clerk. I would recommnend this product.

I have been using powder foundation since college. And this works so well that I can forego a liquid foundation. Also, it's not completely matte, which helps me look natural. The fine powder does a fantastic job at covering the broken capillaries I have on my cheeks.
this foundation makes me break out but the matte version really helped a little more. the coverage is buildable but a bit cakey at first
cant say enough about it. Light, natural, stays all day. love it!
I love that you can now close the inside so that the foundation doesn't spill into the top if the jar is tipped. As a frequent traveler, I appreciate the change; make a great product even better

I've been using BE for about 5 years now and even got my daughter hooked. I have rosacea and every other foundation I tried irritated my skin and made my rosacea flame. This foundation has made it almost disappear. It's easy to use, you can use a little or a lot depending on how much coverage you need on a particular day. You can also blend the colors to achieve the perfect shade. I pour off some into another container and add some BE blush during the summer to get a slightly darker shade if I'm tan. Yes, it's a bit messy, but that's a small trade-off. It makes my skin look like I'm not wearing any makeup, covers the flaws, and doesn't irritate. What more can you ask?
I've tried at least 4 other brands (t.v., drugstore, internet) and find that bare minerals goes on the easiest and has the best coverage. Must make sure you apply moisturizer first.

I bought a starter kit of the bare Minerals about three years ago. Previous to that I had been using Estee Lauder liquid makeup. Liquid Makeup comes off on your clothes, your pillow and leaves an oily residue on your face. I give Bare Minerals and A+ for coverage and a natural look plus you never have to worry about anything getting on your clothes. I will never use anything else again! I am hooked.
This product made my pores look more visible, and skin look dull.

reviews.review_title: same great make up great new container
reviews.review_text: I have used Bare Minerals for over eight years now and still love it. I love it even more now because of the click and turn container which provides more control over the mineral powder. Less mess
DID NOT LIKE IT AT ALL-MADE MY SKIN LOOK OILY. RETURNED IT THE NEXT DAY.

I love this product and have used it for over a year now. I absolutely love the new lid- it makes application a lot cleaner. If you tried this in the past and thought the whole swirl, tap, buff routine wasted a lot of powder and made a mess, try it again! The new lid design makes a big difference.

combination skin with larger pores around my nose, and BE does a great job smoothing my tone out! it also tones down the occasional blemish/redspot. overall my skin lookes more even without looking overly made up. i hate when i see makeup caked on a girls face.. and BE never looks caked on! it gives a more natural glow and look to skin.

I called this order in because the website was down & told the girl that I was normally a fairly light customer but had been tanning & wanted a color to match. She suggested this & it is way to pinkish for my skin tone. Without tanning I'm an ivory tone but I think next time I will just get the Medium.
I got this summer because my regular foundation felt like mud...and this covers well, better than I thought!

reviews.review_title: Love the Product - Not the Packaging
reviews.review_text: Best coverage of any powders on the market. The packaging is not the best - 1) it's hard to remove the protective covering when you first try to open it and 2) the product has residual powder that is no able to use when almost out. Remove the inside slide and get back to the original packaging with several holes.

I have used bareMinerals for about 5 years. I have to travel an hour to Sephora because the small town I live in doesn't provide a store to carry this makeup line. Occassionally I have tried other mineral foundations because I wasn't able to make the trip to purchase more when I ran out. Of all the brands I've tried (Expensive and cheap) NONE compare to the originator... bareMinerals!! I'm forever a loyal customer.  The makeup conceals amazingly and looks so natural! I love it!
The new packaging is a little hard to deal with, but the product still works great.
I love this Bare Escentuals foundation. It surprisingly covers any flaws but doesn't feel sticky even in the hottest weather. I've been using it for a couple of years.
love the new sifter so all of the makeup doesn't fall out everywhere, great coverage.

I love BareMinerals and the coverage is perfect for me, but the one downfall is I have been searching and trying for the perfect shade. Sadly I havent found it yet:( I thought that trying this new shade would work but it isnt my favorite. I have a somewhat golden undertone yet have alot of redness/pink as well. The golden colours are too yellow and this doesnt add enough colour. So the search will continue, this is why I only gave it 4 stars.
This product is great it makes your skin look so flawless!!
Have been using it for a couple of years now and it is the best foundation ever
Forever foundation for me
I recommend this product to anyone who has sensitive skin. Simply wonderful, skin looks so healthy and feels like you have nothing on, no builup.
Still great foundation and less mess!
Of course I love Bare Escentuals, but what I really love is the new jar it comes in! Less mess and easy!
glad to see the formula has not changed with the packaging. great product. love the new locking feature.
offers great coverage and doesn't feel heavy on the face.
I have always loved this product... just be careful to not buy the Matte Base if you are going for a lighter feel, just go for the original formula!:) Cheers

Recently I purchased the bare Minerals Matte foundation and would rate it okay - it is perfect for those of you that don't have a lot to cover up but for those of us that want to cover up freckles or some other things such as freckles older cousin age spot then you really need to bypass the BareMenerals Matte foundation and get the regular foundatioin plus with the added sun screen you don't have to welcome freckles older cousin over for dinner.

Still love the coverage and the way it feels like you're not wearing any makeup, but while I appreciate the company's attempt at making their new twist top so the powder doesn't go all over the place, it's hard to turn once a little powder gets in it. They need to keep trying!

I've been using BM Foundation for three years and will NEVER use anything else!!! I'm fair skinned, and the SPF in this product is all I need for sun protection. This is a totally amazing product! AND....I've turned quite a few of my friends onto it as well!

I've used Bare Minerals for several years now, and it's perfect for me. Before I tried it, I was unsure if it would provide enough coverage, but I am very pleased with how it looks on my 61-year-old complexion. I tried the newer matte coverage, but found that I prefer the very slight shimmer provided by the original. Can't imagine that I would ever switch!

reviews.review_title: Not all its made out to be
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to get a trial size bare minerals powder foundation but when I used it I was pretty disappointed. It worked but not anymore than a 10 $ compact from the drug store. It was a little shiny for me and does not provide a lot of coverage. Good product but not worth the price.
great make-up, only thing that I will use.
Love, love, love BE! It makes your skin luminious and perfected without feeling heavy and cakey. If you haven't tried it, you must! You will not regret it!
works great on my skin; light weight; no breakouts
I really like the natural look of Bare Escentuals. It's light weight and easy to apply. Just what I was looking for.

I use this product along with Multi-tasking face in bisque for an even coverage all over. My 15 year old granddaughter who has an acne condition just started using this product. It covers her flaws beautifully without looking pasty. She loves it!!!

reviews.review_title: Great new color, awesome as always
reviews.review_text: Always love bareMinerals, and now this color is just perfect for me. Not too yellow, not too light... fills in the color gap perfectly.
I swear by this product i have ruddy skin and it evens out my skin tone

I wish that I got a bit more coverage for dark spots. I use a concealer to help. I also wish this would stay on through the day and yes I use the primer and the veil. Lastly I hate that this is messy and gets all over the counter and takes up room in my purse but this is better for my sensitive skin
I have used Bare Minerals for 7 years. Will never use any other foundation. Quick application, great coverage. Perfect for all skin types & age.

I use to mix Light with Fairly Light to get my perfect match. An advisor told me that this Golden Fair was pretty much those two mixed, so I tried it. It's a little bit lighter than my former mix, but it has that yellow in it that I need for my asian yellow skin tone. I prefer the Golden Fair Matte formula. For some reason, it matches with my skin tone better, where as, this original formula is oddly lighter.
Goes on so light, but provides excellent coverage. A big plus that it comes with SPF 15!

I love the whole Bare Escentuals line, but this foundation has to be my favorite!! It is amazing! I recommend it to everyone I meet. It is COMPLETELY worth the money. I can never go back to the previous brands I was using because this is perfect.
I love it; the color is perfect!
I've been using bareMinerals SPF 15 Foundation since 2008 and LOVE it! Very natural - evens out my skin tone without heavy feeling and skin looks flawless and natural.

reviews.review_title: Aface Kissed by the Sun gods
reviews.review_text: If you invest time and money to have the skin on your face look great you must try this foundation for a perfect finish. Your face will look like it was kissed by the gods
I like Bare minerals in the summer becuze it doesn't melt off look most make-up in this heat. And I buy it a Sehora becuze my daughter works there!!!! At the JC Pennys store

reviews.review_title: I bought the matte one - its alright
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and am very prone to acne. This makeup feels light on my face and gives good coverage.  I do have this against it though, i don't feel like it does much about my oily skin. Im still just as oily with or without the matte finish. ( its like a 3 dollar difference)
great foundation. light but provides good coverage
I absolutely love this new shade from BE! It matches perfectly and looks so natural and leaves a flawless finish.
I love bareMinerals and will never go back to regular foundation!
I love bareMinerals and will never go back to regular foundation!
Great! I've been using it for a few years. Great coverage, natural look, easy to use.
love it! so easy & fast to put on.
I have always loved this product but love it even more now with the redesign of the canister...
Very natural, yet great coverage.

I absolutely love this foundation! It is light weight and brushes on flawlessly for a beautiful but natural finish. One of these foundation compacts lasts me a year! And it's definitely worth the extra money compared to cheap drug store brands. An A ++ in my book.

I already use bare minerals but thought I would try this new one . Like the reg light better, but still flawless finish and quick and easy with little mess, just dont put on with your shirt on, it will be all over even if you tap or blow excess
Love, love, love this product!

I just purchased the BM original foundation last week and I love it!!! I didnt choose the fairly medium, it chose me. Looking at it in the container I didnt think it would be a nice color until after I put it on my face and it just blended it perfectly, no demarcation line, nothing just looked like my own skin only better, beautiful finish, I was sold!!, and get this I tried on the fairly light also and it was darker than the fairly medium... what's up with that??/ So anyway, I am quite pleased with the perfect color match for me. I have pink undertones in my skin (which I hate), and I was looking for a yellow based color but the sales clerk told me that it would clash with my skin and make it seem orangey, maybe she's right, because this color works so what can I say. I already had the featherlight mineral veil, so I just use it over that and it gives a nice luminous glow which is what I like. Overall happy with this product and is a good replacement for powder. Looks like you have no make up on and that's what I like, not that heavy made up look you get from other foundations,,,,,blah

I'd like to return this, but didn't keep my receipt thinking I would love it from all of the reviews I've read. I have combination skin and after 30 minutes, it looked like what your makeup looks like at the end of a very long day. Disappointed for sure. I used the photofinish light primer, B E light foundation and the tinted mineral veil.

reviews.review_title: You need to switch to BE.
reviews.review_text: I have converted everyone I know to this product. It will make your skin look smooth and glowing and really take care of any discoloration you may have. I get pretty bad acne and none of my friends know because of this product. It lasts all day and because it's all natural and light, you don't have to feel icky about what you're putting on your face.  Hint: find the exact right shade--maybe even go into a Sephora store and have one of the experts there figure it out for you.

reviews.review_title: I have strayed, but now I'm back for good.
reviews.review_text: Recently looked back on my pics from a year ago and wondered why my skin doesn't look as good now. ITS THE BARE MINERALS! I have been using other foundations over the past year and now I realize they have been the cause of me looking less fabulous. I was missing my Bare Minerals glow.  Bare Minerals is not an event/occasion make-up, but it is my absolute favorite for daily use. It's light, doesn't cause break-outs, and leaves my skin luminous, but not too shiny.  DO use mineral veil with foundation! It's a must!!! It makes a world of difference.  HATE the MATTE version of this make-up.
I have been using Bare Escentuals for over a year. They give me a good coverage without the made-up look.
This product gives great coverage, yet doesn't feel as though you are wearing any make-up.
I will react to pretty much anything but this product has never let me down. Love it!
love it! i'm always in search of natural products made without preservatives. bare minerals lets my skin breathe, gives me a nice, even skin tone, and has sunscreen to protect from sun damage.
This makeup looks natural and flawless.
Wonderful coverage, not heavy and blends well.
I've actually been using this just as an undereye concealer for dark circles and it's been working wonderfully!

Total Bare Minerals convert. Works great. I do have oily skin and while this makeup isn't exactly mattifying, but I haven't really found anything that is and this makeup at least looks natural and feels great on.

I saw my grandmother and aunt using this product and loved it whenever I snagged a sample. The coverage is amazing and your complexion glows! I got it for my 14th birthday on request and I swear I will never use any other make up again! =]

I finally found my shade! I love BE and I had used up all my meduim but it still was a bit to dark for me. This shade is perfect. I love the natural feel and how well it covers my skin. I am a 45 year old woman with sometimes skin of a 16 year old. Very oily in the T zone . I use a primer then my BE.
Best make up ever, would never go back to a liquid makeup

reviews.review_title: The same, but even better now!
reviews.review_text: I've been wearing this exclusively for 3 years, so obviously I love it. But now that they have the closeable shaker top so it won't spill into the lid when I travel, it's absolutely PERFECT!
Thee best mineral based foundation for women of all ages!!!

I tan easily and get dark, but my tan is not always even-looking. I don't like to wear much make up in the summer, so this is perfect. Just a light swish with my face brush and everything evens out and looks smooth. I couldn't do without it.

I really, really, really don't like the new design of the inside. I prefer the old way that is pictured on here. Now the design is like that of the matte container. It' useless & makes it impossible to open up the entire container to get the rest of the makeup out. boo

This foundation is lightweight, looks like you are not wearing makeup, and covers redness and dark spots beautifully. I have severe roseacea, and this gives me the coverage of professional strenth pancake type makeups without the heavy feel. Even when swimming.

best foundation ever. i think i've tried every possible brand/type of cover up and the bare minerals is BY FAR my favorite. it covers imperfections nicely but it feels like you're not wearing any makeup. if you're considering trying bare minerals, do it - it is soooo worth it!!

Ive used bareMinerals for a few years now and ill never go back to other foundations. It's easy to put on and lasts all day (even when i sweat). I have break out issues and this has helped me control this issue for the last 3 years.. Also one pot will last me a couple months so it's worth the investment. I would recommend to anyone who would listen.

reviews.review_title: Works great for oily skin & in humid weather.
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for a while and have never had any issues with it. I have oily skin and live in S. Florida where the humidity can make your face look disgusting by the end of the day, but this has always held up even when I sweat. Sometimes I use a primer under it but it's not always necessary. I use the Mineral Veil to set it.

This stuff is such a scam. I HATE it! I'm young but this manages to somehow bring out wrinkles and enlarged pores like nothing I have EVER used before. At the end of the day, the color oxidizes like crazy and I look like a goopy, blotchy mess.

i was always sceptical about mineral makeup. my generation was brought up on liquid base foundations and the idea of mineral sounded like a non-covering, non-makeup. The good thing...it is! You don't feel it on like a mask, and the coverage is fantastic. I have sun spots; pregnancy spots, etc. and it works on all of them. Love this stuff! The mineral veil is awesome...gives you a nice finish with a flawless face. AND... I am in the over 50 crowd!
wrong color again...but i really love this makeup, i will buy it again and will find a color to match me!
I was excited to try this but I didn't get the coverage I wanted so I returned it.

This foundation is miraculous. It gives me an even, poreless complexion (no telltale 'demarcation' lines) and covers beautifully wihout the clogging, mask-like feeling of liquid or cream foundations. Also, within a short time, the BareMinerals actually morphs into my skin with an unbudgable, light but complete finish. It is a great product!

I have tried the tan kit, and I really didn't use it very long. I have oily, acne prone skin, and the coverage was minimal. Compared to other lines, there is a nice selection of colors, but you would probably have to have non oily, non dry skin with absolutely no areas that need coverage in order to like this product. The small concealer brush was a joke. It is like translucent faintly colored powder that didn't do much for me at all. I felt like the mineral veil was very unlike a veil... it was too loud for my light tan skin with yellow under tones.
Feels good and provides great natural looking coverage that's easy to use, I apply over facial moisturizer daily.

I like this product, but I do not like the new packaging. Before, when the powder would get low, you could pry open the dispensing lid with the little holes in it to get to the last bit of powder. Now there is a new dispensing lid that you have to turn to open, and you absolutely cannot get that lid off to access the last bit of powder that doesn't seem to want to shake out through the little holes in the dispenser. It is very frustrating. I also used to use the empty containers for storing small items once I had used up all the powder. I thought I was being ecologically friendly by recycling the container that way. Now it is impossible to re-use the container and I have to just throw it away. I wish they would go back to the original container.

This powder provides pretty good coverage. My only complaint is that it rubs off on almost everything...like my phone and my jacket. It also doesn't work very well when I get hot and sweaty. But all that aside, I love that the product is all natural and creates a beautifully smooth finish.
i tried the matte foundation and did not like it AT ALL! did nothing to minimize shine and went on cakey. i'll be sticking with the original formula and don't plan on straying again! love this stuff!

Quickly reduces the appearance of redness on my face and evens out my skin tone. I can use it on its own for my everyday routine or when on special occasions, I use it as finishing powder on top of my foundation.
Love it. Looks very natural on my face and covers very well.
I have been using Bare Minerals for years. I have Rosacea and this is the only product that covers it all day and with no irritation. It is my lifesaver.

...been using it for quite a while now. Any time I switch, I wonder why! Added bonus...the new sifter caps that you can close. Thank you Leslie. Makes traveling so much neater. Better control of how much product you sprinkle into the lid too.

Overall: I like that it's powder and natural. I dislike that it looks terrible in pictures.  Coverage: It does give you a natural looking cover and it does even out your skin tone, for the most part. It looks great face to face but it looks washed out, dull, creased to heck, and lifeless on film. So wear this for a shopping trip to the grocery store but not to the social gathering where people are going to be taking pictures, otherwise you'll look like Dracula's wife with deep, crusty facial lines in the pictures.  Application: I like the brush application although the brushes do lose their bristles causing make-up boo boos. Overall the brush is the best and least wasteful way to put on any makeup.  Packaging: This has always been my least, least favorite thing about Bare Min. The containers are sturdy plastic but the probability for spillage due to the wide open spaces is high. It's worse than that too. Once this stuff spills, it'll stain your counter top till you take scrub to it. And good luck getting it off your clothes ... other than desperate flicks. I wish there was another way of containing and using this stuff instead of with a large opening and small mixing area.  Scent: There is none.
I will never use anything else on my face...EVER!
I love this product. This product is great to wear in the Summer with all the heat and humidity. I would recommend it to anyone with oily skin.
Have always loved the foundation...love it even more with the new lid that controls how much powder gets out. It's now a lot cleaner and less wasteful!
love it, this new color is just perfect for me
I love it!!!.......Hides blemishes, discolorations...and it lasts even in the humid weather.....Try it you will love it!!

Good Coverage, can be powdery if you use too much. If applied lightly and allow to build up it looks great. I use the Fair light in the summer and switch to the fair in the winter. The fairly light has a slightly more yellow undertone that looks nice in the summer.

reviews.review_title: perfect for the summer or vacation
reviews.review_text: I love this foudnation bc it gives great light coverage. We live in central Florida, where its super hot and humid, so the light feeling powder is great and it never seems to melt in the intense heat here. The spf is also great for one more layer of sun protection- I never leave the house without it.
Love it!!! It's my favorite foundation ever! It is so light and natural feeling, but still covers well.
This foundation is great. You can apply a little for a sheer daytime look or more for more coverage. I love that it blends away on my skin too and it covers imperfections. Great stuff!

This powder foundation is fabulous!! It provides excellent coverage and you don't need to worry about coverage lines, breakouts, sweating or wear off. I can wear it to dress up, work out or go to the pool. It's so light weight, I don't even feel it on. Definitely the only foundation I'll ever use.
Love it! Will never use another foundation. Thought that it wouldn't cover red spots or pimples, but was proven wrong.

This stuff is awesome! Ever since they've expanded their original offering of colors, I now have a perfect match for my skin. Great coverage and its not putting junk into your skin. My favorite trick is to swipe with your finger directly under the eyes or on zits, let the powder set, and then brush away. Works as well as concealer!
Great product! Feels like you aren't wearing anything
disappointed!!! don't get this product. I can barely see it and I think its causing me to break out :(
Really like this product. Very lightweight, not like liquid or a paste makeup. Good coverage.
This is BY FAR the BEST makeup I have ever used. I was a Clinique user for over 20 years until I discovered Bare Escentuals. Will NEVER switch to anything else!
Great light coverage . A powder product that is not chalky, not heavy or greasy, but good coverage - a great color match.

Upon my sister's suggestion, I decided to give this product a try. I saw how this made her makeup appear natural-looking. An appearance I wanted to achieve but never got through foundation. Since the first day of usig this, I haven't never gone back to liquid foundation. This is my favorite foundation due to its light, natural looking finish. My complexion has also improved with its use. Amazing! No more liquid foundation again!
By far one of my favorite products at Sephora is Bare Minerals foundation. It covers my skin evenly and looks great on.
I love this product so much! It makes my skin look flawless and beautiful! So easy and effortless to apply!

i've heard talk of minerals but didn't want throw everything away that i had because of the expense. This system allows me to replace my foundation while still using my powder and blush. I'll replace my other products with bare minerals as they run out.
not cheap but very good
I LOVE THIS STUFF! IT LOOKS LIKE I HAVE A MORNING GLOW EVERYTIME I WEAR IT!!!
Sometimes I just use this as concealer. It has coverage you can build on. I use the oil absorbing primer for my oily skin. This seems to help.
This is a great inbetween winter & summer skin color.

Totally love it! I've used bare minerals for almost 5 years now and I love the new shade. In the summer, I tan really easily therefore, I tend to be pretty dark in the summer. I love this new shade because it matches my skintone a lot better than the other shade I was using before.
I lvoe bareMinerals! I tried the new Golden color and I think it's going to work out nicely!

I use Fairly Light. I really like this foundation. I have oily skin so I have to be very careful with what I wear. The strange thing is, whenever I've worn the foundation for a few hours, my skin becomes mildly oily and when I touch up or use an oil blotting sheet, my face become dry and peeling around my nose and mouth. It seems that I will never find the perfect foundation. This, however, does come close.  I found that it's better when I use the Bare Minerals primer and if I use a lot of moisturizer before applying. That said, It has great coverage and is very buildable.

i absolutely LOVE this foundation! I have been using mineral foundation for 2 years now and it has never made my skin break out. I tried liquid foundation before but it was always really bad, so when mineral foundation started to become more available, i tried this one out but been using it since! If you want a FULL coverage and have dark spot scars, this won't cover it up fully. I didn't mind having my acne scars show a little because seriously people, ONLY you care and notice the small spots on your face. No one will look at your face and tell you that your foundation isn't covering everything or even notice your little flaws on your face. When I had really dark scars from my acne however, I used little bit on foundation on the spot and used the mineral foundation on top of it. I will never go back to liquid foundation, because I have acne-prone oily skin. Also if it looks un natural after you put it on, just wait a little, your natural skin oil will melt it into your skin and you will be fabulous

This color matches different skin types beautifully. Use Smashbox's oil-free primer first and the foundation glides on like silk! Love the natural finish and I always get compliments on how even my skin tone is (which it really isn't, so that's how good the makeup is!)
Great coverage with this product, I am 50 years old and it covers well, including age spots. Love that they finally put a top that closes off the holes, hope they do it on mineral veil too.
I love this foundation. I had problems with acne and oily skin, but since I switch to this product my skin is clear and I don't have to use much coverage! Highly recommended!
Evens skin tone, great cover up!

I have been using bare minerals for almost a year now. I love to fact that this make-up is so natural for your skin and your appreance. The SPF is a definate plus as well. I'm even happier to know they just came out with a few new shades for those of us with in-between tones.
Great, my second one and the packaging is terrific this time with a closure seal and more color choices for different lighter skin tones.
Excellent coverage and feels natural.

reviews.review_title: All Mineral Foundations are not the Same
reviews.review_text: The best foundation I have ever used, I have dry skin, and have NEVER liked any powder foundation. I love BareMinerals, best foundation I have ever used in all forms or price ranges.

Finally a shade for the pale olive gal! I am a pale olive, which is pretty rare. In other words I am a pale greenish-yellow. Similar to an Asian skin tone but not quite. This shade has been the answer to my foundation prayers!
Had to restock my foundation and was happy to see the new lid that can be closed. What a great idea!

Used it for about a year.. at first I thought it went on nice. Oxidized and turned me orange after a couple hours and sat in the creases around my mouth and eyes.. but I thought it was so much healthier than other makeups so I was willing to live with it. Often it made my face itch. After a few months I started breaking out horribly, I tried switching every other product in my regime, in denial that it was the BE. After I stopped using it my skin cleared up in about a month.
I love this foundation! Use it exclusively. It does not look powdery on the skin, and I can control the amount of coverage.

reviews.review_title: The Best Foundation I've Ever Used!
reviews.review_text: First of all, I started off with the Matte fomula and it completely broke me out! I had tiny little bumps all around my nose and my chin. I quickly changed to the original formula. After switching my face was perfectly fine! I recomend this one to anyone that has SUPER oily skin. I the the Matte fomula will just clog your pores and make you break out!

I will never use anything on my face, other than bareMinerals. From powders to liquids, I've tried everything on the market. My face itches from all of them, all of them except bareMinerals! Your face feels moist, fresh, and clean all day. Your pores don't feel clogged or suffocated. I reapply a touch-up around lunch time, but that's only because I have Rosacea. My touch-ups could also be needed because I can't stop touching my face! My face has never felt silkier or looked healthier. Just swirl, tap, and buff it on. It takes me less time to apply bareMinerals than the foundation I was using in the past. Make sure you use their toner or their moisturizer, which by the way you will also fall in love with. Give this product a try... any age, any skin condition, any excuse... just try it!
I only use this for makeup - it's great
